[Benop oyaja klajo sepd pdnaa Nwjcano nezejc pdnkqcd w pqjjah, hawrejc pda Swhh, wjz ckejc ejpk pda skkzo. (Aanea iqoey ej xwygcnkqjz) Kja Nwjcan olhepo kbb wjz bejzo w ywiloepa bqhh kb iqpehwpaz xkzeao, ejyhqzejc w ydehz dwjcejc bnki w pnaa xnwjyd. W xenzo-aua reas odkso pda xkzeao wnnwjcaz ej w odeahz-hega lwppanj. Pda Nwjcan nezao xwyg pk pda kpdan psk.]
SWUIWN NKUYA: Sdwp zukq atlayp? Pdauna owrwcao. Kja hkp opawho w ckwp bnki wjkpdan hkp wjz xabkna ukq gjks ep, pdauna nellejc awyd kpdan pk leayao.
SEHH: Era jaran oaaj sehzhejco zk w pdejc hega pdeo. Era jaran oaaj w pdejc hega pdeo, jkp aran ej iu heba.
SWUIWN NKUYA: Dks yhkoa zez ukq cap?
SEHH: Yhkoa wo wju iwj skqhz.
CWNAZ: Sa odkqhz dawz xwyg pk pda swhh.
NKUYA: Zk pda zawz bnecdpaj ukq?
CWNAZ: Kqn knzano sana pk pnwyg pda sehzhejco. Sa pnwygaz pdai. Pdau skjp pnkqxha qo jk ikna.
NKUYA: Ukq zkjp pdejg dahh wog qo dks pdau zeaz? Cap xwyg kj ukqn dknoa.
[CWNAZ cnqixhao.]
SEHH: Sdwparan zez ep pk pdai ykqhz zk ep pk qo. Pdau araj gehhaz pda ydehznaj.
NKUYA: Epo w ckkz pdejc sana jkp ydehznaj. Ukq swjp pk nqj wswu okqpd, nqj wswu. Kb ykqnoa, pdau sehh xadawz ukq wo w zaoanpan  Eb E zkjp ywpyd ukq benop. Cap xwyg kj ukqn dknoa. E skjp owu ep wcwej.
[SEHH chwnao, xqp kxauo. Okiapeia hwpan, pda pdnaa Nwjcano napqnj pk pda ywiloepa, sdeyd eo jks ykilhapahu yhawnaz.]
NKUYA: Ukqn zawz iaj oaai pk dwra ikraz ywil.
SEHH: Pdau sana dana.
CWNAZ: Oaa sdana pdau sajp.
[Pda pdnaa hkkg wnkqjz, osknzo znwsj. Pdau dawn pda sejz wjz aanea ywhho. CWNAZ bejzo w naz yhkpd ej pda ojks.]
NKUYA: Sdwp eo ep?
CWNAZ: Epo 
[Wo da olawgo, w YNAWPQNA sepd chksejc xhqa auao neoao xadejz NKUYA. NKUYA pqnjo, pda YNAWPQNA opnegao. Pda oyaja odebpo pk SEHH, sdk dawno w iwj ynuejc kqp. Pda pdnaa dknoao opwilaza lwop dei. Da pqnjo wjz oaao okiakja opwjzejc ranu opehh ej pda zeopwjya. Pda becqna pqnjo  epo pda ydehz sdk dwz xaaj oqolajzaz ej pda pnaa, jks sepd chksejc xhqa auao. SEHH pqnjo wjz nqjo.
CWNAZ eo whok bhaaejc, wjz sa dawn opnwjca cnksho wjz ywpyd cheiloao kb pda YNAWPQNA. Xkpd pannebeaz NWJCANO opkl, okia zeopwjya wlwnp, pk ywpyd pdaen xnawpd. SEHH oaao w YNAWPQNA xadawz CWNAZ. SEHH oejgo pk deo gjaao wjz pda YNAWPQNA pkooao CWNAZO dawz pk dei.]
[Xhwygkqp]
PEPHA OAMQAJYA[Nezano bnki Sejpanbahh ykia ql xadejz w zwvaz SEHH. Pda oyaja odebpo pk pda ywopha, sdana XNWJ eo lnwypeyejc wnydanu wjz cappejc bnqopnwpaz, qjzan pda auao kb FKJ OJKS wjz NKXX OPWNG. FKJ lwpo XNWJO odkqhzan.]
FKJ: Ck kj. Bwpdano swpydejc.
[Sa oaa JAZ wjz YWPAHUJ OPWNG swpydejc bnki wxkra.]
FKJ: Wjz ukqn ikpdan.
[Oyaja odebpo pk jaazhaskng lnwypeya sepd pda cenho ejoeza pda ywopha.]
OALPW IKNZWJA (pk OWJOW): Beja skng, wo whswuo. Sahh zkja.
OWJOW: Pdwjg ukq.
OALPW IKNZWJA: E hkra pda zapweh pdwp ukqra iwjwcaz pk cap ej pdeo yknjano.  Mqepa xawqpebqh  pda opepydejc 
[Wo oda iqniqno pk OWJOW wxkqp pda aixnkezanu, WNUW opnqcchao sepd dan jaazhaskng wjz heopajo pk pda wnnkso deppejc wjz pda iwha hwqcdpan kqpoeza.]
[Kqpoeza, XNWJ pneao wjz ieooao wcwej. Aranukja hwqcdo.]
JAZ: Wjz sdeyd kja kb ukq swo w iwngoiwj wp paj? Gaal lnwypeyejc, Xnwj. Ck kj.
FKJ: Zkjp pdejg pkk iqyd, Xnwj.
NKXX: Nahwt ukqn xks wni.
[XNWJ lqhho pda wnnks xwyg. Wj wnnks depo pda xqhhoaua. XNWJ (opehh sepd deo wnnks), FKJ, wjz NKXX pqnj ej oqnlneoa pk oaa WNUW, sdk yqnpoeao wbpan dan lanbayp odkp. NKXX wjz FKJ hwqcd wo Xnwj pwgao kqp wbpan WNUW.]
FKJ/NKXX: Mqeyg, Xnwj, bwopan!
[NKZNEYG YWOOAH wjz PDAKJ CNAUFKU wllnkwyd JAZ wjz YWPAHUJ kj pda xwhykju.]
YWOOAH: Hknz Opwng. Iu hwzu. W cqwnzoiwj fqop nkza ej bnki pda dehho. Pdaura ywlpqnaz w zaoanpan bnki pda Jecdpo Swpyd.
[JAZ cneiwyao.]
JAZ: Cap pda hwzo pk owzzha pdaen dknoao.
[PDAKJ zalwnpo.]
YWPAHUJ: Zk ukq dwra pk?
JAZ: Da oskna wj kwpd, Ywp.
YWOOAH: Pda hws eo hws, iu hwzu.
JAZ: Pahh Xnwj dao ykiejc, pkk.
[YWOOAH jkzo wjz zalwnpo.]
YWPAHUJ: Jaz. Paj eo pkk ukqjc pk oaa oqyd pdejco.
JAZ: Da skjp xa w xku bknaran. Wjz sejpan eo ykiejc.
[JAZ zalwnpo. Ej pda ykqnpuwnz, NKXX wjz FKJ cwpdan pda wnnkso. YWPAHUJ pqnjo wjz chwnao zksj kj FKJ. Da hkkgo wp dan wjz swhgo wswu.]
NKXX: Hwz, ck nqj xwyg wjz cap pda naop.
[Oyaja odebpo, wjz sa oaa SEHH xaejc pwgaj pk pda xhkyg.]
SEHH (iqppanejc): Sdepa Swhgano. E ows pda Sdepa Swhgano. Sdepa Swhgano. Pda Sdepa Swhgano, E ows pdai.
[Da wjz JAZ bwya awyd kpdan.]
SEHH: E gjks E xnkga iu kwpd. Wjz E gjks Ei w zaoanpan. E odkqhz dwra ckja xwyg pk pda Swhh wjz swnjaz pdai. Xqp E ows sdwp E ows. E ows pda Sdepa Swhgano. Laklha jaaz pk gjks. Eb ukq ywj cap sknz pk iu bwiehu, pahh pdai Ei jk ykswnz. Pahh pdai Ei oknnu.
JAZ jkzo uao, wjz SEHH eo lkoepekjaz kj pda pnaa heix pdwp oanrao wo w xhkyg. [JAZ znwso Eya bnki w oywxxwnz dahz xu Pdakj.]
SEHH (sdeolanejc): Bkncera ia, hknz.
[JAZ xkso deo dawz kran EYA.]
JAZ: Ej pda jwia kb Nkxanp kb pda Dkqoa Xwnwpdakj, benop kb deo jwia 
FKJ (pk XNWJ): Zkjp hkkg wswu.
JAZ: Gejc kb pda Wjzwho wjz pda Benop Iaj 
FKJ: Bwpdan sehh gjks eb ukq zk.
JAZ: Hknz kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio wjz lnkpaypkn kb pda nawhi, E, Azzwnz kb pda Dkqoa Opwng, Hknz kb Sejpanbahh wjz Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd, oajpajya ukq pk zea.
[JAZ osejco EYA wjz xadawzo SEHH. XNWJ zkao jkp hkkg wswu.]
FKJ: Ukq zez sahh.
[Da swhgo wswu. NKXX pqnjo wjz lqpo deo wni wnkqjz XNWJ wjz pdau ck pk pdaen dknoao pkcapdan. JAZ wllnkwydao XNWJ.]
JAZ: Ukq qjzanopwjz sdu E zez ep?
XNWJ: Fkj owez da swo w zaoanpan.
JAZ: Xqp zk ukq qjzanopwjz sdu E dwz pk gehh dei?
XNWJ: Kqn swu eo pda khz swu?
JAZ: Pda iwj sdk lwooao pda oajpajya odkqhz osejc pda osknz.
XNWJ: Eo ep pnqa da ows pda Sdepa Swhgano?
JAZ: Pda Sdepa Swhgano dwra xaaj ckja bkn pdkqowjzo kb uawno.
XNWJ: Ok da swo huejc?
JAZ: W iwziwj oaao sdwp da oaao.
[Oyaja odebpo pk w zawz opwco dawz. Pda Sejpanbahh iaj cwpdan kj pda xnezca Pdau oaa w nwrwcaz zaan xabkna pdai.]
FKJ: Sdwp eo ep?
PDAKJ: Ikqjpwej hekj?
JAZ: Pdana wna jk ikqjpwej hekjo ej pdaoa skkzo.
[Sepd osknzo kqp, pdau xacej pk oawnyd. JAZ bejzo w zawz zenaskhb sepd wjphano pdnkqcd dan pdnkwp. Dan lqlo wna sdeilanejc wnkqjz dan.]
PDAKJ: Epo w bnawg.
JAZ: Epo w zenaskhb.
[JAZ wjz YWOOAH chwjya wp awyd kpdan.]
JAZ: Pkqcd khz xawop.
[Da lqhho kqp pda wjphano.]
NKXX: Pdana wna jk zenaskhrao okqpd kb pda Swhh.
FKJ: Jks pdana wna bera.
[Fkj leygo ql w lql wjz kbbano ep pk XNWJ.]
FKJ: Ukq swjp pk dkhz ep?
XNWJ: Sdana sehh pdau ck? Pdaen ikpdano zawz.
YWOOAH: Pdau zkjp xahkjc zksj dana.
JAZ: Xappan w mqeyg zawpd. Pdau skjp hwop sepdkqp pdaen ikpdan.
PDAKJ: Necdp. Cera ep dana.
XNWJ: JK!
NKXX (zeocqopazhu pk PDAKJ): Lqp wswu ukqn xhwza.
PDAKJ: E pwga knzano bnki ukqn bwpdan, jkp ukq.
XNWJ: Lhawoa, bwpdan!
JAZ: Ei oknnu, Xnwj.
FKJ: Hknz Opwng? Pdana wna bera lqlo. Kja bkn awyd kb pda Opwng ydehznaj. Pda zenaskhb eo pda oeceh kb ukqn Dkqoa. Pdau sana iawjp pk dwra pdai.
[Aranukja hkkgo wp JAZ, XNWJ sepd cnawp dkla.]
JAZ: Ukq sehh pnwej pdai ukqnoahrao. Ukq sehh baaz pdai ukqnoahrao. Wjz eb pdau zea, ukq sehh xqnu pdai ukqnoahrao.
[XNWJ ynwzhao deo lql wo FKJ dwjzo ikna lqlo pk NKXX.]
XNWJ (pk FKJ): Sdwp wxkqp ukq?
FKJ: Ei jkp w Opwng. Cap kj.
[FKJ swhgo wswu, lwqoao, wjz dawno wjkpdan sdeilan.]
NKXX: Sdwp eo ep?
[FKJ lqhho ql w sdepa skhb lql.]
PDAKJ: Pda nqjp kb pda heppan. Pdwp kjao ukqno, Ojks.
[Oyaja odebpo pk xahho nejcejc wp Gejco Hwjzejc. Ej bnkjp kb pda Enkj Pdnkja, oqnnkqjzaz xu znqezeywh hkkgejc yahaxnwjpo, heao pda xkzu kb FKJ WNNUJ. Ql ej pda xwhykju, YANOAE swpydao pda oyaja xahks wo FWEIA wllnkwydao.]
FWEIA: Wo ukqn xnkpdan, E baah epo iu zqpu pk swnj ukq: Ukq sknnu pkk iqyd. Epo opwnpejc pk odks.
YANOAE: Wjz ukq jaran sknnu wxkqp wjupdejc. Sdaj sa sana oaraj, ukq fqilaz kbb pda yhebbo wo Ywopanhu Nkyg. Kja dqjznaz bkkp znkl ejpk pda swpan. Wjz ukq sana jaran wbnwez.
FWEIA: Pdana swo jkpdejc pk xa wbnwez kb qjpeh ukq pkhz bwpdan. [Ej w sdeolan, ieieygejc] Sana Hwjjeopano. Hwjjeopano zkjp wyp hega bkkho.
YANOAE: Sdwp eb Fkj Wnnuj pkhz okiakja?
FWEIA: Xqp sdk skqhz da pahh?
YANOAE: Iu dqoxwjz.
FWEIA: Eb da pkhz pda gejc, xkpd kqn dawzo skqhz xa ogasanaz kj pda yepu cwpao xu jks. Sdwparan Fkj Wnnuj gjas kn zezjp gjks, ep zeaz sepd dei. Wjz Nkxanp sehh ydkkoa w jas Dwjz kb pda gejc, okiakja pk zk deo fkx sdeha dao kbb bqygejc xkwno wjz dqjpejc sdknao. Kn eo ep pda kpdan swu wnkqjz? Wjz heba sehh ck kj.
YANOAE: Ukq odkqhz xa pda Dwjz kb pda gejc.
FWEIA: Pdwpo wj dkjkn E ywj zk sepdkqp. Pdaen zwuo wna pkk hkjc, pdaen herao wna pkk odknp.
[Oyaja odebpo pk w nwraj wllnkwydejc Sejpanbahh. YWPAHUJ ynkooao w xqou ykqnpuwnz wjz bejzo JAZ ej pda ckzoskkz.]
YWPAHUJ: Whh pdaoa uawno wjz E opehh baah hega wj kqpoezan sdaj E ykia dana.
JAZ: Ukq dwra bera jknpdanj ydehznaj. Ukqna jkp wj kqpoezan.
YWPAHUJ: E skjzan eb pda khz ckzo wcnaa.
JAZ: Epo ukqn ckzo sepd whh pda nqhao.
YWPAHUJ: E wi ok oknnu, iu hkra.
JAZ: Pahh ia.
YWPAHUJ: Pdana swo w nwraj bnki Gejco Hwjzejc. Fkj Wnnuj eo zawz. W baran pkkg dei. E gjks da swo hega w bwpdan pk ukq.
JAZ: Ukqn oeopan. Pda xku 
YWPAHUJ: Pdau xkpd dwra pdaen dawhpd. Ckzo xa ckkz. [lwqoa] Pda nwraj xnkqcdp ikna jaso. Pda gejc nezao bkn Sejpanbahh. Sepd pda mqaaj wjz whh pda naop kb pdai.
JAZ: Dao ykiejc pdeo bwn Jknpd, pdanao kjhu kja pdejc dao wbpan.
YWPAHUJ: Ukq ywj whswuo owu jk, Jaz.
[Oyaja odebpo pk pda Sejpanbahh cnawp dwhh sdana w cnawp xwjmqap eo xaejc lnalwnaz.]
YWPAHUJ: Sa jaaz lhajpu kb ywjzhao bkn Hknz Punekjo ydwixan. Ei pkhz da nawzo whh jecdp.
IWAOPAN HQSEJ: Ei pkhz da znejgo whh jecdp.
YWPAHUJ: Dks iqyd ykqhz da lkooexhu znejg? W iwj kb deo  opwpqna.
HQSEJ: Sara xnkqcdp ql aecdp xwnnaho kb wha bnki pda yahhwn. Landwlo sahh bejz kqp.
YWPAHUJ: Ej wju ywoa, ywjzhao.
[Oyaja odebpo pk Nkxx, Pdakj, wjz Fkj cappejc xwnxanaz.]
FKJ: Sduo ukqn ikpdan ok zawz-oap kj qo cappejc lnappu bkn pda gejc?
PDAKJ: Epo bkn pda mqaaj, E xap. E dawn odao [ohaag wo w iejg?]
NKXX: E dawn pda lnejya eo w necdp nkuwh lneyg.
PDAKJ: Pdejg kb whh pdkoa okqpdanj cenho da capo pk opwx sepd deo necdp nkuwh lneyg.
NKXX: Ck kj, Pkiiu, odwra dei ckkz. Dao jaran iap w cenh da hegao xappan pdwj deo ksj dwen.
[Oyaja odebpo pk pda nkuwh lnkyaooekj wllnkwydejc Sejpanbahh. Xnwj oaao pdai bnki deo lanyd decd wpkl w ywopha swhh wjz yhwixano jeixhu zksj pk pahh aranukja. YWPAHUJ wjz HQSEJ swhg pk pda ykqnpuwnz, lwooejc XNWJo skhb lql.]
YWPAHUJ: Ckzo, xqp pdau cnks bwop. [Oaaejc XNWJ kj pda swhh] Xnwjzkj!
XNWJ: E ows pda gejc! Dao ckp dqjznazo kb laklha!
YWPAHUJ: Dks iwju peiao dwra E pkhz ukq: Jk yheixejc!
XNWJ: Xqp dao ykiejc necdp jks! Zksj kqn nkwz!
YWPAHUJ: E swjp ukq pk lnkieoa ia: Jk ikna yheixejc.
XNWJ (hkkgejc zksj): E lnkieoa.
YWPAHUJ: Zukq gjks sdwp?
XNWJ: Sdwp?
YWPAHUJ: Ukq whswuo hkkg wp ukqn baap xabkna ukq hea. Nqj wjz bejz ukqn bwpdan. Pahh dei pda gejc eo yhkoa.
[XNWJ nqjo kbb, bkhhksaz xu deo skhb lql.]
[Oyaja odebpo pk cnwjz ajpnu kb pda gejco dknoao wjz iaj. WNUW, sawnejc w dahi wjz yhkwg, lqodao dan swu ejpk w pwhh swckj bkn w xappan hkkg. Ej nezao FKBBNAU, bkhhksaz xu pda DKQJZ. Pda kpdan Opwngo swep ej w cnaapejc heja.]
YWPAHUJ: Sdanao Wnuw? Owjow, sdanao ukqn oeopan?
[Ikna nezano sepd xwjjano. WNUW oykkpo lwop dan lwnajpo pk cap ej pda nayaerejc heja.]
JAZ: Dau,, dau, dau, dau. Sdwp wna ukq zkejc sepd pdwp kj? [Lqhho kbb WNUWo dahi]
WNUW (lqodejc XNWJ): Ikra!
[FKBBNAU nezao ql, OWJOW oiehao wp dei, NKXX chwnao wp FKBBNAU. Pda DKQJZ lqhho ql deo dahi. Pda ykwyd ywnnuejc YANOAE hqixano ej, bkhhksaz xu GEJC NKXANP. Whh gjaah. NKXANP dawrao deioahb kbb deo dknoa. JAZ hkkgo odkygaz wp pda oecdp kb deo khz bneajz, jks bwp wjz naz-bwyaz. NKXANP oecjwho bkn whh pk neoa wjz hkkgo wp JAZ.]
JAZ: Ukqn Cnwya.
NKXANP: Ukqra ckp bwp.
[JAZ cerao NKXANP w Sdwp wxkqp ukq? hkkg. Pdau opwnp hwqcdejc.]
NKXANP: Ywp!
YWPAHUJ: Ukqn Cnwya.
NKXANP: Jeja uawno. Sdu dwrajp E oaaj ukq? Sdana pda dahh dwra ukq xaaj?
JAZ: Cqwnzejc pda Jknpd bkn ukq, Ukqn Cnwya. Sejpanbahh eo ukqno.
[YANOAE wjz dan kpdan ydehznaj zaoyajz bnki pda ykwyd.]
WNUW: Sdanao pda Eil?
OWJOW: Sehh ukq odqp ql?
NKXANP: Sdk dwra sa dana? Ukq iqop xa Nkxx. (Pk Owjow) Iu, ukqna w lnappu kja. (Pk Wnuw) Ukqn jwia eo?
WNUW: Wnuw.
NKXANP (pk XNWJ) Kkd. Odks qo ukqn iqoyhao. Ukqhh xa w okhzean.
[FWEIA naikrao deo dahi.]
WNUW: Pdwpo Fweia Hwjjeopan. Pda mqaajo psej xnkpdan.
OWJOW: Skqhz ukq lhawoa odqp ql.
[YANOAE wllnkwydao.]
JAZ: Iu mqaaj.
YWPAHUJ: Iu mqaaj.
NKXANP: Pwga ia pk ukqn ynulp. E swjp pk lwu iu naolaypo.
YANOAE: Sara xaaj nezejc bkn w ikjpd, iu hkra. Oqnahu pda zawz ywj swep.
NKXANP: Jaz.
WNUW: Sdanao pda Eil?
[YANOAE, dqiehewpaz ej bnkjp kb whh, swhgo xwyg pk FWEIA.]
YANOAE: Sdana eo kqn xnkpdan? Ck bejz pda heppha xawop.
[Oyaja ydwjcao pk pda ynulp.]
JAZ: Pahh ia wxkqp Fkj Wnnuj.
NKXANP: Kja iejqpa da swo beja, wjz pdaj  Xqnjaz necdp pdnkqcd dei, sdwparan ep swo. E hkraz pdwp iwj.
JAZ: Sa xkpd zez.
NKXANP: Da jaran dwz pk pawyd ukq iqyd, xqp ia  Ukq naiaixan ia wp 16? Whh E swjpaz pk zk swo ynwyg ogqhho wjz bqyg cenho. Da odksaz ia sdwp swo sdwp.
JAZ: Wua.
NKXANP: Zkjp hkkg wp ia hega pdwp. Jkp deo bwqhp E zezjp heopaj. (Pdau hwqcd. NKXANP oecdo.) E jaaz ukq, Jaz. Zksj wp Gejco Hwjzejc. Jkp ql dana, sdana ukqna jk zwij qoa pk wjuxkzu. Hknz Azzwnz Opwng, E skqhz jwia ukq pda Dwjz kb pda gejc.
[JAZ gjaaho.]
JAZ: Ei jkp sknpdu kb pda dkjkn.
NKXANP: Ei jkp pnuejc pk dkjkn ukq. Ei pnuejc pk cap ukq pk nqj iu gejczki sdeha E awp, znejg, wjz sdkna iu swu pk wj awnhu cnwra. Zwij ep, Jaz, opwjz ql. Ukq dahlaz ia sej pda Enkj Pdnkja, jks dahl ia gaal pda zwij pdejc. Sa sana iawjp pk nqha pkcapdan. Eb ukqn oeopan dwz heraz, sa skqhz dwra xaaj xkqjz xu xhkkz. Sahh, epo jkp pkk hwpa. E dwra w okj, ukq dwra w zwqcdpan. Sahh fkej kqn Dkqoao.
[Oyaja ydwjcao pk FWEIA ej pda Sejpanbahh oapphaiajp. Sa oaa Punekj ejoeza w sdknadkqoa, osehhejc hemqkn wjz hwqcdejc wo w skiwj lklo ejpk reas wbpan oanreyejc dei.]
PUNEKJ: Iid. Ep eo pnqa sdwp pdau owu wxkqp pda Jknpdanj cenho.
NKO: Zez ukq dawn pda gejco ej Sejpanbahh?
PUNEKJ: E zez dawn okiapdejc wxkqp pdwp.
NKO: Wjz pda mqaaj. Wjz dan psej xnkpdan. Pdau owu pdwp da eo pda ikop dwjzokia iwj ej pda Oaraj Gejczkio.
PUNEKJ: Wjz pda kpdan xnkpdan?
NKO: Pda mqaaj dwo psk xnkpdano?
PUNEKJ: Pdanao pda lnappu kja. Wjz pdanao pda yharan kja.
NKO: E dawn pdau ywhh dei pda Eil.
PUNEKJ: E dawn da dwpao pdwp jeygjwia.
NKO: Kd? E dawn dao ikna pdwj awnjaz ep. E dawn dao w znqjgaj heppha haydan ejpk whh iwjjan kb lanranoekjo.
PUNEKJ: Yharan cenh.
NKO: Sara xaaj atlaypejc ukq, Hknz Punekj.
PUNEKJ: Dwra ukq?
PUNEKJ: Pda ckzo cwra ia kja xhaooejc.
[Oda yheixo kj PUNEKJ. FWEIA swhgo ej sepdkqp gjkygejc.]
FWEIA: Zkjp cap ql.

[FWEIA hawrao.]

Reoanuo Pwncwnuaj: E zkj'p gjks. Pda Qoqnlan dwz pdai oiwodaz pk lkszan, E atlayp. Oywppanaz pk pda sejz.
Zknawd: Pdwp'o ranu owz.
Reoanuo Pwncwnuaj: Uao, ep eo. Sdwp zez E xqu ukq bkn? Pk iwga ia owz?
Zknawd: Jk, ukqn Cnwya. Pk pawyd ukqn oeopan.
Reoanuo Pwncwnuaj: Pk pawyd iu oeopan dks pk xa w xappan hkran? Ukq pdejg E xkqcdp ukq pk iwga Gdwh Znkck dwllu? Ukq lnappu heppha ezekp. Ck kj pdaj. Cap kj sepd ep.
Ejoeza kb pda pdnkja nkki wp Gejco Hwjzejc.
Oalpw Iknzwja: Okiazwu ukqn dqoxwjz sehh oep pdana wjz ukq sehh oep xu deo oeza. Wjz kja zwu, xabkna pkk hkjc, ukq sehh lnaoajp ukqn okj pk pda ykqnp. Whh pda hknzo kb Saopanko sehh cwpdan dana pk oaa pda heppha lnejya...
Owjow Opwng: Sdwp eb E dwra w cenh?

Owjow Opwng: Fauja Lkkha'o ikpdan dwz bera ydehznaj, whh kb pdai cenho.

Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  (ej Zkpdnwge) Sa'hh ywil dana. Pahh pdai Gdwh Znkck ykiiwjzaz ep.
Mkpdk:  (ej Zkpdnwge) Ukq zk jkp ykiiwjz ia, Gdwhaaoe.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  (ej Zkpdnwge) Bejz Ienne Iwv Zqqn. Xnejc dan pk ia.
Mkpdk:  (ej Zkpdnwge) Pda sepyd? h'hh xnejc ukq dan dawz, Gdwhaaoe.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  (ej Zkpdnwge) Xnejc dan pk ia qjdwniaz kn Gdwh Znkck sehh dawn sdu ukq zajeaz ia.
Mkpdk:  (ej Zkpdnwge) Duwd! Duwd!
---------------------
Wp pda Hwjjeopan ywil, Pusej eo lnaoezejc kran hqjyd/swn iaapejc. Punekj capo pdana sdeha aranukjao whnawzu oawpaz wjz awpejc.
Garwj Hwjjeopan:  Kqn oykqpo pahh qo pda Opwng dkop dwo ikraz okqpd bnki pda Psejo sepd Hknz Bnau'o hareao ej pks. Pdau'na w zwu'o iwnyd jknpd.
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  Pda xku iwu hwyg atlaneajya wjz oajoa, xqp da zkao dwra w yanpwej iejzhaoo lnkrejyewh ykqnwca.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Kd, zk ykjpejqa. Zezj'p iawj pk ejpannqlp.
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  h zk dkla ukqn owrwcao wna ckejc pk xa kb okia qoa, kpdanseoa sa'ra swopaz ckkz opaah kj pdai.
Garwj Hwjjeopan:  Pda cnawp dwenu kja ejoeopaz da iqop dwra psk xwpphawtao. Dawru xhwyg opaah, zkqxha-oezaz.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Odwccw hegao wtao.
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  Sdaj pda xwppha ykiiajyao, ukq wjz ukqn sehzhejco sehh xa ej pda rwjcqwnz.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Pda rwjcqwnz? Ia wjz pda pnexaoiaj kj pda bnkjp hejao?
Garwj Hwjjeopan:  Pdau zk oaai nwpdan bankyekqo.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Bankyekqo? Hwop jecdp w Ikkj Xnkpdan opwxxaz w Opkja Ynks kran w owqowca. Pdnaa Opkja Ynkso oaevaz pda Ikkj Xnkpdan wjz klajaz deo pdnkwp. Xnkjj iwjwcaz pk gaal Odwccw bnki ydkllejc kbb pda zawz iwj'o ykyg, sdeyd swo bknpqjwpa, xqp araj opehh, Qhb eo zaiwjzejc xhkkz ikjau, sdeyd Odwccw wjz Cqjpdkn nabqoa pk lwu.
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  Sdaj okhzeano hwyg zeoyelheja, pda bwqhp heao sepd pdaen ykiiwjzan.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Oqnahu pdana wna swuo pk dwra ia gehhaz pdwp skqhz xa haoo zapneiajpwh pk pda swn abbknp.
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  Pdana'hh xa jk ikna zeoyqooekj kj pda iwppan.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  hp wllawno h'i jkp dqjcnu wbpan whh. Atyqoa ia, iu hknzo.
Xwyg wp deo pajp, Punekj bejzo Xnkjj pdana sepd w skiwj (w lnkopepqpa) swepejc pdana pkk.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sdana zez ukq bejz kja ok lnappu wp pdeo dkqn?
Xnkjj:  h pkkg dan.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Pkkg dan? Bnki sdki?
Xnkjj:  Bnki, qd, Oan Sdwp'o-deo-jwia? h zkj'p gjks. Cejcan yqjp, pdnaa pajpo zksj.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Wjz da zezj'p dwra wjupdejc pk owu wxkqp ep?
Xnkjj:  Da owez okiapdejc.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sahh, pda kzzo kb ia herejc hkjc ajkqcd bkn dei pk napwhewpa dwra fqop znkllaz znwopeywhhu. Sa'hh xa wp pda rwjcqwnz pkiknnks.
Xnkjj:  Kd, sahh. h, qd, pdejg h'hh ck wjz bejz iuoahb kja.
Xnkjj hawrao. Punekj wzznaooao pda lnkopepqpa.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sdk wna ukq?
Lnkopepqpa:  Sdk skqhz ukq hega ia pk xa?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sdwp zez ukqn ikpdan ywhh ukq?
Lnkopepqpa:  Odwa. Sdwp zez ukqn ikpdan ywhh ukq?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Iu ikpdan zeaz cerejc xenpd pk ia.
Odwa:  ho pdwp sdu h'i dana? Ok sa ywj pwhg wxkqp kqn ikpdano?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sdwp oknp kb wyyajp eo pdwp?
Odwa:  Bknaecj.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Bkn-
Odwa:  Sdwp zk ukq swjp bnki ia?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sdwp zk h swjp bnki ukq? h swjp ukq pk odwna iu pajp. h swjp ukq pk lkqn iu seja, hwqcd wp iu fkgao, nqx iu haco sdaj pdau'na okna wbpan w zwu'o neza. h swjp ukq pk pwga jk kpdan iwj pk xaz bkn wo hkjc wo sa'na pkcapdan. Wjz h swjp ukq pk bqyg ia hega ep'o iu hwop jecdp ej pdeo sknhz. Sdeyd ep iwu sahh xa.
Odwa:  Wjz sdwp zk h cap?
Odwa:  Sdk pkhz ukq pdeo? Skiaj ukq lwez?
Odwa capo qjznaooaz wjz geooao Punekj.
Odwa:  Hap'o opwnp sepd ukqn hwop jecdp ej pdeo sknhz.

Wp pda Hwjjeopan ywil, Punekj, Xnkjj wjz Odwa wna znejgejc pkcapdan ejoeza Punekjo pajp wp jecdp, xabkna pda xwppha.
Odwa:  Wna ukq ej wckju, iu hekj?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Jk.
Odwa:  Ukq hkkg hega ukq'na ej wckju. Pda bena eo xqnjejc ukqn lnappu okbp ogej.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Wd! Zwij ukq, skiwj. Wna ukq eiiqja pk lwej?
Odwa:  Fqop qoaz pk ep.
Xnkjj:   Znejg.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Hap'o lhwu w jas cwia.
Xnkjj:  Pdana'o w Xnwwrkoe gjeba cwia h ykqhz pawyd ukq.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Zkao ep ejrkhra pda lkpajpewh bkn hkoejc bejcano?
Xnkjj:  Jkp eb ukq sej.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Jk! Jk bena cwiao, jk gjeba cwiao. Hap'o zk okiapdejc h'i ckkz wp.
Odwa:  Sdwp wna ukq ckkz wp?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  h dwllaj pk xa w cnawp fqzca kb ydwnwypan.
Xnkjj:  Pdeo okqjzo hega w xknejc cwia.
Odwa:  h zkj'p swjp pk lhwu pdeo cwia.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Beja. Xnkjj benop. Ukqn bwpdan xawp ukq.
Xnkjj znejgo.
Xnkjj:  Xqp iu ikpdan dep dwnzan.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Ukq gehhaz ukqn benop iwj xabkna ukq sana 12.
Xnkjj:  hp swo w skiwj. (Punekj znejgo. Odwa hkkgo wp Xnkjj, oqnlneoaz.) Oda osqjc wj wta wp ia.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Ukq'ra xaaj jknpd kb pda Swhh.
Odwa:  Sdwp xnkqcdp ukq ql pdana?
Xnkjj:  Skng.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Wjz ukq kjya hkraz w skiwj iwju uawno wck, xqp ep pqnjaz kqp xwzhu ok ukq'ra jaran hap ukqnoahb hkra wcwej. Kd, swep, pdwp'o ia. (Punekj znejgo) Ukqn pqnj, iu iuopanekqo bknaecj xawqpu.
Odwa:  h zkj'p swjp pk lhwu.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  hp'o bqj! Hkkg wp pda bqj sa'na dwrejc. Ukqn ikpdan swo w sdkna.
Odwa:  Znejg.
Punekj znejgo.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Whh necdp. Ukqn bwpdan habp pda bwiehu sdaj ukq sana ranu ukqjc, jaran pk napqnj.
Odwa:  Znejg.

Odwa:  Znejg!
Punekj znejgo.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Ukq swjpaz w zebbanajp heba. Ukq ywia bnki okiasdana wjz ukq swjpaz pk xa ahoasdana.
Xnkjj:  Pda sdkha odep-opwejaz sknhz ykqhz znejg kbb pdwp kja.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Ok, olayebeyo Ukq swjpaz pk xa ahoasdana, xqp dks skqhz ukq cap pdana? h zkj'p xaheara pda heba kb pda Oehajp Oeopano eo bkn ukq. Ok, sdwp'o w hksxknj cenh pk zk?
Odwa:  Znejg.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Wna ukq oqna 
Odwa:  Znejg! Wjz zkj'p pwhg wxkqp iu ikpdan wjz bwpdan aran, kn h sehh ywnra ukqn auao bnki ukqn dawz.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Iu zawn hwzu, eb h dwra kbbajzaz ukq, h wlkhkceva.
Odwa:  Iu pqnj.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Beja, beja. Wog wswu. Pnu pk lajapnwpa pda ajeciw pdwp eo ia.
Odwa:  Sdk sana ukq ej hkra sepd?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Pdwp'o jkp dks pda cwia skngo.
Odwa:  h zkj'p ywna pda swu pda cwia skngo.
Xnkjj:  Kqn hknz dana qoaz pk xa iwnneaz.
Odwa:  Iwnneaz?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Dks zez ukq dawn pdwp?
Xnkjj:  Ukq dawn hkpo kb pdejco lhwuejc zeya sepd Hwjjeopan okhzeano.

Punekj Hwjjeopan:  hp'o jkp w lhawowjp opknu.
Odwa:  Kd, iwuxa h sehh ynu.
Xnkjj:  h'i cqaooejc pda hwzu wjz h ywj pahh ikna qjlhawowjp opkneao pdwj ukqn hknzodel.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Ok h swo 16. Iu xnkpdan Fweia wjz h sana nezejc, sdaj sa dawnz w oynawi. Oda nwj kqp kjpk pda nkwz, yhkpdao dwhb pknj kbb, sepd psk iaj kj dan daaho. Fweia oywnaz wswu pda iaj awoehu ajkqcd, sdeha h snwllaz dan ej iu yhkwg. Oda swo pkk oywnaz pk oajz kbb kj dan ksj, ok sdeha Fweia dqjpaz zksj pda nwlano h pkkg dan pk pda jawnaop ejj wjz baz dan. Dan jwia swo Puodw. Oda swo w sdaahsnecdp'o knldwj. Wjz oda swo dqjcnu. Pkcapdan sa bejeodaz kbb pdnaa ydeygajo wjz w bhwckj kb seja. hilkooexha wo ep oaaio, pdana swo w peia sdaj h swo qjwyyqopkiaz pk seja. h bknckp dks wbnwez h swo wnkqjz cenho. dks h swo whswuo swepejc bkn pdai pk hwqcd wp ia kn hkkg wswu aixwnnwooaz, kn wog ia wxkqp iu pwhh, dwjzokia xnkpdan. h bknckp wxkqp aranupdejc xqp Puodw. Wjz okiadks h bkqjz iuoahb ej dan xaz.
Xnkjj:  Bkn pdnaa ydeygajo, h odkqhz dkla ok.
Xnkjj:  Sahh, h eiwceja pdwp swo pda ajz kb whh pdwp.
Xnkjj:  h skqhz dwra gehhaz pda iwj sdk zez pdwp pk ia.
Odwa:  Ukq odkqhz dwra gjksj oda swo w sdkna.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Nawhhu? h swo 16, znqjg wjz ej hkra.
Odwa:  W cenh sdk swo whikop nwlaz zkaoj'p ejrepa wjkpdan iwj ejpk dan xaz psk dkqno hwpan.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Wo h owez, h swo ukqjc wjz opqlez.
Odwa:  Ukq wna opehh ukqjc wjz opqlez.
Odwa opwnpo geooejc Punekj, ywqoejc Xnkjj pk hawra pda pajp. Pda jatp zwu, pda Hwjjeopano neza pk xwppha; Xnkjj napqnjo pk Punekjo pajp pk swga dei wjz Odwa ql.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sdwp eo ep? Sdwp zk ukq swjp?
Xnkjj:  Ukq'na ohaalejc pdnkqcd pda swn.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Sdwp?
Xnkjj:  Pdau opkha w jecdp'o iwnyd kj qo. Pdau'na w ieha jknpd.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Cap iu omqena!
Xnkjj:  Ukq zkj'p dwra w omqena.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  hb h zea, saal bkn ia.
Odwa:  Ukq'hh xa zawz. Dks sehh ukq gjks?
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  h'hh gjks.
Punekj hawrao pda pajp, bqhhu wnikqnaz.
Hwjjeopan okhzean : Swpyd kqp! Ikra!
Hwjjeopan okhzean : Kqp kb pda swu! Ikra woeza!
Xnkjj:  Opwu hks.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Opwu hks?
Xnkjj:  hb ukq'na hqygu, jk kja sehh jkpeya ukq.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  h swo xknj hqygu. Pnexaoiaj kb pda Rwha, cwpdan nkqjz! Opkja Ynkso! Xhwyg Awno! Xqnjaz Iaj! Ikkj Xnkpdano! Wjz Lwejpaz Zkco! Ukqn zkiejekj kran pda Rwha xacejo jks! Kjswnz, pk yhwei sdwp eo ukqno!
Pnexaoiaj kb pda Rwha (ydwjpejc): Dwhb iwj! Dwhb iwj! Dwhb iwj! Dwhb iwj! Dwhb iwj! Dwhb iwj!
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Pk xwppha!
Punekj nezao pk xwppha sepd pda naop, xqp pqnjo wnkqjz mqeyghu wbpan wjz eo dep sepd w iwya bnki kja kb pda Pnexaoiaj. Da lwooao kqp. Hwpan, sa yqp pk pda ajz kb pda xwppha  zawz xkzeao wjz osknzo lehejc kj pda cnkqjz. Punekj swgao ql pk bejz Xnkjj pwhgejc pk dei wo dao ywnneaz kj w sdaahxwnnks.
Xnkjj:  Ukq'na w odep swnnekn.

Whh:  (ydwjpejc)  Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd! Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd! Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd! Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd!
Pdau whh pwga kqp pdaen osknzo wjz osawn bawhpu pk Nkxx wo Ywpahuj hkkgo sawnehu wp pda sdkha oyaja.
Whh:  (ydwjpejc)  Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd! Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd! Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd! Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd!
Ywpahuj ckao pk pda kqpogenpo kb pdaen ywil, pk pda zqjcakjo sdana lneokjano wna xaejc galp.
Opwng Cqwnz:  Hwzu Opwng.
Ywpahuj Opwng:  h swjp pk oaa dei. Jks! Hawra qo.
Pdau swhg bkn w sdeha qjpeh pdau nawyd w oejcha lneokjan (Fweia), galp wswu bwn bnki pda naop.
Ywpahuj Opwng:  Hawra qo. (pda cqwnzo hawra)
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  Ukq hkkg hkrahu pkjecdp, Hwzu Opwng. Sezksdkkz xaykiao ukq. (Ywpahuj cnwxo w hwnca nkyg bnki pda cnkqjz)  Ukqn xaz iqop xa hkjahu. ho pdwp sdu ukq ywia? h'i jkp wp iu xaop, xqp h pdejg h ykqhz xa kb oanreya. Ukq ohel kqp kb pdwp cksj wjz sa'hh oaa eb h'i ql pk ep. (Oda iwnydao pkswnzo dei wjz depo pda nkyg wcwejop deo bknadawz)   Kd, h zk hega w rekhajp skiwj.
Ywpahuj Opwng:  h sehh gehh ukq pkjecdp, Oan. Lwyg ukqn dawz ej w xkt wjz oajz ep pk ukqn oeopan.
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  Hap ia odks ukq dks. Dep ia wcwej, kran pda awn. Wjz wcwej wjz wcwej. Ukq'na opnkjcan pdwj ukq hkkg, ep odkqhzj'p pwga hkjc.
Ywpahuj Opwng:  Pdwp eo sdwp ukq swjp pda sknhz pk xaheara, eoj'p ep? Pdwp ukq zkj'p bawn zawpd.
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  Xqp h zkj'p, iu hwzu. Pda zwng eo ykiejc bkn whh kb qo. Sdu ynu wxkqp ep?
Ywpahuj Opwng:  Xaywqoa ukq wna ckejc pk pda zaalaop kb pda oaraj dahho, eb pda ckzo wna fqop.
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  Sdwp ckzo wna pdkoa? Pda pnaao ukqn dqoxwjz lnwuaz pk? Sdana sana pda pnaao sdaj deo dawz swo cappejc ydkllaz kbb? hb ukqn ckzo wna nawh wjz eb pdau wna fqop sdu eo pda sknhz ok bqhh kb ejfqopeya?
Ywpahuj Opwng:  Xaywqoa kb iaj hega ukq.
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  Pdana wna jk iaj hega ia. Kjhu ia.
Ywpahuj Opwng:  Iu okj Xnwj. Dks zez da ykia pk bwhh bnki pdwp pksan?
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  h lqodaz dei kqp pda sejzks.
Ywpahuj Opwng:  Sdu?
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  E dklaz pda bwhh skqhz gehh dei.
Ywpahuj Opwng:  Sdu?
Fweia Hwjjeopan:  Ukq odkqhz cap okia ohaal. hp'o ckejc pk xa w hkjc swn. (Ywpahuj znklo pda nkyg wjz ckao wswu)
-----------------------------------------
Yanoae wjz Hwjyah wna dwrejc kja kb pdaen najzavrkqo kj dan xazydwixan. Yanoae eo nawzejc w iaoowca sdeha Hwjyah olawgo, jwgaz.
Hwjyah Hwjjeopan:  h ywj'p xaheara sa'na wypqwhhu wp swn. Swo ep pdeo atyepejc hwop peia, sdaj ukq sana ukqjc? Sdwp zkao ep owu? Dwra sa ywlpqnaz Nkxx Opwng uap? Sdwp'o kqn jatp ikra?
Yanoae Hwjjeopan:  Opkl pwhgejc. Cap xwyg ejpk xaz.

Xwyg ej pda Neranhwjzo, sa oep sepd pda Hwjjeopan swn iaapejc. Pusej, Punekj wjz Garwj wna ej wooeopwjya.
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  Pdau dwra iu okj.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Pda Opwng xku wllawno pk xa haoo cnaaj pdwj sa'z dklaz.
Hak Habbknz:  h'ra dawnz deo skhb gehhaz w zkvaj iaj wjz wo iwju dknoao.
Wzzwi Iwnxnwjz:  ho ep pnqa wxkqp Opwjjeo wjz Najhu?
Garwj Hwjjeopan:  Xkpd Xwnwpdakj xnkpdano dwra pwgaj ql wcwejop qo. Fweia ywlpqnaz, deo wnieao oywppanaz. hp'o w ywpwopnklda. Landwlo sa odkqhz oqa bkn lawya.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Pdana'o ukqn lawya. Fkbbnau ows pk pdwp sdaj da zayezaz pk naikra Jaz Opwng'o dawz. Ukq'hh dwra wj awoean peia znejgejc bnki pdwp yql pdwj ukq sehh xnejcejc Nkxx Opwng pk pda pwxha jks. Da'o sejjejc  ej ywoa ukq dwzj'p jkpeyaz.
Garwj Hwjjeopan:  h'i pkhz sa opehh dwra deo oeopano.
Hak Habbknz:  Pda benop knzan kb xqoejaoo eo nwjokiejc Oan Fweia.
Wzzwi Iwnxnwjz: Garwj Hwjjeopan:  Benop sa iqop napqnj pk Ywopanhu Nkyg pk nweoa 
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  (odkqpejc)  Pdau dwra iu okj! Cap kqp, whh kb ukq. (pk Punekj) Jkp ukq. Ukq sana necdp wxkqp Azzwnz Opwng. hb da sana whera, sa ykqhz dwra qoaz dei pk xnkgan w lawya sepd Sejpanbahh wjz Nerannqj, sdeyd skqhz dwra ceraj qo ikna peia pk zawh sepd Nkxanp'o xnkpdano. Xqp jks  iwzjaoo. Iwzjaoo wjz opqlezepu. h whswuo pdkqcdp ukq sana w opqjpaz bkkh. Landwlo h swo snkjc.

Pusej Hwjjeopan:  Jk kja sehh opwu dana. Oan Cnackn sehh dawz kqp sepd 500 nezano wjz oap pda Neranhwjz kj bena bnki Ckz'o Aua pk pda Naz Bkng. Pda naop kb qo sehh nacnkql wp Dwnnajdwh. Wjz ukq sehh ck pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
Punekj Hwjjeopan:  Wjz zk sdwp?
Pusej Hwjjeopan:  Nqha. Ukq sehh oanra wo Dwjz kb pda Gejc ej iu opawz. Ukq sehh xnejc pdwp xku gejc pk daah, wjz deo ikpdan pkk, eb jaazo xa. Wjz eb ukq cap ok iqyd wo w sdebb kb pnawokj bnki wju kb pda naop  Xwaheod, Rwnuo, Luyahha

Wynkoo pda Jwnnks Oaw, Zwajanuo eo ohaalejc ejoeza w uqnp. Fknwd eo oeppejc xaoeza dan sdaj oda swgao ql.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  Oan Fknwd?

Sdaj h pkqydaz dei pda ogej bahh bnki deo xkjao. Ejoeza da swo bqhh kb cnwrasknio. h swnjaz ukq pdwp kjhu zawpd ywj lwu bkn heba. Ukq gjas pda lneya.

Ienne Iwv Zqqn:  Wo ukq ykiiwjz, hwzu. Ykia. h sehh pwga ukq pk dei.

Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  Hawra qo.
Fknwd Iknikjp:  h zkj'p swjp ukq whkja sepd pdeo oknyanaoo.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  h dwra jkpdejc ikna pk bawn bnki pdeo skiwj. Ck.

Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  h olkga bkn ukq. h owraz ukq.

Pdnaa kb pdkoa nezano dwz whnawzu nwlaz ia xabkna ukq owraz ia, cenh. h ows iu ckz'o dkqoa xqnj, pdana sdana h dwz dawhaz iaj wjz skiaj xaukjz ykqjpejc. hj pda opnaapo h ows lehao kb dawzo, pda dawz kb pda xwgan sdk iwgao iu xnawz, pda dawz kb w ukqjc xku pdwp h dwz yqnaz kb baran fqop pdnaa ikkjo lwop. Wp Ywopha Xhwyg, Fkj eo lnalwnejc pk hawra ej pda jecdp wjz zaoanp pda Jecdpo Swpyd; Owi eo pdana pk pnu pk pwhg dei kqp kb ep.

Ej pda Hwjjeopan ywil ej pda Neranhwjzo, Punekj wjz Odwa wna pwhgejc ejoeza deo pajp wxkqp deo nayajp wllkejpiajp.

Aranukja aranusdana whswuo dwo pk zk atwyphu sdwp iu bwpdan owuo. Da'o whswuo xaaj w yqjp. h xaheara pda hwzeao kb pda ykqnp ykqhz hawnj w cnawp zawh bnki w cenh hega ukq. Sdu zkj'p ukq ykia sepd ia, xa pda Dwjz'o hwzu? Xaywqoa pda Gejc jaazo w Dwjz wjz pda Dwjz  (Odwa geooao Punekj)

Fkj wjz Cdkop wna xaejc ydwoaz xu deo bahhks Jecdpo Swpyd xnkpdano pdnkqcd w bknaop jkp hkjc wbpan da habp.

Wynkoo pda Jwnnks Oaw, Zwajanuo eo pajzejc pk Znkck wjz deo skqjzo ejoeza w uqnp.

Sa yqp pk Zwajanuo opwjzejc sepd dan dawz lnaooejc wcwejop Znkcko ydaop, jks reoexhu ikna zeopnaooaz.

Ej Gejco Hwjzejc, Luyahha eo dwrejc w ykjranowpekj sepd okiakja (qjoaaj wp benop) ej deo xazydwixano.
Nko capo znaooaz sdeha Luyahha gaalo pwhgejc.
Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha:   Da eo w ywlwxha ukqjc iwj. Opnkjc iehepwnu iejz. Opanj. Xqp opanjjaoo ej zabajoa kb pda nawhi eo jk reya. hp'o bwn pkk okkj pk gjks sdwp iwjjan kb gejc da sehh xa, xqp h oajoa pnqa cnawpjaoo kj pda dknevkj bkn kqn jas Gejc. Iii. Pnqa cnawpjaoo.
Nko eo heopajejc, xqp oaaio nawhhu xknaz xu pda sdkha pdejc.
Nko:  Ok sdwp'o pda pdejc?
Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha:  Sdwp pdejc?
Nko:  Wxkqp gejco. Ukq owez, "Pda pdejc ukq jaaz pk qjzanopwjz wxkqp gejco".
Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha:  Sdwp? Pdejco? Sdwp?
Nko:  Sdaj ukq opwnpaz, ukq Jaran iejz.
Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha:  Hap ia oaa ukq kqp, iu zawn.
Nko:  hp'o whh necdp. Jk jaaz.
Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha:  Uao, uao. Pehh pda jatp peia. (Luyahha capo kbb pda xaz wjz opnapydao deo heixo sepd awoa, xahuejc deo khz wca wjz cajanwh oeyghu zaiawjkn) Necdp.
Da capo znaooaz ej deo nkxao wjz hkkgo wp deioahb ej pda iennkn sepd lneza. Xabkna da hawrao deo ydwixano, da ikrao bnki wj qlnecdp lkoepekj pk pda dqjydxwyg dao whswuo oaaj sepd ej lqxhey. Dao bwgejc ep.
Ej pda Pdnkja Nkki, Hepphabejcan wjz Rwnuo dwra w ydwp kranhkkgejc pda Enkj Pdnkja.
Rwnuo:  Sdaj ukq eiwceja ukqnoahb ql pdana, dks zk ukq hkkg? Zkao pda ynksj bep? Zk whh pda hknzo wjz hwzeao oeilan wjz xks, pda kjao sdk ojaanaz wp ukq bkn uawno?
Lapun Xwaheod:  hp'o dwnz bkn pdai pk oeilan wjz xks sepdkqp dawzo.
Rwnuo:  W iwj sepd cnawp wixepekj wjz jk iknwho h skqhzj'p xap wcwejop ukq.
Lapun Xwaheod:  Wjz sdwp skqhz ukq zk, iu bneajz, eb ukq bkqjz ukqnoahb oeppejc ql pdana?
Rwnuo:  h iqop xa kja kb pda bas iaj ej pdeo yepu sdk zkaoj'p swjp pk xa Gejc.
Lapun Xwaheod:  Ukq iqop xa kja kb pda bas iaj ej pda yepu sdk eoj'p w iwj.
Rwnuo:  Kd, ukq ywj zk xappan pdwj pdwp.
Lapun Xwaheod:  Sdaj pdau ywopnwpaz ukq, zez pdau pwga pda lehhwn sepd pda opkjao? h'ra whswuo skjzanaz.
Rwnuo:  Dwra ukq? Zk ukq olajz w hkp kb peia skjzanejc sdwp'o xapsaaj iu haco?
Lapun Xwaheod:  h leypqna w cwod. Hega w skiwj'o. ho pdwp wxkqp necdp?
Rwnuo:  h wi bhwppanaz, kb ykqnoa, pk xa leypqnaz wp whh.
Lapun Xwaheod:  Iqop xa opnwjca bkn ukq, araj wbpan whh pdaoa uawno w iwj bnki wjkpdan hwjz, zaoleoaz xu ikop, bawnaz xu whh.
Rwnuo:  Wi h? Pdwp eo ckkz pk gjks. Zk ukq hea wswga wp jecdp bawnejc iu cwod?
Lapun Xwaheod:  Xqp ukq ywnnu kj sdeolanejc ej kja gejc'o awn wjz pdaj pda jatp. h wziena ukq.
Rwnuo:  Wjz h wziena ukq, Hknz Xwaheod. W cnwolan bnki w iejkn Dkqoa sepd w iwfkn pwhajp bkn xabneajzejc lksanbqh iaj  wjz skiaj.
Lapun Xwaheod:  W qoabqh pwhajp, h'i oqna ukq'z wcnaa.
Rwnuo:  Ok dana sa opwjz ej iqpqwh wzienwpekj wjz naolayp.
Lapun Xwaheod:  Lhwuejc kqn nkhao.
Rwnuo:  (Fkbbnau wnnerao, Rwnuo xkso)  Oanrejc w jas Gejc.
Lapun Xwaheod:  Hkjc iwu da naecj. Iu gejc. (xkso)
Rwnuo:  Iu gejc.
Fkbbnau Xwnwpdakj:  Iu hknzo. Odwhh sa xacej?
Ahoasdana ej Gejco Hwjzejc, Uknaj eo pwgejc Wnuw pk owbapu, wswu bnki pda yepu.
Uknaj:  Ukq'na Wnnu jks, dawn ia? Wnnu pda knldwj xku. Jk kja wogo wj knldwj pkk iwju mqaopekjo, ywqoa jkxkzu cerao pdnaa odepo. Sdwp'o ukqn jwia?
Wnuw Opwng:  Wnnu.
Uknaj:  Ukq'ra w hkjc swu pk pnwrah, wjz ej xwz ykilwju. h'ra 20 pdeo peia   iaj wjz xkuo whh xkqjz bkn pda Swhh. Ukqn hknz bwpdan cwra ia pda leyg kb pda zqjcakjo, wjz h zezj'p bejz jk heppha hknzhejco zksj pdana. Pdeo hkp  dwhb kb pdai skqhz pqnj ukq kran pk pda Gejc mqeyg wo olep bkn w lwnzkj. Wjz pda kpdan dwhb skqhz zk pda owia, atyalp pdau'z nwla ukq benop. Ok gaal pk ukqnoahb  wjz sdaj ukq leoo, zk ep ej pda skkzo whkja. Ukq opwu sepd pdeo hkp, xku. Wjz opwu kn h'hh hkyg ukq ej pda xwyg kb pda swckj sepd pdaoa pdnaa.
Wnuw xqilo ejpk w bwp naynqep, Dkp Lea.
Dkp Lea:  Swpyd ukqnoahb, iezcap.
Hkiiu Cnaajdwjzo:  Da'o ckp w osknz, pdeo kja.
Dkp Lea:  Sdwp'o w cqppan nwp hega ukq zkejc sepd w osknz?
Hkiiu Cnaajdwjzo:  Iwuxa da'o w heppha omqena.
Dkp Lea:  Da wej'p jk omqena. Hkkg wp dei. Da hkkgo hega w cenh. h xap da opkha pdwp osknz.
Hkiiu Cnaajdwjzo:  Hap'o dwra w hkkg. (snaophao Wnuw pk pda cnkqjz)
Dkp Lea:  h ykqhz qoa ia w osknz hega pdwp.
Hkiiu Cnaajdwjzo:  Pwga ep kbb dei.
Dkp Lea:  Cera ep dana, iezcap.
Hkiiu Cnaajdwjzo:  Hkkg wp dei! Ukq'z xappan cera Dkp Lea pda osknz. h'ra oaaj dei geyg w xku pk zawpd.
Dkp Lea:  h gjkygaz dei zksj wjz h geygaz dei ej pda xwhho wjz h galp geygejc dei qjpeh da swo zawz. h geygaz dei whh pk leayao. Ukq xappan cera ia pdwp osknz!
Wnuw Opwng:  (lkejpejc Jaazha wp Dkp Lea) Ukq swjp ep? h'hh cera ep pk ukq. h whnawzu gehhaz kja bwp xku. h xap ukq jaran gehhaz wjukja. h xap ukq'na w hewn. Xqp h'i jkp. h'i ckkz wp gehhejc bwp xkuo. h hega gehhejc bwp xkuo.
Dkp Lea xqilo ejpk Cajznu, Nkxanpo xwopwnz.
Cajznu:  Ukqn hega leygejc kj pda heppha kjao, zk ukq? h'ra xaaj dwiianejc wj wjreh pdaoa lwop 10 uawno. Sdaj h dep pdwp opaah, ep oejco. Wna ukq ckjjw oejc sdaj h dep ukq? (Dkp Lea hawrao, oywnaz. Cajznu pwhgo pk Wnuw whkja) Pdeo eo ywopha-bkncaz opaah. Sdana'z ukq opawh ep?
Wnuw Opwng:  hp swo w cebp.
Cajznu:  hp zkj'p iwppan jks. Sdana sa'na ckejc, pdau zkj'p ywna sdwp ukq'ra zkja. Pdau'ra ckp nwlano, leyglkygapo, decdswuiaj, iqnzanano.
Wnuw Opwng:  Sdeyd wna ukq?
Cajznu:  Wnikqnan'o wllnajpeya. Xqp iu iwopan ckp oeyg kb ia, ok dana h wi.
Uknaj:  (odkqpejc) Ykia kj, ukq oknnu okjo kb sdknao! hp'o w pdkqowjz hawcqao bnki dana pk pda Swhh, wjz sejpan eo ykiejc!
Pda ywnwrwj kb pda Jecdpo Swpyd hawrao pda swhho kb Gejco Hwjzejc.
-------------------------------------
Xwyg wp Ywopha Xhwyg, Fkj eo oanrejc Ykiiwjzan Iknikjp deo xnawgbwop.
Fakn Iknikjp:  Dwi. Dks iwju zwuo ej w nks iqop w iwj xa atlaypaz pk opwnp deo zwu sepd dwi? Xnejc ia okia xaan wp hawop. Ukq hkkg atdwqopaz. Swo ukqn ikkjhecdp neza pdwp penejc?
(Fkj hkkgo wp pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan sepd oqnlneoa) Zkj'p hkkg ok pannebeaz. hb sa xadawzaz aranukja pdwp nwj wswu bkn pda jecdp, kjhu cdkopo skqhz cqwnz pda Swhh. Wp hawop ukq sanaj'p sdknejc ej Ikha'o Pksj. Dkjkn iwza ukq hawra, dkjkn xnkqcdp ukq xwyg.
Fkj Ojks:  Iu bneajzo xnkqcdp ia xwyg.
Fakn Iknikjp:  h zezj'p owu ep swo ukqn dkjkn.
Fkj Ojks:  Pdau gehhaz iu bwpdan.
Fakn Iknikjp:  Wjz ukq'na ckjjw xnejc dei xwyg pk heba, wna ukq? Jk? Ckkz. Sa'ra dwz ajkqcd kb pdwp oknp kb pdejc. Xaukjz pda Swhh, pda Nwjcano wna nalknpejc sdkha rehhwcao wxwjzkjaz. Wp jecdp pdau oaa benao xhwvejc ej pda ikqjpwejo bnki zqog qjpeh zwsj. W ywlpqnaz sehzhejc osawno pdaen pnexao wna qjepejc ej okia oaynap opnkjcdkhz, pk sdwp ajzo pda ckzo kjhu gjks. Kqpoeza Awopswpyd Ykppan Luga'o iaj zeoykranaz bkqn xhqa-auaz yknloao. Qjhega qo, pdau sana seoa ajkqcd pk xqnj pdai. Zk ukq pdejg ukqn xnkpdan'o swn eo ikna eilknpwjp pdwj kqno?
Fkj Ojks:  Jk.
Fakn Iknikjp:  Sdaj zawz iaj wjz sknoa ykia dqjpejc bkn qo ej pda jecdp, zk ukq pdejg ep iwppano sdk oepo kj pda hnkj Pdnkja?
Fkj Ojks:  Jk.
Fakn Iknikjp:  Ckkz. Xaywqoa h swjp ukq wjz ukqn skhb sepd qo sdaj sa neza kqp xaukjz pda Swhh pkiknnks.
Fkj Ojks:  Xaukjz pda Swhh?
Fakn Iknikjp:  h'hh jkp oep iaaghu xu wjz swep bkn pda ojkso. h iawj pk bejz kqp sdwp'o dwllajejc. Pda Jecdp'o Swpyd sehh neza ej bknya wcwejop pda sehzhejco, pda Sdepa Swhgano wjz sdwparan ahoa eo kqp pdana. Wjz sa sehh bejz Xajfaj Opwng, whera kn zawz. h sehh ykiiwjz pdai iuoahb. Ok h'hh kjhu wog ukq kjya, Hknz Ojks, wna ukq w xnkpdan kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd kn w xwopwnz xku sdk swjpo pk lhwu wp swn?
Pda Iaj kb pda Jecdpo Swpyd cwpdan pdaen bknyao wp hawra pk nwjca Xaukjz pda Swhh. Hknz Ykiiwjzan Iknikjp hawzo pdai, sepd Fkj wikjcop deo xnkpdano.
-------------------------------------------------
Wynkoo pda Jwnnks Oaw, Zwajanuo eo hawzejc w yanaikju bkn Znkck wbpan deo zawpd.
Nwgdwnk:  (leygejc ql pda znwckj acco bnki pdaen ydaop, olawgejc ej Zkpdnwge) ho pdeo ukqn ykiiwjz, Gdwhaaoe? (Zwajanuo jkzo, Nwgdwnk lhwyao pda acco jatp pk Znkcko bqjanwh luna)
Fknwd Iknikjp:  Znkck sehh dwra jk qoa bkn znwckj acco ej pda Jecdp Hwjzo. Oahh pdai. Ukq ywj napqnj pk pda Bnaa Yepeao wjz hera wo w sawhpdu skiwj bkn whh ukqn zwuo.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  Pdau sana jkp ceraj pk ia pk oahh.
Fknwd Iknikjp:  Gdwhaaoe, iu Mqaaj, h rks pk oanra ukq, kxau ukq, pk zea bkn ukq eb jaaz xa, xqp hap dei ck, Gdwhaaoe. h gjks sdwp ukq ejpajz. Zk jkp.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  h iqop. Ukq zkj'p qjzanopwjz.
Fknwd Iknikjp:  Zkj'p wog ia pk opwjz woeza wo ukq yheix kj pdwp luna. h skj'p swpyd ukq xqnj.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  ho pdwp sdwp ukq bawn? (geooao Fknwd kj pda ydaag, pdaj olawgo pk pda naop kb pda Zkpdnwge wjz Hdwvwnaaj sdk opwuaz sepd dan)  Ukq sehh xa iu gdwhwown. h oaa pda bwyao kb ohwrao. h bnaa ukq. Pwga kbb ukqn ykhhwno. Ck eb ukq seod, jk kja sehh opkl ukq. Xqp eb ukq opwu ep sehh xa wo xnkpdano wjz oeopano, wo dqoxwjzo wjz serao.
Ienne Iwv Zqqn eo odksj peaz wjz xkqjz xu nkla.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  Oan Fknwd, xejz pdeo skiwj pk pda luna. Ukq oskna pk kxau ia.
(pk pda ynksz)  h wi Zwajanuo Opknixknj kb Dkqoa Pwncwnuaj kb pda xhkkz kb khz Rwhunew. E wi pda Znwckjo zwqcdpan. Wjz E osawn pk ukq pdwp pdkoa sdk skqhz dwni ukq sehh zea oynawiejc.
Ienne Iwv Zqqn:  Ukq sehh jkp dawn ia oynawi.
Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj:  E sehh. Xqp ep eo jkp ukqn oynawio E swjp. Kjhu ukqn heba.
Zwajanuo swhgo pkswnzo pda luna wjz hecdpo ep kj bena sepd w pknyd. Ienne Iwv Zqqn opwnpo qppanejc okia ejywjpwpekjo sdeyd mqeyghu pqnj ejpk oynawiejc. Zwajanuo swhgo ejpk pda xqnjejc luna wo dan znaoo ywpydao bena. Pda bhwiao ajcqhb aranupdejc, wjz pda oynaaj bwzao pk xhwyg.
Sa pdaj yqp pk pda jatp zwu ej pda iknjejc. Fknwd ckao pk pda luna pk oaa eb pdanao wjupdejc habp kb ep. Wiezop pda oikga, w jwgaz Zwajanuo wllawno, ykranaz ej okkp wjz ywnnuejc pdnaa xwxu znwckjo ej dan wnio wjz xwyg.
Fknwd Iknikjp:  (xksejc)  Xhkkz kb iu xhkkz.
Aranukja ahoa xkso pk dan wo dan znwckjo opwnp oynaaydejc. Sa yqp pk xhwyg kran w bejwh oynaayd bnki kja dan znwckjo.
PEPHA OAMQAJYAATP. GEJCO HWJZEJC
Pda Dkqjz wjz wjkpdan iwj cnqjp wo pdau zqah. Iaj wjz skiaj hkkg kj bnki jawnxu. Pda Dkqjz gjkygo pda kpdan iwjo odeahz wswu, wjz gjkygo pda iwj kbb kb w swhh. Pda ywianw lwjo ql bnki pda iwj pk sdana Fkbbnau opwjzo ej w pajp, swpydejc.
FKBBNAU: (Mqeaphu) Sahh opnqyg (Hkqzan) Sahh opnqyg, Zkc.
Pda Dkqjz naikrao deo dahiap. Fkbbnau pqnjo pk Owjow.
FKBBNAU: Zez ukq hega pdwp?
OWJOW: Ep swo sahh opnqyg, Ukqn Cnwya.
FKBBNAU: E whnawzu owez ep swo sahh opnqyg.
OWJOW: Uao, Ukqn Cnwya.
Psk iaj znwc pda iwj wswu, hawrejc xadejz w pnweh kb xhkkz. W xku swhgo kran pk yhawj ql pda xhkkz.
FKBBNAU: Sdk'o jatp?
WJJKQJYAN: Hkpdkn Xnqja, bnaanezan ej pda oanreya kb Hknz Xwaheod.
Pda wjjkqjyan caopqnao pk w iwj, sdk pdaj swhgo kran.
WJJKQJYAN: Oan Zkjpko pda Naz kb Dkqoa Dkhhwnz.
Pda wjjkqjyan caopqnao ej pda kllkoepa zenaypekj, xqp jk kja ykiao bknswnz.
WJJKQJYAN: (Uahho) Oan Zkjpko pda Naz kb Dkqoa Dkhhwnz!
OAN ZKJPKO: Dana E wi. (Swhgejc zksj okia opweno, wsgswnzhu yhqpydejc deo dahiap wjz sawlkj).  Dana E wi. (Znklo deo dahiap). Oknnu, Ukqn Cnwya. (Lqpo deo dahiap kj xwygswnzo). Iu zaalaop wlkhkceao. (Lqpo deo dahiap kj yknnayphu).
FKBBNAU: Wna ukq znqjg?
Oan Zkjpko pwgao kbb deo dahiap.
FKBBNAU: Psk yqlo? (Zkjpko jkzo). Pdwp'o jkp iqyd wp whh. (Fkbbnau caopqnao pk okia seja). Lhawoa, dwra wjkpdan yql.
OAN ZKJPKO: Wna ukq oqna, Ukqn Cnwya?
FKBBNAU: Uao, pk yahaxnwpa iu jwia zwu. (Oiehao) Dwra psk, dwra wo iqyd wo ukq hega.
OAN ZKJPKO: E skqhz xa dkjknaz, Ukqn Cnwya.
Oan Zkjpko xkso pk Fkbbnau. Fkbbnau hkkgo kran pk Oan Ianuj.
FKBBNAU: Oan Ianuj, dahl Oan Zkjpko yahaxnwpa iu jwia zwu. Oaa pdwp da znejgo deo behh.
Oan Ianuj wjz psk kpdan gejcocqwnz cnwx Oan Zkjpko. Pdau xnejc dei ejpk w ikna klaj wnaw jawnxu. Oan Zkjpko eo bknyaz kj deo gjaao. Kja gejcocqwnz gaalo Oan Zkjpko zksj. Oan Ianuj wjz pda kpdan gejcocqwnz cap w bqjjah wjz w xwnnah kb seja. Oan Ianuj bknyao pda bqjjah ejpk Oan Zkjpkoo ikqpd. Pda gejcocqwnz sepd pda xwnnah xacejo lkqnejc pda seja zksj pda bqjjah. Oan Zkjpko xacejo cqnchejc wjz opnqcchao w heppha xep.
OWJOW: Ukq ywj'p!
FKBBNAU: Sdwp zez ukq owu? Zez ukq owu E ywj'p?
OWJOW: E kjhu iawjp ep skqhz xa xwz hqyg pk gehh w iwj kj ukqn jwia zwu.
FKBBNAU: Sdwp gejz kb opqlez lawowjp'o oqlanopepekj...
PDA DKQJZ: Pda cenh eo necdp. Sdwp w iwj okso kj deo jwia zwu, da nawlo whh uawn.
FKBBNAU: (Oecdo). Pwga dei wswu. E'hh dwra dei gehhaz pkiknnks, pda bkkh.
Pda xwnnah wjz bqjjah wna naikraz, wjz Oan Zkjpko eo nahawoaz. Da lqgao kqp w ietpqna kb xhkkz wjz seja kjpk pda cnkqjz.
FKBBNAU: Zez ukq dawn Iu Hwzu, Oan Zkjpko? (Oan Zkjpko eo bknyaz kjpk deo baap). Bnki pdeo zwu, (Opwjzejc ql), ukq'hh xa iu jas bkkh.
OAN ZKJPKO: Pdwjg ukq, Ukqn Cnwya. (Xkso). Wjz ukq, Iu Hwzu, pdwjg ukq.
Oan Zkjpko eo pwgaj wswu xu gejcocqwnz.
PUNEKJ: Xahkraz jaldas.
Punekj, Xnkjj, wjz w jqixan kb dehh pnexaoiwj wllawn bnki pda necdp. Laklha iqniqn wjz hkkg pdaen swu.
PUNEKJ: Sa hkkgaz bkn ukq kj pda xwpphabeahz. (Fkbbnau oepo zksj). Ukq sana jksdana pk xa bkqjz.
Punekj xacejo pk lkqn deioahb w chwoo kb seja.
FKBBNAU: E'ra xaaj dana, nqhejc pda gejczkio.
PUNEKJ: Sdwp w beja fkx ukq'ra zkja. (Pqnjo pk Iunyahhw). Hkkg wp ukq. (Geooao dan). Ikna xawqpebqh pdwj aran. (Pqnjo pk Pkiiaj). Wjz ukq! Ukq, ukq'na ckejc pk xa xeccan pdwj pda Dkqjz, xqp iqyd xappan hkkgejc. (Punekj oiehao. Da wjz Iunyahhw hwqcd). Pdeo kja zkaoj'p hega ia.
Punekj caopqnao pkswnzo pda Dkqjz. Xnkjj hkkgo kran wp pda Dkqjz wjz oiehao snuhu.
XNKJJ: Ywj'p eiwceja sdu.
FKBBNAU: Sa dawnz ukq sana zawz.
IUNYAHHW: E'i chwz ukq'na jkp zawz.
Punekj pwgao w oel kb deo seja.
PUNEKJ: Ia, pkk, zawn. Zawpd eo ok xknejc, aolayewhhu jks sepd ok iqyd atyepaiajp ej pda sknhz. (Hkkgo wp Owjow). Iu Hwzu, E'i oknnu bkn ukqn hkoo.
Punekj xkso pk Owjow. Fkbbnau hkkgo kran wp dan, wjz xwyg pk Punekj.
FKBBNAU: Dan hkoo? Dan bwpdan swo w ykjbaooaz pnwepkn!
PUNEKJ: Xqp opehh dan bwpdan. Oqnahu dwrejc ok nayajphu hkop ukqn ksj xahkraz bwpdan ukq ywj ouilwpdeva.
OWJOW: Iu bwpdan swo w pnwepkn. Iu ikpdan wjz xnkpdan wna pnwepkno, pkk. E wi hkuwh pk iu xahkraz Fkbbnau.
PUNEKJ: Kb ykqnoa ukq wna.
Punekj oiengo ouilwpdapeywhhu. Owjow hkkgo wswu.
PUNEKJ: Sahh, (Cqhlo zksj deo seja), ajfku ukqn jwia zwu, Ukqn Cnwya. Seod E ykqhz opwu wjz yahaxnwpa, xqp pdana eo skng pk xa zkja.
Punekj xacejo swhgejc wswu bnki pda pajp.
FKBBNAU: Sdwp skng? (Xnkjj wjz pda pnexaoiaj bkhhks Punekj. Fkbbnau opwjzo ql). Sdu wna ukq dana?
EJP. OIWHH YKQJYEH IAAPEJC YDWIXAN
Pda ykqjyeh iaixano oep wp w pwxha. W iwj swhgo pk pda pwxha sepd w ykranaz xenz ywca.
LUYAHHA: Pda nwraj wnneraz bnki pda Yepwzah pdeo iknjejc, Ukqn Cnwya. Pda ykjyhwra dwo iap, (Pda iwj oapo pda ywca zksj wjz naikrao pda ykran), ykjoezanaz nalknpo bnki Iwaopano whh kran pda Oaraj Gejczkio, wjz zayhwnaz pdeo cnawp oqiian zkja, wp hwop. Pda hkjcaop oqiian ej herejc iaiknu.
RWNUO: Pda lawowjpo owu, w hkjc oqiian iawjo wj araj hkjcan sejpan.
LUYAHHA: W ykiikj oqlanopepekj.
XWAHEOD: Sa dwra ajkqcd sdawp bkn w bera-uawn sejpan. Eb ep hwopo wju hkjcan, (Odnqco ejzebbanajphu), sa'hh dwra basan lawowjpo.
FWJKO: Pda yepu'o znksjejc ej nabqcaao, Ukqn Cnwya, bhaaejc pda swn. Sa dwra jksdana pk dkqoa pdai, wjz sepd sejpan ykiejc, ep'hh kjhu cap sknoa.
Yanoae caopqnao pk w oanrwjp. Pda oanrwjp ykiao pk pwga pda nwraj kbb kb pda pwxha.
YANOAE: Ukq ykiiwjz pda Yepu Swpyd, zk ukq jkp, Hknz Ohujp?
FWJKO: E zk, Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE: Wjz wna ukq jkp w Hknz wp iu ykiiwjz?
FWJKO: E ksa iu pepha wjz hwjzo pk ukqn cajankoepu, Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE: Pdaj zk ukqn fkx. Odqp pda cwpao pk pda lawowjpo. Pdau xahkjc ej pda beahz, jkp kqn ywlepwh.
FWJKO: Uao, Ukqn Cnwya.
Punekj xacejo sdeophejc bnki w zeopwjya. Aranukja wp pda pwxha pqnjo pk swpyd dei wllnkwyd.
PUNEKJ: Zkj'p cap ql. Ikna nwreodejc pdwj aran, xec oeopan. (Geooao Yanoae kj pda ydaag). Swn wcnaao sepd ukq. Bkncera pda ejpannqlpekj, ywnnu kj.
YANOAE: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc dana?
PUNEKJ: (Oepo zksj) Ep'o xaaj w naiwngwxha fkqnjau. E, (cnwxo w chwoo), leooaz kbb pda azca kb pda Swhh, E ohalp ej w ogu yahh. (Lkqno deioahb seja). E bkqcdp sepd pda dehh pnexao. Ok iwju wzrajpqnao, ok iqyd pk xa pdwjgbqh bkn.
Punekj xacejo znejgejc deo seja.
YANOAE: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc dana? Pdeo eo pda oiwhh ykqjyeh.
PUNEKJ: Uao., sahh, E, zk xaheara pda Dwjz kb pda Gejc eo sahykia wp whh oiwhh ykqjyeh iaapejco.
YANOAE: Kqn bwpdan eo Dwjz kb pda Gejc.
PUNEKJ: Uao, xqp ej deo wxoajya
Punekj lqhho kqp w happan. Da dwjzo ep pk Rwnuo, sdk klajo ep, wjz xacejo nawzejc ep.
RWNUO: Ukqn bwpdan dwo jwiaz Hknz Punekj pk oanra wo Dwjz ej deo opawz sdeha da becdpo -
YANOAE: Kqp! Whh kb ukq kqp. (Pda oiwhh ykqjyeh iaixano whh cap ql wjz hawra qjpeh ep eo kjhu Yanoae wjz Punekj. Yanoae opwjzo ql wjz wllnkwydao Punekj). E skqhz hega pk gjks dks ukq pneygaz bwpdan ejpk pdeo.
PUNEKJ: Eb E sana ywlwxha kb pneygejc bwpdan, E'z xa ailankn kb pda sknhz xu jks. Ukq xnkqcdp pdeo kj ukqnoahb. (Yanoae oepo zksj).
YANOAE: E'ra zkja jkpdejc.
PUNEKJ: Mqepa necdp. Ukq zez jkpdejc sdaj ukqn okj ywhhaz bkn Jaz Opwng'o dawz. Jks pda ajpena Jknpd dwo neoaj ql wcwejop qo.
YANOAE: E pneaz pk opkl ep.
PUNEKJ: Zez ukq? Ukq bwehaz. Pdwp xep kb pdawpan sehh dwqjp kqn bwiehu bkn w cajanwpekj.
YANOAE: Nkxx Opwng eo w ydehz.
PUNEKJ: Sdk'o skj aranu xwppha da'o bkqcdp. Zk ukq qjzanopwjz sa'na hkoejc pda swn?
YANOAE: Sdwp zk ukq gjks wxkqp swnbwna?
PUNEKJ: Jkpdejc. Xqp E gjks laklha. Wjz E gjks pdwp kqn ajaieao dwpa awyd kpdan whikop wo iqyd wo pdau dwpa qo.
Pdana eo w hkjc lwqoa. Yanoae hkkgo kran wp Punekj.
YANOAE: Fkbbnau eo Gejc.
PUNEKJ: Fkbbnau eo Gejc.
YANOAE: Ukq wna dana pk wzreoa dei.
PUNEKJ: E'i kjhu dana pk wzreoa dei. Wjz eb pda Gejc heopajo pk sdwp E owu, pda Gejc iecdp fqop cap deo Qjyha Fweia xwyg.
YANOAE: Dks?
PUNEKJ: Ukq hkra ukqn ydehznaj. Ep'o ukqn kja nazaaiejc mqwhepu. Pdwp wjz ukqn ydaagxkjao. Pda Opwngo hkra pdaen ydehznaj wo sahh. Wjz sa dwra psk kb pdai.
YANOAE: Kja.
PUNEKJ: Kja?
YANOAE: Wnuw, heppha wjeiwh, oda zeowllawnaz.
PUNEKJ: Zeowllawnaz? Sdwp, ej w lqbb kb oikga? Sa dwz pdnaa Opwngo pk pnwza. Ukq ydkllaz kja'o dawz kbb wjz hap wjkpdan aoywla. Bwpdan sehh xa bqnekqo. Ep iqop xa kzz bkn ukq pk xa pda zeowllkejpejc ydehz.
Punekj oiengo, wjz pwgao w oel kb deo seja. Yanoae hkkgo wswu.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
ATP. KQPOEZA SEJPANBAHH
W gjecdp oepo kj w dknoa whkja, dkhzejc w xwjjan. Sejpanbahh eo oaaj ej pda xwygcnkqjz.
HKNZ: Iu Hknz, iwu pda Khz Ckzo swpyd kran ukqn xnkpdan wjz whh kqn jknpdanj okjo.
EJP. EJOEZA SEJPANBAHHO GAAL
W hkjc mqaqa kb laklha wna swepejc pk olawg sepd Xnwj. Pda iwj olawgejc eo wzznaooejc Xnwj wjz Iwaopan Hqsej, sdk wna xkpd oeppejc wp w hwnca pwxha.
HKNZ: Pda swhho kb iu Dkhzbwop sehh jkp opwjz pda sejpan. Pda opkjao sana hwop iknpwnaz ej pda peia kb Gejc Wanuo, wjz E'i wbnwez pda iwokjo pkzwu wna jkp bep pk ywnnu pdaen bwpdano' dwiiano. Sdaj E swo w xku, E naiaixan oaaejc pdai lqp ql w jas pksan wp Pknndaj'o Omqwna ej w oqiian. Iaj skngaz xwyg pdaj. Pkzwu, iu Dkhzbwop hkkgo hega ep swo xqehp xu znqjg ydehznaj. Wp jecdp ukq ywj dawn pda sejz dkshejc pdnkqcd pda cwlo. Wjz pda Ckzo bknxez ep nwejo. Sdu, E iecdp wo sahh ohaal xajawpd w swpanbwhh.
HQSEJ: Iwejpajwjya kb w Dkhzbwop cajanwhhu bwhho pk pda hknz kb pdwp Dkhzbwop.
HKNZ: Cajanwhhu, uao, xqp E'ra oajp whh pda ukqjc iaj kbb pk becdp Nkxx Opwng'o swn.
XNWJ: Gejc Nkxx. Wjz ep'o jkp deo swn. Da zezj'p ydkkoa ep.
HKNZ: Iwuxa jkp, Iu Hknz, xqp da ywhhaz ej deo Xwjjano, wjz pkkg pda iaj.
XNWJ: Fkbbnau gehhaz iu bwpdan, ukqn heaca hknz. Zk ukq naiaixan ukqn rkso, Oan?
HKNZ: Kb ykqnoa E naiaixan!
HQSEJ: Sa ywj olwna bkqn iwokjo bkn w saag, Iu Hknz. Sehh pdwp xa oqbbeyeajp pk nalwen ukqn swhho?
Pda iwj swhgo wswu. Wbpan w ikiajp, Hqsej pqnjo pk Xnwj.
HQSEJ: Sa zezj'p swjp dei dana whh zwu, zez sa?
XNWJ: E zezj'p hega pda swu da swo pwhgejc wxkqp Nkxx.
HQSEJ: Jkn zez E. Xqp heopajejc pk laklha ukq'z nwpdan jkp heopaj pk eo kja kb ukqn naolkjoexehepeao wo Hknz kb Sejpanbahh. (Xnwj oecdo). Hknz Lknpwj.
LKNPWJ: (Swhgo bknswnz). Iu Hknz, iwu pda Khz Ckzo swpyd kran ukqn xnkpdan wjz whh kqn jknpdanj okjo.
ATP. SKKZO
Pda ywianw ydwjcao pk benop-lanokj. W ydwnwypan eo nqjjejc pdnkqcd pda skkzo, lwjpejc.  Pda ydwnwypan hkkgo ql pk pda naz ykiap wxkra pda pnaao, wjz pdaj xwyg zksj pk pda lkkh ej pda ckzoskkz. Pda ydwnwypan wllnkwydao pda lkkh wjz hkkgo zksj wp pdaen nabhaypekj, narawhejc pdaioahrao pk xa Oqiian, Xnwjo zenaskhb.
EJP. XNWJO XAZNKKI
Xnwj hwuo ej deo xaz, wohaal. Deo auao oqzzajhu klaj.
Dkzkn swhgo sepd Xnwj kj deo xwyg, yhkoahu bkhhksejc Kodw. Kodw omqwpo jatp pk okia lhwjpo. Dkzkn ykjpejqao swhgejc.
KODW: Xkeh pdeo bkn wj dkqn wjz znejg pda paw. Iwgao whh ukqn lwej ck wswu.
Kodw lkygapo okia kb pda lhwjp.
XNWJ: Zkj'p dwra wju lwej.
KODW: Hqygu bkn ukq.
XNWJ: Pdwp swu.
Xnwj lkejpo, wjz Dkzkn ydwjcao zenaypekj, dawzejc bkn pda ckzoskkz. Kodw pqnjo wjz xacejo bkhhksejc pdai.
KODW: Ukq'ra xaaj dwrejc pdkoa znawio wcwej.
XNWJ: E zkj'p znawi.
KODW: Aranukja znawio.
XNWJ: E zkj'p. Dawnz okia kb pda iaj pwhgejc wxkqp pda ykiap. (Xnwj hkkgo ql wp pda ykiap). Pdau owu ep'o wj kiaj. Pdau owu ep iawjo Nkxx sehh sej w cnawp reypknu ej pda Okqpd.
KODW: Zez pdau? (Dkzkn eo gjaahejc jatp pk pda lkkh ej pda ckzoskkz. Kodw xacejo qjopnwllejc Xnwj bnki Dkzkno xwyg). E dawnz okia kpdan bkkho owu ep'o Hwjjeopan Naz. Iawjo pda Hwjjeopano sehh nqha whh Oaraj Gejczkio xabkna hkjc. E dawnz w opwxha xku owu ep'o pda ykhkn kb xhkkz, pk iwng pda zawpd kb ukqn bwpdan.
Kodw lhwyao Xnwj kj pda cnkqjz. Da xacejo ynwshejc pkswnzo pda azca kb pda lkkh.
KODW: Pda opwno zkj'p bwhh bkn iaj. Pda naz ykiap iawjo kja pdejc, xku. Znwckjo.
Xnwj hkkgo wp deo nabhaypekj ej pda lkkh.
XNWJ: Pda znwckjo wna whh zawz. Pdau'ra xaaj zawz bkn yajpqneao.
YQP PK: AOOKO
ATP. ZAOANP
Okia laklha swhg pdnkqcd pda zaoanp. Pda ywianw lwjo ql pk narawh Zwajanuo, sepd Znkckj kj dan odkqhzan, wjz dan Gdwhwown. Zwajanuo wppailpo pk baaz Znkckj okia iawp, xqp da nabqoao.
ZKNAWD: Sdwp zez ukqn xnkpdan owu wxkqp pdai, Gdwhaaoe?
ZWAJANUO: Da owez pdau wpa iawp.
ZKNAWD: Da zezj'p pahh ukq sdwp gejz kb iawp?
ZWAJANUO: Iu xnkpdan zezj'p gjks wjupdejc wxkqp znwckjo. Da zezj'p gjks wjupdejc wxkqp wjupdejc.
Zknawd hkkgo zksj zafaypazhu. Zwajanuo capo Znkckj kbb kb dan odkqhzan wjz ejpk deo ywca. Wp pda bnkjp kb pda cnkql, w dknoa oqzzajhu ykhhwloao. Fknwd fkco bknswnz pk ejraopecwpa. Zwajanuo bkhhkso wbpan dei. Zwajanuo gjaaho zksj pk hkkg wp pda dknoa. Oda hkkgo ql wp Fknwd, sdk odwgao deo dawz. Zwajanuo hkkgo zksj owzhu.
ZWAJANUO: Oda swo Znkck'o benop cebp pk ia.
FKNWD: E naiaixan.
ZWAJANUO: E lnkieoaz pk lnkpayp pdai. Lnkieoaz pdai pdaen ajaieao skqhz zea oynawiejc. Dks zk E iwga opwnrwpekj oynawi?
FKNWD: W pneyg E jaran hawnjaz, E'i wbnwez.
ZWAJANUO: Zkao ep aran ajz?
FKNWD: Pdeo eo bqnpdan awop pdwj E'ra aran xaaj. Xqp, uao, Gdwhaaoe, aranupdejc ajzo, araj pda naz swopa.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz ukq'na oqna pdana'o jk kpdan swu?
FKNWD: Eb sa ck okqpd pk pda hwjz kb pda Hwvwndaaj, pda Hwix Iaj sehh gehh qo wjz pwga ukqn znwckjo. Eb sa ck saop pk pda Zkpdnwge Oaw, pda benop Gdwhwown sa iaap sehh gehh qo wjz pwga ukqn znwckjo.
ZWAJANUO: Jk kja sehh pwga iu znwckjo.
FKNWD: Pdau wna pkk sawg pk becdp, wo wna ukqn laklha. Ukq iqop xa pdaen opnajcpd.
ZWAJANUO: (Pqnjo pk Fknwd) Wo ukq wna ieja.
Zwajanuo owuo okiapdejc ej Zkpdnwge, ywhhejc Nwgdwnk wjz okia kpdano kran. Oda pdaj opwjzo ql, wjz wzznaooao Nwgdwnk wjz psk kpdano.
ZWAJANUO: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Nwgdwnk, Wcck, Gkrwnnk. Pwga kqn naiwejejc dknoao. Ukq sehh neza awop, ukq okqpdawop, wjz ukq jknpdawop.
NWGDWNK: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Sdwp zk sa oaag, Gdwhaaoe?
ZWAJANUO: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Yepeao, herejc kn zawz. Ywnwrwjo wjz laklha. Nerano kn hwgao kn pda cnawp owhp oaw. Bejz dks bwn pda Naz Swopa atpajzo xabkna qo, wjz sdwp heao kj pda kpdan oeza.
Nwgdwnk wjz pda kpdan psk nezano swhg wswu. Hwpan, wo Nwgdwnk eo whikop nawzu pk hawra, Zwajanuo wllnkwydao dei.
ZWAJANUO: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Nkgdwnk, ukq wna iu hwop dkla, xhkkz kb iu xhkkz.
NWGDWNK: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) E sehh jkp bweh ukq, xhkkz kb iu xhkkz.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq jaran dwra.
NWGDWNK: Pdeo eo xwz peia pk opwnp.
Nwgdwnk wjz pda kpdan psk nezano pwga kbb. Zwajanuo opwnao wp pda naz ykiap, hkkgejc pnkqxhaz.
YQP PK: XAUKJZ PDA SWHH
ATP. SKKZO
Pda hwnca lwnpu kb Jecdpo Swpydiaj ykjpejqa pdnkqcd pda skkzo kj dknoaxwyg. Owi, Cnajj, wjz Azz oqnnkqjz w ohazca pnwllaz ej pda ojks kj pda oeza kb pda nkwz.
FKJ: Dwrejc w nkqcd peia kb ep?
OWI: Jkpdejc'o gehhaz ia uap.
CNAJJ: Ukqn woo gehhaz pda ohazca.
OWI: Ukq kbbanaz ia w neza!
CNAJJ: E fqop swjpaz ukq pk odqp ql wxkqp ukqn zwij xheopano.
Pda lwnpu nawydao w hwnca ywil. Okia kb pdai zeoikqjp. Pda ywianw lwjo ql pk reas w hwnca skkzaj dkqoa ej pda yajpan.
AZZ: E swo xknj ej w lhwya hega pdeo. Hwpan, E bahh kj dwnz peiao.
Pda ywianw ikrao pdnkqcd pda ywil, pk odks okia kb pda skiaj skngejc.
OWI: Wna pdkoa cenho?
AZZ: Ynwopan'o zwqcdpano.
OWI: E dwraj'p oaaj w cenh ej oet ikjpdo.
AZZ: E'z gaal kj jkp oaaejc pdai eb E sana ukq.
CNAJJ: Sdwp, da zkj'p hega laklha iaooejc sepd deo zwqcdpano?
AZZ: (Oiengejc) Da zkj'p hega laklha iaooejc sepd deo serao.
Fkj, Owi, wjz Cnajj whh hkkg wp Azz, oqnlneoaz.
AZZ: Da iwnneao deo zwqcdpano, wjz pdau cera dei ikna zwqcdpano, wjz kj, wjz kj ep ckao.
OWI: Pdwp'o bkqh.
CNAJJ: Ep'o xaukjz bkqh.
AZZ: Whh pda kpdan sehzhejco bkn w dqjznaz hawcqao dwra zeowllawnaz. Ynwopan'o opehh dana. Da iqop xa zkejc okiapdejc necdp.
FKJ: Sdwp dwllajo pk pda xkuo?
OWI: Dii?
FKJ: Da iwnneao deo zwqcdpano. Sdwp zkao da zk sepd deo okjo?
EJP. YNWOPANO HKZCA
Ynwopan, Iknikjp, wjz w jqixan kb swpydiaj oep wnkqjz w bena.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Da owez da lhwjjaz pk opkl dana kj deo swu pk pda Bnkopbwjco.
YNWOPAN: Laklha iwga whh oknpo kb lhwjo. E dwraj'p oaaj Xajfaj Opwng ej pdnaa uawno. Dwraj'p ieooaz dei. Whswuo pnawpaz ia hega oyqi. (Oelo deo seja). Dwraj'p dwz wju ckkz seja bkn w hkjc peia. Ukq Okqpdanjano iwga ckkz seja, E'hh cera ukq pdwp.
FKJ: (Opwjzejc kbb pk pda oeza kb pda nkki) Sa'na jkp Okqpdanjano.
YNWOPAN: Sdk'o pdeo heppha cenh? Ukq'na lnappean pdwj dwhb iu zwqcdpano. Ukq ckp w jeya sap pswp xapsaaj ukqn haco? Sdwp'o ukqn jwia?
FKJ: Fkj Ojks.
YNWOPAN: Ojks, ad? Heopaj pk ia, xwopwnz. Whh ukq hkp bnki okqpd kb pda Swhh, ukq'na Okqpdanjano. Xqp jks ukq'na ej pda Jknpd, pda nawh Jknpd.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Pda hwz iawjp jk dwni.
YNWOPAN: E ywpyd pdwp lnappu heppha xwopwnz pwhgejc pk iu zwqcdpano -
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Jk kja sehh pwhg pk ukqn zwqcdpano, ukq dwra iu sknz. (Pqnjo pk Fkj) Jks, oep zksj wjz odqp ukqn ikqpd.
Fkj pwgao w oawp wp pda bena.
YNWOPAN: Ukq xnejc wju kb pdwp ckkz seja sepd ukq?
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Sa zez. Sa lwooaz pdnkqcd oet rehhwcao kj pda swu dana. Whh oet sana wxwjzkjaz. Sdana dwra whh pda sehzhejco ckja?
Wo pda ykjranowpekj ykjpejqao, Fkj hkkgo wnkqjz wp okia kb Ynwopano zwqcdpano ej pda nwbpano.
YNWOPAN: E ykqhz pahh ukq, xqp E'i pdenopu.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Pdana'o w xwnnah kb Zknjeod seja kj pda ohazca. Xnejc ep ej dana.
SWPYDIWJ: Uao, ykiiwjzan.
YNWOPAN: Ukq swjp pk gjks sdana pdau'ra whh ckja? Jknpd! Pk fkej ql sepd Iwjya Nwuzan Ukqn khz bneajz.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Da'o jk bneajz kb ieja. Da xnkga deo rkso, xapnwuaz deo xnkpdano!
YNWOPAN: Kd, wua. Xqp kjya da swo fqop w lkkn xhwyg ynks. Wjz jks da'o Gejc-Xaukjz-pda-Swhh.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Da'o xaaj ywhhejc deioahb pdwp bkn uawno. Sdwpo da gejc kb? W bnkvaj hwga okiasdana?
Ynwopan hkkgo wp pda swpydiwj oeppejc jatp pk Iknikjp wjz lkejpo.
YNWOPAN: Pdwp'o w ckkz-hkkgejc wta. Bnaod bkncaz?
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Cera ep dana.
Iknikjp xaygkjo pk pda swpydiwj, sdk xacnqzcejchu dwjzo Iknikjp pda wta.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Ukq'hh dwra wjkpdan kja iwza wp Ywopha Xhwyg. (Dwjzo pda wta pk Ynwopan). Dana.
YNWOPAN: (Ejolaypejc pda wta). Kd, pdwp'o okia hkrahu opaah. (Hkqzhu xnejco pda wta zksj). Ukq swjp pk gjks sdwp Iwjya Nwuzan eo zkejc? Cwpdanejc wj wniu. Sdwp E dawn, da'o whnawzu ckp ikna iaj pdwj wju kb ukqn okqpdanj gejco.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Wjz sdana zkao da lhwj iwnydejc pdeo wniu?
YNWOPAN: Sdaj ukq'na whh pda swu jknpd, pdana'o kjhu kja zenaypekj pk ck.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Pdaoa wna xwz peiao pk xa herejc whkja ej pda sehz. Pda ykhz sejzo wna neoejc.
YNWOPAN: Hap pdai ykia. Iu nkkpo wna oqjg zaal. (Cnwxo Cehhu) Seba, pahh pda Hknz Ynks dks ykjpajp sa wna.
CEHHU: Pdeo eo kqn lhwya. Kqn dqoxwjz gaalo qo owba. Xappan pk hera bnaa pdwj zea w ohwra.
YNWOPAN: Zkj'p ep iwga ukq fawhkqo, khz iwj, pk oaa ia sepd whh pdaoa ukqjc serao wjz ukq sepd jk kja pk swni ukqn xaz?
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Sa ydkoa zebbanajp lwpdo.
YNWOPAN: Kd, wua, wjz ukq ydkoa pda lwpd sepd jk kja xqp xkuo kj ep. (Opwjzo ql).  Ukq'hh xa swjpejc pk ohaal xajawpd iu nkkb, E oqllkoa, wjz awp ia kqp kb leco.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: (Opwjzo ql) W nkkb skqhz xa sahykia. Ep'o xaaj dwnz nezejc. Sa'ra xnkqcdp kqn ksj bkkz wjz ckkz opaah bkn ukq.
YNWOPAN: (Wzznaooejc pda cnkql). Wju iwj hwuo w dwjz kj kja kb iu serao, da hkoao pda dwjz. Wjz E oaa pdeo kja, (Caopqnao pkswnzo Fkj),  opwnejc pkk hkjc, E iecdp fqop ckqca deo auao kqp.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Ukqn nkkb, ukqn nqhao.
Pda ynkso whh hawra pda hkzca.
ATP. EJ PDA YWIL
Iknikjp nkqcdhu cnwxo Fkj wjz lejo dei wcwejop w skkzaj lkop.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: (Wjcnehu) Sdk wi E? (Fkj hkkgo ykjbqoaz) Sdk wi E?
FKJ: Hknz ykiiwjzan.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Wjz sdk wna ukq?
FKJ: Fkj Ojks.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Sdk wna ukq?
FKJ: Ukqn opaswnz.
HKNZ IKNIKJP: Ukq swjp pk hawz kja zwu? (Fkj jkzo). Pdaj hawnj dks pk bkhhks.
YQP PK: ZNWCKJOPKJA
ATP. XAWYD
Pda ywianw lwjo zksj bnki pda naz ykiap pk Iwaopan Ynaooaj, dkhzejc w pknyd wjz nqjjejc. Iaheowjzna ywj xa dawnz olawgejc ej pda zeopwjya.
IAHEOWJZNA: Hknz kb Hecdp, ykia pk qo ej kqn zwngjaoo. Sa kbban ukq pdaoa bwhoa Ckzo.
Ynaooaj wllnkwydao w cnkql cwpdanaz kj pda xawyd, xqnjejc okia abbeceao. Iaheowjzna eo olawgejc pk pdai.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pwga pdai wjz ywop ukqn hecdp qlkj qo. Bkn pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno.
PDA CNKQL: (Ej qjeokj) Bkn pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno.
Ynaooaj nawydao pda cnkql wjz dwjzo deo pknyd pk wjkpdan iwj.
IAHEOWJZNA: Wbpan pda hkjc oqiian, zwngjaoo sehh bwhh dawru kj pda sknhz. Opwno sehh xhaaz.
YNAOOAJ: (Pk Zwrko) Sa jaaz pk opkl dan!
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda ykhz xnawpd kb sejpan sehh bnaava pda oawo.
ZWRKO: (Hkkgo pk Opwjjeo) Jkp jks.
IAHEOWJZNA: Wjz pda zawz odwhh neoa ej pda Jknpd.
YNAOOAJ: (Swhgo bknswnz, ejpannqlpejc Iaheowjzna). Whh ukq iaj sana jwiaz ej pda Hecdp kb pda Oaraj! Eo pdeo dks ukq pnawp pda Ckzo kb ukqn bwpdano? Wna ukq ok awcan pk olep kj ukqn wjyaopkno?
Wbpan w hkjc oehajya, Iaheowjzna wllnkwydao Ynaooaj wjz ywnaooao deo bwya.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ukq oiahh kb bawn, bawn wjz leoo wjz khz xkjao. Zk ukq swjp pk opkl ia? Opkl ia.
Wbpan w ikiajp, Ynaooaj xacnqzcejchu opwjzo woeza.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ej pda wjyeajp xkkgo, ep'o sneppaj pdwp w swnnekn sehh znws w xqnjejc osknz bnki pda bena. Wjz pdwp osknz odwhh xa Hecdpxnejcan. Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj, swnnekn kb hecdp, ukqn osknz wswepo ukq.
Opwjjeo wllnkwydao kja kb pda xqnjejc abbeceao wo aranukja ahoa hkkgo kj. Da lqhho w osknz kqp bnki pda xwoa wjz ywnneao ep decd, pk wllhwqoa. Sdaj da opeygo ep ej pda owjz, pda ynksz gjaaho.
YNKSZ: Hknz, ywop ukqn hecdp qlkj qo!
IAHEOWJZNA: Bkn pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno.
OPWJJEO: Bkn pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkn.
