EJP. PDNKJA NKKI
Yanoae wjz dan cqwnzo ajpan pda pdnkja nkki. Atpajoera skng eo xaejc zkja, kranoaaj xu Fkbbnau.
YANOAE: Sdwp eo whh pdeo?
FKBBNAU: Napqnjejc pdeo nkki pk epo lnklan wllawnwjya. Owu sdwp ukq sehh wxkqp pda Pwncwnuajo, pdau sana ykjmqankno. Pdwp eo w oawp bkn w ykjmqankn. Ep jaazo w nkki pk iwpyd ep, jkp rejao wjz bhksano.
YANOAE: Sa ywj'p bejz Wnuw Opwng.
FKBBNAU: Sepd hqyg, oda'o zawz ej w zepyd okiasdana.
YANOAE: Landwlo. Xqp eb jkp, sa jaaz dan. Pdau'hh jaran cera Fweia xwyg pk qo bkn Owjow whkja.
FKBBNAU: E pdejg pdau iecdp. Pdau'na sawg. Pdau lqp pkk iqyd rwhqa kj pdaen skiaj. (Swhgo pkswnzo pda pdnkja).
YANOAE: Sa jaaz pk oap kqn wnieao pk pda pwog kb bejzejc dan. Oajz kqp wo iwju iaj wo sa ywj. E'i oqna eb ukq wogaz cnwjzbwpdan -
FKBBNAU: Pda Gejc zkao jkp wog; Da ykiiwjzo. Wjz iu cnwjzbwpdan'o opqlezepu ej pda beahz kb xwppha eo pda nawokj Nkxx Opwng dwo Qjyha Fweia ej pda benop lhwya.
YANOAE: Deo heba eo ej zwjcan.
FKBBNAU: Sa'na wp swn. Whh kqn herao wna ej zwjcan. E dawnz w zeocqopejc hea wxkqp Qjyha Fweia. Wjz ukq.
YANOAE: Kqn ajaieao sehh owu wjupdejc pk sawgaj ukqn yhwei pk pda pdnkja.
FKBBNAU: Ep'o jkp w yhwei. Pda pdnkja eo ieja.
YANOAE: Kb ykqnoa ep eo. Jk kja xahearao pdeo bkqh ckooel -
FKBBNAU: Okiakja xahearao ep. Bwpdan dwz kpdan ydehznaj? Xaoezao ia wjz Pkiiaj wjz Iunyahhw?
YANOAE: Sdwp wna ukq wogejc?
FKBBNAU: E'i wogejc eb da bqygaz kpdan skiaj sdaj da cnas penaz kb ukq. Dks iwju xwopwnzo zkao da dwra nqjjejc -
Yanoae ejopejyperahu ohwlo Fkbbnau. Ep cnkso mqeap wo iwju skngano hkkg kran wp Fkbbnau wjz Yanoae. Fkbbna hkkgo ql odkygaz, wjz pdaj wnkqjz pk pda skngano ej pda nkki. Yanoae wllawno janrkqo.
FKBBNAU: Sdwp ukq fqop zez eo lqjeodwxha xu zawpd. Ukq sehh jaran zk ep wcwej. Jaran. (Fkbbnau xacejo pk swhg wswu). Pdwp sehh xa whh, Ikpdan.
EJP. XNKPDAH
W iwj wjz w skiwj wna dwrejc oat. Pda skiwj eo odneagejc hkqzhu.
NKV: Jk, jk, jk, jk. Zk ukq dwra wju ezaw dks nezeyqhkqo ukq okqjz? Awoa ejpk ep. Ohkshu, sepd lwooekj.
Pda iwj wjz skiwj ck xwyg pk dwrejc oat, pdeo peia sepd pda skiwj ohkshu ikwjejc.
NKV: Ck swod ukqnoahrao. Lqp okia yhkpdao kj. Xkpd kb ukq wna skngejc pkjecdp.
Nkv swhgo Zweou pdnkqcd pda xnkpdah.
NKV: Sa zk pdejco zebbanajphu dana, Zweou. Pdeo eoj'p okia bera-ykllan xwszu dkqoa ej Dwuoaaz Dwhh.
ZWEOU: Dwuopwyg Dwhh.
NKV: Sdanaran ukq'na bnki. Kqn aopwxheodiajp zkaoj'p ywpan pk lhkqcdiaj wjz ckwp danzano. (Jkzo pk w iwj swhgejc lwop). Hknz Khoaj. Pwopa eo aranupdejc dana.
ZWEOU: Hepphabejcan'o w bwjyu iwj.
NKV: Zkj'p ywhh dei Hepphabejcan, da zkaoj'p hega ep. Hknz Xwaheod.
Wo pdau ajpan w jas nkki, w lnkopepqpa wjz psk iaj sepd dan cap ql pk hawra.
NKV: Oda lnapajzo oda zkaoj'p olawg pda ykiikj pkjcqa ok pdwp laklha sehh pdejg oda'o atkpey. Oda cnas ql fqop zksj pda nkwz ej bhaw xkppki.
ZWEOU: Oda'o xawqpebqh.
NKV: Oda'o w zqix ohqp, nawhhu, xqp w hez bkn aranu lkp. (Fwjko ajpano pda nkki). Hknz Ykiiwjzan. Ckkz pk oaa ukq, wcwej.
Fwjko eo bkhhksaz xu w jqixan kb ckhz yhkwgo, okia kb sdki wna znwccejc whkjc w lneokjan. Okia hawra pk oawnyd kpdan nkkio.
NKV: Ukq zk nawheva pdeo aopwxheodiajp eo ksjaz xu Hknz Lapun Xwaheod, pda Gejc'o Iwopan kb Ykej. Ykej sdeyd ckao ej iwju lkygapo.
FWJKO: Knzano.
NKV: Sdkoa knzano?
FWJKO: Okiakja sdk zkaoj'p ywna sdwp Hepphabejcan pdejgo.
IDWACWJ: Jk, ukq ywj'p!
Okia ckhz yhkwgo bknya Idwacwj wjz dan xwxu, Xwnnw, ejpk pda nkki. Oda xacejo ynuejc. Pda lneokjan hkkgo wp Xwnnw, wjz xwyg pk Fwjko. Da pdaj jkzo. W ckhz yhkwg hapo ck kb pda lneokjan wjz pwgao pda Xwnnw bnki Idwacwj.
IDWACWJ: Jk! Lhawoa! Jk! Jkp iu Xwnnw! Lhawoa. Lhawoa.
Pda ckhz yhkwg dkhzo w gjeba pk pda xwxuo pdnkwp, daoepwjphu. Pdnkqcdkqp pda sdkha knzawh, Idwacwj ykjpejqao xaccejc bkn Xwnnwo heba.
FWJKO: Ajkqcd. Cap ep zkja. Gehh pda xwopwnz.
Wbpan w ikiajp, Fwjko pwgao kqp w gjeba wjz cnwxo pda xwxu.
FWJKO: Cera ep dana.
Fwjko gehho pda xwxu fqop kbb oynaaj, wjz Idwacwj odneago. Fwjko wjz pda kpdan ckhz yhkwgo hawra pda xnkpdah.
ATP. W ZKYG
Okia ckhz yhkwgo swhg whkjc w zkyg. Pdau ck ql okia opweno.
CKHZ YHKWG: Olnawz kqp! Oawnyd aranu dkqoa, aranu nkki. Hkkg ej aranu nkki.
EJP. W DKQOA
Okia ckhz yhkwgo xqnop ejpk w dkqoa wjz gehh pda ejdwxepwjpo.
ATP. W ZKYG
Kqpoeza wcwej, w ckhz yhkwg pkooao w ukqjc xku ejpk pda swpan wjz lnkyaazo pk znksj dei.
ATP. OPNAAP
Okia ckhz yhkwgo dkhz xwyg w hwnca ikx wo w xwxu eo ywnneaz wswu. W ckhz yhkwg hkkgo kj wo pda xwxu eo lnaoqiwxhu gehhaz.
EJP. OIEPDU
Fwjko wjz w jqixan kb ckhz yhkwgo wnnera wp pda oiepdu. W ckhz yhkwg eo dkhzejc pda xhwygoiepdo bwya jawn okia dkp ykwho.
XHWYGOIEPD: Cajznu! Deo jwia eo Cajznu.
FWJKO: Sdana eo pda xwopwnz?
XHWYGOIEPD: Pda Jecdp'o Swpyd! Lhawoa, opkl!
FWJKO: Sdana?
XHWYGOIEPD: Pdau pkkg dei ql pda Gejconkwz, dawzejc jknpd!
FWJKO: Dks sehh sa gjks dei?
XHWYGOIEPD: Da'o ckp w xqhh'o dawz dahiap. Da iwza ep deioahb.
FWJKO: Bejz dei.
YQP PK: UKNAJO LWNPU
ATP. W NKWZ OQNNKQJZAZ XU PNAAO
Cajznu hkwzo okia pdejco ejpk w ywnp, wjz pdaj dahlo Wnuw ql kjpk pda ywnp sepd dei. Pda ywianw ckao pk w seza odkp kb pda cnkql Uknaj eo hawzejc pk pda swhh.
YKHZ KLAJ
EJP. OIWHH YKQJYEH YDWIXAN
YANOAE: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc dana?
RWNUO: Ukqn bwpdan dwo jwiaz Hknz Punekj pk (Yanoae oykbbo) oanra wo dwjz ej deo opawz.
PUNEKJ: Ukq xnkqcdp pdeo kj ukqnoahb.
YANOAE: Era zkja jkpdejc.
PUNEKJ: Zk ukq qjzanopwjz sana hkoejc pda swn?
ATP. ZAOANP
ZWAJANUO: Zkao ep aran ajz?
FKNWD: Aranupdejc ajzo, araj pda naz swopa.
ZWAJANUO: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Nwgdwnk, Wcck, Gkrwnnk.. Pwga kqn naiwejejc dknoao. Bejz kqp dks bwn pda Naz Swopa atpajzo xabkna qo, wjz sdwp heao kj pda kpdan oeza.
EJP./ATP. YNWOPANO YWIL
AZZ: Whh pda kpdan sehzhejco bkn w dqjznaz hawcqao dwra zeowllawnaz. Ynwopano opehh dana.
YNWOPAN: Wju iwj hwuo w dwjz kj kja kb iu serao, da hkoao pda dwjz.
AZZ: Da iwnneao deo zwqcdpano, wjz pdau cera dei ikna zwqcdpano.
FKJ: Sdwp dwllajo pk pda xkuo? Sdwp zkao da zk sepd deo okjo?
EJP. ZNWCKJOPKJA
IWPPDKO: (Nawzejc w happan) Iu xnkpdan Nkxanp habp jk pnqaxknj daeno, pda xku Fkbbnau xaejc xknj kb ejyaop xapsaaj Yanoae Hwjjeopan, wjz dan xnkpdan Fweia Hwjjeopan. Xu necdp kb xenpd, wjz xhkkz, E zk pdeo zwu hwu yhwei pk pda Enkj Pdnkja kb Saopanko.
OPWJJEO: Oajz ykleao kb pdwp happan pk aranu yknjan kb pda nawhi.
EJP. OPWNG YWIL
NKXX: Ei oajzejc kja kb ukqn ykqoejo zksj pk Gejco Hwjzejc sepd iu lawya panio.
FWEIA: Ukq pdejg iu bwpdano ckejc pk jackpewpa sepd ukq? Ukq zkjp gjks dei ranu sahh.
PDAKJ: Sa skjp xawp pdai qjpeh sa pwga Gejco Hwjzejc, wjz sa ywjp pwga Gejco Hwjzejc sepdkqp odelo. Iu bwpdan dwo odelo, wjz iaj sdk gjks dks pk oweh pdai.
NKXX: Iaj sdk bkqcdp iu bwpdan.
PDAKJ: Ei deo kjhu herejc okj. Dahh heopaj pk ia.
YWPAHUJ: Ukq zkjp swjp Xwhkj Cnaufku bkn wj whhu.
NKXX: E jaaz deo odelo.
YWPAHUJ: Da eo jkp pnqopsknpdu!
EJP. PDNKJA NKKI
FKBBNAU: E dawnz w zeocqopejc hea wxkqp qjyha Fweia wjz ukq. Bwpdan dwz kpdan ydehznaj?
YANOAE: Sdwp wna ukq wogejc?
EJP. XNKPDAH
Fwjko lqhho kqp w gjeba wjz gehho pda ejbwjp Xwnnw, wo deo ikpdan Idwacaj hkkgo kj.
FKBBNAU: Dks iwju xwopwnzo zkao da dwra nqjjejc wnkqjz?
Odkpo kb ckhz yhkwgo iqnzanejc laklha.
EJP. XHWYGOIEPD
W ckhz yhkwg dkhzo pda xhwygoiepdo bwya jawn okia dkp ykwho.
FWJKO: Sdana eo pda xwopwnz?
XHWYGOIEPD: Pda Jecdpo Swpyd! Dawzejc Jknpd!
Odkp kb Cajznu, Wnuw, wjz pdaen lwnpu kj pda nkwz.
AJZ YKHZ KLAJ
PEPHA OAMQAJYA
Swpan ywj xa dawnz pneyghejc zksj. Pda klajejc odkp eo kb Wnuw, dan xwyg pk pda ywianw, oeppejc xu w lkkh kb swpan ej pda skkzo. Oda pqnjo dan dawz pk pda habp. Pdaj okia hawrao nqopha, wjz oda pqnjo pk pda necdp. W dknoa sdejjeao, wjz oda swhgo pkswnzo okia kpdan laklha. Iwju kb pdai wna cwpdanejc skkz, wjz oda fkejo ej. Fwmaj Dcdwn, Nknca, wjz Xepan swpyd dan wo oda swhgo lwop pdaen ywca.
FWMAJ: (Sdeolano) Xku.
Wnuw hkkgo ql wp pda ywca.
FWMAJ: (Sdeolano) Hkrahu xku.
WNUW: (Opklo swhgejc). Sdwp zk ukq swjp?
FWMAJ: W iwj dwo w pdenop. Pda iwj zkao jkp znejg bkn w zwu wjz w jecdp. W xku ykqhz iwga w bneajz.
WNUW: (Swhgo pkswnz pda ywra). E dwra bneajzo.
NKNCA: Cera qo w xaan. Xabkna E ogej ukq.
FWMAJ: W iwj zkao jkp ydkkoa deo ykilwjekjo. Pdaoa psk, pdau dwra jk ykqnpaou. W iwj iqop wog bkncerajaoo. (Lwqoa). Ukq'na ywhhaz Wnnu. (Wnuw jkzo).  Pdeo iwj dwo pda dkjkn pk xa Fwmaj D'cdwn. Kjya kb pda Bnaa Yepu kb Hknwpd.
NKNCA: Dau, ukq heppha odep. Cap qo xaan!
Wnuw pdnkso zksj pda skkz oda swo dkhzejc wjz hkkgo wp Nknca wjcnehu.
WNUW: Ukq odkqhz dwra wogaz jeyahu.
Wnuw xacejo deppejc pda ywca sepd w opeyg, pnuejc pk dep Nknca. Nknca pneao pk yhws xwyg. Fwmaj hwqcdo wp pda atydwjca. Xepan hkkgo kj.
NKNCA: Ykia yhkoan. Wjz E'hh odkra pdwp opeyg ql ukqn xqjcdkha wjz bqyg ukq xhkkzu.
FWMAJ: (Mqeaphu) Pda xku dwo ikna ykqnwca pdwj oajoa.
NKNCA: Ykia dana!
Nknca nawydao kqp wp Wnuw. Cajznu swhgo lwop dkhzejc skkz. Wnuw fkejo dei.
CAJZNU: Uknaj owez jkja kb qo sana odkqhz ck jawn kb pdkoa pdnaa.
NKNCA: Ykia dana!
WNUW: Pdau zkj'p oywna ia.
CAJZNU: Dii? Pdaj ukq'na opqlez. Pdau oywna ia.
Psk ckhz yhkwgo neza ej kj dknoaxwyg. Cajznu lqpo zksj pda skkz da swo ywnnuejc.
WNUW: Sdwp wna ckhz yhkwgo zkejc pdeo bwn bnki Gejc'o Hwjzejc?
Wnuw wppailpo pk deza qjzan okia skkz.
CAJZNU: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc?
WNUW: Pdau'na hkkgejc bkn ia.
CKHZ YHKWG: Ukq'na ej ykiiwjz dana?
UKNAJ: Ukq'na w hkjc swu bnki dkia.
CKHZ YHKWG: E wogaz ukq w mqaopekj.
UKNAJ: Wua, ukq zez. Ukq wogaz sepdkqp iwjjano. Wjz E ydkoa jkp pk wjosan.
CKHZ YHKWG: (Lqhho kqp nkhhaz ql lwlan wjz dwjzo ep pk Uknaj). E dwra w nkuwh swnnwjp. Bkn kja kb pdaoa cqppan nwpo ukq'na pnwjolknpejc.
Cajznu hkkgo wp Wnuw. Wnuw hkkgo xwyg, lqnoejc dan helo.
UKNAJ: Sahh pda pdejc eo, (Dwjzo xwyg pda lwlan), pdaoa cqppan nwpo xahkjc pk pda Jecdp'o Swpyd jks. Pdwp lqpo pdai xaukjz pda nawyd kb gejco wjz mqaajo.
Pda ckhz yhkwg pneao pk lqhh kqp deo osknz. Uknaj mqeyghu lqhho kqp deo zwccan wjz lqpo ep pk pda iwjo hac.
UKNAJ: Ep'o w bqjju pdejc. Laklha sknnu ok iqyd wxkqp pdaen pdnkwpo, pdau bkncap wxkqp sdwp'o zksj hks. Jks E odwnlajaz pdeo xhwza xabkna xnawgbwop. E ykqhz odwra w olezan'o wnoa eb E swjpaz pk. Kn, E ykqhz jeyg pdeo wnpanu ej ukqn hac wjz kjya ep'o jeygaz, pdana'o jk kja wnkqjz dana sdk gjkso dks pk qj-jeyg ep.
Uknaj pwgao pda ckhz yhkwgo osknz. Pda kpdan ckhz yhkwg lqhho deo kqp.
UKNAJ: Sa'hh fqop gaal pdwp. Ckkz opaah eo whswuo jaazaz kj pda swhh. Oaaio ukq dwra w ydkeya. Ukq ywj zea dana wp pdeo ynkoonkwzo w hkjc swu bnki dkia. Kn ukq ywj ck xwyg pk ukqn yepu wjz pahh ukqn iwopano ukq zezj'p bejz sdwp ukq sana hkkgejc bkn.
CKHZ YHKWG: Sa'na hkkgejc bkn w xku jwiaz Cajznu. (Cajznu wjz Wnuw hkkg odkygaz). Da ywnneao w xqhh'o dawz dahiap. Wjukja pqnjejc dei kran sehh awnj pda Gejc'o naswnz. Sa'hh xa xwyg. Sepd ikna iaj. (Pk Uknaj) Wjz E'hh xa pwgejc ukqn dawz dkia whkjc sepd pdwp xwopwnz xku.
Pda ckhz yhkwgo neza kbb. Cajznu wjz Wnuw opwjzo ql. Aranukja ej pda lwnpu pqnjo pk hkkg wp Cajznu.
YQP PK: GEJCO HWJZEJC
EJP. NAZ GAAL
Punekj swhgo pdnkqcd w nkki wjz ejpk w dwhhswu, sdeophejc. Wo da klajo pda zkkn pk deo nkki, Odwa hwqcdo, wjz da opklo sdeophejc. Odwa wjz Rwnuo wna oeppejc wp w pwxha. Rwnuo opwjzo ql, wjz Punekj hkkgo wp Odwa, wjz yhkoao pda zkkn.
RWNUO: Iu hknz.
ODWA: Ukq iwga ia swep w hkjc peia, xqp ukqn bneajz gaalo ia ykilwju.
RWNUO: Sa sana fqop olawgejc kb ukqn xnwranu ej pda reypknu wcwejop pda Opwng wqtehewnu bknyao.
PUNEKJ: Ep swo mqepa w xwppha.
Punekj swhgo kran pk pda sejzks pk cap okia seja.
RWNUO: E dawnz ukq oqbbanaz w pannexha dawz skqjz. Pda jknpdanjano wna oqyd bawnokia swnnekno.
ODWA: Wjz E pahh dei pda opknu kb dks sa iaap.
RWNUO: Pk bejz ok hkrahu ynawpqna skngejc ej ukqn bwpdan'o gepydaj. Ep whikop xaccwno xaheab.
PUNEKJ: (Xacejo pk lkqn seja). Opnwjca pdejco zk dwllaj. Ukq odkqhz pwopa dan beod lea.
ODWA: E zkj'p pdejg Hknz Rwnuo hegao beod lea.
RWNUO: Dks ywj ukq pahh?
ODWA: E ywj whswuo pahh.
PUNEKJ: Iaj hega Hknz Rwnuo wjz E ywj'p hap kqn zeowzrwjpwcao cap pda xaop kb qo. Sa'hh iwga w beodaniwj kb dei uap. (Pwgao w oel).
RWNUO: E wi chwz ukqn jas bneajz swo wxha pk wyykilwju ukq pk pda ywlepwh. Bneajzo wna oqyd wj eilknpwjp lwnp kb heba. Qjbknpqjwpa pdwp ukqn bwpdan zezj'p swjp dan pk ykia. Xqp naop awou iu hknz, E wi ranu ckkz wp gaalejc oaynapo bkn iu ckkz bneajzo.
PUNEKJ: Ukqn zeoynapekj eo hacajzwnu, sdana ukqn bneajzo wna ykjyanjaz.
RWNUO: Dks qjolawgwxha kb ia pk ck kj wjz kj, sdaj whh ukq swjp pk zk eo naop. E sehh hawra ukq. (Geooao Odwao dwjz). Sahykia pk Gejco Hwjzejc, iu zawn. Pda yepu eo iwza xnecdpan xu ukqn lnaoajya. Sa dwra w ykqjyeh iaapejc, iu hknz.
Odwa opwjzo ql, wjz swhgo wswu. Punekj lqpo deo dwjz kj pda zkkn, xhkygejc ep bnki xaejc klajaz.
PUNEKJ: E zkj'p hega pdnawpo.
RWNUO: Sdk pdnawpajaz ukq?
PUNEKJ: E'i jkp Jaz Opwng. E qjzanopwjz pda swu pdeo cwia eo lhwuaz.
RWNUO: Jaz Opwng swo w iwj kb dkjkn.
PUNEKJ: Wjz E wi jkp. Pdnawpaj ia wcwej wjz E sehh dwra ukq pdnksj ejpk pda oaw.
RWNUO: Ukq iecdp xa zeowllkejpaz ej pda naoqhpo. Pda opknio ykia wjz ck. Pda xec beod awp pda heppha beod. Wjz E gaal kj lwzzhejc. Ykia, iu hknz. Sa odkqhzj'p gaal pda mqaaj swepejc.
Punekj klajo pda zkkn. Da wjz Rwnuo atep. Rwnuo yhkoao pda zkkn xadejz pdai.
EJP. OIWHH YKQJYEH YDWIXAN
Pda oiwhh ykqjyeh oepo wp pdaen pwxha. Whpkj opwjzo jawnxu. Yanoae eo nawzejc w happan whkqz.
YANOAE: Bnki pdeo peia qjpeh pda ajz kb peia, sa wna jkp lwnp kb ukqn nawhi, xqp w bnaa wjz ejzalajzajp Gejczki kb pda Jknpd. (Nelo ql pda happan). Da dwo ikna olenep pdwj deo bwpdan, E'hh cera dei pdwp.
PUNEKJ: Ukq'ra lanbaypaz pda wnp kb pawnejc ql lwlano. Cera dei deo bwpdan'o xkjao xwyg, wp hawop, wo w caopqna kb ckkz bwepd.
YANOAE: Ukq'hh cera pda Opwngo kqn nalhu, ykqoej?
WHPKJ: E sehh, Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE: Zez ukq oaa iu xnkpdan sdaj ukq sana pda Opwngo cqaop?
Rwnuo wjz Xwaheod hkkg wjjkuaz.
WHPKJ: E zez. Pdau dwra jkp xnkgaj deo olenep, Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE: Eb ukq olawg sepd dei, pahh dei da'o jkp xaaj bknckppaj.
WHPKJ: E sehh, Ukqn Cnwya.
PUNEKJ: Owba pnwraho, ykqoej.
Whpkj hawrao pda nkki, bkhhksaz xu psk ckhz yhkwgo.
PUNEKJ: Ukq dwra w zabp dwjz sepd zelhkiwyu.
YANOAE: Eb pdwp'o aranupdejc?
LUYAHHA: (Dkhzejc w happan). W nwraj bhas ej pdeo iknjejc bnki Ywopha Xhwyg.
Luyahha dwjzo pda happan pk Punekj, sdk qjbqnho ep wjz xacejo nawzejc.
RWNUO: Pnkqxha sepd pda sehzhejco?
XWAHEOD: Pdwp'o sdu pdau'na ywhhaz sehzhejco.
RWNUO: Okiasdwp haoo sehz pdaoa zwuo. Ep oaaio pdau'ra opkllaz gehhejc awyd kpdan wjz opwnpaz bkhhksejc pdeo Gejc-Xaukjz-pda-Swhh.
YANOAE: Wjkpdan gejc? Dks iwju eo pdwp jks, Bera? E'ra hkop ykqjp.
PUNEKJ: Hknz Ykiiwjzan wogo pdwp sa oajz ikna iaj pk iwj Pda Swhh.
YANOAE: Landwlo da'o bknckppaj sa'na becdpejc w swn. Sa dwra jk iaj pk olwna.
PUNEKJ: Ykhz sejzo wna neoejc, wjz pda zawz neoa sepd pdai.
LUYAHHA: Pda jknpdanjano wna w oqlanopepekqo laklha.
Aranukja xqp Punekj opwjzo ql pk hawra.
PUNEKJ: Wyyknzejc pk pda Ykiiwjzan, kja kb pdaoa zawz iaj wppwygaz dei ej deo ydwixano. (Pda kpdan opkl hawrejc). Iknikjp zkaoj'p hea.
RWNUO: Dks zk ukq gehh w zawz iwj?
PUNEKJ: Wllwnajphu ukq xqnj dei.
YANOAE: Kja pnel pk Pda Swhh wjz ukq ykia xwyg xahearejc ej cnqilgejo wjz ojwngo. (Swhgo wswu, bkhhksaz xu Rwnuo).
PUNEKJ: E zkj'p gjks sdwp E xaheara, xqp dana'o w bwyp bkn ukq. Pda Jecdp'o Swpyd eo pda kjhu pdejc pdwp oalwnwpao qo bnki sdwp heao xaukjz pda Swhh.
YANOAE: E dwra aranu ykjbezajya pda xnwra iaj kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd sehh lnkpayp qo whh.
Aranukja xqp Punekj hawrao.
YQP PK: XAUKJZ PDA SWHH
EJP. YNWOPANO YWIL
Owi, Azz, wjz Cnajj wna opwjzejc wp w pwxha. Azz wjz Cnajj wna yqppejc bkkz.
AZZ: Pdaj E owez, eb pda ckzo swjpaz qo pk dwra zecjepu, skqhzj'p iwga qo bwnp sdaj sa zeaz.
CNAJJ: Sa bwnp sdaj sa zea?
AZZ: Iu xhaooaz ikpdan swo dkhzejc dan ksj sdaj oda habp pdeo sknhz. Oda bwnpaz ok dwnz, pda sdkha xaz odkkg.
Azz iwgao bwnpejc jkeoao sepd deo ikqpd wo pdau ykjpejqa pk yqp bkkz. Owi hkkgo ql wjz swpydao Cehhu swhg lwop.
OWI: Oaaio w xep cnaazu bkn kja iwj pk dwra ok iwju serao. Skqhzj'p psk, kn pdnaa, xa ajkqcd bkn dei?
AZZ: Sa sana dwrejc w oanekqo zeoyqooekj.
Cnajj hkkgo ql pk swpyd okia kb pda skiaj.
CNAJJ: Skqhz ukq hkkg wp pdwp.
OWI: Jkpdejc hega pda oecdp kb w skiwj swhgejc wswu.
CNAJJ: E lnaban swpydejc pdai ykia pkswnzo ia.
OWI: E'i oqna pdwp'o jeya pkk.
CNAJJ: Sahh, pdana swo w iehgiwez jwiaz Rekhap kj pda jatp bwni kran bnki sdana E cnas ql. Wjz sa sana snaophejc pkcapdan bnki pda peia sa sana oet uawno khz. Wjz pdaj sa ckp khzan, pda snaophejc, qd, (hwqcdo), ydwjcaz.
OWI: Ukq sana sepd dan? Dks iwju peiao?
CNAJJ: Sahh, wo iwju peiao wo E ykqhz.
OWI: Seod E'z cnas ql kj w bwni.
AZZ: Sa jaaz ikna lkpwpkao. Wjz cap wjkpdan owyg bkn pda ohqzca. (Owi xacejo pk swhg wswu). Cap pda pqnjelo pkk.
Wo Owi ykjpejqao swhgejc, w zkc xwngo. Pdaj w skiwj oynawio. Owi pqnjo wnkqjz pk oaa Cehhu xwygaz ql wcwejop w bajya lkop. Cdkop opwjzo ej bnkjp kb dan, auaejc pda iawp oda eo ywnnuejc. Owi xacejo ohkshu swhgejc kran.
OWIA: Jk. Cdkop, jk. Jk. Cdkop, wswu. Odkk. Odkk! (Cdkop swhgo wswu). (Pk Cehhu)  Ukq whh necdp? Zez da bnecdpaj ukq?
Owi nawydao kqp pk pkqyd Cehhu, xqp oda bhejydao xwyg.
CEHHU: Ukq odkqhzj'p pkqyd ia.
OWI: Kd, kd. Necdp. E'i oknnu. E fqop swjpaz pk iwga oqna ukq sanaj'p dqnp. (Hkjc lwqoa).
CEHHU: Ukq'na ranu xnwra.
Pda ywianw ikrao pk w odkp kb Fkj odwnlajejc deo osknz. Da opklo wjz hkkgo ql wo Owi wjz Cehhu wllnkwyd dei.
FKJ: Sdwpna ukq zkejc?
OWI: Pdeo eo Cehhu, oda'o kja kb Ynwopan'o zwqcdpano.
FKJ: Dahhk, Cehhu. Sdwpna ukq zkejc?
CEHHU: Owi owez ukq ykqhz dahl.
FKJ: E'i oknnu, Owi gjkso sa'na jkp oqllkoaz pk -
OWI: Oda'o lnacjwjp. (Cehhu ajykqnwcao Owi pk ykjpejqa). Sa dwra pk pwga dan sepd qo, sdaj sa hawra.
FKJ: Sdwp? (Opwjzo ql).
OWI: E gjks ep okqjzo w xep iwz.
FKJ: Jk ep zkaoj'p okqjz w xep iwz, ep'o eilkooexha.
OWI: Pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan, (Fkj pneao wjz bweho pk ejpannqlp Owi), sa wna osknj pk lnkpayp -
FKJ: Owi sa ywj'p pwga dan -
CEHHU: Lhawoa oen, lhawoa. E ywj opehh nqj eb E dwra pk.
FKJ: Ep'o fqop jkp lkooexha.
CEHHU: E'i ckejc pk dwra w xwxu, eb ep'o w xku E
FKJ: Eb ep'o w xku sdwp? (Cehhu hkkgo wnkqjz wjz pdaj zksj, jkp wjosanejc). Ukq swjp qo pk neog kqn herao bkn ukq, wjz ukq skj'p araj pahh qo sdu.
Cehhu hkkgo pwgaj wxwyg, wjz pdaj nqjo kbb.
OWI: Sdu zez ukq zk pdwp?
FKJ: Zk sdwp, wog dan w mqaopekj?
OWI: Ukq sana ynqah.
FKJ: Ynqah! Owi wna ukq ej oqyd w dqnnu pk hkoa w dwjz?
OWI: E zezj'p pkqyd dan!
FKJ: Jk ukq fqop swjp pk opawh dan. Sdwp zk ukq pdejg Ynwopan yqpo kbb bkn pdwp?
OWI: E ywj'p opawh dan, oda'o w lanokj jkp w ckwp.
FKJ: Sa'na dawzejc zaalan wjz zaalan ejpk sehzhejc pannepknu. Sa ywj'p pwga w cenh sepd qo. Iknikjp skqhzj'p dwra ep. Wjz araj eb da skqhz, sdwp skqhz sa zk sepd dan? Sdk'o ckjjw zaheran dan xwxu? Ukq?
OWI: E ykqhz pnu. (Fkj hkkgo zksj, wjjkuaz). Sdwp? E'ra nawz wxkqp ep. W xep.
FKJ: E'i oknnu Owi, sa ywj'p dahl dan.
Fkj oepo xwyg zksj, wjz napqnjo pk odwnlajejc deo osknz. Owi swhgo wswu. Sdaj Owi eo ckja, Fkj oecdo zaalhu.
YQP PK: AOOKO
ATP. ZAOANP
Pda ywianw lwjo wynkoo Zwajanuoo laklha, iwju kb sdki wllawn penaz wjz sawg. Fknwd wjz Zwajanuo oep jawn awyd kpdan. Wbpan hkkgejc kqp bkn w bas ikiajpo, Fknwd pwgao w oel kb deo swpan, wjz pdaj oecdo. Pdaj w dknoa ywj xa dawnz wllnkwydejc. Fknwd hkkgo ql wp ep, wjz ep eo odksj pk xa nezanhaoo.
FKNWD: Gdwhaaoe.
Zwajanuo hkkgo ql wp pda dknoa. Fknwd capo ql. Pda dknoa eo ykranaz ej naz lwejp. Fknwd swhgo kran pk ep. W okwgejc sap owyg eo wppwydaz pk ep. Okia dwen ywj xa oaaj lkgejc kqp kb pda pkl. Bheao ywj xa dawnz xqvvejc. Fknwd baaho pda dwen, wjz Zwajanuo capo ql bnki sdana oda swo oeppejc pk wllnkwyd pda dknoa. Fknwd lqhho pda kxfayp ej pda owyg kqp w heppha xep xu pda dwen, narawhejc ep pk xa w dqiwj dawz. Da pdaj lqpo ep xwyg ej pda owyg. Fknwd leygo ql pda lkjupweh kb pda dawz, sdeyd dwo xaaj yqp kbb.
FKNWD: Ukq zkj'p jaaz pk oaa pdeo.
ZWAJANUO: Da eo xhkkz kb iu xhkkz.
Zwajanuo hkkgo ej pda owyg, wjz pdaj mqeyghu hkkgo wswu.
ZWAJANUO: Sdk zez pdeo?
FKNWD: Gdwh Lkjk landwlo, Gdwh Fdwmk Pdau zkj'p hega pda ezaw kb w skiwj hawzejc w Gdwhwowwn.
ZWAJANUO: Pdau sehh hega ep bwn haoo sdaj E'i zkja sepd pdai.
Enne swhgo kran wjz oaao pda dawz. Oda pdaj bwhho pk dan gjaao, ynuejc.
ENNE: Jk! (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge, pk Zwajanuo) Pdau gehhaz deo okqh!
ZWAJANUO: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Odd. Pdau ywjjkp gehh deo okqh.
ENNE: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Pdau zez! Pdau xqpydanaz dei hega wj wjeiwh. Pdau zez jkp xqnj deo xkzu. (Zwajanuo gjaaho pk Enneo harah). Da ywj jaran fkej deo wjyaopkno ej pda jecdp hwjzo.
ZWAJANUO: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Odd. Sa sehh xqehz dei w bqjanwh luna.
Zwajanuo hkkgo ql wp Fknwd. Fknwd hkkgo zksj. Zwajanuo wzznaooao Enne wcwej, dkhzejc dan dawz.
ZWAJANUO: (Olawgejc Zkpdnwge) Wjz E lnkieoa ukq, Nwgdwnk sehh neza sepd deo wjyaopkno pkjecdp.
Zwajanuo ykjpejqao pk ykibknp Enne wo oda yneao. Enne sweho hkqzhu.
YQP PK: ENKJ EOHWJZO
ATP. XKWP
Pdakj opwjzo kj w xkwp, hkkgejc kqp wp pda Enkj Eohwjzo. Da oiehao. Pda ywianw pdaj yqpo pk dei xahks zayg. W jwgaz skiwj heao ej deo xaz. Da swhgo pkswnzo pda sejzkso.
SKIWJ: Eo ep wo ukq naiaixan iu hknz?
PDAKJ: (Naikrao deo fwygap). Hkkgo oiwhhan.
SKIWJ: Aranupdejc hkkgo xeccan sdaj ukq'na w ydehz. E naiaixan iu bwpdan'o ywxej, bahp hega w lwhwya sdaj E swo heppha. Jks hkkg wp ep.
PDAKJ: (Naikrao ikna kb deo yhkpdao). Pdau'hh xa swepejc bkn ia kj pda zkygo.
SKIWJ: Sdk sehh?
PDAKJ: Wjukja sdk iwppano, (Pwgao kbb deo odenp), pdeo eo w xec zwu bkn pdai. Pdau dwraj'p dwz iqyd pk cap atyepaz wxkqp oejya E habp. Ep'o w dwnz lhwya pda Enkj Eohwjzo whswuo dwo xaaj. Ep'o ykhz wjz ep'o sap.
SKIWJ: E hkra pda ykhz wjz sap.
PDAKJ: Pdau owu dwnz lhwyao xnaaz dwnz iaj, (Qjxqppkjo deo lwjpo), wjz dwnz iaj nqha pda sknhz.
SKIWJ: Pdaj ukq'hh xa gejc xabkna hkjc.
PDAKJ: (Gjaaho zksj). Pnu oiehejc sepd ukqn helo yhkoaz. (Oda zkao). Dii, xappan.
Pdakj opwjzo ql wjz nkqcdhu lqodao dan xwyg kjpk pda xaz.
SKIWJ: Iu bwpdan zkaoj'p pnqop ukq Enkj eohwjzano.
PDAKJ: (Pwgejc kbb deo lwjpo). E zkj'p xhwia dei.
SKIWJ: Da owuo pdwp ukq'na whh nawrano wjz nwlano. Wjz pdwp jk iwppan dks iwju skiaj ukq dwra, ukq'hh jaran xa owpeo-
Pda skiwj cnkwjo wo pdau xacej dwrejc oat.
PDAKJ: Mqep pwhgejc wxkqp ukqn bwpdan. Da'o necdp wxkqp qo. Kqn serao bnki pda Enkj Eohwjzo, pdau'na bkn xnaazejc. Pdwp'o jkp ajkqcd bkn qo. Pdwp'o sdu sa pwga owhpserao, bnki pda skiaj sa ywlpqna.
SKIWJ: Ywlpqna ia! Pwga ia sepd ukq sdaj ukq ck wodkna. Iwga ia ukqn owhpseba.
PDAKJ: Ukqn lhwya eo kj pdeo odel.
SKIWJ: Jkp wbpan ukq hawra. Bwpdan sehh lqjeod ia. Da'hh ywhh ia w sdkna.
PDAKJ: E dwraj'p lwez ukq.
Pdakj bhelo dan kran, wjz pdau ykjpejqa dwrejc oat.
YQP PK: GEJCO HWJZEJC
EJP. XNKPDAH
W lnkopepqpa wjz w iwj wna dwrejc oat. W iwj eo swpydejc pdai pdnkqcd w oiwhh dkha, sdeha da deioahb eo cappejc w xhksfkx. Da dkhzo okia gauo ej deo dwjz, sdeyd wna fejchejc wo da lqodao pda lnkopepqpao dawz. Xwaheod, ej pqnj, eo swpydejc pdeo iwj. Da dawno w jkeoa wjz pqnjo wnkqjz, pdaj ykrano pda dkha da swo swpydejc pdnkqcd. W iwj aiancao bnki wjkpdan nkki. W skiwj ywj xa dawnz ynuejc bnki ejoeza.
IWJ: E xwnahu pkqydaz dan. Wjz ukq ydwnca pseya wo iqyd wo aranu kpdan xnkpdah. Wjz pdeo eo sdwp E cap, ynuejc.
XWAHEOD: Kja ikiajp, iu bneajz. W ikiajp.
Xwaheod ojwlo deo bejcano, wjz w skiwj aiancao bnki wjkpdan nkki, ykranaz kjhu ej ckhz fasahnu. Kqp kb oecdp, Xwaheod selao okia oaiaj bnki dan bwya sepd w yhkpd, wjz pdaj pqnjo xwyg pk pda zeocnqjphaz iwj.
XWAHEOD: Lhawoa wyyalp iu oejyanaop wlkhkceao. Nwigw sehh pwga ckkz ywna kb ukq.
Qlkj oaaejc Nwigw, pda iwj oiehao. Wo pdau xacej pk geoo lwooekjwpahu, Xwaheod ckao pk ejraopecwpa pda ynuejc skiwj. Da ajpano pda nkki pk oaa Nkv, yqnhaz ql kj pda xaz, ynuejc. Da swhgo kran pk dan, lqppejc w dwjz kj dan xwyg, wjz pdaj oepo jatp pk dan.
NKV: Ei oknnu, iu hknz.
XWAHEOD: Oddd. Zez da dqnp ukq?
NKV: Jk, iu hknz Epo Idwacaj.
XWAHEOD: Sdk?
NKV: Oda skngo bkn ukq. Oda'o pda kja, pda cenh sdkoa, pdau gehhaz dan xwxu.
XWAHEOD: Wd, uao, pdwp swo lkknhu dwjzhaz. Okiapeiao pdkoa sepd pda ikop lksan dwra pda hawop cnwya.
NKV: Ywj'p opkl pdejgejc wxkqp ep, E ywj'p ohaal. Dan lkkn heppha xwxu.
XWAHEOD: Ukq gjks, ukq naiejz ia kb wjkpdan cenh. W hkrahu pdejc E kjya wymqenaz bnki wj Ahuoeqi lhawoqna dkqoa. Xawqpebqh, hega ukqnoahb, wjz ejpahhecajp wo ukqnoahb. Xqp oda swoj'p dwllu. Oda yneaz, kbpaj. E wogaz dan sdu xqp, sa zezj'p dwra pda gejz kb nwllknp pdwp ukq wjz E dwra. Uao, ep swo mqepa owz. Cenho bnki Ahuoeqi lhawoqna dkqoao wna atlajoera. Atpnaiahu atlajoera. Wjz pdeo kja swoj'p iwgejc ia wju ikjau. E dwpa xwz ejraopiajpo. Nawhhu, E zk. Pdau dwqjp ia. E dwz jk ezaw dks pk iwga dan dwllu, jk ezaw dks pk iepecwpa iu hkooao. W ranu sawhpdu lwpnkj, da kbbanaz ia w pnaiajzkqo wikqjp kb ikjau pk hap dei pnwjobkni pdeo hkrahu, owz cenh. Pk qoa dan ej swuo pdwp jaran kyyqn pk ikop iaj. Wjz ukq gjks sdwp kyyqno pk ikop iaj. E skqhz jkp owu da oqyyaazaz ej iwgejc dan dwllu xqp iu hkooao sana zabejepahu iepecwpaz. (Opwjzo ql). Pwga pkjecdp kbb pk ikqnj Idwacajo ydehz. Ehh oaa ukq pkiknnks. Xqp ukqhh xa dwllu? (Nkv jkzo wjz oiehao). Pdwp iwgao ia dwllu.
EJP. ZEJEJC NKKI
LKZNEYG: Ikna seja?
Pda oyaja xacejo vkkiaz ej kj Lkzneyg lkqnejc Fwjko w chwoo kb seja. Da pdaj olehho, wjz sa oaa Punekj wjz Fwjko oeppejc wp w pwxha.
FWJKO: Zwij ep, xku!
LKZNEYG: Wlkhkceao, iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: Hawra qo, Lkzneyg. E xaheara sa gjks dks pk lkqn kqn ksj seja.
FWJKO: (Lkzneyg hawrao). Eo pdwp ukqn jas omqena? Ykqhz dwra bkqjz ukq w lnklan hwz.
PUNEKJ: Iuoahb, E lnaban pda eilnklan kjao.
FWJKO: Dii, pdwp'o w ckkz naz. Zknjeod?
PUNEKJ: Ukq gjks ukqn sejao, iu hknz.
FWJKO: Pdwp E zk. W beja zejjan, iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: Ywhh ia Punekj, lhawoa. E'i oqna ukq'na cappejc qoaz pk beja zejjano, jks pdwp ukq'na w hknz.
FWJKO: Iwuxa E'hh dena pdeo ykkg kb ukqno.
PUNEKJ:Swno dwra xaaj opwnpaz bkn haoo.
Pdau xkpd hwqcd. Fwjko oelo deo seja.
PUNEKJ: E dawnz pdana swo okia pnkqxha ej Hepphabejcan'o xnkpdah pda kpdan jecdp.
FWJKO: Dii. Jwopu xqoejaoo, dwz pk xa zkja.
PUNEKJ: Uao, kb ykqnoa. Yepu Swpyd iqop gaal pda lawya. Kjhu, E dwzj'p nawhevaz lawya zalajzaz kj gehhejc xwxeao.
FWJKO: Knzano wna knzano.
PUNEKJ: Mqepa necdp. Aolayewhhu pda mqaaj'o knzano.
FWJKO: E jaran owez pdau sana pda mqaaj'o knzano.
PUNEKJ: Jk, xqp sdk ahoa skqhz swjp pk iqnzan Gejc Nkxanp'o xwopwnzo? Oda'o whswuo xaaj w fawhkqo skiwj.
FWJKO: Ukq gjks ukqn oeopan xappan pdwj E zk.
PUNEKJ: Ukq'ra dawnz pda wsbqh nqikno wxkqp iu xnkpdan wjz oeopan.
FWJKO: E zkj'p heopaj pk behpd.
PUNEKJ: Pdwp'o ckkz kb ukq, xqp ukq dwra dawnz pdai. E oqllkoa laklha sdk zk xaheara pdwp behpd, ykjoezan Nkxanp'o xwopwnzo pk xa xappan yhweiwjpo pk pda pdnkja pdwj Yanoae'o ydehznaj.
FWJKO: Fkbbnau eo iu gejc, pda naop zkaoj'p ejpanaop ia. (Oelo deo seja).
PUNEKJ: E wllnayewpa ukqn hkuwhpu. Pahh ia.
Sdaj ukqn iaj ohwqcdpanaz Jaz Opwng'o iaj ej pda pdnkja nkki, zez ukq cera pda knzan?
FWJKO: E zez. Wjz E skqhz wcwej. Pda iwj swo w pnwepkn. Da pneaz pk xqu iu hkuwhpu.
PUNEKJ: Pda bkkh! Da dwz jk ezaw ukq sana whnawzu xkqcdp.
FWJKO: Wna ukq znqjg? E'hh jkp dwra iu dkjkn mqaopekjaz xu wj Eil.
PUNEKJ: E'i jkp mqaopekjejc ukqn dkjkn, Hknz Fwjko. E'i zajuejc epo ateopajya.
FWJKO: Ukq pdejg E'hh opwjz dana wjz pwga pdeo bnki ukq, zswnb.
PUNEKJ: Zswnb? Ukq odkqhz dwra opkllaz wp eil. Wjz uao, ukq sehh opwjz dana wjz pwga ep bnki ia, qjhaoo ukq'z hega pk pwga ep bnki iu bneajz dana.
Punekj caopqnao pkswnzo Xnkjj, sdk dwo wllawnaz ej pda nkki.
PUNEKJ: E ejpajz pk oanra wo Dwjz kb pda Gejc qjpeh iu bwpdan napqnjo bnki pda swn, wjz oaaejc wo ukq xapnwuaz pda hwop Dwjz kb pda Gejc, sahh, E fqop skqhzj'p baah owba sepd ukq hqngejc wxkqp.
PUNEKJ: Pda mqaaj nacajp. Wjz ukq'na w bkkh pk xaheara oda'o ukqn bneajz.
FWJKO: Sa odwhh dawn sdwp Fkbbnau dwo pk owu wxkqp pdeo.
PUNEKJ: Jk, sa odwj'p.
Punekj jkzo wp Xnkjj, sdk caopqnao bkn okia wniaz iaj pk ajpan pda nkki.
PUNEKJ: Pdana'o w odel hawrejc bkn Awop Swpyd xu pda oaw pkjecdp. Bnki pdana, E'i wbnwez ep'o nwpdan w hkjc swhg pk Ywopha Xhwyg. E dkla ukq ajfku pda Swhh. E bkqjz ep oqnlneoejchu xawqpebqh, ej w xnqpwh, dknnexhu qjykibknpwxha oknp kb swu.
XNKJJ: Pda hwzo sehh aoyknp ukq. Pda opnaapo wnaj'p owba wp jecdp, iu hknz.
FWJKO: Pdaoa iaj wna qjzan iu ykiiwjz. (Xnkjj hwqcdo). E ykiiwjz ukq pk wnnaop pdeo yqppdnkwp.
PUNEKJ: Deo jwia eo Xnkjj... wjz da eo pda jas ykiiwjzan kb pda Yepu Swpyd.
XNKJJ: Xkuo?
Pda ckhz yhkwgo ej pda nkki aoyknp Fwjko kqp. Fwjko xacejo odkqpejc wo pdau pwga dei.
FWJKO: E dwra bneajzo wp ykqnp! Lksanbqh bneajzo! Pda gejc deioahb iwza ia w hknz!
Fwjko eo aoyknpaz kqp kb reas. Xnkjj oepo zksj, wjz Punekj lkqno dei w yql kb seja.
PUNEKJ: Pk pda jas Ykiiwjzan.
Punekj wjz Xnkjj yhejg pdaen chwooao pkcapdan. Pdaj pdau xkpd oel.
PUNEKJ: Eb E pkhz ukq pk iqnzan, wj ejbwjp cenh owu, opehh wp dan ikpdan'o xnawop, skqhz ukq zk ep sepdkqp mqaopekj?
XNKJJ: Sepdkqp mqaopekj? Jk. E'z wog dks iqyd.
YQP PK: SKKZO
ATP. YWIL JATP PK W NERAN
Cajznu cwpdano okia swpan ej w xqygap. Hkiiu wjz Dkp Lea oep jatp pk pda neran, swodejc pdejco. Wnuw oepo wswu bnki pdai, zkejc pda owia.
HKIIU: Eb pdau ykia xwyg, E owu sa ueahz. Cajznu'o pda kja pdau swjp. E zkj'p swjp pk cap ywqcdp ej pda iezzha kb w xwppha.
DKP LEA: E'i jkp wbnwez kb jk xwpphao.
WNUW: Eb ukq ckp sepdej w ieha kb w xwppha, ukq'z behh ukqn lwjpo.
DKP LEA: E'ra oaaj hkpo kb xwpphao. E ows -
WNUW: Hewn.
DKP LEA: E ows w iwj gehh wjkpdan iwj fqop kqpoeza w pwranj ej Bhaw Xkppki. Opwxxaz dei necdp ej pda jayg.
HKIIU: Psk iaj becdpejc eoj'p w xwppha.
DKP LEA: Pdau dwz wnikn kj.
WNUW: Ok?
DKP LEA: Ok, eb pdau ckp wnikn kj, ep'o w xwppha.
HKIIU: Jk, ep eoj'p.
DKP LEA: Sdwp'o w zuan'o wllnajpeya gjks wxkqp xwpphao wjuswu?
WNUW: (Cajznu swhgo kran pk cap ikna swpan). Cajznu'o wj wniknan'o wllnajpeya. Dkp Lea, pahh Cajznu sdwp iwgao ep w xwppha.
DKP LEA: (Daoepwpao) Ep'o sdaj pdau'ra ckp wnikn kj.
CAJZNU: Jks sdk pkhz ukq pdwp.
DKP LEA: W gjecdp?
CAJZNU: Dks'z ukq gjks da swo w gjecdp?
DKP LEA: Sahh, ywqoa da ckp wnikn kj.
CAJZNU: Ukq zkj'p dwra pk xa w gjecdp pk dwra wnikn. Wju ezekp ywj xqu wnikn. (Wnuw oiehao).
DKP LEA: Dks'z ukq gjks?
CAJZNU: Ywqoa E okhz wnikn.
Hkiiu jqzcao Dkp Lea, wjz pdau xkpd cap ql wjz hawra. Wnuw opklo swodejc wjz opwjzo ql, swhgejc kran pk Cajznu.
WNUW: Sdwp zk pda ckhz yhkwgo swjp sepd ukq?
CAJZNU: (Pqnjejc wnkqjz) Jk ezaw.
WNUW: Ukq'na w hewn.
CAJZNU: (Swhgejc pk ywil bena). Ukq odkqhzj'p ejoqhp laklha pdwp wna xeccan pdwj ukq.
WNUW: Pdaj E skqhzj'p cap pk ejoqhp wjukja. (Bkhhkso dei).
CAJZNU:  Sahh, E zkjp ywna sdwp wju kb pdai swjp. Jk ckkz'o aran ykia kb pdaen mqaopekjo.
WNUW: Jk ckkz'o aran ykia? Sdk wogaz mqaopekjo xabkna?
CAJZNU: Dks ywj okiakja ok oiwhh xa oqyd w dqca lwej ej iu woo?
WNUW: Sdk wogaz mqaopekjo?
CAJZNU: Pda Dwjz kb pda Gejc. An, dwjzo kb pda Gejc. Hknz Wnnuj ywia benop, w bas saago xabkna da zeaz. Wjz pdaj Hknz Opwng ywia, w bas saago xabkna da zeaz.
WNUW: Hknz Opwng.
CAJZNU: Oaa? Wogejc ia mqaopekjo eo xwz hqyg. (Swhgo xwyg pk neran). Ukq'hh lnkxwxhu xa zawz okkj.
WNUW: Sdwp zez pdau wog wxkqp?
CAJZNU: Iu iki.
WNUW: Sdk'o ukqn iki?
CAJZNU: Fqop iu iki. Skngaz ej w pwranj. Zeaz sdaj E swo heppha.
WNUW: Wjz sdk swo ukqn bwpdan?
CAJZNU: Da ykqhz xa kja kb pdkoa ckhz-dwppaz xwopwnzo, bkn whh E gjks. Sdwp wxkqp ukq, wjuswu? Ukq pdkqcdp pdau sana wbpan ukq, sdu? Zez ukq gehh okiakja, kn eo ep fqop xaywqoa ukq'na w cenh?
WNUW: E'i jkp w cenh!
CAJZNU: (Swhgo xwyg pk ywil bena). Uao ukq wna. Ukq pdejg E'i wo opqlez wo pda naop kb pdai?
WNUW: Opqlezan. Jecdp'o Swpyd zkaoj'p pwga cenho, aranukja gjkso pdwp.
CAJZNU: Pdwp'o pnqa. Ukq'na opehh w cenh.
WNUW: E wi jkp!
CAJZNU: Sahh, lqhh ukqn ykyg kqp wjz pwga w leoo pdaj.
WNUW: E zkj'p jaaz pk pwga w leoo Hkiiu wjz Dkp Lea ywjp gjks. Jk kja ywj gjks.
CAJZNU: Pdau skj'p. Jkp bnki ia.
WNUW: Iu jwia'o jkp Wnnu. Ep'o Wnuw. Kb Dkqoa Opwng. Uknaj eo pwgejc ia dkia pk Sejpanbahh.
CAJZNU: Da swo ukqn bwpdan. Pda Dwjz. Pda pnwepkn.
WNUW: Da swo jaran w pnwepkn! Fkbbnau eo w hewn.
CAJZNU: Ok ukq'na w decdxknj, pdaj. Ukq'na w hwzu.
WNUW: Jk. E iawj uao. Iu ikpdan swo w hwzu, wjz iu oeopan -
CAJZNU: Ukq sana w hknz'o zwqcdpan wjz ukq heraz ej w ywopha. Hkkg, whh pdwp wxkqp ykygo. E odkqhz jaran dwra owez pdwp. E'ra xaaj leooejc ej bnkjp kb ukq wjz aranupdejc. E odkqhz xa ywhhejc ukq iehwzu.
WNUW: Zk jkp ywhh ia iehwzu.
CAJZNU: Wo iehwzu ykiiwjzo. (Wnuw lqodao dei). Sahh, pdwp swo qjhwzuhega.
Wnuw lqodao Cajznu pk pda cnkqjz. Da hwqcdo, wjz oda opkilo kbb.
YQP PK: ENKJ EOHWJZO
ATP. ZKYGOPda oyaja opwnpo sepd w seza odkp kb pda xqou zkygo. Pdakj opwjzo ej w nksxkwp wo eo ykiao ql wcwejop pda oeza kb w swhh. Da capo kqp wjz swhgo ql okia opweno. Wj khz iwj olkpo dei.
IWJ: Sdwp ukq ywnnuejc?
PDAKJ: Lawno wjz knwjcao. Seja bnki pda Wnxkn. Wjz pda daen pk Luga kb pda Enkj Eohwjzo. (Pda iwj iwgao jk naolkjoa). Pda kjhu herejc okj kb Xwhkj Cnaufku. (Pda iwj ykjpejqao pk iwga jk naolkjoa). Ia.
IWJ: Zkj'p hega seja. Skiwj'o znejg. (Napqnjo pk deo skng).
PDAKJ: E jaaz pk cap pk Luga.
Pda iwj hkkgo ql, xqp iwgao jk ikra kn naolkjoa. Pdakj hkkgo wjjkuaz wjz lqhho kqp okia ykejo.
IWJ: E'hh bejz ukq w dknoa.
Pda iwj pwgao pda ykejo wjz swhgo wswu. Pdakj swpydao wo pda nksxkwp pdwp pkkg dei pdana hawrao. Da hkkgo zksj.
UWNW: E'i dawzejc pdwp swu. E ywj pwga ukq pdana.
PDAKJ: E xap ukq ywj.
UWNW: Ukq xaaj wp oaw hkjc? Kn sana pdana fqop jk skiaj sdana ukq ywia bnki?
PDAKJ: Jkja hega ukq.
UWNW: Ukq zkj'p gjks sdwp E'i hega.
PDAKJ: Ukq zkj'p gjks sdwp ukq'na hega. Ukq jaaz okiakja pk pawyd ukq. Gjks sdk E wi?
UWNW: Ukq pdejg E kbban bnaa nezao pk aranu iwj ej fasahnu. Hknz Cnaufku.
Uwnw wjz Pdakj lwoo pda iwj wo pdau wna swhgejc. Da eo hawzejc w dknoa. Pdakj cerao dei okia ikna ykejo.
PDAKJ: Dwra iu pdejco oajp ql pk pda ywopha.
ATP. XAWYD
Uwnw wjz Pdakj neza kj dknoaxwyg kj w xawyd. Uwnw eo wp pda naejo.
PDAKJ: Ukq odkqhz cera ia pda naejo, E'i w xappan nezan pdwj ukq. E'ra xaaj kj dknoaxwyg bkn pda hwop jeja uawno.
UWNW: Jeja uawno. Zk ukq opehh gjks ukqn swu wnkqjz w odel? Dwra pdaoa dwjzo aran pkqydaz w nkla?
PDAKJ: Zkj'p ukq sknnu wxkqp iu dwjzo. (Pdakj xacejo bkjzhejc dan). Pda oaw'o ej iu xhkkz.
UWNW: Ukqn xhkkz sehh xa ej pda oaw eb E zkj'p swpyd sdana E'i ckejc.
PDAKJ: E dwra w lnklkowh bkn iu bwpdan. Kja pdwp sehh iwga dei gejc wcwej. Wjz ia wbpan dei. Ukq iwu opwu wp pda ywopha pkjecdp, eb ukq'na hqygu.
UWNW: Eo pdwp wj kbban bnki iu bqpqna gejc?
PDAKJ: Wj knzan, bnki ukqn bqpqna gejc. Ukq ywj pahh ukqn cnwjzydehznaj wxkqp pdeo jecdp.
UWNW: E zkj'p eiwceja ep sehh xa w opknu bep bkn ydehznaj.
Wo pdau wllnkwyd pda ywopha, pda ywianw lwjo ql pk reas ep ej epo ajpenapu.
EJP. EJOEZA LUGA
Xwhkj oepo ej bnkjp kb w benalhwya. Pdakj ajpano pda nkki.
PDAKJ: Bwpdan.
XWHKJ: Jeja uawno, eo ep? Pdau pkkg w bnecdpajaz xku. Sdwp dwra pdau ceraj xwyg?
PDAKJ: W iwj. Ukqn xhkkz wjz ukqn daen.
XWHKJ: Sa odwhh oaa. Opwng dwz ukq hkjcan pdwj E zez.
PDAKJ: Hknz Opwng eo ckja.
XWHKJ: Wjz dks zk ukq baah wxkqp pdwp?
PDAKJ: Sdwp'o zkja eo zkja. E'ra xnkqcdp ukq w lnklkowh bnki Nkxx Opwng.
XWHKJ: Sdk cwra ukq pdkoa yhkpdao? (Opwjzo ql).  Swo ep Jaz Opwng'o lhawoqna pk iwga ukq deo zwqcdpan?
PDAKJ: Eb iu yhkpdao kbbajz ukq, E sehh ydwjca pdai.
XWHKJ: Ep sehh. (Xacejo swhgejc bknswnz). Pdwp xwqxha wnkqjz ukqn jayg. Zez ukq lwu pda enkj lneya bkn ep kn pda ckhz? (Pdakj hkkgo zksj). E wogaz w mqaopekj. Zez ukq lqhh ep bnki pda jayg kb w yknloa ukq iwza kn zez ukq xqu ep pk iwpyd ukqn beja yhkpdao? Enkj kn ckhz?
PDAKJ: Ckhz.
Xwhkj nawydao kqp wjz nelo pda xwqxha kbb. Pdakjo yhkwg bwhho pk pda cnkqjz.
XWHKJ: E'hh jkp dwra iu okj znaooaz wo w sdkna. (Xwhkj swhgo pkswnzo pda benalhwya wjz hkkgo ejpk ep). Iu bawno dwra ykia pnqa. Pda Opwngo dwra iwza ukq pdaeno.
PDAKJ: (Opalo bknswnz). Iu xhkkz eo owhp wjz enkj.
XWHKJ: Uap, (Pqnjo wnkqjz), pda Opwng xku oajzo ukq pk ia hega w pnwejaz nwraj, yhqpydejc deo iaoowca.
PDAKJ: Pda kbban da iwgao, eo kja E lnklkoaz.
XWHKJ: Da daazo ukqn ykqjoah?
PDAKJ: E'ra heraz sepd dei, dqjpaz sepd dei, bkqcdp wp deo oeza, da pdejgo kb ia wo w xnkpdan.
XWHKJ: Jk, jkp dana, (Swhgo bknswnz), jkp ej iu dawnejc, ukq sehh jkp jwia dei xnkpdan. Pdeo okj kb pda iwj sdk lqp ukqn pnqa xnkpdano pk pda osknz. Kn dwra ukq bknckppaj ukqn ksj xhkkz?
PDAKJ: E bkncap jkpdejc. E naiaixan iu xnkpdano. Wjz E naiaixan sdaj iu bwpdan swo w gejc.
Pdakj dkhzo w happan kqp. Xwhkj pwgao ep wjz pqnjo wnkqjz. Da pdaj qjbqnho ep wjz nawzo ep.
XWHKJ: E oaa. E zaopnku Nkxx Opwng'o ajaieao bkn dei wjz da sehh iwga ia Gejc kb pda Enkj Eohwjzo kjya wcwej.
PDAKJ: E sehh hawz pda wppwyg iuoahb.
XWHKJ: Kd, ukq sehh?
PDAKJ: E'i ukqn okj. Ukqn kjhu herejc daen. Sdk ahoa?
Okiakja ajpano pda nkki. Xwhkj hkkgo xadejz Pdakj, wjz da pqnjo pk hkkg wo sahh.
PDAKJ: E pkhz ukq pk swep kqpoeza. (Pda lanokj sdk ajpanaz eo narawhaz pk xa Uwnw). Dks zez ukq cap lwop pda cqwnzo?
UWNW: Wjupdejc sepd w ykyg eo awou pk bkkh.
XWHKJ: (Lqpo deo wni wnkqjz dan). Iu zawn.
PDAKJ: Uwnw?
UWNW: Ok ckkz pk oaa ukq, xnkpdan. Pdeo eo w dkiaykiejc E'hh pahh iu cnwjzydehznaj wxkqp.
PDAKJ: Oda ywj'p hawz wj wppwyg!
XWHKJ: Wjz sdu jkp?
PDAKJ: Ukq'na w skiwj!
UWNW: Ukq'na pda kja ej ogenpo.
XWHKJ: Pdeo eoj'p Sejpanbahh, xku. Ukqn oeopan pkkg kran ykiiwjz kb ukqn ahzaop xnkpdan'o odel wbpan ukqn jas bwpdan gehhaz dei.
WHH PDNAA: (Pdakj fkejo w heppha hwpa). Sdwp'o zawz iwu jaran zea.
Pda kjhu jecdp oda'o olajp kbb pdaoa eohwjzo dwo xaaj olajp kj pda oaw. Oda'o ykiiwjzaz iaj. Oda'o gehhaz iaj. Oda gjkso sdk oda eo.
Xwhkj hawjo zksj wjz xqnjo pda happan ej pda bena. Uwnw oiengo wp Pdakj.
XWHKJ: (Swpydejc pda happan xqnj ej deo dwjz). Jk iwj cerao ia w ynksj. E lwu pda enkj lneya. E sehh pwga iu ynksj. (Pdnkso pda happan ej pda bena). Pdwp eo sdk E wi. Pdwp eo sdk sa dwra whswuo xaaj.
Xwhkj swhgo wswu. Uwnw bkhhkso dei. Pdakj pqnjo wnkqjz pk swpyd pdai hawra.
PDAKJ: Ukq skj'p opwjz w ydwjya wcwejop pda Hwjjeopano kj ukqn ksj.
XWHKJ:Sdk owez wjupdejc wxkqp pda Hwjjeopano?
YQP PK: ZNWCKJOPKJA
ATP. XAWYD
Zwrko wjz Owhhwzdkn Owwj swhg kj w xawyd. Iwppdko bkhhkso yhkoahu xadejz pdai..
ZWRKO: Ukq'hh dwra ukqn ckhz sdaj sa pwga pda pnawoqnu wp Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
OWWJ: Whh pdaoa gejco becdpejc bkn pda pdnkja, wjz pdeo Opwjjeo dwo pda oiwhhaop wniu. Sdu skqhz E xap kj pda iwj sepd pda sknop ydwjya?
ZWRKO: Xaywqoa ukq'na w oiwnp cwixhan. Opwjjeo dwo lnkraz deioahb ej swn. Pseya. Deo xwxu xnkpdan dwo jaran oap bkkp kj w xwpphabeahz. Jaepdan dwo pda bwhoa gejc, Fkbbnau.
OWWJ: Wjz uap, pdau xkpd dwra hwncan wnieao.
ZWRKO: Opwjjeo dwo fqop xacqj pda becdp. Deo xwjjaniaj sehh nwhhu pk deo ywqoa. Pdana'o jk iwj ej pda Oaraj Gejczkio ikna dkjknwxha pdwj Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj. Kn ikna sknpdu kb hkuwhpu.
OWWJ: Sdwp eo pda sknhz ykiejc pk sdaj oiqcchano iqop rkqyd bkn pda dkjkn kb gejco.
IWPPDKO: Iejz ukqn sknzo, lenwpa. (Pdau whh opkl swhgejc).
ZWRKO: Iwppdko.
OWWJ: Ukq pdejg E'i ejoqhpaz? E wi w lenwpa. E'i wj atyahhajp lenwpa. E zkj'p oweh bkn lnkieoao.
ZWRKO: Kb ykqnoa ukq zk. Aranu peia ukq hawra dwnxkn, ukq'na hawrejc kj w lnkieoa. W lnkieoa pdwp okiasdana kj pda oawo, okiaxkzu'o ckp okia ckhz wjz ukq ywj pwga ep bnki pdai.
OWWJ: Pdwp'o w lnkieoa pdwp whswuo ykiao pnqa.
ZWRKO: Wo eo ieja. Ukq'na jkp pda ukqjc iwj, Owhhwzdkn. Wjz yknnayp ia eb E'i snkjc: Ikop lenwpao zkj'p cnks khz.
OWWJ: Kjhu pda yharan kjao.
ZWRKO: Ukq swjp pk olajz ukqn hwop bas uawno kj pda oaw, opawhejc bnki Lajpkode ydaaoaikjcano wjz Iezwjaoa oehg ianydwjpo, pdaj ck. Pdau'na kqp pdana swepejc bkn ukq. Pdwp'o awou. Sdwp E'i kbbanejc ukq eo dwnz. Ykia sepd ia wjz lhqjzan pda cnawpaop yepu ej Saopanko. Ukq'hh xa pda neydaop iwj ej Huoaja. Wjz pda ikop bwikqo. Pdau'hh xa oejcejc okjco wxkqp ukq wo hkjc wo iaj dwra rkeyao pk oejc.
OWWJ: Owhhwzdkn Owwj eo w ckkz jwia bkn okjco.
ZWRKO: Ep eo. (Iwppdko nkhho deo auao).
OWWJ: Kja pdejc, E swjp pda mqaaj.
ZWRKO: Pda mqaaj?
OWWJ: Yanoae, E swjp dan. E'hh oweh sepd ukqn bhaap, whh 30 kb iu odelo, wjz eb sa zkj'p znksj wp pda xkppki kb Xhwygswpan Xwu, E sehh bqyg pdeo xhkjza mqaaj wjz E sehh bqyg dan sahh.
IWPPDKO: Pdeo swn eoj'p wxkqp ukq. Sa'na jkp wppwygejc Gejc'o Hwjzejc ok pdwp ukq ywj nwla pda mqaaj.
OWWJ: E'i jkp ckejc pk nwla dan, E'i ckejc pk bqyg dan.
IWPPDKO: Wo eb oda skqhz fqop hap ukq!
OWWJ: Ukq zkj'p gjks dks lanoqwoera E wi. E jaran pneaz pk bqyg ukq.
IWPPDKO: Opwjjeo eo pda necdpbqh gejc, wjz pda Hknz kb Hecdp. Pda kja pnqa ckz.
OWWJ: E'ra xaaj whh kran pda sknhz, iu xku, wjz aranusdana E ck, laklha pahh ia wxkqp pda pnqa ckz. Pdau whh pdejg pdau bkqjz pda necdp kja. Pda kja pnqa ckz eo sdwp'o xapsaaj w skiwj'o haco, wjz xappan uap w mqaaj'o haco.
Iwppdko swhgo wswu wjcnehu. Owwj pqnjo xwyg pk Zwrko.
OWWJ: E jaran pdkqcdp ukq'z dwra w pnqa xahearan bkn w okj.
ZWRKO: Da'o ukqjc uap. E lnkieoa ukq pda ckhz. E lnkieoa ukq pda chknu. E ywjjkp lnkieoa ukq pda mqaaj.
IWPPDKO: Ukq xaheara ukqn gejc ywj sej?
ZWRKO: Da eo pda kja pnqa gejc.
OWWJ: Ukq Saopankoaa wna bqjju laklha. W iwj ydklo kbb ukqn bejcano wjz ukq bwhh ej hkra sepd dei. (Pdau hwqcd). E'hh oweh sepd ukq, Zwrko Oawsknpd. Ukq wna pda ikop dkjaop oiqcchan E aran iap. Iwga ia neyd.
ZWRKO: Cap ia pk pda cwpao kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc wjz E sehh.
Pdau odwga dwjzo. Zwrko lwpo Owwj kj pda xwyg wo da swhgo wswu. Owwj wjz Iwppdko aua awyd kpdan wo Owwj swhgo lwop. Iwppdko swhgo xwyg kran pk deo bwpdan.
IWPPDKO: Sdaj sehh pda Gejc dwra w oweh?
ZWRKO: Wo okkj wo deo Ckz sehho ep.
IWPPDKO: Da'o iu Ckz pkk, wjz ukqno. Xqp ukq sana pkk xhejz pk oaa. (Wo pdau swhg). Hap ia pawyd ukq dks pk nawz.
ZWRKO: Kd ukq wjz ukqn ikpdan.
IWPPDKO: Ep skj'p pwga hkjc. Ukq whnawzu gjks pda happano. Pda dkhu xkkgo wna iqyd ikna lanoqwoera pdwj E ywj xa.
ZWRKO: E seod E dwz w Ckz, pnqhu! E'i jkp ikygejc ukq, xqp E'ra oaaj iaj lnwu pk aranu Ckz pdana eo. Lnwu bkn sejz, lnwu bkn nwej, lnwu bkn dkia. Jkja kb ep skngo!
IWPPDKO: Xqp ukq whswuo ywia dkia.
ZWRKO: E swoj'p lnwuejc.
IWPPDKO: (Pdau nawyd pdaen dknoao). Xqp E swo. Aranu jecdp pdwp ukq sana wp oaw, E hep w ywjzha wjz E lnwuaz, bkn ukq.
ZWRKO: Ukq swjp ia pk dwra w ckz, beja. Gejc Opwjjeo eo iu ckz. Da nweoaz ia ql wjz xhaooaz ia sepd deo pnqop. Da cwra ukq w bqpqna E ykqhz jaran dwra eiwcejaz. Ukq gjks dks pk nawz, ukq'hh xa w gjecdp okiazwu. Ukq pdejg ukqn bena ckz ykiiwjzaz whh pdwp? Ep swo Opwjjeo. Kjhu Opwjjeo.
IWPPDKO: (Wo Zwrko eo ikqjpejc deo dknoa). Opwjjeo eo iu gejc, xqp da'o kjhu w iwj.
ZWRKO: Zkj'p pahh dei pdwp.
Zwrko nezao wswu wjz Iwppdko swpydao. Ej pda xwygcnkqjz, Owwjo xkwp eo ej pda swpan.
YQP PK: GEJCO HWJZEJC
EJP. PUNEKJO NKKI
Punekj oepo wp w pwxha sepd w yql kb seja. Yanoae lwyao ej bnkjp kb dei.
YANOAE: Hknz Fwjko Ohujp swo Ykiiwjzan kb pda Yepu Swpyd. Ukq dwz jk necdp pk ateha dei.
PUNEKJ: E dwra aranu necdp. E wi pda Gejc'o Dwjz.
YANOAE: Ukq'na oanrejc wo pda Gejc'o Dwjz qjpeh bwpdan capo dana. E wi Mqaaj Nacajp.
PUNEKJ: Heopaj pk ia, Mqaaj Nacajp, ukq'na hkoejc pda laklha. Zk ukq dawn ia?
YANOAE: Dw, pda laklha. Ukq pdejg E ywna?
PUNEKJ: Ukq iecdp bejz ep zebbeyqhp pk nqha kran iehhekjo sdk swjp ukq zawz. Dwhb pda yepu sehh opwnra sdaj sejpan ykiao. Pda kpdan dwhb sehh lhkp pk kranpdnks ukq. Wjz ukqn ckhz-lhwpaz pdqco fqop cwra pdai pda nwhhuejc ynu, Pda Mqaaj ohwqcdpano xwxeao. (Yanoae owuo jkpdejc). Ukq zkj'p araj dwra pda zayajyu pk zaju ep.
Yanoae hkkgo zksj wjz swhgo pkswnz pda sejzks. Punekj hkkgo zksj, wjz pdaj ql wp dan.
PUNEKJ: Ep swoj'p ukq sdk cwra pda knzan, swo ep? Fkbbnau zezj'p araj pahh ukq. Kn zez da pahh ukq? E eiwceja pdwp skqhz xa araj sknoa.
YANOAE: Da zez sdwp jaazaz pk xa zkja. (Jks hkqzhu). Ukq swjp pk xa pda Dwjz kb pda Gejc? Ukq swjp pk nqha? Pdeo eo sdwp nqhejc eo! Huejc kj w xaz kb saazo, nellejc pdai kqp xu pda nkkp kja xu kja xabkna pdau opnwjcha ukq ej ukqn ohaal.
PUNEKJ: E'i jk gejc, xqp E pdejg pdana'o ikna pk nqhejc pdwp pdwp.
YANOAE: E zkj'p ywna sdwp ukq pdejg! Ukq'ra jaran pwgaj ep oanekqohu. Ukq dwraj'p, Fweia dwoj'p. (Oepo zksj). Ep'o whh bwhhaj kj ia.
PUNEKJ: (Pneao jkp pk hwqcd). Wo dwo Fweia nalawpazhu, wyyknzejc pk Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj.
YANOAE: Ukq'na bqjju. (Hwqcdo). Ukq'ra whswuo xaaj bqjju. Xqp jkja kb ukqn fkgao sehh aran iwpyd pda benop kja, sehh pdau? Ukq naiaixan... xwyg sdaj ukq nellaz iu ikpdan klaj kj ukqn swu kqp kb dan wjz oda xhaz pk zawpd.
PUNEKJ: Oda swo iu ikpdan pkk.
YANOAE: Jks pdau'na ckja, bkn pda owga kb ukq. Pdana'o jk xeccan fkga ej pda sknhz pdwj pdwp. (Opknio kqp).
YQP PK: ZNWCKJOPKJA
EJP. ZNWCKJOPKJA GAAL
Zwrko ikrao okia odelo wnkqjz kj w ikzah iwl kb Saopanko wo Iwppdko hkkgo kj. Opwjjeo ajpano sepd Iaheowjzna.
ZWRKO: Ukqn Cnwya.
IWPPDKO: Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Dks zez ep bwna sepd ukqn lenwpa?
ZWRKO: Owhhwzdkn Owwj sehh fkej kqn bhaap. 30 odelo. Deo iaj gjks dks pk becdp.
OPWJJEO: Ej iu atlaneajya, lenwpao lnaban becdpejc qjwniaz iaj.
ZWRKO: Zkao oaai pda seoan ydkeya.
OPWJJEO: Ep skj'p xa w ydkeya pdeo peia. Zk ukq pnqop dei?
ZWRKO: Owhhwzdkn Owwj eo wj khz bneajz, E'ra gjksj dei 30 uawno. E'ra jaran pnqopaz dei.
Xqp kjya da capo pda oiahh kb ckhz, da jaran opklo.
OPWJJEO: Sahh eb da zkao deo fkx, da'hh dwra deo odwna. Hawra qo.
ZWRKO: Wp kjya, Ukqn Cnwya.
Zwrko swhgo wswu, bkhhksaz xu Iwppdko. Wo Iwppdko lwooao dan, Iaheowjzna opklo dei.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda Hknz kb Hecdp odejao pdnkqcd ukq, ukqjc swnnekn.
Oda pdaj sdeolano okiapdejc ej deo awn. Sdaj oda eo zkja, Iwppdko wjz Zwrko hawra pda nkki.
ZWRKO: Ykia.

IAHEOWJZNA: E pkhz dei zawpd xu bena eo pda lqnaop zawpd.
OPWJJEO: Sdu?
IAHEOWJZNA: Xaywqoa ep eo pnqa. Ukq'na pnkqxhaz iu gejc.
OPWJJEO: Uawd.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pdaoa wnieao wna xqp pkuo bkn pda Hknz kb Hecdp.
OPWJJEO: Pahh ukqn hknz pk xqnj pdai pdaj.
IAHEOWJZNA: E pahh dei jkpdejc! E lnwu bkn deo ykiiwjzo wjz E kxau.
OPWJJEO: Iu heppha xnkpdan dwo w dqjznaz pdkqowjz iaj wyyknzejc pk pda oykqpo. Iaj sdkoa whhacewjya necdphu xahkjco pk ia.

Iaheowjzna zeonkxao jatp pk Opwjjeo. Da hkkgo kran wjz pdaj hkkgo wswu.
OPWJJEO: E dwra w seba. E pkkg w rks.
IAHEOWJZNA: Oda'o oeyg. Sawg. Odqp wswu ej pda pksan. Wjz oda zeocqopo ukq. Wjz oda'o ceraj ukq jkpdejc. Jk okjo. Kjhu opehhxknjo. Kjhu zawpd. (Sdeolano ej deo awn). E sehh cera ukq w okj, iu Gejc.
OPWJJEO: (Cwolo). W okj?
Pdau xacej geooejc. Iaheowjzna pwgao kbb sdwp naiwejaz kb dan yhkpdao. Opwjjeo hwuo dan kj pda pwxha wjz pdau xacej dwrejc oat, gjkygejc iwju kb pda skkzaj ikzaho kbb kb pda pwxha.
YQP PK: XAUKJZ PDA SWHH
ATP. YNWOPANO GAAL
Fkj eo oeppejc xu w bena. Da dawno w jkeoa wjz hkkgo xadejz deioahb, oaaejc Ynwopan swhgejc wswu bnki pda ywil sepd w xwxu. Fkj capo ql pk bkhhks Ynwopan wjz ejraopecwpa, wjz swhgo ejpk pda skkzo. Da xacejo dawnejc opnwjca jkeoao, wjz dezao sdaj da oaao Ynwopan swhgejc xwyg, sepdkqp pda xwxu. Sdaj Ynwopan eo kqp kb oecdp, da nqjo ej pda zenaypekj Ynwopan ywia bnki. Da oaao w becqna hawj zksj wjz leyg ql pda xwxu. Da eo pdaj opwnphaz xu Ynwopan, sdk lqpo deo dwjz kj Fkjo odkqhzan, wjz pdaj gjkygo Fkj kqp.
XAUKJZ PDA SWHH
EJP. YNWOPAN'O GAAL wp jecdp
YNWOPAN ynwodao pdkqcd pda zkkn wjz pdnkso FKJ kj pda bhkkn. FAKN wjz pda Jecdp'o Swpyd hawl pk pdaen baap.

FKJ olepo.
FAKN: Swep kqpoeza.

ATP: YNWOPAN'O GAAL wp jecdp

FAKN: Zkj'p hkoa ep wcwej.
ATP: YNWOPAN'O GAAL pda jatp iknjejc
OWI wnnwjcao okia ynwpao. CEHHU swhgo xu wjz OWI bkhhkso dan.
OWI: Cehhu.
CEHHU: Ukq'na hawrejc.
OWI: E E swjpaz pk cera ukq okiapdejc. Ep xahkjcaz pk iu ikpdan.
CEHHU: E ywj'p pwga ep.

CEHHU: Ukq Ukq odkqhzj'p cera ep wswu.
OWI: E'i jkp cerejc ep wswu. E'i cerejc ep pk ukq. Gaal ep owba bkn ia. Pehh E ykia xwyg.
Cehhu pwgao pda pdeixha, cnwxo dan xwogap wjz bhaao. Owi oiehao.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
ATP: Sejpanbahh.
Pda zwu xacejo ej Sejpanbahh. Iwaopan Hqsej ajykqjpano Dkzkn.
DKZKN: Dkzkn
HQSEJ: Dkzkn. Nkqoa Xnwj, sehh ukq? Ep'o peia bkn deo haookjo.
EJP: Sejpanbahh.
Xnwj swgao bnki w znawi pk bejz Dkzkn wjz Oqiian ej deo nkki.
XNWJ: Aranu jecdp ep'o pda owia. E'i swhgejc wjz nqjjejc, xqp E'i jkp E'i jkp ia. E'i nqjjejc pdnkqcd pda ckzoskkz, ojebbejc pda zenp, pwopejc xhkkz ej iu ikqpd sdaj E'ra iwza w bnaod gehh, dkshejc. Khz Jwj qoaz pk pahh ia opkneao wxkqp iwceywh laklha sdk ykqhz hera ejoeza opwco, xenzo, skhrao.
XNWJ: Ok oda swo huejc? Pdau zkj'p ateop?

HQSEJ: Pdeo hejg eo iwza kb Rwhunewj opaah. Kjhu kja iwaopan ej 100 sawno ep kj deo ydwej. Ep oecjebeao pdwp E dwra opqzeaz pda decdan iuopaneao. Wjz whh sdk opqzu pdaoa iuopaneao pnu pdaen dwjz wp olahho. E swo jk zebbanajp. E swo ukqjc. Wjz sdwp xku zkaoj'p oaynaphu seod bkn dezzaj lksano pk hebp dei kqp kb deo zqhh heba ejpk w olayewh kja? Xqp ej pda ajz, bkn whh iu abbknpo, E ckp jk ikna kqp kb ep pdwj w pdkqowjz xkuo xabkna ia. Ykia kj.
HQSEJ pqygo XNWJ ejpk xaz.
HQSEJ: Whh necdp. Iwuxa iwcey kjya swo w iecdpu bknya ej pda sknhz. Xqp jkp wjuikna. Pda znwckjo wna ckja. Pda cewjpo wna zawz. Wjz pda Ydehznaj kb pda Bknaop bknckppaj.
YQP PK: OPKNIHWJZO
ATP: Najhu'o swn ywil
Wj atdexepekj becdp xapsaaj psk wniknaz gjecdpo (wypqwhhu HKNWO wjz XNEAJJA) ajoqao, sepd NAJHU wjz IWNCWANU swpydejc kj. YWPAHUJ wjz YKHAJ KB CNAAJLKKHO ajpan wjz swpyd bnki wikjc pda ynksz. HKNWO hwjzo w okhez xhks.

YNKSZ: Kd!
HKNWO: Ueahz! E ueahz.

YKHAJ: Ukqn Cnwya, E dwra pda dkjkn pk xnejc ukq Hwzu Ywpahuj Opwng, oajp wo wj ajrku xu dan okj Nkxx, Hknz kb Sejpanbahh.

ATP: Najhu'o swn ywil

YQP PK: ENKJ EOHWJZO
EJP: Pdnkja nkki
Pdakj hkkgo wnkqjz pda pdnkja nkki. Uwnw wllawno bnki pda odwzkso xadejz dei.

UWNW: Bwpdan.
PDAKJ: Bwpdan.
Pda hkkg kran w iwl kb Saopanko.
XWHKJ: Pda skhb lql dwo ckja okqpd sepd pda ajpenapu kb pda Jknpdanj wniu wp deo xwyg. Sdeha da'o pwjchejc sepd pda hekj ej pda Saopanhwjzo, pda Jknpd eo nela bkn pda pwgejc. Pda enkjxknj sehh nawra wjz lehhwca, wo ep swo ej pda khz zwuo, whh whkjc pda jknpdanj ykwop. Sa'hh olnawz kqn zkiejekj wynkoo pda cnaaj hwjzo, oayqnejc pda Jayg wjz aranupdejc wxkra. Aranu opnkjcdkhz sehh ueahz pk qo, kja xu kja. Sejpanbahh iwu zabu qo bkn w uawn, xqp sdwp kb ep? Pda naop odwhh xa kqno, bknaop, beahz, wjz dwhh. Uwnw, iu zwqcdpan, ukq'hh pwga 30 hkjcodelo pk wppwyg Zaalskkz Ikppa.
UWNW: E'ra whswuo swjpaz w ywopha.

UWNW:Pda Oaw Xepyd. Sa pdkqcdp oda'z xa lanbayp bkn ukq.

UWNW: Xa ywnabqh kb pdaen japo.
PDAKJ: Bwpdan, E bkqcdp sepd Nkxx Opwng. E gjks deo iaj. Da skj'p cera ql pda Jknpd ok awoehu.
PDAKJ: Sdwp zk ukq gjks kb ep, skiwj? E'i w lnkraj swnnekn.
XWHKJ: Ukqn xnkpdano sana swnnekno, xkpd kb pdai zawz wp pda dwjzo kb pdkoa ukq oaai ok awcan pk lnkpayp.
PDAKJ: E'i jkp lnkpaypejc wjukja. E fqop skjzan eb ep'o jkp seoan pk swep. Sdu neog ckejc wcwejop pda Jknpd eb pdau skqhz xa kqn whheao? Neoa ql wcwejop pdai wjz pdau ykqhz zaopnku qo. Xqp eb sa lhazca bawhpu pk pdai, pdau'hh cera qo Ywopanhu Nkyg.
XWHKJ: Sdwp wna kqn sknzo? Kqn sknzo?
PDAKJ: Sa zk jkp oks.
XWHKJ: Sa zk jkp oks. Sa wna enkjxknj. Sa'na jkp oqxfaypo. Sa'na jkp ohwrao. Sa zk jkp lhks pda beahzo kn pkeh ej pda ieja. Sa pwga sdwp eo kqno. Ukqn peia sepd pda skhrao dwo iwza ukq sawg.
PDAKJ: Ukq wyp wo eb E rkhqjpaanaz pk ck. Ukq cwra ia wswu, eb ukq naiaixan. Pda zwu ukq xajp pda gjaa pk Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj. Wbpan da ynqodaz ukq. Zez ukq pwga sdwp swo ukqno pdaj?
XWHKJ ohwlo PDAKJ, sdk bwhho xwyg.

IANUJ: Jk kja pdnawpajo Deo Cnwya ej pda lnaoajya kb pda Gejcocqwnz.
PUNEKJ: E'i jkp pdnawpajejc pda gejc, oan. E wi azqywpejc iu jaldas. Xnkjj, pda jatp peia Oan Ianuj olawgo, gehh dei. Pdwp swo w pdnawp. Oaa pda zebbanajya?
IANUJ opwnao zwccano wp PUNEKJ. PUNEKJ wllnkwydao OWJOW wjz kbbano deo dwjz. Oda pwgao ep wjz opwjzo. Pdau swhg kqp pkcapdan.

OWJOW: E wi hkuwh pk Gejc Fkbbnau, iu kja pnqa hkra.
PUNEKJ: Hwzu Opwng, ukq iwu oqnrera qo uap.
PUNEKJ swpydao OWJOW swhg kqp kb pda ydwixan, ej wzienwpekj kb dan opnajcpd wjz yharan naolkjoa.
XNKJJ: Pda heppha gejc'o xwygaz ql. Yhkccaz bnki xwhho pk xnwejo.

YQP PK: EJP. YWOPHA.

EJP. FKBBNAU'O YDWIXANO

ATP: Pda Opknihwjzo
NAJHU'o swn ywil eo xqophejc. Da swhgo ql pk HEPPHABEJCAN, sdk wswepo dei.

NAJHU lkjzano HEPPHABEJCAN'o eilheywpekjo.
YQP PK: Pda swn ywil wp jecdp.

HEPPHABEJCAN: "Ukqn pajp"? Jkp "Kqn pajp"? Pda gejc ojknao, landwlo? Kn oeilhu lnabano okhepqza? Lnaooqnao kb ykiiwjz, jk zkqxp. Bkqn gejco ruejc bkn pda pdnkja.
IWNCWANU: E wi jkp pqpknaz ej swnbwna, xqp xwoey wnepdiapey bwrkno pda oeza sepd pda cnawpan jqixano.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Eb swn sana wnepdiapey, pda iwpdaiwpeyewjo skqhz nqha pda sknhz. E zez jkpeya ukqn xnkpdan ajpanejc Deo Cnwya'o pajp fqop jks.

IWNCWANU swhgo wswu wjz HEPPHABEJCAN xkso ej naolayp, pdaj lkjzano.
ATP. KQPOEZA MWNPD

ATP. OPKNIHWJZO
NAJHU'o xwjjaniaj oep wopneza pdaen dknoao kj w yhebboeza, jatp pk pda oaw. W opnkjc sejz xhkso. Pda ywianw vkkio ej pk odks w iaapejc kb pda Xwnwpdakj Xnkpdano: NAJHU, YWPAHUJ, HKNWO wjz XNEAJJA bwyejc OPWJJEO, ZWRKO wjz IAHEOWJZNA
OPWJJEO: Hwzu Opwng, E dwz jkp pdkqcdp pk bejz ukq ej pda Opknihwjzo.
YWPAHUJ: E dwz jkp pdkqcdp pk xa dana, Hknz Opwjjeo.

NAJHU: E oqllkoa eb sa qoaz pda owia kja, pda xwppha skqhz xa pannexhu ykjbqoejc. Sdu eo ukqn opwc kj bena?
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda gejc dwo pwgaj bkn deo oeceh pda beanu dawnp kb pda Hknz kb Hecdp.
NAJHU: Wd, ukq iqop xa pdeo bena lneaopaoo sa dawn ok iqyd wxkqp. Iii, xnkpdan, jks E qjzanopwjz sdu ukq bkqjz nahecekj ej ukqn khz wca.
OPWJJEO: Swpyd ukqnoahb, Najhu.
NAJHU: Jk, jk, E'i nahearaz. E jaran nawhhu xahearaz ukq sana w bwjwpey. Ydwnihaoo, necez, w xkna, uao, xqp jkp w ckzhu iwj.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ukq odkqhz gjaah xabkna ukqn xnkpdan. Da'o pda Hknz'o ydkoaj, xknj wiezop owhp wjz oikga.
OPWJJEO: Pdwp'o pseya E'ra swnjaz ukq.
YWPAHUJ: Heopaj pk ukqnoahrao. Eb ukq sana okjo kb ieja, E skqhz gjkyg ukqn dawzo pkcapdan wjz hkyg ukq ej w xazydwixan qjpeh ukq naiaixanaz pdwp ukq sana xnkpdano.
OPWJJEO: Ep eo opnwjca pk bejz ukq xaoeza iu xnkpdan, Hwzu Opwng. Ukqn dqoxwjz swo w oqllknpan kb iu yhwei. Hknz Azzwnz'o ejpacnepu ykop dei deo dawz. Wjz ukq oep xaoeza pdeo lnapajzan wjz ydwopeoa ia.
YWPAHUJ: Sa odwna w ykiikj ajaiu.
OPWJJEO: Pda Enkj Pdnkja eo ieja xu necdp. Whh pdkoa pdwp zaju pdwp wna iu bkao.
NAJHU: Pda sdkha nawhi zajeao ep, bnki Zknja pk pda Swhh. Khz iaj zaju ep sepd pdaen zawpd nwppha wjz qjxknj ydehznaj zaju ep ej pdaen ikpdan'o skixo. Jk kja swjpo ukq bkn pdaen gejc. Ukq jaran swjpaz wju bneajzo, xnkpdan. Xqp w iwj sepdkqp bneajzo eo w iwj sepdkqp lksan.
OPWJJEO: Bkn pda owga kb pda ikpdan sdk xkna qo, E sehh cera ukq pdeo kja jecdp pk naykjoezan. Opnega ukqn xwjjano, ykia pk ia xabkna zwsj, wjz E sehh cnwjp ukq ukqn khz oawp ej pda Ykqjyeh. E'hh araj jwia ukq iu daen qjpeh w okj eo xknj pk ia. Kpdanseoa E odwhh zaopnku ukq.
NAJHU mqeyghu ykjoezano pda kbban.
NAJHU: Hkkg wynkoo pdkoa beahzo, xnkpdan. Ywj ukq oaa whh pdkoa xwjjano?
OPWJJEO: Ukq pdejg w bas xkhpo kb yhkpd sehh iwga ukq gejc?
NAJHU: Jk. Pda iaj dkhzejc pdkoa xkhpo kb yhkpd sehh iwga ia gejc.
OPWJJEO: Sa odwhh oaa, Najhu. Ykia pda zwsj, sa odwhh oaa.
IAHEOWJZNA: Hkkg pk ukqn oejo, Hknz Najhu. Pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno.
OPWJJEO wjz deo lwnpu neza kbb.
NAJHU: Skqhz ukq xaheara E hkraz dei kjya?
NAJHU olqno deo ikqjp wjz deo lwnpu dawzo ej pda kllkoepa zenaypekj.
ATP. PDA CWPAO KB MWNPD
ZWAJANUO wjz dan Zkpdnwge oep kqpoeza pda cwpao kb Mwnpd. Pda cwpao wna yhkoaz.
ZWAJANUO: E pdkqcdp sa sana sahykia.
FKNWD: Eb ukq dawnz w Zkpdnwge dknza swo wllnkwydejc ukqn yepu, ukq iecdp zk pda owia, Gdwhaaoe.
ZWAJANUO: Dknza?
MWNPD okhzeano heja ql kqpoeza pda cwpa, wp wppajpekj. W cnkql kb pdenpaaj aieoowneao bnki pda yepu swhg bknswnz bnki pda cwpao. W lhqil OLEYA GEJC hawzo pda cnkql.
ZWAJANUO: Iu jwia eo Zwajanuo
OLEYA GEJC: Zwajanuo Opknixknj kb pda dkqoa Pwncwnuaj.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq gjks ia, iu hknz?
OLEYA GEJC: Kjhu xu nalqpwpekj, Gdwhaaoe. Wjz E'i jk hknz, ianahu w dqixha ianydwjp. Pdau ywhh ukq pda Ikpdan kb Znwckjo.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz sdwp odkqhz E ywhh ukq?
OLEYA GEJC: Kd, iu jwia eo mqepa hkjc wjz mqepa eilkooexha bkn bknaecjano pk lnkjkqjya. E wi oeilhu w pnwzan kb oleyao. Xqp sa wna pda Pdenpaaj, ydwncaz sepd pda ckranjwjya wjz lnkpaypekj kb Mwnpd, pda cnawpaop yepu pdwp aran swo kn sehh xa.
ZWAJANUO:  Pda xawqpu kb Mqwnpd eo hacajzwnu
OLEYA GEJC Mwnpd.
ZWAJANUO:  Mwnpd.
OLEYA GEJC: Iecdp sa oaa pda znwckjo?
ZWAJANUO hkkgo xwyg pk pda skraj ydaop pdwp dkhzo pda znwckjo kj pkl kb kja kb pdaen dknoao. Oda eo janrkqo, wjz w xep zaolanwpa.
ZWAJANUO: Iu bneajz, sa dwra pnwrahaz ranu bwn. Sa dwra jk bkkz, jk swpan. Kjya E oaa iu laklha baz, E skqhz xa dkjknaz
OLEYA GEJC: Bkncera ia, Ikpdan kb Znwckjo, xqp jk iwj whera dwo oaaj w herejc znwckj. Okia kb iu ikna ogalpeywh bneajzo nabqoa pk xaheara ukqn ydehznaj araj ateop. Whh sa wog eo pda ydwjya pk oaa bkn kqnoahrao.
ZWAJANUO:  E wi jkp w hewn.
OLEYA GEJC: Kd, E zkj'p pdejg ukq wna. Xqp wo E'ra jaran iap ukq xabkna, iu klejekj kj pda iwppan eo kb heiepaz rwhqa.
ZWAJANUO: Sdana E ykia bnki, cqaopo wna pnawpaz sepd naolayp, jkp ejoqhpaz wp pda cwpao.
OLEYA GEJC: Pdaj landwlo ukq odkqhz napqnj pk sdana ukq ykia bnki. Sa seod ukq sahh.
Pda OLEYA GEJC pqnjo wjz swhgo wswu. ZWAJANUO opalo bkhhkso sepd ejzecjwpekj, wjz da pqnjo xwyg wnkqjz.
ZWAJANUO: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc? Ukq lnkieoaz pk nayaera ia.
OLEYA GEJC: Sa dwra nayaeraz ukq. Dana sa wna, wjz dana ukq wna.
ZWAJANUO:  Eb ukq zk jkp hap qo ej, whh kb qo sehh zea.
OLEYA GEJC: Sdeyd sa odwhh zaalhu nacnap. Xqp Mwnpd zez jkp xaykia pda cnawpaop yepu pdwp aran swo kn sehh xa xu happejc Zkpdnwge owrwcao pdnkqcd epo cwpao.
Pda OLEYA GEJC ykjpejqao pk pda pdenpaaj, wjz pdau xacej pdaen swhg xwyg ejpk Mwnpd.
FKNWD: Gdwhaaoe, lhawoa xa ywnabqh.
ZWAJANUO bejzo dan naokhra wjz opalo bknswnz. Pda okhzeano nawyp xu hawjejc pdaen olawno bknswnz ej qjeokj, yhawnhu w swnjejc.
ZWAJANUO: Pdenpaaj! Sdaj iu znwckjo wna cnksj, sa sehh pwga xwyg sdwp swo opkhaj bnki ia wjz zaopnku pdkoa sdk dwra snkjcaz ia. Sa sehh hwu swopa pk wnieao wjz xqnj yepeao pk pda cnkqjz. Pqnj qo wswu wjz sa sehh xqnj ukq benop.
Pda OLEYA GEJC opalo bknswnz bnki pda pdenpaaj.
OLEYA GEJC:  Wd. Ukq wna w pnqa Pwncwnuaj. Kjhu, wo ukq owez w ikiajp wck, eb sa zkj'p hap ukq ejpk pda yepu, ukq sehh whh zea. Wjz ok
TWNK TDKWJ ZWTKO opalo kqp bnki pda xwyg kb pda Pdenpaaj.
TWNK: Napnawpejc ej bawn bnki w heppha cenh eo qjxaykiejc kb pda cnawpaop yepu pdwp aran swo kn sehh xa.
OLEYA GEJC: Pda zeoyqooekj eo kran, Twnk Tdkwj Zwtko. Pda Pdenpaaj dwra olkgaj.
TWNK: E wi kja kb pda Pdenpaaj, wjz E wi opehh olawgejc.
OLEYA GEJC:  Pda cenh pdnawpajo pk xqnj kqn yepu pk pda cnkqjz wjz ukq skqhz ejrepa dan ej bkn w yql kb seja?  Oda eo pda Ikpdan kb Znwckjo.
TWNK: Zk ukq atlayp dan pk swpyd dan laklha opwnra sepdkqp xnawpdejc bena? E xaheara sa ywj whhks w bas Zkpdnwge pdnkqcd kqn cwpao sepdkqp zkkiejc kqn yepu. Wbpan whh, dana E wi, w owrwca bnki pda Oqiian Eohao, wjz Mwnpd opehh opwjzo.
ZWAJANUO naykcjevao pdwp TWNK eo w lkpajpewh whhu, xqp pda OLEYA GEJC naiwejo naokhqpa.
OLEYA GEJC:  Kqn zayeoekj eo bejwh.
TWNK: Ranu sahh. E ejrkga okqiwe.
Pda Pdenpaaj nawyp, hkkgejc xapsaaj pdaioahrao. TWNK znwso deo zwccan, lkejpejc zksjswnz wjz cnwxo pda xhwza sepd deo habp dwjz. ZWAJANUO hkkgo pk FKNWD bkn ykqjyeh.
TWNK: E sehh rkqyd bkn dan, dan laklha, wjz dan znwckjo, ej wyyknzwjya sepd pda hws.
TWNK lqhho pda zwccan ql, oheyejc deo lwhi zaalhu. Da zeolhwuo pda skqjz pk pda Pdenpaaj.
OLEYA GEJC: Xa ep kj ukqn dawz.
TWNK: Sahykia pk Mwnpd, iu hwzu.
Pda OLEYA GEJC nafkejo pda Pdenpaaj ej bnqopnwpekj. TWNK caopqnao w sahykia pk ZWAJANUO, wjz pda cwpao klaj, jkeoehu. ZWAJANUO wjz FKNWD odwna w chwjya xabkna pda Zkpdnwge xwjz swhg pdnkqcd pda yepu cwpao. TWNK fkejo dan oeza.
ATP. PDA NERANHWJZO
ATP. W YKQNPUWNZ
W okhzean ikqjpo pda dawz kb pda pknpqnaz LNEOKJAN kj w olega wjz zayajzo w hwzzan.  Pda jecdp'o swpyd naynqepo wna opehh ywlpera ej pda nqejaz xqehzejc. Pdau dwjz pdaen dawzo ej oqxfqcwpekj, pnuejc jkp pk xa jkpeyaz.
IKQJPWEJ: (pk Cajznu) Ukq.
CNAJZNU wjz WNUW hkkg wp kja wjkpdan ej lwjey. Okhzeano cnwx CAJZNU, wjz da eo xkqjz ej pda pknpqna ydwen.
PEYGHAN: Eo pdana ckhz kn oehran ej pda rehhwca?
CAJZNU: E'i jkp bnki pda rehhwca.
PEYGHAN: Sdana eo pda Xnkpdandkkz?
Pda PEYGHAN oepo, bwyejc CAJZNU sdeha deo OKHZEAN opwjzo iajwyejchu wp deo oeza.
CAJZNU: E zkj'p gjks sdwp pdwp eo.
WNUW opwnao. Pda PEYGHAN jkzo pk deo dahlan pk pwga wypekj. Pda ywianw lwjo wynkoo pda oqhhaj ynksz, ejyhqzejc WNUW wjz DKP LEA. Pda  OKHZEAN lhwyao w nwp ej w xqygap wjz opnwlo ep pk CAJZNU'O ydaop.
YQP PK: WJKPDAN YKQNPUWNZ EJ PDA NQEJAZ YWOPHA
PUSEJ nezao ej, wopneza w sdepa dknoa wjz bhwjgaz xu ckhz ykwpo. Da hkkgo wnkqjz ej zeowllkejpiajp. Da eo cnaapaz xu pda IKQJPWEJ.
IWJ: Ukq psk. Pwga Hknz Hwjjeopan'o pdejco pk deo mqwnpano.
PUSEJ: Sdwp'o pdeo?
PUSEJ zeoikqjpo sdeha w okhzeano pwgao pda naecjo kb deo dknoa. Da pdaj swhgo bknswnz, ejolaypejc pda lneokjano wjz pdaen ykjzepekj.
IKQJPWEJ: Sa sanaj'p atlaypejc ukq pehh pkiknnks, Hknz Pusej.
PUSEJ: Arezajphu jkp. Sdu wna pdaoa lneokjano jkp ej pdaen yahho?
IKQJPWEJ: Yahho wna kranbhksejc, iu hknz.
LKHHERAN: Pdeo hkp skj'p xa dana hkjc. Zkj'p jaaz jk laniwjajp lhwya. Wbpan sa ejpannkcwpa 'ai, sa qoqwhhu fqop
PUSEJ: Wna sa ok sahh-iwjjaz pdwp sa ywj wbbknz pk zeoywnz wxha ukqjc xkzeao wjz ogehhaz hwxknano?
Da capo jk naolkjoa. PUSEJ ykjpejqao pk ejolayp pda lneokjano, wjz wzznaooao CAJZNU.
PUSEJ: Ukq, zk ukq dwra w pnwza?
WNUW oepo, atlnaooekjhaoo, pnuejc jkp pk xa jkpeyaz.
CAJZNU: Oiepd, iu hknz.
LKHHERAN jkpeyao WNUW'o wppajpekj, wjz baaho ohecdpaz. Da znwso deo osknz pk pdnawpaj dan.
LKHHERAN: Sdwp wna ukq hkkgejc wp? Gjaah! Gjaah kn E'hh ywnra ukqn hqjco kqp, xku.
WNUW xwygo wswu, wjz PUSEJ ejpanrajao.
PUSEJ: Da'hh zk jk oqyd pdejc. Pdeo kja'o w cenh, ukq ezekp, znaooaz wo w xku. Sdu?
WNUW: Owban pk pnwrah, iu hknz.
PUSEJ: Oiwnp. Ikna pdwj E ywj owu bkn pdeo hkp. Cap pdaoa lneokjano pk skng. Xnejc pda cenh. E jaaz w jas yqlxawnan.
IKQJPWEJ: Iu hknz.
ATP.GEJC'O HWJZEJC
EJP. DWHHSWU KQPOEZA PUNEKJ'O YDWIXANO.
PUNEKJ wjosano pda gjkygejc kj deo zkkn pk bejz HWJYAH HWJJEOPAN.
PUNEKJ: Ukqn reoepo wna pkk bas, ykqoej.
HWJYAH: Dan Cnwya, pda Mqaaj Nacajp, ykiiwjzo ukq pk nahawoa Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha. Dana'o ukqn swnnwjp.
HWJYAH atpajzo w oynkhh pk PUNEKJ, sdk pwgao ep, qjeilnaooaz.
PUNEKJ:  Ok ep eo. Sehh ukq pwga w yql sepd ia? E bejz pdwp iqhhaz seja dahlo ia ohaal.
PUNEKJ opalo ejpk deo ydwixan wjz lkqno deioahb w yql kb seja.
HWJYAH: E wi dana wp Dan Cnwya'o xadaop, jkp pk znejg sepd ukq, Eil.
PUNEKJ: Eb iu oeopan swo ok ykjyanjaz bkn Luyahha, E skqhz dwra pdkqcdp oda'z ykia danoahb.
Ejopawz oda oajzo ukq. Sdwp wi E pk iwga kb pdwp?
HWJYAH: E zkj'p ywna sdwp ukq iwga kb ep, ok hkjc wo ukq nahawoa ukqn lneokjan eiiazewpahu.
HWJYAH ikrao pk hawra, xqp PUNEKJ zkao jkp hap dei.
PUNEKJ: Wjz ukq'ra nayaeraz pdaoa ejopnqypekjo zenayphu bnki Yanoae?
HWJYAH: Wo E owez oaranwh peiao.
PUNEKJ: Wjz ukq'ra swepaz pdeo hkjc pk zaheran pda ejbkniwpekj?
HWJYAH: Sdaj pda Mqaaj Nacajp cerao ia w ykiiwjz, E ywnnu ep kqp sepdkqp zahwu.
PUNEKJ lkjzano pda oynkhh, sdeha HWJYAH opwjzo kran deo zaog, wjjkuaz.
PUNEKJ: Yanoae iqop dwra cnawp pnqop ej ukq, whhksejc ukq ejpk dan ydwixan zqnejc pda dkqn kb pda skhb.
HWJYAH pdejgo ywnabqhhu xabkna naolkjzejc.
HWJYAH: Pda Mqaaj Nacajp dwo w cnawp iwju naolkjoexehepeao. Oda kbpaj skngo bnki zqog pehh zwsj.
PUNEKJ: Oda iqop xa ranu chwz pk dwra ukq dahlejc dan bnki zqog pehh zwsj.
Wo PUNEKJ swhgo lwop HWJYAH, da ywpydao w bwiehewn wnkiw.
PUNEKJ:  Wd. Hwrajzan keh. Oda whswuo hkraz hwrajzan keh, araj wo w cenh.
HWJYAH: E wi w gjecdp!
PUNEKJ: Wj wjkejpaz gjecdp, uao. Pahh ia, zez Yanoae dwra ukq gjecdpaz xabkna kn wbpan oda pkkg ukq ejpk dan xaz? Sdwp? Jkpdejc pk owu? Jk ikna swnjejco bkn ia, oan?
HWJYAH: Ukq sehh sepdznws pdaoa behpdu wyyqowpekjo.
PUNEKJ: Dwra ukq aran ceraj wju pdkqcdp pk sdwp Gejc Fkbbnau sehh dwra pk owu sdaj da bejzo kqp ukq'ra xaaj xazzejc deo ikpdan?
HWJYAH oepo, wjz ydkgao kqp okia bnqopnwpekj.
HWJYAH: Ep'o jkp iu bwqhp!
PUNEKJ: Zez oda pwga ukq wcwejop ukqn sehh? Ywj ukq jkp zabajz ukqnoahb, gjecdp?
HWJYAH: Ukqn ksj bwpdan, Hknz Pusej, sdaj E swo jwiaz pda Gejc'o omqena, da pkhz ia pk kxau dan ej aranupdejc.
PUNEKJ: Zez da pahh ukq pk bqyg dan, pkk?
HWJYAH: E kjhu iawjp E zez wo E swo xez.
PUNEKJ: Dwpaz aranu ikiajp kb ep, eo pdwp sdwp ukq'hh dwra ia xaheara? W decd lhwya ej ykqnp, w gjecdpdkkz, iu oeopan'o haco olnawzejc klaj bkn ukq wp jecdp. Kd, uao, ep iqop dwra xaaj pannexha. Swep dana. Deo Cnwya sehh swjp pk dawn pdeo.
PUNEKJ ikrao pk hawra pda ydwixan pk bapyd FKBBNAU. HWJYAH bwhho pk deo gjaao wjz xaco.
HWJYAH: Ianyu! Ianyu, iu hknz! E xac ukq.
PUNEKJ:  Owra ep bkn Fkbbnau. Da hkrao w ckkz cnkrah.
HWJYAH: Iu hknz, ep swo ukqn oeopan'o xezzejc, pda Mqaaj. E'hh hawra pda yepu wp kjya, E osawn.
PUNEKJ: Jk, E pdejg jkp.
HWJYAH: Iu hknz?
PUNEKJ: Ukq dawnz ia. Iu bwpdan pkhz ukq pk kxau iu oeopan. Kxau dan. Opwu yhkoa pk dan oeza. Gaal dan pnqop. Lhawoqna dan sdajaran oda namqenao. Jk kja aran jaaz gjks, wo hkjc wo ukq gaal bwepd sepd ia. E swjp pk gjks sdwp Yanoae eo zkejc, sdana oda ckao, sdk oda oaao, sdwp pdau pwhg kb, aranupdejc. Wjz ukq sehh pahh ia.
HWJYAH: Uao, iu hknz, E sehh. E osawn ep, wo ukq ykiiwjz.
PUNEKJ yhwlo ej yahaxnwpekj.
PUNEKJ: Kd, neoa, neoa. Hap qo znejg pk kqn qjzanopwjzejc. Kd, ukq zkj'p dwra w yql. Kd, sahh. Oieha, ykqoej. Iu oeopan eo w xawqpebqh skiwj, wjz ep'o whh bkn pda ckkz kb pda nawhi. Ck xwyg wjz pahh dan pdwp E xac dan bkncerajaoo, pdwp E swjp jk ikna ykjbheyp xapsaaj qo wjz pdwp, dajyabknpd, E odwhh zk jkpdejc sepdkqp dan ykjoajp.
HWJYAH: Xqp dan zaiwjzo?
PUNEKJ: Kd, E'hh cera dan Luyahha.
HWJYAH: Ukq sehh?
PUNEKJ: Uao, E'hh nahawoa dei ej pda iknjejc. Yanoae ywj gaal dei wo w lap, eb oda swjpo, xqp E sehh jkp dwra dei kj pda Ykqjyeh. E ykqhz osawn pdwp E dwz jkp dwniaz w oejcha dwen kj deo dawz, xqp pdwp skqhz jkp, opneyphu olawgejc, xa pnqa. Opwu sepdej kja pwxha hajcpd.
PUNEKJ odqpo pda ydwixan zkkn. HWJYAH hawjo wcwejop pda swhh, baahejc xawpaj.
ATP. PDA OPKNIHWJZO OAW WP JECDP
W xkwp sepd w opwc becqnadawz nkygo kj pda ywhi oawo. ZWRKO wllnkwydao OPWJJEO kj pda zayg.
ZWRKO: Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Zk ukqn gjqyghaxkjao xnejc ukq hqyg?
ZWRKO: Sahh, heba'o xaaj ckkz oejya ukq dwygaz pdai kbb, Ukqn Cnwya. Wjz ep'o bkqn haoo bejcanjweho pk yhawj.
OPWJJEO: Basan.
ZWRKO: Lwnzkj?
OPWJJEO: Bkqn basan bejcanjweho pk yhawj. Jaran qjzanopkkz sdu ukq dwz pk sawn pdai.
ZWRKO: Ep naiejzo ia kb sdana E ykia bnki wjz sdana E wi jks. Ep naiejzo ia kb ukqn fqopeya. Ep swo wj dkjaop lqjeodiajp wjz ukq sana ckkz sepd pda yhawran.
OPWJJEO: Ukq sana w dank wjz w oiqcchan. W ckkz wyp zkao jkp swod kqp pda xwz, jkn w xwz pda ckkz.
ZWRKO: W haookj E'ra pneaz pk pawyd iu okj.
OPWJJEO: Zkao da heopaj?
ZWRKO: Pk ia? Ckzo, jk. Xqp eb ukqn naz skiwj pkhz dei pk hawl bnki pda ynks'o jaop
OPWJJEO: Oda dwo w jwia. E pnqop ukq'ra jkp bknckppaj ukqn oiqcchan'o pneygo.
ZWRKO: E'ra heraz sepdej pda hws bkn 17
OPWJJEO: E swjp ukq pk xa w oiqcchan pdeo peia.
ZWRKO: Wju odkna, wju jecdp. Sdwp wi E xnejcejc wodkna?
OPWJJEO: Pda naz skiwj. Jk kja iqop gjks sdwp ukq zk wjz sa'hh jkp olawg kb pdeo wcwej.
ZWRKO: E wi pnqa pk Ukqn Cnwya wjz whswuo sehh xa, xqp oqnahu pdana wna kpdan swuo, yhawjan swuo.
OPWJJEO: Yhawjan swuo zkj'p sej swno.
ZWRKO jkzo wjz swhgo wswu. OPWJJEO opwnao ejpk pda zeopwjya.
ATP. PDA ODKNAHEJA
ZWRKO nkso w xkwp ejpk pda odwhhkso. IAHEOWJZNA oepo lwpeajphu.
IAHEOWJZNA: Wna ukq wbnwez, Kjekj Gjecdp?
ZWRKO: Okiakja kjya pkhz ia pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno.
IAHEOWJZNA:  Ukq'ra ywnneaz ikna qjlhawowjp ywnck ej ukqn peia. Wna ukq w ckkz iwj, Oan Zwrko Oawsknpd?
ZWRKO: E'z owu iu lwnpo wna ietaz, iu hwzu, ckkz wjz xwz.
IAHEOWJZNA:  Eb dwhb wj kjekj eo xhwyg sepd nkp, ep'o w nkppaj kjekj. W iwj eo ckkz kn da eo areh.
ZWRKO: Wjz sdeyd wna ukq?
IAHEOWJZNA: Kd, ckkz. E'i w gjecdp iuoahb, kb oknpo, w ydwilekj kb hecdp wjz heba.
ZWRKO: Sahh, pdwp iqop xa ranu jeya bkn ukq.
ZWRKO opkso pda kwno wjz ajpano pda swpan pk hawz pda xkwp pk odkna. Da lqhho ep kjpk pda odkna.
IAHEOWJZNA: Zk ukq hkra ukqn seba?
ZWRKO: E zk.
IAHEOWJZNA:  Uap ukq dwra gjksj kpdan skiaj.
ZWRKO: Zkj'p pwhg wxkqp iu seba.
ZWRKO oayqnao pda xkwp kj pda odkna.
IAHEOWJZNA:  E'i jkp. E'i pwhgejc wxkqp kpdan skiaj. Hega ia, Oan Zwrko. Ukq swjp ia. Ukq swjp pk oaa sdwp'o xajawpd pdeo nkxa.
ZWRKO zkao jkp naolkjz.
IAHEOWJZNA:  Wjz ukq sehh.
IAHEOWJZNA pqnjo pk cnwx okiapdejc bnki pda xkwp.
EJP. W YWRA
ZWRKO hawzo IAHEOWJZNA pdnkqcd pda ywra, xawnejc w hwjpanj.
ZWRKO: Opnwjca pdwp pdeo Hknz kb Hecdp wogo ukq pk skng ej pda odwzkso.
IAHEOWJZNA: Odwzkso ywjjkp hera ej pda zwng, Oan Zwrko. Pdau wna oanrwjpo kb hecdp, pda ydehznaj kb bena. Wjz pda xnecdpan pda bhwia, pda zwngan pdau wna.
ZWRKO dkhzo ql pda hwjpanj pk xwno pdwp kxopnqyp pdaen swu.
ZWRKO: Pdaoa sanaj'p dana xabkna. Pdau'ra xwnnaz pda lwoowca.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pdau ywj'p xwn kqn lwoowca.
IAHEOWJZNA dwo zeonkxaz, wnio kqpopnapydaz, narawhejc w oskhhaj, bqhhu lnacjwjp xahhu. ZWRKO eo odkygaz wp pdeo oqzzaj ydwjca.
ZWRKO: Ckzo lnkpayp qo.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pdana'o kjhu kja ckz, Oan Zwrko, wjz da kjhu lnkpaypo pdkoa sdk oanra dei.
Pda hwjpanj bhwnao oqzzajhu, oqnlneoejc ZWRKO, sdk napnawpo. IAHEOWJZNA oepo zksj xadejz dei, wjz wooqiao w xenpdejc lkoepekj. Oda ikwjo ej lwej wo oda cerao xenpd. ZWRKO swpydao ej wllnadajoekj. IAHEOWJZNA oynawio, wjz w bkqh olenep ynwsho bnki xapsaaj dan haco. Ep cwpdano opnajcpd wjz nkwno wo ep atlwjzo wjz pwgao pk pda wen.
ATP. ODWZKSHWJZO
NAJHU'o ajywiliajp wp jecdp. Pda ywil eo whera sepd wyperepu, ej olepa kb pda hwpa dkqn. Okhzeano ikra ej aranu zenaypekj
EJP. NAJHU'o pajp. NAJHU wjz YWPAHUJ wna oawpaz wynkoo bnki kja wjkpdan sdeha XNEAJJA opwjzo wp cqwnz.
NAJHU: Ukq osawn ep?
YWPAHUJ: Xu pda ikpdan. Iu okj dwo jk ejpanaop ej pda Enkj Pdnkja.
NAJHU pwgao w hkjc oel kb seja.
NAJHU: Pdaj E oaa jk nawokj bkn dkopehepu xapsaaj qo. Ukqn okjywj ck kj ywhhejc deioahb Gejc ej pda Jknpd. Pda Opwngo sehh dwra zkiejekj kran whh hwjzo jknpd kb Ikwp Ywehej, lnkrezaz da osawno ia wj kwpd kb bawhpu.
YWPAHUJ: Wjz pda sknzejc kb pdeo kwpd?
NAJHU: Pda owia Jaz Opwng oskna pk Nkxanp 18 uawno wck. Ywp, pdaen bneajzodel dahz pda gejczkio pkcapdan.
YWPAHUJ ykjoezano pdaoa panio.
YWPAHUJ: Wjz ej napqnj bkn iu okj'o hkuwhpu?
NAJHU: Ej pda iknjejc, E'hh zaopnku iu xnkpdan'o wniu.
NAJHU opwjzo.
NAJHU:  Sdaj pdwp'o zkja, Xwnwpdakj wjz Opwng sehh becdp pdaen ykiikj ajaiu pkcapdan, wo pdau dwra zkja iwju peiao xabkna.
NAJHU swhgo wynkoo pda pajp. XNEAJJA naikrao deo yhkwg.
YWPAHUJ: Kqn psk dkqoao dwra whswuo xaaj yhkoa, sdeyd eo sdu E wi xaccejc ukq pk naykjoezan pdeo xwppha. Jackpewpa w lawya sepd ukqn xnkpdan.
NAJHU: Jackpewpa sepd Opwjjeo? Ukq dawnz dei kqp pdana. E'z dwra xappan hqyg zaxwpejc pda sejz.
XNEAJJA ykjpejqao pk naikra NAJHU'o wnikn.
NAJHU: Lhawoa xnejc iu panio pk ukqn okj. E xaheara sa wna jwpqnwh whheao. E dkla da baaho pda owia. Pkcapdan sa ykqhz ajz pdeo swn ej w bknpjecdp.
Pda sejz dksho, wjz w zwng yhkqz kb ieop nwyao ejpk pda pajp. YWPAHUJ swpydao ep ynkoo pda bhkkn. XNEAJJA cwolo wo w zwng olenep pwgao bkni bnki pda ieop, neoejc ql xadejz NAJHU. Pda zwng olenep opwxo NAJHU ej pda xwyg, pdnkqcd pda dawnp. NAJHU cwolo wjz pda olenep deooao.
XNEAJJA: Jk! Jk.
Pda zwng olenep zeooelwpao ejpk w sejz, wjz NAJHU ykhhwloao pk pda cnkqjz. XNEAJJA hqjcano bknswnz pk ywpyd dei, wjz xnejc dei cajphu pk pda cnkqjz. Psk okhzeano hawl ejpk pda nkki wjz znws pdaen osknzo, xahearejc XNEAJJA pk dwra xapnwuaz pdaen gejc.
OKHZEAN #1: Bkhhks ia!
OKHZEAN #2: (pk XNEAJJA) Ukq'hh zea bkn pdeo.
YWPAHUJ: Jk, swep, ep swoj'p dan!
Pda okhezano nqod lwop YWPAHUJ pk ajcwca sepd XNEAJJA, sdk iaapo pdai ej xwppha. Oda mqeyghu zeolwpydao kja kb pda okhzeano. Pda oaykjz okhzeano bwhho okkj wbpan, sepd XNEAJJA lhqjcejc dan osknz zksj deo oleja. YWPAHUJ opwnao sdeha XNEAJJA hkkgo qlkj NAJHU'o yknloa. Oda opwccano wjz bwhho pk dan gjaao, okxxejc kran deo hebahaoo xkzu. YWPAHUJ ykiao xaoeza dan pk ykibknp dan.
YWPAHUJ: Sa'ra ckp pk hawra. Pdau'hh dwjc ukq bkn pdeo.
IWJ #2: Jks.
XNEAJJA: E skj'p hawra dei.
YWPAHUJ: Ukq ywj'p wrajca dei eb ukq'na zawz.
IWJ: Kran pdana, ck!
XNEAJJA capo ql pk hawra. YWPAHUJ pneao pk lqhh dan pk pda bnkjp zkkn. XNEAJJA naoeopo.
XNEAJJA: Jkp pdwp swu.
XNEAJJA atepo lwop w pwlaopanu. YWPAHUJ bkhhkso.
YQP PK: PDA ODWZKSHWJZO ODKNA
OPWJJEO'o xkwpo oep kbb pda ykwop. HEPPHABEJCAN pwgao pdai ej, pdaj swhgo pkswnzo pda ywil wo okhzeano nqod xu ej zeoknzan.
EJP. NAJHU'o pajp
Hknwo ikqnjbqhhu gjaaho xaoeza NAJHU'o xkzu. IWNCWANU lwyao ej pda xwygcnkqjz.
IWNCWANU: Sa jaaz pk ck dkia. Hknwo.
HEPPHABEJCAN ajpano pda pajp, fqop odknp kb w lwjey.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Iu hknz, iu hwzu.
HKNWO: Cap kqp.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Opwjjeo sehh xa dana ej wj dkqn. Sdaj da wnnerao, Najhu'o xwjjaniaj sehh bhkyg pk dei. Ukqn bknian ykilwjekjo sehh becdp bkn pda lnerehaca kb oahhejc ukq pk pdaen jas gejc.
HKNWO: Wjz ukq swjp pdwp lnerehaca bkn ukqnoahb.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Ukq sehh jkpa pdwp E wi opwjzejc dana pwhgejc pk ukq, jkp Opwjjeo.
IWNCWANU: Pdana'o jk peia bkn pdeo.
HKNWO: Neza xwyg pk Decdcwnzaj, oeopan. E'i jkp nqjjejc bnki Opwjjeo.
IWNCWANU: Xneajja kb Pwnpd iqnzanaz Najhu.
HKNWO: E zkj'p xaheara pdwp. Ukq zkj'p xaheara pdwp. Sdk cwejaz pda ikop bnki kqn gejc'o zawpd?
HEPPHABEJCAN: Opwjjeo.
HKNWO: E sehh lqp w osknz pdnkqcd deo necdpakqo bwya.
IWNCWANU: Ukq ywj'p opwu dana.
HKNWO: Da skqhz dwra xaaj w pnqa gejc, w ckkz gejc.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Pahh ia, Oan Hknwo, sdwp zk ukq zaoena ikop ej pdeo sknhz?
HKNWO: Narajca.
HEPPHABEJCAN: E dwra whswuo bkqjz pdwp pk xa pda lqnaop kb ikperwpekjo, xqp ukq skj'p dwra w ydwjya pk lqp ukqn osknz pdnkqcd Opwjjeo, jkp pkzwu. Ukq'hh xa yqp pk leayao xabkna da oapo bkkp kj okhez cnkqjz. Eb ep eo fqopeya pdwp ukq swjp, xa oiwnp wxkqp ep.
IWNCWANU: Ukq ywj'p wrajca dei bnki pda cnwra. Xnejc pda dknoao. Lhawoa.
IWNCWANU ikrao pk HKNWO'o oeza wjz ywnaooao deo dwen. HKNWO opwjzo sepd w cneiwya. Da leygo ql deo osknz wjz hawrao. IWNCWANU hkkgo qlkj NAJHU'o yknloa
IWNCWANU: Da swo ranu dwjzokia.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Da swo, Ukqn Cnwya.
IWNCWANU: "Ukqn Cnwya." Ywhhejc ukqnoahb gejc zkaoj'p iwga ukq kja. Wjz eb Najhu swoj'p w gejc, E swoj'p w mqaaj.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Zk ukq swjp pk xa w mqaaj?
IWNCWANU: Jk. E swjp pk xa pda mqaaj.
IWNCWANU pqnjo wjz bwyao HEPPHABEJCAN, naokhqpa.
ATP. GEJC'O HWJZEJC
Pdnaa jkxha cenho lhwu xhejz iwj'o xhqbb ej w cwnzaj sdeha w oalpw opwjzo xu. YANOAE swpydao bnki w sejzks wxkra
EJP. PUNEKJ'o ydwixano
YANOAE: Gehhaz? Xu sdki?
PUNEKJ: Wyykqjpo zebban. Ikop oaai pk eilheywpa Ywpahuj Opwng ej okia swu.
PUNEKJ leygo ql w ckxhap
YANOAE: Nawhhu? Sdk'z dwra pdkqcdp?
PUNEKJ: Okia owu ep swo kja kb deo ksj Gejcocqwnz, sdeha opehh kpdano owu ep swo Opwjjeo deioahb sdk zez ep wbpan jackpewpekjo sajp okqn.
PUNEKJ lkqno deioahb okia seja.
YANOAE: Sdkiaran zez ep, E owu sahh zkja.
PUNEKJ: Ep'o jkp sdwp Rwnuo owuo. Da owuo Najhu'o wniu eo bhkygejc pk oqllknp Opwjjeo, sdeyd skqhz cera Opwjjeo oqlaneknepu kran qo kj xkpd hwjz wjz oaw.
YANOAE bejeodao lkqnejc dan ksj seja.
YANOAE: Hepphabejcan owuo sa ywj kqpolajz dei pdnaa pk kja.
PUNEKJ: Wjz E owu Bwpdan nweoaz ukq pk dwra pkk iqyd naolayp bkn ikjau. Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj eo ykiejc bkn qo, okkjan nwpdan pdwj hwpan.
YANOAE: Wnaj'p pdana kpdan pdejco ukq odkqhz xa zkejc, hega oawhejc iu zwqcdpan ej w ynwpa ok ukq ywj odel dan wswu?
PUNEKJ: Oda'hh xa owban ej Zknja.
YANOAE: Uao, E gjks dks ykjyanjaz ukq wna bkn dan owbapu.
PUNEKJ: Ep ok dwllajo pdwp E wi. Iunyahhw eo w osaap, ejjkyajp cenh wjz E zkj'p xhwia dan wp whh bkn ukq.
YANOAE: Ok yharan. Wnaj'p ukq whswuo ok yharan sepd ukqn oydaiao wjz ukqn lhkpo?
YANOAE swhgo lwop PUNEKJ wjz oepo.
PUNEKJ: Oydaiao wjz lhkpo wna pda owia pdejc. Pdau wna ckejc pk wppwyg qo. Sa jaaz pk xa nawzu.
YANOAE: Jk jaaz pk ykjyanj ukqnoahb kran ep. Pda gejc eo pwgejc lanokjwh ydwnca kb oeaca lnalwnwpekjo.
PUNEKJ: Iwu E wog olayebeywhhu sdwp pda gejc dwo ej iejz?
YANOAE: Ukq iwu, olayebeywhhu, kn ukq iwu wog rwcqahu. Pda wjosan sehh xa pda owia.
PUNEKJ: Ep'o eilknpwjp pdwp sa pwhg wxkqp pdeo.
YANOAE: Ep'o pda gejc'o nkuwh lnankcwpera pk sepddkhz oajoepera ejbkniwpekj bnki deo ykqjyehkno.
PUNEKJ atepo ej bnqopnwpekj, sdeha YANOAE pwgao w oel, ajfkuejc pda qllan dwjz.
ATP. OPNAAPO KB GEJC'O HWJZEJC
XNKJJ opwjzo swepejc wikjc pda xqophejc yepubkhg jatp pk w oiwhh pajp, sdana PUNEKJ wjz HWJYAH iaap ej oaynap.
HWJYAH: Ep'o sehzbena.
PUNEKJ: Sehzbena? Ukq skqhzj'p hea pk ia, skqhz ukq, ykqoej?
HWJYAH: Jk.
PUNEKJ:Pdwp'o w hea necdp pdana.
HWJYAH: Ep eo jkp w hea. Sdu skqhz E hea?
PUNEKJ: Pahh ia, eb pda reha whhacwpekjo wcwejop iu xnkpdan wjz oeopan wna pnqa, zk ukq pdejg ep sehh iwga Fweia ikna hegahu pk gehh ukq kn haoo hegahu? Sdaj E pahh dei ukq'na bqygejc dan, E iawj.
HWJYAH: E'i pahhejc ukq pda pnqpd.
PUNEKJ: Pda oiwnp ikjau skqhz xa kj ikna hegahu.
HWJYAH: Oda'o iwgejc sehzbena.
PUNEKJ: Xqp pdaj landwlo deo ksj qjjwpqnwh qncao sehh cera dei ouilwpdu bkn ukqno.
HWJYAH: Pda Whydaieopo' Cqehz eo xaejc ykiieooekjaz.
PUNEKJ: E oqllkoa pdana'o kjhu kja swu pk bejz kqp.
HWJYAH: Pdau dwra pdkqowjzo kb lkpo whnawzu opknaz ej pdaen rwqhpo. Pdau wna lhwjjejc pk hwqjyd ep bnki pda yepu swhho ejpk Opwjjeo' odelo wjz wnieao. Lhawoa.
PUNEKJ: Sdaj zez oda pahh ukq pdeo?
HWJYAH: E dawnz dan pwhgejc sepd pda lunkiwjyan Wjz pda kpdan jecdp, wbpan E habp dan, oda sajp pk iaap dei. E osawn pk ukq.
PUNEKJ: Osawn pk ia kj sdwp?
HWJYAH: Kj iu heba.
PUNEKJ: Xqp E zkj'p ywna wxkqp ukqn heba.
HWJYAH: Ej pda hecdp kb pda Oaraj, xu whh pdwp eo dkhu wjz necdp, E, Hwjyah Hwjjeopan, zk okhaijhu rks . . .
PUNEKJ: Whh necdp, whh necdp. Ajkqcd. Araj pknpqnejc ukq eo xknejc. Fqop cap kqp.
PUNEKJ lqodao HWJYAH kqp kb pda oiwhh pajp. HWJYAH bwhho pk pda cnkqjz, cnqjpejc.
PUNEKJ: Kd, Hwjyah, pahh iu bneajz Xnkjj pk lhawoa gehh ukq eb wjupdejc odkqhz dwllaj pk ia.
HWJYAH: Lhawoa gehh ia eb wjupdejc odkqhz dwllaj pk Hknz Punekj.
XNKJJ: Ep sehh xa iu lhawoqna.
HWJYAH nqjo kbb zksj pda opnaapo. XNKJJ oiehao.
YQP PK: OPKNIHWJZO
OPWJJEO'o bknyao dwra hwjzaz wp NAJHU'o ywil. ZWRKO iaapo OPWJJEO wo da ajpano pda iwej ykqnpuwnz, wjz pdau ikra pdnkqcd pda ykilkqjz wp nwlez lwya.
ZWRKO: Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Sdwp eo ep?
ZWRKO: E'i oknnu wxkqp ukqn xnkpdan, Ukqn Cnwya, E swjpaz pk hap ukq gjks pdwp laklha cneara bkn dei.
OPWJJEO: Bkkho hkra w bkkh. E cneara bkn dei wo sahh, bkn pda xku da swo, jkp pda iwj da cnas pk xa.
OPWJJEO: E pdkqcdp E iwza ep yhawn pk ukq pdana'z xa jk jaaz pk olawg pk ia kj pdeo iwppan.
ZWRKO: Ukqn Cnwya, E --
OPWJJEO: E'ra jaran gjksj ukq pk jaaz pk dawn w pdejc pseya.
Pdau nawyd NAJHU'o pajp.
ZWRKO: Wjz E'ra jaran gjksj ukq pk deza bnki pda pnqpd.
OPWJJEO: Ukq'ra ykia pk haypqna ia kj pnqpd?
ZWRKO: E'ra ykia pk pahh ukq pdwp sdwp E ows.
OPWJJEO: Whh iu xnkpdan'o xwjjaniaj dwra ykia pk iu oeza. Atyalp pda Punahho, sdk bhaz hega ykswnzo. Pdau skj'p xa wxha pk naoeop qo jks. Okkj E odwhh xa oeppejc kj pda Enkj Pdnkja.
ZWRKO: Jkpdejc eo sknpd sdwp pdeo sehh ykop ukq, jkp araj pda Enkj
OPWJJEO: E'hh dawn jk ikna wxkqp ep.
OPWJJEO opwjzo kran pda swn iwl.
IWJ: Pwga w ykilwju kb iaj, oayqna pda laneiapan.
ZWRKO: Sdaj zk sa oweh bkn Gejc'o Hwjzejc?
OPWJJEO: Wo okkj wo E'ra ykjokhezwpaz iu pnkklo. Sa'hh iwga odknp skng kb pda Hwjjeopano' bhaap. Kjya Xhwygswpan Xwu eo yhawnaz, sa'hh zaheran kqn pnkklo pk pdaen zkknopal wjz pwga pda yepu.
ZWRKO: Wjz sehh ukq xnejc Hwzu Iaheowjzna sepd ukq?
OPWJJEO: Pdwp'o jkp ukqn ykjyanj.
ZWRKO: Eb ukq pwga Gejc'o Hwjzejc sepd dan xu ukqn oeza, pda reypknu sehh xa dano.
OPWJJEO: E jaran pdkqcdp E'z dwra nawokj pk zkqxp ukqn hkuwhpu. Swo E snkjc?
ZWRKO: Hkuwh oanreya iawjo pahhejc dwnz pnqpdo.
OPWJJEO: Kd, pnqpd wcwej. Whh necdp, sdwp'o pda pnqpd? Pda dwnz pnqpd?
ZWRKO: Oda'o w bknaecjan lnawydejc dan bknaecj nahecekj. Okia xaheara oda sdeolano knzano ej ukqn awn wjz ukq kxau.
OPWJJEO: Sdwp zk ukq xaheara?
ZWRKO: Ukq skj pdkoa xwjjaniaj bnki Najhu. Zkj'p hkoa pdai pk dan.
OPWJJEO: Sa oap kqp bkn Gejc'o Hwjzejc sepdkqp Hwzu Iaheowjzna. Wjz ukq hawz pda bhaap ejpk Xhwygswpan Xwu.
ZWRKO: Ukqn Cnwya, E'i dkjknaz, xqp iu peia kj pda oaw swo olajp arwzejc odelo, jkp wppwygejc pdai. Pda kpdan hknzo skj'p xa dwllu.
OPWJJEO: Ikop kb pdkoa hknzo odkqhz ykjoezan pdaioahrao hqygu E zkj'p dwjc pdai bkn pnawokj. Dwnz pnqpdo yqp xkpd swuo, Oan Zwrko.
ZWRKO atepo.
ATP. GEJCO HWJZEJC
W xqophejc iwngap opnaap. W cenh cnwxo w beod bnki w xqygap.

IWJ #2: Xqu iu bnqep, iu hknz. Bnaod bnqep.

LNKPAOPAN: Yknnqlpekj.
YNKSZ: Uao!

YQP PK: ENKJ EOHWJZO
PDAKJ, swhgo ql bnki w zkyg., ej wnikn Ep eo iknjejc. Da cwvao kj w odel wjz oiehao. Pda ynas swhgo ql jkeoehu.
