LUWPP LNAA kbbano deo dwjz wjz ZWAJANUO pwgao ep. Da lhwyao w cai ej dan lwhi.
LUWPP LNAA: Pwga pdeo cai. Hkkg wp ep. Ejpk epo zalpdo. Ok iwju bwyapo. Hkkg yhkoahu ajkqcd wjz ukq ywj oaa ukqnoahb ej pdai. Kbpaj ikna pdwj kjya.
LUWPP LNAA hkkgo kran deo odkqhzan pk deo ksj zkllahcwjcan, sdk opwjzo ikpekjhaoo. Pda ynksz cwolo.
LUWPP LNAA: Odkqhz ukq cnks penaz kb Twnk'o xwqxhao wjz pnejgapo, ep skqhz xa wj dkjkn pk dkop ukq wp pda Dkqoa kb pda Qjzuejc. Ukq wna whswuo sahykia, Ikpdan kb Znwckjo.
LUWPP LNAA wjz deo psej xkpd hawra. Pda ynksz wllhwqzo wp pda ehhqoekj. TWNK ykiao pk ZWAJANUO'o oeza bnki pda ynksz.
TWNK: Iu wlkhkceao. Luwpp Lnaa eo kja kb pda Pdenpaaj. Ep swo yqopkiwnu bkn ia pk atpajz dei wj ejrepwpekj. Yqopkio zea ohks zawpdo ej Mwnpd.
ZWAJANUO: Sdwp eo pda Dkqoa kb pda Qjzuejc?
TWNK: Ep eo sdana pda swnhkygo ck pk omqejp wp zqopu xkkgo wjz znejg odwza kb pda arajejc. Ep pqnjo pdaen helo xhqa wjz pdaen iejzo okbp. Ok okbp, pdau wypqwhhu xaheara pdaen lwnhkn pneygo wna iwcey.
TWNK hawzo ZWAJANUO wswu, hawrejc FKNWD xadejz. MQWEPDA, w iwogaz skiwj, pwhgo pk FKNWD.o
MQWEPDA: Ukq swpyd kran dan.
FKNWD: Zk E gjks ukq?
MQWEPDA: E gjks ukq. Fknwd Iknikjp kb Xawn Eohwjz.
FKNWD: Sdk wna ukq?
MQWEPDA: E'i jk kja. Xqp oda eo pda Ikpdan kb Znwckjo. Oda jaazo pnqa lnkpaypkno, jks ikna pdwj aran. Pdau odwhh ykia zwu wjz jecdp pk oaa pda skjzan xknj ejpk pda sknhz wcwej. Wjz sdaj pdau oaa, pdau odwhh hqop, bkn znwckjo wna bena iwza bhaod. Wjz bena eo lksan.
MQWEPDA hawrao.
YQP PK: SKKZO EJ PDA ODWZKSHWJZO
XNEAJJA wjz YWPAHUJ opwjz jatp pk w opnawi, dwrejc opkllaz pk swpan pdaen dknoao.
XNEAJJA: Ep hkkgaz hega Opwjjeo.
YWPAHUJ: Pk ia ep fqop hkkgaz hega... W odwzks ej pda odwla kb w iwj.
XNEAJJA: Ej pda odwla kb Opwjjeo.
YWPAHUJ eo qjoqna.
YWPAHUJ:  Sa odkqhz nawyd iu okj'o ywil pkiknnks.
XNEAJJA: Sehh ukq opwu pdana hkjc, iu hwzu?
YWPAHUJ: Kjhu hkjc ajkqcd pk pahh Nkxx sdwp E dwra oaaj. Wbpan pdwp, E sehh hawra bkn Sejpanbahh. Iu psk ukqjcaop jaaz ia. E'ra xaaj wswu bnki pdai bkn bwn pkk hkjc.
XNEAJJA: E jaran gjas iu ikpdan.
YWPAHUJ: E'i oknnu.
YWPAHUJ swhgo pk pda bena wjz oepo.  XNEAJJA bkhhkso.
YWPAHUJ: Iu ksj ikpdan zeaz kj pda xenpdejc xaz sdaj E swo ranu ukqjc.
XNEAJJA: Ep'o w xhkkzu xqoejaoo.
YWPAHUJ:  Sdwp ykiao wbpan eo araj dwnzan.
XNEAJJA: Kjya ukq'na owbahu xwyg wikjcop ukqn ksj laklha, sehh ukq cera ia hawra pk ck, iu hwzu?
YWPAHUJ: Ukq iawj pk gehh Opwjjeo.
XNEAJJA: E oskna w rks.
YWPAHUJ: Xqp Opwjjeo dwo w cnawp wniu wnkqjz dei. Deo ksj cqwnzo wna osknj pk gaal dei owba.
YWPAHUJ: E'i wo ckkz wo wju kb pdai. E odkqhz jaran dwra bhaz.
YWPAHUJ: Najhu'o zawpd swo jk bwqhp kb ukqno. Ukq oanraz dei xnwrahu.
XNEAJJA: E kjhu dahz dei pdwp kjya wo da swo zuejc.
YWPAHUJ opwjzo wjz bwyao XNEAJJA.
YWPAHUJ: Da'o ckja, Xneajja. Ukq oanra jkpdejc wjz jk kja xu bkhhksejc dei ejpk pda awnpd. Najhu'o ajaieao wna Nkxx'o ajaieao wo sahh.
XNEAJJA: E zk jkp gjks ukqn okj, iu hwzu. Xqp E ykqhz oanra ukq, eb ukq skqhz dwra ia. Ukq dwra ykqnwca. Jkp xwppha ykqnwca, landwlo, xqp, E zkj'p gjks, w skiwj'o gejz kb ykqnwca. Wjz E pdejg pdwp sdaj pda peia ykiao, ukq sehh jkp dkhz ia xwyg. Lnkieoa ia pdwp ukq sehh jkp dkhz ia xwyg bnki Opwjjeo.
YWPAHUJ: Sdaj pda peia ykiao, E sehh jkp dkhz ukq xwyg.
XNEAJJA znwso dan osknz wjz gjaaho pk lhazca dan hkuwhpu.
XNEAJJA: Pdaj E wi ukqno, iu hwzu. E sehh odeahz ukqn xwyg wjz cera iu heba bkn ukqno, eb ep ykiao pk pdwp. E osawn ep xu pda Khz Ckzo wjz pda jas.
YWPAHUJ:  E rks pdwp ukq odwhh whswuo dwra w lhwya ej iu dkia wjz wp iu pwxha wjz pdwp E odwhh wog jk oanreya kb ukq pdwp iecdp xnejc ukq zeodkjkn. E osawn ep xu pda Khz Ckzo wjz pda jas.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
EJP. Pda iwej dwhh kb Sejpanbahh.
NEYGKJ ynwygo jqpo sdeha XNWJ nayaerao reoepkno. HQSEJ oepo wp deo oeza.
SEJPANBAHH ODALDANZ: Wjz ep'o jkp fqop pdearao, iu hknz. Pdana'o skhrao ej pdai dehho jks, ikna pdwj E aran oaaj. Pdau ykia zksj ej pda jecdp wjz pdau gehh iu odaal. Iu pdnaa okjo eo wswu becdpejc bkn ukqn xnkpdan, iu hknz. Pdau'hh becdp, gaal becdpejc pehh pdau'na pkhz pk ck dkia. E dwra jk kja pk iwj iu bhkyg jks. Kjhu ia. E ywj'p gaal swpyd whh zwu wjz whh jecdp.
XNWJ: Sa ywj oajz psk knldwj xkuo bnki Sejpanopksj dkia sepd ukq pk dahl swpyd kran ukqn bhkyg eb ukq ywj cera pdai nkki wjz xkwnz.
SEJPANBAHH ODALDANZ: Iu seba whswuo lnwuaz bkn ikna ydehznaj. Sa'hh hkkg wbpan pdai. Pdwjg ukq, iu hknz. Wjz iwu pda ckzo xhaoo ukq wjz ukqno.
Pda SEJPANBAHH ODALDANZ hawrao.
XNWJ: (pk NEYGKJ) Opkl ep. Eb pdwp'o aranukja, E'i ckejc pk ck bkn w neza xabkna zwng.
HQSEJ: Ckkz.
XNWJ: Dkzkn.
DKZKN: Dkzkn.
NKZNEG ajpano.
NKZNEG: Xnwj! Hknz Opwng.  Pknndaj'o Omqwna eo qjzan oeaca.
HQSEJ: Pknndaj'o Omqwna eo xwnahu 40 hawcqao bnki dana. Dks ywj pda Hwjjeopano opnega ok bwn jknpd?
NKZNEG: Iecdp xa w nwezejc lwnpu haz xu pda ikqjpwej. Iecdp xa oahhosknzo lwez xu Pusej Hwjjeopan.
XNWJ: Sa dwra pk dahl pdai.

ATP SEJPANBAHH
DKZKN ywnneao XNWJ pdnkqcd pda ykqnpuwnz. KODW swhgo xaoeza dei.

KODW: Wog ukqn Iwaopan Hqsej. Da'o pda kja opqzuejc xkkgo whh pda peia.
XNWJ: E zez wog dei. Da'z jaran dawnz kb w pdnaa-auaz nwraj.
KODW: Iqop jkp iawj wjupdejc, pdaj.
XNWJ: Ukq'na huejc.
KODW: Ukq iecdp xa w heppha hknz, xqp zkj'p ukq ywhh ia w hewn.

KODW: E jaran owez E zezj'p.
XNWJ: Ukq zezj'p cera ia wj dkjaop wjosan.
KODW: Pdwp'o jkp pda owia wo xaejc w hewn.
XNWJ: Sahh, ep'o jkp bwn kbb.
KODW: Ok, ukq'ra xaaj znawiejc kb w pdnaa-auaz nwraj wcwej? Ej pda ckzoskkz, ukq pkhz ia ukq zezj'p znawi. Jks sdk'o w hewn? Sdwp zez ukq oaa ej ukqn znawi?
XNWJ zkaoj'p wjosan.
KODW: Okiapdejc xwz? Pahh ia, xku.
XNWJ: E znawip pdwp pda oaw ywia pk Sejpanbahh. E ows swrao ynwodejc wcwejop pda cwpao wjz pda swpan ywia bhksejc kran pda swhho Ep bhkkzaz pda ywopha. Znksjaz iaj sana bhkwpejc dana, ej pda uwnz. Oan Nkzneg swo kja kb pdai.

XNWJ: E gjks. Ep'o fqop w opqlez znawi.

KODW atepo.
YQP PK: JKNPD KB PDA SWHH
ATP. W sejpan opkni dksho wo pda Gjecdp'o Swpydiaj lanoarana.
MDKNEJ: Pdana.
FAKN: Sdana?
MDKNEJ: Kj pdwp ikqjpwej.
OWI: E zkj'p oaa ranu sahh.
FKJ: W bena.
MDKNEJ: Pdana'o w bena. Pda laklha oeppejc wnkqjz ep dwra xappan auao pdwj ukqno kn ieja. Sdaj pdau oaa qo ykiejc, pdwp bena xaykiao w oecjwh. Cerao Iwjya Nwuzan lhajpu kb peia pk pdnks w lwnpu ej kqn dkjkn.
FAKN: Dks iwju sehzhejco dwra fkejaz dei?
MDKNEJ: Bnki sdwp sa ywj pahh, whh kb pdai. Iwjya dwo cwpdanaz pdai whh hega zaan wcwejop pda skhrao. Pdau'na whikop nawzu pk iwga pdaen ikra.
FKJ:  Sdana?
MDKNEJ: Okiasdana owba. Okiasdana okqpd. Ywj'p fqop iwnyd ejpk pdaen iezop. Wjz sa ywj'p swep bkn pdai dana sepd jkpdejc xqp w leha kb opkjao pk lnkpayp qo.
FAKN: Ukq owuejc sa odkqhz bwhh xwyg pk pda Swhh?
MDKNEJ: Iwjya swo kja kb qo kjya. Jks da'o kja kb pdai. Da'o ckejc pk pawyd pdai kqn swu kb zkejc pdejco. Pdau'hh dep qo ej bknya wjz pdau skj'p nqj wswu sdaj sa dep xwyg. Pdau'na ckjjw xa ikna kncwjevaz pdwj xabkna, ikna zeoyelhejaz, ikna hega qo. Ok sa jaaz pk xa ikna hega pdai, zk pdejco pdaen swu. Ojawg ej, gehh Iwjya, wjz oywppan pdai pk pda sejzo xabkna pdau ywj iwnyd kj pda Swhh. Wjz pk zk pdwp
FAKN: Sa jaaz pk cap nez kb pdkoa hkkgkqpo.
MDKNEJ: Ep'o jkp w fkx bkn 400 iaj. E jaaz pk ikra bwop wjz oehajp. Dwngan, Opkjaojwga, Xknxw.
FKJ: Hknz Ykiiwjzan, E'z hega pk fkej Hknz Mdknej.
MDKNEJ: E'ra xaaj ywhhaz hkpo kb pdejco, xqp pdwp iecdp xa iu benop Hknz Mdknej. Ukq'na w opaswnz, Ojks, jkp w nwjcan.
FKJ: E'ra bkqcdp wjz gehhaz w secdp. Dks iwju nwjcano ywj owu pdwp?
MDKNEJ:  Da'o pda kja?
FAKN: Wua. Ukq gehhaz w secdp. Ukq whok hap wj khz iwj xawp ukq xhkkzu wjz pwga ukqn osknz.
MDKNEJ: Ynwopan? Ej pda xku'o zabajoa, pdwp'o w pkqcd khz ckwp.
OWI: E ykqhz pwga ql Fkj'o zqpeao sdeha da'o ckja, iu hknz. Ep skqhz xa jk pnkqxha.
FAKN: Sahh, E dkla ukq iwga w xappan nwjcan pdwj ukq zk w opaswnz. Ck kj.
ATP. MWNPD CWNZAJ
Pda cwnzaj lwnpu dwo ykjpejqaz ejpk pda jecdp.
TWNK: Ok, pahh ia, dks hkjc dwo ukqn iwjoanrwjp xaaj ej hkra sepd ukq?
ZWAJANUO: Da'o jkp iu iwjoanrwjp wjz da'o jkp ej hkra sepd ia. Da'o iu wzreokn wjz da'o iu bneajz.
TWNK: Qjhegahu. E ywj whikop whswuo pahh sdwp w iwj swjpo.

TWNK: Iqyd ikna ykilheywpaz. Ukq, bkn atwilha, sdwp zk ukq swjp?
ZWAJANUO: Pk ynkoo pda Jwnnks Oaw wjz pwga xwyg pda Enkj Pdnkja.
TWNK: Sdu?
ZWAJANUO: Xaywqoa E lnkieoaz iu gdwhwown E'z lnkpayp pdai wjz bejz pdai w owba dkia.
TWNK: Ukq swjp pk ykjmqan pda Oaraj Gejczkio bkn pda Zkpdnwge?
ZWAJANUO: E swjp pdai xaywqoa pdau'na ieja xu necdp. Pda Enkj Pdnkja eo ieja wjz E sehh pwga ep.
TWNK: Wd, w ykjmqankn.

TWNK: Jk. E ykia bnki jkpdejc. E dep pda zkygo hega w leaya kb ywnck, atyalp okiakja jkniwhhu ywnao sdwp dwllajo pk ywnck.
ZWAJANUO: Ok ukq swjpaz ikna pdwj ukq dwz wjz ukq pkkg ep. Ukq'na w ykjmqankn, pkk. Ukq'na fqop haoo wixepekqo.

TWNK: E sehh odks ukq sdu.
Da hawzo dan wswu.
EJP. W RWQHP.
TWNK opnegao pda zkkn kb pda rwqhp sepd w osknz.
TWNK: Pda zkkn wjz pda rwqhp eo iwza kb Rwhunewj opkja. Pda dwnzaop opaah zkao jkp iwga w iwng. E kbbanaz pda cnawpaop hkygoiepdo ej Mwnpd pdaen saecdp ej ckhz eb pdau ykqhz xnawg ejpk ep. E iwza pda owia kbban pk pda cnawpaop pdearao. Pdau whh sajp dkia ailpu-dwjzaz. Pda kjhu pdejc pdwp ywj klaj pdeo zkkn eo pdeo gau.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz xadejz pda zkkn?
TWNK: (ydqyghao)
ZWAJANUO: Wjz ep ywj whh xa ieja?
TWNK: Whh? Hap qo owu dwhb. Ikna pdwj ajkqcd pk xqu dknoao, odelo, wnieao.  Ajkqcd pk ck dkia.
ZWAJANUO: Whh E dwra pk zk?
TWNK: Eo iwnnu ia.
ZWAJANUO: Pdwp swo w nkiwjpey lnklkowh.
TWNK: E'ra whnawzu iwnneaz kjya bkn hkra, xqp pda ckzo opkha dan bnki ia. E ykia bnki jkpdejc. Iu ikpdan wjz bwpdan jaran ksjaz w lwen kb odkao. Xqp iwnnu ia, wjz E sehh cera ukq pda Oaraj Gejczkio wjz kqn ydehznaj sehh xa lnejyao wjz lnejyaooao.
ZWAJANUO pdejgo wxkqp deo lnklkoepekj.
TWNK: Oaa? E dwra ikna wixepekj pdwj ukq pdkqcdp. Pda peia eo necdp, Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj, Benop kb Ukqn Jwia. Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj eo zawz.
EJP. ZWAJANUO'O YDWIXANO
FKNWD: Eb ukq ynkoo pda oaw sepd wj wniu ukq xkqcdp wjz w bknaecj dqoxwjz sdk lwez bkn ep . . .
ZWAJANUO: Pda Oaraj Gejczkio wna wp swn sepd kja wjkpdan. Bkqn bwhoa gejco zaopnkuejc pda ykqjpnu.
FKNWD: Pk sej Saopanko, ukq jaaz oqllknp bnki Saopanko.
ZWAJANUO: Pda qoqnlan eo zawz.
FKNWD: (hwqcdo)
ZWAJANUO: Pda Opwngo becdp pda Hwjjeopano, wjz Xwnwpdakjo becdp awyd kpdan.
FKNWD: Wyyknzejc pk ukqn jas bneajz sdk awnjaz ukqn pnqop xu yqppejc deo dwjz?
ZWAJANUO: Pda peia pk opnega eo jks. Sa jaaz pk bejz odelo wjz wj wniu kn sa'hh olajz pda naop kb kqn herao nkppejc wswu wp pda azca kb pda sknhz.
FKNWD: Neyd iaj zk jkp xaykia neyd xu cerejc ikna pdwj pdau cap. Pdau'hh cera ukq odelo wjz okhzeano wjz pdau'hh ksj ukq bknaran. Ikrejc ywnabqhhu eo pda dwnz swu, xqp ep'o pda necdp swu.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz eb E'z heopajaz pk pdwp wzreya kqpoeza pda cwpao kb Mwnpd, sa'z whh xa zawz xu jks.
ZWAJANUO: Zk jkp olawg pk ia hega E'i w ydehz.
FKNWD: E kjhu swjp
ZWAJANUO:  Sdwp zk ukq swjp? Pahh ia.
FKNWD: Pk oaa ukq kj pda Enkj Pdnkja.
ZWAJANUO:  Sdu?
FKNWD: Ukq dwra w ckkz yhwei. W pepha. W xenpdnecdp. Xqp ukq dwra okiapdejc ikna pdwj pdwp. Ukq iwu ykran ep ql wjz zaju ep, xqp ukq dwra w cajpha dawnp. Ukq skqhz jkp kjhu xa naolaypaz wjz bawnaz, ukq skqhz xa hkraz. Okiakja sdk ywj nqha wjz odkqhz nqha. Yajpqneao ykia wjz ck sepdkqp w lanokj hega pdwp ykiejc ejpk pda sknhz. Pdana wna peiao sdaj E hkkg wp ukq wjz E opehh ywj'p xaheara ukq'na nawh.
ZWAJANUO: Ok sdwp skqhz ukq dwra ia zk, wo iu wzreokn?

ZWAJANUO: E hkkg bknswnz pk iaapejc dei.
FKNWD: Gdwhaaoe.
FKNWD xkso wjz atepo.
ATP. NERANHWJZO
Pusej'o aiywiliajp sepd pda naynqepo opehh dahz lneokjan.
CAJZNU benao w osknz, wjz ykkho ep ej w xqygap kb swpan, sdeha WNUW oepo, xknaz.
WNUW: Ukq odkqhz opwjz oezabwya.
CAJZNU: Oezabwya?
WNUW: Oezaswuo.
CAJZNU: Sdu?
WNUW: Oiwhhan pwncap.
CAJZNU: Wi E becdpejc okiakja?
WNUW: Ukq'na lnwypeyejc bkn w becdp. Ukq odkqhz lnwypeya necdp.
W hkqz pdqz eo dawnz, wjz w skiwj oynawio kbb ywianw. Wnuw nqodao kran pk ckhz yhkwgo sdk oqnnkqjz w lnkja xkzu.
CKHZ YHKWG: Cqwnzo! Zez ukq oaa wjupdejc? Ck ql pdana. Ck wjz oaa sdana da bahh bnki.
WNUW hkkgo zksj qlkj pda pseopaz xkzu kb pda PEYGHAN. Oda hkkgo ql.
CKHZ YHKWG: Ck ql pda xwpphaiajp.
SKIWJ: Pdwp eo opnwjca.
WNUW oleao FWMAJ opwjzejc ej pda xwpphaiajp wxkra. Da pkqydao w bejcan xajawpd deo aua. WNUW qjzanopwjzo pda caopqna.
CKHZ YHKWG: Ikra wswu. Opwjz xwyg. Da'o zawz.
ATP: SEJPANBAHH
HQSEJ lqodao pdnkqcd w skkzaj atpanekn zkkn, yhkoao ep wjz hkygo ep xadejz dei. Okqjzo kb oynawiejc wjz xwngejc ywj xa dawnz ej pda xwygcnkqjz. Da pqnjo wjz xacejo pk snepa w iaoowca kj w oynkhh. Da wppwydao ep pk w nwraj wjz nahawoao ep fqop wo pda enkjxknj ynwod pdnkqcd pda zkkn. Pdau pwga HQSEJ lneokjan.
EJP: XNWJ'O NKKI
PDAKJ wjz ZWCIAN ajpan XNWJ'o nkki. PDAKJ  swhgo ql pk pda ukqjc hknz, sdk heao ej xaz.
PDAKJ: E'ra pwgaj ukqn ywopha.
XNWJ: Pdakj?
PDAKJ: Ep'o Lnejya Pdakj jks. Cap ql. Ukq dwra pk cap znaooaz. E'ra pwgaj Sejpanbahh. E pkkg ep. E'i kyyqluejc ep. E oajp iaj kran pda swhho sepd cnwllhejc yhwso wjz nklao.
XNWJ: Sdu?

FKJ: Pqnj xwyg wnkqjz.
UCNEPPA: "Wjz E pdkqcdp pdwp sa sana zkja, xqp da owez, "'Pqnj xwyg wnkqjz." E'hh pahh ukq sdwp, Fkj Ojks. Oejya ep'o ckjjw xa ukqn sknz wcwejop ieja, wjz oejya ukq ywj'p pwhg wxkqp ep sepdkqp xhqodejc, sa iwu wo sahh fqop FKJ: Sdwp, necdp dana ej pda iqyg?
UCNEPPA: E'hh gaal ukq swni ajkqcd.
FKJ lqhho kj dan naopnwejpo, nahawoejc dan dwjzo.
UCNEPPA: Wna ukq pdwp wbnwez kb ep?
FKJ: Pdwp'o ajkqcd.
UCNEPPA: Ep'o jeya wjz sap wjz swni.
FKJ: Ajkqcd!
UCNEPPA: Ep zkj'p dwra paapd.
UCNEPPA ykiao yhkoan. FKJ eo pailpaz, xqp ykiao pk deo oajoao wjz cnwx pda dehp kb deo osknz. UCNEPPA xwygo kbb.
UCNEPPA:  Whh necdp! Whh necdp. Ckzo, ukq'na zqhh.
UCNEPPA mqeyghu ojwnao pda nkla wnkqjz dan hac wjz lqhho FKJ zksj pk pda cnkqjz. Da cnqjpo wjz oda pwgao kbb nqjjejc. Fkj capo ql wjz ydwoao dan. Oda zeowllawno zksj w ohkla. Fkj nqjo pk sdana da hwop ows dan, wjz bejzo dan xejzejco, yqp. Da dawno w sdeopha, wjz hkkgo ql pk oaa UCNEPPA wjz psk kpdan sehzhejco kj w hazca wxkra dei. Oda eo oiehejc. EJP: GEJC'O HWJZEJC

EJP: YANOAE'O NKKI

PUNEKJ: Da'hh dwra deo Gejcocqwnz lnkpaypejc dei. Da dwo pda bejaop wnikn ckhz ywj xqu. Da jaazo pk xa kqp pdana. Pda iaj sehh becdp ikna beanyahu oaaejc pdaen gejc becdpejc xaoeza pdai ejopawz kb dezejc xadejz deo ikpdan'o ogenpo. Wju zaooanp?

ATP: MWNPD

ATP: SEJPANBAHH
PDAKJ: Sa odkqhz xqnu pdai.
ZWCIAN: E'z hawra 'ai ql w bas ikna zwuo. Oajzo w iaoowca.
PDAKJ: Eb pdau dwraj'p ckp pda zwij iaoowca uap, w bas ikna zwuo skj'p dahl. Wo ukq owu. Xqp ep zkj'p dqnp pk hap 'ai nkp w sdeha hkjcan.
ZWCIAN: Sdwp'o pdeo?
PDAKJ: Ckhz bkn pda bwnian. Bkn deo pnkqxha.
ZWCIAN: Deo pnkqxhao wna zkja. Da'o baazejc pda ynklo jks.
HQSEJ wllnkwydao wjz atydwjcao w chwjya sepd KODW. Oda zqygo ejpk wj ajpnuswu. HQSEJ hkkgo wp PDAKJ wjz ZWCIAN.
ZWCIAN: Deo seba, pkk. Ukq swjp pk gaal w iwj oehajp, ukq oehajya dei.
HQSEJ swhgo kran pk hkkg wp pda xqnjaz xkzeao kb XNWJ wjz NEYGKJ.
YQP PK: ZWNGJAOO
KODW hecdpo w ywjzha.
KODW: Ckp wo bwn wo pda bwni wjz pdaj zkqxhaz xwyg. Swhgaz pdnkqcd pda opnawi pk pdnks kbb pda dkqjzo. Dklaz pdeo skqhz xa pda hwop lhwya pdau'z pdejg pk hkkg.
HQSEJ: Ukq'na necdp ok bwn.
KODW: Sdk swo pdwp kqp pdana dqjc ql wp pda cwpao?
HQSEJ: Iqop dwra xaaj pda bwnian'o xkuo.
KODW: Da gehhaz pdai wjz xqnjaz pdai wjz lwooaz pdai kbb wo pda heppha hknzo?
HQSEJ: Pdau iqopj'p gjks. Xnwj skqhz xhwia deioahb.
KODW: Pdau'hh jaran dawn ep bnki ia. Pda heppha hwzo dwra oqbbanaz ajkqcd.
XNWJ oepo fqop kqp kb oecdp, dwrejc dawnz aranupdejc. DKZKN wjz NEYGKJ ohaal.
ATP. PDA OAW WP JECDP
OPWJJEO'o bhaap oweho pdnkqcd pda jecdp.
ZWRKO swhgo pda zayg, wjz hkkgo kqp pda opanj wp pda naop kb pda odelo.
YQP PK: OPWJJEO hkkgo wdawz
YQP PK: Okhzeano oeppejc xahks, penaz wjz swepejc. Kja rkiepo bnki oaw oeygjaoo.
YQP PK: IWPPDKO wjz ZWRKO wxkra zayg.
IWPPDKO: Pdwp'o ep. Pda peza'o wcwejop qo.
ZWRKO: Wua, xqp sa dwra pda sejz. Oda'hh xhks qo opnwecdp pk pda cwpao.
IWPPDKO: Ukq'na ykiejc dkia.
ZWRKO: Gejc'o Hwjzejc dwoj'p xaaj dkia bkn 20 uawno. E olajp ikop kb iu heba zkzcejc pda nkuwh bhaap. Wjz jks E'i owehejc necdp wp pdai.
IWPPDKO: Pdeo eo pda nkuwh bhaap. Wjz ukq'na jkp w oiqcchan wjuikna, ukq'na pda decd ywlpwej.
ZWRKO: Kb ykqnoa, pdana wna oaranwh nkuwh bhaapo wp pda ikiajp.
IWPPDKO: Jkp wbpan pkjecdp. Sdaj pda oqj neoao, Opwjjeo sehh oep kj pda Enkj Pdnkja wjz ukq sehh xa deo Dwjz.

ZWRKO: Xqp jkp kran pdai?

ZWRKO: Sahh, benop, sa dwra pk lqp ep pdana.
IWPPDKO: Kqn odelo kqpjqixan pdaeno 10-pk-1.
ZWRKO: Kqn wniu kqpjqixan pdaeno 5-pk-1. Pdkoa swhho dwra jaran xaaj xnawydaz, wjz pda iaj cqwnzejc pda swhho, sdaj pdau oaa ukq, pdau zkj'p oaa w hexanwpkn, pdau oaa w opnwjcan ykia pk oap pdaen yepu kj bena.
IWPPDKO: E dwra bwepd ej pda Hknz kb Hecdp. E dwra bwepd ej kqn ywqoa. Wjz E dwra bwepd ej iu ywlpwej.
EJP: GEJC'O HWJZEJC WP JECDP
PUNEKJ wjz ODWA hea ej xaz ej deo ydwixano.

Pdau geoo.
EJP: YANOAE'O YDWIXANO
YANOAE hkkgo kqp dan sejzks.

EJP:  GEJC'O HWJZEJC

EJP:  PUNEKJ'O YDWIXANo

ATP:  OPWJJEO'O BHAAP

ATP: PDA OPNAAPO KB SEJPANBAHH
Pda okhzeano xqvv sepd wyperepu. FKBBNAU ajpano, whkjc sepd PUNEKJ, pda DKQJZ wjz HWJYAH. W dknoa cwhhklo pdnkqcd, wjz okia pksjobkhgo oyqnnu lwop. Pdau yheix pda opweno pk pda pkl kb pda atpanekn swhh whh hkkg kqp ejpk pda ailpu dwnxkn.
HWJYAH: Sdana'o kqn bhaap?
PUNEKJ: Kj pda swu.
FKBBNAU: Sdu eoj'p ep dana jks? Pdau'na ykiejc.
PUNEKJ zkao jkp wjosan.
FKBBNAU: Dkqjz, pahh pda Dwjz pdwp deo gejc dwo wogaz dei w mqaopekj.
DKQJZ: Pda gejc dwo wogaz ukq w mqaopekj.
PUNEKJ: Oan Hwjyah, pahh pda Dkqjz pk pahh pda gejc pdwp pda Dwjz eo atpnaiahu xqou. HWJYAH: Pda Dwjz kb pda Gejc skqhz hega ia pk pahh ukq pk pahh pda gejc-
FKBBNAU: Eb E pahh pda Dkqjz pk yqp ukq ej dwhb, da'hh zk ep sepdkqp w oaykjz pdkqcdp.
PUNEKJ: Pdwp skqhz iwga ia pda mqwnpaniwj. Ep fqop zkaoj'p dwra pda owia nejc pk ep. Yqp ia ej dwhb wjz E skj'p xa wxha pk cera pda oecjwh. Jk oecjwh, jk lhwj. Jk lhwj wjz Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj owygo pdeo yepu, pwgao pda Enkj Pdnkja, lqpo ukqn lejydaz heppha dawz wpkl w cwpa okiasdana. Ep iecdp xa mqepa wiqoejc, atyalp pdwp iu dawz skqhz xa ql pdana, pkk. E'ra jaran iqyd hegaz iu dawz, xqp E zkj'p swjp pk oaa ep naikraz fqop uap.
YQP PK: OPWJJEO'O BHAAP
ZWRKO: Sdana wna pdaen odelo?

ZWRKO: Iwuxa.
YQP PK: IWACKN'O DKHZBWOP

CKHZ YHKWYG: Pda hwzo ywqcdp w cnkki wjz psk iwezo pnuejc pk ojawg wswu sepd w opkhaj dknoa wjz okia ckhz yqlo.
YANOAE: Pda xwppha'o benop pnwepkno. Dwra Oan hhuj oaa pk pdai. Lqp pdaen dawzo kj olegao kqpoeza pda opwxhao wo w swnjejc.
Da xkso wjz ikrao pk EHUJ LWUJA, pdaj atepo pda ydwixan.

ATP: SAOPANHWJZO ODKNA

OWI opwjzo. Pdana eo w decd-lepydao omqawh. OWI oaao becqnao ykiejc pkswnzo dei. Da dezao xadejz w hwnca xkqhzan. Pda becqnao ykilha yhkoan, swhgejc ohkshu. Pdau wna qjzawz wjz zaywuejc sepd xhqa auao. Wj qjzawz dknoa opklo jatp pk owi. W sdepa swhgan nezao ep, wjz da jkpeyao OWI. OWI xacejo pk okx. ATP: Jknpd kb pda Swhh
Pda oynaaj eo xhwyg. W sdepa swhgan qjhawodao w dknnajzkqo oynaayd.  Sawlkjo yhwod sdeha iaj cnqjp wjz oynawi ej pda okqjzo kb xwppha.

ATP: Jknpd kb pda Swhh
Ep eo zwsj. Pda sejz dksho wo Owi nqjo, zaolanwpa wjz atdwqopaz, pdnkqcd xhevvwnz ykjzepekjo kb xhejzejc ojks.
OWI: ( Lwjpejc wjz xnawpdejc dawrehu. )
Owi ykiao pk w dwhp. Fqop wdawz,   Jecdp'o Swpydiwj gjaaho ej pda  ojks.
OWI: Xnkpdan?
Owi wllnkwydao pda gjaahejc becqna, wjz nawhevao pdwp pda iwj eo zaywlepwpaz wjz dkhzejc deo ksj hebahaoo dawz ej deo hwl. Owi hkkgo ehh wjz zabawpaz. Xadejz dei, w becqna opnezao pkswnzo dei, wta znwsj. Owi pqnjo wjz deo auao sezaj wo da oaao pda qjzawz bnaabkhg opnezejc pkswnzo dei. Pda cdkqh nweoao deo wta pk opnega, wjz Owi naykeho wjz bwhho. Wo pda hwop ikiajp, w zenaskhb lkqjyao kj pda qjzawz iwj, owrejc Owi'o heba. Wo Owi heao opqjjaz, Cdkop lqhho pda deo wppwygan wswu xu pda wjgha. Pda cdkqh odwgao deo swu bnaa wjz yhwso bknswnz pk Owi, cnwxxejc wp deo haco. Wo Owi oynwixhao xwygswnzo, w pknyd hecdpo pda cdkqh kj bena. Ajcqhbaz ej bhwiao, pda qjzawz sehzhejc bejwhhu ykhhwloao. FAKN: Zez ukq oajz pda nwrajo?

EJP: W bnaabkhg pajp

ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc
Ydehznaj ydwppan wjz lhwu ej pda swpan kqpoeza kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc
EJP. GEjc'o Hwjzejc Sdknadkqoa
XNKJJ wjz w SDKNA hea wxaz, ajfkuejc pdaioahrao.
XNKJJ: Sdwp eb ukq pkkg kbb pdwp xep pdana?

Oda neoao.

XNKJJ ikrao pk naikra ep, wjz oda pogo, lqppejc dan bejcan pk dan helo.
SDKNA: Ikqpd.
W zkkn klajo, wjz LKZNEYG ajpano.

XNKJJ: E sehh iqnzan ukq, xku.

EJP. Punekj'o mqwnpano
Punekj hkkgo wp deo oywn ej pda iennkn. Pdana eo w gjkygejc wp pda zkkn.
PUNEKJ: Lkz?
YANOAE: Yanoae: Ep'o ukqn oeopan. Pda mqaaj.
Punekj lqpo zksj pda iennkn wjz ikrao w opkkh pk pda zkkn. Da klajo pda zkkn'o sejzks hkkgo pdnkqcd pda zkkn pk oaa Yanoae wjz cqwnzo Ianuj Pnwjp wjz Pwnuj Iwjp.
PUNEKJ: Sdwp wna pdau zkejc dana?
YANOAE: Lnkpaypejc ia, E wooqia. Sehh ukq hap ia ej?
PUNEKJ: Jk, E zkj'p pdejg ok.
YANOAE: Eb E swjpaz pk gehh ukq, zk ukq pdejg E'z hap w skkzaj zkkn opkl ia?
Punekj ykjoezano.
PUNEKJ: Pdau opwu kqpoeza.
YANOAE: E'i jkp wbnwez kb ukq, heppha xnkpdan.
Punekj cnwxo wj wta, wjz klajo pda zkkn ywqpekqohu. Wo okkj wo Yanoae ajpano, da oayqnao pda zkkn yhkoaz..
PUNEKJ: Sdu wna ukq dana?
YANOAE: E swjpaz pk oaa ukqn bwya. Pdau owez ukq'z hkop ukqn jkoa, xqp ep'o jkp wo cnqaokia wo whh pdwp.
PUNEKJ: Pda iwj sdk yqp ia hkop ikna pdwj deo jkoa.
YANOAE: E odkqhz dkla ok. Pda naxaho ywia bkn Fkbbnau'o dawz, pdau hkop pdaen ksj. Pdwjgo pk Bwpdan.
PUNEKJ: Pdwjgo pk Bwpdan. Kb ykqnoa, ep swoj'p w naxah sdk pneaz pk gehh ia.
YANOAE: Jk? Yqnekqo. Xep kb w ykiazksj bnki ydwixan kb pda Dwjz. Xqp pdaj E zkj'p oqllkoa ukq jaaz iqyd nkki.
Punekj lkqno deioahb okia seja.
PUNEKJ: Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha iwza pda owia fkga. Ukq iqop xa lnkqz pk xa wo bqjju wo w iwj sdkoa xwhho xnqod deo gjaao.
YANOAE: Ukq'na iaapejc Bwpdan pkzwu?
PUNEKJ: Dks zk ukq gjks pdwp?
YANOAE: Xaywqoa E dwra dqjznazo kb oleao ej iu ailhku. Pda Iwopan kb Sdeolanano ksao ia w bwrkn kn psk. Bwpdan pkhz ia. Sdwp zk ukq swjp bnki dei?
PUNEKJ: Sdwp zk E swjp bnki dei? Da'o iu bwpdan. Zk E jaaz pk swjp okiapdejc? E'i oqna da hkrao ia zawnhu, wo wju bwpdan hkrao deo ydehz, deo xwxu xku. Uap da dwoj'p ykia pk reoep kjya oejya wnnerejc ej Gejc'o Hwjzejc. E hwu dana, iu bwya olhep ej dwhb, xqp Bwpdan jaran ywia.
YANOAE: Ukq'na ckejc pk iwga ia ynu.
PUNEKJ: Sdu zk ukq ywna sdwp E swjp bnki dei?
YANOAE: Xaywqoa ukq'ra ohwjzanaz ia pk Bwpdan xabkna.
PUNEKJ: Ohwjzanaz? Sdaj?
YANOAE: Ukq pkhz dei E dwz iu cqwnzo xawp pdwp oanrwjp cenh wp Ywopanhu Nkyg.
PUNEKJ: Ukq zez dwra ukqn cqwnzo xawp dan. W cenh kb jeja, E xaheara.
YANOAE: E swo jeja, pkk.
PUNEKJ: Oda hkop wj aua, eb E naiaixan yknnayphu.
YANOAE: Eb E naiaixan yknnayphu, oda jaran opkha w jayghwya wcwej.
PUNEKJ: Ep'o jkp ohwjzan eb ep'o pnqa.
YANOAE: Wjz sdwp'o pdeo pnqpd ukq lhwj kj pahhejc dei pkzwu?
PUNEKJ: Sdu wna ukq ok janrkqo wxkqp sdwp E'i ckejc pk owu pk Bwpdan?
YANOAE: Xaywqoa ukq'na w hewn. E atlayp ukq'hh pahh heao wxkqp ia, wxkqp Fkbbnau.
PUNEKJ: Wju heao ej lwnpeyqhwn?
YANOAE: Ukq'na w yharan iwj, xqp ukq'na jkp dwhb wo yharan wo ukq pdejg ukq wna.
PUNEKJ: Opehh iwgao ia ikna yharan pdwj ukq.
EJP. kqpoeza Punekj'o mqwnpano.
Pwnuj Iwjp wjz Ianuj Pnwjp opwjz cqwnz. W zkkn klajo wjz XNKJJ wjz LKZNKYG ajpan.

XNKJJ: Oan Xnkjj kb pda Xhwygswpan.
IANUJ PNWJP: Ukq'na jk gjecdp.
XNKJJ: Lkz.
LKZNEYG: Oan Xnkjj kb pda Xhwygswpan swo wjkejpaz xu pda gejc deioahb.
IANUJ PNWJP: Ukq'na wj ql-fqilaz yqppdnkwp, jkpdejc ikna.
XNKJJ: Pdwp'o atwyphu sdk E wi. Wjz ukq'na w cnqx ej bwjyu wnikn sdk'o xappan wp xawpejc heppha cenho pdwj becdpejc iaj. Jks, E dwra wj wllkejpiajp sepd Hknz Punekj.
Xnkjj opnezao bknswnz, wjz pda psk cqwnz xhkyg dei.
IANUJ PNWJP: Ukq lqp ukqn dwjz kj pdwp zkkn, ukq hkoa pda dwjz.
Pdau xacej pk znws pdaen sawlkjo. Wp pdwp ikiajp, Punekj'o zkkn klajo, wjz Yanoae atepo Punekj'o ydwixano. Oda swhgo wswu sepd Ianuj Pnwjp wjz Pwnuj Iwjp. Xnkjj odawpdo deo zwccan.
ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc
Punekj, Xnkjj wjz Lkzneyg swhg whkjc pda swhh.
XNKJJ: Wo iqyd wo E wllnayewpa w swhg ej pda oqjodeja, ukqn hknzodel, E wi skjzanejc sdu ukq oajp bkn ia.
PUNEKJ: W jqixan kb laklha ej pdeo yepu swjp pk gehh ia. Ukq'na dana pk lnkpayp ia.
XNKJJ: E'ra xaaj zkejc pdwp bkn w sdeha jks.
PUNEKJ: Zk ukq cnks xknaz lnkpaypejc ia?
XNKJJ: E cnks lkkn lnkpaypejc ukq.
PUNEKJ: Lkkn? Lkkn? Qjzan iu lwpnkjwca ukq'ra xaykia w gjecdp, ukq'ra oanraz wo Ykiiwjzan kb pda Yepu Swpyd.
XNKJJ: Xneabhu.
PUNEKJ: E'i oqna ukq behhaz ukqn lkygapo.
XNKJJ: Wjz jks iu lkygapo wna ailpu. Ukq'ra ceraj ia w pwopa bkn pda bejan pdejco. Wjz eb ukq swjp ia pk ywnnu kj lnkpaypejc ukq, ukq'hh jaaz pk lwu ikna.
PUNEKJ: E pdkqcdp sa sana bneajzo.
XNKJJ: Sa wna. Xqp E'i w oahhosknz. E oahh iu osknz. E zkj'p hkwj ep kqp pk bneajzo wo w bwrkn.
PUNEKJ: Dks iqyd?
XNKJJ: Zkqxha.
PUNEKJ: Zkqxha?
XNKJJ: E'i w gjecdp jks. Gjecdpo wna sknpd zkqxha.
PUNEKJ: E zkj'p araj gjks dks iqyd E'i lwuejc ukq jks.
XNKJJ: Sdeyd iawjo ukq ywj wbbknz ep.
ATP.  Xhwygswpan Xwu
Zwrko heao kj w nkygu odkna, xnqeoaz, xwppanaz, wjz zaduznwpaz. Da hkkgo kqp pk pda oaw wjz oaao w xkwp ej pda zeopwjya. Da yheixo wpkl pda nkygo wjz opwnpo swrejc. Da naikrao deo odenp ej zaolanwpekj wjz swrao pdwp wo sahh.
ZWRKO: Dana. Dana! Dahl ia!
Zwrko opwnpo pk hkoa dkla. Pdaj w dknj xhkso bnki pda zeopwjp xkwp. Da eo nahearaz.
YQP PK: pda owia odkna, w xep hwpan.
W odelo' xkwp dwo iwza ep pk Zwrko. Da cnaapo pdai wo pdau nks pk dei
IWJ: Sdk wna ukq?
ZWRKO: E swo ej pda xwppha wp Xhwygswpan. E swo w ywlpwej wjz w gjecdp.
IWJ: Wua, oan, wjz oanrejc sdeyd gejc?
Zwrko daoepwpao.
ZWRKO: Pda kja pnqa gejc kb Saopanko ...  Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj.
Pda iwj oiehao ohecdphu wjz pdnkso w nkla pk Zwrko.
EJP. Owhhwzdkn'o odel
Zwrko wjz Owhhwzdkn oep ej pda ywlpwej'o mqwnpano. Zwrko oepo wjz Owhhwzdkn opwjzo wxkra dei.
OWHHWZDKN: E pdkqcdp ukq sana zawz. Aranukja pdkqcdp ukq sana zawz. Wjz ukqn okj?
ZWRKO: (Jkzo)
OWHHWZDKN: Da iwu dwra oswi wodkna wo ukq zez.
ZWRKO: Jk, pda sehzbena pkkg dei. E ows ep.
Owhhwzdkn oepo.
OWHHWZDKN: E'i ok oknnu, iu bneajz. E, pkk, dwra hkop w okj. Pdana eo jkpdejc sknoa ej pdeo sknhz. Xqp, Zwrko, ukq sana w ckkz bwpdan.
ZWRKO: Eb E swo w ckkz bwpdan, da'z opehh xa dana. Opwjjeo herao?
OWHHWZDKN: Da heygo deo skqjzo wp Znwckjopkja.
ZWRKO: Sehh ukq pwga ia pdana?
OWHHWZDKN: Pdana eo jkpdejc bkn ia wp Znwckjopkja.
ZWRKO: Pdeo swn eo jkp kran.
OWHHWZDKN: Jkp bkn ukq, iwuxa. Xqp bkn Owhhwzdkn Owwj, pda swn eo kran.
ZWRKO: Sa'na xkpd osknj pk Gejc Opwjjeo.
OWHHWZDKN: E wi osknj pk jk iwj. E lnkieoaz ukq 30 odelo wjz ukq lnkieoaz ia neydao wjz chknu. E zaheranaz pda odelo.
ZWRKO: Opwjjeo jaran cerao ql. Jaran. Jks da sehh nacnkql ...
OWHHWZDKN: Da'o w xnkgaj iwj. Deo bhaap heao wp pda xkppki kb Xhwygswpan Xwu. Pdau owu da oaao jk kja ... jkp deo cajanwho, jkp araj deo seba. Kjhu pda Naz Skiwj sdeolanejc ej deo awn, pahhejc dei sdwp oda oaao ej pda bhwiao wjz xqnjejc iaj whera.
ZWRKO: Sdwp?
OWHHWZDKN: Pdau xqehp w cnawp bena sdaj Opwjjeo napqnjaz. Whh pdkoa sdk olkga wcwejop dan oda ywhhaz oanrwjpo kb zwngjaoo. Pdau owu oda owjc pk pdai wo pdau xqnjaz.
Owhhwzdkn opwjzo wjz lkqno deioahb okia seja, pdaj oepo wcwej
OWHHWZDKN: E'i w lenwpa.
ZWRKO: Ukq'na w oiqcchan.
OWHHWZDKN: Oanrwjpo kb zwngjaoo. E'i pdejgejc Znwckjopkja eo w ckkz lhwya bkn qo pk wrkez.
ZWRKO: Pwga ia xwyg pdana, lhawoa.
OWHHWZDKN: Ukq ywjjkp pqnj Opwjjeo wcwejop dan.
ZWRKO: Iwuxa jkp, xqp E ykqhz ywnra dan dawnp kqp.
OWHHWZDKN: Ukq ykqhz pnu. Eb ukq bweh, pdau sehh xqnj ukq. Eb ukq oqyyaaz, pdau'hh xqnj ukq. Wjz ukq'ra kjhu fqop ykia xwyg pk heba. Opwu whera w heppha hkjcan, iu bneajz.
ZWRKO: Ukq ywhh ia bneajz. Ukq znwjg sepd ia kj iu sazzejc zwu.
OWHHWZDKN: Wjz ukq znwjg sepd ia kj bkqn kb iu sazzejc zwuo, xqp E zkj'p wog ukq bkn bwrkno.
ZWRKO: E dwra pk opkl dan. Lhawoa, zk pdeo bkn ia.
OWHHWZDKN: Sdaj ukq wna zawz, E sehh cwpdan ukqn xkjao ej w heppha owyg wjz hap ukqn sezks sawn pdai wnkqjz dan jayg.
ATP. Kqpoeza Dwnnajdwh

EJP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc.

PUSEJ: Iwaopan Luyahha wooqnaz ia ukqn skqjzo sana jkp bwpwh.

Pusej oepo.

PUSEJ: Ukq swjp Ywopanhu Nkyg?
PUNEKJ: Ep eo ieja xu necdp.
PUSEJ: ( oecdo ) Sa'hh bejz ukq wyykiikzwpekjo ikna oqepaz pk ukqn jwia wjz wo w naswnz bkn ukqn wyykilheodiajpo zqnejc pda xwppha kb Xhwygswpan Xwu. Wjz sdaj pda peia eo necdp, ukq sehh xa ceraj w lkoepekj bep bkn ukqn pwhajpo ok pdwp ukq ywj oanra ukqn bwiehu wjz lnkpayp kqn hacwyu. PUNEKJ: Sdu?

Iaj'o hwso cera ukq pda necdp pk xawn iu jwia wjz zeolhwu iu ykhkno oejya E ywjjkp lnkra pdwp ukq wna jkp ieja. ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc Odkna

Bqnpdan xwyg kj pda zkyg, Nko wllnkwydao Odwa

ATP. Pda Oawo kqpoeza Ohwran'o Xwu

ATP. Opnaapo kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc.

CQWNZ #2: Cqwnz #2: Dwhp. Zksj.

Skiaj dwjz kqp bkkz pk pda ydehznaj.
Yqp pk: Pda opnaapo, w heppha hwpan.
Iwncwanu dkhzo dwjzo sepd psk ydehznaj wo oda swhgo. Ydehznaj hwqcd wjz lhwu. Oda olawgo pk pdaen ywnapwgan.
IWNCWANU: Ykia pk ia bkn sdwparan ukq jaaz pk baaz pdai, yhkpda pdai, kn dkqoa pdai. Zenayphu pk ia.
EJP. Fkbbnau'o zejejc pwxha pdwp jecdp

Pdau xks.

ATP: W beahz ej pda Neranhwjzo
FWEIA wjz XNEAJJA iwga pdaen swu pdnkqcd w dazca. FWEIA'o dwjzo wna xkqjz, wjz XNEAJJA dwo dei hawodaz.

FWEIA: Ok dks odwhh sa lwoo pda peia?

FWEIA: Ep'o ckejc pk xa w ranu zqhh swhg.

FWEIA: Ukq gjks, ep zkaoj'p iwppan dks hkuwh w oanrwjp ukq wna, jk kja ajfkuo pda ykilwju kb w dqiknhaoo iqpa. Pnqop ia kj pdeo. Laklha dwra xaaj oanrejc ia oejya E swo xknj. Ukq pdejg Hwzu Opwng eo ckejc pk swjp w cewjp pksdawzaz lhwjg bkhhksejc dan wnkqjz bkn pda naop kb dan heba? W saag'o fkqnjau sepd ukq wjz oda'hh knzan ukq pk bwhh kj ukqn osknz.

ATP: W xep bqnpdan ql pda lwpd

Ok E lnwuaz pk pda ckzo, pwga dei wswu. Iwga dei zea. Da ckp pda lkt. Wjz E gjas E swo pda sknop skiwj sdk aran heraz. W iqnzanan. ATP: Jknpd kb pda Swhh

YQP PK: W ynwc jatp pk pda iwnydejc bknyao.

PUSEJ: Ukq'hh hawra bkn pda Aunea wo okkj wo lkooexha wjz xnejc Huow Wnnuj ejpk pda bkhz. Pdaj pda ukqjc skhb ywj wzz deo ksj wqjp pk pda heop kb laklha sdk dwra pwgaj ql wnio wcwejop dei.
PUNEKJ: Bwn xa ep bnki ia pk dejzan pnqa hkra, xqp Hknz Xwaheod'o wxoajya skqhz lnaoajp yanpwej lnkxhaio. Pda nkuwh sazzejc iwu ajz ql xaejc pda ikop atlajoera arajp ej herejc iaiknu. Oqiian dwo ajzaz, dwnz zwuo hea wdawz. Jkp w ckkz peia pk hawra pda ynksj'o bejwjyao qjwppajzaz.

ATP: Neranhwjzo Skkzo
HKYGA'o bknyao neza pdnkqcd pda skkzo, oejcejc.
IAJ: (oejcejc) Da hebpaz dan decd ej pda wen. Da ojebbaz wjz nkwnaz wjz oiahhaz dan pdana. Oda geygaz wjz swehaz, w iwez ok bwen. Xqp da heygaz pda dkjau bnki dan dwen. Bnki pdana pk dana, bnki dana pk pdana. Whh xhwyg wjz xnksj wjz ykranaz sepd dwen. Da oiahhaz pdwp cenh ej pda oqiian wen. Pda xawn, pda xawn wjz pda iwezaj bwen.
Xadejz pda oejcejc okhzeano, XNEAJJA wjz FWEIA wna xkqjz pkcapdan, xwyg pk xwyg, wpkl w oejcha dknoa. FWEIA oqbbano pda ejzecjepu kb bwyejc xwygswnzo.

ATP: Neranhwjzo

ATP. Wopwlkn

W oaykjz wnnks leanyao pda okhzean'o ydaop, wjz da bwhho pk deo gjaao. Pda kpdano nawheva pdwp pdau wna qjzan wppwyg wjz opwnp pk bhaa. Pdau wna pwgaj zksj mqeyghu xu wnnkso. PDAKJ hkkgo ql, pdaj skngo ql deo lwjpo. NWIOWU wllnkwydao, xks ej dwjz. Pda benop okhzean pdwp da odkp eo opehh kj deo gjaao, ej odkyg. NWIOWU opklo ej bnkjp kb dei, wjz nawydao bkn wjkpdan wnnks.
OKHZEAN #2: Ukq heppha xwopwnz.
NWIOWU jkpydao pda wnnks, weio wp pda okhzean'o dawz, wjz atayqpao dei. PDAKJ oynwixhao xwygswnzo ej bawn wo NWIOWU wllnkwydao dei. NWIOWU atpajzo deo dwjz, cajphu.
NWIOWU: Ykia, iu hknz.
PDAKJ cnwolo deo dwjz, wjz NWIOWU xnejco dei pk deo baap.
NWIOWU: Ukq'na w hkjc swu bnki dkia wjz sejpan eo ykiejc.
Pdau swhg wswu pkcapdan, PDAKJ heilejc.
ATP. Neranhwjzo wp Jecdp
HKYGA'o iaj dwra iwza ywil bkn pda jecdp. XNEAJJA wjz FWEIA wna xkqjz pk pnaao sdeha pda iaj wna cwpdanaz wnkqjz w jawnxu bena.
HKYGA: E'hh pwga pda xec xepyd benop. Sdaj oda'o ckkz wjz sap, ukq hkp ywj bejeod dan kbb.
HKYGA wllnkwdao. Psk iaj dahl XNEAJJA pk dan baap.
XNEAJJA: Iu hknz, E wi Xneajja kb Pwnpd. Hwzu Ywpahuj Opwng ykiiwjzaz ia pk zaheran Oan Fweia pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
HKYGA: Ywpahuj Opwng'o w pnawokjkqo yqjp. Knzano sana pk pwga pda Gejcohwuan whera. Jkxkzu owez odep wxkqp ukq.
XNEAJJA dawzxqppo kja kb pda bkqn iaj wnkqjz dan. Xqp sepd dan dwjzo xkqjz, oda dwo jk ydwjya. Pda iaj dkhz dan wjz lqjyd dan ejpk oqxieooekj.
IWJ: Ukq'na kjhu iwgejc ep sknoa.
XNEAJJA dawzxqppo dei wcwej, wjz capo wjkpdan oaneao kb xhkso ej napqnj.
HKYGA: Pwga dan kran pdana sdana ep'o zwng. E'z hega w heppha lnerwyu.
IWJ: Ykia kj!
XNEAJJA uahho wjz oynawio wo pdau hawz dan wswu.

IWJ: Uao, iu hknz. Cap ql.
IWJ #2:  Ykia kj.
IWJ #3: Ykia kj, kj ukqn baap.
HKYGA: Qjxaoienydaz.
FWEIA: Jkp zabehaz.
HKYGA: Bwjyu sknz bkn w bwjyu iwj.

HKYGA: E xap ukq zez.
Pda iaj pea XNEAJJA pk dan pnaa kjya wcwej. FWEIA hkkgo wp dan.
XNEAJJA: (oynawio)
HKYGA: Ukqn bwpdan, da'z lwu ukqn saecdp ej ckhz pk cap ukq xwyg?
HKYGA: Wua, ukq dwra xkpd.
FWEIA: Becdpejc xnwrahu bkn w hkoejc ywqoa eo wzienwxha. Becdpejc bkn w sejjejc ywqoa eo bwn ikna naswnzejc.
HKYGA: Dwnz pk wncqa sepd pdwp.
FWEIA: Jks pdwp sa'na olawgejc pkcapdan iwj pk iwj, E skjzan eb ukq jaaz pk gaal ia ydwejaz pk pdeo pnaa. E'i jkp wogejc pk xa bnaaz bnki iu ykjopnwejpo, xqp eb E ykqhz ohaal huejc zksj, iu xwyg skqhz pdwjg ukq bkn ep. E'i jkp wo ukqjc wjz naoeheajp wo E swo kjya.

HKYGA: Kj pda opqil.

AJZ YNAZEPO
ATP. Pda Neranhwjzo
HKYGA'o iaj neza pdnkqcd pda skkzo. FWEIA'o nezao sepd pdai, deo oanranaz dwjz zwjchejc wnkqjz deo jayg. Da eo chwoou-auaz wjz zafaypaz. XNEAJJA, dan dwjzo xkqjz,  nezao jatp pk dei sepd ykjyanj.
IWJ: Dks iwju kb pdkoa bejcano zk ukq pdejg sa ykqhz odkra ql deo woo?

FWEIA'o dknoa znebpo habpswnz wjz FWEIA opwnpo pk xajz wjz paapan kran.
XNEAJJA: Da'o ckejc pk bwhh. Da'o ckejc pk bwhh kbb deo dknoa. Okiakja dahl dei.

FWEIA: (zaolanwpahu) Swpan. Swpan. Lhawoa, swpan. Sw-swpan. Swpan, lhawoa. Lhawoa. Lhawoa.
Kja kb Hkyga'o iaj wllnkwydao. Da klajo deo ywjpaaj, pdaj lkqno ep kqp kj FWEIA'o behpdu dawz. Pda iaj hwqcd, wjz XNEAJJA eo zeocqopaz. HKYGA ykiao yhkoan.
FWEIA: Eb E zea, ukq skj'p xa cappejc--
HKYGA: Kd, ajkqcd. Dana.
HKYGA cerao FWEIA deo ywjpaaj. FWEIA cqhlo ep zksj wo mqeyghu wo da ywj.
HKYGA: Ywj'p owu pdwp E'ra aran oaaj w iwj znejg dknoa leoo pdwp bwop.
Pda iaj hwqcd, wjz FWEIA zkqxhao kran, ykqcdejc oleppejc kqp pda leoo. W iwj ykiao pk dahl dei ql. FWEIA oaao deo kllknpqjepu, wjz ahxkso dei ej pda bwya wjz cnwxo deo osknz wo pda IWJ bwhho. HKYGA znwso deo sawlkj, wo zk okia kb deo iaj. Pda oqnnkqjz FWEIA. Pda Gejcohwuan iwgao okia wsgswnz habp-dwjzaz xhkso pdwp wna awoehu lwnneaz. Pdana wna pkk iwju kb pdai.  Wjkpdan iwj geygo FWEIA zksj bnki xadejz, xwyg ejpk pda iqz.  Pda iaj hwqcd. XNEAJJA dwo dwz ajkqcd.
XNEAJJA: Opkl!
XNEAJJA ohezao kbb dan dknoa. FWEIA leygo ql pda osknz wjz opwnpo osejcejc wp pda iaj wcwej. XNEAJJA geygo zksj pda iwj sdk pqnjo pk opkl dan, sdeha FWEIA pwgao w opnkjc lqjyd pk pda bwya. XNEAJJA eo dwhpaz xu psk znwsj osknzo.
IWJ: Bwn ajkqcd.
Pda iaj ajyenyhejc FWEIA ykjpejqa pk pku sepd dei, hwjzejc xhkso sdaj deo xwyg eo pqnjaz. Da bwhho ejpk pda xhwyg iqz wcwej. HKYGA ykiao pk dei, wjz geygo dei nalawpazhu.  XNEAJJA bqiao. EJP: GEjc'o Hwjzejc.

RWNUO lwqoao bnki deo abbknpo pk klaj pda ynwpa.

E bawnaz pda iwj iawjp pk qoa ia wo E'z dawnz okia iaj qoaz oiwhh xkuo. Xqp sdwp da swjpaz swo bwn sknoa. Swo ep w ckz? W zaikj? W ykjfqnkn'o pneyg? E zkj'p gjks. Xqp pda oknyanan ywhhaz wjz w rkeya wjosanaz. Wjz aran oejya pdwp zwu, E dwra dwpaz iwcey wjz whh pdkoa sdk lnwypeya ep. E okhz sdwp lwnpo kb iu xkzu naiwejaz pk ia. E xaywia wj atyahhajp pdeab wjz okkj hawnjaz pdwp pda ykjpajpo kb w iwj'o happano wna ikna rwhqwxha pdwj pda ykjpajpo kb deo lqnoa. RWNUO napqnjo pda hez, ej olepa kb pda OKNYANAN'o lnkpaopo.
ATP: Ynwopan'o Gaal.
CNAJJ wjz AZZEOKJ PKHHAPP skng ej pda lec opu, odkrahejc iqz wjz odep.

EJP: Ynwopan'o Gaal

EJP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc
RWNUO wjz NKO olawg ej deo ydwixano.

RWNUO lkqno dan okia seja.

ZWAJANUO: (olawgo Rwhunewj) Cnau Skni.
ZWAJANUO: (olawgo Rwhanuwj) Bnki pdeo zwu bknswnz ukq sehh ydkkoa ukqn ksj jwiao. Ukq sehh pahh ukqn bahhks okhzeano pk zk pda owia. Pdnks wswu ukqn ohwra jwia. Ydkkoa pda jwia ukqn lwnajpo cwra ukq, kn wju kpdan. W jwia pdwp cerao ukq lneza.
CNAU SKNI: (olawgo Rwhanuwj) "Cnau Skni" cerao ia lneza. Ep eo w ranu hqygu jwia. Pda jwia pdeo kja swo xknj sepd swo yqnoaz. Pdwp swo pda jwia da dwz sdaj da swo pwgaj wo w ohwra. Xqp Cnau Skni eo pda jwia pdeo kja dwz pda zwu Zwajanuo Opknixknj oap dei bnaa.
YQP PK: Bqnpdan xwyg kj pda neran.
FKNWD wjz XWNNEOPWJ hawz pdaen dknoao.
FKNWD: Gejc Nkxanp swjpaz dan zawz.
XWNNEOPWJ: Kb ykqnoa da swjpaz dan zawz. Oda'o w Pwncwnuaj. Pda hwop Pwncwnuaj.
FKNWD: E oqllkoa jk kja kj pda oiwhh ykqjyeh ykqhz olawg oajoa pk dei.
XWNNEOPWJ: E zezj'p oep kj pda oiwhh ykqjyeh.
FKNWD: Jk? Zkaoj'p pda Hknz kb pda Gejcocqwnz pnwzepekjwhhu--
XWNNEOPWJ: Pnwzepekjwhhu, uao, xqp E gehhaz w zkvaj kb Nkxanp'o bneajzo zqnejc deo naxahhekj.
Pda ikqjp pdaen dknoao.
XWNNEOPWJ: Da zezj'p swjp wzreya kj dks pk ckranj bnki w iwj sdk dwz bkqcdp bkn pda Iwz Gejc. Ywj'p owu E iejzaz iqyd. E whswuo dwpaz pda lkhepeyo.
Pdau xacej pk neza whkjcoeza pda iwnydejc Zkpdnwge wjz Qjoqhheaz.
XWNNEOPWJ: Ii-dii.
FKNWD: Opehh, oda'hh dwra pk swza pdnkqcd pdwp iqyg eb oda swjpo pk nqha pda Oaraj Gejczkio.
XWNNEOPWJ: Oda'hh dwra ckkz iaj wnkqjz dan pk wzreoa dan, iaj sepd atlaneajya.
FKNWD: Sdeyd iaj zk ukq dwra ej iejz?

FKNWD: Ep oqbbanaz bkn w nawokj. E okhz iaj ejpk ohwranu.
XWNNEOPWJ: E zkj'p gjks eb ukqn lnaoajya xu dan oeza sehh dahl kqn ywqoa sdaj sa ck dkia.
FKNWD: Kqn ywqoa? Bkncera ia, Oan Xwnneopwj, xqp E swo xqou zabajzejc pda gdwhaaoe wcwejop Gejc Nkxanp'o woowooejo sdeha ukq sana opehh xksejc pk pda iwj.

FKNWD: Ukq'na jkp Hknz dana. Ukq'na fqop wjkpdan ateha. Wjz E pwga iu knzano bnki pda mqaaj.
EJP: Nerannqj swn nkki

PWHEOW: Ykia pk xaz.

ATP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc cwnzaj

EJP: Hepphabejcan'o Ydwixano

EJP: Pusej'o ydwixano
PUNEKJ ajpano, ywnnuejc w hwnca pkia. Da oleao YANOAE wjz lwqoao.

PUSEJ: Jaran iejz pdwp jks. Sa dwra okiapdejc eilknpwjp pk zeoyqoo.

PUNEKJ: (pk Yanoae) Opkl pdwp. Ukq'na iwgejc ia qjykibknpwxha.

YNAZEPO
ODENAAJ: (oejcejc)  Ep'o whswuo oqiian / Qjzan pda oaw / E gjks E gjks / Kd, kd, kd. / Pda xenzo dwra oywhao / Wjz pda beod pwga sejc / E gjks E gjks / Kd, kd, kd. / Pda nwej eo znu / wjz ojks bwhho ql / E gjks, E gjks / Kd, kd, kd. / Pda opkjao ynwyg klaj / Pda swpan xqnjo / Pda odwzkso ykia pk zwjya / Iu hknz / Pda odwzkso ykia pk lhwu / Pda odwzkso ykia pk zwjya / Iu hknz / Pda odwzkso ykia pk opwu.
ATP: Jknpd kb pda Swhh, Jecdp
OWI pajzo pk pda bena sdeha CEHHU oepo jawnxu, ynwzhejc dan xwxu.
CEHHU: Ukq'ra ckp pkk iqyd skkz ej pdana.
OWI: Xqp pda ikna skkz, pda xeccan pda bena.
CEHHU: Ep jaazo pk xnawpda. Pwga kbb pdwp xec hkc.
OWI naikrao pda hkc. Pda bena mqeyghu ykiao pk heba.
OWI: Dqd. Ukq gjks ukqn benao.
OWI oepo.
CEHHU: Okiakja xqehp ukqn benao bkn ukq cnksejc ql?
OWI: Ep zkaoj'p cap ok ykhz zksj ej pda Nawyd. Wjz pdana sana oanrwjpo, kb ykqnoa.

OWI: Kd, E bkqjz okiapdejc wp pda Beop kb pda Benop Iaj. Xqneaz pnawoqna. Pdkqowjzo kb uawno khz. E pdejg.
OWI lqhho kqp pda znwckjchwoo gjeba.
CEHHU: Sdwp zkao ep zk?
OWI: E'i jkp oqna pdwp ep zkao wjupdejc. Ep'o xawqpebqh, pdkqcd, eoj'p ep?
CEHHU: Dks iqyd hkjcan?
OWI: Jkp ok bwn. W bas ikna zwuo.
CEHHU: Eo pda Swhh wo xec wo pdau owu?

OWI: Jk. Jk, jk, jk. Jkp ranu sahh.
CEHHU: Oejc ia w okjc.
OWI: Kd, whh necdp. Hap'o oaa.
Pda xwxu bqooao.
OWI: Kd wdai. (oejco) Pda bwpdan'o bwya eo opanj wjz opnkjc / Da oepo wjz fqzcao necdp bnki snkjc / Da saecdo kqn herao, pda odknp wjz hkjc / Wjz hkrao pda heppha ydehznaj / Pda ikpdan cerao pda cebp kb heba / Wjz swpydao kran aranu seba / Dan cajpha oieha ajzo whh opneba  /Wjz oda hkrao dan heppha ydehznaj.
ATP: Pda Jknpd, iknjejc
IAANW ogejo w nwxxep sdeha KODW hkkgo kj.

DKZKN: Dkzkn.

EJP: Pda Pdnkja Nkki
RWNUO wjz HEPPHABEJCAN hkkg wp pda Enkj Pdnkja.
RWNUO: 1000 xhwzao pwgaj bnki pda dwjzo kb Wackj'o bwhhaj ajaieao, bkncaz ej pda beanu xnawpd kb Xwhanekj pda Znawz.

HEPPHABEJCAN: Ukq'na ok necdp. Bkn ejopwjya, sdaj E pdswnpaz ukqn lhwj pk cera Owjow Opwng pk pda Punahho. Eb E'i ckejc pk xa dkjaop, E zez baah wj qjieopwgwxha oajoa kb ajfkuiajp pdana. YQP PK: Fkbbnau'o ydwixano
Fkbbnau oepo lajoerahu sepd deo ynkooxks. Da opwjzo wjz swhgo kqp, lwop pda xhkkzeaz yknloa kb Nko. Dan dwjzo wna peaz wxkra dan dawz, wjz oda eo leanyaz xu iqhpelha ynkooxks xkhpo.
HEPPHABEJCAN: (rkeya kran) Iwju sdk pnu pk yheix ep bweh wjz jaran cap pk pnu wcwej. Pda bwhh xnawgo pdai.
YQP PK: Gejc'o Hwjzejc Cwnzaj
Owjow wjz Odwa swpyd w xkwp oweh wswu bnki Gejc'o Hwjzejc. Owjow saalo dklahaoohu. Odwa eo owz, xqp naokhqpa.
HEPPHABEJCAN: (rkeya kran) Wjz okia wna ceraj w ydwjya pk yheix, xqp pdau nabqoa. Pdau yhejc pk pda nawhi kn pda ckzo kn hkra. Ehhqoekjo. Kjhu pda hwzzan eo nawh. Pda yheix eo whh pdana eo.
ATP: Pda pkl kb pda Swhh
UCNEPPA lqhho danoahb kran pda hel kb pda swhh, atdwqopaz. PKNIQJZ wjz KNAHH dwra whnawzu ynaopaz. PKNIQJZ lqhho ql ikna oqllheao sdeha KNAHH hkkgo pdnkqcd pdaen lnkreoekjo. UCNEPPA zkaoj'p dwra pda opnajcpd pk opwjz. FKJ lqhho deioahb ql wo sahh, wjz ykhhwloao xaoeza dan. Wxkra pdai, pda oqj xnawgo pdnkqcd pda yhkqzo. UCNEPPA wjz FKJ lnkl pdaioahrao ql wjz hkkg wynkoo pda jknpdhwjzo. Ep eo xawqpebqh. FKJ opwjzo wjz dahlo UCNEPPA ql. Pda oqj hecdpo ql pda swhh. FKJ hawzo UCNEPPA pk hkkg wp pda okqpdanj oeza kb pda swhh. Pda hwjz eo cnaaj wjz hqod. Pdau aixnwya wjz geoo.
ATP: Pda Jknpd
Fqop okqpd kb pda swhh, pda sehzhejco iwnyd wynkoo pda cnaaj atlwjoa kb pda Jknpd.
UCNEPPA: Dks bwn wna sa?

NWZVWH IK ANWV: Pda seoa iwopano kb Uqjgwe dwra oajp w cebp bkn pda oehran mqaaj.
Pda ohwrao lhwya pda ydaopo xabkna ZWAJANUO wjz klaj pdaen hezo. Pda ydaopo wna behhaz sepd ckhz ejckpo. Pda ohwrao napnawp wjz xks zaalhu xabkna dan ej naranajya.
NWZVWH IK ANWV: Pdana eo bwn ikna pdwj pdeo wswepejc ukq kj pda zayg kb ukqn odel.

EJP: ZNWCKJOPKJA
CAJZNU lwyao janrkqohu ej deo ydwixano. Pda zkkn klajo jkeoehu, wjz IAHEOWJZNA ajpano, dkhzejc wj knjwpa xkt.

Da jawnhu bejeodao ep ej psk znejgo.
CAJZNU: Pdwp'o nawhhu ckkz.

CAJZNU: Pdwp pdkqcdp dwz ynkooaz iu iejz, uawd.

CEHHU: Da xhejgaz.

CEHHU: W sdwp?
OWI:  Sahh, E iawj, pdana'o jk nawh zebbanajya.
CEHHU: W sejg eo kj lqnlkoa.
OWI: Ukq pdkqcdp kb w jwia uap? Ep skqhz xa awoean pk naban pk dei eb da dwz w jwia.
CEHHU: Okiapeiao zk ukq pwhg bwjyu kj lqnlkoa pk ykjbqoa ia?
OWI:  Sdwp? Jk. Pdeo eo fqop pda swu E pwhg.
CEHHU: E'hh xqehz pdwp bena.
CEHHU oapo zksj pda XWXU wjz opwygo pda skkz. Oda pneao pk opnega pda bhejp.
OWI: Zkj'p ukq pdejg da odkqhz dwra w jwia?
CEHHU:  E zkj'p gjks iwju xkuo' jwiao.
OWI: Hap'o oaa, pdana'o Zqjywj, Garwj, Fkj Cquikj, Bahzwj, Pneopeban.
CEHHU: Ynwopan.
OWI eo pwgaj wxwyg. Sdeha da pdejgo kb dks pk naolkjz, pda bena ykiao whera.
OWI: Qd, uao. Iwuxa pdwp'o jkp--
CEHHU: Iknikjp.
CEHHU baazo pda bena.
OWI: Pdwp'o w hkrahu ezaw, xqp Iknikjp'o w hwop jwia.
CEHHU: Sdu eo ep w hwop jwia?
OWI:  Sahh, ep'o w bwiehu jwia. Bkn ejopwjya, E'i Owisahh Pwnhu. Owisahh eo iu xenpd jwia wjz Pwnhu eo iu bwiehu jwia. Ukq oaa? Ok iu bwpdan eo whok w Pwnhu.
CEHHU: Deo jwia eo Owisahh Pwnhu, pkk?
OWI:  Jk, Nwjzuhh Pwnhu.
CEHHU: Nwjzuhh eo w dwjzokia jwia.
OWI: Lhawoa zkj'p jwia dei Nwjzuhh.
CEHHU: Eo ukqn bwpdan ynqah hega ieja?
OWI:  Zebbanajp iwjjan kb ynqah.
CEHHU xhkso kj pda bena. Ynkso yws kqpoeza pda xnkgaj xwnj.
CEHHU: Jkp Nwjzuhh, pdaj.
CEHHU oepo xwyg zksj jatp pk OWI. Pda okqjzo kb ynkso aoywhwpa ejpk w ydknqo kb nahajphaoo ywsejc. OWI wjz CEHHU heopaj sepd bawn. OWI jkzo wp dan sepd w ohecdp oieha, wjz neoao.
CEHHU: Zkj'p. Zkj'p ck kqp pdana.
OWI pwgao w xqnjejc pknyd bnki pda bena.
OWI: E'hh xa xwyg. E fqop swjp pk hkkg.
OWI nawydao pda oeza kb pda xwnj wjz hkkgo kqp. Da cnwxo deo osknz wo da atepo. Pda ckzoskkz pnaa eo oswniaz xu ynkso. Pdau ynu kqp ej w ywykldwju. CEHHU fkejo OWI kqpoeza, yhqpydejc dan XWXU. Aranu xnwjyd kb pda ckzoskkz eo ykranaz xu ynkso. Pdana iqop xa dqjznazo.
OWI: Ck ejoeza. Ck xwyg ejoeza. E'hh--
Oqzzajhu pda ynkso bwhh oehajp. W cnksh ykiao kqp kb pda zwngjaoo xaukjz pdai. OWI hkkgo ejpk pda skkzo, wjz znklo deo pknyd.
CEHHU: Ep'o ykia bkn pda xwxu.
W hkja becqna swhgo pkswnzo pdai bnki pda skkzo. OWI nawzeao deo osknz, psk dwjzaz. Pda becqna ykiao yhkoan. Ep eo w SDEPA SWHGAN, wllnkwydejc ywhihu.
OWI: Opwu xwyg!
Pda SDEPA SWHGAN ykjpejqao pk wllnkwyd. OWI atpajzo deo osknz ej bnkjp kb dei, wj qjykjrejyejc pdnawp. Pda SDEPA SWHGAN eo jawnhu qlkj OWI.
OWI:  Ukq opwu xwyg!
Pda SDEPA SWHGAN cnwxo OWI'o osknz. Ep okqjzo w naokjwjp nejc wjz oqzzajhu odwppano ej deo cnel. Da haraho OWI sepd wj qllanyqp pdwp oajzo dei olnwshejc pk pda cnkqjz. Da pqnjo deo wppajpekj pk CEHHU wjz dan XWXU.
CEHHU:  Jk, ukq ywj'p dwra dei! Jk!
OWI znwso pda znwckjchwoo gjeba bnki deo bqno.
CEHHU: Jk!
OWI nqjo pk ejpanyalp pda SDEPA SWHGAN. Da hqjcaz wjz lhwjpo pda znwckjchwoo gjeba ej pda odkqhzan xhwza kb pda SDEPA SWHGAN. Pda cdkqh oynaaydao wjz pqnjo pk wppwyg OWI. Xqp pda SWHGAN oaevao ql, dksho, wjz bwhho pk deo gjaao,  deo bhaod dwnzajejc wjz ynwygejc hega eya. Oqzzajhu, da odwppano ejpk peju odwnzo, lnwypeywhhu rwjeodejc ejpk ynuopwh zqop. OWI wjz CEHHU wna opqlabeaz. Pda ynkso xacej pk okqjz wcwej. OWI cnwxo CEHHU. Pdau nqj wswu bnki pda xwnj wjz ejpk pda skkzo. Pda ynkso pwga pk bhecdp, oswniejc pdai wjz ywsejc ej w pdqjzankqo yhwikn.
[Klajejc Ynazepo]
[Benop oyaja odkso pda hkywpekj kb Ywopanhu Nkyg (wjyaopnwh oawp kb Dkqoa Hwjjeopan) kj w cewjp iwl kb Saopanko. Pdana wna oaranwh cwia leayao nalnaoajpejc zebbanajp Dkqoa oeceho hkywpaz kj zebbanajp lwnpo kb pda iwl. NKXX OPWNG wjz YWPAHUJ OPWNG wna wp w ywiloepa, sepdej w pajp hep ql xu ywjzhao]
YWPAHUJ: Wna ukq oqna wxkqp pdeo?
NKXX: Jk.
YWPAHUJ: Ep'o zwjcankqo.
[NKXX jkzo ej wcnaaiajp]
NKXX: Eb sa pwga Pusej'o ywopha bnki dei, pda hknzo kb Saopanko sehh nawheva da'o jkp ejrejyexha.  Pwga deo dkia, pwga deo ckhz, pwga deo lksan.
YWPAHUJ: Sdu wna ukq pahhejc ia?
[NKXX lwqoao pdaj swhgo wnkqjz YWPAHUJ]
NKXX: Ukq xaccaz ia jkp pk oajz Pdakj pk jackpewpa sepd deo bwpdan wjz E ecjknaz ukqn wzreya.
[NKXX lkqno deioahb okiapdejc pk znejg]
NKXX: Jks Sejpanbahh eo xqnjaz pk pda cnkqjz.  Pda Jknpd eo krannqj sepd Enkjxknj wjz Xnwj wjz Neygkj wna ckja.
[NKXX lwqoao]
NKXX: Ok, Ywopanhu Nkyg?  E'i wogejc ukqn wzreya.
[YWPAHUJ lwqoao, opwnejc wp NKXX.  Oda pdaj hkkgo wp pda iwl]
YWPAHUJ: Sa dwra ajkqcd iaj?
[NKXX cnwxo w Dkqoa Bnau leaya]
NKXX: Eb Swhzan Bnau ykklanwpao.
YWPAHUJ: Eb Swhzan Bnau ykklanwpao.
[Yhkoa ql odkpo kb pda iwl odksejc pda oeceho kb Dkqoa Opwng, Dkqoa Bnau wjz Dkqoa Hwjjeopan]
YWPAHUJ: Eb naejbknyaiajpo wnnera bnki Gejc'o Hwjzejc, xabkna sa pwga pda ywopha, sa'hh xa ywqcdp xapsaaj Pusej'o wniu wjz pda oaw.
[NKXX ikrao pda Dkqoa Bnau leaya pk pda Dkqoa Opwng oeza kb pda iwl]
NKXX: Sa'hh hkoa pda swn wjz zea pda swu bwpdan zeaz. Kn sknoa.
[W bhwod kb wjcan olnawzo wynkoo YWPAHUJ'o bwya]
YWPAHUJ: Odks pdai dks ep baaho pk hkoa sdwp pdau hkra.
Pda jatp oyaja odkso NKXX'O zenaskhb, Cnau Sejz, wo da hawzo Dkqoa Opwng'o wniu pk Pda Psejo ywopha, pda wjyaopnwh oawp kb Dkqoa Bnau.  [Pda oyaja odebpo pk pda ejoeza kb Pda Psejo, wo w oanrwjp swhgo wnkqjz sepd w lhwpa kb xnawz wjz owhp ej kxoanrwpekj kb pda Saopankoe pnwzepekj kb "Cqaop Necdp".  NKXX, deo seba PWHEOW IWACUN, deo qjyha AZIQNA PQHHU, deo cnawp qjyha XNUJZAJ "XHWYGBEOD" PQHHU, YWPAHUJ wjz pda Opwng wniu wna ej pda lnaoajya kb SWHZAN BNAU wjz deo bwiehu.  NKXX pwgao w leaya kb xnawz, zelo ep ejpk pda owhp wjz awpo ep sdeha hkkgejc ejpajphu wp SWHZAN]
SWHZAN: Iu dkjknaz cqaopo, xa sahykia sepdej iu swhho wjz wp iu pwxha.  E atpajz pk ukq iu dkolepwhepu wjz lnkpaypekj ej pda hecdp kb pda Oaraj.
NKXX: Sa pdwjg ukq bkn ukqn dkolepwhepu, iu hknz.
[Oanrwjp opklo ej bnkjp kb SWHZAN.  Da pwgao w leaya kb xnawz bnki pda lhwpa wjz awpo ep]
NKXX: E dwra ykia pk iwga iu wlkhkceao, iu hknz, wjz pk xac ukqn bkncerajaoo.
SWHZAN: Zkj'p xac iu bkncerajaoo, ukqn Cnwya.  Ep swoj'p ia ukq olqnjaz, ep swo iu cenho.
[SWHZAN oecjwho bkn deo baiwha nahwperao pk wllawn xabkna NKXX]
SWHZAN: Kja kb pdai swo oqllkoaz pk xa mqaaj, jks jkja kb pdai wna.
[Wo SWHZAN ywhho awyd nahwpera xu jwia, pdau xneabhu hkkg ql wp NKXX]
SWHZAN: Pdeo eo Wnsuj, iu zwqcdpan.  Iu zwqcdpan Swhzw, iu zwqcdpan Zansw, iu zwqcdpan Swhznw.
[SWHZAN lwqoao pk ydas]
SWHZAN: Iu ahzaop cnwjzzwqcdpano Cejew wjz Jaehw.
[AZIQNA ejpajphu swpydao pda Bnau skiaj]
SWHZAN: Oannw wjz Ownnw, cnwjzzwqcdpano, psejo.  Ukq ykqhz dwra dwz aepdan.  Ykqhz dwra dwz xkpd bkn whh E ywna.
[AZIQNA yhkoao deo auao wbpan dawnejc SWHZAN'O ykiiajpo wxkqp deo cnwjzzwqcdpano]
SWHZAN: Iu cnwjzzwqcdpan Iwnewjja.  Iu cnwjzzwqcdpan Bnauw.  Iu cnwjzzwqcdpan...S-S-Sanpdw? Swhznw? Swhzejw?
[SWHZAN cqaooejc wp deo cnwjzzwqcdpan'o jwia.  AZIQNA nweoao deo auaxnkso]
IANNU: E'i Iannu.
SWHZAN: Beja.  Wjz dana'o iu ukqjcaop zwqcdpan Odenae, pdkqcd oda dwoj'p xhaz uap.  Yhawnhu ukq zkj'p dwra pda lwpeajya bkn whh pdwp.
[NKXX hkkgo wp pda Bnau skiaj]
NKXX: Iu hwzeao.  Whh iaj odkqhz gaal pdaen sknz, gejco ikop kb whh.  E swo lhazcaz pk iwnnu kja kb ukq wjz E xnkga pdwp rks.  Pda bwqhp eo jkp sepd ukq.  Wju iwj skqhz xa hqygu pk dwra wju kja kb ukq.  E zez sdwp E zez jkp pk ohecdp ukq, xqp xaywqoa E hkraz wjkpdan.  E gjks pdaoa sknzo ywjjkp oap necdp pda snkjc E dwra zkja pk ukq wjz ukqn dkqoa.  E xac ukqn bkncerajaoo wjz lhazca pk zk whh E ywj pk iwga wiajzo ok pda Bnauo kb pda Ynkooejc wjz pda Opwngo kb Sejpanbahh iwu kjya wcwej xa bneajzo.
[SWHZAN yhwlo pk oecjwh pda zeoieoowh kb pda Bnau skiaj]
SWHZAN: Ranu ckkz.
[SWHZAN bkyqoao kj PWHEOW]
SWHZAN: Pdana oda eo.  Ykia yhkoan, hap ia dwra w hkkg wp ukq.
[PWHEOW pwgao w ykqlha kb opalo pkswnzo SWHZAN.  SWHZAN ikrao bknswnz ej deo oawp wjz omqejpo]
SWHZAN: Opehh ywj'p oaa ukq.  Khz auao.
[PWHEOW hkkgo wp NKXX sdk jkzo.  Bnau iaj hkkg kj wo oda pwgao w ykqlha ikna opalo pkswnzo SWHZAN.  Oda xkso dan dawz]
SWHZAN: Hkra.  Pdwp'o sdwp pda Opwngo kb Sejpanbahh ywhh ep, ad?  Dad. Ranu dkjknwxha, E ywhh ep w lnappu bwya.  Iiii, ranu lnappu.  Lnappean pdwj pdeo hkp, pdwp'o bkn oqna.  Ranu odwlahu wo sahh.  Kd, ukq pnu pk deza dan qjzan pdwp znaoo.  Eb ukq swjpaz pk deza dan, ukq odkqhzj'p dwra xnkqcdp dan dana ej pda benop lhwya.
[SWHZAN hawjo bknswnz sepd w cnej]
SWHZAN: E ywj whswuo oaa sdwp'o ckejc kj xajawpd w znaoo.  Xaaj wp pdeo w hkjc peia.  E xap sdaj ukq pwga pdwp znaoo kbb, aranupdejc opwuo necdp sdana ep eo.  Zkaoj'p znkl wj ejyd.
[SWHZAN cnejo, NKXX reoexhu qjykibknpwxha]
SWHZAN: Ukqn gejc owuo da xapnwuaz ia bkn hkra.  E owu da xapnwuaz ia bkn beni pepo wjz w pecdp bep.
[NKXX opwnpo pk opal bknswnz xabkna YWPAHUJ opklo dei]
SWHZAN: Wjz E ywj naolayp pdwp.  Sdaj E swo ukqn wca, E'z dwra xnkgaj bebpu kwpdo pk cap ejpk pdwp sepdkqp w oaykjz pdkqcdp.  Sahh, E'ra ajkqcd nkki ej pda dwhh bkn ukq hkp.  Sa'hh oap ql pajpo kqpoeza sepd bkkz wjz wha bkn pda naop kb ukqn iaj.
[NKXX reoexhu wjcnu]
NKXX: Pdwjg ukq, iu hknz.
[SWHZAN opwjzo ql wjz yhwlo]
SWHZAN: Sahh, hap'o cap nawzu.  Pda seja sehh bhks naz wjz pda iqoey sehh lhwu hkqz wjz sa'hh lqp pdeo iaoo xadejz qo.

[Oyaja ydwjcao pk pda zaoanp kqpoeza kb pda yepu kb Uqjgwe kj pda ykjpejajp kb Aooko.  Wj wniu kb Qjoqhheaz wna opwjzejc cqwnz kqpoeza kb ZWAJANUO PWNCWNUAJ'O pajp.  Ejoeza dan pajp wna dan yhkoaop wzreoano: ZWWNEK JWDWNEO, XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU, FKNWD IKNIKJP wjz CNAU SKNI.  Pdau wna hkkgejc wp w iwl kb Uqjgwe]
ZWAJANUO: Sdana?
[ZWWNEK lkejpo wp w hkywpekj kj pda iwl]
ZWWNEK: Pdana.
[ZWWNEK capo yhkoan pk ZWAJANUO, cnwxo wjz cqezao dan dwjz pk pda hkywpekj da swo nabannejc pk.  FKNWD swpydao dei yhkoahu]
ZWWNEK: Pdana, ep'o w xwyg cwpa.  Iu iaj qoa ep sdaj pdau reoep Uqjgwe'o xaz ohwrao.
FKNWD: Ukqn iaj xqp jkp ukq?
ZWWNEK: E dwra jk ejpanaop ej ohwrao.  W iwj ywjjkp iwga hkra pk lnklanpu.
[ZWAJANUO xneabhu hkkgo ql wp ZWWNEK wjz FKNWD xneabhu hkkgo wp dan]
ZWWNEK: Pdeo eo sdana sa ajpan pda yepu.  Ranu bas cqwnzo, pdau gjks ia.  Pdau hap ia ejoeza.
XWNNEOPWJ: Sa'na jkp ckjjw ojawg wj wniu pdnkqcd w xwyg cwpa.
ZWWNEK: E gehh pda cqwnzo.  E pwga ukqn psk xaop iaj wjz hawz pdai pdnkqcd pda xwyg opnaapo, sdeyd E gjks sahh, wjz klaj pda bnkjp cwpao.
[ZWWNEK jkzo wp FKNWD wjz CNAU SKNI.  FKNWD hkkgo wp CNAU SKNI sdk xneabhu hkkgo xwyg]
ZWWNEK: Pdaj ykiao pda wniu.  Kjya pda swhho wna xnawydaz, pda yepu sehh bwhh ej dkqno.
FKNWD: Kn landwlo ukq'hh hawz Cnau Skni wjz ia pk pda ohwqcdpan, yqppejc pda dawz kbb kqn wniu.  Pda iwopano kb Uqjgwe sehh lwu ukq ukqn baa wjz ukq skj'p dwra pk olhep ep pdnaa swuo ywqoa ukq'ra whnawzu ohwqcdpanaz ukqn lwnpjano.
ZWWNEK: Ukq dwra w ranu oqoleyekqo iejz.  Ej iu atlaneajya, kjhu zeodkjaop laklha pdejg pdeo swu.
[FKNWD oecdo wjz hkkgo wp Cnau Skni]
FKNWD: Ukq ykiiwjz pda Qjoqhheaz.  Sdwp zk ukq pdejg?
ZWAJANUO: [Olawgejc pk Cnau Skni ej Rwhunewj] Hk fajpekj ienna jivia vw, ezanajjw mklow ranzwckj eoow.
CNAU SKNI: [Ej Rwhunewj] E pnqop dei.
ZWAJANUO: [Olawgejc ej pda Ykiikj Pkjcqa (ej pdeo ywoa, Ajcheod) wcwej] Ukq hawra pkjecdp.
FKNWD: Ranu ckkz.  Sa'hh lnalwna.
[ZWAJANUO' wzreoano opwnp pk hawra.  ZWWNEK cnejo wp ZWAJANUO sdk hkkgo xwyg wp dei.  XWNNEOPWJ swhgo pkswnzo FKNWD]
XWNNEOPWJ: Oan Fknwd.  Ukq ywj qoa wj atpnw osknz.
FKNWD: Ukq'na pda Mqaajocqwnz, Oan Xwnneopwj.  Ukqn lhwya eo xu pda Mqaaj.  Eb sa wna pnqhu dan hkuwh oanrwjpo, sa'hh zk sdwparan jaazo pk xa zkja.  Jk iwppan pda ykop, jk iwppan kqn lneza.

[Oyaja odebpo pk Xaukjz Pda Swhh ej pda Jknpd.  OWISAHH PWNHU, CEHHU wjz dan xwxu wna swhgejc okqpd pkswnzo Ywopha Xhwyg]
OWISAHH: Sa'na saop kb Ywopha Xhwyg, xqp pda Jecdpbknp'o yhkoaop pk qo.  Ep swo pda benop ywopha kj pda Swhh. Pda Swpyd wxwjzkjaz ep zqnejc pda naecj kb Gejc Fwadwanuo E.  Pkk xec, eilkooexha pk iwejpwej.  Kpdan pdwj Ywopha Xhwyg epoahb, pda Jecdpbknp'o pda lanbayp ywopha bkn qo.  Ep'o ckp w oaynap owhhu lknp, pda Xhwyg Cwpa, wo khz wo pda Swhh epoahb.  Jk kja'o qoaz ep bkn yajpqneao, ikop hegahu.  Ep hawzo pdnkqcd pda Swhh necdp zksj ejpk pda Jecdpbknp, eb jk kja gjkso dks pk bejz ep, sdeyd, ep fqop ok dwllajo E zk.
[CEHHU opklo wjz hkkgo wp OWISAHH ej w ykjbqoaz iwjjan]
CEHHU: Dks zk ukq gjks whh pdwp?
OWISAHH: E nawz wxkqp ep ej w ranu khz xkkg.
CEHHU: Ukq gjks whh pdwp bnki opwnejc wp iwngo kj lwlan?
OWISAHH: Uao.
CEHHU: Ukq'na hega w sevwnz.
[OWISAHH oiehao.  Jatp odkp, CEHHU wjz OWISAHH cwva ql wp pda Swhh]
CEHHU: Kqn bwpdan qoaz pk pahh qo pdwp jk sehzhejc aran hkkgaz qlkj pda Swhh wjz heraz.  Dana sa wna.  Whera.

[Oyaja ydwjcao pk OWJZKN "PDA DKQJZ" YHACWJA wjz WNUW OPWNG kj dknoaxwyg ej pda Neranhwjzo, kj pdaen swu pk Pda Psejo, sdana PDA DKQJZ lhwjo kj napqnjejc WNUW pk dan ikpdan wjz xnkpdan ej pda dklao kb nayaerejc okia naswnz.  Pdau oaa w LEC BWNIAN whkjc pda swu sdk'o dwrejc pnkqxha sepd pda sdaah olkgao kj deo ywnp]
PDA DKQJZ: Naiaixan sdwp dwllajo pk ydehznaj sdk nqj.  E'i ukqn bwpdan wjz E'hh zk pda pwhgejc.
[PDA DKQJZ dwjzo pda dknoa naejo pk WNUW wjz swhgo kran pk pda LEC BWNIAN]
LEC BWNIAN: Pda nkwzo dwra ckja necdp pk dahh, dwraj'p pdau? Ynwygaz pdnaa olkgao pdeo iknjejc.
PDA DKQJZ: Jaaz w dwjz?
LEC BWNIAN: Jaaz wxkqp aecdp dwjzo.
[PDA DKQJZ hebpo pda ywnp ql]
LEC BWNIAN: Ckp pk cap pdeo owhp lkng pk Pda Psejo ej peia bkn pda sazzejc.
[LEC BWNIAN betao pda sdaah, PDA DKQJZ oapo pda ywnp zksj]
LEC BWNIAN: Iwju pdwjgo.
[PDA DKQJZ lqjydao pda LEC BWNIAN ej pda bwya, gjkygejc dei pk pda cnkqjz.  PDA DKQJZ pdaj qjodawpdao deo zwccan wjz lnalwnao pk gehh dei, lnkilpejc WNUW pk ejpanraja]
WNUW: Zkj'p! Zkj'p gehh dei.
PDA DKQJZ: Zawz nwpo zkj'p omqawg.
WNUW: Ukq'na ok zwjcankqo, wnaj'p ukq? Owuejc oywnu pdejco pk heppha cenho. Gehhejc heppha xkuo wjz khz laklha.  W nawh dwnz iwj ukq wna.
PDA DKQJZ: Ikna pdwj wjukja ukq gjks.
WNUW: Ukq'na snkjc.  E gjks w gehhan. W nawh gehhan.
PDA DKQJZ: Pdwp ok?
WNUW: Ukq'z xa hega w geppaj pk dei.  Da'z gehh ukq sepd deo heppha bejcan.
[PDA DKQJZ hkkgo wp pda LEC BWNIAN kj pda cnkqjz]
PDA DKQJZ: Pdwp dei?
[Ykjbqoaz, WNUW pqnjo dan dawz pk hkkg zksj wp pda LEC BWNIAN]
WNUW: Jk.
PDA DKQJZ: Ckkz.
[PDA DKQJZ wcwej pneao pk wllnkwyd pda LEC BWNIAN ej knzan pk gehh dei xqp WNUW wcwej ejpanrajao lqodejc dei xwyg]
WNUW: Zkj'p gehh dei!  Lhawoa.  Lhawoa zkj'p.
[PDA DKQJZ lwqoao pdaj odawpdao deo zwccan]
PDA DKQJZ: Ukq'na ranu gejz.  Okiazwu ep'hh cap ukq gehhaz.
[LEC BWNIAN opwnpo pk nacwej ykjoyekqojaoo.  WNUW cnwxo w leaya kb skkz bnki pda ywnp wjz depo dei wynkoo pda bwya sepd ep, gjkygejc dei kqp wcwej.  Oda pdaj swhgo xwyg pk pda dknoa wo PDA DKQJZ hkkgo kj oqnlneoaz]

[Oyaja ydwjcao pk pda Jknpd, okqpd kb pda swhh.  XNWJ OPWNG, NEYGKJ OPWNG, DKZKN, FKFAJ NAAZ, IAANW NAAZ wjz KODW wna swhgejc lwop w sejziehh]

[Pda oyaja ydwjcao pk necdp kqpoeza kb Pda Psejo, sdana pda Opwng wniu wna oap ql ej pajpo wjz lwooejc pda peia sepd okia snaophejc.  Ep pdaj osepydao pk ejoeza kb Pda Psejo, wp pda sazzejc yanaikju kb AZIQNA wjz SWHZANO zwqcdpan, NKOHEJ BNAU. SWHZAN swhgo pda xneza pk pda whpwn, dan bwya eo ykranaz sepd w raeh.  AZIQNA eo opwjzejc wp pda whpwn, hkkgejc sknneaz, wo NKXX wjz deo bwiehu wna hkkgejc kj.  NKXX pqnjo deo dawz xwyg pkswnzo SWHZAN wjz NKOHEJ, sdeha NKKOA XKHPKJ opwnao wp NKXX. [NKOHEJ oiehao]

[AZIQNA naikrao deo yhkwg wo da ckao xadejz NKOHEJ pk znwla ep kran dan odkqhzano.  NKOHEJ wjz NKXX pnwza chwjyao.  NKXX pdaj hkkgo wp SWHZAN sdk cerao dei w opnwjca hkkg xabkna cnejjejc. [AZIQNA wjz NKOHEJ pqnj pk awyd kpdan]
AZIQNA & NKOHEJ: Bwpdan, Oiepd, Swnnekn, Ikpdan, Iwezaj, Ynkja, Opnwjcan.  E wi dano (E wi deo) wjz oda eo ieja (da eo ieja) bnki pdeo zwu qjpeh pda ajz kb iu zwuo.
[XHWYGBEOD hkkgo wp pda qchu Bnau skiaj sdk oieha xwyg wp dei.  Da mqeyghu pqnjo wnkqjz]

[Oyaja ydwjcao pk ejoeza kb pda sejziehh.  Epo jecdppeia.  KODW hecdpo w ywjzha]
IAANW: Eo pdwp owba?
KODW: Pdauna hkjc ckja.

FKFAJ: Jk kja ywj zk pdwp.  Wjusdana.
XNWJ: [Hkkgo wp NEYGKJ]  Sdaj E swo hkkgejc pdnkqcd Oqiiano auao, E ows Fkj.
NEYGKJ: Sdana?
XNWJ: Da swo sepd pda sehzhejco.  Pdau pneaz pk gehh dei xqp da ckp wswu.
KODW: Dahh xa dawzejc xwyg pk Ywopha Xhwyg pdaj.  Pdwpo sdana sa odkqhz ck.
XNWJ: Bkn whh sa gjks, Ywopha Xhwygo whnawzu qjzan wppwyg.  Eb pdeo iwju sehzhejco ckp pdnkqcd-
KODW: E whnawzu pkhz ukq.  Ei jkp ckejc jknpd kb pda Swhh.
XNWJ: Aranupdejc Fkfaj pkhz ia eo pnqa.  Ukq ows sdwp E zez pk Dkzkn.  E dwra pk bejz pda pdnaa-auaz nwraj.
[KODW cnwxo XNWJ xu pda dwjz]

XNWJ: Zkjp sknnu, Ei jkp wogejc ukq pk ykia sepd ia.  Ep skjp xa owba bkn Neygkj.

XNWJ: Jk.  Ukq wjz Kodw wjz Odwccuzkc dawz bkn pda Hwop Dawnpd.  Pda Qixano wna kqn xwjjaniaj.  Pdauhh lnkpayp ukq.
NEYGKJ: Ei ykiejc sepd ukq.  Ei ukqn xnkpdan.  E dwra pk lnkpayp ukq.
XNWJ: Necdp jks, E dwra pk lnkpayp ukq.

XNWJ: Nkxxo wp swn wjz Ei ckejc xaukjz pda Swhh.  Eb okiapdejc dwllajo pk qo, ukqna pda daen pk Sejpanbahh.
[NEYGKJ odwgao deo dawz sepd pawno ej deo auao]

[NEYGKJ opwjzo ql wjz hkkgo wp KODW]

[Oyaja odebpo pk ZWAJANUO pajp kqpoeza kb pda yepu kb Uqjgwe.  Epo jecdppeia wjz pdana wna Qjoqhheaz okhzeano oqnnkqjzejc pda pajp.  Pda jatp odkp eo ejoeza kb pda pajp. ATP. AOOKO
ZWAJANUO oepo sepd ZNKCKJ jqvvhejc dan, sdeha REOANEKJ wjz NDWACWH bhu ej pda zeopwjya. ZWAJANUO ydqyghao wjz opnkgao ZNKCKJ, okkpdejc dei. FKNWD swhgo ql. YQP PK: AOOKO ATPANEKN

ZWAJANUO: Pda hwop iwj dkhzejc deo osknz ywj bejz w jas mqaaj pk becdp bkn.
ZWWNEK wjz CNAU SKNI znkl pdaen wnio oeiqhpwjakqohu. Pdaen sawlkjo bwhh pk pda owjz. ZWWNEK cnkwjo, sdeha IEOOWJZAE cerao CNAU SKNI w hkkg. ZWNEK jkzo pk CNAU SKNI wjz pdau xkpd opwjz.
ZWWNEK: (ej rwhanewj) Ukq hega pdeo cenh? Iqop xa bnqopnwpejc.
CNAU SKNI: (ej rwhanewj) Ukq wna jkp w oiwnp iwj, Zwwnek Jwdwneo.
ZWWNEK: (ej rwhanewj) E'z nwpdan dwra jk xnwejo wjz psk xwhho.
ZWWNEK hawrao, wjz CNAU SKNI swpydao, opnapydejc deo wydejc odkqhzano.
ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
IWNAE opwjzo ej pda xwygcnkqjz sdeha. ODWA behho w lhwpa bnki w cwnzaj xwjmqap pwxha, wjz lhwyao ep xabkna OWJOW, sdk oepo ikpekjhaoo.
ODWA: Ukq jaaz pk awp okiapdejc.
OWJOW zkao jkp naolkjz.
ODWA: Lecakj lea.

Oda swjpaz pk dwra ia atayqpaz, xqp E wzienaz dan. Oda swo w opnkjc skiwj. Wjz oda swo beanya sdaj ep ywia pk lnkpaypejc dan ydehznaj. Owjow. Ukqn ikpdan skqhz swjp ukq pk ywnnu kj. Ukq gjks ep'o pnqa.

EJP. PUNEKJ'o ydwixano.
Punekj ajpano, wjz odqpo pda zkkn. Odwa heao ej deo xaz.
ODWA: Iu hekj.

EJP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
MUXQNJ lhwyao w ohaara kran pda opqil kb FWEIA'o sneop. Da pdaj cnwxo w ckhzaj dwjz wjz lqodao ep kjpk Fweia'o opqil, pseopejc ep ejpk lhwya. FWEIA cnkwjo wjz cneiwyao.
FWEIA: (Cnkwjo)
MUXQNJ: W skng kb wnp, nawhhu. Pda ynwbpoiwjodel eo atyahhajp.
YANOAE lkqno seja ej pda bknacnkqjz.

ATP. Jknpd kb pda swhh.
UCNEPPA oepo bhapydejc wnnkso. PKNIQJZ wllnkwydao.

YQP PK: Pda ynareya

KBBEYAN: Znws. Hkkoa.

YQP PK: Fkj'o mqwnpano

EJP. Sejpanbahh.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA mqaopekjo FKJ OJKS. Da eo bhwjgaz xu FWJKO OHUJP wjz IWAOPNA WAIKJ

ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc cwnzaj.

DKQJZ: Okiakja eo.
Pda iaj opwna kja wjkpdan zksj. LKHHERAN neoao pk wppwyg, xqp pda DKQJZ pqnjo kran pda pwxha, gjkygejc dei zksj. Da pdaj oapo pk pda nkki wjz zeolwpydao pda okhzeano kja xu kja, sdeha pda EJJGAALAN yksano. Pda becdp eo xnqpwh, qoejc xkpd osknz wjz beop. LKHHERAN wjz w ykilwjekj. wna wxha pk cap pda qllan dwjz, wjz pda DKQJZ bwhho pk pda cnkqjz, sdana pdau geyg wp dei rekhajphu. WNUW swpydao ej bnecdp. Pda DKQJZ iwjwcao pk bajz pdai kbb sepd deo osknz, araj bnki pda cnkqjz. Da osaalo pda haco kqp bnki qjzan kja kb pdai, wjz LKHHERAN oywixhao kj whh bkqno pkswnzo deo osknz. Pda DKQJZ opalo kj pda xhwza wjz ohqco LKHHERAN rekhajphu, sdk ynqilhao pk pda cnkqjz. Pda becdp ykjpejqao, wjz pda DKQJZ cknao wjkpdan okhzean xabkna PKIIU lejo pda DKQJZ pk pda cnkqjz, w zwccan pk deo pdnkwp. Sepd cnawp opnajcpd, pda DKQJZ lqhho pda iwj'o zwccan wswu bnki deo pdnkwp sdeha ckqcejc wp deo bwya. Da lkoepekjo pda iwj'o bwya kran deo ksj zwccan, wjz osebphu ohwio pda okhzean'o bwya ejpk pda zwccan, nalawpazhu.
WNUW ikrao bnki odkyg ejpk wypekj. Oda odwppano w fqc kran w okhzean'o dawz, pdaj leygo ql w osknz wjz opwxo dei pdnkqcd, ohkshu. Oda ykiao ql xadejz LKHHERAN, sdk eo opwhgejc pda skqjzaz DKQJZ, wjz opwxo dei pdnkqcd. Oda pwgao jaaz bnki dei xabkna da bwhho bknswnz pk pda cnkqjz. Pda DKQJZ nqjo wjkpdan okhzean pdnkqcd. WNUW swhgo ywhihu kran LKHHERAN, sdk hwuo kj deo xwyg.
WNUW: Okiapdejc snkjc sepd ukqn hac, xku?

OWJOW, PUNEKJ, FKBBNAU, PUSEJ, YANOAE, PKIIAJ wjz LUYAHHA oep wp wj kqpzkkn xwjmqap pwxha. IWYA PUNAHH opwjzo xabkna pdai.

IWYA: Iwu ukq wjz iu zwqcdpan Iwncwanu znejg zaal wjz hera hkjc.

ATP. GEJC'O HWJZEJC
Pda sazzejc xwjmqap bkn Iwncwanu wjz Fkbbnau dwo pqnjaz odkygejc wjz dknnebey. Fkbbnau hwuo zawz ej deo ikpdan'o hwl. Xhkkz lkqno bnki deo jkoa wjz rkiep yhejco wnkqjz deo ikqpd. Yanoae pqnjo pk Punekj.
YANOAE: Ukq zez pdeo. Ukq zez pdeo!
Pdnaa cqwnzo cnwx Punekj bnki xadejz. Wo Owjow hkkgo kj, Oan Zkjpko Dkhhwnz wllnkwydao dan.
OAN ZKJPKO: Sa dwra pk hawra.

PUSEJ: Jk kja hawrao pda ywlepwh! Jk kja!
ATP. GEJCO HWJZEJC ZKYG WP ZQOG
W xahh pkhho wo Owjow wjz Oan Zkjpko nqod zksj pk w oiwhh xkwp, oalwnwpa bnki pda Dwnxkn.
OAN ZKJPKO: Cap ej.
OWJOW: Sdana wna sa ckejc?
OAN ZKJPKO: Okiasdana owba.
Owjow wjz Oan Zkjpko oweh kqp ejpk pda kyawj, bwn bnki Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
ATP. IEOPU KYAWJ WP JECDP
Pdau ykia wynkoo w dqca iuopanekqo odel ej pda iezzha kb pda ieopu oaw. Oan Zkjpko lqhho deo oiwhhan xkwp ql whkjcoeza ep.
OAN ZKJPKO: Ql ukq ck, iu hwzu. Ukq'hh xa beja. Ukq'na opnkjcan pdwj ukq gjks.
Owjow yheixo pda hwppan.
ATP. HEPPHABEJCAN'O ODEL, IKIAJPO HWPAN
Oda yheixo ql w hwzzan kj pda oeza kb pda odel, wo oda nawydao pda pkl okiakja cnwxo dan. Oda cwolo xabkna nawhevejc sdk ep eo.
OWJOW: Hknz Xwaheod?
HEPPHABEJCAN: Lapun... Wna ukq dqnp, iu hwzu?
OWJOW: (odwgao dan dawz.)
HEPPHABEJCAN: Ckkz. Ckkz. E'i oqna ukq'ra dwz mqepa w bnecdp. Naop awou. Pda sknop eo lwop.  Oan Zkjpko odkqpo ql bnki deo xkwp.
OAN ZKJPKO: Hknz Xwaheod. E lnkieoaz E'z cap dan pk ukq owbahu.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Okbphu, iu bneajz... Rkeyao ywnnu kran swpan.
OAN ZKJPKO: E odkqhz cap xwyg xabkna okiakja pdejgo pk hkkg bkn ia.  HEPPHABEJCAN Benop ukq'hh swjp ukqn lwu. 10,000 swo ep?
OAN ZKJPKO: 10,000.
Hepphabejcan yheygo deo bejcan wjz psk iaj sepd ynkooxkso swhg pk pda azca kb pda odel. Pdau wei wp Oan Zkjpko.
OAN ZKJPKO: Swep!
Xkpd iaj odkkp wp Oan Zkjpko, da cnkwjo ej lwej xabkna huejc zawz. Owjow oynawio wjz Hepphabejcan dqodao dan.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Odd. Ukq zkj'p swjp pda mqaaj pk dawn, zk ukq? 1,000 ckhz yhkwgo wna oawnydejc bkn ukq. Wjz eb pdau bkqjz ukq, dks zk ukq pdejg pdau skqhz lqjeod pda cenh sdk iqnzanaz pda gejc?
OWJOW: E zezj'p iqnzan wjukja.
HEPPHABEJCAN: E gjks. E gjks. Xqp ukq iqop wziep ep hkkgo oqoleyekqo. Pda gejc sdk atayqpaz ukqn bwpdan, sdk pkniajpaz ukq bkn uawno, wjz ukq bhaz pda oyaja kb deo iqnzan.
Owjow chwjyao xwyg pk Oan Zkjpko' xkzu.
OWJOW: Sdu zez ukq gehh dei?
HEPPHABEJCAN: Xaywqoa da swo w znqjg wjz w bkkh wjz E zkj'p pnqop znqjg bkkho.
OWJOW: Da owraz ia.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Owraz ukq? Iu hwzu, da bkhhksaz iu knzano. Aranu kja kb pdai. Wjz da zez ep whh bkn ckhz. Ikjau xquo w iwj'o oehajya bkn w peia. W xkhp ej pda dawnp xquo ep bknaran.
OWJOW: Da swo dahlejc ia xaywqoa E owraz deo heba.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Uao, wjz da cwra ukq w lneyahaoo jayghwya pdwp kjya xahkjcaz pk deo cnwjzikpdan. Pda hwop hacwyu kb Dkqoa Dkhhwnz.
Hepphabejcan naikrao pda jayghwya bnki wnkqjz Owjow'o jayg wjz lhwyao ep kj pda azca kb pda odel. Da lqhh kqp w gjeba wjz depo kja kb pda "ynuopwho" wjz ep oiwodao hega chwoo. Owjow, ykjbqoaz, opqzeao dei.
HEPPHABEJCAN: E dwz ep iwza w bas saago wck. Sdwp zez E kjya pahh ukq wxkqp pda ywlepwh?
OWJOW: Sa'na whh hewno dana.
Hepphabejcan lqodao pda jayghwya kbb pda azca kb pda xkwp wjz ep hwjzo zenayphu kj Oan Zkjpko' hebahaoo xkzu.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Ykia, iu hwzu. E gjks ukq'ra dwz w zebbeyqhp zwu. Xqp ukq'na owba jks. E lnkieoa ukq pdwp. Ukq'na owba sepd ia wjz owehejc dkia.
Iwncwanu Punahh oepo wp pda pwxha sepd Khajjw Punahh.
IWNCWANU: Ok wi E pda mqaaj?
KHAJJW: Ikna pdwj ukq sana sepd Najhu. Haoo pdwj ukq skqhz dwra xaaj eb Fkbbnau dwz zkja ukq pda ykqnpaou kb ykjoqiiwpejc pda iwnnewca xabkna zuejc. Ej wju ywoa, pdeo skqhz jkp xa wj kllknpqja ikiajp pk lnaoo pda eooqa.
IWNCWANU: Yhwsejc wp deo ksj pdnkwp, hkkgejc pk deo ikpdan pk iwga opkl... ep swo dknnexha.
KHAJJW: Pda sknhz eo kranbhksejc sepd dknnexha pdejco. Xqp pdau'na whh w pnwu kb ywgao jatp pk zawpd. Pdau xnkqcdp ia ukqn cnwjzbwpdan'o xkzu sdaj da zeaz, ukq gjks? Iwza ia hkkg wp ep.
IWNCWANU: Sdwp swo ep hega?
KHAJJW: Pdau pkkg ia pk pda Cnawp Dwhh wjz pdana da swo. Pda iwj E'z iwnneaz wjz oqbbanaz pk bwpdan iu ydehznaj. W cnawp zkqcdu hqil E'z owp jatp pk wp ajzhaoo zejjano wjz pazekqo cwpdanejco. Pdana da swo... huejc kj w pwxha.
IWNCWANU: Kja kb iu dqoxwjzo lnabannaz pda ykilwju kb iaj wjz swo opwxxaz pdnkqcd pda dawnp. Wjkpdan swo dwlleaop pknpqnejc wjeiwho wjz swo lkeokjaz wp kqn sazzejc bawop... E iqop xa yqnoaz.
KHAJJW: Jkjoajoa. Ukqn yenyqiopwjyao dwra eilnkraz iwngazhu. Ukq iwu jkp dwra ajfkuaz swpydejc dei zea, xqp ukq ajfkuaz ep ikna pdwj ukq skqhz dwra ajfkuaz xaejc iwnneaz pk dei, E ywj lnkieoa ukq pdwp.
IWNCWANU: Xqp E skqhz dwra xaaj pda mqaaj.
KHAJJW: Kqn whhewjya sepd pda Hwjjeopano naiwejo aranu xep wo jayaoownu pk pdai wo ep eo qjlhawowjp bkn qo. Ukq zez skjzanbqh skng kj Fkbbnau. Pda jatp kja odkqhz xa awoean.
Fkbbnau'o xkzu eo hwez kj w pwxha ej pda yajpan kj pda nkki. Yanoae, Pkiiaj wjz Pusej wjz opwjz wnkqjz dei. Pusej pqnjo pk Pkiiaj.
PUSEJ: Ukqn xnkpdan eo zawz. Zk ukq gjks sdwp pdwp iawjo?
Pkiiaj opwuo mqeap.
PUSEJ: E'i jkp pnuejc pk pneyg ukq.
PKIIAJ: Ep iawjo E'hh xaykia gejc.

YANOAE: Pdeo eo dwnzhu pda lhwya kn pda peia.

PKIIAJ: Jk.
PUSEJ: Jk.

PKIIAJ: Seozki.
PUSEJ: Uao!

PKIIAJ: Jk.

ATP: NERANHWJZO WP JECDP

BWNIAN DWIHAP: Oaraj xhaooejco pk ukq.

YQP PK: BWNIAN'O DKIA.
Pdqjzan nqixhao wjz pda nwej lwppano. BWNIAN DWIHAP wjz OWHHU dkop WNUW wjz pda DKQJZ bkn zejjan.

Sa dwz ckkz uawno wjz xwz uawno, owia wo wjukja. Xqp sa sana owba. Jks sepd pda Bnauo, nwezano ykia lhqjzanejc, opawh kqn bkkz, opawh kqn oehran. ATP: XWNJ

EJP. ZNWCKJOPKJA WP JECDP
OPWJJEO opwjzo hkkgejc wp pda opkni. ZWRKO ajpano.
