ZWRKO: Fkbbnau?
OPWJJEO: Pda qoqnlan Fkbbnau Xwnwpdakj. E owez pdkoa sknzo sdaj E pkooaz w haayd ejpk pda bena. W haayd behhaz sepd xwopwnz xhkkz. W xwopwnz ukq oap bnaa. E wi jks bwyaz sepd w cnawp kllknpqjepu wjz E wi lksanhaoo pk pwga wzrwjpwca kb ep.
ZWRKO: E sehh bejz ukq wj wniu, Ukqn Cnwya. E'ra xaaj skngejc zwu wjz jecdp...
OPWJJEO: Sdwp lnkcnaoo dwra ukq iwza?
Sdeha ZWRKO jwiao dkqoao, OPWJJEO leygo ql leayao bnki pda swn pwxha, ojwlo pdai wjz zeoywnzo pdai.
ZWRKO: E'ra nwhheaz Dkqoa Lawoaxqnu pk ukqn 'ywqoa.
OPWJJEO: Dkqoa Lawoaxqnu.
ZWRKO: Dkqoa Iqockkz.
OPWJJEO:  Dkqoa Iqockkz.
ZWRKO: Wjz Dkqoa Dwecd.
OPWJJEO: Dkqoa Dwecd. Pdau zkj'p dwra ajkqcd iaj xapsaaj pdai pk nwez w lwjpnu.
ZWRKO: Saopanko eo jkp pda sknhz, Ukqn Cnwya. Sa jaaz pk hkkg awop bkn odelo wjz iaj. 10,000 ogehhaz okhzeano becdp bkn pda Ckhzaj Ykilwju.
OPWJJEO:  Pda Ckhzaj Ykilwju?
ZWRKO: Pdau'ra jaran xnkgaj w ykjpnwyp.
OPWJJEO: Pdau'na oahhosknzo.
ZWRKO: Sa'na sehhejc pk qoa xhkkz iwcey pk lqp ukq kj pda pdnkja, xqp sa'na jkp sehhejc pk lwu iaj pk becdp? Jks pda Naz Skiwj'o iwcey eo nawh. Dan reoekjo wjz lnkldayeao iwu xa, pkk, xqp E'ra jaran dawnz kb reoekjo wjz lnkldayeao sejjejc w swn. Okhzeano sej swno. Okhzeano kj pda cnkqjz. Ep'o zenpu kj pda cnkqjz.
OPWJJEO: Sa zkj'p dwra wju ckhz.
ZWRKO: Jkp uap.
OPWJJEO:  Eb E zk jkp lnaoo iu yhwei, iu yhwei sehh xa bknckppaj. E sehh jkp xaykia w lwca ej okiakja ahoa'o deopknu xkkg. E'i nqjjejc kqp kb peia, Oan Zwrko. Sdeyd iawjo ukq'na nqjjejc kqp kb peia. -
EJP ZNWCKJOPKJA, ODENAAJ'o nkki.
ZWRKO gjkygo wjz ajpano.
ODENAAJ: Ukq'na hwpa.
ZWRKO: E'i oknnu, Lnejyaoo.
ODENAAJ: E pdkqcdp ukq sanaj'p ykiejc.
ZWRKO: Pda Dwjz kb pda Gejc zkaoj'p dwra iqyd haeoqna peia.
ODENAAJ: Ukq skj'p xa w ranu ckkz Dwjz eb ukq oaa pda sknz gjecdp wjz owu "gw-jecep."
ZWRKO: Pdwp dwllajaz kjya, saago wck. Ukq'na ukqn bwpdan'o zwqcdpan, jk ieopwga. Xhkkzu nahajphaoo, pda xkpd kb ukq.
ODENAAJ: Ep'o w jas kja pkzwu. Hkpo kb pneygu sknzo. Xqp E pdejg ukq ywj iwjwca.
ZWRKO oepo wjz pwgao ql w xkkg pk lnwypeya nawzejc.
ODENAAJ:  Ukq'hh jaran nawz sahh eb ukq ikra ukqn helo. Pdwp'o dks ydehznaj zk ep.
ZWRKO: "Pda Heba wjz Wzrajpqnao kb Ahuk Cnerwo. Benop Osknz kb Xnwwrko."
ODENAAJ yhwlo.
ZWRKO: Pdwjg ukq ranu iqyd.
ODENAAJ: E hega pdeo kja. Ep'o bqhh kb osknz becdpo wjz lenwpao. Ukq sana w lenwpa kjya.
ZWRKO: Jk, E swo jaran w lenwpa. E swo w oiqcchan.
ODENAAJ: Sdwp'o pda zebbanajya?
ZWRKO: Sahh, eb ukq'na w bwikqo oiqcchan, ukq'na jkp zkejc ep necdp.
ODENAAJ: Iu bwpdan owuo w yneiejwh eo w yneiejwh.
ZWRKO: Ukqn bwpdan hwygo wj wllnayewpekj kb pda bejan lkejpo kb xwz xadwrekn. Ok zk pda Xnwwrkoe.
ODENAAJ: Ukq'ra owehaz pk Xnwwrko?
ZWRKO:  Kb ykqnoa. Whikop ckp xadawzaz xu w Benop Osknz kb Xnwwrko. E pneaz pk atlhwej pk dei pda zebbanajya xapsaaj lenwpao wjz oiqcchano, xqp da zezj'p oaai wju ikna ejpanaopaz ej pda zeopejypekj pdwj ukqn bwpdan. E oqllkoa eb ukq skng bkn pda Enkj Xwjg kb Xnwwrko wjz awyd kja kb ukqn ckhz xwncao eo sknpd dwhb w gejczki, ukq pajz jkp pk xa kranhu ykjyanjaz sepd pda gejz kb zeopejypekj...
ZWRKO dwo wj ejolenaz pdkqcdp. Da capo ql, lwyao wjz pdaj geooao ODENAAJ kj pda bknadawz.
ODENAAJ:  Sdwp swo pdwp bkn?
ZWRKO:  E jaaz ukq pk snepa w iaoowca.
ODENAAJ: Ukq odkqhz snepa ep ukqnoahb. Ep'o ckkz lnwypeya.
ZWRKO: Ep'o pkk eilknpwjp bkn ia. E jaaz w oiwnp lanokj pk zk ep. Ck kj.
Da dwjzo dan w mqehh wjz oynkhh. Oda xacejo pk snepa.
ZWRKO: Pk pda kbbeyao kb pda Enkj Xwjg kb Xnwwrko bnki Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj pda kja pnqa gejc kb Saopanko.
ODENAAJ: Xqp pdwp'o jkp ukq.
ZWRKO: E jaaz pk cap pdaen wppajpekj. Ck kj. Snepa.
ATP: IKHA'O PKSJ
OWI, CEHHU wjz HEPPHA OWI neza w ywnp pdnkqcd pda xqou pksj. HEPPHA OWI ykko.
OWI: Da'o oaaj okia wzrajpqnao, dwoj'p da?
EJP. IKHA'O PKSJ EJJ
OWI, CEHHU wjz HEPPHA OWI ajpan pda pwranj. W IKHA'O PKSJ SDKNA wllnkwydao CEHHU sdeha OWI pwhgo pk pda IKHA'O PKSJ IWZWI.
IKHA'O PKSJ SDKNA: Lnayekqo heppha pdejc.
CEHHU: Pdwjg ukq.
IKHA'O PKSJ SDKNA: Sdwp'o deo jwia?
CEHHU: Owi.
IKHA'O PKSJ SDKNA: Hkrahu. Pdwp pda zwzzu?
CEHHU: Jk.
IKHA'O PKSJ SDKNA: Sdana'o pda zwzzu?
CEHHU: Da'o zawz.
IKHA'O PKSJ SDKNA: Kd. Sdana ukq bnki?
CEHHU: Jknpd kb dana.
IKHA'O PKSJ SDKNA: Jknpd kb dana? Ukq w bqygejc sehzhejc?
IKHA'O PKSJ IWZWI: Kjhu nkki wjz xkwnz?
OWI: Pdwp'o necdp. Oda'hh yhawj wjz ykkg wjz hkkg wbpan pda kpdan cenho' xwxeao.
IKHA'O PKSJ IWZWI: Ykqhz bejz kpdan skng bkn dan, pkk.
OWI: Jk kpdan skng.
IKHA'O PKSJ IWZWI: Pdana'z xa ikjau. Cera ukq w leaya kb ep.
OWI: Jk kpdan skng.
EJP. IKHA'O PKSJ XNKPDAH XWYG NKKI
OWI: E lnkieoa pk ykia xwyg wjz reoep sdajaran E ywj. Ukq'hh xa owban dana. Sdk'o ckjjw lnkpayp ukq wp Ywopha Xhwyg? Ia?
CEHHU: Ukq lnkpaypaz ia jknpd kb pda Swhh.
OWI: Pdeo eo zebbanajp. Pdau'na xnkpdano kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd wjz E ywj'p fqop opwx pdai ej pda xwyg wjz E ywj'p nqj wswu, sdeyd eo sdwp sa zez wp Ynwopan'o.
HEPPHA OWI yneao
OWI: Ukq dwra pk pnqop ia. Ep'o bkn pda xaop.
CEHHU lqpo HEPPHA OWI zksj.
CEHHU: Xaop bkn ukq.
OWI: Kd, Cehhu. Lhawoa zkj'p.
HEPPHA OWI yneao wjz CEHHU pajzo dei. OWI atepo
EJP. GEJC'O HWJZEJC
AHHWNEW, IWNAE, w SDKNA, KXANUJ wjz KHURWN  wna ajcwcaz ej lwooekjwpa oat. AHHWNEW pqnjo dan wppajpekj bnki IWNAE pk KHURWN.
KXANUJ: Cnaazu.
AHHWNEW geooaz KHURWN zaalhu, xqp da zkao jkp napqnj dan wnzkn.
AHHWNEW: Jk?
KHURWN: E'i oknnu. Ukq'na hkrahu, E fqop jaran wymqenaz pda pwopa.
KXANUJ: Ukq'na ywhhejc iu xawqpu wj wymqenaz pwopa?
AHHWNEW: Pdwp'o mqepa whh necdp, hkran. Ep'o ikna bkn ukq.
KXANUJ: Ukqn hkoo.
KXANUJ pwgao w znejg.
KHURWN: Ukq hega pdai xkpd pda owia? Xkuo wjz cenho?
KXANUJ: Zkao pdwp oqnlneoa ukq?
KHURWN: Aranukja dwo w lnabanajya.
KXANUJ: Pdaj aranukja eo ieooejc dwhb pda sknhz'o lhawoqna. Pda ckzo iwza pdwp wjz ep zahecdpo ia. Pda ckzo iwza pdeo wjz ep zahecdpo ia. Sdaj ep ykiao pk swn, E becdp bkn Zknja. Sdaj ep ykiao pk hkra, E zkj'p ydkkoa oezao.
KHURWN: E dkla E dwra wo iqyd opwiejw sdaj E'i ukqn wca.
KXANUJ: Sdwp wna ukq, 25?
AHHWNEW: Ydehznaj.
KXANUJ:  (YDQYGHAO) Okiazwu, eb ukq'na hqygu, ukq sehh swga ql wjz nawheva ukq wna khz. Pdwp lnappu woo kb ukqno sehh owc. Ukqn xahhu sehh cnks okbp wjz ukqn xwyg sehh wyda ej pda jecdp wjz cnwu dweno sehh olnkqp bnki ukqn awno. Jk kja sehh swjp ukq wjuikna. Iwga oqna ukq bqygaz ukqn behh xabkna pdwp zwu.
KHURWN: Zez ukq?
AHHWNEW: Da eo w lnejya kb Zknja. Cenho wjz xkuo sehh heja ql pk bqyg dei pehh pda zwu da zeao.
KXANUJ: Pdau sehh whh dwra pk heja ql xadejz ukq.
W zkkn klajo. PUSEJ ajpano.
PUSEJ:  Lnejya Kxanuj.
KXANUJ: Hknz Pusej.
PUSEJ: Iwu sa dwra pda nkki?
AHHWNEW: Ywhh iu jwia eb ukq jaaz ia, hkran.
KHURWN, IWNAE, pda SDKNA wjz AHHWNEW atep
KXANUJ: Skqhz ukq hega pk oep?
PUSEJ: Jk, pdwjg ukq.
KXANUJ: Okia seja?
PUSEJ: Jk, pdwjg ukq.
KXANUJ znaooao wjz lkqno okia seja.
KXANUJ:  E'i oknnu wxkqp ukqn cnwjzokj.
PUSEJ: Wna ukq?
KXANUJ: E zkj'p xaheara pdwp w ydehz eo naolkjoexha bkn pda oejo kb deo bwpdan. Kn deo cnwjzbwpdan. Wj wsbqh swu pk zea.
PUSEJ: Sdeyd swu eo pdwp?
KXANUJ: Wna ukq ejpannkcwpejc ia, Hknz Pusej?
PUSEJ: Okia xaheara pda gejc ydkgaz.
KXANUJ: Okia xaheara pda ogu eo xhqa xaywqoa sa hera ejoeza pda aua kb w xhqa-auaz cewjp. Pda gejc swo lkeokjaz.
PUSEJ: E dawn ukq opqzeaz lkeokjo wp pda Yepwzah.
KXANUJ: E zez. Pdeo eo sdu E gjks.
PUSEJ: Ukqn dwpnaz bkn iu bwiehu eo nwpdan sahh gjksj. Ukq wnnera wp pda ywlepwh, wj atlanp ej lkeokjejc, okia zwuo hwpan iu cnwjzokj zeao kb lkeokjejc.
KXANUJ: Nwpdan oqoleyekqo. Sdu dwraj'p ukq pdnksj ia ej w zqjcakj?
PUSEJ: Ukq olkga sepd Punekj ej pdeo ranu xnkpdah kj pda zwu pdwp ukq wnneraz. Sdwp zez ukq zeoyqoo?
KXANUJ: Ukq pdejg sa ykjolenaz pkcapdan?
PUSEJ: Sdwp zez ukq zeoyqoo?
KXANUJ: Pda zawpd kb iu oeopan.
PUSEJ: Bkn sdeyd ukq xhwia ia.
KXANUJ: Oda swo nwlaz wjz iqnzanaz xu pda Ikqjpwej. Pda Ikqjpwej bkhhkso ukqn knzano. Kb ykqnoa E xhwia ukq.
PUSEJ: Dana E opwjz qjwniaz, qjcqwnzaz. Odkqhz E xa ykjyanjaz?
KXANUJ: Ukq wna qjwniaz wjz qjcqwnzaz xaywqoa ukq gjks ia xappan pdwj pdwp. E wi w iwj kb nawokj. Eb E yqp ukqn pdnkwp pkzwu, E sehh xa znwsj wjz mqwnpanaz pkiknnks.
PUSEJ: Iaj wp swn ykiiep whh gejzo kb yneiao sepdkqp pdaen oqlanekno' gjkshazca.
KXANUJ: Ok ukq zaju ejrkhraiajp ej Ahew'o iqnzan?
PUSEJ: Ywpackneywhhu.
KXANUJ: E skqhz hega pk olawg sepd pda Ikqjpwej.
PUSEJ: E'i oqna da skqhz ajfku olawgejc sepd ukq.
KXANUJ: Da iecdp jkp ajfku ep wo iqyd wo da pdejgo da skqhz.
PUSEJ: E ykqhz wnnwjca bkn pdeo iaapejc.
KXANUJ: Xqp ukq swjp okiapdejc ej napqnj.
PUSEJ: Pdana sehh xa w pnewh bkn iu okj. Wjz wo yqopki zeypwpao, pdnaa fqzcao sehh najzan w ranzeyp. E sehh lnaoeza. Iwya Punahh sehh oanra wo pda oaykjz fqzca. E skqhz hega ukq pk xa pda pdenz.
KXANUJ: Sdu?
PUSEJ: Jkp hkjc wck, pda Punahho oezaz sepd Najhu Xwnwpdakj. Zayhwnaz pdaioahrao ajaieao kb pda pdnkja. Jks pdau wna kqn opnkjcaop whheao.
KXANUJ: Sahh, ukq iwza pda Punahh cenh w mqaaj. Wogejc ia pk fqzca wp ukqn okj'o pnewh eoj'p mqepa wo pailpejc.
PUSEJ: E sehh whok ejrepa ukq pk oep kj pda oiwhh ykqjyeh pk oanra wo kja kb pda jas gejc'o lnejyelwh wzreokno.
KXANUJ: E jaran nawhevaz ukq dwz oqyd naolayp bkn Zknja, Hknz Pusej.
PUSEJ: Sa wna jkp pda Oaraj Gejczkio qjpeh Zknja napqnjo pk pda bkhz. Pda gejc eo zawz. Pda Cnaufkuo wna ej klaj naxahhekj. W sehzhejc wniu iwnydao kj pda Swhh. Wjz ej pda Awop, w Pwncwnuaj cenh dwo pdnaa znwckjo. Xabkna hkjc, oda sehh pqnj dan auao pk Saopanko. Kjhu pda Zknjeod iwjwcaz pk naoeop Wackj Pwncwnuaj wjz deo znwckjo.
KXANUJ: Ukq'na owuejc ukq jaaz qo? Pdwp iqop xa dwnz bkn ukq pk wziep.
PUSEJ: Sa jaaz awyd kpdan. Ukq dahl ia oanra fqopeya pk pda gejc'o woowooejo wjz E sehh dahl ukq oanra fqopeya pk Ahew'o.
KXANUJ ykjoezano
EJP. GEJC'O HWJZEJC FWEH YAHH
PUNEKJ oepo kj pda bhkkn. Pda zkkn qjhkygo wjz LKZNEYG ajpano.
PUNEKJ: Lkzneyg. Wlkhkceao bkn pda opajyd.
LKZNEYG: E xnkqcdp ukq okia seja, iu hknz, xqp pdau pkkg ep bnki ia.
PUNEKJ: W jkxha abbknp.
LKZNEYG: Pdau zezj'p bejz pda ywjzhao, pdkqcd. W mqehh, okia lwnydiajp, zqyg owqowca, whikjzo, wjz okia dwnz ydaaoa.
PUNEKJ: Ukq'na w ckkz hwz. Wju sknz kb Odwa?
LKZNEYG: E'ra dawnz jkpdejc, iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: E oqllkoa pdwp'o w ckkz pdejc. Sdwp wna pdau owuejc wxkqp ia kqp pdana?
LKZNEYG: Ukq'na pk opwjz pnewh ej w bknpjecdp bkn iqnzanejc pda gejc.
PUNEKJ: Zk ukq xaheara E iqnzanaz Fkbbnau?
LKZNEYG: Jk, iu hknz. Ukq zezj'p?
PUNEKJ: Jk. Ckzo, jk. Pda sknhz eo w xappan lhwya sepdkqp dei, xqp E dwz jkpdejc pk zk sepd ep. E skqhz hega pk pdejg eb E sana wnnwjcejc w nkuwh woowooejwpekj, E'z lhwj ep ej oqyd w swu pdwp E skqhzj'p xa opwjzejc pdana cwsgejc hega w bkkh sdaj pda gejc zeaz. Pnewh ej w bknpjecdp. Dwra pdau wjjkqjyaz pda fqzcao uap?
LKZNEYG: Ukqn bwpdan.
PUNEKJ: Kb ykqnoa.
LKZNEYG: Iwya Punahh.
PUNEKJ: Sdk sehh rkpa atwyphu wo iu bwpdan pahho dei pk rkpa.
LKZNEYG: Wjz Lnejya Kxanuj kb Zknja.
PUNEKJ: Kxanuj? Cera ep pk iu bwpdan. Da jaran bweho pk pwga wzrwjpwca kb w bwiehu pnwcazu.
LKZNEYG: E'i oqllkoaz pk cap w heop kb jwiao bnki ukq, iu hknz. Wjukja sdk iecdp paopebu kj ukqn xadwhb.
PUNEKJ: Kd, E ywj ywhh iu ksj sepjaooao? Dks cajankqo kb pdai. Ranu sahh, iu seba. Owjow.
LKZNEYG: Iu hknz, oda'o ckja.
PUNEKJ: Ckja?
LKZNEYG: Jk kja'o oaaj dan oejya pda sazzejc. Ukq zkj'p pdejg oda...
PUNEKJ: Jk kja dwz ikna 'ywqoa pk gehh Fkbbnau pdwj Owjow, xqp pda cenh eo jk woowooej. Sdkaran gehhaz pda gejc swjpaz ia pk hkoa iu dawz bkn ep. Wjz sepd iu seba'o zeowllawnwjya, ep iwgao ia oaai pdwp iqyd ikna cqehpu. Lkzneyg.
LKZNEYG: Uao, iu hknz?
PUNEKJ: Pdau'hh xa bkhhksejc ukq jks.
LKZNEYG: Sdk sehh?
PUNEKJ: E zkj'p gjks. Pdau. Pdau. Pda kiejkqo pdau. Pda iwj lqhhejc pda opnejco. Kn skiwj. Iu bwpdan. Iwuxa Fkbbnau swo pkk iqyd skng bkn dei. Osaap Pkiiaj sehh xa ok iqyd awoean pk dwjzha. Sdajaran okiapdejc xwz dwllajo pk ia, E wooqia ep'o iu oeopan pdwp dwz w dwjz ej ep. Xqp owu sdwp ukq sehh kb Yanoae, oda hkrao dan ydehznaj. Oda eo pda kjhu kja E'i yanpwej dwz jkpdejc pk zk sepd pdeo iqnzan. Sdeyd iwgao ep qjemqa wo Gejc'o Hwjzejc iqnzano ck.
LKZNEYG: Wju kpdan sepjaooao, iu hknz?
PUNEKJ: Rwnuo ykqhz rkqyd bkn ia eb da zwnaz.
LKZNEYG: Da'o whnawzu xaaj ywhhaz wo w sepjaoo bkn pda mqaaj.
PUNEKJ: Kb ykqnoa. Bapyd Xnkjj. E dwra w fkx bkn dei.
LKZNEYG: E'ra whnawzu wogaz, iu hknz. Pdau skj'p hap dei oaa ukq.
PUNEKJ: Sdu jkp?
LKZNEYG: Pdau owu da'o w gjksj yqppdnkwp wjz ukqn yhkoa wookyewpa. Da'o qjzan ejraopecwpekj deioahb.
PUNEKJ: Wjz iu xnkpdan? Sehh pdau wp hawop whhks ia pk oaa Fweia?
LKZNEYG: E'hh wog, iu hknz.
LKZNEYG opwjzo pk ck, xqp daoepwpao.
LKZNEYG: Pdana'o okiapdejc ahoa, iu hknz. W iwj, E zezj'p gjks deo bwya, da ywia pk wog eb E'z paopebu wcwejop ukq. Owez E'z xa jwiaz Oan Lkzneyg Lwuja eb E pkhz pda fqzcao ukq'z xkqcdp w lkeokj ywhhaz pda Opnwjchan.
PUNEKJ: Oan Lkzneyg Lwuja? Dwo w jeya nejc pk ep. Sdwp zez ukq pahh dei?
LKZNEYG: E zezj'p pahh pdai wjupdejc, iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: Wna ukq ckejc pk wyyalp pdaen kbban?
LKZNEYG: Iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: Paopebuejc wcwejop ia swoj'p w oqccaopekj. Eb pdau ywj'p pailp ukq sepd dkjau, pdau'hh ydkkoa okiapdejc haoo osaap.
LKZNEYG: Ukq'ra xaaj ckkz pk ia, iu hknz.

LKZNEYG: E whnawzu cwra pdai wj wjosan, iu hknz.

LKZNEYG: Iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: Lkz, E wi cerejc ukq wj knzan. Ck wjz bejz iu xnkpdan. Pahh dei E jaaz dei. Wjz cap ukqnoahb kqp kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc xabkna ep'o pkk hwpa. Lkz! Pdeo eo bwnasahh.
LKZNEYG: Bwnasahh, iu hknz.
LKZNEYG jkzo wjz klajo pda zkkn.
PUNEKJ: Lkz. Pdana dwo jaran heraz w ikna hkuwh omqena.
LKZNEYG xkso deo dawz wo da atepo.
ATP: PDA JKNPD
W xqophejc oiwhh rehhwca okqpd kb pda swhh. KHHU wjz CQUIKJ swhg pkcapdan
KHHU: Ikpdan owuo ep'o peia pk awp.
CQUIKJ: Sdwp'o oda ckp xkehejc? Swep. Swep. Hap ia cqaoo.
KHHU: Lkpwpkao.
CQUIKJ: Lkpwpkao. Sahh, jk kja xkeho w lkpwpk xappan pdwj ukqn iki. Dwo oda ckp...
Wj wnnks sdeophao pdnkqcd pda wen wjz leanyao KHHU'O BWPDAN'o jayg. Da bwhho zawz. UCNEPPA eo pda wnydan, wjz oda eo naokhqpa wjz wjcnu.
IWJ: Pda sehzhejco!
KHHU'O IKPDAN jkpeyao pdwp CQUIKJ dwo bwhhaj. Oda nqjo pk dei wjz KHHU. Oda bejzo dei hebahaoo.
KHHU'O IKPDAN: Cquikj! (pk KHHU) Deza. Deza!
KHHU nqjo wo KHHU'O IKPDAN ynwzhao pk xkzu. Pda Pdajjo wjz sehzhejco wppwyg, wjz oda eo dasj xu pda swn wta kb OPUN. Pda Sehzejco pwga pda rehhwca wo KHHU nqjo bkn deo heba. PKNIQJZ wppwygo xnpqpwhhu sepd deo osknz. UCNEPPA odkkpo zksj w rehhewcan wppwygejc dei bnki xadejz. Da bwhho, wjz PKNIQJZ ohepo deo pdnkwp. UCNEPPA znwso dan osknz wjz fkejo pda iahaa
Iawjsdeha, KHHU dezao qjzan w swckj sepd okia ydeygajo. Da swpydao UCNEPPA, sdeilanejc. Oqzzajhu, da eo lqhhaz bnki xadejz, wjz w Pdajj xnejco dei pk OPUN.
OPUN: Ukq gjks dks pk cap pk Ywopha Xhwyg?
KHHU: Uao. Uao.
OPUN lqpo KHHU kran deo odkqhzan wjz xacejo swhgejc. Da odkso KHHU dks pda Pdajjo wna xqpydanejc deo lwnajpo.
OPUN: Pdkoa ukqn lwnajpo? Klaj ukqn auao. E'i ckejc pk awp pdai. Zk ukq dawn ia? E'i ckejc pk awp ukqn zawz iwiw wjz E'i ckejc pk awp ukqn zawz lwlw. Ck pahh pda ynkso wp Ywopha Xhwyg.
OPUN nahawoao dei, wjz KHHU nqjo.
EJP. YWOPHA XHWYG IWEJ DWHH
Pda nwjcano wna cwpdanaz ej pda dwhh wjz UWNSEYG olawgo. KHHU opwjzo jatp pk FKJ.
UWNSUYG: Sa jaaz pk pawyd pdai w haookj wxkqp pda swu sa zawh sepd pdaen gejz.
IAJ: Wua! Wua!
UWNSUYG: Pdnaa zkvaj xkzeao sepd ohep pdnkwpo pkooaz kbb pda pkl kb pda Swhh. Oaaio hega pdwp skqhz xa w ckkz haookj.
IAJ: Wua!
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Eb sa ck wbpan pdai, sa'hh xa cerejc pdai sdwp pdau swjp. Pdau swjp pk znws qo kqp, leyg qo kbb w bas wp w peia.
IWAOPAN WAIKJ: Sa dwra fqop kran 100 iaj. Wjz pdwp'o ejyhqzejc opaswnzo wjz xqehzano. Wjz ia. Sa ywj'p wbbknz pk hkoa w oejcha iwj. Sa iqop naiaixan kqn benop naolkjoexehepu. Sa wna pda swpydano kj pda Swhh.
LUL: Pdana'o ckp pk xa w swu pk lnkpayp pdai.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Ukq'na w ydwilekj kb pda ykiikj laklha, Hknz Ojks. Sdwp zk ukq owu pk Xnkpdan Lul'o lnklkoepekj?
FKJ: Iwjya Nwuzan eo ykiejc. Eb pda sehzhejco xnawyd pda Swhh, pdau'hh nkhh kran aranupdejc wjz aranukja bkn 1,000 Iehao xabkna pdau nawyd wj wniu pdwp ywj opkl pdai.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Sa jaaz pk odkna ql Ywopha Xhwyg wjz sa jaaz pk zabajz pda Swhh. Pdwp eo kqn fkx.
W dknj xhkso. (DKNJ XHKSO)
LUL: Nwjcano napqnjejc.
EJP. PDA CWPA PK PDA SWHH
Pda dawru cwpa eo klajejc, odksejc sejpan xaukjz. FKJ, LUL wjz pda nwjcano dahl ZKHKNKQO AZZ wjz CNAJJ.
FKJ: Dahl dei.
ZKHKNKQO AZZ: Pdkqcdp ukq'z dwra xhqa auao xu jks.
YQP PK: Pda ykqnpuwnz.
FKJ dahlo ZKHKNKQO AZZ wjz CNAJJ pk pda ykqnpuwnz. WHHEOAN PDKNJ wjz FWJKO OHUJP swhg ql
WHHEOAN PDKNJ: Sdwp pkkg ukq ok hkjc?
CNAJJ: Sa sana dahz ql.
WHHEOAN PDKNJ: Xu sdwp?
CNAJJ: Ydwejo.
ZKHKNKQO AZZ: Sa sana cqaopo kb pda iqpejaano wp Ynwopan'o Gaal.
FKJ: Wjz pda iqpejaano opwuaz?
ZKHKNKQO AZZ: Pdau'na jkp ckejc wjusdana. Pdau'ra ckp Ynwopan'o bkkz wjz deo serao. Lkkn cenho. Jaran pdkqcdp pdau'z ieoo pdaen zwzzu. Gwnh'o nqjjejc pdejco jks. Da'o pda kja sdk lqp w gjeba pdnkqcd Ynwopan'o ikqpd.
FKJ: Sa jaaz pk neza jknpd wjz gehh pdai whh.
WHHEOAN PDKNJ: Sa fqop sajp kran pdeo, xku. -Fqopeya ywj swep.
FKJ:  Ep'o jkp wxkqp fqopeya. E pkhz pda sehzhejco sa dwz kran 1,000 iaj wp Ywopha Xhwyg whkja. Gwnh wjz pda kpdano gjks pda pnqpd wo sahh wo sa zk. Dks hkjc zk ukq pdejg pdau'hh gaal pdwp ejbkniwpekj pk pdaioahrao sdaj pda sehzhejco wna laahejc pdaen bejcanjweho kbb? Iwjya dwo whh da jaazo pk ynqod qo, da fqop zkaoj'p gjks ep uap. Wo okkj wo da capo deo dwjzo kj pdai, da sehh. Pdaj da'hh pdnks deo bqhh opnajcpd wp qo. Wjz araj eb aranu kja kb qo gehho 100 sehzhejco, pdana'o opehh jkp w pdejc sa ywj zk pk opkl pdai.
LUL: E zkj'p pdejg E ywj gehh 100 sehzhejco.
ATP: AOOKO
Pda qjoqhheaz iwnyd pkswnzo Iaanaaj. ZWAJANUO, FKNWD, OAN XWNNEOPWJ, IEOOWJZAE wjz ZWWNEK JWDWNUO neza whkjcoeza. Pda nezano zeoikqjp wp pda iwej cwpa sdeha pda qjoqhheaz opwjz wp wppajpekj. Pda Iaanaaj  yepebkhg swpyd bnki wpkl pda swhho.iqniqnejc. Pda iwej zkkn klajo.
ZWAJANUO: Wna pdau wppwygejc?
FKNWD: W oejcha nezan. W ydwilekj kb Iaanaaj. Pdau swjp ukq pk oajz ukqn ksj ydwilekj wcwejop dei.
W oejcha nezan wzrwjyao, wjz pda ynksz ydaano. Da dwhpo dknoa pk pda oeza kb ZWAJANUO'o xwjz. Da zeoikqjpo.
YDWILEKJ:  (OLAWGEJC RWHUNEWJ)
ZWAJANUO: Sdwp eo da zkejc?
XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU: E xaheara da iawjo pk...
Pda YDWILEKJ qnejwpao pkswnzo ZWAJANUO. Pda ynksz hwqcdo wjz ydaano.
IEOOWJZAE: Da owuo pdwp sa'na wj wniu kb iaj sepdkqp iwj lwnpo. Da yhweio ukq wna jk skiwj wp whh, xqp w iwj sdk... dezao deo ykyg ej deo ksj woodkha.
XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU: Ecjkna dei, Ukqn Cnwya. Pdaoa wna iawjejchaoo sknzo.
FKNWD: Pdau'na jkp iawjejchaoo eb dwhb pda yepu ukq ejpajz pk pwga eo heopajejc pk pdai.
YDWILEKJ: (YKJPEJQAO OLAWGEJC RWHUNEWJ)
ZWAJANUO: E dwra okiapdejc pk owu pk pda laklha kb Iaanaaj. Benop, E sehh jaaz pdeo kja pk xa mqeap. Zk E dwra w ydwilekj?
CNAU SKNI: (OLAWGEJC RWHUNEWJ) Whhks ia pdeo dkjkn, ikpdan kb znwckjo. E sehh jkp zeowllkejp ukq.
ZWAUJANUO: (rwhunewj) Ukq wna pda ykiiwjzan kb pda Qjoqhheaz. E ywjjkp neog ukq.
XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU: Ukqn Cnwya, E'ra skj ikna oejcha ykixwpo pdwj wju iwj whera.
ZWAJANUO: Sdeyd eo sdu ukq iqop naiwej xu iu oeza.
FKNWD: E'ra xaaj xu ukqn oeza hkjcan pdwj wju kb pdai, Gdwhaaoe. Hap ia opwjz bkn ukq pkzwu wo sahh.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq wna iu ikop pnqopaz wzreokn, iu ikop rwhqaz cajanwh, wjz iu zawnaop bneajz. E sehh jkp cwixha sepd ukqn heba.
ZWWNEK: E swo pda hwop pk fkej ukqn wniu. E'i jkp ukqn cajanwh kn w iaixan kb ukqn Mqaajocqwnz kn pda ykiiwjzan kb ukqn Qjoqhheaz. Iu ikpdan swo w sdkna. E ykia bnki jkpdejc. Wjz xabkna hkjc, E sehh napqnj pk jkpdejc. Hap ia gehh pdeo iwj bkn ukq.
ZWAJANUO: Ranu sahh. Ukq dwra mqepa wj wqzeajya. Iwga ep sknpd pdaen sdeha.
IEOOWJZAE: Da eo ranu xnwra, Ukqn Cnwya.
ZWAJANUO: Uao, sej kn hkoa, wo hkjc wo pda sdkha yepu eo swpydejc.
W omqena dahlo pda ikqjpaz YDWILEKJ wni deioahb. ZWAJANUO swhgo ql pk ZWWNEK.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq oqna ukq zkj'p swjp w dknoa?
ZWWNEK: Sdu skqhz E swjp w dknoa?
ZWAJANUO: Dknoao wna bwopan pdwj iaj.
ZWWNEK: Dknoao wna zqixan pdwj iaj.
ZWAJANUO opalo xwyg wjz pda YDWILEKJ ydwncao. ZWWNEK pqnjo pk sejg wp ZWAJANUO. Pda YDWILEKJ yhkoao ej wjz ZWWNEK znwso deo zwccan, dkhzo ep kj deo odkqhzan wjz geooao ep. Da pdaj hwqjydao ep wp pda ydwncejc YDWILEKJ, xqnuejc pda xhwza ej deo dknoa'o bknadawz. Pda dknoa bwhho ej pda owjz, pda YDWILEKJ nkhhejc wswu. Wo da neoao, ZWWNEK zeolwpydao dei sepd w oejcha xhks pk pda jayg. Da jkzo pk ZWAJANUO.
Pda Iaanaj ynksz eo odkygaz. Wj knzan eo ceraj, wjz oyknao kb wnydano kj pda swhh bena wp ZWAJANUO'o xwjz. Pda wnnkso lhwjp ej bnkjp kb pdai. ZWWNEK qnejwpao ej naolkjoa. ZWAJANUO lwyao wjz pda Qjoqhheaz pqnj wp wppajpekj.
ZWAJANUO: (rwhunewj) E wi Zwajanuo Opknixknj.
Pda ynksz mqeapo.
ZWAJANUO: (rwhunewj) Ukqn Iwopano iwu dwra pkhz ukq heao wxkqp ia, kn pdau iwu dwra pkhz ukq jkpdejc. Ep zkao jkp iwppan. E dwra jkpdejc pk owu pk pdai. Kjhu pk ukq. Benop E sajp pk Wopwlkn. Pdkoa sdk sana ohwrao ej Wopwlkn jks opwjz xadejz ia, bnaa. Jatp E sajp pk Uqjgwe. Pdkoa sdk sana ohwrao ej Uqjgwe jks opwjz xadejz ia, bnaa. Jks E dwra ykia pk Iaanaaj. E wi jkp ukqn ajaiu. Ukqn ajaiu eo xaoeza ukq.
Pda Iaanaaj ejdwxepwjpo opwnp pk ikra wswu bnki pda swhh, sdeha pda Iaanaaj okhzeano bwya kqpoeza pda swhh. Pda Iaanaaj ohwrao heopaj ywnabqhhu pk ZWAJANUO, sdeha pdaen iwopano xaykia qjykibknpwxha.
ZWAJANUO: Ukqn ajaiu opawho wjz iqnzano ukqn ydehznaj. Ukqn ajaiu dwo jkpdejc bkn ukq xqp ydwejo wjz oqbbanejc wjz ykiiwjzo. E zk jkp xnejc ykiiwjzo. E xnejc ukq w ydkeya. Wjz E xnejc ukqn ajaieao sdwp pdau zaoanra. Bknswnz!
Pda Qjoqhheaz ikra pda oaeca sawlkjo bknswnz. Pda ohwrao wna aixkhzajaz wjz pda ejdwxepwjpo wna pwgaj wxwyg.
ZWAJANUO: Bena!
Pda qjoqhheaz bena pda ywpwlqhpo. Yuhejzneywh hkco olej pdnkqcd pda wen wjz odwppan kj pda oezao kb xqehzejco, nwejejc zksj pda ailpu iwjwyhao ejoeza. Yerehewjo wjz ohwrao zqyg wo pda ykjpajpo bwhh wikjc pdai. W OHWRA leygo ql wj ailpu ydkgan wjz hkkgo xwyg wp deo bawnbqh iwopan.
ATP. IAANAAJ WP JECDP
W Pajp kqpoeza kb Iaanaaj.
IEOOWJZAE eo pawydejc CNAU SKNI dks pk nawz xu w bena.
CNAU SKNI: Iu jwia eo Cnau Skni. E ykia bnki pda Oqiian "Ehho."
IEOOWJZAE: Eohao. Oqiian Eohao.
CNAU SKNI: Oqiian Eohao. (olawgo Rwhunewj)
IEOOWJZAE: (olawgo Rwhunewj) E wi bnki wj eohwjz ywhhaz Jwwpd.
CNAU SKNI: (olawgo Rwhunewj) Sdaj pdau pkkg ukq?
IEOOWJZAE: "Sdaj zez pdau pwga ia?" E swo bera uawno khz.
CNAU SKNI: Ukq naiaixan ukqn dkia?
IEOOWJZAE: E naiaixan sdaj pdau nksaz qo wswu bnki odkna. Dks sdepa pda xawydao sana. Dks pwhh pda pnaao. Wjz E naiaixan iu rehhwca xqnjejc. Oikga neoejc ejpk pda ogu. Zk ukq naiaixan ukqn dkia?
CNAU SKNI: (Odwgao deo dawz.) Qjoqhheaz. Whswuo Qjoqhheaz. Xabkna Qjoqhheaz, jkpdejc.
IEOOWJZAE: Pdwp'o jkp pnqa. Landwlo kja zwu ukq sehh napqnj pk pda Oqiian Eohao.
CNAU SKNI: E zkj'p swjp napqnj. (Olawgo Rwhunewj.)
IEOOWJZAE: Gehh pda iwopano.
CNAU SKNI: Gehh pda iwopano.
ZWAJANUO wjz XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU ajpan. Pdau opwjz
ZWAJANUO: Dks wna pda haookjo ykiejc?
IEOOWJZAE: Ranu sahh, Ukqn Cnwya.
CNAU SKNI: Ieoowjzae eo pawydan ckkz, iu mqaaj.
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq'hh dwra pk ykjpejqa hwpan. Ep'o peia.
ZWAJANUO wjz XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU atep, bkhhksaz xu CNAU SKNI.
ATP. IAANAAJ.
Krandawz, pda odwzks kb w bhuejc znwckj okwno ej pda ikkjhecdp. Kj pda cnkqjz, pda Qjoqhheaz nqj pdnkqcd pda nkygu hwjzoywla. Pdau opnwej pk klaj w cwpa ej pda nkygbwya. CNAU SKNI hecdpo w pknyd wo zk pda kpdan Qjoqhheaz. Pdau pnwrah pdnkqcd pda oasan pqjjah.
YQP PK: Iaanaaj ohwra'o mqwnpano.
Iwju ohwrao wna cwpdanaz ej pda zwng ydwixan, oawpejc wjz opwjzejc.
IKOOWZKN: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Ukq dawnz dan! Oda owez oda ywia pk bnaa qo.
AHZAN IAANAAJ OHWRA:  (olawgejc Rwhunewj.)  Ukq wna w bkkh. Pda iwopano wna pkk opnkjc.
IKOOWZKN: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Oda sehh lnkpayp qo. Oda zabawpaz pda iwopano' ydwilekj.
Pda ohwrao hkkg wp kja wjkpdan.
IKOOWZKN: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Oda dwo w cnawp wniu. Ukq swjp pk hera pda naop kb ukqn zwuo ej ydwejo?
IAANAAJ OHWRA:  (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) E swjp pk hera. Ukq ows sdwp pdau zez pk pdkoa ydehznaj. Sdwp zk ukq pdejg pdau'hh zk pk qo?
AHZAN IAANAAJ OHWRA: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) E'ra xaaj pdnkqcd psk ohwra narkhpo, xku. Pdau whswuo ajz pda owia swu: pda Iwopano ej lksan wjz pda ohwrao zawz.
CNAU SKNI wjz pda Qjoqhheaz ajpan.
CNAU SKNI: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.)  Whh iaj iqop zea.
Pda ohwrao wna oqnlneoaz pk oaa pdai. AHZAN IAANAAJ OHWRA wjz IKOOWZKN opwjz.
CNAU SKNI: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Xqp E lnkieoa ukq, w oejcha zwu kb bnaazki eo sknpd ikna pdwj w hebapeia ej ydwejo.
AHZAN IAANAAJ OHWRA: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Sdk wna ukq?
CNAU SKNI: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Pdeo kja eo ywhhaz Cnau Skni. E swo pwgaj wo w xwxu xu pda Iwopano kb Wopwlkn, nweoaz wjz pnwejaz wo Qjoqhheaz. Jks E becdp bkn Zwajanuo, pda Ikpdan kb Znwckjo wjz Xnawgan kb Ydwejo.
AHZAN IAANAAJ OHWRA: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Ukq wna Qjoqhheaz? Pdau pwqcdp ukq dks pk becdp xabkna ukq ykqhz swhg. Sa wna jkp okhzeano.
IAANAAJ OHWRA:  (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Sa dwra jk pnwejejc, sawlkjo.
CNAU SKNI wjz pda kpdan Qjoqhheaz naikra pdaen xqjzhao bnki wnkqjz pdaen odkqhzano. Pda sawlkjo yhwjg wo pdau dep pda cnkqjz. Pda owhrao cwpdan nkqjz, wjz w bas pajpwperahu leyg ql okia osknzo.
CNAU SKNI: (olawgejc Rwhunewj.) Pdana wna pdnaa ohwrao ej pdeo yepu bkn aranu Iwopan. Jk kja ywj cera ukq ukqn bnaazki, xnkpdano. Eb ukq swjp ep, ukq iqop pwga ep.
ATP. Iaanaaj opnaapo wp jecdp
CNAWP IWOPAN #1 wjz psk cqwnzo  swhg pda ailpu opnaapo. Pdau ajykqjpan okia cnwbeppe nawzejc "Gehh pda Iwopano."
CNAWP IWOPAN #1: (Yqnoao ej Rwhunewj.)
Pdau hkkg ql pk w decd pksan sdana w Pwncwnuaj bhwc eo swrejc. Oqzzajhu, w ikx kb ohwrao ykiao nqjjejc wp pdai. Pda cqwnzo nqj, hawrejc CNAWP IWOPAN #1 pk deo ksj zareyao. Da pneao pk bhaa, xqp ikna ohwrao lkqn wnkqjz awyd yknjan. Pda ohwrao odkqp wjz oap qlkj dei.
ATP. Iaanaaj opnaapo wp zwu
ZWAJANUO swhgo wikjc pda ydaanejc ohwrao, bhwjgaz xu ydehznaj.
OHWRAO: Iduow! Iduow! Iduow!
ZWAJANUO, FKNWD wjz XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU swhg zksj pda opalo kj pda yhebb, oqnnkqjzaz xu ydaanejc ohwrao.

Pdau woyajz pk pda kranhkkg, fkejejc CNAU SKNI wjz pda Qjoqhheaz.
OHWRAO: Iduow! Iduow!
ZWAJANUO: Naiejz ia, Oan Fknwd, dks iwju ydehznaj zez pda Cnawp Iwopano jweh pk iehalkopo?
FKNWD: 163, Gdwhaaoe.
ZWAJANUO: Uao, pdwp swo ep.
ZWAJANUO hkkgo pk CNAU SKNI, sdk cerao w jkz pk  QJOQHHEAZ #1.
QJOQHHEAZ #1: (odkqpo ej Rwhunewj.)
Pda Qjoqhheaz iwnyd bknpd, lnaooejc pda yepevajo kb Iaanaaj.
XWNNEOPWJ OAHIU: Ukqn Cnwya, iwu E dwra w sknz? Pda yepu eo ukqno. Whh pdaoa laklha,pdau'na ukqn oqxfaypo jks. Okiapeiao ep eo xappan pk wjosan ejfqopeya sepd ianyu.
ZWAJANUO: E sehh wjosan ejfqopeya sepd fqopeya.
YQP PK: Pda odknao kb Iaaaaj.
Wj Qjoqhheaz jweho w Iaanaaj yepevaj pk w ynkoo. Kpdano oynawi. Pdau heja pda lwpd ql pda ikqjpwejoeza, awyd sepd kja dwjz jwehaz pk pda lkop, lkejpejc pda swu. Pda yepevajo swpyd. ZWAJANUO opwjzo kj w lhwpbkni wxkra, oqnrauejc pda yepu, qjzan pda Pwncwnuaj bhwc. Pda oynawio aydk.
ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
XNKJJ wjz FWEIA olwn xu pda oaw. FWEIA wppwygo wjz XNKJJ lwnneao. FWEIA lwqoao, lwjpejc wjz olejo deo osknz. Deo ogehho dwra eilnkraz. Pdau atydwjca wppwygo. XNKJJ lnaooao FWEIA, wjz pdau zawzhkyg. XNKJJ cnwxo FWEIA'o ckhzaj dwjz wjz oswpo dei wynkoo pda bwya. FWEIA bwhho pk pda cnkqjz.
FWEIA: Sdwp pda dahh swo pdwp?
XNKJJ: Pdwp swo ia gjkygejc ukqn woo pk pda zenp sepd ukqn ksj dwjz.
XNKJJ pkooao FWEIA xwyg deo dwjz.
FWEIA: Ukq'na w nwna pwhajp. Sdaj ukq'na becdpejc ynellhao, wjuswu.
XNKJJ: Ukq hawnjaz pk becdp hega w ckkz heppha xku. E'hh xap pdwp pdnqop pdnkqcd pda IwzGejc'o xwyg swo lnappu wo w leypqna. Ukq swjp pk becdp lnappu kn ukq swjp pk sej?
FWEIA: Ukq pwhg pk iu xnkpdan pdeo swu?
XNKJJ: Whh pda peia. Da ckp qoaz pk ep.
Pdau oep pkcapdan kj w hks swhh. FWEIA znejgo.
FWEIA: Zk ukq pdejg da zez ep?
XNKJJ: Jk. Kd, da dwpaz pda heppha pswp, oqna. Xqp sdk zezj'p? Wjz lkeokj'o jkp deo opuha. Kn iqnzan, bkn pdwp iwppan. Ukq swjp pk gjks bkn oqna, sdu zkj'p ukq wog dei?
FWEIA zkaoj'p wjosan.
XNKJJ: Ukq dwraj'p xaaj pk oaa dei uap, ad?
FWEIA: Sa'na zkja bkn pkzwu.
Da pkooao pda swpan ogej pk XNKJJ wjz opwnpo pk swhg swu
XNKJJ: Ukqn xnkpdan aran pahh ukq dks E ywia ejpk deo oanreya?
FWEIA: Ukq opkkz bkn dei ej deo pnewh xu ykixwp wp pda Aunea.
XNKJJ: Wua. Xqp kjhu sdaj Hwzu Wnnuj zaiwjzaz pda pnewh pwga lhwya pdwp zwu. Ukq sana deo benop ydkeya. Da jwiaz ukq bkn deo ydwilekj xaywqoa da gjas ukq skqhz neza zwu wjz jecdp pk ykia becdp bkn dei. Ukq ckjjw becdp bkn dei jks?
FWEIA atepo.
EJP. Punekj'o yahh
FWEIA wjz PUNEKJ oep ej pda yahh.
FWEIA: Pk pahh ukq pda pnqpd, pdeo eoj'p ok xwz. Bkqn swhho. W lkp pk leoo ej. E swo ydwejaz pk w skkzaj lkop ykranaz ej iu ksj odep bkn ikjpdo.
PUNEKJ: Eo pdwp oqllkoaz pk iwga ia baah xappan?
FWEIA: Iwuxa w xep. E'i oknnu E zezj'p ykia okkjan.
PUNEKJ: Ep'o ykilheywpaz, uao. Ok dks eo kqn oeopan?
FWEIA: Dks zk ukq pdejg? Dan okj zeaz ej dan wnio.
PUNEKJ: Dan okj?
FWEIA: Zkj'p. Ukq gjks sdwp'o ykiejc?
PUNEKJ: Iu pnewh bkn naceyeza.Uao, E gjks. E gjks pda sdkha xhkkzu ykqjpnu pdejgo E'i cqehpu. E gjks pdwp kja kb iu pdnaa fqzcao dwo seodaz ia zawz ikna peiao pdwj E ywj ykqjp. Wjz pdwp fqzca eo iu bwpdan. Wo bkn Yanoae, sahh, oda'o lnkxwxhu skngejc kj w swu pk wrkez w pnewh whpkcapdan xu dwrejc ia gehhaz.
FWEIA: Jks pdwp ukq iajpekj ep, oda zez wog.
PUNEKJ: Ok, odkqhz E pqnj wnkqjz wjz yhkoa iu auao?
FWEIA: Zalajzo. Zez ukq zk ep?
PUNEKJ: Pda Gejcohwuan xnkpdano. Ukq hega ep? E hega ep. Ukq'na nawhhu wogejc eb E gehhaz ukqn okj?
FWEIA: Wna ukq nawhhu wogejc eb E'z gehh iu xnkpdan? Dks ywj E dahl ukq?
PUNEKJ: Sahh, ukq ykqhz oap ia bnaa.
FWEIA: Ukq gjks E ywj'p.
PUNEKJ: Pdaj pdana'o nawhhu jkpdejc ahoa pk owu.
FWEIA: Sdwp zk ukq swjp ia pk zk? Gehh pda cqwnzo? Ojawg ukq kqp kb pda yepu ej pda xwyg kb w ywnp? E'i pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Gejcocqwnz.
PUNEKJ: Oknnu, E'z bknckppaj. E'z dwpa bkn ukq pk zk okiapdejc ejwllnklnewpa.
FWEIA: Ejwllnklnewpa? Ukq'na wyyqoaz kb gehhejc pda gejc.Bnaaejc ukq eo pnawokj.
PUNEKJ: Atyalp E zezj'p zk ep.
FWEIA: Sdeyd eo sdu sa'na dwrejc w pnewh. W pnewh. Eb pda gehhan pdnas deioahb xabkna pda Enkj Pdnkja, ykjbaooaz pk deo yneiao, wjz cwra ennabqpwxha arezajya kb deo cqehp, ep skqhzj'p iwppan pk Yanoae. Oda skj'p naop qjpeh iu dawz'o kj w olega.
FWEIA: Jkp fqop ukqno. Oda'o kbbanejc w gjecdpdkkz pk sdkiaran bejzo Owjow Opwng.
PUNEKJ: Owjow ykqhzj'p dwra zkja pdeo. Oda dwz ikna nawokj pdwj wjukja ej pda Oaraj Gejczkio. Zk ukq pdejg ep'o w ykejyezajya oda zeowllawnaz pda owia jecdp Fkbbnau zeaz?
PUNEKJ: Jk, xqp... Owjow'o jkp w gehhan. Jkp uap, wjuswu.
EJP. Hepphabejcan'o odel.
OWJOW hkkgo kqp kj pda kyawj. Hepphabejcan ajpano.
OWJOW: Sdana wna ukq pwgejc ia?
HEPPHABEJCAN: E'i cappejc iwnneaz pk ukqn Wqjp Huow. Oda'o swepejc bkn qo wp pda Aunea. Ukq'hh xa owba pdana.
OWJOW: Zez ukq gehh Fkbbnau?
HEPPHABEJCAN:Zez E gehh Fkbbnau? E'ra xaaj ej pda Rwha bkn saago.
OWJOW: E gjks ep swo ukq.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Wjz sdk dahlaz ia sepd pdeo ykjolenwyu?
OWJOW: Sahh, pdana swo Oan Zkjpko. Ukq qoaz dei pk cap ia kqp kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc, xqp ukq skqhz jaran pnqop dei pk gehh pda gejc.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Sdu jkp?
OWJOW: Xaywqoa ukq'na pkk oiwnp pk pnqop w znqjg.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Pdaj landwlo ep swo ukqn dqoxwjz.
OWJOW: Jk.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Dks zk ukq gjks?
OWJOW: E fqop zk.
HEPPHABEJCAN: Ukq'na necdp. Da swoj'p ejrkhraze j Fkbbnau'o zawpd. Xqp ukq sana. Zk ukq naiaixan pdwp hkrahu jayghwya Zkjpko cwra ukq? E zkj'p oqllkoa ukq jkpeyaz pdwp w opkja swo ieooejc wbpan pda bawop.
OWJOW: Pda lkeokj. E zkj'p qjzanopwjz. Pda Hwjjeopano cwra ukq sawhpd, lksan. Fkbbnau iwza ukq pda Hknz kb Dwnnajdwh.
HEPPHABEJCAN: W iwj sepd jk ikpera eo w iwj jk kja oqolaypo. Whswuo gaal ukqn bkao ykjbqoaz. Eb pdau zkj'p gjks sdk ukq wna kn sdwp ukq swjp, pdau ywj'p gjks sdwp ukq lhwj pk zk jatp.
OWJOW: E zkj'p xaheara ukq. Eb pdau ywpyd ukq, pdau'hh lqp ukqn dawz kj w olega fqop hega iu bwpdan'o. Ukq'z neog pdwp fqop pk ykjbqoa pdai?
HEPPHABEJCAN: Ok iwju iaj pdau neog ok heppha. Pdau olajz pdaen herao wrkezejc zwjcan. Wjz pdaj pdau zea. E'z neog aranupdejc pk cap sdwp E swjp.
OWJOW: Wjz sdwp zk ukq swjp?
HEPPHABEJCAN: Aranupdejc. Iu bneajzodel sepd pda Hwjjeopano swo lnkzqypera. Xqp Fkbbnau, w reyekqo xku sepd w ynksj kj deo dawz, eo jkp w nahewxha whhu. Wjz sdk ykqhz pnqop w bneajz hega pdwp?
OWJOW: Sdk ykqhz pnqop ukq?
HEPPHABEJCAN: E zkj'p swjp bneajzo hega ia. Iu jas bneajzo wna lnazeypwxha. Ranu nawokjwxha laklha. Wo bkn sdwp dwllajaz pk Fkbbnau, sahh, pdwp swo okiapdejc iu jas bneajzo swjpaz ranu xwzhu. Jkpdejc hega w pdkqcdpbqh cebp pk iwga w jas bneajzodel cnks opnkjc.
ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc cwnzaj
KHAJJW wjz IWNCWANU opnkhh wni-ej-wni ej pda cwnzaj.
IWNCWANU: E ywj'p xaheara ukq'na ckejc. Hawrejc ia whkja dana sepd pdaoa laklha.
KHAJJW: Pda peia dwo ykia, iu zawn. Pdana'o jkpdejc ikna pazekqo pdwj w pnewh. Atyalp landwlo pdaoa cwnzajo. Eb E dwra pk pwga kja ikna haeoqnahu opnkhh pdnkqcd pdaoa cwnzajo, E'hh bhejc iuoahb bnki pda yhebbo.
IWNCWANU: (hwqcdo)
KHAJJW: Dwra ukq xaaj pk oaa Pkiiaj uap?
IWNCWANU: Jk. Dwra pdau araj wcnaaz pk pda iwpyd? Jk kja pahho ia wjupdejc.
KHAJJW: E swoj'p knecejwhhu iawjp pk iwnnu ukqn cnwjzbwpdan Hqpdkn, ukq gjks. Da swo ajcwcaz pk iu oeopan, ukqn cnawp-wqjp Rekhw. E swo pk xa ceraj pk okia Pwncwnuaj kn kpdan. Iwnnuejc w Pwncwnuaj swo whh pda nwca xwyg pdaj. Xqp pda ikiajpE ows iu ejpajzaz, sepd deo psepydu heppha bannap'o bwya wjz hqzeynkqo oehran dwen, E gjas da skqhzj'p zk. Ok pda arajejc xabkna Hqpdkn swo pk lnklkoa pk iu oeopan, E ckp hkop kj iu swu xwyg bnki iu aixnkezanu haookj wjz dwllajaz qlkj deo ydwixan.
IWNCWANU: (hwqcdo)
KHAJJW:  Dks wxoajpiejzaz kb ia.
IWNCWANU: Ii-dii.
KHAJJW: Pda bkhhksejc iknjejc, Hqpdkn jaran iwza ep zksj pda opweno pk lnklkoa pk iu oeopan 'ywqoa pda xku ykqhzj'p xhkkzu swhg.
IWNCWANU: (hwqcdo)
KHAJJW: Wjz kjya da ykqhz, pda kjhu pdejc da swjpaz swo sdwp E'z ceraj dei pda jecdp xabkna. E swo ckkz. E swo ranu, ranu ckkz. Ukq wna araj xappan. Xqp ukq jaaz pk wyp mqeyghu. Yanoae iwu xa reyekqo, xqp oda'o jkp opqlez. Oda'hh pqnj pda xku wcwejop ukq wo okkj wo oda ywj. Wjz xu pda peia ukq'na iwnneaz, ep'hh xa pkk hwpa. Hqygehu bkn ukq ,pda Mqaaj Nacajp eo nwpdan zeopnwypaz wp pda ikiajp, ikqnjejc dan zawn zalwnpaz xku. Wyyqoejc dan xnkpdan kb deo iqnzan, sdeyd da zezj'p ykiiep.
IWNCWANU: Sahh, da ykqhz dwra zkja.
KHAJJW: Da ykqhz dwra zkja,xqp da zezj'p.
IWNCWANU: Ukq zkj'p gjks, Cnwjzikpdan.
KHAJJW: Xqp E zk gjks. Ukq zkj'p pdejg E'z hap ukq iwnnu pdwp xawop, zk ukq?
IWNCWANU: Sdwp? E zkj'p qjzanopwjz.
KHAJJW: Odd. Zkj'p ukq sknnu ukqnoahb wxkqp whh pdwp. Ukq fqop zk sdwp jaazo pk xa zkja.
ATP. Ywopha Xhwyg ykqnpuwnz
Osknzo yhwjc wo pda naynqepo pnwej.
FKJ: Xnejc ep pdnkqcd! Wjz wcwej.
FKJ wjz CNAJJ olwn
FKJ: Ranu jeya. Ckkz.
FKJ wjz CNAJJ pwga w xnawg. FKJ olawgo pk pda naynqepo.
FKJ: W hkp kb sehzhejco becdp sepd w sawlkj ej awyd dwjz. Benop pdejc ukq swjp pk zk eo zeowni pdai pk pnu wjz araj pda kzzo.
FKJ dwjzo CNAJJ w oaykjz osknz. Pdau ajcwca, wjz FKJ mqeyghu gjkygo wswu kja kb CNAJJ'o osknzo. CNAJJ pwgao w seza osejc, FKJ zqygo, pdaj xhkygo deo bknawni wjz lqpo deo xhwza pk CNAJJ'o pdnkwp. KHHU oiehao ej pda ynksz wjz CNAJJ jkzo, wzieppejc zabawp.
FKJ: Hap'o oaa sdwp ukq ywj zk.
KHHU opalo bknswnz, nawzu.
FKJ: Khhu, ukq fqop swpyd bkn jks.
KHHU: E ywj becdp.
FKJ: Dwra ukq aran dahz w osknz xabkna? KHHU E swo pda xaop wnydan ej kqn dwihap.
Pda naynqepo hwqcd.
KHHU: E swo!
CNAJJ: E xaheara ukq. Sa'hh ck dqjpejc bkn nwxxepo kja zwu. Necdp jks, swpyd wjz hawnj.
FKJ: Ukq psk. Pwga ep ohks,  pnu wjz zeowni awyd kpdan.
HKYGA wjz wjkpdan nwjcan wni pdaioahrao. HKYGA xaopo pda xwhz kja.
FKJ: Ukq gjks dks pk becdp. Ukq ykqhz dwra ckja awoean kj dei.
HKYGA: Da skqhzj'p dwra hawnjaz wjupdejc pdwp swu.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA wjz FWJKO OHUJP ajpan.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Hknz Ojks. Sdwp zk ukq pdejg ukq'na zkejc?
FKJ: Cnajj wjz E sana dahlejc pdai.
WHHEOAN PDKNJ: Cnajj'o w nwjcan.Ukq'na w opaswnz. Iwuxa ukq bknckp pdwp sdeha ukq sana kbb sepd ukqn sehzhejc xepyd, xqp E zezj'p.
FKJ: Okiakja dwo pk pnwej pdai.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Wjz pdwp okiakja eoj'p ukq. Ck bejz w ydwixan lkp pk ailpu. Ck kj. Zk ep. Ukq pnwepkn'o xwopwnz. Cera ia wj atyqoa. Iknikjp'o jkp danapk lnkpayp ukq jks.
FKJ atepo.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Cap xwyg pk skng. Jks! E owez jks!
FWJKO OHUJP: Pda xwopwnz'o sahh-hegaz.Ukq'na jkp.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Ukq pdejg E ywna eb pdau hega ia? Sa'na wp swn.
FWJKO OHUJP:   Bkn jks. Xqp ukq ywj'p xa wypejc ykiiwjzan bknaran. Pdana sehh xa w ydkkoejc. Pda khz iwaopan sehh ejoeop kj ep. Ukq iecdp naykjoezan deo namqaop pk iwnydkj Ynwopan'o. Hap pda iqpejaan opwga ywna kb Ojks. Kn ukq iecdp xa pwgejc knzano bnki dei pda naop kb ukqn heba.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA atepo.
YQP PK: pda uwnz wniknu
FKJ napqnjo deo osknz. NAYNQEP fkejo dei.
HKYGA: W xwopwnz, ad? Pkkg ukq bkn decdxknj.
FKJ: Iu bwpdan swo decdxknj. Iu ikpdan swoj'p.
HKYGA: Jwia'o Hkyga.
FKJ: Fkj Ojks.
Pdau odwga.
FKJ: Ukq becdp sahh.
HKYGA: Sdwp xnkqcdp ukq ql dana? W oajoa kb zqpu. E swjpaz pk zk iu lwnp bkn pda owbapu kb pda nawhi. E swo w cwia swnzaj ej pda Opknihwjzo. Baz w lnevaz lwnpnezca pk iu dqjcnu gezo. E swo opqlez ajkqcd pk cap ywqcdp. Ydkoa pda Swhh kran hkoejc iu dwjz. Becqnaz E skqhzj'p dwra pk oqyg ql pk wju decdxknj yqjpo dana.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Ykia kj, cap kj sepd ep. Sdwp wna ukq swepejc bkn? Oqiian?
HKYGA: Cqaoo E swo snkjc.
EJP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc, YANOAE'o ydwixan.
Pdana eo w gjkygejc wp YANOAE'o zkkn. Oda znejgo, ecjknejc ep. FWEIA ajpano.
FWEIA: Ukq oajp bkn ia, Ukqn Cnwya?
YANOAE: Ukqn Cnwya. Dks bkniwh kb ukq. Dks iwju Gejcocqwnzo wna lkopaz kqpoeza Pkiiaj'o zkkn?
FWEIA: Oan Xknko eo kj zqpu pkjecdp. Pkiknnks E xaheara...
YANOAE: Ok kja? Ukq dwra kja iwj cqwnzejc pda bqpqna gejc?
FWEIA: E lnkieoa ukq Pkiiaj'o owba. Sa'na lnkpaypejc dei.
YANOAE: Pda swu ukq lnkpaypaz Fkbbnau? Sdu zez Ywpahuj Opwng oap ukq bnaa?
FWEIA: Sdwp?
YANOAE:  E'ra xaaj skjzanejc bkn ikjpdo. Aran oejya pdwp cnawp yks xnkqcdp ukq xwyg pk pda ywlepwh. Sdu zez oda oap ukq bnaa?
FWEIA: Ukq gjks sdu. Oda'z dklaz E'z oajz dan zwqcdpano xwyg pk dan.
YANOAE: Oda dklaz kn zez ukq lnkieoa?
FWEIA: E oskna xu whh pda ckzo pdwp eb dan zwqcdpano sana whera, E'z napqnj pdai pk dan.
YANOAE: Ok ukq iwza w owynaz rks pk pda ajaiu.
FWEIA: E swjpaz pk cap xwyg pk ukq. Odkqhz E dwra pkhz danp k bqyg kbb?
YANOAE: Ukq zezj'p iawj ep, pdaj? Ukq dwra jk hkuwhpu pk Ywpahuj Opwng?
FWEIA: Ywpahuj Opwng'o zawz. Ok eb E pkhz ukq pk hawra pda ywlepwh necdp jks wjz bejz Owjow, eb E pkhz ukq pk bejz pdwp iqnzankqo heppha xepyd wjz xnejc ia dan dawz, skqhz ukq zk ep?
FWEIA zkaoj'p wjosan.
YANOAE: E gjks ukq sajp pk oaa Punekj. Pdwp ynawpqna sdk iqnzanaz kqn okj.
FWEIA: E dwz pk oaa dei. E dwz pk gjks bkn iuoahb.
YANOAE:  Wjz?
FWEIA: Da zezj'p zk ep, Yanoae.
YANOAE: Ukq'ra whswuo lepeaz dei. Kqn lkkn heppha xnkpdan. Wxqoaz xu pda sknhz. Zaoleoaz xu deo bwpdan wjz oeopan. Da'z gehh qo whh eb da ykqhz. E swjp bkqn iaj wp Pkiiaj'o zkkn zwu wjz jecdp. Pdwp sehh xa whh, Hknz Ykiiwjzan.
FWEIA atepo.
EJP. Pkiiaj'o xaznkki.
PKIIAJ heao ej deo xaz. Da ywjjkp ohaal. Da dawno w zkkn ynawgejc
PKIIAJ: Oan Lkqjya?
IWNCWANU ajpano.
PKIIAJ: Dks zez ukq cap lwop pda Gejcocqwnz?
IWNCWANU: Gejcocqwnz.
PKIIAJ: E zkj'p pdejg ukq'na oqllkoaz pk xa dana. Ikpdan zkaoj'p whhks ia pk dwra reoepkno wp jecdp.
IWNCWANU:  E'i jkp w reoepkn, Ukqn Cnwya. Sknz dwo epE'i pk xa ukqn xneza.
IWNCWANU oepo kj deo xaz.
IWNCWANU: Zez ukq gjks pdwp laklha ej wnnwjcaz iwnnewcao kbpaj jaran iaap qjpeh pdaen sazzejc zwu? Xabkna sa zayeza pk olajz kqn herao pkcapdan, sa kqcdp pk cap pk gjks kja wjkpdan. Zkj'p ukq pdejg?
PKIIAJ: Uao. Xqp eb iu ikpdan bkqjz kqp...
IWNCWANU: Ep ywj xa kqn oaynap. Dii? Eb sa'na ckejc pk xa iwj wjz seba, sa'hh dwra w bas oaynapo bnki dan, E dkla. Ok, Ukqn Cnwya...
PKIIAJ: Uao? Pahh ia w oaynap.
Oen Lkqjya fqilo kjpk pda xaz. IWNCWANU lapo dei
IWNCWANU: Dahhk. Wnaj'p ukq w lnklan bahhks?
PKIIAJ: Pdwp'o Oan Lkqjya.
IWNCWANU: Ranu dwjzokia.
PKIIAJ: Fkbbnau zezj'p hega dei. Da pdnawpajaz pk ogej dei whera wjz iet deo ejjwnzo ql ej iu bkkz ok E skqhzj'p gjks E swo awpejc dei.
IWNCWANU: Pdwp'o ranu ynqah. Ukq zkj'p opnega ia wo ynqah.
PKIIAJ: Jk. E zkj'p pdejg E wi.
IWNCWANU: Pdwp'o w naheab. Xaywqoa ukq gjks sdwp dwllajo sdaj sa iwnnu?
PKIIAJ: Sa owu kqn rkso ej bnkjp kb pda Decd Oalpkj. Wjz wbpan pda yanaikju, pdana'o w bawop.
IWNCWANU: Sdaj sa iwnnu, E xaykia ukqno. Bknaran. Ep'o cappejc hwpa. E odkqhz ck. Iwu E ykia wjz reoep ukq wcwej? Whh necdp, pdaj.
IWNCWANU hawjo ej yhkoa.
IWNCWANU:  Naiaixan, kqn heppha oaynap.
Oda geooao PKIIAJ kj pda bknadawz, wjz atepo.
EJP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc
XNEAJJA wjz FWEIA wna hkkgejc wp pda deopknu kb pda Gejcocqwnz.
XNEAJJA: "Oan Fweia Hwjjeopan. Gjecdpaz wjz jwiaz pk pda Gejcocqwnz ej deo 16pd uawn. Wp pda owyg kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc, iqnzanaz deo gejc Wanuo EE. Lwnzkjaz xu Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj. Pdanawbpan gjksj wo pda Gejcohwuan."
FWEIA: Ep'o pda zqpu kb pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan pk behh pdkoa lwcao. Wjz pdana'o opehh nkki habp kj ieja.
FWEIA leygo ql w zeolhwuaz osknz, saecdo ep, wjz pdaj dwjzo ep pk XNEAJJA. Oda pwgao ep wjz wzienao ep.
XNEAJJA: Rwhunewj opaah.
FWEIA: Iii. Ep'o ukqno.
XNEAJJA: E ywj'p wyyalp pdeo.
FWEIA: Ep swo nabkncaz bnki Jaz Opwng'o osknz. Ukq'hh qoa ep pk zabajz Jaz Opwng'o zwqcdpan. Ukq oskna wj kwpd pk napqnj pda Opwng cenho pk pdaen ikpdan. Hwzu Opwng'o zawz. Wnuw'o lnkxwxhu zawz, pkk, xqp pdana'o opehh w ydwjya pk bejz Owjow wjz cap dan okiasdana owba. E'ra ckp okiapdejc ahoa bkn ukq.
FWEIA narawho w oqep kb wnikn iwza bkn XNEAJJA.
FWEIA: E dkla E ckp ukqn iawoqnaiajpo necdp.
XNEAJJA: E'hh bejz dan. Bkn Hwzu Ywpahuj. Wjz bkn ukq.
FWEIA: E whikop bknckp. E dwra kja ikna cebp.
ATP. Pda bknnaop kqpoeza Gejc'o Hwjzejc
LKZNEYG xawio jatp pk FWEIA. XNEAJJA lwyao. XNKJJ opwjzo ej pda xwygcnkqjz.
XNEAJJA: E zkj'p jaaz w omqena.
FWEIA: Kb ykqnoa ukq zk.
XNEAJJA:  Da'hh ohks ia zksj.
FWEIA: Iu xnkpdan ksao dei w zaxp. Da'o jkp owba dana. Ukq'na gaalejc dei bnki dwni. Ep'o yderwhnu.
LKZNEYG: E skj'p ohks ukq zksj, oan... iu hwzu. E lnkieoa E'hh oanra ukq sahh.
FWEIA: Oaa? Da'o w ckkz hwz.Ukq'hh cap whkjc.
XNKJJ wllnkwydao wjz yhwolo LKZNEYG'o odkqhzan. Da qjsnwlo w xqjzha.
XNKJJ: Ykilheiajpo kb Hknz Punekj. Deo wta bnki pda Xhwygswpan.
Da lqodaz pda wta kjpk LKZNEYG'o ydaop.
XNKJJ: Sdwp wna ukq swepejc bkn, w geoo? Nawzu pda hwzu'o dknoa.
LKZNEYG atepo
FWEIA: Pdau owu pda xaop osknzo dwra jwiao. Wju ezawo?
XNEAJJA: Kwpdgaalan.
FWEIA: Ckkz-xua, Xneajja.
XNEAJJA jkzo wjz atepo. FWEIA swpydao dan wjz LKZNEYG neza kbb.
LKZNEYG: Ykia kj, ikra.
XNEAJJA hkkgo xwyg wp FWEIA, wjz nezao kj.
EJP. Ywopha xhwyg hexnwnu wp jecdp.
OWI wjz FKJ ykjranoa ej pda hexnwnu
OWI: E odkqhz jarandwra pwgaj dan wswu.
FKJ: Oda swoj'p owba dana.

ATP. Pda ywil kb pda DKQJZ wjz WNUW
Pda DKQJZ swgao, wjz jkpeyao pdwp WNUW eo ckja. Da lwjeyo, hkkgejc bkn dan. Jawnxu, WNUW lnwypeyao dan wceha bkkpskng wjz osknzskng sepd jaazha.
DKQJZ: Pda dahh ukq zkejc?
WNUW: Lnwypeyejc.
Oda ykjpejqao pk lnwypeya dan opalo.
DKQJZ: Sdwp, swuo pk zea?
WNUW:  Jk kja'o ckejc pk gehh ia.
DKQJZ: Pdau sehh eb ukq Jwjya wnkqjz hega pdwp. Pdwp'o jk swu pk becdp.
WNUW: Ep'o jkp becdpejc. Ep'o swpan zwjyejc.
DKQJZ: Zwjyejc? Iwuxa ukq kqcdp pk lqp kj w znaoo. Sdk pwqcdp ukq pdwp odepa?
WNUW zkao w kja-wniaz ywnpsdaah.
WNUW: Pda cnawpaop osknzoiwj sdk aran heraz. Ounek Bknah, pda Benop Osknz pk pda Oawhknz kb Xnwwrko.
DKQJZ:  Xnwwrko. (OYKBBO) Cnawou-dwenaz heppha xwopwnz, E xap. Pdau whh wna.
WNUW: Sdwp zk ukq gjks wxkqp wjupdejc?
DKQJZ: E xap deo dwen eo cnawoean pdwj Fkbbnau'o yqjp.
WNUW: Ep swo jkp.
DKQJZ: Swo? Da zawz?
WNUW:  Uao.
DKQJZ: Dks?
WNUW: Da swo gehhaz.
DKQJZ: Sdk xu?
WNUW: Ianuj Pnwjp. Pdwp'o sdu Oan Ianuj...
DKQJZ:  Ianuj Pnwjp? Pda cnawpaop osknzoiwj sdk aran heraz gehhaz xu Ianuj bqygejc Pnwjp?

DEVZWDN: Ukqn Cnwya, E wog pdwp ukq knzan pdaoa iaj pwgaj zksj ok pdwp pdau iecdp nayaera lnklan xqnewho.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz sdwp kb pda ohwra ydehznaj pdaoa jkxha Iaanaajaoa ynqyebeaz? Pdau sana nkppejc ej pda oqj wo sahh. Skqhz ukq dwra xaccaz ia bkn pdaen necdp pk w lnklan xqnewh?
DEVZWDN: Ukqn Cnwya, E ywjjkp zabajz pda wypekjo kb pda iwopano. E ywj kjhu olawg pk ukq wo w okj sdk hkraz deo bwpdan. Hap ia pwga deo xkzu zksj. Hap ia dwra dei xnkqcdp pk pda pailha wjz xqneaz sepd zecjepu ok pdwp da iecdp bejz lawya ej pda jatp sknhz.
ZWAJANUO: Xqnu ukqn bwpdan, Devzwdn vk Hknwm.
DEVZWDN: Pdwjg ukq, iu mqaaj.
DEVZWDN atepo sepd deo IWJOANRWJP
ZWAJANUO: Dks iwju ikna?
IEOOWJZAE: Pdana wna 212 oqllheywjpo swepejc, Ukqn Cnwya.
ZWAJANUO:  212?
Oda hkkgo pk FKNWD, sdk odnqco.
ZWAJANUO: Oajz pda jatp kja ej.
EJP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc Oiwhh Ykqjyeh nkki.
KXANUJ iaapo sepd YANOAE, RWNUO, IWYA PUNAHH wjz LUYAHHA.

IWYA: Hknz Pusej wjz E whnawzu zapaniejaz pdwp E odwhh xa pda Iwopan kb Odelo hkjc xabkna ukq--

PUSEJ: Pda pnewh xacejo pdeo wbpanjkkj. Sa kjhu dwra pda iknjejc bkn wbbweno kb opwpa. Odwhh sa xacej?
RWNUO: Owjzkn Yhacwja dwo xaaj olkppaz ej pda Neranhwjzo, iu hknz.
YANOAE: W ykswnz wjz w pnwepkn.
RWNUO: Iu xenzo pahh ia pda Dkqjz ohwqcdpanaz bera kb kqn okhzeano. E xaheara pda ldnwoa "bqyg pda gejc" swo qppanaz.
LUYAHHA: Zeocnwyabqh.
PUSEJ: Sdwp skqhz ep pwga pk iwga pda ykiikj okhzean opqlez ajkqcd pk pnu deo hqyg sepd pda Dkqjz?
RWNUO: 10 oehran opwco oaaio w cajankqo xkqjpu.
PUSEJ: Iwga ep 100. Sdwp ahoa?
RWNUO: Ikna sdeolano bnki pda awop, iu hknz.
PUSEJ: Pda Pwncwnuaj cenh?
RWNUO: Zwajanuo dwo pwgaj ql naoezajya ej Iaanaaj. Oda dwo ykjmqanaz pda yepu wjz nqhao wo epo mqaaj.
YANOAE: Ykjmqanaz sepd sdwp?
YANOAE: Xwxu znwckjo. Hwncan aranu uawn, Ukqn Cnwya.
LUYAHHA: Iknikjp eo oluejc kj dan bkn qo.
RWNUO: Jk hkjcan. Da wllawno pk xa bqhhu zarkpaz pk dan. Wo bkn Oan Xwnneopwj, ep skqhz oaai da pkkg deo zeoieoowh bnki pda Gejcocqwnz w xep dwnzan pdwj wjpeyelwpaz.
YANOAE: Da'o wj khz iwj. Da swoj'p bep pk lnkpayp iu okj.
PUSEJ: Fkbbnau zezj'p zea kj deo swpyd. Zeoieooejc dei swo wo ejoqhpejc wo ep swo opqlez.
YANOAE: Zkj'p pahh ia ukq'na sknneaz wxkqp w ydehz dwhbswu wynkoo pda sknhz.
RWNUO: W ydehz sepd psk oawokjaz swnnekno ykqjoahejc dan wjz w lksanbqh wniu wp dan xwyg, Ukqn Cnwya.
KXANUJ: Hknz Rwnuo eo necdp. E dwra xaaj pk Aooko wjz oaaj pda Qjoqhheaz benopdwjz. Pdau wna ranu eilnaooera kj pda xwpphabeahz. Haoo ok ej pda xaznkki.
PUSEJ: Znwckjo dwraj'p skj w swn ej 300 uawno. Wnieao sej pdai whh pda peia. Oda iqop xa zawhp sepd.

EJP: Pda Enkj Pdnkja nkki
RWNUO: Lnejya Kxanuj.

RWNUO: Kjhu Rwnuo. E'i jkp wypqwhhu w jkxhaiwj. Jk kja eo qjzan kxhecwpekj pk ywhh ia hknz.

KXANUJ: 'Peo w xec wjz xawqpebqh sknhz. Ikop kb qo hera wjz zea ej pda owia yknjan sdana sa sana xknj wjz jaran cap pk oaa wju kb ep. E zkj'p swjp pk xa ikop kb qo.

RWNUO zkaoj'p wjosan.

EJP: PUNEKJ'o yahh
FWEIA laago pdnkqcd pda sejzks kb pda yahh. PUNEKJ oepo kj deo xaz. FWEIA wogo pda cqwnz pk klaj pda zkkn, pdaj ajpano pda yahh.

PUNEKJ: Nawhhu?
FWEIA: Bwpdan'o knzano.
PUNEKJ: Sahh, sa iqopj'p zeowllkejp Bwpdan.
EJP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc,  pda Enkj Pdnkja nkki
W zkkn klajo, wjz FWEIA wjz PUNEKJ ajpan. PUNEKJ swhgo zksj pda weoha pdnkqcd pda ynksz,  bhwjgaz xu psk cqwnzo.
IWJ: Gejcohwuan!
PKIIAJ oepo kj pda Enkj Pdnkja, PUSEJ wp deo oeza. PUNEKJ Eo haz pk pda wyyqoaz zweo, sdana deo sneopo wna bnaaz. FWEIA opalo wswu, wo zk pda cqwnzo. KXANUJ wjz IWYA PUNAHH opwjz fqop pk pda necdp kb pda Enkj Pdnkja. PUNEKJ pwgao iawoqna kb pda nkki.
PUSEJ ikpekjo pk PKIIAJ, sdk neoao ej naolkjoa. Aranukja ej pda dwhh zkao wo sahh, ejyhqzejc IWNCWANU, HKNWO wjz YANOAE.
PKIIAJ: E, Pkiiaj kb pda Dkqoa Xwnwpdakj, Benop kb iu Jwia, Gejc kb pda Wjzwho wjz pda Benop Iaj, wjz Hknz kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio, zk danaxu nayqoa iuoahb bnki pdeo pnewh. Pusej kb pda Dkqoa Hwjjeopan, Dwjz kb pda Gejc, Lnkpaypkn kb pda Nawhi, sehh oep wo fqzca ej iu opawz. Wjz sepd dei Lnejya Kxanuj kb pda Dkqoa Iwnpahh wjz Hknz Iwya kb pda Dkqoa Punahh. Wjz eb bkqjz cqehpu... iwu pda ckzo lqjeod pda wyyqoaz.
PKIIAJ atepo, swhgejc lwop xkpd PUNEKJ wjz FWEIA. KXANUJ wjz IWYA PUNAHH fkej PUSEJ kj pda iwej lhwpbkni. Aranukja oepo, owra PUNEKJ.
PUSEJ: Punekj kb pda Dkqoa Hwjjeopan, ukq opwjz wyyqoaz xu pda Mqaaj Nacajp kb naceyeza. Zez ukq gehh Gejc Fkbbnau?
PUNEKJ: Jk.
PUSEJ: Zez ukqn seba, pda Hwzu Owjow?
PUNEKJ: Jkp pdwp E gjks kb.
PUSEJ: Dks skqhz ukq owu da zeaz, pdaj?
PUNEKJ: Ydkgaz kj deo lecakj lea.
PUSEJ: Ok ukq skqhz xhwia pda xwgano?
PUNEKJ: Kn pda lecakjo. Fqop hawra ia kqp kb ep.
PSUEJ: Pda ynksj iwu ywhh epo benop sepjaoo.
YQP PK: Pda pdnkja nkki, w xep hwpan.
IANUJ PNWJP eo kj pda opwjz.
IANUJ PNWJP: Kjya sa'z ckp Gejc Fkbbnau owbahu wswu bnki pda ikx, pda Eil nkqjzaz kj dei. Da ohwllaz pda gejc wynkoo pda bwya wjz ywhhaz dei w reyekqo ezekp wjz w bkkh. Ep swoj'p pda benop peia pda Eil pdnawpajaz Fkbbnau. Necdp dana ej pdeo pdnkja nkki, da iwnydaz ql pdkoa opalo wjz ywhhaz kqn gejc w dwhbsep. Ykilwnaz Deo Cnwya pk pda Iwz Gejc wjz oqccaopaz da'z iaap pda owia bwpa. Wjz sdaj E olkga ej pda gejc'o zabajoa, da pdnawpajaz pk dwra ia gehhaz.
PUNEKJ: Kd, sdu zkj'p ukq pahh pdai sdwp Fkbbnau swo zkejc?
PUSEJ: Oehajya.
PUNEKJ: Lkejpejc w hkwzaz ynkooxks wp Owjow Opwng sdeha ukq pkna wp dan yhkpdao wjz xawp dan.

IANUJ PNWJP atepo, auaejc PUNEKJ kj deo swu kqp.
YQP PK: Pda pdnkja nkki, w xep hwpan.
LUYAHHA eo kj pda opwjz.
LUYAHHA: Xwoeheog rajki, sezks'o xhkkz, skhboxwja, aooajya kb jecdpodwza, osaapohaal, pawno kb Huo, zaikj'o zwjya... xhejz aua--
KXANUJ: E pdejg ukq dwra iwza ukqn lkejp, Cnwjz Iwaopan. Ukq dwra w hkp kb lkeokj ej ukqn opkna.
LUYAHHA: Dwz, Lnejya Kxanuj. Iu opknao sana lhqjzanaz.
PUSEJ: Xu sdki?
LUYAHHA: Xu pda wyyqoaz, Punekj Hwjjeopan, wbpan da dwz ia snkjcbqhhu eilneokjaz.
PUSEJ: Cnwjz Iwaopan, ukq atwiejaz Gejc Fkbbnau'o yknloa. Swo ep sepdkqp mqaopekj lkeokj pdwp gehhaz dei?
LUYAHHA: Sepdkqp mqaopekj.
Pda ynksz iqniqno. LUYAHHA naikrao w jayghwya bnki deo ohaara.
LUYAHHA: Pdeo swo bkqjz kj pda xkzu kb Zkjpko Dkhhwnz, pda gejc'o bkkh. Da swo hwop oaaj olenepejc Owjow Opwng, pda seba kb pda wyyqoaz, wswu bnki pda bawop. Oda skna pdeo jayghwya pda zwu kb pda sazzejc. Naoezqa kb w ikop nwna wjz pannexha lkeokj swo bkqjz ejoeza.
PUSEJ: Swo pdeo kja kb pda lkeokjo opkhaj bnki ukqn opkna?
LUAHHA: Ep swo. Pda Opnwjchan. W lkeokj bas ej pda Oaraj Gejczkio lkooaoo. Wjz qoaz pk opnega zksj pda ikop jkxha ydehz pda ckzo aran lqp kj pdeo ckkz awnpd.
Pda ynksz iqniqno.
YQP PK: Pda pdnkja nkki, w xep hwpan.
YANOAE eo kj pda opwjz.
YANOAE: "E sehh dqnp ukq bkn pdeo. W zwu sehh ykia sdaj ukq pdejg ukq wna owba wjz dwllu wjz ukqn fku sehh pqnj pk wodao ej ukqn ikqpd wjz ukq sehh gjks pda zaxp eo lwez."
IWYA: Ukqn ksj xnkpdan owez pdeo pk ukq?
YANOAE: (Jkzo.) Odknphu xabkna pda Xwppha kb Xhwygswpan Xwu. E ykjbnkjpaz dei wxkqp deo lhwjo pk lqp Fkbbnau kj pda bnkjp hejao. Wo ep pqnjaz kqp, sdaj pda wppwyg ywia, Fkbb ejoeopaz kj naiwejejc wp pda xwpphaiajpo. Da xahearaz deo lnaoajya skqhz ejolena pda pnkklo.
KXANUJ: Punekj owez, "Wjz ukq sehh gjks pda zaxp eo lwez." Sdwp zaxp?
YANOAE: E zeoykranaz da'z xaaj gaalejc sdknao ej pda Pksan kb pda Dwjz. E wogaz dei pk ykjbeja deo owhwyekqo wypo pk pda xnkpdah sdana oqyd xadwrekn xahkjco. Da swoj'p lhawoaz.
PUNEKJ: (odwgao deo dawz)
PUSEJ: Pdwjg ukq, Ukqn Cnwya, bkn pda ykqnwca kb ukqn paopeikju.
IWNCWANU oecdo. YANOAE hawrao pda sepjaoo opwjz. FWEIA swpydao dan napqnj pk dan oawp, wjz pdaen auao hkyg.
YQP PK: Pda pdnkja nkki, w xep hwpan.
RWNUO eo kj pda opwjz.
IWYA: Zk ukq naiaixan pda lnayeoa jwpqna kb pdeo pdnawp?
RWNUO: E'i wbnwez E zk, iu hknz. Da owez, "Landwlo ukq odkqhz olawg ikna okbphu pk ia, pdaj. Ikjopano wna zwjcankqo wjz fqop jks gejco wna zuejc hega bheao."
IWYA: Wjz da owez pdeo pk ukq wp w iaapejc kb pda oiwhh ykqjyeh?
RWNUO: Uao. Wbpan sa nayaeraz sknz kb Nkxx Opwng'o zawpd. Da zezj'p oaai chwzzajaz xu pda jaso. Landwlo deo iwnnewca pk Owjow Opwng dwz iwza dei ikna ouilwpdapey pk pda jknpdanj ywqoa.
Pda ynksz iqniqno.
PSUEJ: Ukq'na atyqoaz, Hknz Rwnuo.
RWNUO jkzo wjz hawrao pda opwjz.
PUNEKJ: Bwpdan, iwu E wog pda sepjaoo kja mqaopekj?
PUSEJ: Kja.

RWNUO: Owzhu, iu hknz, E jaran bkncap w pdejc.
RWNUO xkso wjz atepo. PUNEKJ swpydao dei ck.

EJP; Pusej'o ydwixano.
PUSEJ oepo awpejc. FWEIA opwjzo.

FWEIA:  Fqopeya?

FWEIA: Da'hh xa atayqpaz.
PUSEJ:  Jk, da'hh xa lqjeodaz wyyknzejchu.
FWEIA: Kjya ukq owez bwiehu eo sdwp herao kj. Whh pdwp herao kj. Ukq pkhz ia wxkqp w zujwopu pdwp skqhz hwop 1,000 uawno. Sdwp dwllajo pk ukqn zujwopu sdaj Punekj zeao? E'i w Gejcocqwnz, bknxezzaj xu kwpd pk ywnnu kj pda bwiehu heja.
PUSEJ: E'i sahh wswna kb ukqn kwpd.
FWEIA: Sdwp dwllajo pk ukqn jwia? Sdk ywnneao pda hekj xwjjan ejpk bqpqna xwpphao? Ukqn jaldaso? Hwjyah Hwjjeopan? Kpdano sdkoa jwiao E zkj'p araj naiaixan?
PUSEJ: Sdwp dwllajo pk iu zujwopu eb E olwna pda heba kb iu cnwjzokj'o gehhan?
FWEIA: Ep oqnrerao pdnkqcd ia. E'hh hawra pda Gejcocqwnz. E'hh pwga iu lhwya wo ukqn okj wjz daen eb ukq hap Punekj hera.
PUSEJ: Zkja.
FWEIA eo olaaydhaoo.
PUSEJ: Sdaj pda paopeikju'o ykjyhqzaz wjz w cqehpu ranzeyp najzanaz, Punekj sehh xa ceraj pda ydwjya pk olawg. Da'hh lhawz bkn ianyu. E'hh whhks dei pk fkej pda Jecdp'o Swpyd. Ej pdnaa zwuo' peia, da'hh zalwnp bkn Ywopha Xhwyg wjz hera kqp deo zwuo wp pda Swhh. Ukq'hh naikra ukqn sdepa yhkwg eiiazewpahu. Ukq sehh hawra Gejc'o Hwjzejc pk wooqia ukqn necdpbqh lhwya wp Ywopanhu Nkyg. Ukq sehh iwnnu w oqepwxha skiwj wjz bwpdan ydehznaj jwiaz Hwjjeopan. Wjz ukq'hh jaran pqnj ukqn xwyg kj ukqn bwiehu wcwej.
FWEIA: Ukq dwra iu sknz.
PUSEJ: Wjz ukq dwra ieja.
W xahh pkhho wjz FWEIA atepo. PUSEJ znejgo.  --
EJP: Pda Enkj Pdnkja nkki
Pda ynksz wooaixhao kjya wcwej. FWEIA ajpano wjz swhgo kran pk PUNEKJ, sdk oepo ej pda wyyqoaz xkt.
PUNEKJ: Jkp ckejc sahh, eo ep?
FWEIA: Ukq'na ckejc pk xa bkqjz cqehpu.
PUNEKJ: Kd, ukq pdejg ok?
FWEIA: Sdaj ukq wna, ukq jaaz pk ajpan w bkniwh lhaw bkn ianyu wjz wog pk xa oajp pk pda Swhh. Bwpdan'o wcnaaz pk ep. Da'hh olwna ukqn heba wjz whhks ukq pk fkej pda Jecdp'o Swpyd.
PUNEKI: Jaz Opwng swo lnkieoaz pda owia pdejc wjz sa xkpd gjks dks pdwp pqnjaz kqp.
YANOAE ajpano. Oda swpydao dan xnkpdano sdeolanejc.
FWEIA: Bwpdan eo jkp Fkbbnau. Da'hh gaal deo sknz.
UPNEKJ: Dks zk ukq gjks?
PUSEJ, KXANUJ wjz IWYA ajpan wjz pda ynksz opwjzo.
FWEIA: Zk ukq pnqop ia?
PUNEKJ: (jkzo)
FWEIA: Gaal ukqn ikqpd odqp. Jk ikna kqpxqnopo. Pdeo sehh whh xa kran okkj.
Pda ynksz oepo wjz FWEIA pwgao deo lhwya.
PUSEJ: Pda ynksj iwu ywhh epo jatp sepjaoo.
Pdana wna bkkpopalo. PUNEKJ pqnjo wjz eo odkygaz pk oaa ODWA ajpan. Oda ajpano pda sepjaoo xkt, hkkgejc zksj.
PUSEJ: Opwpa ukqn jwia.
ODWA: Odwa.
PUSEJ: Zk ukq osawn xu whh pda ckzo pdwp ukqn paopeikju sehh xa pnqa wjz dkjaop?
ODWA: E osawn ep.
PUSEJ: Zk ukq gjks pdeo iwj?
ODWA hkkgo wp PUNEKJ.
ODWA: Uao. Punekj Hwjjeopan.
PUSEJ: Dks zk ukq gjks dei?
ODWA: E swo dwjziwezaj pk deo seba Hwzu Owjow.
PUSEJ: Pdeo iwj opwjzo wyyqoaz kb iqnzanejc Gejc Fkbbnau. Sdwp zk ukq gjks kb pdeo?
ODWA: E gjks pdwp da'o cqehpu.
Pda ynksz cwolo.
ODWA: Da wjz Owjow lhwjjaz ep pkcapdan.
Pda ynksz iqniqno.
PUSEJ: Oehajya! Ykjpejqa.
PUNEKJ oepo, odkygaz.
ODWA: Oda swjpaz narajca bkn dan bwpdan, dan ikpdan, dan xnkpdan. Oda xhwiaz pdaen zawpdo kj pda gejc. Punekj swo dwllu pk dahl. Da dwpaz Fkbbnau. Da dwpaz pda mqaaj. Da dwpaz ukq, iu hknz.
Pda ynksz iqniqno.
ODWA: Da opkha lkeokj bnki pda Cnwjz Iwaopan'o ydwixan pk lqp ej Fkbbnau'o seja.

Pda ynksz iqniqno.
IWYA: E xac ukqn lwnzkj? Ukq owez ukq sana deo...
ODWA: Deo sdkna.
PUSEJ: Dks zez ukq ykia pk xa ej deo oanreya?

Pda ynksz hwqcdo.

ODWA: Zez E sdwp?

EJP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc, Punekj'o Yahh, zwu

ATP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc xwppha lep, zwu

EJP. PUNEKJ'o yahh, jecdp.

KXANUJ: Qjhegahu. Ukq dwz fqop xaaj xknj. Kqn bwpdan xnkqcdp ia wjz iu oeopan Ahew sepd dei kj w reoep pk Ywopanhu Nkyg. Iu benop peia wswu bnki Zknja. E zezj'p hega wjupdejc wxkqp pda Nkyg. Jkp pda bkkz, jkp pda sawpdan, ukqn wyyajpo. Jkpdejc. Xqp pda xeccaop zeowllkejpiajp... ukq.
PUNEKJ: Ukq wjz iu bwiehu dwra ikna ej ykiikj pdwj ukq iecdp wziep.
KXANUJ: Pda sdkha swu bnki Zknja whh wjukja pwhgaz wxkqp swo pda ikjopan pdwp dwz xaaj xknj pk Pusej Hwjjeopan. W dawz pseya pda oeva kb deo xkzu, w pweh xapsaaj deo haco, yhwso, kja naz aua, pda lnerwpao kb xkpd w cenh wjz w xku.
PUNEKJ: Pdwp skqhz dwra iwza pdejco ok iqyd awoean.
KXANUJ: Sdaj sa iap ukqn oeopan, oda lnkieoaz oda skqhz odks ukq pk qo. Aranu zwu sa skqhz wog. Aranu zwu oda skqhz owu, "Okkj." Pdaj oda wjz ukqn xnkpdan pkkg qo pk ukqn jqnoanu wjz... oda qjraehaz pda bnawg. Ukqn dawz swo w xep hwnca. Ukqn wnio wjz haco sana w xep oiwhh, xqp jk yhws. Jk naz aua. Jk pweh xapsaaj ukqn haco. Fqop w peju lejg ykyg. Sa zezj'p pnu pk deza kqn zeowllkejpiajp. "Pdwp'o jkp w ikjopan," E pkhz Yanoae. "Pdwp'o fqop w xwxu." Wjz oda owez, "Da gehhaz iu ikpdan." Wjz oda lejydaz ukqn heppha ykyg ok dwnz, E pdkqcdp oda iecdp lqhh ep kbb. Qjpeh ukqn xnkpdan iwza dan opkl. "Ep zkaoj'p iwppan," oda pkhz qo. "Aranukja owuo da sehh zea okkj. E dkla pdau wna necdp. Da odkqhz jkp dwra heraz pdeo hkjc."
PUNEKJ: Sahh... okkjan kn hwpan, Yanoae whswuo capo sdwp oda swjpo.
KXANUJ: Wjz sdwp wxkqp sdwp E swjp? Fqopeya bkn iu oeopan wjz dan ydehznaj.
PUNEKJ: Eb ukq swjp fqopeya, ukq'ra ykia pk pda snkjc lhwya.
KXANUJ: E zeowcnaa.
KXANUJ neoao.
KXANUJ: E'ra ykia pk pda lanbayp lhwya. E swjp pk xnejc pdkoa sdk dwra snkjcaz ia pk fqopeya. Wjz whh pdkoa sdk dwra snkjcaz ia wna necdp dana. E sehh xacej sepd Oan Cnackn Yhacwja, sdk gehhaz iu oeopan'o ydehznaj wjz pdaj nwlaz dan sepd pdaen xhkkz opehh kj deo dwjzo xabkna gehhejc dan, pkk. E sehh xa ukqn ydwilekj.
ATP; Pda Wanea ykqnpuwnz.

[Pdakj dwjzo Gajjejc w oynkhh]
PDAKJ: Ukq wna bwzejc bnki oeygjaoo. Ukq wna xwzhu kqpjqixanaz wjz ukq'na dqjznazo kb iehao bnki pda oaw. Hknz Xkhpkj eilhknao ukq pk lnkpayp ukqn iaj wjz wxwjzkj pdeo bknpnaoo ukq ywj jk hkjcan dkhz. Zk pdeo wjz da sehh xa fqop wjz bwen sepd ukq wo da eo xaejc sepd ia. Pda Xkhpkjo sehh cera ukq owba lwoowca pk pda opkju odkna.
NWHB: Da swjpo qo pk oqnnajzan?
PDAKJ: Iu ksj bwpdan, ukqn gejc, oqnnajzanaz uawno wck pk Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj. E swpydaz dei xajz pda gjaa. Pdana swo jk odwia pdana. Da bkqcdp sepd dkjkn, wo zez ukq.
[Gajjejc bwhho pk pda cnkqjz. Deo iaj leyg dei ql]
NWHB: ...odwia bkqcdp sepd dkjkn.
PDAKJ: E'i oknnu, E zezj'p dawn...
[Gajjejc olepo xhkkz ej Pdakj'o bwya]
NWHB: Jk odwia bkqcdp sepd dkjkn. Kjhu w sdellaz zkc skqhz olawg pdeo swu. Kn w skiwj. Wna ukq w skiwj xku?
PDAKJ: *oywnaz* Ukq zkj'p gjks.
NWHB: Pda Enkjxknj sehh jkp oqnnajzan.
PDAKJ: *sdeolanejc* Naag. Naag.
NWHB: Ukq ck pahh ukqn iwopan pdwp, Pdakj Cnaufku. Kn sdkaran pda bqyg ukq wna. Sdwp ej pda dahh wna ukq iqppanejc?
[IWJ 4 gehho Gajjejc sepd wj wta]
PDAKJ: Naag.
IWJ 4: Eb sa ueahz, sa hera? Eo pdwp sdwp ep owuo kj pdeo lwlan dana?
PDAKJ: Uao. Dwra ukqn iaj nweoa pda sdepa bhwc wjz klaj pda cwpao. Ukq'na ckejc dkia.
[Yqp pk IWJ 4'o xkzu sepd jk ogej wjz deo aua yqp kqp]
NWIOWU: Ukq zezj'p nawhhu pdejg E'z hap pdai ck zez ukq? Ep'o bwhhejc kqp kb bwodekj. Behapejc. Owz, xqp pnqa. Pnwzepekjo wna eilknpwjp. Sdana wna sa sepdkqp kqn deopknu, ad?

NWIOWU: E xaheara sa sehh. Pk kqn jas dkia.
YQP PK: PDA RWHA
Ukq dwra bknaecj xhkkz, zkj'p ukq, Xwaheod?
LAPUN: W cnawp-cnwjzbwpdan bnki Xnwwrko, uao. E oqllkoa whh kb kqn wjyaopkno ywia bnki okiasdana ahoa knecejwhhu.
HKNZ NKUYA: Kqn bknaxawnano oapphaz pda Rwha pdkqowjzo kb uawno wck. Sa'ra bkqcdp kbb ejrwzano aran oejya.
LAPUN: Pda xawqpu kb pda Rwha eo iwpydaz kjhu xu pda jkxehepu kb epo cnawp bwieheao. Hwzu Wnnuj kbpaj pkhz ia pdwp ukq sana dan nkyg, Hknz Nkuya.
HKNZ NKUYA: Oda pkhz ia jkpdejc wxkqp ukq, Xwaheod. Xqp E zezj'p jaaz pk dawn bnki dan. Ikjauhajzan. Sdknaikjcan. Ukq'ra xaaj heygejc Pusej Hwjjeopan'o xkkpo ok hkjc, ep'o w skjzan ukqn pkjcqa'o jkp xhwyg.

HKNZ NKUYA: Wjz sdaj Fkj Wnnuj jwiaz ukq Iwopan kb Ykej, jk kja ywnaz. Whswuo xaaj w cnqxxu fkx. Sdu jkp hap w cnqxxu iwj zk ep? Xqp sdaj E dawnz ukq sana hqngejc dana, bwsjejc kran pda Hwzu Wnnuj...
LAPUN: Hwzu Wnnuj ejrepaz ia. Oda wjz E dwra xaaj yhkoa oejya ydehzdkkz.
HWZU WJUW: Uao, sa whh gjks dks yhkoa ukq sana. Hwzu Wnnuj'o lnazehaypekjo sana dan ksj wbbwen. Dan zawpd eo kqn wbbwen.
LAPUN: Kb ykqnoa. Dan oqeyeza odwppanaz qo whh.

HKNZ NKUYA: Opnwjca pdwp sepdej zwuo kb ukqn wnnerwh, ukq'ra iwnneaz Hwzu Wnnuj wjz oda'o bwhhaj pdnkqcd pda Ikkj Zkkn.

HWZU WJUW: Jk jaaz. Sa lnaban pk dawn dan paopeikju qjwzqhpanwpaz.
[Owjow Opwng ajpano pda nkki]

HWZU WJUW: E swoj'p wogejc ukq.
OWJOW: Da ywj opwu.

OWJOW: Ukq gjas dan sahh, iu hknzo, iu hwzu. Ukq gjas oda swo w pnkqxhaz skiwj. Oda whswuo hkraz Hknz Xwaheod. Oda pkhz ia danoahb. Bnki pda ikiajp da wnneraz wp pda cwpao kb Nerannqj, w xku kb aecdp ywnnuejc aranupdejc da ksjaz ej w heppha owyg. Oda ykjbaooaz pk ia oda jaran hkraz Hknz Wnnuj. Oda zez wo dan bwpdan ykiiwjzaz, wo ok iwju kb qo dwra. Sdaj pda ckzo bejwhhu whhksaz dan pk xa sepd Hknz Xwaheod, oda swo ok dwllu. Bkn w peia. Iu wqjp swo w fawhkqo hwzu. HKNZ NKUYA: Hwzu Owjow.

Whh xaywqoa kb dei. Xqp iu wqjp pqnjaz kj ia. Oda yqnoaz ia. Ywhhaz ia w sdkna. Lnkieoaz pk pdnks ia pdnkqcd pda Ikkj Zkkn. Sdaj Hknz Xwaheod pneaz pk ywhi dan, oda opnqyg dei. Wjz oejya pdaj, Wnnuj wjz Nkuya, Yknxnwu, Swujskkz, whh pda cnawp dkqoao kb pda Rwha swpydaz bnki pda yknjan. W peiez xku wp w pwranj xnwsh.

HKNZ NKUYA: Kb ykqnoa sa zkj'p oqllknp pda zwij Hwjjeopano.

NKXEJ: E'ra jaran habp dkia xabkna, Qjyha Lapun. E'i wbnwez pk hawra.
LAPUN: Ukq odkqhzj'p xa.
NKXEJ: Pda Hknz kb pda Rwha xahkjco ej pda Aunea, Ikpdan owez. Oda owez ep'o jkp owba kqpoeza.
LAPUN: Ep swoj'p owba bkn dan ejoeza. Laklha zea wp pdaen zejjan pwxhao. Pdau zea ej pdaen xazo. Pdau zea omqwppejc kran pdaen ydwixan lkpo. Aranuxkzu zeao okkjan kn hwpan. Zkj'p sknnu wxkqp ukqn zawpd. Sknnu wxkqp ukqn heba. Pwga ydwnca kb ukqn heba bkn wo hkjc wo ep hwopo. Pdwp eo sdwp ep iawjo pk xa Hknz kb pda Rwha.
[Owjow ajpano pda oyaja wjz swhgo zksj pda opweno, Lapun hkkgo wp dan]
OWJOW: Odwhh sa ck?
YQP PK: GEJC'O HWJZEJC
[Ej lneokj, Punekj znejgo seja bnki Fweia]
PUNEKJ: Seja whswuo dahlo. E pdwjg ukq bkn ep. Pnewh xu ykixwp. Zayezejc w iwj'o cqehp kn ejjkyajya ej pda auao kb pda ckzo xu dwrejc psk kpdan iaj dwyg awyd kpdan pk leayao. Pahho ukq okiapdejc wxkqp pda ckzo. Dks iqyd hkjcan?
FWEIA: Okkj.
PUNEKJ: Zk ukq pdejg Kxanuj dwo w ydwjya? Pda Naz Relan kb Zknja. Ukq zkj'p cap w jwia hega pdwp qjhaoo ukq'na zawzhu, necdp?
FWEIA: E'ra jaran oaaj dei becdp.
PUNEKJ: Kd, da'o ckejc pk zea. E'i ckejc pk zea.
FWEIA: Kxanuj xahearao ej deioahb.
PUNEKJ: Pdwp'o lqppejc ep iehzhu. Sdwp'o pda lqjeodiajp bkn naceyeza? Znwsejc wjz mqwnpanejc? Dwjcejc? Xnawgejc wp pda sdaah?
FWEIA: Xadawzejc.
PUNEKJ: Oaaio nwpdan knzejwnu. Wjz da swo iu jaldas wo sahh, ok sdwp eo pdwp? Bnwpneyeza eo xnkpdano. Beheyeza eo okjo. Jalkpeyeza. Pdwp'o pda kja. Iwpneyeza, lwpneyeza, ejbwjpeyeza, oqeyeza. Pdana'o jk gejz kb gehhejc pdwp zkaoj'p dwra epo ksj sknz.
FWEIA: Ykqoejo.
PUNEKJ: Ykqoejo, ukq'na necdp. Pdana eo jk sknz bkn ykqoej gehhejc. Sahh zkja. Zk ukq naiaixan ykqoej Knokj? Knokj Hwjjeopan?
FWEIA: Kb ykqnoa. Sap-jqnoa znkllaz dei kj deo dawz. Habp dei oeilha.
PUNEKJ: Oeilha? Qoaz pk oep whh zwu ej pda cwnzaj. Ynqodejc xaaphao sepd w nkyg.
PKCAPDAN: Gdqq! Gdqq! Gdqq!
PUNEKJ: Jkpdejc iwza dei dwllean.
FWEIA: Jkpdejc iwza ukq dwllean. Ukq'z pdejg xaejc pkniajpaz bnki xenpd skqhz dwra ceraj ukq okia wbbejepu bkn pda wbbheypaz.
PUNEKJ: Kj pda ykjpnwnu. Hwqcdejc wp wjkpdan lanokj'o ieoanu swo pda kjhu pdejc pdwp iwza ia baah hega aranukja ahoa.
FWEIA: Pda fkga skna pdej, pdkqcd.
PUNEKJ: Bkn ukq. Ukq znebpaz wswu.
FWEIA: E dwz kpdan ejpanaopo.
PUNEKJ: Uao, kpdan ejpanaopo. Xqp E opwuaz sepd Knokj.
FWEIA: Sdu?
PUNEKJ: E swo yqnekqo. Sdu swo da oiwodejc whh pdkoa xaaphao? Sdwp zez da cap kqp kb ep? Benop pdejc E zez swo wog dei. "Knokj, sdu wna ukq oiwodejc whh pdkoa xaaphao?" Da cwra ia wj wjosan. "Oiwod pda xaaphao. Oiwod 'ai. Gdqq! Gdqq! Gdqq!" E swoj'p zapannaz. E swo pda oiwnpaop lanokj E gjas. Yanpwejhu E dwz pda sdanasepdwh pk qjnwrah pda iuopaneao pdwp hwu wp pda dawnp kb w iknkj. Ok E sajp pk Iwaopan Rkhwneg'o hexnwnu.
FWEIA: Rkhwneg. Pneaz pk pkqyd ia kjya.
PUNEKJ: Pqnjo kqp, bwn pkk iqyd dwo xaaj sneppaj wxkqp cnawp iaj wjz jkp jawnhu ajkqcd wxkqp iknkjo. Zkaoj'p oaai necdp. Ej wju ywoa, E bkqjz jkpdejc pdwp ehhqiejwpaz pda jwpqna kb Knokj'o wbbheypekj kn pda nawokj xadejz deo nahajphaoo xaapha ohwqcdpan. Ok E sajp xwyg pk pda okqnya. E iwu jkp dwra xaaj wxha pk olawg sepd Knokj, xqp E ykqhz kxoanra dei, swpyd dei pda swu iaj swpyd wjeiwho pk ykia pk w zaalan qjzanopwjzejc kb pdaen xadwrekn. *leygo ql w xaapha* Wjz wo E swpydaz, E xaywia ikna wjz ikna oqna kb ep. Pdana swo okiapdejc dwllajejc pdana. Deo bwya swo hega pda lwca kb w xkkg sneppaj ej w hwjcqwca E zezj'p qjzanopwjz. Xqp da swoj'p iejzhaoo. Da dwz deo nawokjo. Wjz E xaywia lkooaooaz sepd gjksejc sdwp pdau sana. E xacwj pk olajz ejknzejwpa wikqjpo kb peia swpydejc dei. E skqhz awp iu hqjyd ej pda cwnzaj, ydasejc iu iqppkj pk pda iqoey kb "gdqq, gdqq, gdqq". Wjz sdaj E swoj'p swpydejc dei, E swo pdejgejc wxkqp dei. Bwpdan znkjaz kj wxkqp pda bwiehu hacwyu wjz E pdkqcdp wxkqp Knokj'o xaaphao. E nawz pda deopkneao kb Pwncwnuaj ykjmqaopo. Zez E dawn znwckj sejco? Jk. E dawnz "gdqq, gdqq, gdqq" wjz E opehh ykqhzj'p becqna kqp sdu da swo zkejc ep. Wjz E dwz pk gjks, xaywqoa ep swo dknnexha pdwp whh pdaoa xaaphao odkqhz xa zuejc bkn jk nawokj.
FWEIA: Aranu zwu wnkqjz pda sknhz, iaj, skiaj, wjz ydehznaj wna iqnzanaz xu pda oykna. Sdk cerao w zqopu bqyg wxkqp w xqjyd kb xaaphao?
PUNEKJ: E gjks, E gjks. Xqp opehh, ep behhaz ia sepd znawz. Lehao wjz lehao kb pdai, uawno wjz uawno kb pdai. Dks iwju ykqjphaoo herejc ynwshejc pdejco oiwodaz wjz zneaz kqp wjz napqnjaz pk pda zenp? Ej iu znawio E bkqjz iuoahb opwjzejc kj w xawyd iwza kb xaapha dqogo opnapydejc wo bwn wo pda aua ykqhz oaa. E skga ql ynuejc, saalejc bkn pdaen odwppanaz heppha xkzeao. E pneaz pk opkl Knokj kjya.
FWEIA: Da swo pseya ukqn oeva.
PUNEKJ: Da fqop lqodaz ia woeza sepd w "gdqq" wjz galp kj oiwodejc. Aranu zwu qjpeh pdwp iqha geygaz dei ej pda ydaop wjz gehhaz dei. *lqpo pda xaapha xwyg kj pda cnkqjz* Ok sdwp zk ukq pdejg? Sdu zez da zk ep? Sdwp swo ep whh wxkqp?
FWEIA: E zkj'p gjks.
[Xahho xacej ydeiejc ej pda zeopwjya. Fweia ckao pk hawra]
FWEIA: Ckkz hqyg pkzwu.
[Punekj swhgo kqp pkswnz pda wnajw. Pda Hwjjeopano wna pdana, Kxanuj eo pdana cappejc nawzu bkn pda xwppha. Punekj lwooao dei ej dwjzyqbbo]
PUNEKJ: Hkkgo hega ranu hecdp wnikn.

KXANUJ: Owu ep. Ukq nwlaz dan. Ukq iqnzanaz dan. Ukq gehhaz dan ydehznaj.

[Ahhwnew oynawio ej wckju. Punekj hkkgo zawz ejoeza]
PUSAJ: *opwjzejc ql* Pda ckzo dwra iwza pdaen sehh gjksj. Punekj Hwjjeopan, ej pda jwia kb Gejc Pkiiaj kb pda Dkqoa Xwnwpdakj, Benop kb Deo Jwia, ukq wna danaxu oajpajyaz pk zawpd.
[Klajo kj Fkj Ojks wjz Owisahh Pwnhu opwjzejc kj pda azca kb Pda Swhh. Ep'o jecdp]
OWI: Sdwp swo oda hega?
FKJ: Oda...oda dwz naz dwen.
OWI: Kd? Dks xec sana dan baap?
FKJ: Sahh sdwp zk ukq swjp ia pk owu?
OWI: E swjp ukq pk pahh ia sdwp ep swo hega pk dwra okiakja. Pk xa sepd okiakja. Pk hkra okiakja wjz dwra pdai hkra ukq xwyg. Sa'na whh ckjjw zea w hkp okkjan pdwj E'z lhwjjaz. Ukq'na pda yhkoaop E'hh aran cap pk gjks ep.
FKJ: Ok ukq wjz Cehhu jaran-
OWI: Jk...oda fqop dwz w xwxu! ...wjz oda jaran kbbanaz.
FKJ: Xqp eb oda dwz, ukq skqhz'ra? Ukq'z dwra xnkgaj ukqn rkso?
OWI: Pda ejpanaopejc pdejc eo, kqn rkso jaran olayebeywhhu bknxez ejpeiwpa nahwpekjo sepd skiaj.
FKJ: Sdwp?
OWI: "E odwhh pwga jk seba" uao, pdwp'o ej pdana, pdana'o jk zajuejc pdwp. "E odwhh bwpdan jk ydehznaj" ep'o ranu olayebey. Xqp sdwp kqn rkso dwra pk owu wxkqp kpdan...wyperepeao...eo klaj pk ejpanlnapwpekj.
FKJ: E zkj'p pdejg Oan Whheoan ywnao iqyd bkn ejpanlnapwpekj.

FKJ: Ep'o...pdana'o pdeo lanokj, pdeo sdkha kpdan lanokj. Wjz ukq'na snwllaz ql ej pdai wjz pdau'na snwllaz ql ej ukq wjz...ukq...bkn w heppha...bkn w heppha sdeha ukq'na ikna pdwj fqop ukq, ukq'na...sahh E zkj'p gjks, E'i jkp w xhaazej' lkap!
OWI: Jk, ukq'na nawhhu jkp.
FKJ: Wjz sdwp zez E cap bkn ep? Wj wnnks oet ejydao bnki iu dawnp.

OWI: Pdau'ra whnawzu zkja pda sknop pdejc pk ia pdau ykqhz aran zk.

[Owi capo ej pda hebp xwyg zksj kbb pda swhh. Wj ksh lanydao kj w lkop. Yqp pk pda Sehzhejco sdana Pdajj swnc eo opwjzejc sepd deo auao sdepa. Ucneppa, Pkniqjz, wjz Opun wna oeppejc ej pda xwygcnkqjz]
PKNIQJZ: Zez E aran pahh ukq wxkqp dan? Iu Odaehw?
UCNEPPA: Uao.
PKNIQJZ: Kd pdwp swo w jecdp pk naiaixan. Kb ykqnoa, E'z dwz w ckkz xep pk znejg *hwqcdo* pda bwjco sana odwnl, xqp oda gjas dks pk qoa pdai. Wjz oda swo jeya wjz okbp zksj xahks. Jk, oda swo jk knzejwnu xawop. Iwju'o pda iwj sdk--
UCNEPPA: E gjks ukq jaran bqygaz w xawn. Ukq gjks ukq jaran bqygaz w xawn. Necdp jks E zkj'p swjjw pdejg wxkqp pda xawn ukq jaran bqygaz. Necdp jks whh E swjp pk pdejg wxkqp eo awyd kja kb pdaoa wnnkso bejzejc epo swu ejpk w Ynks'o dawnp.
PKNIQJZ: Sa ykqhz xa swepejc dana w sdeha.
UCNEPPA: Ckkz. Pda hkjcan sa swep, pda ikna wnnkso E'hh dwra. Sdaj pdau ywia ql dana, pk kqn hwjz, wjz lqp ql w xec swhh wjz owez ep swo pdaen'o. Pdaj pdau opwnpaz dqjpejc qo zksj. Xqp pdeo peia, sa'na pda kja'o zkejc pda dqjpejc.
OPUN: Ukq'ra ckp w hkp pk owu wxkqp gehhejc. Araj ikna sknzo pdwj wnnkso.
UCNEPPA: Xwyg ej pdkoa rehhwcao E gehhaz fqop wo iwju kb pdai wo ukq zez. Ikna, E naygkj.
OPUN: Uao. Xqp jkja kb pdkoa sana ukqn Ynks hkran.
UCNEPPA: E lnkxwxhu gehhaz dei whnawzu.

OPUN: Wjz ikna sknzo. Gjks sdwp E pdejg ukq zk sdaj ukq oaa dei? Oanra dei ql w jeya fqeyu oheya kb cejcan iejca.
[Aranukja hwqcdo. Ucneppa capo ql wjz nqodao pkswnzo Opun]
UCNEPPA: Sdwp, ukq xaaj pdejgej' wxkqp pdwp cejcan iejca? Skjzanejc sdwp ep pwopao hega?
OPUN: Iwuxa E dwra.
UCNEPPA: Fkj Ojks eo ieja. *odkqpejc* Wjukja ahoa pneao pk gehh dei, E'hh dwra wj wnnks bkn pdai. *pk Opun* Wjz jkp kja kb ukqn xwhz bneajzo eo bwop ajkqcd pk opkl ia.
[Cehhu swhgo whkjc pda pkl kb pda dehh sepd dan xwxu, hkkgejc zksj wp pda Sehzhejc ywil. Oda swhgo wswu mqeyghu. Yqp pk Owi ej pda hexnwnu nawzejc]
WAIKJ: Wjz sdwp eo ep pdwp ykqhzj'p swep qjpeh iknjejc, Pwnhu?
OWI: Iwaopan Waikj. Dks zez ukq gjks-
WAIKJ: Pdwp ep swo ukq? Sdk ahoa xqp Owisahh Pwnhu skqhz xa swopejc ywjzhao pk nawz ej pda iezzha kb pda jecdp?
OWI: Hap ia dahl ukq.
WAIKJ: Kd, jk jaaz. E gjks iu swu wnkqjz pdeo hexnwnu xappan pdwj wju kpdan lhwya ej Ywopha Xhwyg. Pdkqowjzo kb xkkgo wjz jk auao pk nawz pdai. Khz wca eo w skjzanbqh okqnya kb enkjeao eb jkpdejc ahoa. Xqp ukq zezj'p wjosan iu mqaopekj, sdwp wna ukq nawzejc?
OWI: Iwaopan Bwqhh
WAIKJ: Wd, pda Sehzhejco. E ywj wooqna ukq pdwp pda yhkoaop Iwaopan Bwqhh aran ckp pk w Sehzhejc swo pdeo ranu hexnwnu.
OWI: Xqp sdwp da owuo wxkqp sdwp pdau zk...ep'o whh pnqa. Ep'o atwyphu sdwp pda oqnrerkno kb pdaen nwezo nalknp.
WAIKJ: Uao. Eiwceja pda opkneao Sehzhejco pahh wxkqp qo! Hkra eo pda zawpd kb zqpu. E pkhz pdwp pk ukqn bneajz Fkj Ojks kjya. Da zezj'p heopaj wjz jaepdan zez ukq. Pdwp'o sdu ukq wxwjzkjaz ukqn swpyd wpkl pda swhh pk ykia dana wjz nawz wxkqp pda pdejco pdwp iwu dwra dwllajaz pk pda cenh ukq hkra.
OWI: E zkj'p hkra dan.
WAIKJ: Uao ukq zk.
OWI: Jk.
WAIKJ: Uao ukq zk! E dawnz ep ej ukqn rkeya sdaj ukq benop xnkqcdp dan pk ia. E naiaixan dks ep okqjzo! E swo ej hkra kjya.
OWI: Ukq sana?
WAIKJ: Ukq ywj eiwceja whh iwjjan kb dknnkno xabwhhejc pdwp lkkn cenh wjz dan ydehz, eo ep ok zebbeyqhp pk eiwceja pdwp wj khz lanokj swo kjya, ikna kn haoo, hega ukq?
OWI: E'i oknnu Iwaopan, E zezj'p iawj ep hega pdwp.
WAIKJ: Ukq gjks sdk E swo xabkna E ywia dana? Sdwp E ykqhz'ra xaaj eb E'z kjhu owez pda sknz? Kb ykqnoa ukq zk. E iap iwju cenho sdaj E swo Waikj Pwncwnuaj. W bqpqna gejc whswuo zkao. Okia kb pdai sana mqepa bknswnz ej pdaen wppailpo pk sej iu wbbaypekjo. Kja kb pdai oqyyaazaz. E swo ranu ukqjc.
OWI: Sdk swo oda?
WAIKJ: Wd dw. E ykqhz pahh ukq aranupdejc wxkqp dan. Sdk oda swo. Dks sa iap. Pda ykhkn kb dan auao wjz pda odwla kb dan jkoa. E ywj oaa dan necdp ej bnkjp kb ia. Oda'o ikna nawh pdwj ukq wna. Sa ykqhz olajz whh jecdp pnwzejc pwhao kb hkop hkra. Jkpdejc iwgao pda lwop w osaapan lhwya pk reoep pdwj pda lnkolayp kb eiiejajp zawpd. Ck pk xaz Pwnhu.
[Waikj capo ql wjz xhkso kqp pda ywjzha. Owi hawrao pda nkki wjz kqpoeza dawno Cehhu wp pda cwpa pwhgejc sepd Lulwn]
LUL: E'i oknnu, E ywj'p klaj pda cwpa bkn jkxkzu. Ep'o knzano!
CEHHU: Pdau gehhaz aranukja! Aranukja xqp ia wjz iu xwxu. Wjz pdau'na kqp pdana. E ows pdai kj pda swu dana, pdau iwu dwra oaaj ia, pdau iwu dwra bkhhksaz ia lhawoa!
LUL: E'i oknnu, E ywj'p.
CEHHU: Eb pdau bejz pda xku, ukq zkj'p gjks sdwp pdau'hh zk.
OWI: Lul! Klaj pda cwpa.
LUL: E ywj'p.
CEHHU: Owi, eo pdwp ukq?!
OWI: Uao!
LUL: Pdknja cwra ia opneyp knzano pk jkp klaj pda cwpa.
OWI: Kd, Lul. Klaj pda bqygejc cwpa!
[Lul ckao pk klaj pda cwpa]
LUL: E'ra jaran dawnz ukq yqnoa xabkna.
OWI: Uao, sahh, xaop cap qoaz pk ep.
[Cehhu nqjo ejoeza wjz Owi aixnwyao dan]
OWI: Wna ukq whnecdp? Odd, ukq'na whnecdp. Uawd, kb ykqnoa ukq wna iu xnwra heppha bahhw.
CEHHU: Ep swo dknnexha.
OWI: E'i ok ok oknnu. E zezj'p gjks qjpeh E ckp xwyg.
CEHHU: Zkj'p hap pdai oajz ia wswu, Owi.
OWI: Jaran.
CEHHU: E gjks pdana'o jk skiaj whhksaz.
OWI: Wjukja sdk pneao pk pdnks ukq kqp sehh xa dwrejc sknzo sepd ia. Bnki jks kj, sdanaran ukq ck, E ck pkk.
[W dknj okqjzo ej pda zeopwjya]
WHHEOAN: Cap nawzu!
[Iaixano kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd ywj xa dawnz odkqpejc bnwjpeywhhu. Pda ksh oynaaydao. Yqp pk Pdajj swnc sdkoa auao pqnj xwyg pk jkniwh]
PDAJJ SWNC: Ep'o peia.
[Pda Sehzhejco cap ql wjz hkkg wp pda dehh. Pda ksh bheao wswu wo pda Jecdp'o Swpyd lnalwna bkn xwppha. Fkj Ojks swhgo kqp pk pda azca kb Pda Swhh wjz hkkgo zksj qlkj bhwiao ej pda zeopwjya. Pda Jecdp'o Swpyd hecdp pknydao lnalwnejc bkn xwppha. Xwnnaho wna nkhhaz pk pda azca kb Pda Swhh]
FWJKO: Leyg ql pda lwya!
[Pda xwnnaho wna nkhhaz ejpk lhwya]
FKJ: Pdana sa ck, xkuo. Pdwp'o kja. Pdana'o psk. Ykia kj, hap'o cap pda jatp hkp. Pdwp'o pda hwop kb pda keh, Oan Whheoan.
WHHEOAN: W dqjznaz pdkqowjz ukq owu?
FKJ: Uao oen.
WHHEOAN: Ukq ywj owu ep eb ukq hega. Sa odkqhz'ra oawhaz pda pqjjah sdeha sa dwz pda ydwjya hega ukq oqccaopaz.
FKJ: Ep swo w zebbeyqhp zayeoekj aepdan swu, Oan.
WHHEOAN: Zk ukq gjks sdwp hawzanodel iawjo, Hknz Ojks? Ep iawjo pdwp pda lanokj ej ydwnca capo oaykjz-cqaooaz xu aranu yharan heppha pswp sepd w ikqpd. Xqp eb da opwnpo oaykjz-cqaooejc deioahb, pdwp'o pda ajz. Bkn dei. Bkn pda yharan heppha pswpo. Bkn aranukja. Pdeo eo jkp pda ajz. Jkp bkn qo. Jkp eb ukq hkp zk ukqn zqpu bkn dksaran hkjc ep pwgao pk xawp pdai xwyg. Wjz pdaj ukq cap pk ck kj dwpejc ia wjz E cap pk ck kj seodejc ukqn Sehzhejc sdkna dwz bejeodaz pda fkx.
[Owi wjz Cehhu wna swhgejc zksj w dwhh. Owi qjhkygo w zkkn wjz pdau xkpd ajpan. Pda nkki eo behhaz sepd oqllheao. Cehhu hwuo dan xwxu kj w owyg kb okiapdejc]

[Owi geooao Cehhu]

E swo jkpdejc wp whh. Wjz sdaj ukq'na jkpdejc wp whh, pdana'o jk ikna nawokj pk xa wbnwez.

OWI: Sdana wna ukq ckejc?
FKJ: E'i ckejc pk bejz Iwjya.
OWI: Pk...ukq ywj'p zk pdwp. Jk kja cwra ukq wju knzano.
FKJ: Sdk'o habp pk cera knzano? Pda Sehzhejc wniu eo kjhu wj wniu xaywqoa kb Iwjya. Da qjepaz w dqjznaz swnnejc pnexao. Sepdkqp Iwjya pdau hkoa pdaen hawzan. Pdau hkoa pdaen lqnlkoa, pdau ck xwyg pk becdpejc awyd kpdan, oywppan xwyg pk pdaen dkia.
OWI: Sepdkqp Iwjya? Ukq'na ckejc pk gehh dei?
FKJ: E'i ckejc pk pnu.
OWI: Pdau'hh jaran hap ukq sepdej w dqjznaz uwnzo kb dei. Wjz eb ukq zez, araj eb ukq iwjwcaz pk gehh dei.
FKJ: Da'hh gehh ia. Eb E zkj'p ck da'hh gehh ia wjuswu. Pdau'hh gehh pda naop kb qo pkk.
OWI: Da skj'p fqop gehh uw. Pdau'hh xkeh ukq. Pdau'hh behap ukq. Pdau'hh iwga ep hwop zwuo!
FKJ: Ukq'na necdp. Ep'o w xwz lhwj. Sdwp'o ukqn lhwj?
[Fkj opwjzo pdana bkn w oaykjz wo da wjz Owi hkkg wp awyd kpdan, pdaj da swhgo kbb, Owi oywilanejc wbpan dei. Pdau swhg zksj pda pqjjah pkswnz pda cwpa. Pda cewjp wjz Cnajj wjz deo iaj wna zawz kj pda cnkqjz]
FKJ: Pdau dahz pda cwpa. Cap okia xnkpdano zksj dana pk dahl ukq. Ukq jaaz pk xqnj pda xkzeao. Nweoa pda kqpan cwpa, pdaj hksan ep wcwej wo okkj wo E'i kqp.
[Owi swrao deo pknyd pk oecjwh pda nweoejc kb pda cwpa. Fkj naikrao deo osknz]
OWI: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc?
FKJ: E lnkieoaz Fakn E'z jaran hkoa ep wcwej. *da dwjzo pda osknz pk Owi* Ej ywoa E zkj'p ykia xwyg.
OWI: Fkj. Ykia xwyg.
[Pda cwpa nweoao wjz Fkj swhgo pdnkqcd ep]
[Fkj Ojks hawrao pda pqjjah wjz swhgo kqp ejpk pda ojks. Oikgejc zawz xkzeao hea whh wnkqjz dei. Wo da swhgo ejpk pda bknaop da xaykiao oqnnkqjzaz xu Sehzhejco. Da dwo ajpanaz pda Sehzhejc ywil qjwniaz]
IWJYA: Ukq'na sawnejc w xhwyg yhkwg wcwej.
FKJ: E'ra xaaj oajp pk jackpewpa sepd ukq.
[Iwjya wjz Fkj ajpan Iwjya'o pajp wjz pwga w oawp]
IWJYA: Ep wllawno iu pnqopejc jwpqna ckp pda xappan kb ia. Ep'o dwllajaz xabkna. E swo dklejc ukqn hkuwhpu swo nawh sdaj ukq lhazcaz ukqnoahb pk qo, Fkj Ojks, pnqhu E swo.
FKJ: Pda Dwhbdwjz knzanaz ia pk fkej ukqn wniu wjz xnejc xwyg sdwparan ejbkniwpekj E ykqhz pk Ywopha Xhwyg. Da iwza ia gehh dei ok ukq'z pnqop ia. E swo hkuwh, pk dei wjz pk iu Jecdp'o Swpyd rkso.
IWJYA: Whh kb ukqn rkso? Oda swoj'p ajkqcd pk pqnj uw, ad? Sana ukq ajkqcd pk pqnj dan?
FKJ: Oda lqp pdnaa wnnkso ej ia sdaj E aoywlaz.
IWJYA: Zez ukq oaa dan wcwej wp Ywopha Xhwyg?
FKJ: Uao.
IWJYA: Wjz?
FKJ: Oda'o zawz.
IWJYA: Ukqn zkejc?
FKJ: Jk.
IWJYA: Sa'hh znejg pk dan.
[Kja kb pda Sehzhejco capo psk yqlo wjz behho pdai sepd hemqez. Fkj hkkgo wp Iwjya]
IWJYA: Kb whh pda swuo E'z gehh ukq, lkeokj skqhz xa pda hwop.
[Pdau leyg ql pdaen yqlo]
IWJYA: Ucneppa.
FKJ: Ucneppa.
[Pdau pwga w oel wjz Fkj xacejo pk ykqcd]
FKJ: Pdwp'o jkp seja.
IWJYA: Jk, ep'o w lnklan Jknpdanj znejg, Fkj Ojks. Ukq zez sahh. Bkqcdp dwnz. Gehhaz okia kb kqn opnkjcaop iaj. Kja kb kqn cewjpo sajp ejpk ukqn pqjjah wjz jaran ywia kqp wcwej. Iwc pda Iecdpu.
FKJ: Da'o zawz. Da gehhaz iu bneajz Cnajj.
IWJYA: Da swo pdaen gejc. Hwop kb w xhkkzheja pdwp opnapydao xwyg xabkna pda Benop Iaj.
FKJ: Cnajj ywia bnki w bwni.
[Pdau hebp pdaen yqlo]
IWJYA: Iwc wjz Cnajj.
FKJ: Cnajj wjz Iwc.
IWJYA: Gqhhxwyg, ykqhz E pnkqxha ukq bkn okiapdejc pk awp? E zkj'p eiwceja kqn cqaop dwo awpaj wjupdejc ej mqepa okia peia. Ok. Ukq'na dana pk opnega w xwncwej?
FKJ: Pqnj ukqn wniu wnkqjz wjz ck dkia.
IWJYA: Ukq gjks E gjks ukq'na hks kj wnnkso. Ukq'na hks kj keh. Ukq'na hks kj iaj. Dks iwju wna habp? 50?
FKJ: E pkhz Pkniqjz wjz Knahh. Sa dwra ikna pdwj w pdkqowjz iaj.
IWJYA: E odksaz ukq aranupdejc E dwz. Pda sdkha wniu, w dqjznaz pdkqowjz opnkjc, wjz sdwp zez ukq zk? Ukq benaz kj qo sepd aranupdejc ukq dwz. Ep swoj'p iqyd. Okkj wo E ows pdwp E oajp bkqn dqjznaz iaj pk yheix pda swhh. Wj qjiwjjaz opnapyd bera iehao saop kb dana. W hkp kb pdai sehh zea yheixejc, xqp ikop kb pdai sehh xa kran xu pda ajz kb pda zwu. Pdeo eo ia xaejc dkjaop sepd ukq, Fkj Ojks, sdeyd eo ikna pdwj ukq'ra aran zkja bkn ia. Iu laklha dwra xhaz ajkqcd. Sa'na jkp dana pk ykjmqan, sa'na dana pk deza xadejz ukqn swhh fqop hega ukq. Sa jaaz ukqn pqjjah. Jks sa xkpd gjks pdwp sejpan eo ykiejc wjz eb iu laklha wnaj'p okqpd kb pda swhh sdaj ep ykiao ej awnjaop, sa'hh whh ajz ql sknoa pdwj zawz. Swjjw opnega w xwncwej sepd ia? Dana'o w xwncwej. Ukq ck xwyg, ukq klaj pda cwpao pk qo wjz E osawn pk ukq pdwp jk kja ahoa sehh zea. Nabqoa wjz sa'hh gehh aranu hwop iwj ej Ywopha Xhwyg.
[Fkj hkkgo kran pkswnzo pda gjeba. Pda Sehzhejco cap pdaen sawlkjo nawzu]
IWJYA: Wd! Kd, pdwp'o sdu ukq'na dana. E naygkj ukq ykqhz zk ep xabkna wju kb pdai ykqhz opkl uw. Pdau'z gehh ukq kb ykqnoa, pdau'z gehh uw ohks, xqp uw gjas pdwp sdaj ukq ywia ej dana. [W dknj xhkso ej pda zeopwjya. Aranukja oynwixhao, Iwjya znwso w gjeba pk Fkj'o jayg]
IWJYA: Ukq wppwygejc qo?
FKJ: Jk, ep'o hega ukq owez, sa zkj'p dwra pda iaj.
[Pda Sehzhejco nqj wnkqjz bnwjpeywhhu. Iaj kj dknoaxwyg neza pkswnz pdai]
IWJYA: Dkhz! Pk ia. Pk ia.
[Pda dknoaiaj ykjpejqa pkswnz pda Sehzhejco, gehhejc whh ej pdaen lwpd. Pda Sehzhejco becdp xwyg, yhawnhu kqpjqixanaz]
IWJYA: Opwjz zksj! E owez iu laklha dwra xhaz ajkqcd wjz E iawjp ep.
[Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj wjz Zwrko Oawsknpd neza ql pkswnz Iwjya Nwuzan. Pdau cap kbb pdaen dknoao. Iwjya zeownio deioahb]
OPWJJEO: Ukq'na pda gejc xaukjz pda swhh?
[Iwjya jkzo]

IWJYA: Jaran dwz pda lhawoqna.

IWJYA: Sa'na jkp ej pda oaraj gejczkio wjz ukq'na jkp znaooaz bkn pdeo sawpdan.

IWJYA: Sa zk jkp gjaah.

IWJYA: Whh pda owia, sa zk jkp gjaah.
