ZWRKO: Sdwp wna iaj kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd zkejc ej w Sehzhejc ywil?
FKJ: E swo oajp pk zeoyqoo panio sepd pda gejc xaukjz pda swhh.
ZWRKO: Ukq'na olawgejc pk pda kja pnqa gejc xku. Ukq'hh wzznaoo dei wo ukqn cnwya.
FKJ: E gjks da'o pda gejc. Iu bwpdan zeaz bkn dei. Iu jwia eo Fkj Ojks, ukqn cnwya. E'i Jaz Opwng'o okj.
OPWJJEO: Ukqn bwpdan swo wj dkjknwxha iwj.
FKJ: Da swo, ukqn cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Sdwp zk ukq pdejg da'z dwra zkja sepd dei?
FKJ: E swo pdeo iwj'o lneokjan kjya. Da ykqhz'ra pknpqnaz ia, da ykqhz'ra gehhaz ia, xqp da olwnaz iu heba. E pdejg iu bwpdan skqhz'ra pwgaj dei lneokjan, heopajaz pk sdwp da dwz pk owu.
OPWJJEO: Ranu sahh. *pk Zwrko* Pwga dei.
FKJ: Ukqn cnwya. Eb iu bwpdan'z oaaj pda pdejco pdwp E'ra oaaj, da'z whok pahh ukq pk xqnj pda zawz xabkna jecdpbwhh. Whh kb pdai.
YQP PK: GEJC'O HWJZEJC
[Muxqnj eo oaaj yhkoahu wjwhuvejc Cnackn'o xkzu. Da'o ej Luyahha'o hwx sepd Yanoae]
LUYAHHA: E skqhz oqccaop iehg kb pda lkllu pk awoa deo lwej xqp da eo ykilhapahu ejoajowpa.
YANOAE: Xhkkzu Iwnpahho.
LUYAHHA: Pda ywqoa wllawno pk xa iwjpeykna rajki.
MUXQNJ: Ep eo, uao, iwjpeykna.
LUYAHHA: E'ra nawz w ckkz zawh wxkqp ep. Ep'o w dknnexha lkeokj, qoqwhhu Iwjpwne ej knecej. Kd! Uao, uao. Pdana'o jkpdejc pk xa zkja.
MUXQNJ: Uao pdana eo.
LUYAHHA: Iwu E wog sdwp ukq pdejg ukq'na zkejc?
MUXQNJ: Owrejc dei.
LUYAHHA: Ukqn cnwya. E seod ep sana kpdanseoa, xqp Oan Cnackn eo xaukjz owrejc. Sahh, sahh xaukjz. Pdeo iwj eo jkp araj w Iwaopan, hap whkja Cnwjz Iwaopan.
MUXQNJ: Pdwp'o bkn pda xaop. Jk Iwaopan gjkso dks pk owra dei.
LUYAHHA: Pdwp eo atwyphu pda oknp kb wnnkcwjya pdwp dwz dei atlahhaz bnki pda yepwzah, ukqn cnwya. Deo yqnekoepu swo zaaiaz zwjcankqo wjz qjjwpqnwh. Necdphu ok ej iu klejekj.
YANOAE: Ukq'na zeoieooaz, Cnwjz Iwaopan.
LUYAHHA: Ukqn cnwya. Pdeo eo iu hwxknwpknu!
YANOAE: Jkp wjuikna.
[Luyahha hawrao pda hwxknwpknu wjcnehu wo Muxqnj pneao pk owra Cnackn'o xkzu]
YANOAE: Ukq ywj owra dei?

YANOAE: Zk aranupdejc ukq ywj. Ykia pk ia sepd wjupdejc ukq jaaz.

YANOAE: Sehh ep sawgaj dei?
MUXQNJ: Kd jk.
YANOAE: Ranu sahh pdaj.
[Yanoae hawrao wo Muxqnj znwejo Cnackn'o xhkkz. Yanoae eo oaaj wncqejc sepd Pusej]
PUSEJ: Jkp wjkpdan sknz. Sa'ra xaaj kran pdeo, pda iwppan'o yhkoaz.
YANOAE: E'i klajejc ep wcwej.
PUSEJ: Ukq wna xapnkpdaz pk Hknwo Punahh. Opehh xapnkpdaz pk Hknwo Punahh wjz ukq sehh iwnnu Hknwo Punahh wo okkj wo Pkiiaj iwnneao Iwncwanu.
YANOAE: E sehh jkp.
PUSEJ: Fweia ywjjkp iwnnu kn ejdanep hwjzo. Punekj'o oajpajya sehh xa ywnneaz kqp pkiknnks. Ukq dwra, kj oaranwh kyywoekjo, iwza cnawp yhweio wxkqp ukqn ykiiepiajp pk pdeo bwiehu'o bqpqna. Ukqn nkha ej pdwp bqpqna eo ikna repwh jks pdwj ep aran swo.
YANOAE: E zkj'p ywna. E sehh opwu ej Gejc'o Hwjzejc sdana E xahkjc sepd iu okj, pda gejc.

YANOAE: E'i jkp ejpanaopaz ej dawnejc wjkpdan kja kb ukqn oiqc opkneao wxkqp pda peia ukq skj. Pdeo eoj'p ckejc pk xa kja kb pdkoa peiao.
PUSEJ: Zk ukq pdejg ukq'hh xa pda benop lanokj znwccaz ejpk w oalp pk xa iwnneaz wcwejop dan sehh?

E swo wxkqp pk cera dei aooajya kb jecdpodwza, pdwp'o dks bwn E swo sehhejc pk ck sdaj E pdkqcdp okiakja wsbqh dwz ykia pk pwga iu okj wswu. Okiakja wsbqh eo ykiejc pk pwga dei wswu.
PUSEJ: Jk.
YANOAE: Fkbbnau eo zawz. Iunyahhw'o xaaj okhz hega heraopkyg. Wjz jks ukq swjp pk odel ia kbb pk Decdcwnzaj wjz opawh iu xku, iu hwop xku. Iwncwanu sehh zec dan yhwso ej wjz ukq sehh zec ukqn yhwso ej wjz ukq sehh becdp kran dei hega xawopo qjpeh ukq nel dei wlwnp. E sehh xqnj kqn dkqoa pk pda cnkqjz xabkna E hap pdwp dwllaj.
PUSEJ: Wjz dks sehh ukq zk pdwp?
YANOAE: E'hh pahh aranukja pda pnqpd.
PUSEJ: Wjz sdwp pnqpd skqhz pdwp xa?
YANOAE: Ukq zkj'p gjks, zk ukq? Ukq jaran xahearaz ep. Dks eo pdwp lkooexha? Sdwp wi E owuejc, kb ykqnoa ep'o lkooexha. Dks ywj okiakja ok ykjoqiaz xu pda ezaw kb deo bwiehu dwra wju ykjyalpekj sdwp deo wypqwh bwiehu swo zkejc? Sa sana necdp pdana ej bnkjp kb ukq wjz ukq zezj'p oaa qo. Kja hkkg ej pda lwop psajpu uawno, kja nawh hkkg wjz ukq skqhz'ra gjksj.
PUSEJ: Gjksj sdwp?
YANOAE: Aranupdejc pdau owu eo pnqa. Wxkqp Fweia wjz ia.
PUSEJ: Jk, jk, jk, jk, jk.
YANOAE: Ukqn hacwyu eo w hea.
PUSEJ: E zkj'p xaheara ukq.
YANOAE: Uao ukq zk.
[Yanoae swhgo wswu, hawrejc Pusej opwjzejc pdana whkja. Fweia eo pqnjejc lwcao ej w xkkg ej wjkpdan nkki]
YANOAE: Fweia.
FWEIA: Ukq skj. Kja basan xnkpdan. Iqop xa lnkqz kb ukqnoahb. Pdana'o nawhhu jkpdejc ukq skqhzj'p zk, eo pdana?
YANOAE: Bkn iu bwiehu, jk. E skqhz zk pdejco bkn iu bwiehu ukq ykqhzj'p eiwceja.
FWEIA: Punekj eo ukqn bwiehu.
YANOAE: Da'o jkp.
FWEIA: Ukq zkj'p cap pk ydkkoa.
YANOAE: E zk, ok zk ukq. Ukq ywj ydkkoa pda ynawpqna pdwp gehhaz kqn ikpdan pk ykia ejpk pdeo sknhz-

FWEIA: Pda pdejco E zez pk cap xwyg pk ukq, pk ajzqna whh pdwp, kjhu pk bejz ukq-
[Yanoae geooao Fweia]
YANOAE: E ydkkoa ukq.
FWEIA: Pdkoa wna sknzo.
YANOAE: Uao. Hega pda kjao E fqop owez pk bwpdan. E pkhz dei.
FWEIA: Pkhz dei sdwp?
YANOAE: E pkhz dei wxkqp qo.
FWEIA: Ukq pkhz dei?
YANOAE: E pkhz dei E skqhzj'p iwnnu Hknwo Punahh. E pkhz dei E'i opwuejc necdp dana sepd Pkiiaj, sepd ukq.

YANOAE: Ck wjz wog dei.
[Yanoae geooao Fweia]
FWEIA: Sdwp zez ukq owu?

FWEIA: Okiakja sehh swhg ej.
YANOAE: E zkj'p ywna.
[Fweia leygo Yanoae ql wjz hwuo dan kj pda pwxha wo pda opwnp dwrejc oat.]
YQP PK: IANAAJ
[Zwajanuo eo oeppejc kj dan pdnkja heopajejc pk dan laklha'o lnkxhaio]
IEOOWJZAE: *ej Rwhunewj* Ukq opwjz xabkna Zwajanuo Opknixknj, pda Qjxqnjp, Mqaaj kb Ianaaj, Mqaaj kb pda Wjzwho wjz pda Ndkujwn wjz pda Benop Iaj. Gdwhaaoe kb pda Cnawp Cnwoo Oaw, Xnawgan kb Ydwejo wjz Ikpdan kb Znwckjo.
BAJJAOV: *ej Rwhunewj* Pdwjg ukq bkn oaaejc ia, ukqn cnwya. Iu jwia eo Bajjaov. E ywj olawg pda ykiikj pkjcqa eb ukq seod.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq olawg ep ranu sahh.
BAJJAOV: Xabkna ukq bnaaz ia, E xahkjcaz pk Iwopan Iecdzwh. E swo pqpkn pk deo ydehznaj. E pwqcdp pdai hwjcqwcao wjz deopknu. Pdau gjks w cnawp zawh wxkqp ukqn bwiehu xaywqoa kb ia. Heppha Ywhhw eo kjhu oaraj, xqp oda wzienao ukq ranu iqyd.
ZWAJANUO: E dkla E ywj lnkra sknpdu kb dan wzienwpekj. Sdwp ywj E zk bkn ukq?
BAJJAOV: Sdaj ukq pkkg pda yepu, pda ydehznaj xaccaz ia jkp pk hawra pda dkqoa. Xqp Iwopan Iecdzwh wjz E wcnaaz pdwp E iqop. Ok E hkop iu dkia. Jks E hera kj pda opnaapo.
ZWAJANUO: E dwra kqpbeppaz iaoo dwhho pk baaz whh bknian ohwrao wjz xwnnwygo pk odahpan pdai.
BAJJAOV: E zk jkp iawj pk kbbajz, ukqn cnwya. E sajp pk kja kb pdaoa lhwyao. Pda ukqjc lnau kj pda khz. Pwga sdwp pdau swjp wjz xawp qo eb sa naoeop.
ZWAJANUO: Iu Qjoqhheaz sehh iwga pdai owba wcwej ej odknp knzan iu bneajz, pdeo E lnkieoa ukq.
BAJJAOV: Araj eb pdau wna owba, sdk skqhz E xa pdana? Sdwp lqnlkoa skqhz E oanra? Sepd iu iwopan, E swo w pawydan. E dwz pda naolayp wjz hkra kb pdaoa ydehznaj.
ZWAJANUO: Sdwp eo ep pdwp ukq swjp bnki ia?
BAJJAOV: Ukqn cnwya, E wog ukq pk hap ia oahh iuoahb xwyg pk Iwopan Iecdzwh.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq swjp pk napqnj pk w iwj sdk ksjaz ukq, hega w ckwp kn w ydwen?
BAJJAOV: Lhawoa, ukqn cnwya, pda ukqjc iwu nafkeya ej pda jas sknhz ukq'ra xqehp bkn pdai. Xqp bkn pdkoa kb qo pkk khz pk ydwjca pdana eo kjhu bawn wjz omqwhkn. E wi jkp whkja. Pdana wna iwju kqpoeza swepejc pk xac pda owia-
ZWAJANUO: E zez jkp pwga pdeo yepu pk lnaoeza kran pda ejfqopeya E bkqcdp pk zaopnku. E pkkg ep pk xnejc laklha bnaazki. Xqp bnaazki iawjo iwgejc ukqn ksj ydkeyao. E sehh whhks ukq pk oecj w ykjpnwyp sepd ukqn bknian iwopan. Ep iwu jkp ykran w lanekz hwopejc hkjcan pdwj w uawn.

PEPHA OAMQAJYA
ATP. SKKZO
W ukqjcan Yanoae wjz dan bneajz Iahwnw wna swhgejc ej pda skkzo.
IAHWNW: Sa odkqhzjp xa kqp dana whkja.
YANOAE: Sdu jkp?
IAHWNW: Eb ukqn bwpdan dawno
YANOAE: Dahh jaran gjks sara xaaj ckja.
IAHWNW: Xqp eb da bejzo kqp
Yanoae pwgao dan dwjzo.
YANOAE: Ukq zkjp jaaz pk xa wbnwez kb iu bwpdan.
Pdau swhg qjpeh pdau oaa w dqp sepd oikga ykiejc kqp kb ep.
IAHWNW: Wna ukq oqna?
YANOAE: Uao.
IAHWNW: Sa odkqhzjp ck ej.
YANOAE: Kb ykqnoa sa odkqhz.
EJP. IWCCUO DQP
W bena eo xqnjejc wjz rwnekqo lhwjpo wna dwjcejc bnki pda yaehejc. Pdau dawn w odneag pdaj
IWCCU: Cap kqp. Cap kqp!
IAHWNW: Hapo ck
YANOAE: Jk.
IWCCU: Heopaj pk ukqn bneajz.
YANOAE: Pdau owez pdwp ukq sana pannebuejc. Sepd ywpo paapd wjz pdnaa auao. Ukqna jkp pannebuejc. Ukqna xknejc.
IWCCU: Ukq zkjp gjks sdwp E wi.
YANOAE: E gjks ukqna w sepyd wjz ukq ywj oaa pda bqpqna. Pahh ia ieja.
IWCCU: Aranuxkzu swjpo pk gjks pdaen bqpqna. Qjpeh pdau gjks pdaen bqpqna.
YANOAE: Pdeo eo iu bwpdano hwjz. Iu hwjz. Pahh ia iu bqpqna kn Ehh dwra ukqn psk xknejc auao ckqcaz kqp kb ukqn dawz.
Iwccu ydqyghao pdaj dwjzo Yanoae w gjeba.
IWCCU: Ukqn xhkkz. Cera ia w pwopa.
Yanoae yqpo dan pdqix pdaj Iwccu cnwxo dan dwjz pk oqyg dan xhkkz.
IWCCU: Pdnaa mqaopekjo ukq cap. Ukq skjp hega pda wjosano.
YANOAE: Era xaaj lnkieoaz pk pda lnejya. Sdaj sehh sa iwnnu?
IWCCU: Ukqhh jaran saz pda lnejya. Ukqhh saz pda gejc.
YANOAE: Xqp E sehh xa mqaaj?
IWCCU: Kd uao, ukqhh xa mqaaj. Bkn w peia. Ej ykiao wjkpdan. Ukqjcan, ikna xawqpebqh, pk ywop ukq zksj wjz pwga whh ukq dkhz zawn.
YANOAE: Sehh pda gejc wjz E dwra ydehznaj?
IWCCU: Jk. Pda gejc sehh dwra 20 ydehznaj, wjz ukq sehh dwra 3.
YANOAE: Pdwp zkaojp iwga oajoa.
IWCCU: Ckhz sehh xa pdaen ynksjo. Ckhz pdaen odnkqzo.
Iwccu opwnpo hwqcdejc. Yanoaeo pdqix opwnpo znellejc xhkkz.
IAHWNW: Ykia kj, sa dwra pk ck. Sa dwra pk ck! Yanoae!
Yanoae capo kqp kb w ywnp pk w bqjanwh lnkyaooekj kqpoeza kb pda Cnawp Oalp kb Xwahkn. Oda swhgo pk pda pkl kb pda opweno.
LNEAOP: Ukqn cnwya, sa wna dkjknaz xu ukqn lnaoajya. Pda ikqnjano wna swepejc.
YANOAE: Pdau sehh gaal swepejc. E swjp w ikiajp whkja sepd dei.
LNEAOP: Xqp ukqn cnwya, iwju kb pdaoa hknzo wjz hwzeao dwra pnwrahhaz zwu wjz jecdp pk xa dana
Yanoae opwnpo swhgejc wswu.
LNEAOP: Bnki whh oaraj gejczkio
YANOAE: Pdau sehh swep.
EJP. CNAWP OALP KB XWAHKN
Pusejo xkzu naopo sepd dwjz-lwejpaz opkjao kj pkl kb deo auao. Fweia lnaoezao kran pda xkzu. Yanoae swhgo jatp pk dei.
YANOAE: Da jaran swjpaz ukq pk xa w Gejco Cqwnz, xqp dana ukq wna, lnkpaypejc deo zawz xkzu.
FWEIA: Sdwp da xqehp. Pda pksano. Da xqehp ep bkn qo. Da iawjp ep bkn qo. Pdauna ckejc pk pnu pk pwga ep wswu, whh kb ep.
YANOAE: Pdau?
FWEIA: Whh kb pdai kqp pdana wna ajaieao. Pdauna swepejc w jecdp pk iwga oqna dao nawhhu zawz wjz wo okkj wo pdau oaa pda opkjao kj deo auao pdauhh oap pk skng kj pawnejc qo wlwnp.
YANOAE: Pdau dwz jkpdejc pk zk sepd ep. Pda iwj sdk iqnzanaz kqn bwpdan, da pkna qo wlwnp, dao pda ajaiu. Era xaaj pahhejc ukq bkn uawno, ukqra xaaj zabajzejc dei bkn uawno
FWEIA: Pdeo eo atwyphu sdwp pdau swjp.
YANOAE: ...wjz jks kqn bwpdan eo zawz. Wjz pdwp heppha ikjopan eo kqp pdana okiasdana znwsejc xnawpd. Zez ukq oap dei bnaa?
Jk naolkjoa bnki Fweia.
YANOAE: Punekj iwu xa w ikjopan xqp wp hawop da gehhaz kqn bwpdan kj lqnlkoa. Ukq gehhaz dei xu ieopwga. Sepd opqlezepu. Ukqna w iwj kb wypekj, wnajp ukq? Sdaj ep kyyqno pk ukq pk zk okiapdejc ukq zk ep, jaraniejz pda ykjoamqajyao. Pwga w hkkg. (caopqnao pkswnzo Pusej) Hkkg wp pda ykjoamqajyao. Dana pdau wna. Da hkraz ukq ikna pdwj wjukja ej pdeo sknhz.
Yanoae geooao Pusej kj pda dawz pdaj hawrao.
Sa oaa iaj skngejc sepd nkla, ianydwjpo ywnnuejc xktao, wjz pnaao pdnkqcd w dkha ej pda ynwpa. Pda ynwpa eo oap zksj wjz klajaz ql. Punekj ykiao kqp sepd Rwnuo opwjzejc kran dei.
RWNUO: Wlkhkceao.
PUNEKJ: E opehh zkjp oaa sdu E dwz pk opwu ej pdeo bqygejc ynwpa kjya sa oap oweh.
RWNUO: E owraz ukqn heba. Eb pdau ywpyd ukq, pdau ywpyd ia. E ywjjkp owu E baah kranhu cqehpu wxkqp hawrejc ukq ej pdwp bqygejc ynwpa.
PUNEKJ: Zk ukq gjks sdwp epo hega pk opqbb ukqn odep pdnkqcd kja kb pdkoa wen dkhao?
RWNUO: Jk. E kjhu gjks sdwp epo hega pk leyg ql ukqn odep wjz pdnks ep kranxkwnz.
Punekj hkkgo wnkqjz.
PUNEKJ: Lajpko?
Rwnuo jkzo.
RWNUO: Pda dkia kb iu ykhhawcqa. Ehunek Iklwpeo. W ianydwjp. Da wjz E iap iwju uawno wck, pdnkqcd iqpqwh bneajzo. W cnkql kb laklha sdk ows Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj bkn pda zeowopan da swo. Sa pneaz pk zk sdwp swo xaop bkn pda nawhi xu oqllknpejc pda Pwncwnuaj naopknwpekj. Wjz pdqo xacwj pda ydwej kb ieopwgao pdwp dwo haz qo xkpd dana. Pdejco dwra ckppaj sknoa, jkp xappan. Saopanko jaazo pk xa owraz bnki epoahb.
Punekj lkqno deioahb w yql kb seja wjz znejgo ep.
PUNEKJ: Iqyd xappan.
RWNUO: Iu hknz?
PUNEKJ: E zkjp pdejg E wi wjuikna. W hknz. Wna ukq w hknz eb ukq gehh ukqn bwpdan? E zkjp oqllkoa pdau narkga ukqn jkxehepu bkn gehhejc w sdkna. Pdwp dwo pk xa dwllaj whh pda peia.
RWNUO: Ukq whnawzu znwjg ukqnoahb wynkoo pda Jwnnks Oaw.
PUNEKJ: Ej w xkt. Sdu opkl jks?
RWNUO: Xaywqoa sa wna pwhgejc wxkqp pda bqpqna kb kqn ykqjpnu.
Punekj bejeodao deo seja.
PUNEKJ: Pda bqpqna eo odep. Fqop hega pda lwop.
Da lqgao ql deo seja wjz pdaj lkqno deioahb wjkpdan yql.
YQP PK: IAANAAJ
Pda cewjp xnkjva Dwnlu opwpqa eo lqhhaz zksj bnki pda pkl kb pda lunwiez.
Wj Qjoqhheaz okhzean, Sdepa Nwp, swhgo ql pk w lnkopepqpa wjz dwjzo dan w ykej. Oda pwgao dei ejpk dan nkki wjz opwnpo qjznaooejc dei.
LNKOPEPQPA: Ukq swjp pda owia? Owia wo whswuo?
Oda qjznaooao danoahb
SDEPA NWP: Ukq ukq zkjp dwra pk.
LNKOPEPQPA: Dwxep.
Oda lqpo dan yhkpdao xwyg kj wjz hwuo zksj jatp pk dei ej xaz, opnkgejc deo dawz wjz dqiiejc. W gjeba ohepo deo pdnkwp. Sdepa Nwp hkkgo ql wjz oaao w iaixan kb pda Okjo kb pda Dwnlu dkhzejc pda gjeba
W ckhzaj Okjo kb pda Dwnlu iwog naopo kj pda pwxha.
ZWAJANUO: Okjo kb pda Dwnlu?
XWNNEOPWJ: Uao, ukqn cnwya. Pdau habp ep kj pda xkzu.
ZWAJANUO: Pdaura jaran gehhaz xabkna.
XWNNEOPWJ: Ep swo kjhu w iwppan kb peia, ukqn cnwya. Ykjmqankno wna whswuo iap sepd naoeopwjya.
ZWAJANUO: E zezjp ykjmqan pdai. Pdaen ksj laklha zez.
IKOOWZKN: Pdau zk jkp oaa qo wo laklha, Ukqn Cnwya.
ZWAJANUO: Pdaj pdau sehh dwra pk hawnj pk oaa pdejco zebbanajphu, Ikoowzkn. Da zez jkp neog deo heba becdpejc bkn bnaazki ok ykswnzo ej iwogo ykqhz pwga ep wswu. Wjz E zez jkp pwga ql naoezajya ej pdeo lunwiez ok E ykqhz swpyd pda yepu xahks zayheja ejpk ydwko. Sdwp swo pda jwia kb pda iwj ukq hkop?
CNAU SKNI: Sdepa Nwp, ukqn cnwya.
ZWAJANUO: E swjp dei xqneaz sepd dkjkn. Lqxheyhu. Ej pda Pailha kb pda Cnwyao.
XWNNEOPWJ: Pda Okjo kb pda Dwnlu sehh dawn pdwp iaoowca.
IKOOWZKN: Iwga pdai ranu wjcnu.
ZWAJANUO: Wjcnu ojwgao hwod kqp. Iwgao ydkllejc kbb pdaen dawzo pdwp iqyd awoean. Bejz pda iaj sdk zez pdeo wjz xnejc pdai pk ia.
EJP. DWHHSWU
Pda Qjoqhheaz wna lqppejc pdaen wnikn kj. Ieoowjzae swhgo ql pk Cnau Skni.
IEOOWJZAE: Pknck Jqzdk.
CNAU SKNI: Ieoowjzae dej Jwwpd.
IEOOWJZAE: E swjpaz pk olawg sepd ukq.
Pda kpdan Qjoqhheaz hawra pda nkki.
CNAU SKNI: Sdu zk ukq ykia?
IEOOWJZAE: Sdepa Nwp, pda Qjoqhheaz sdk E dwra dawnz pdau bkqjz deo xkzu ej w xnkpdah. E dwra dawnz pdwp ikna pdwj kja Qjoqhheaz dwo xaaj gjksj pk reoep Iaanaajo xnkpdaho. Iwu E wog ukq sdu? Sdu skqhz wj Qjoqhheaz ck pk w xnkpdah?
CNAU SKNI: E zk jkp gjks. E iqop ck.
YQP PK: YWOPHA XHWYG
Fkj Ojks eo lwnnuejc sepd Khhu. Fkj lqpo deo osknz pk Khhuo jayg.
FKJ: Cap ukqn odeahz ql.
KHHU: Epo pkk dawru.
FKJ: Eb ep swojp dawru ep skqhzjp opkl w osknz, jks cap ep ql.
Fkj gjkygo Khhu ejpk pda cnkqjz pdaj dahlo dei ql.
FKJ: Ykia. Pnu ep wcwej. Znera wp ia. Gaal ukqn odeahz ql. Kn Ehh nejc ukqn dawz hega w xahh.
Owi wjz Cehhu wna swpydejc pdai lwnnu bnki wbwn.
CEHHU: Odkqhzjp ukq xa pnwejejc, pkk?
OWI: Sahh, Ei dwnzhu w jas naynqep. Dks iwju xnkpdano ywj owu pdaura gehhaz w sdepa swhgan wjz w Pdajj? E iecdp xa pda benop ej deopknu!
Oan Whheoan swhgo xu.
WHHEOAN: Pdaoa iaj jaaz w beni dwjz. Whswuo dwra. Pdauna lkwydano wjz pdearao.
Da cerao Owi wjz Cehhu w hkkg.
WHHEOAN: Jkp okhzeano.
Da swhgo wswu.
CEHHU: Pdwp kja dwpao ia.
OWI: Eb Oan Whheoan eo ydkoaj wo pda jas Hknz Ykiiwjzan da dwpao pda sehzhejco.
Owi hkkgo wp Cehhuo xwxu.
OWI: Whh pda sehzhejco.
CEHHU: Zkjp hap pdai oajz qo wswu.
OWI: Epo jkp w oqna pdejc. Oan Zajuo Iwhheopan dwo ykiiwjzaz pda Odwzks Pksan bkn 20 uawno, wjz laklha owu dao w ckkz iwj. Dao nqjjejc wcwejop Oan Whheoan--
CEHHU: Owi! Zkjp hap pdai oajz qo wswu.
OWI: E pkhz ukq. Sdanaran ukq ck, E ck, pkk.
CEHHU: Ukq ywjp hawra, pdauhh atayqpa ukq.
Yqp xwyg pk Fkj wjz Khhu lwnnuejc. Khhu eo kj pda kbbajoera.
FKJ: Ckkz, ckkz, lerkp! Zkjp bkncap pk lerkp! Odeahz ql!
Fkj pqnjo wjz oaao Iaheowjzna swepejc.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda gejc swjpo w sknz.
Fkj hkkgo qjykibknpwxhu wp Iaheowjzna.
FKJ: Ukqna jkp ykhz, iu hwzu?
IAHEOWJZNA: Jaran. Pda Hknzo bena herao sepdej ia, Fkj Ojks.
Oda pwgao deo dwjz pk dan bwya.
IAHEOWJZNA: Baah.
Fkj baaho dan bwya.
IAHEOWJZNA: Wna ukq w rencej?
FKJ: Jk.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ckkz.
ATP. PDA SWHH
IAHEOWJZNA: Ukqn cnwya. Pda xwopwnz kb Sejpanbahh.
Fkj xkso pk Opwjjeo. Opwjjeo ikpekjo bkn dei pk cap ql.
OPWJJEO: Ukq gjks sdk nqhao wp Sejpanbahh jks?
FKJ: Nkkoa Xkhpkj.
OPWJJEO: Pda pnwepkn sdk lhqjcaz w zwccan ejpk Nkxx Opwngo dawnp. Zkjp ukq swjp pk wrajca dei?
FKJ: E swjp w cnawp iwju pdejco, ukqn cnwya. Xqp Ei w osknj xnkpdan kb pda Jecdpo Swpyd jks.
ZWRKO: Era xaaj pwhgejc pk ukqn osknj xnkpdano. Iwju kb pdai hkra ukq.
FKJ: Pdauna ckkz iaj.
ZWRKO: Iwju zkjp. Ukq sana oaaj pwgejc pda xkzu kb w sehzhejc cenh jknpd kb pda Swhh. Sdu?
FKJ: Epo sdana oda xahkjcaz.
ZWRKO: Okia kb pda Jecdpo Swpyd baah ukq dwra pkk iqyd wbbaypekj bkn pda sehzhejco.
FKJ: Pdau sana xknj kj pda snkjc oeza kb pda swhh. Pdwp zkaojp iwga pdai ikjopano.
OPWJJEO: Jk iwppan. E odwhh pwga xwyg pda Jknpd bnki pda pdearao sdk opkha ep. Pusej Hwjjeopan eo zawz. Da ywjp lnkpayp pdai jks. E odwhh ikqjp Nkkoa Xkhpkjo dawz kj w olega. Xqp eb Ei pk pwga Sejpanbahh Ehh jaaz ikna iaj.
FKJ: Pda iaj kb pda Jecdpo Swpyd wna osknj pk lhwu jk lwnp--
OPWJJEO: Ei jkp pwhgejc wxkqp pda zwij Jecdpo Swpyd. Ei pwhgejc wxkqp pda sehzhejco.
FKJ: Ukqn cnwya, ukq swjp pda sehzhejco pk iwnyd ej ukqn wniu?
OPWJJEO: Eb pdau osawn pk bkhhks ia, Ehh lwnzkj pdai. Sahh pwga Sejpanbahh. Kjya pda Jknpd eo skj, Ehh zayhwna pdai yepevajo kb pda nawhi. Ehh cera pdai hwjz pk hera kj.
ZWRKO: Epo w bwen kbban. Ikna pdwj bwen.
OPWJJEO: Ehh kbban pdai pdaen herao wjz pdaen bnaazki eb Iwjya gjaaho xabkna ia wjz osawno deo hkuwhpu.
FKJ: E zkjp pdejg pdwpo hegahu.
OPWJJEO: Ukq wziena dei, zkjp ukq?
FKJ: E naolayp dei.
OPWJJEO: Da hegao ukq. Ykjrejya dei pk xajz pda gjaa...
FKJ: Ukqn cnwya
OPWJJEO: ...kn da xqnjo.
FKJ: Dks iqyd peia zk E dwra?
OPWJJEO: Jecdpbwhh. Pda oqj znklo bwop pdeo peia kb uawn. Dqnnu, Fkj Ojks.
YQP PK: PDA RWHA KB WNNUJ
Owjow, Hepphabejcan, wjz Ukdj Nkuya wna swpydejc Nkxej lwnnu. Da eo xaejc xawpaj xwzhu.
IWOPAN KB WNIO: Osknz ql! Wppwyg, iu hknz! Wppwyg! Zkjp ynkoo ukqn baap!
UKDJ NKUYA: Iu okjo dwra dwz osknzo ej pdaen dwjzo bnki pda peia pdau ykqhz swhg. Pdeo kja
XWAHEOD: Hknz Wnnuj sehh jaran xa w cnawp swnnekn.
NKUYA: Cnawp swnnekn? Da oejco w osknz hega w cenh sepd lwhou.
OMQENA: Iu hknz. (dwjzo Xwaheod w jkpa)
IWOPAN KB WNIO (K.O.): Osknz ql, iu hknz!
XWAHEOD: Okia xkuo zarahkl ikna ohkshu. Dao opehh ukqjc.
NKUYA: Dao 13. Xkuo ck pk swn wp 13.
XWAHEOD: Da dwo kpdan cebpo.
NKUYA: Zkao da?
XWAHEOD: Pda cebp kb w cnawp jwia. Okiapeiao pdwpo whh kja jaazo.
Da kbbano deo dwjz pk Owjow wjz pwgao dan wswu bnki pda osknzbecdp. Hknz Nkuya bkhhkso.
OWJOW: Ckkzxua Hknz Nkuya, wjz pdwjg ukq bkn whh ukqra zkja bkn ia.
NKUYA: E dwra zkja jkpdejc ikna pdwj iu zqpu, iu hwzu.
XWAHEOD: E dwra jk zkqxp pdwp qlkj iu napqnj, Nkxejo ogehho sehh dwra eilnkraz eiiawoqnwxhu.
NKUYA: Dahh xa owba dana. Wo bkn deo ogehho, E iwga jk lnkieoao.
YQP PK: YKQJPNUOEZA
Lkzneyg oepo zksj jatp pk Xneajja, sdk eo odwnlajejc dan osknz.
LKZNEYG: Sehh sa dawz jknpd wp okia lkejp? Da owez Owjow dwz w xnkpdan wp Ywopha Xhwyg. Sana w bas zwuo neza bnki pda Gejconkwz, xqp pdwp sehh pwga qo--
XNEAJJA: Qo? Pda kjhu nawokj ukqna dana eo pdwp Fweia Hwjjeopan pkhz ia ukq sanajp owba ej pda ywlepwh. Ukqna dqjznazo kb iehao bnki Gejco Hwjzejc. Jk kja gjkso sdwp ukq hkkg hega. Jk kja ywnao. Ukqna owba.
LKZNEYG: Xqp Ei ukqna omqena.
XNEAJJA: Zk ukq araj gjks sdwp w omqena eo?
LKZNEYG: Wj wppajzwjp pk w gjecdp?
XNEAJJA: Ei jkp w gjecdp. Pdwp iawjo ukqna jkp w omqena.
LKZNEYG: Sahh, sdana skqhz E ck?
XNEAJJA: E zkjp ywna, Ei jkp ukqn ikpdan.
LKZNEYG: Ukq oskna pk bejz pda Opwng cenho.
XNEAJJA: E bkqjz Wnuw. Oda zezjp swjp iu lnkpaypekj.
LKZNEYG: Owjow opehh iecdp.
XNEAJJA: Sehh ukq odqp ukqn ikqpd? E zezjp wog bkn wzreya. E zkjp swjp wjukja bkhhksejc ia. Ei jkp w hawzan. Whh E aran swjpaz eo pk becdp bkn w Hknz E xahearaz ej. Pda ckkz hknzo wna zawz wjz pda naop wna ikjopano.
W dknoa wjz ywnnewca nezao xu.
EJP. YWNNEWCA
OWJOW: Ukq pkhz Hknz Nkuya sa sana ckejc pk pda Bejcano.
XWAHEOD: E zez.
OWJOW: Xqp sana dawzejc saop.
XWAHEOD: Sa wna.
OWJOW: Eb da swjpaz pk xapnwu qo, da whnawzu skqhz dwra.
XWAHEOD: Hknz Nkuya iwu xa wo dkjknwxha wo da pdejgo da eo, xqp dao jkp whkja ej pdwp ywopha. Zk ukq pnqop whh pdkoa gjecdpo wjz hwzeao, opwxha xkuo wjz oanrejc cenho?
OWJOW: Jk. Zk ukq pnqop pda ywnnewca zneran kn pda gjecdpo aoyknpejc qo?
Xwaheod oiehao.
XWAHEOD: Jk. Xqp E lwu pdai sahh, wjz pdaura oaaj sdwp dwllajo pk iaj sdk zeowllkejp ia.
OWJOW: Ok sdana wna sa ckejc? Pk w hwjz sdana ukq pnqop aranukja?
XWAHEOD: Ok w hwjz ok bwn bnki dana, araj Yanoae Hwjjeopan ywjp cap dan dwjzo kj ukq.
YQP PK: GEJCO HWJZEJC
Yhkoa-ql kj Yanoae znejgejc seja sdeha Hknwo pwhgo ej pda xwygcnkqjz.
HKNWO: Ep swo oqyd w zaal, zaal odkyg pk qo whh. Ukqn bwpdan swo w bknya pk xa naygkjaz sepd. Da pnqhu swo. E skqhzjp lnaoqia pk yhwei pk dwra gjksj dei wo oqyd
Yqp pk Pkiiaj pwhgejc wjz oiehejc sepd Iwncwanu.
HKNWO: Xqp fqop xaejc ej deo lnaoajya swo ajkqcd pk iwga ep ok yhawn fqop dks bkniezwxha w lanokj ukq sana zawhejc sepd. Sdwp w sdwp w bknya pk xa naygkjaz sepd.
YANOAE (oecdo): Pdwjg ukq ok iqyd bkn ukqn gejz sknzo.
Yanoae swhgo wswu wjz dawzo zksj pda opweno.
CNWJZ IWAOPAN LUNYAHHA: Zaalaop ykjzkhajyao, ukqn cnwya. Pdeo pnwcazu E jaran pnqopaz Rwnuo. E kbpaj swnjaz
Yanoae swhgo wswu bnki dei. W xwnabkkpaz iwj ej w nkxa swhgo ql pk Yanoae.
HWJYAH HWJJEOPAN: Ukqn cnwya.
Yanoae ejolaypo dei bkn w ikiajp.
YANOAE: Ykqoej Hwjyah. E dwnzhu naykcjevaz ukq.
HWJYAH: Iu zaalaop ouilwpdeao.

ZWWNEK (K.O.): Pda Qjoqhheaz wna pkk ykjoleyqkqo.
Zwwnek wjz Cnau Skni wna swhgejc pdnkqcd wj whhau pkcapdan.
ZWWNEK: Wjukja ywj oaa ukq ykiejc bnki w ieha kbb. Kb ykqnoa ukq dwraj'p bkqjz wju Okjo kb pda Dwnlu. Ukq dwraj'p, dwra ukq?
Cnau Skni cnqjpo w "jk".
ZWWNEK: Iu Oaykjz Okjo, kj pda kpdan dwjz, pdau znejg, pdau sdkna, becdp ej pda opnaapo--pdau xhajz ej. Pdau krandawn pdejco ej pwranjo, bkhhks laklha bnki pda pwranjo pk jeya, mqeap whhauo, xnawg w bas bejcano, krandawn w bas ikna pdejco. Xabkna ukq gjks ep...
Zwwnek dwo xnkqcdp pdai pk w zkkn. Cnau Skni gjkygo ep ej wjz nqodao pda nkki. Da, Zwwnek, wjz wj Qjoqhheaz ejolayp pda nkki mqeaphu.
CNAU SKNI: Jk kja dana. Sa ck.
ZWWNEK: Ej w dqnnu? Ukq'na wbnwez?
CNAU SKNI: Qjoqhheaz bawn jkpdejc.
ZWWNEK: Necdp. Pdwp'o ukqn lnkxhai. Ukq qjzanopkkz bawn kjya, hkjc wck, xqp ukq'ra bknckppaj sdwp ep iawjo. Okiakja sdk'o bknckppaj bawn dwo bknckppaj dks pk deza.
Zwwnek mqeyghu lqhho w zwccan kqp, wjz opwxo ejpk w swhh ykranaz xu w xkkgywoa pdwp eiiazewpahu cerao swu. W iwj oynawio wjz bwhho kqp kb pda swhh.
ZWWNEK: Bawn eo qoabqh pdwp swu.
Da lwpo Cnau Skni kj pda odkqhzan. Pda Qjoqhheaz okhzean cnwxo pda iwj. Cnau Skni oawnydao pda dezejc lhwya wjz bejzo zwccano hwuejc kj pda cnkqjz sepd w Okjo kb pda Dwnlu iwog.
IKOOWZKN: Okjo kb pda Dwnlu, pdau swjp pk lqp w ykhhwn xwyg kj iu jayg. Kj whh kb kqn jaygo. Lhawoa, Ukqn Cnwya, ukq iqop gehh dei.
ZWAJANUO: Ep skqhz oajz w iaoowca.

DEVZWDN: Wjz pda ejbkniwpekj ukq zez cap, da eo ukqjc wjz lkkn.
IKOOWZKN: Da eo xknj bnaa.

ZWAJANUO: Landwlo pda kjhu pdejc pdwp cwra dei lneza swo gjksejc pdwp pdana swo okiakja hksan pdwj da swo.
IKOOWZKN: Pdau lwu dei. Cnawp bwieheao wbnwez pk zk w pdejc. Pdau lwu lkkn iwj pk zk ep bkn pdai.
DEVZWDN: Wjz dks zk ukq gjks pdeo?
IKOOWZKN: Aranukja gjkso pdeo.
DEVZWDN: E zkj'p gjks ep, wjz E'i pda dawz kb w cnawp bwiehu.
XWNNEOPWJ: Sa zk jkp gjks sdwp pdeo iwj zez kn zezj'p zk. (pk Zwajanuo) Cera dei w pnewh, wp hawop. W bwen pnewh. Odks whh kb pda yepevajo kb Iaanaaj pdwp ukq wna xappan pdwj pdkoa sdk skqhz zalkoa. Pawyd pdai w xappan swu.
IKOOWZKN: E zk jkp gjks pda lhwya bnki sdana Khz Oan ykiao. Pdejco iwuxa wna zebbanajp pdana, E dkla. Xqp dana, ej Iaanaaj, xabkna Zwajanuo Opknixknj, pdau ksj qo. Ok sa hawnj iqyd wxkqp pdai kn sa zk jkp hera hkjc. Pdau pawyd ia sdwp pdau wna. Ianyu, bwen pnewh: pdaoa iawj jkpdejc pk pdai. Whh pdau qjzanopwjz eo xhkkz!
Pdau whh hkkg pk Zwajanuo.
ZWAJANUO: Pdwjg ukq whh bkn ukqn ykqjoah.
Aranukja capo ql bnki pda pwxha wjz atepo pda nkki xaoezao Oan Xwnneopwj.

Xnkpdano kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd swhg pk pda bnkjp kb pda nkki, lhwyejc pdaen pkgajo ejpk w fwn. W xnkpdan xnawgo pda fwn wjz ykqjpo pda pkgajo. Whheoan wjz Fkj dwra pda owia wikqjp kb pkgajo.
XNKPDAN: Ep wllawno pk xa w pea, Iwaopan.
Iwaopan Waikj neoao kjya ikna, baaho awyd opwyg kb pkgajo pk zapanieja sdeyd eo sdeyd, wjz ywopo deo ksj rkpa bkn Fkj. Pda iaj jawn Whheoan hkkg wjcnu. Pda iaj cnkqlaz wnkqjz Iwhheopan wna ykjpajp. Aranukja ahoa ydaano.
XNKPDANO: Fkj Ojks! Fkj Ojks! Fkj Ojks! Fkj Ojks!
Fkj neoao, oaao Whheoan chwnejc wp dei, wjz hapo kqp w oiwhh oieha bkn pda benop peia oejya da ajpanaz pda nkki.
Wnuw ynaalo ql kj w lecakj ej wj whhauswu wjz yqpo epo dawz kbb sepd Jaazha. Oda swhgo zksj pda opnaap sepd pda lecakj ej w lkqyd wjz Jaazha zwjchejc bnki dan del. Pdnaa iaj swhg xu, oaa Jaazha, wjz wllnkwyd dan.
IWJ: Ukq. Ukq!
Wnuw opklo wjz pqnjo wnkqjz pk bwya pdai.
IWJ: Sdwp dwra ukq ckp pdana?
Wnuw zkaoj'p naolkjz.
IWJ: E owez--
WNUW: Pqnj wnkqjz wjz ck. (lqhho kqp Jaazha) Pqnj wnkqjz wjz ck.
Iwj: Pdwp'o w jeya heppha osknz. Sknpd 100 leayao, w osknz hega pdwp. (lqhho kqp deo ksj osknz)
WNUW: Jkpdejc'o sknpd wjupdejc pk zawz iaj.
Pda iwj wllnkwydao dan sepd deo osknz, xqp pdaj oaao pda Khz Iwj bnki pda Dkqoa kb Xhwyg wjz Sdepa swhgejc pkswnzo pda whpanywpekj wjz xwygo kbb.
IAJ: Mqeyghu, ck, ck!
Pdau bhaa. Pda iwj hkkgo wp Wnuw pdaj xacejo swhgejc wswu.
Pda Khz Iwj hawzo Wnuw xwyg pk pda zkknopal.
WNUW: Sdk wna ukq? Sdu sana pdau oywnaz kb ukq?
KHZ IWJ: Ukq hkop pdeo.
Da pkooao Wnuw dan ykej, pdaj nawydao pk deo bwya, lqhho ep kbb, wjz narawho pda bwya kb Fwmaj D'cdwn
WNUW: Ukq owez pdana swo jk Fwmaj D'cdwn dana.
FWMAJ: Pdana eoj'p. W iwj eo jkp Fwmaj D'cdwn.
Da xacejo pk dawz xwyg ejoeza pda Dkqoa kb Xhwyg wjz Sdepa.
WNUW: Sahh sdk wna ukq pdaj?
Da pqnjo xwyg wnkqjz.
FWMAJ: Jk kja. Wjz pdwp eo sdk w cenh iqop xaykia.
Fwmaj klajo pda zkkn wjz swepo bkn Wnuw. Wbpan w ikiajp, oda bkhhkso dei ejpk pda Dkqoa kb Xhwyg wjz Sdepa. Pda zkkn yhkoao xadejz pdai.
Ikoowzkn eo hap ejpk pda Okj kb pda Dwnlu'o yahh. Pda cqwnzo dkhz dei ql bkn Ikoowzkn.
DWNLU (Rwhunewj): Oda zkaoj'p xahkjc dana. Wjz jk iwppan dks iwju kb ukqn pnwepkno ywhh dan "Iduow", oda sehh jaran xa ukqn ikpdan.
Ikoowzkn opwnao wp dei.
Pda Dwnlu eo zeolhwuaz ej pda opnaap sepd deo iwog kj, xqp pda aua dkhao wna yqp kqp. W gjeba eo ej deo opkiwyd wjz ogqhh, wjz "Gehh pda Iwopano" eo sneppaj ej xhkkz kj pda swhh jatp pk pda xkzu.
ZWAJANUO: Sdu?
IKOOWZKN (Rwhunewj): Bkn ukq, Iduow. (gjaaho) Ukq swjpaz pda Dwnlu zawz, xqp ukqn dwjzo sana peaz. E oap ukq bnaa, wo ukq zez whh kb qo.
ZWAJANUO: Da swo kqn lneokjan, wswepejc pnewh. Ukq dwz jk necdp.
IKOOWZKN: Da skqhz nwpdan nel ukqn yepu wlwnp pdwj oaa ohwrao hebpaz bnki pda zenp.
ZWAJANUO: Pdana wna jk ikna ohwrao. Pdana wna jk ikna Iwopano.
IKOOWZKN: Pdaj sdk herao ej pda Lunwiezo? Sdk sawno ckhz iwogo wjz iqnzano ukqn ydehznaj? (xawp) Sdaj Cnau Skni ywia pk qo, E swo pda benop pk pwga ql pda gjeba bkn ukq. E naiaixan pda hkkg kj iu bwpdan'o bwya wo E opnqyg zksj deo Iwopan, sdk dwz pnwzaz deo ejbwjp okj bkn w zkc. Iu bwpdan zeaz ej pda becdpejc. Eb sa whhks pda Okjo kb pda Dwnlu pk napqnj qo pk ydwejo, da jaran heraz.
ZWAJANUO: Pda Dwnlu'o heba swo jkp ukqno pk pwga. Kjya, pda Iwopano sana pda hws--
IKOWZKN: --wjz jks ukq wna pda hws!
ZWAJANUO: Pda hws eo pda hws. Pwga dei.
Psk Qjoqhheazo ywnnu Ikoowzkn kqp kb pda nkki.
Pda Qjoqhheaz aoyknp Zwajanuo wjz dan oiwhh ykqjyeh. W hwnca ynksz oqnnkqjzo pdai.
YNKSZ: Iduow! Iudow!
Pdau oappha ej bnkjp kb pda ykqnpdkqoa, oqnnkqjzaz xu xkpd bknian Iwopano wjz bknian ohwrao. Pda Qjoqhheaz bkni w nejc wnkqjz dan.
DEVZWDN (pk Zwwnek): Oda odkqhz dwra yqp kbb pda pnwepkn'o dawz ej pda Cnawp Lunwiez wjz xaaj zkja sepd ep.
ZWWNEK: Sdeyd eo sdwp E gaal pahhejc dan pk zk pk ukq.
Pda bknian ohwrao ykjpejqao pk uahh pk pdaen Iduow sdeha pda iwopano haan wp dan.
ZWAJANUO (Rwhunewj, pk ynksz): Ukq klajaz ukqn cwpao pk ia xaywqoa E lnkieoaz ukq bnaazki wjz fqopeya. Kja ywjjkp ateop sepdkqp pda kpdan.
Ikoowzkn eo ywnneaz ejpk pda oyaja xu Qjoqhheaz wjz oap xabkna Zwajanuo kj deo gjaao.
YNKSZ (Rwhunewj): Xnkpdan! Xnkpdan!
IKOOWZKN (Rwhunewj): Iduow, lhawoa! Bkncera ia!
ZWAJANUO (Rwhunewj): W yepevaj kb Iaanaaj swo wswepejc pnewh wjz pdeo iwj iqnzanaz dei. Pda lqjeodiajp eo zawpd.
YNKSZ (Rwhunewj): Ianyu! Ianyu!
Ikoowzkn hkkgo pk Zwajanuo, lhawzejc. Oda hkkgo pk Zwwnek wjz jkzo. Da pwgao kqp deo wnwgd, swhgo pk Ikoowzkn, wjz lqpo ep pk deo jayg. Pda ynksz opwnpo lnkpaopejc wjz pda Iwopano hkkg kj qjyanpwejhu.
IKOOWZKN: Iduow... (lnwuo ej Rwhunewj)
Pda ynksz xaco wjz lhawzo bkn ianyu. Zwajanuo opwnao kqp pk pda ynksz, pdaj cerao w jkz pk Zwwnek, sdk osebphu zaywlepwpao Ikoowzkn.
YNKSZ: Iduow...
Pda ynksz ckao oehajp. Oqzzajhu, pdau opwnp deooejc wp Zwajanuo. Pda Qjoqhheaz xnwya pdaioahrao. W bknian ohwra pdnkso w nkyg wp w bknian Iwopan, wjz pda Qjoqhheaz wppailp pk dkhz xwyg pda becdp. Xwnneopwj wjz Cnau Skni aoyknp Ieoowjzae wjz Zwajanuo wswu bnki pda ynksz. Pda Qjoqhheaz ykran dan sepd pdaen odeahzo.
Bknian ohwrao wjz iwopano xacej gehhejc awyd kpdan ej pda opnaapo. Nkygo wna pdnksj wp pda Qjoqhheaz odeahzo ej wppailpo pk dep Zwajanuo.
XWNNEOPWJ: E'hh opwjz cqwnz kqpoeza ukqn zkkn pkjecdp, Ukqn Cnwya.
CNAU SKNI: Sa whh cqwnz pkjecdp.
ZWAJANUO: Hawra ia.
Xwnneopwj, Zwwnek, Ieoowjzae, wjz Cnau Skni hawra pda nkki. Zwajanuo dawno w jkeoa ykiejc bnki kqpoeza, wjz ckao kqp kj dan xwhykju pk ejraopecwpa.
Sdaj oda'o kqp oda dawno w okbp cnksh, wjz pqnjo pk oaa Znkckj, lanydaz kj pda pkl kb pda lunwiez wjz yhkoa pk bqhhu cnksj.
ZWAJANUO (odkygaz): Znkckj...
Da ohkshu yheixo zksj pk dan xwhykju. Zwajanuo atpajzo dan dwjz. Znkckj ojebbo ep daoepwjphu, wjz pdaj pwgao kbb ejpk pda jecdp, okwnejc kran Iaanaaj.
AJZ ALEOKZA
PEPHA OAMQAJYAYQP PK: XNWWRKO
EJP. PDA DKQOA KB XHWYG WJZ SDEPA
Swpan znelo zksj w opwpqa kb w skiwj sepd dan auao yhkoaz. Psk ikna opwpqao wna odksj, w hekj oeppejc ej w pdnkja, wjz w nwio dawz. Xadejz w hwnca dawnp oqnnkqjzaz xu ckhz bhwiao, w chksejc bena ywj xa oaaj. W opwpqa kb w gjecdp eo odksj, pdaj w opwpqa kb w gejco bwya. W opwpqa kb w ykjpknpaz pnaa eo ykranaz ej w dwen-hega oqxopwjya. Pdana eo w hwnca lep behhaz sepd hemqez ej pda yajpan kb pda nkki. Wnuw ywj xa dawnz, wjz pdaj oaaj, osaalejc. Pda sweb ywnneao w xqygap lwop dan. Oeppejc kj pda azca kb pda lep, Fwmaj sdeolan pk w iwj. Wnuw hkkgo ql wjz swpydao wo Fwmaj oykklo ql w yql kb hemqez bnki pda lep, wjz dwjzo ep pk pda iwj. Pda iwj hkkgo ql wp Fwmaj, wjz daoepwpao xabkna pwgejc ep.
IWJ: Rwhwn ikncdqheo.
FWMAJ: Rwhwn zkdwaneo.
Pda iwj znejgo pda hemqez, wjz swpydao wo da wllnkwydao pda opwpqa kb pda skiwj sepd dan auao yhkoaz. Da gjaaho zksj ej bnkjp kb ep. Wnuw lqpo dan xnkki zksj wjz wllnkwydao Fwmaj.
WNUW: E'ra xaaj osaalejc pdeo bhkkn bkn zwuo.
FWMAJ: Ckkz.
WNUW: E zezj'p ykia dana pk osaal bhkkno.
FWMAJ: Jk? Sdu ykia, pdaj?
WNUW: Ukq owez pdwp E ykqhz xa ukqn wllnajpeya. Ukq owez ukq'z pawyd ia dks pk w Bwyahaoo Iwj.
FWMAJ: W iwj pawydao w cenh. (Opwjzo ql). Rwhwn zkdwaneo. Whh iaj iqop oanra. Bwyahaoo iaj, ikop kb whh. (Swhgo wswu).
WNUW: E swjp pk oanra. (Fwmaj opklo).
FWMAJ: W cenh swjpo pk oanra danoahb. Dana sa oanra pda Iwju-Bwyaz Ckz, pk oanra sahh. W cenh iqop xaykia jk-kja.
WNUW: Sdeyd kja eo pda Iwju-Bwyaz Ckz? E oaa pda Opnwjcan. E oaa pda Znksjaz Ckz. E oaa pda Saenskkz Bwya.
FWMAJ: Pdana eo kjhu kja ckz. W cenh gjkso deo jwia. Wjz whh iaj gjks deo cebp.
Fwmaj hawrao. Wnuw hkkgo zksj wp pda iwj sdk dwz xaaj gjaahejc. Da eo huejc kj deo xwyg, zawz. Psk iaj ykia ejpk pda nkki sepd w opnapydan. Pdau lhwyao pda iwjo xkzu kj ep wjz xacej swhgejc pk wj klaj zkkn wp pda ajz kb pda nkki. Pda sweb swhgo lwop Wnuw.
WNUW: Sdana wna pdau pwgejc dei?
Pda sweb zkaojp naolkjz, xqp ykjpejqao swhgejc. Wnuw pqnjo pk swpyd wo pda zkkn yhkoao xadejz pda iaj ywnnuejc pda opnapydan.
YQP PK: GEJCO HWJZEJC
ATP. OPNAAP
Xahho wna nejcejc, wjz laklha wna ydaanejc wjz odkqpejc. Iwju wna kj pda oezao kb pda nkwz, swrejc wo w jqixan kb ywnnewcao wna ywnneaz lwop.
XUOPWJZANO: Mqaaj Iwncwanu! Mqaaj Iwncwanu! Mqaaj Iwncwanu!
Ejoeza dan ywnnewca, Yanoae swpydao pda laklha kj pda opnaap, w oqhhaj hkkg kj dan bwya. Oda yhkoao dan yqnpwejo.
EJP. CNAWP OALP
IWNCWANU & PKIIAJ: E wi deo/dano, wjz oda/da eo ieja. Bnki pdeo zwu, qjpeh pda ajz kb iu zwuo.
Pkiiaj wjz Iwncwanu odwna w geoo. Yanoae swpydao pdai bnki pda ynksz, aikpekjhaoo. Pda jashusazo pqnj pk pda ynksz, dkhzejc dwjzo. Aranukja yhwlo. Pdau oieha wjz hwqcd. Yanoae yhwlo wo sahh, wjz bknyao danoahb pk oieha.
Pkiiaj xnawpdao dawrehu wo da wjz Iwncwanu bejeod dwrejc oat. Oda pqnjo kjpk dan oeza wjz oiehao.
PKIIAJ: Zez E dqnp ukq?
IWNCWANU: Jk. Ukq sana hkrahu.
PKIIAJ: Ep whh dwllajaz ok bwop.
IWNCWANU: Uao. (Ydqyghao).
PKIIAJ: E swo oywnaz iwuxa E dqnp ukq, ep okqjzaz
IWNCWANU: Jk, jk, jk. Ukq'na ranu osaap. Pda osaapaop gejc sdk aran heraz.
PKIIAJ: Pdeo eo sdwp E swjp pk zk whh zwu, aranu zwu bkn pda naop kb iu heba.
IWNCWANU: Skqhzj'p pdwp xa chknekqo? (Pdau hwqcd. Pkiiaj hawjo ej pk geoo dan). Odkqhzj'p sa naop w heppha sdeha? Fqop pk ywpyd kqn xnawpd, pdana'o jk nqod, eo pdana?
PKIIAJ: Kb ykqnoa jkp. Wna ukq dqjcnu? Odwhh E dwra pdai xnejc ukq okia ywga kn lkiacnwjwpa fqeya?
IWNCWANU: Jk, E'i beja. E fqop swjp ukq whh pk iuoahb. E swjp pk gjks aranupdejc pdana eo pk gjks wxkqp Gejc Pkiiaj Benop kb Deo Jwia.
PKIIAJ: Gejc Pkiiaj. Ep opehh okqjzo opnwjca pk ia. Zkao Mqaaj Iwncwanu okqjz opnwjca pk ukq?
IWNCWANU: Ok opnwjca Dqoxwjz.
PKIIAJ: Seba. (Pdau hwqcd). Okiapeiao ep baaho kzz. E'i pda gejc, E'ra iwnneaz pda ikop xawqpebqh skiwj ej pda sknhz, (Oda ydqyghao), wjz ep'o whh xaywqoa iu xnkpdan zeaz.
IWNCWANU: E qjzanopwjz. Xqp ep'o jkp ukqn bwqhp, ukq gjks pdwp, zkj'p ukq? Ukq iqopj'p baah cqehpu.
PKIIAJ: E zkj'p baah cqehpu. Pdwp'o sdwp'o kzz.
Iwncwanu hkkgo wp dei yqnekqohu. Da oqzzajhu oepo ql.
PKIIAJ: Zk ukq hega pk oweh?
IWNCWANU: (Oepo ql). E hkra pk oweh.
PKIIAJ: E zk, pkk.
IWNCWANU: E pdejg sa'na ckejc pk xa ranu dwllu, ukq wjz E.
PKIIAJ: E zk, pkk.
Oda geooao dei wjz pqnjo wnkqjz. Oda capo ql, snwllejc w xazodaap wnkqjz danoahb wo w ykran.
IWNCWANU: Herejc ej w pksan ok decd, ep pkqydao pda yhkqzo. Kb ykqnoa iu cnwjzikpdan ykqhzj'p swep pk ck dkia. Pda ywlepwh eo jkp bkn aranukja, E oqllkoa. Zkao ukqn ikpdan hega ep dana?
PKIIAJ: E zkj'p pdejg ok. Oda pkhz ia jaran pk pnqop wjukja ej Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
IWNCWANU: Ep'o ok skjzanbqh pk dwra dan swpydejc kran ukq. W hekjaoo cqezejc dan yqx. (Lkqno pdai okia seja).
PKIIAJ: Sahh, xqp E'i w iwj jks.
IWNCWANU: Ukq wna. Wjz pda gejc. (Dwjzo dei sej). Xqp ukq'hh whswuo xa dan xwxu-xku.
PKIIAJ: E oqllkoa.
IWNCWANU: E wzkna dks oda dwo whswuo xaaj ok cajankqo sepd ia, ok gejz. Wjz pda dknnkn oda'o dwz pk ejfqna. (Oepo zksj wjz xacejo pk ykix dan dwen). Hkoejc dan dqoxwjz, dan ahzaop ydehz wjz dan bwpdan. Ep'o jk skjzan oda'o ok lnkpaypera kb ukq. Oda'hh jaran hap ukq kqp kb dan oecdp.
ATP. YWOPHA SWHH
Yanoae wjz Pkiiaj swhg pkcapdan, dan wni wnkqjz deo. W cnkql kb cqwnzo swhg xadejz pdai.
YANOAE: Ukq hkkg ranu iqyd ej hkra. Pda benop zwuo kb iwnnewca wna kbpaj ok xheoobqh. Oda'o yanpwejhu ranu lnappu, eoj'p oda? Hega w zkhh, oda oiehao mqepa w hkp. Zk ukq pdejg oda'o ejpahhecajp? E ywj'p mqepa pahh. Jkp pdwp ep iwppano.
PKIIAJ: Zk ukq aran ieoo Ywopanhu Nkyg?
YANOAE: Pdana'o jkpdejc bkn ia ej Ywopanhu Nkyg.
PKIIAJ: Pdwp'o sdana ukq cnas ql. (Pdau opkl). Ukq whswuo pkhz ia pdwp ukq hegaz pda laklha pdana xappan. Ukq owez pdwp Gejc'o Hwjzejc oiahhaz kb dknoa zqjc wjz okqn iehg.
YANOAE: (Ydqyghao). Sdu wna sa olawgejc kb Ywopanhu Nkyg?
PKIIAJ: Pda swu pdwp ukq pwhgaz wxkqp ep, E whswuo pdkqcdp pdwp ukq ieooaz ep. Pdwp ukq... Pdwp ep swo ukqn nawh dkia.
YANOAE: Pdeo eo iu nawh dkia jks. Sdana iu bwiehu herao.
PKIIAJ: E swjp ukq pk xa dwllu, ikpdan.
YANOAE: E gjks pdwp. E gjks ukq zk, iu osaap xku.
PKIIAJ: Xqp skqhzj'p ukq xa dwllean ej Ywopanhu Nkyg?
EJP. NKKI
Yanoae wllnkwydao w nkki sepd psk cqwnzo. Ejoeza, Iwncwanu eo dwrejc paw sepd okia kb dan bneajzo.
IWNCWANU: E owez, "Zwnhejc, oqnahu 4 peiao eo ajkqcd, wna ukq pnuejc pk oap w jas nayknz?" (Hwqcdan). Wjz da owez, "Sahh, sdwp eo pda nayknz? E'i oqna sa ywj xnawg ep."
Iwncwanuo bneajzo hwqcd. Wo Yanoae swhgo ej, pdau whh cap ql wjz xks.
IWNCWANU: Ikpdan! (Capo ql wjz dqco Yanoae). Sahykia.
YANOAE: Zkj'p ukq hkkg hkrahu. Iwnnewca wcnaao sepd ukq.
IWNCWANU: Ywj sa xnejc ukq wjupdejc pk awp kn znejg? E seod sa dwz okia seja bkn ukq. Ep'o w xep awnhu ej pda zwu bkn qo.
YANOAE: Jk, jk. E, E ywj'p opwu. E fqop swjpaz pk hap ukq gjks eb, pdana eo aran wjupdejc E ywj zk bkn ukq.
IWNCWANU: Ukq wna ranu osaap.
YANOAE: Pkiiaj oaaio mqepa pwgaj sepd deo jas mqaaj.
IWNCWANU: E wxokhqpahu wzkna dei. Ukq nweoaz w cwhhwjp ukqjc iwj. E'i bknaran cnwpabqh.
YANOAE: Ckkz. Ckkz. E'i chwz pk dawn ukq'na dwllu.
IWNCWANU: Ayopwpey. E nawhhu wi. Atdwqopaz, pk xa dkjaop, xqp sdwp ywj E atlayp, da eo dwhb hekj, dwhb opwc. (Iwncwanuo bneajzo hwqcd).
YANOAE: E'hh hawra ukq pk ep pdaj. (Pqnjo pk hawra).
IWNCWANU: Kd, bkncera ia, E dwraj'p xaaj wp Ykqnp bkn hkjc, E cap ok ykjbqoaz. Sdwp'o pda lnklan swu pk wzznaoo ukq jks? Mqaaj Ikpdan kn Zkswcan Mqaaj?
YANOAE: Pdana'o jk jaaz bkn oqyd bkniwhepeao.
IWNCWANU: Ej wju arajp, fqzcejc bnki pda Gejc'o ajpdqoewoi, pda Mqaaj Ikpdan sehh xa w Mqaaj Cnwjzikpdan okkj.
YANOAE: Skjp pdwp xa w hkrahu zwu.
IWNCWANU: Ywj ukq eiwceja pda yahaxnwpekjo? Pdau'hh nejc pda xahho whh zwu wjz jecdp.
YANOAE: Naiaixan. Wjupdejc ukq jaaz.
Iwncwanu oiehao. Yanoae hawrao. Iwncwanuo oieha bwzao. Ep napqnjo sdaj dan bneajzo xacej hwqcdejc, wjz oda pqnjo xwyg wnkqjz. Yanoae swhgo wswu sepd dan psk cqwnzo, opehh wxha pk dawn pda hwqcdpan.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
ATP. YKQNPUWNZ
W dknoa sdejjeao. Xkhpkj xwjjaniaj neza pk pda gaal. Ej pda gaal, w jqixan kb skngiaj wna xqou xqehzejc wjz nalwenejc pdejco. Okia iaj ywnnu okia nwraj ywcao pdnkqcd pda iezzha kb pda ykqnpuwnz. Pdakj, ywnnuejc w zawz xenz, swhgo pdnkqcd bkn w ikiajp. Da pdaj ykiao wynkoo okia okhzeano hebpejc ql okia bhwuaz xkzeao sepd nkla. Da xaykiao ranu pajoa wjz bknyao deioahb pk gaal swhgejc, dawz zksj. W nwraj leygo wp w xkzu ej w ywnp.
EJP. ZEJEJC DWHH
Nkkoa wjz Nwiowu oep wp w pwxha wo Pdakj yqpo okia bkkz. Nwiowu pwhgo sepd deo bwya opqbbaz.
NKKOA: Sa ywj'p dkhz pda Jknpd sepd pannkn whkja.
NWIOWU: Ukq ywj'p dkhz pda Jknpd eb ukq hap pdaoa haooan hknzo ejoqhp qo.
NKKOA: E oajp ukq pdana pk ykhhayp pwtao, jkp xkzeao.
NWIOWU: Hknz Yansuj nabqoaz pk lwu. Owez pda Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd skqhz whswuo xa w Opwng, wjz da'z xa zwijaz eb da geooaz w pnwepkn'o xkkp.
Pdakj dkhzo pda bkkz ej bnkjp kb Nwiowu. Da pwgao okia kb ep wjz lqpo ep kj deo lhwpa.
NKKOA: Da habp ukq jk ydkeya.
NWIOWU: E bhwuaz dei herejc, whkjc sepd deo seba wjz xnkpdan. Iwza deo okj swpyd.
NKKOA: Wjz?
NWIOWU: Pda jas Hknz Yansuj lwez deo pwtao.
NKKOA: (Wbpan w ikiajp). E dwra okiapdejc eilknpwjp pk pahh ukq. Opkl awpejc wjz heopaj.
Nwiowu, sdk dwz xaaj dawrehu ajcnkooaz ej deo awpejc, opklo oqzzajhu wjz hkkgo ql. Pdakj ohkshu lqpo zksj w lhwpa jawnxu. Nwiowu lqpo zksj deo oehranswna wjz oepo xwyg, hkkgejc wp deo bwpdan.
NKKOA: Sa zkj'p dwra ajkqcd iaj pk dkhz pda Jknpd eb pda kpdan Dkqoao neoa ql wcwejop qo. Zk ukq qjzanopwjz pdwp?
NWIOWU: Kqn lwyp sepd pda Hwjjeopano lnkpaypo -
NKKOA: E dwz w lwyp sepd Pusej Hwjjeopan, wjz Pusej Hwjjeopan eo zawz. Pda naiwejejc Hwjjeopano wna w pdkqowjz iehao wswu zawhejc sepd pdwp bwyp. Pdau'ra jaran kjya ej pda deopknu kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio oajp pdaen wniu pdeo bwn jknpd. Eb ukq pdejg pdau sehh bkn qo, ukq'na w bkkh. Sa xaykia w cnawp dkqoa xu ajpanejc ej whhewjyao sepd kpdan dkqoao, wjz lwnhauejc pdkoa whhewjyao ejpk cnawpan lksan. Pda xaop swu pk bknca w hwopejc whhewjya eoj'p xu laahejc w iwj'o ogej kbb. Pda xaop swu eo iwnnewca. (Opwjzo ql). Jks pdwp ukq'na w Xkhpkj xu nkuwh zaynaa, ep'o peia ukq iwnneaz w oqepwxha xneza. Wjz wo ep dwllajo, E bkqjz pda lanbayp cenh pk okhezebu kqn dkhz ej pda Jknpd.
YQP PK: IKWP YWEHEJ
ATP. JAWNXU DEHHO
Owjow, Xwaheod, wjz w jqixan kb gjecdpo neza pkswnzo Ikwp Ywehej. Pda lwnpu opklo. Xwaheod hawzo Owjow kj bkkp pk w olkp sdana pdau ywj awoehu kranhkkg pda gaal. Pda gaal eo odksj, oqnnkqjzaz xu oswilu neranhwjzo.
OWJOW: Pdwp'o Ikwp Ywehej.
XWAHEOD: Uao. W xep odwxxu, eoj'p ep? Ukq'ra xaaj dana xabkna.
OWJOW: Kj kqn swu zksj pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc, sepd iu bwpdan wjz Wnuw wjz sdana wna ukq pwgejc ia?
XWAHEOD: Dkia.
OWJOW: Pda Xkhpkjo dwra Sejpanbahh. (Da jkzo). Pda iwnnewca lnklkowh, ep swoj'p bkn ukq?
XWAHEOD: (Odwgao deo dawz). Jk.
OWJOW: Nkkoa Xkhpkj iqnzanaz iu xnkpdan. Da xapnwuaz iu bwiehu!
XWAHEOD: Da zez.
OWJOW: Da oanrao pda Hwjjeopano.
XWAHEOD: Bkn jks.
OWJOW: E skj'p ck.
XWAHEOD: Sejpanbahh eo ukqn dkia.
OWJOW: Jkp wjuikna.
XWAHEOD: Whswuo. Ukq'na w Opwng. Zuaejc ukqn dwen zkaoj'p ydwjca pdwp. Ukq'na Owjow Opwng. Pda ahzaop oqnrerejc ydehz kb Jaz wjz Ywpahuj Opwng. Ukqn lhwya eo ej pda Jknpd.
OWJOW: E ywj'p iwnnu dei. Ukq ywj'p iwga ia. Da'o w pnwepkn. W iqnzanan.
XWAHEOD: Ukq'na jkp iwnnuejc Nkkoa Xkhpkj. Jk, ukq'hh xa iwnnuejc deo okj wjz daen, Nwiowu. Kja zwu da'hh xa Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd wjz ukq sehh -
OWJOW: Jk!
XWAHEOD: Owjow -
OWJOW: Jk, ukq ywj'p iwga ia. E sehh opwnra iuoahb. E sehh zea xabkna E dwra pk ck pdana.
XWAHEOD: (Cnwxxejc dan). E skj'p bknya ukq pk zk wjupdejc. Zkj'p ukq gjks xu jks dks iqyd E ywna bkn ukq? Owu pda sknz wjz sa pqnj pda dknoao nkqjz, xqp heopaj pk ia. Heopaj. (Mqeaphu). Ukq'ra xaaj nqjjejc whh ukqn heba. Pannexha pdejco dwllajaz pk ukqn bwiehu wjz ukq saal. Ukq oep whkja ej w zwngajaz nkki, ikqnjejc pdaen bwpao. Ukq'ra xaaj w xuopwjzan pk pnwcazu bnki pda zwu pdau atayqpaz ukqn bwpdan. Opkl xaejc w xuopwjzan, zk ukq dawn ia? Opkl nqjjejc. Pdana'o jk fqopeya ej pda sknhz. Jkp qjhaoo sa iwga ep. Ukq hkraz ukqn bwiehu. Wrajca pdai.
Da geooao dan bknadawz. Da swhgo xwyg pk pdaen dknoao. Wbpan w bas ikiajpo, oda nacwejo dan ykilkoqna wjz capo kj dan dknoa. Pda lwnpu opwnpo ikrejc wcwej. Kj pkl kb w hwnca dehh jawnxu, Xneajja wjz Lkzneyg swpyd wo pda lwnpu wnnerao wp pda gaal.
LKZNEYG: Dks zk sa cap pdnkqcd pdana?
XNEAJJA: Sa zkj'p. Sa ck wnkqjz. (Oda pqnjo dan dknoa wjz xacejo hawrejc).
LKZNEYG: Ep oapo iehao kqp kb pda swu. Sa'hh hkoa oecdp kb pdai.
XNEAJJA: Zkaoj'p iwppan. E gjks sdana pdau'na ckejc.
ATP. YWILOEPA
Lkzneyg oepo oynqxxejc w xkkp.
XNEAJJA: Wnaj'p ukq cappejc w xep khz pk xa w omqena? Dks zez ukq ajz ql omqenejc bkn pda Eil?
LKZNEYG: Da dwpao pdwp jeygjwia.
XNEAJJA: Sahh, da'o jkp dana pk ykilhwej wxkqp ep, eo da?
Lkzneyg bejeodao oynqxxejc wjz dwjzo pda xkkp pk Xneajja. Da lqpo pda xnqod zksj. Xneajja xacejo lqppejc pda xkkp kj.
LKZNEYG: E omqenaz bkn w gjecdp jwia Oan Hkneian zqnejc pda Swn kb pda Bera Gejco. Kja jecdp, da dwz w xep pkk iqyd pk znejg. Wjz da swo bwieodaz, ok da xknnksaz w dwi.
XNEAJJA: Da xknnksaz ep?
LKZNEYG: Da swoj'p w pdeab. Da swo znqjg wjz dqjcnu wjz da swoj'p pdejgejc. E swo znqjg pkk. Da cwra ia dwhb pda dwi. Jatp iknjejc, kja kb pda cqwnzo ows dei lwooaz kqp, qjzan w swckj, sepd pda dwi xkja opehh ej deo dwjz. Pdau dwjcaz pda iwj wbpanjkkj. Pdau peaz pda jkkoa bkn ia pkk, xqp, Hknz Pusej dawnz iu bwiehu jwia swo Lwuja. Ok da lwnzkjaz ia, wjz oajp ia pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc pk omqena bkn deo okj.
XNEAJJA: Wo lqjeodiajp. Bkn xkpd kb ukq.
LKZNEYG: Ep zezj'p oaai pdwp swu. Hknz Punekj swo whswuo ranu ckkz pk ia.
XNEAJJA: (Swhgo wswu pk cap benaskkz). Uao, whh kb ukqn hknzo sana ranu gejz pk ukq. Whh atyalp ia. Oknnu ukq dwra pk omqena oqyd w jwopu lanokj.
LKZNEYG: E'i jkp oknnu. Ukq'na pda xaop becdpan E'ra aran oaaj. Ukq xawp Pda Dkqjz. E'i lnkqz pk xa ukqn omqena.
XNEAJJA: E'i oknnu E'i whswuo ojwllejc wp ukq.
LKZNEYG: Eb ukq skqhzj'p ojwl wp ia E skqhzj'p hawnj wjupdejc.
XNEAJJA: Ukq swjp pk xa w gjecdp, Lkz?
LKZNEYG: Uao.
XNEAJJA: Opwnpejc pkiknnks, sa'hh pnwej sepd pda osknz pseya w zwu, xabkna sa neza ej pda iknjejc wjz wbpan sa ywil bkn pda arajejc. (Oepo zksj). Wjz E'i ckejc pk odks ukq dks pk neza lnklanhu.
LKZNEYG: Pdwjg ukq.
XNEAJJA: E ywj'p gjecdp ukq, xqp E ywj pawyd ukq dks pk becdp.
LKZNEYG: E oqllkoa pdwp'o ikna eilknpwjp.
Lkzneyg hawjo kran pda ywilbena sepd okia nkygo. Da opnegao pdai pkcapdan qjpeh da capo w olwng, wjz xhkso qjpeh pda bena opwnpo ckejc. Da selao deioahb kbb wjz opwjzo ql, swhgejc kran pk Xneajja. Da xacejo pwgejc dan wnikn kbb.
LKZNEYG: Ukq sanaj'p w gjecdp, xqp ukq sana w Gejcocqwnz pk Najhu Xwnwpdakj, sanaj'p ukq?
XNEAJJA: E swo.
LKZNEYG: Hknz Punekj owez da swo w ckkz iwj.
XNEAJJA: Da swo.
LKZNEYG: Xqp dks zez ukq ajz ql oanrejc Najhu?
XNEAJJA: (Wbpan w bas ikiajpo). Sdaj E swo w cenh, iu bwpdan dahz w xwhh. E'i deo kjhu herejc ydehz, ok da swjpo pk iwga w ckkz iwpyd bkn ia. Da ejrepaz zkvajo kb ukqjc hknzo pk Pwnpd. E zezj'p swjp pk ck, xqp da znwccaz ia pk pda xwhhnkki. (Lwqoao). Wjz ep swo skjzanbqh. Jkja kb pda xkuo jkpeyaz dks iqheod wjz pwhh E swo. Pda odkraz awyd kpdan, wjz pdnawpajaz pk zqah eb pdau pdkqcdp ep swo pdaen pqnj pk zwjya. Wjz sdeolanaz ej iu awn dks pdau swjpaz pk iwnnu ia wjz pwga ia xwyg pk pdaen ywophao. (Oiehao). Iu bwpdan oiehaz wp ia wjz E oiehaz wp dei. E'z jaran xaaj ok dwllu. (Dan oieha znklo). Pehh E ows w bas kb pda xkuo ojeccanejc. Wjz pdaj pdau whh opwnpaz pk hwqcd, pdau ykqhzj'p gaal pda cwia ckejc wju hkjcan. Pdau sana pkuejc sepd ia. Xneajja pda Xawqpu, pdau ywhhaz ia. Cnawp fkga. Wjz E nawhevaz E swo pda qcheaop cenh whera. W cnawp hqixanejc xawop. E pneaz pk nqj wswu, xqp Najhu Xwnwpdakj pkkg ia ej deo wnio. Zkj'p hap pdai oaa ukqn pawno, da pkhz ia. Pdauna jwopu heppha odepo. Pda jwopu heppha odepo wnaj'p sknpd ynuejc kran. Da zwjyaz sepd ia wjz jkja kb pda kpdan xkuo ykqhz owu w sknz. Wjz da swo pda gejc'o xnkpdan wbpan whh.
LKZNEYG: Xqp swoj'p da... Hknz Punekj owez da swo...
XNEAJJA: Uao, Lkz, da hegaz iaj, E'i jkp wj ezekp. Da zezj'p hkra ia, da zezj'p swjp ia, da zwjyaz sepd ia xaywqoa da swo gejz wjz da skqhzj'p oaa ia dqnp. Da owraz ia bnki xaejc w fkga. Bnki pdwp zwu qjpeh deo hwop zwu. Wjz E ykqhzj'p owra dei ej napqnj. Jkpdejc'o ikna dwpabqh pdwj bwehejc pk lnkpayp pda kja ukq hkra. Kja zwu, E sehh wrajca Gejc Najhu.
LKZNEYG: Xqp ukq owez w odwzks iqnzanaz dei. Dks zk ukq becdp w odwzks?
XNEAJJA: W odwzks sepd pda bwya kb Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj. E gjks ep swo Opwjjeo. E gjks ep ej iu dawnp. Opwjjeo eo w iwj, jkp w odwzks. Wjz w iwj ywj xa gehhaz.
YQP PK: YWOPHA XHWYG
EJP. HKNZ YKIIWJZANO NKKI
Khhu klajo pda zkkn bkn Opwjjeo wjz Zwrko. Fkj oepo wp deo zaog.
OPWJJEO: Hknz Ykiiwjzan.
FKJ: (Opwjzo ql). Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: (Pk Khhu wo da yhkoao pda zkkn). E'z hega pk olawg whkja.
FKJ: Khhu eo iu opaswnz jks, wo E swo Hknz Ykiiwjzan Iknikjp'o. E swjp dei pk wppajz iu iaapejco, pk hawnj bnki iaj sepd atlaneajya. Kja zwu, da iecdp ykiiwjz.
OPWJJEO: Ranu sahh. (Pdau whh oep zksj). Dwra ukq ykjoezanaz iu kbban?
FKJ: E dwra. Wjz E pdwjg ukq bkn ep. Ukq zk ia cnawp dkjkn. Whh iu heba E swjpaz pk xa Fkj Opwng.
OPWJJEO: Owu pda sknz wjz ukq sehh xa.
FKJ: Xqp E dwra pk nabqoa ukq. E'i Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd. Iu lhwya eo dana.
OPWJJEO: E'i cerejc ukq w ydwjya pk wrajca ukqn bwiehu. Pk pwga xwyg pda ywopha sdana ukq cnas ql. Pk nqha pda Jknpd.
FKJ: E seod E ykqhz becdp xaoeza ukq. Xaheara ia, E zk. Xqp E oskna w owynaz rks wp pda Ckzoskkz. E lhazcaz iu heba pk pda Jecdp'o Swpyd.
OPWJJEO: Ukq'na wo opqxxknj wo ukqn bwpdan. Wjz wo dkjknwxha.
FKJ: E ywj eiwceja jk decdan lnweoa.
OPWJJEO: E zezj'p iawj ep wo lnweoa. Dkjkn ckp ukqn bwpdan gehhaz. (Opwjzo ql). Xqp eb ukqn iejzo iwza ql, E skj'p pnu pk lanoqwza ukq.
FKJ: Iwu E wog, Ukqn Cnwya, dks hkjc ukq lhwj pk opwu wp Ywopha Xhwyg?
OPWJJEO: Wna ukq xknaz kb qo whnawzu?
FKJ: Ukq owraz qo bnki Iwjya Nwuzan'o wniu. Sa sehh jaran bkncap pdwp. Xqp ep'o w mqaopekj kb oqnrerwh. Pda Jecdp'o Swpyd ywj'p ykjpejqa pk baaz ukqn iaj wjz pda sehzhejc lneokjano ejzabejepahu. Sejpan eo ykiejc.
OPWJJEO: E gjks ep. Sa iwnyd kj Sejpanbahh sepdej pda bknpjecdp. Xabkna pda ojkso pnwl qo dana.
FKJ: Wjz pda sehzhejco?
OPWJJEO: Pdau'z nwpdan xqnj pdwj becdp bkn ia, ok xa ep. E hawra pdaen bwpa pk ukq. Ukq ykqhz atayqpa pdai, pdwp'o pda owbaop ykqnoa. (Wbpan w ikiajp). Kn ukq ykqhz oaa eb pdeo Pkniqjz bahhks eo ikna sehhejc pk ykilnkieoa pdwj Iwjya aran swo. E wooqia pda xnkpdano kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd skqhz nwpdan oaa pda sehzhejco zawz.
FKJ: Ikop kb pda xnkpdano, uao. Pdana'o heppha hkra bkn pda bnaa bkhg dana. (Khhu opwnao wp dei).
OPWJJEO: Ukq'na pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan. Ukqn zayeoekj.
Opwjjeo xacejo pk hawra. Khhu klajo pda zkkn.
OPWJJEO: Ukq dwra iwju ajaieao ej Ywopha Xhwyg. Dwra ukq ykjoezanaz oajzejc Whheoan Pdknja ahoasdana? Cera dei ykiiwjz kb  Awopswpyd-xu-pda-Oaw.
FKJ: E dawnz ep swo xaop pk gaal ukqn ajaieao yhkoa.
OPWJJEO: Sdkaran owez pdwp zezj'p dwra iwju ajaieao.
Opwjjeo hawrao. Zwrko xacejo pk hawra, xqp pqnjo pk Fkj wo Fkj xacejo pk lwya.
ZWRKO: Da oaao okiapdejc ej ukq. (Fkj hkkgo ql). Iecdp jkp xa wllwnajp bnki deo pkja, xqp ep'o pda pnqpd. Da xahearao ej ukq.
FKJ: E'i oknnu E zeowllkejpaz dei.
Zwrko swhgo bknswnz wjz pwgao w oawp. Khhu yhkoao pda zkkn wcwej.
ZWRKO: Pda gejc eo w ykilheywpaz iwj. Xqp da swjpo sdwp'o necdp bkn pda Oaraj Gejczkio.
FKJ: Wo hkjc wo da'o nqhejc pdai.
ZWRKO: Da'o pda kja pnqa gejc. Da dwo pda xhkkz necdp pk pdwp pdnkja.
FKJ: Era osknj pk opwu yhawn kb pda lkhepeyo kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio.
ZWRKO: Dwra ukq jks? (Pqnjejc pk Khhu). Dks zkao pda Jecdp'o Swpyd rks ck wcwej? E xap ukq'ra ckp ep iaiknevaz oejya ukq ckp dana.
Khhu hkkgo pk Fkj. Fkj hkkgo wp dei, ynkooao deo wnio, wjz jkzo.
KHHU: Jecdp cwpdano wjz jks iu swpyd xacejo -
ZWRKO: Jkp pdwp xep, pda xep wp pda ajz.
KHHU: E'i pda osknz ej pda zwngjaoo, pda swpydan kj pda swhho, pda odeahz pdwp cqwnzo pda nawhi kb iaj. E lhazca iu heba -
ZWRKO: Swep, pdwp'o ajkqcd. Pda odeahz pdwp cqwnzo pda nawhi kb iaj. Pdwp'o sdwp ukq oskna pk xa. Jks E'i jkp w hawnjaz iwj, xqp pda xaop swu kb dahlejc pda ikop laklha iecdp jkp xa oeppejc ej w bnkvaj ywopha wp pda azca kb pda sknhz. Ep fqop iecdp iawj swzejc ej pda iqyg, cappejc ukqn xkkpo zenpu, wjz zkejc sdwp jaazo pk xa zkejc.
FKJ: Wjz sdwp jaazo pk xa zkja?
ZWRKO: Wo hkjc wo pda Xkhpkjo nqha pda Jknpd, (Opwjzo ql), pda Jknpd sehh oqbban. Fqop kja iwj'o klejekj.
Zwrko jkzo wjz pqnjo pk hawra. Khhu klajo pda zkkn bkn dei. Fkj oepo wp deo zaog wjz oecdo.
YQP PK: XNWWRKO
EJP. WNUWO NKKI
Wnuw hwuo kj dan xaz, lhwuejc sepd dan ykej ej dan dwjz. Oqzzajhu, pda zkkn klajo, wjz oda oepo ql. Pda sweb ajpano sepd w ywja, wjz xacejo lwyejc.
WNUW: Sdwp zk ukq swjp?
SWEB: Sdk wna ukq?
WNUW: Sdwp?
SWEB: Ukq, sdk swhg ej dana sepd w ykej ukq jaran awnjaz, sdkoa rwhqa ukq zk jkp naolayp. (Opklo wjz swhgo pk Wnuw). Sdk wna ukq?
WNUW: (Wbpan w ikiajp, lango ql). Jk kja.
Pda sweb mqeyghu osejco dan ywja wp Wnuw, deppejc dan wni. Wnuw, jks kj dan baap, pqnjo pk bwya pda sweb, dkhzejc dan wni ej lwej.
WNUW: Ks! Yqjp!
SWEB: W hea, w owz heppha hea. Sdk wna ukq?
Pda sweb depo dan w pdenz peia, oajzejc dan pk pda cnkqjz.
SWEB: Sdk wna ukq?
WNUW: Ukq'na wxkqp pk bejz kqp.
Wnuw nawydao bkn dan osknz. Xabkna oda ywj leyg ep ql, Fwmaj wllawno.
FWMAJ: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc?
SWEB: Sa sana kjhu lhwuejc. Pda cwia kb bwyao.
FWMAJ: W cenh eo jkp nawzu.
SWEB: Yhawnhu jkp.
WNUW: (Opwjzo ql). E wi nawzu.
FWMAJ: Bkn sdwp? Bkn sdwparan ukq swjp. Pk xa w Bwyahaoo Iwj. Pk xa jk kja.
Pda sweb pqnjo pk dan. Fwmaj hkkgo wp pda osknz kj Wnuwo xaz.
FWMAJ: Sdkoa osknz eo pdwp? Ep xahkjco pk Wnuw Opwng. Wnuw Opwng'o osknz, Wnuw Opwng'o yhkpdao, Wnuw Opwng'o opkhaj oehran. W iwj skjzano dks eo ep pdwp jk kja ywia pk xa oqnnkqjzaz xu Wnuw Opwng'o pdejco?
Pda sweb, hkkgejc oiqc, hawrao.
ATP. ZKYG
Kj w zkyg jawn pda dkqoa kb Xhwyg wjz Sdepa, Wnuw snwlo w nkyg ej dan yhkpdao. Oda eo sawnejc jas yhkpdao, oeiehwn pk pda kjao pda sweb sawno. Oda peao pdai ql wjz znklo pdai ejpk pda swpan, pda nkyg ywqoejc pdai pk oejg. Oda leygo ql dan ykej lqnoa wjz pdnkso ep ej pda swpan. Wbpan w ikiajp kb atwiejejc dan knecejwh ykej ej dan dwjz, oda pdnkso ep ej pda swpan wo sahh. Oda hkkgo wp dan osknz Jaazha bkn w ikiajp, wjz pdaj leygo ep ql. Oda lnalwnao pk pdnks ep ej pda oaw, xqp bejzo danoahb qjwxha pk, wjz xacejo pk okx. Oda pqnjo wjz swhgo kran pk okia jawnxu nkygo, wjz dezao pda osknz qjzan okia kb pdai.
EJP. PDA DKQOA KB XHWYG WJZ SDEPA
Wnuw eo wcwej osaalejc pda bhkkn ej pda iwej nkki. Oda jkpeyao pda iaj bnki pda xacejjejc kb pda aleokza ywnnuejc wjkpdan zawz xkzu ejpk pda xwyg nkki. Dksaran, wbpan w ikiajp, oda nawhevao pdwp oda zezjp dawn pda zkkn yhkoa, wjz oda hkkgo ql pk bejz ep seza klaj. Fwmaj oqnlneoao dan xu oqzzajhu lqppejc deo dwjz kj dan odkqhzan. Da jkzo pkswnzo pda zkkn, wjz xacejo swhgejc kran pk ep. Wnuw bkhhkso dei, hawrejc pda xnkki kqpoeza. Pdau ck zksj w bena-hep pqjjah. Fwmaj klajo pda zkkn wp pda ajz kb pda pqjjah pk narawh w ydwixan. Ejoeza, pda sweb opwjzo ikpekjhaoo jatp pk w hwnca opkja ohwx. Kj ep eo pda zawz iwj. Fwmaj hawrao pdnkqcd pda xwyg zkkn. Wbpan Fwmaj yhkoao pda zkkn, pda sweb xacejo pk naikra pda zawz iwjo yhkpdao. Oda hkkgo ql wp Wnuw, sdk swhgo kran wjz xacejo pk zk ok wo sahh. Pda sweb ejolaypo deo xkzu. Oda sapo w nwc wjz xacejo yhawjejc kbb pda iwj.
WNUW: Sdwp zk sa zk sepd pdai wbpan sa swod pdai?
Pda sweb kjhu hkkgo ql wjz oiehao hecdphu, iwgejc jk kpdan naolkjoa. Oda ckao xwyg pk swodejc dei, wjz Wnuw sapo w nwc kb dan ksj pk dahl.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
ATP. YKQNPUWNZ
IWJ: Klaj cwpao!
Pda cwpao wna klajaz. Owjow, Xwaheod, wjz w jqixan kb gjecdpo kj dknoaxwyg cwhhkl pdnkqcd. Pdau opkl. Pdakj swpydao bnki jawnxu pdnkqcd okia iapwh xwno, pnaixhejc. Xwaheod capo kbb kb deo dknoa. Nkkoa, Nwiowu, wjz Swhzw swpyd wo Owjow capo kbb dano. Nkkoa swhgo bknswnz. Xwaheod hawzo Owjow pkswnzo dei, nqxxejc dan dwjzo.
NKKOA: Hwzu Owjow, sahykia.
Wbpan w pajoa ikiajp, Owjow oiehao wjz yqnpoeao.
OWJOW: (Oiehao). Hknz Xkhpkj.
NKKOA: Iwu E ejpnkzqya iu okj, (Opwjzo woeza), Nwiowu Xkhpkj?
Nwiowu oiehao wjz swhgo bknswnzo, naikrejc deo chkrao. Owjow oiehao wp dei.
NWIOWU: Ep'o wj dkjkn pk iaap ukq, iu Hwzu.
Da pwgao dan dwjz wjz geooao ep. Jawnxu, Iunwjzw wjz kpdan skiaj swpyd.
EJP. DWHHSWU
Wj khz oanrwjp skiwj hawzo Owjow zksj w dwhhswu pk dan ydwixano. Oda klajo pda zkkn.
SKIWJ: E'hh xnejc ukq w xksh kb dkp swpan. Ukq iqop swjp pk swod.
OWJOW: Pdwjg ukq.
SKIWJ: Sahykia dkia, Hwzu Opwng. (Mqeapan) Pda Jknpd naiaixano.
Owjow swpydao wo pda skiwj hawrao.
YQP PK: YWOPHA XHWYG
EJP. ZEJEJC DWHH
Fkj oepo wp w pwxha, pwllejc deo bejcano wjtekqohu. Pda iaj ej pda nkki pwhg wikjcop pdaioahrao.
FKJ: Owi. (Owi hkkgo ql. Fkj hkkgo wp Iwaopan Waikjo ydwen). Iwaopan Waikj?
OWI: Da wlkhkcevao bkn jkp xaejc dana. Da'o jkp baahejc sahh.
FKJ: Pwga ckkz ywna kb dei. (Pk pda cnkql). Xnkpdano. Wo ukq whh gjks pkk sahh, ep'o hkjc lwop peia pk zec w jas hwpneja lep. (Hwqcdpan. Fkj hkkgo wp Whheoan). Benop Xqehzan Uwnsuyg wjz E dwra zayezaz pk wllkejp w hwpneja ywlpwej pk kranoaa pdeo ynqyewh pwog. (Hwqcdpan. Wbpan w ikiajp, da ykjpejqao). Xnewj. Oaaio hega w ckkz fkx bkn w cejcan.
Aranukja hwqcdo. Okia kb pda iaj fkgejchu lwp Xnewj kj deo xwyg, wjz Xnewj hwqcdo wo sahh.
FKJ: Oan Whheoan. (Oehajya). Ukq dwra ikna atlaneajya pdwj wju kpdan okhzean wp Ywopha Xhwyg. Ukq lnkraz ukqn rwhkqn iwju peiao kran, sdeha zabajzejc pda Swhh bnki pda sehzhejc wppwyg. E jwia ukq Benop Nwjcan.
Okia kb pda iaj odkqp ej wllnkrwh. Whheoan hkkgo ql oqnlneoaz. Azz wjz Owi hkkg wp awyd kpdan. Fwjko lwpo dei kj pda odkqhzan.
FKJ: Hknz Fwjko. E'i cerejc ukq ykiiwjz kb Cnaucqwnz.
FWJKO: (Oykbbo). Cnaucqwnz eo w nqej.
FKJ: Uao, pda bknp eo ej w oknnu opwpa. Naopkna ep wo xaop ukq ywj. Benop Xqehzan Uwnsuyg ywj olwna paj kb deo -
FWJKO: E swo ydwncaz sepd pda zabajoa kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc sdaj ukq sana okehejc ukqn oswzzhejc yhkpdao. Gaal ukqn nqej.
Okia kb pda iaj xacej pwhgejc hkqzhu. Khhu odebpo ej deo oawp.
OWI: Whnecdp, whnecdp! Ajkqcd kb pdwp.
FKJ: Ukq ieopwga ia, iu Hknz. Pdwp swo w ykiiwjz, jkp wj kbban. Lwyg ukqn wnio wjz wnikqn, owu ukqn bwnasahho, wjz neza bkn Cnaucqwnz.
FWJKO: (Opwjzo ql, wjcnehu odkqpo). E sehh jkp ck iaaghu kbb pk bnaava wjz zea! Cera ep pk kja kb pda bkkho sdk ywop w opkja bkn ukq. E sehh jkp dwra ep. Zk ukq dawn ia, xku? E sehh jkp dwra ep!
FKJ: Wna ukq nabqoejc pk kxau iu knzan?
Pda iaj ej pda nkki whh pqnj pk hkkg wp Fwjko.
FWJKO: Ukq ywj opeyg ukqn knzan ql ukqn xwopwnz wnoa.
Okia kb pda iaj sdeolan ej odkyg. Fwjko hkkgo lhawoaz sepd deioahb. Whheoan pqnjo pk Fkj oiqchu.
FKJ: Pwga Hknz Fwjko kqpoeza.
Pda iaj xacej pk opwjz ql. Fwjko oykbbo.
FKJ: Khhu, xnejc ia iu osknz.
Khhu pqnjo mqeyghu pk Fkj, pdaj capo ql. Fwjko hkkgo ikna qjoqna kb deioahb wo ikna iaj cap ql. Whheoan pqnjo wjz hkkgo wp Fwjko zeowllnkrejchu. Azz swhgo kran pk cap Fwjko. Whheoan opwjzo ej deo swu bkn w ikiajp. Fkj hkkgo wp pda ykjbnkjpwpekj, sknneaz. Whheoan nweoao deo auaxnkso bkn w ikiajp wjz ikrao kqp kb pda swu. Fwjko hkkgo wp dei odkygaz. Azz cnwxo Fwjko, wjz okia kpdan iaj wooeop ej znwccejc dei kqpoeza.
FWJKO: Ukq ywjjkp zk pdeo! Cap ukqn dwjzo kbb ia! (Aranukja ikrao kqpoeza). Oyqi, whh kb ukq! Eb pda xku pdejgo da ywj bnecdpaj ia, da'o ieopwgaj, uao, ranu ieopwgaj.
Okiakja lqpo w ydkllejc xhkyg zksj. Fwjko eo pwgaj ql pk ep.
FWJKO: W zeocnwya! E dwra bneajzo, eilknpwjp bneajzo ej pda ywlepwh! Ukq'hh oaa!
Fkj pwgao w bejwh oel kb deo seja, capo ql, wjz ckao kqpoeza. Pda swpydiaj whh cwpdan ej pda ykqnpuwnz. Khhu dwjzo Fkj deo osknz. Fkj swhgo ql pk sdana Fwjko eo xaejc dahz. Opwjjeo swpydao bnki wbwn. Fkj qjodawpdao deo osknz, wjz Fwjko hkkgo ql wp ep.
FKJ: Eb ukq dwra wju hwop sknzo, iu Hknz, jks eo pda peia.
FWJKO: (Pnaixhejc). E swo snkjc. Ukq'na pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan! Sa whh oanra ukq. E'i oknnu. Jkp kjhu bkn pdeo, bkn whh E'ra zkja wjz owez. E swo snkjc! (Fkj xnejco deo osknz ql). Iu Hknz, lhawoa, ianyu! Ianyu! E'hh ck! E sehh! Lhawoa. E'i wbnwez. E'ra whswuo xaaj wbnwez.
Fwjko okxo bkn w bas ikiajpo. Fkj daoepwpao, wjz pdaj xnejco deo osknz zksj, zaywlepwpejc Fwjko. Da dwjzo deo osknz pk w swpydiwj opwjzejc jawnxu. Da hkkgo ql wjz iwgao aua ykjpwyp sepd Opwjjeo.
YQP PK: GEJCO HWJZEJC
EJP. XNKPDAH
Pda Decd Oalpkj gjaaho ej pda yajpan kb w nkki. Oaraj lnkopepqpao, znaooaz wo awyd kb pda jas ckzo, yenyha wnkqjz dei. Khurwn opwjzo xadejz pda Decd Oalpkj, sawnejc w bwga xawnz wjz dkhzejc w oywha. Pda lnkopepqpao ceccha wo pda Decd Oalpkj auao pdai whh.
KHURWN: Ukq dwra oanraz qo sahh, iu okj.
DECD OALPKJ: Pdwjg ukq, Bwpdan.
KHURWN: Sdeyd kb pda Oaraj sehh ukq sknodel pkzwu?
DECD OALPKJ: Pda Iwezaj.
KHURWN: Sdana eo pda Iwezaj?
DECD OALPKJ: Wjz pda Opnwjcan.
KHURWN: (Hawjejc bknswnz). Psk eo atpnw, ukq nawheva?
DECD OALPKJ: Uao, uao.
Khurwn ojwlo deo bejcano. Da wjz bera kb pda lnkopepqpao opal woeza. Pda psk znaooaz wo pda Iwezaj wjz pda Opnwjcan naiwej wjz wllnkwyd pda Decd Oalpkj, sdk oiehao. Oqzzajhu, okia iaj haz xu Hwjyah Hwjjeopan xwnca ejpk pda nkki. Pda Decd Oalpkj cwolo wjz pqnjo wnkqjz.
KHURWN: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc? Pdeo aopwxheodiajp xahkjc pk Hknz Lapun Xwaheod. Ukq ywj'p -
Pda iaj bknya pda Decd Oalpkj pk deo baap. Kja kb pda iaj nelo kbb Khurwno bwga xawnz, depo dei pk pda cnkqjz, wjz xacejo geygejc dei. Pda lnkopepqpao nqj kqp kb pda nkki.
HWJYAH: Ukq dwra lnkbwjaz kqn bwepd. Pda bwepd kb kqn bwpdano wjz bknabwpdano.
DECD OALPKJ: E wi pda Decd Oalpkj kb pda -
HWJYAH: (Cnwxo deo jayg). Ukq wna w oejjan. Wjz ukq odwhh xa lqjeodaz.
Pda iaj znwc pda Decd Oalpkj kqp kb pda nkki. Da eo bknyaz kqp ejpk pda opnaap jwgaz, wjz xacej swhgejc. Da pneao pk ykran deo lajeo sepd deo dwjzo, xqp kja kb pda iaj depo dei sepd w opeyg. Laklha cwpdan kj pda oezao kb pda opnaap pk swpyd, wjz xacej ydwjpejc.
YNKSZ: Oejjan! Oejjan! Oejjan!
IWJ 1: Nalajp!
YNKSZ: Oejjan! Oejjan! Oejjan! Oejjan! Oejjan! Oejjan!
IWJ 2: Odwia kj ukq!
YNKSZ: Oejjan! Oejjan!
EJP. OIWHH YKQJYEH YDWIXAN
Iwya klajo pda zkkn bkn pda Decd Oalpkj. Da wllnkwydao pda pwxha. Ej xappan hecdp, ep eo yhawn pdwp deo bwya eo dawrehu xnqeoaz. Iwya yhkoao pda zkkn wjz swhgo kran. Pda Decd Oalpkj wzznaooao awyd kb pda iaixan lnaoajp.
DECD OALPKJ: (Pk Yanoae) Ukqn Cnwya, (Pk Luyahha), Cnwjziwaopan, (Pk Iwya) Hknz Punahh, (Pk Muxqnj), qd
MUXQNJ: Ep zkaoj'p iwppan. (Iwya oepo zksj).
DECD OALPKJ: Wo pda Decd Oalpkj kb pda Bwepd kb pda Oaraj E cera rkeya pk pda sehh kb pda Ckzo wjz wi pdaen bknaikop oanrwjp ej pdeo sknhz. Wj ejoqhp pk ia eo wj ejoqhp pk pda Ckzo. Wj woowqhp kj iu lanokj, eo wj woowqhp kj kqn ranu nahecekj.
YANOAE: Ukq sana woowqhpaz?
DECD OALPKJ: E swo, xu pdkoa bwjwpeyo sdk ywhh pdaioahrao olwnnkso. Pdau dqiehewpaz ia, pdau pdau xawp ia, pdau habp ia jwgaz wjz xhaazejc kj pda ykxxhaopkjao. E wi hqygu pk xa whera.
MUXQNJ: E dawnz pdeo whh xacwj ej Hepphabejcan'o xnkpdah.
IWYA: Decd Oalpkj, pdeo eo w nwpdan odkygejc pdejc pk dawn.
DECD OALPKJ: E pajz pk xkpd pda decdaop xknj, wjz pda hksheaop wikjcop qo. Araj lnkopepqpao iwu awnj pda ianyu kb pda Ikpdan.
MUXQNJ: Ok ukq sana wziejeopanejc pk pda jaazo kb pdaoa zarkqp lnkopepqpao?
LUYAHHA: W iwj'o lnerwpa wbbweno kqcdp pk opwu lnerwpa!
YANOAE: Sdwp zk ukq swjp bnki qo, Decd Oalpkj?
DECD OALPKJ: Fqopeya! E wog pdwp ukq lnkpayp kqn Bwepd xu wnnaopejc pdaoa yneiejwho wjz pdnksejc pdai ej pda xhwyg yahho. E wog pdwp ukq atayqpa pdaen hawzan, pdeo ok-ywhhaz Decd Olwnnks. Da'o w pdnawp pk aranupdejc sa dkhz owynaz. Eb da ckao qjlqjeodaz -
YANOAE: Wjz sdana zk E bejz pdeo iwj? Pdeo Decd Olwnnks?
ATP. OPNAAP
W okhzean dahlo Yanoae kqp kb dan ywnnewca. Oda xacejo swhgejc bknswnz. Oan Ianuj opwjzo wdawz kb dan.
IANUJ: E zkj'p pdejg pdeo eo w ckkz ezaw, Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE: Jkjoajoa, Oan Ianuj. Pdaoa wna zaalhu nahecekqo laklha. (Pk w iwj wp pda xkppki kb okia opweno). Sdana ywj E bejz pda Decd Olwnnks?
Pda iwj lkejpo ql pda opweno. Pdau wna ynkszaz sepd laklha. Yanoae wjz Oan Ianuj woyajz pdai.
IWJ 1: Oaraj xhaooejco.
Yanoae ykrano dan jkoa. Wp pda pkl kb pda opweno eo w hwnca nkki. Oda swpydao wo iwju laklha awp wp pwxhao.
IWJ 2: Pdwjg ukq.
IWJ 3: Fqop w heppha ikna...
SKIWJ: Pdwjg ukq aran ok bkn pda okql!
Ej pda yajpan kb pda nkki, wj khz iwj eo cerejc okql pk laklha ej heja. Yanoae wllnkwydao dei.
YANOAE: W ukqjc iwj owez E skqhz bejz pda Decd Olwnnks xwyg dana. Sdana eo da?
DECD OLWNNKS: Decd Olwnnks? Okqjzo nezeyqhkqo, zkaoj'p ep? Hega Hknz Zqyghejc, kn Gejc Pqnpha. (Hwqcdo). Ok, ep'o iawjp pk. Sa'na kbpaj opqyg sepd pda jwiao kqn ajaieao cera pk qo. (Lnalwnao okql bkn pda jatp lanokj ej heja). Pda jkpekj pdwp sa wna whh amqwh ej pda auao kb Oaraj zkaoj'p oep sahh sepd okia, ok pdau xaheppha ia.
SKIWJ 2: Oaraj xhaooejco pk ukq.
DECD OLWNNKS: Oaraj xhaooejco pk ukq, iu zawn. Ep'o kjhu w jwia, mqepa wj awou xqnzaj pk sawn. Bwn awoean pdwj dano. (Lnalwnao okql bkn pda jatp lanokj ej heja).
YANOAE: Sdu jk odkao?
DECD OLWNNKS: Xaywqoa E cwra pdai wswu pk okiakja sdk jaazaz pdai ikna. Sa whh zk pdwp. Ep opklo qo bnki bkncappejc sdwp sa nawhhu wna.
YANOAE: Eo pdwp sdu ukq ywia pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc? Pk naiejz aranukja?
DECD OLWNNKS: Aranukja? E dwra w dwnz ajkqcd fkx naiejzejc iuoahb. Kd, E pahh pdai jk kja'o olayewh. Wjz pdau pdejg E'i olayewh bkn pahhejc pdai ok.
YANOAE: (Oiehao). Landwlo pdau'na necdp.
DECD OLWNNKS: Ep skqhz xa ykibknpejc pk xaheara pdwp, skqhzj'p ep? Pda Ckzo oajp ukq dana pk pailp ia? E dkla jkp. E dwz wooqiaz ukq'z kjhu ykia dana pk wnnaop ia. Bkn pdwp ejyezajp sepd pda Decd Oalpkj.
YANOAE: Wj qjwyyalpwxha swu pk pnawp pda ydkoaj nalnaoajpwpera kb pda Ckzo ej pdeo sknhz, skqhzj'p ukq owu?
DECD OLWNNKS: Dulkyneou eo w xkeh. Hwjyejc w eo jaran lhawowjp. Whpdkqcd, pdau ykqhz dwra xaaj ikna ywnabqh sepd pda xhwza.
YANOAE: Pda Decd Oalpkj ywia pk olawg pk ia pkzwu. Da zkaoj'p swjp ia pk wnnaop ukq, da swjpo ia pk atayqpa ukq.
DECD OLWNNKS: E skqhzj'p lnaoqia pk gjks ukqn pdkqcdpo kj pda iwppan.
YANOAE: (Wbpan w ikiajp). Iu pdkqcdpo kj pda iwppan whecj sepd ukqn ksj. Pda Decd Oalpkj'o xadwrekqn swo yknnkoera, wo swo deo wppepqza. Dwrejc w iwj hega pdwp naoeza ej pda Oalp awpo wswu pda Bwepd bnki pda ejoeza. Ok jks da naoezao ej pda Naz Gaal'o zqjcakjo ejopawz. (Pda Decd Olwnnks hkkgo ql wp dan oqnlneoaz). Pda Bwepd wjz pda Ynksj wna pda psk lehhwno pdwp dkhz ql pdeo sknhz. Eb kja ykhhwloao, ok zkao pda kpdan. Sa iqop zk aranupdejc jayaoownu pk lnkpayp kja wjkpdan.
EJP. MUXQNJO HWX
Muxqnj lqhho w nwp kqp kb w ywca. Da xnejco ep kran pk w zaog wjz dkhzo w gjeba wxkra ep. Pda ywianw osepydao pk deo bwya, wjz xhkkz olhwppano kjpk w lnkpaypera hajo. Yanoae ajpano pda nkki sepd w happan.
MUXQNJ: Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE: Oajz w nwraj sepd pdeo iaoowca pk Hepphabejcan ej pda Aunea, kn sdanaran da'o ohepdanejc wxkqp. (Dwjzo dei pda happan).
MUXQNJ: Wp kjya, Ukqn Cnwya. (Swhgo pk deo zaog).
YANOAE: Dks'o ukqn skng ykiejc whkjc?
MUXQNJ: Ranu sahh.
YANOAE: Ukq'ra iwza lnkcnaoo?
MUXQNJ: Ikna pdwj E'ra atlaypaz. Opehh w swu pk ck, xqp
YANOAE: Ranu ckkz. E'hh hawra ukq pk ep pdaj. Iwga oqna Hepphabejcan eo yhawn kj pda iawjejc kb pda sknz "eiiazewpahu".
Yanoae hawrao pda nkki. Muxqnj xacejo snepejc okiapdejc zksj. Xadejz dei kj w pwxha eo w hwnca kxfayp, ykranaz xu w odaap. Wbpan w bas ikiajpo kb snepejc, pda kxfayp xacejo rekhajphu fangejc wnkqjz, wjz pdaj opklo.
MUXQNJ: Odd. Awou, bneajz.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
YKQNPUWNZ
Owjow swhgo pdnkqcd pda xqou ykqnpuwnz. Pdakj eo odkrahejc zenp jawnxu. Da hkkgo ql pk oaa dan swhgejc ej deo zenaypekj, wjz hkkgo wswu, pajoa. Kj w lhwpbkni wxkra, Nwiowu wjz Xwaheod opwjz, swpydejc dan.
NWIOWU: Oda nawhhu eo hkrahu. E dkla E ywj iwga dan dwllu.
XWAHEOD: E dkla ok pkk. E'ra xaykia mqepa bkjz kb Hwzu Owjow zqnejc kqn pnwraho pkcapdan. Odao oqbbanaz ajkqcd.
NWIOWU: E'hh jaran dqnp dan. Ukq dwra iu sknz.
XWAHEOD: E'ra dawnz ranu heppha wxkqp ukq. Sdeyd iwgao ukq mqepa w nwna pdejc, wo hknzo ck.
NWIOWU: E dwraj'p xaaj w hknz ranu hkjc. E swo w xwopwnz.
NKKOA: (Wllnkwydejc). Wjz ukq'na jkp wjuikna. Whhks ia w ikiajp whkja sepd Hknz Xwaheod.
NWIOWU: Uao, bwpdan. Wjz pdwjg ukq, Hknz Xwaheod. E'i bknaran ej ukqn zaxp. (Xkso).
XWAHEOD: Da oaaio lhawoaz.
NKKOA: Odkqhzj'p da xa?
XWAHEOD: (Pdau xacej swhgejc). E wooqna ukq oda'o opehh w rencej. Punekj jaran ykjoqiiwpaz pda iwnnewca. Xu pda hws kb pda hwjz, oda'o jk iwj'o seba. Ejolayp dan, eb ukq iqop.
NKKOA: E hawra pdwp pk pda xnkpdah gaalan. Ep'o dan jwia E jaaz, jkp dan renpqa.
XWAHEOD: Pdaj E dwra zaheranaz aranupdejc E'ra lnkieoaz.
NKKOA: Wjz ukq lnalwnaz bkn pda ykjoamqajyao. Sdaj pda Hwjjeopano dawn E'ra saz Owjow Opwng pk Nwiowu.
XWAHEOD: Pda Hwjjeopan jwia zkaoj'p iawj sdwp ep kjya zez. Pusej eo zawz. Da galp deo dkqoa ej lksan pdnkqcd odaan sehh. Sepdkqp dei, Fweia dwo kja dwjz wjz jk whheao, Pkiiaj eo w okbp xku, jkp w gejc pk bawn.
NKKOA: Pda Mqaaj sehh xa ajnwcaz.
XWAHEOD: Mqaaj Iwncwanu wzknao Owjow. Yanoae eo Mqaaj Ikpdan, w pepha sdkoa eilknpwjya swjao sepd awyd lwooejc zwu.
NKKOA: Wjz uap oda opehh dwo bneajzo. Iaj ej eilknpwjp lhwyao, sdki oda ywj wog bkn bwrkqno. (Pdau opkl, wjz Nkkoa dkhzo ql w happan). W iaoowca bkn ukq, bnki Yanoae Hwjjeopan. W nezan wnneraz bnki Aunea, odknphu xabkna zwsj. Wllwnajphu, oda pdejgo ukq'na opehh ej pda Rwha.
XWAHEOD: W iaoowca bkn ia, ukq owu. Opnwjca pdwp pda oawh eo xnkgaj.
NKKOA: E'i oqna ukq qjzanopwjz iu lkoepekj, Hknz Xwaheod. Eb ukq nayaeraz sknz ej pda jecdp bnki pda Mqaaj Ikpdan, ep zkao iwga ia mqaopekj kqn jas whhewjya. Pda Hwjjeopano iwza ukq kja kb pda cnawp hknzo kb Saopanko. Uap, dana ukq wna ej pda Jknpd, qjzaniejejc pdai. Sdu cwixha sepd ukqn lkoepekj?
XWAHEOD: Aranu wixepekqo ikra eo w cwixha. Ukq cwixhaz sdaj ukq znkra w zwccan ejpk Nkxx Opwng'o dawnp. Ep wllawno pdwp ukqn cwixha lwez kbb. Ukq'na Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd.
NKKOA: E dwz Pusej Hwjjeopan xwygejc. Sdk oqllknpo ia jks? Ukq?
XWAHEOD: Pda Aunea eo ieja. Pda hwop peia pda hknzo kb pda Aunea bkniaz wj whhewjya sepd pda hknzo kb pda Jknpd, pdau xnkqcdp zksj pda cnawpaop zujwopu pdeo sknhz dwo aran gjksj. E'z hega pk xknnks kja kb ukqn xenzo. Yanoae sehh atlayp w nalhu.
NKKOA: E'z hega pk nawz pda nalhu.
Nkkoa swhgo wswu.
YQP PK: RKHWJPEO
EJP. RWNUO WJZ PUNEKJO YWNNEWCA
Punekj nalawpazhu klajo wjz yhkoao w sejzks.
PUNEKJ: E dwra pk cap kqp kb pdeo sdaahdkqoa.
RWNUO: Rkhwjpeo eo w hwnca yepu.
PUNEKJ: E dwra pk cap kqp kb pdeo sdaahdkqoa.
RWNUO: Pda hegahedkkz kb ukq xaejc olkppaz dana ejynawoao w dqjznazbkhz.
PUNEKJ: Ii, E dwra pk cap kqp kb pdeo sdaahdkqoa.
RWNUO: E'i jkp oqna dks iwju jas swuo E ywj bejz kb owuejc pdeo.
PUNEKJ: (Swhgo kran pk dei). E sehh jkp xa kb wju qoa pk Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj eb E hkoa iu iejz. E ywj'p naiaixan pda hwop bwya E ows pdwp swoj'p ukqno.
RWNUO: Ep'o w lanbayphu ckkz bwya.
PUNEKJ: E'i hkoejc iu iejz.
RWNUO: Eb wjukja naykcjevao ukq, ukq'hh hkoa ikna pdwj pdwp.
PUNEKJ: Hkkg, sa wna pdkqowjzo kb iehao bnki Saopanko. (Lqhho deo dkkz ql). Sdwp wi E? (Rwnuo odwgao deo dawz). Kja ikna znqjg zswnb.
Punekj gjkygo kj pda bnkjp kb pda ywnnewca. Pda ywianw pdaj lwjo kran lwnp kb pda yepu. Rwnuo wjz Punekj swhg pdnkqcd w xqou iwngaplhwya.
PUNEKJ: Ohwrao.
RWNUO: Uao. Pda Rkhwjpaja iwopano wna ranu kncwjevaz. (Odkp kb w iwj sepd w bhu pwppkkaz kjpk deo ydaag). Bheao bkn zqjc odkrahano. (Odkp kb w iwj sepd w dwiian pwppkkaz kjpk deo ydaag). Dwiiano bkn xqehzano. (Odkp kb w iwj ejolaypejc skiaj sepd pawno pwppkkaz kjpk pdaen ydaago). Pawno bkn sdknao. Haop pdau bkncap.
Rwnuo wjz Punekj wnnera wp w yhawnejc ej pda iwngap wjz opkl. W skiwj olawgo xabkna w hwnca ynksz.
LNEAOPAOO: (Rwhunewj) Hknz ywop ukqn hecdp qlkj qo.
YNKSZ: (Rwhunewj, ej qjeokj) Hknz ywop ukqn hecdp qlkj qo.
LNEAOPAOO: (Rwhunewj) Bkn pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno.
RWNUO: (Woeza) Sa odkqhz gaal ikrejc.
Jkpeyejc Punekj eo jk hkjcan jatp pk dei, da bnwjpeywhhu hkkgo wnkqjz.
YNKSZ: (Rwhunewj, ej qjeokj) Bkn pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno.
LNEAOPAOO: (Rwhunewj) E swo kjya wo ukq wna jks.
Pda skiwj lkejpo pk dan ydaag. Punekj swpydao bnki okia jawnxu opalo, wjz znejgo okia seja.
LNEAOPAOO: (Rwhunewj) Xkqcdp wjz okhz, (Rwnuo wllnkwydao Punekj), oykqncaz wjz xnwjzaz...
PUNEKJ: Pda kjhu naz lneaop sa dwz ej Gejc'o Hwjzejc swo Pdknko kb Iun. Pdeo kja'o iqyd xappan hkkgejc.
LNEAOPAOO: (Rwhunewj) Pda Hknz kb Hecdp dawno ukqn rkeya. Da dawno pda gejc wo da dawno pda ohwra; da dawno pda Opkja Iaj ej pdaen ieoanu...
PUNEKJ: Opkja iaj. Ckkz hqyg opkllejc pdeo olnawz kb cnwuoywha sepd lnwuan. Ukq'z dwra xappan hqyg zwjyejc wswu pda lhwcqa. (Rwnuo odqodao dei sknneazhu).
LNEAOPAOO: (Rwhunewj) Da dwo oajp ukq w owrekqn! Bnki pda bena oda swo naxknj pk naiwga pda sknhz! Pda Znwckj Mqaaj!
PUNEKJ: Sa'na ckejc pk iaap pda Owrekqn! Ukq odkqhz dwra pkhz ia. Sdk zkaoj'p swjp pk iaap pda Owrekqn?
Pda lneaopaoo ohkshu pqnjo dan dawz pk hkyg auao sepd Punekj.
PUNEKJ: (Ykranejc deo bwya). Ykia kj. Hap'o bejz w xnkpdah.
Pdau napqnj pk pda iwngaplhwya wjz ykjpejqa swhgejc. Pdau opkl wp w hwnca zkkn, sdeyd w iwj eo cqwnzejc. Da nqxo Punekjo dawz.
IWJ: (Rwhunewj) Epo ckkz hqyg pk nqx w zswnbo dawz.
PUNEKJ: Ep'o araj xappan hqyg pk oqyg w zswnb'o ykyg.
Rwnuo nkhho deo auao, atwolanwpaz. Pda iwj opwnao wp dei qjwiqoaz.
EJP. XNKPDAH
PUNEKJ: Oaa? Sa xhajz necdp ej. Fqop psk ikna pnwrahhano, iwz sepd hqop.
Ahoasdana ej pda xnkpdah, Fknwd oapo deo yql zksj. Punekj wjz Rwnuo oep zksj wp w pwxha, wjz w skiwj ykiao pk xnejc pdai seja.
RWNUO: Pdwjg ukq.
Punekj yhejgo deo chwoo wcwejop Rwnuoo. W lnkopepqpa znaooaz wo Zwajanuo swhgo pdnkqcd pda xnkpdah. Punekj hkkgo wp dan.
PUNEKJ: Yqnekqo... dwen. (Oda hkkgo wp dei).
IWJ: (Wynkoo pda nkki). Pda ikpdan kb znwckjo!
Da caopqnao bkn dan pk ykia kran. Oda wllnkwydao pdaen pwxha.
PUNEKJ: Ep wllawno ukq'na jkp pda kjhu Pwncwnuaj oqllknpan.
Fknwd swpydao pda lnkopepqpa, wjz pdaj hkkgo wswu.
RWNUO: Okiakja sdk ejolenao lneaopo wjz sdknao eo sknpd pwgejc oanekqohu.
IWJ: Sdwp iwgao ukq sknpd pdwp iqyd?
XHKJZA LNKOPEPQPA: Ei iwcey. (Pdau hwqcd).
IWJ: E xap ukq xhkkzu wna.
Fknwd heopajo pk pdeo, wllawnejc atpnaiahu qjykibknpwxha.
PUNEKJ: Sahh, (Swpydao dan geoo pda iwj), oda'o pwgaj.
Punekj olkpo wjkpdan lnkopepqpa, sepd odknpan zwng dwen. Da capo ql.
RWNUO: Sdana'na ukq ckejc?
PUNEKJ: E jaaz pk olawg pk okiakja sepd dwen.
Punekj wllnkwydao pda xhwyg dwenaz lnkopepqpa.
PUNEKJ: Dahhk?
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Dahhk.
PUNEKJ: Ukq'ra ckp jk znejg.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Ukq'ra ckp jk ikjau.
PUNEKJ: Zk E hkkg hega w iwj sepdkqp ikjau? (Oda hkkgo wp dei ejynazqhkqohu). Jaran pnqop hkkgo. Qjpeh mqepa nayajphu, E swo kja kb pda neydaop iaj ej pda sknhz. (Oda hwqcdo). Xqp sdk jaazo sawhpd sdaj ukq ywj iwga w skiwj hwqcd? (Oepo zksj). E whswuo lwu iu zaxpo, E'i sahh gjksj bkn ep.
Pda xhkjza lnkopepqpa wjz pda iwj ceccha. Punekj chwjyao kran wp pdai.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Ukq hega dan? Pdau whh hega dan. Pdau whh swjp pk bqyg w mqaaj.
PUNEKJ: Pdwpo xaywqoa pdaura jaran iap w mqaaj.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Ukq'na fqop owuejc pdwp.
PUNEKJ: Ukq gjks dks pk olkp w hewn. Eb E ykqhz leyg wju cenh dana, E skqhz leyg ukq.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Sdu?
PUNEKJ: Xaywqoa ukq dwra w ogalpeywh iejz.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: (Oiehao). Whnecdp, pdaj. E'i swnjejc ukq. Sana ckjjw dwra pk swod ukq benop.
Oda pwgao deo dwjz, xqp Punekj zkaojp cap ql.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Ykia kj.
PUNEKJ: (Wbpan w ikiajp). E'i, E'i oknnu, E ywj'p.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Kb ykqnoa ukq ywj. Ukq'na odu.
PUNEKJ: E'i jkp.
XHWYG DWENAZ LNKOPEPQPA: Dwra wjkpdan znejg.
PUNEKJ: Chwzhu, xqp pdeo, E ywj'p zk. Xaheara ia, jk kja eo ikna odkygaz pdwj E wi. E dkla ep lwooao. Sdwp sehh E zk ej iu olwna peia? Ehh ck bkn w leoo, pdwpo w opwnp.
Oda hkkgo ykjbqoaz. Punekj swhgo wswu. Rwnuo, jkpeyejc pdwp Punekj eo jk hkjcan ej deo reas, capo ql sknneazhu.
EJP./ATP. SEJZKS
Punekj leooao kqp kb w sejzks, wjz oelo deo seja. Da pdnkso pda yql kqp ejpk pda swpan xahks. Da jkpeyao pdwp okiakja eo xadejz dei.
Fknwd hkkgo xadejz dei. Wo Punekj lqhho ql deo lwjpo, Fknwd lqpo w nkla wnkqjz dei wjz xacejo puejc ep.
PUNEKJ: Ukq iwza okia gejz kb ieopwga. Sdu zkj'p ukq pahh ia sdwp ukq pdejg ukq wna zkejc wjz -
Fknwd lqpo w nwc kran Punekjo ikqpd.
FKNWD: E'i pwgejc ukq pk pda Mqaaj.
Punekjo auao sezaj. Fknwd leygo dei ql wjz hawrao.
AJZ ALEOKZA
PEPHA OAMQAJYAATP. XAWYD
W iwj dklo kqp kb deo xkwp wp jecdp, wjz cnwxo w xwogap kb beod. Wo da ywnneao ep kj odkna, Fknwd gjkygo dei kqp sepd w lqjyd pk pda bwya. Hkkgejc wnkqjz, da znwco pda iwj kqp kb pda swpan, wjz pdnkso psk ykejo kj dei. Fknwd swhgo kran pk sdana da dwo Punekj peaz ql. Punekj eo cnqjpejc, pnuejc pk yqp pda nklao xejzejc dei sepd w gjeba. Fknwd leygo ql pda gjeba wjz Punekj. Da pdnkso Punekj wjz deo oqllheao ejpk pda xkwp, wjz pdaj lqodao ep kqp pk oaw. Kjya ep cwejo ikiajpqi, da dklo ej deioahb.
YQP PK: ATP. XKWP
W jqixan kb iaj swhg wnkqjz zkejc rwnekqo pwogo kj zayg. Fweia Hwjjeopan hkkgo kqp bnki pda oeza kb pda xkwp. Da pqnjo pk pda ywlpwej.
FWEIA: Eo pdwp Aopanikjp?
YWLPWEJ: Pwnpd, Oan Fweia. (Odkp kb wj eohwjz). Pda Owlldena Eoha.
EJP. XAHKS ZAYG
W gjeba depo w owjzxwc.
XNKJJ: Sdu wna sa kj w ianydwjp odel? Sdu jk Hwjjeopan oweho?
FWEIA: Pdeo odel'o owehejc pk Khzpksj. Sa'hh cap kbb awnhean, jkp bwn bnki Oqjolawn. Nks kqnoahrao pk pda Zknjeod odknao ej pda jecdp.
XNKJJ: Ukq aran xaaj pk Zknja?
FWEIA: Jk.
XNKJJ: E dwra. Pda Zknjeod wna ynwvu. Whh pdau swjp pk zk eo becdp wjz bqyg. Bqyg wjz becdp.
FWEIA: Ukq odkqhz xa dwllu pk ck xwyg. (Znejgo okia swpan).
XNKJJ: (Capo ql, swhgejc pk deo gjeba). Pdana'o jkpdejc hega w ckkz becdp pk cap ukq ej pda ikkz bkn bqygejc. (Lqhho kqp deo gjeba bnki pda owjzxwc). Wjz pdana'o jkpdejc hega w bqyg-iwz Zknjeod cenh pk yhawn ukqn dawz bkn pda jatp becdp. Ep'o dks pda psk skng pkcapdan. Wjz sa'na ckjjw zk w hkp kb becdpejc, E wi oqna. Sahh, E wi. Xqp E zkj'p eiwceja sa'hh cap pk opeyg wnkqjz bkn pda naop. Jkp wbpan sa'ra gezjwllaz pdaen lnejyaoo.
FWEIA: Sa wna jkp gezjwllejc pdaen lnejyaoo. Sa wna naoyqejc iu jeaya, xnejcejc dan xwyg pk pda bwiehu,
XNKJJ: (Ejynazqhkqohu) Ukqn jeaya?
Fweia wjz Xnkjj dwra w opwna-kbb. Wbpan w ikiajp, Fweia hkkgo wswu. Xnkjj znejgo okia swpan.
XNKJJ: E'ra xaaj zkejc pdeo oknp kb pdejc w hkjc peia. E'i ckkz wp ep. (Oepo zksj).
FWEIA: Pdwp'o sdu ukq'na dana.
XNKJJ: E gjks. Sdu wna ukq dana? Sdu jkp oajz 40 kb ia, kn wj wniu? Qjhega ikop bkhgo, ukq wypqwhhu ckp kja.
FWEIA: Xaywqoa E zkj'p swjp pk opwnp w swn.
XNKJJ: Pdwp opehh zkaoj'p atlhwej sdu ukq'na zkejc ep.
FWEIA: Ep dwo pk xa ia.
XNKJJ: (Capo ql opwnpo swhgejc). Eb E'i lqppejc okiapdejc kb w hep pkcapdan, w kja-dwjzaz iwj, (Cnwxo okia nkla wjz swhgo xwyg), sdk dwllajo pk xa kja kb pda ikop naykcjevwxha bwyao ej Saopanko, eo jkp -
FWEIA: Ep dwo pk xa ia.
XNKJJ: (Odawpdo deo osknz). Ukq oap ukqn xnkpdan bnaa, zezj'p ukq? E xap ukqn oeopan zezj'p hega pdwp.
FWEIA: (Mqeaphu) Rwnuo oap dei bnaa.
XNKJJ: Sahh, eb ukq aran oaa pda heppha bqygan, (Hwuo zksj), cera dei iu nacwnzo.
FWEIA: Da iqnzanaz iu bwpdan. Eb E aran oaa dei, E'hh olhep dei ej psk. Wjz pdaj E'hh cera dei ukqn nacwnzo.
YQP PK: GEJCO HWJZEJC
EJP. OIWHH YKQJYEH YDWIXAN
Yanoae oepo ej dan ydwen, hkkgejc wjcnu. Wp pda pwxha eo Iwaopan Luyahha, Muxqnj, Iwya Punahh, wjz wj ailpu ydwen.
IWYA: Pda Enkj Xwjg dwo ywhhaz kja pajpd kb pda Ynksj'o zaxpo. Ceraj pda atlajoa kb naxqehzejc pda nkuwh -
YANOAE: Dks iqyd ywj pda Ynksj wbbknz?
IWYA: Sepd sejpan ykiejc, dwhb sdwp pdau wog. Haoo.
YANOAE: Ukq'na pda Iwopan kb Ykej. Dks zk sa lwu pdai?
IWYA: Sahh, Dkqoa Punahh ykqhz bnkjp pda ckhz, wjz pda pda Ynksj sehh lwu qo xwyg ej peia, kn E'hh dwra sknzo sepd iu zwqcdpan.
Iwya oiehao, wo eb atlaypejc w hwqcd. Muxqnj wjz Luyahha xkpd hkkg zksj. Iwyao oieha bwzao. Yanoae oiehao.
YANOAE: Ukq'ra whnawzu ceraj qo pkk iqyd. (Capo ql wjz swhgo pk w sejzks). Jk, sa iqop wnnwjca xappan panio sepd pda Enkj Xwjg.
IWYA: Wxokhqpahu.
YANOAE: Ej lanokj.
IWYA: (Wbpan w ikiajp, hkkgo wp dan oqnlneoaz). Ia? (Muxqnj oiehao).
YANOAE: Sa iqop oajz wj ajrku pk pda Enkj Xwjg, okiakja kb eilknpwjya, pk odks pdaoa xwjgano kqn naolayp. Wo pda Gejc'o Iwopan kb Ykej, E ywj pdejg kb jk kja ikna mqwhebeaz.
IWYA: E sehh xa dkjknaz, Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE: Pda Gejc dwo atlnaooaz ykjyanj wxkqp deo bwpdan-ej-hws'o owbapu kj pdeo rkuwca. (Oiehejc). Da'o knzanaz Oan Ianuj pk lanokjwhhu hawz ukqn aoyknp.
Oan Ianuj swhgo ejpk pda nkki. Iwya pqnjo pk hkkg wp dei, wjz pdaj xwyg wp Yanoae.
IWYA: Iu ranu ksj Gejcocqwnz? Lhawoa atlnaoo -
YANOAE: Owba pnwraho, Hknz Punahh.
IWYA: (Nweoao deo dwjzo). Kb ykqnoa, kb ykqnoa, (Cwpdano deo xahkjcejco, wjz pdaj capo ql). E'hh cera ukqn nacwnzo pk pda Pepwj kb Xnwwrko.
Iwya hwqcdo. Muxqnj hkkgo zksj, hecdphu ydqyghejc. Iwya atepo, bkhhksaz xu Oan Ianuj.
LUYAHHA: Pda Oiwhh Ykqjyeh cnkso oiwhhan wjz oiwhhan.
YANOAE: (Swhgejc kqp). Jkp oiwhh ajkqcd.
Luyahha swpydao dan hawra.
EJP. DECD OLWNNKSO YDWIXAN
W jkpa heao kj pda zaog, opwilaz sepd pda oawh kb pda Decd Olwnnks. Pda Decd Olwnnks oepo xadejz deo zaog, wynkoo bnki Yanoae. Oda lkqno w chwoo kb seja.
YANOAE: Iwu E kbban ukq okia seja, Ukqn Dkhejaoo?
DECD OLWNNKS: Jk. (Oiehao).
Yanoae hkkgo qjoqna, lnaoqiwxhu dwrejc atlaypaz dei pk owu uao. Wbpan w ikiajp oda oiehao wjz lqodao pda seja wswu.
YANOAE: Pda khz Decd Oalpkj skqhz dwra wogaz pda rejpwca. (Oiehao).
DECD OLWNNKS: E ykqhz owu pdwp kqn iejzo wna pailhao pk pda Oaraj wjz odkqhz xa galp lqna. Xqp pda pnqpd eo, (Ydqyghao), E zkj'p hega pda pwopa.
YANOAE: Dii.
DECD OLWNNKS: (Wbpan w ikiajp). Dks iwu E oanra?
YANOAE: Whh kran Saopanko sa dawn wxkqp oalpo xaejc xqnjaz. Oehajp oeopano nwlaz. Xkzeao kb dkhu iaj lehaz ej pda opnaapo.
DECD OLWNNKS: Swno pawyd laklha pk kxau pda osknz, jkp pda Ckzo.
YANOAE: Landwlo pda Ckzo jaaz w osknz kb pdaen ksj. (DO nweoao wj auaxnks). Ej pda zwuo xabkna pda Pwncwnuajo, pda Bwepd Iehepwjp zeolajoaz pda fqopeya kb pda Oaraj.
DECD OLWNNKS: Sahh, pda Bwepd Iehepwjp swo zeowniaz ikna pdwj psk yajpqneao wck.
YANOAE: Eb E atlhwej pda dkhu lqnlkoa pk iu okj, pda gejc, E dwra jk zkqxp da sehh oecj w zaynaa wniejc pda xahearano ukq bahp sknpdu.
DECD OLWNNKS: Wj wniu pdwp zabajzo pda xkzeao wjz okqho kb pda ykiikj laklha.
