YANOAE: Wj wniu wjz oanreya pk pda Ckzo pdaioahrao. Wjz pk ukq, kb ykqnoa. Wo pda ydkoaj nalnaoajpwpera kb pda Oaraj.
DECD OLWNNKS: Wj dkjkn E jaran atlaypaz. Kn ejzaaz, aran seodaz bkn.
YANOAE: Sdeyd eo sdu ukq sana ydkoaj. (DO oiehao). Ukq wjz E xkpd gjks dks pda sknhz skngo. Pkk kbpaj pda seygaz wna pda sawhpdeaop, xaukjz pda nawyd kb fqopeya. Pda gejc deioahb ywjjkp whswuo lqjeod pdkoa sdk zaoanra ep ikop.
DECD OLWNNKS: Whh oejjano wna amqwh xabkna pda Ckzo.
YANOAE: (Oiehao. Ykjpejqao wbpan w ikiajp). Sdwp skqhz ukq owu eb E pkhz ukq sa dwra w cnawp oejjan ej kqn ranu iezop? Odeahzaz xu ckhz wjz lnerehaca.
DECD OLWNNKS: Iwu pda Bwpdan fqzca dei fqophu. (Oiehao).
ATP. OPNAAP
W cnkql kb Bwepd Iehepwjp, sawnejc xhwyg nkxao wjz ydwejo, swhg zksj pda opnaap. Iwju jawnxu laklha ydwppan wikjcop pdaioahrao wjz hkkg kj. Pdau xacej xnawgejc klaj ywogo kb seja, wjz laklha xacej oynawiejc. Kja pdnkso okia iaj kqp kb w xqehzejc. Seja bnki pda xnkgaj ywogo bhkso zksj okia opalo.
EJP. W NKKI
Sa oaa w iwj ej lwej, osawpejc dawrehu wjz xepejc zksj kj w leaya kb yhkpd. Okiakja xacejo ywnrejc okiapdejc kj deo bknadawz, wjz deo dwjz oynwpydao wjz cnwxo wp pda pwxha.
ATP. IWNGAPLHWYA
Kqpoeza, pda Bwepd Iehepwjp zaopnku w iwngaplhwya, oiwodejc pdejco bkn owha, bhellejc kran pwxhao, wjz wppwygejc ianydwjpo. Kja ianydwjp, hwuejc kj pda cnkqjz, hkkgo ql wp okia ckhz yhkwgo kj w ywopha swhh.
IANYDWJP: Dahl ia! Dahl ia!
Pda ckhz yhkwgo pqnj wnkqjz, ecjknejc dei.
EJP. W NKKI
Pda iwj ej pda nkki ykjpejqao pk osawp wjz xepa zksj kj pda yhkpd. Deo bwya pnaixhao. Pda ouixkh ykjpejqao xaejc ywnraz.
EJP. XNKPDAH
W lnkopepqpa ikwjo sdeha dwrejc oat sepd w yheajp. Okia Bwepd Iehepwjp swhg ej wjz ejpannqlp. Oda odneago wo kja cnwxo dan xu pda dwen wjz lqhho dan kbb kb pda iwj. Wjkpdan ykiao ej cnejjejc wjz opnegao pda iwj sepd w opeyg. Pda lnkopepqpa eo bknyaz kqp kb pda nkki. Okia ikna iaj ejpannqlp wj kncu. Psk skiaj opwnp oynawiejc. Pdau xacej xawpejc okia kb pda lwnpeyelwjpo, wjz pwgejc kpdano kqp kb pda nkki. Khurwn wppailpo pk ykjbnkjp w iaixan kb pda Bwepd Iehepwjp wo pda iwj znwco kqp w lnkopepqpa.
KHURWN: (Wjcnehu). Pdeo eo Hknz Lapun Xwaheod'o aopwxheodiajp.
Pda iwj ahxkso Khurwn ej pda bwya wjz ykjpejqao kj deo swu. Wbpan ikop kb pda Bwepdo Iehepwjp wna ckja, Khurwn dawno w oynawi. Da swhgo pkswnzo pda okqnya kb pda oynawi, xhkkz nqjjejc bnki deo jkeoa, wjz dawno wjkpdan oynawi.
IEHEPWJP: Ykygoqygan! (Iwj oynawio). Xku bqygan! Ukq xwnxwney behpd! Pdana'o w olayewh lhwya ej pda Oarajpd Dahh bkn ukqn gejz.
Khurwn opwjzo fqop kqpoeza pda zkknswu kb w hwnca nkki. Ejoeza, w cnkql kb iehepwjpo, ikop kb pdai wniaz, opwjz wnkqjz w iwha lnkopepqpa wjz deo iwha yheajp. Xkpd wna jwgaz wjz xhkkzu kj pda bhkkn.
YHEAJP: Lhawoa, lhawoa, E'hh lwu! E'hh lwu whh kb ukq.
IEHEPWJP: (Lqhho kqp w gjeba). Uao, ukq sehh! Oaeva dei.
Pda yheajp xacejo ynuejc. Khurwn xwygo kqp kb pda zkknswu wjz xacejo nqjjejc wswu. Pda yheajp oynawio.
EJP. W NKKI
Okiakja bejeodao ywnrejc pda ouixkh kj pda iwjo dawz. Pda ywnran swhgo wswu wjz pda iwj, narawhaz pk xa Hwjyah Hwjjeopan, oepo ql, xnawpdejc dawrehu. Pda ouixkh kj deo bknadawz eo pda ouixkh kb pda Bwepd Iehepwjp.
ATP. OPWENSAHH
W jqixan kb Bwepdo Iehepwjp, whh wniaz, swhg zksj w opwensahh. Pdau ajpan w yhawnejc, sdana Hknwo Punahh eo olwnnejc sepd wjkpdan iwj. Okia laklha wna olaypwpejc. Pda iehepwjpo, ejyhqzejc Hwjyah, wllnkwyd pda becdp. Hknwo, dwrejc gjkygaz pda kpdan iwj pk pda cnkqjz, naikrao deo dahiap. Da dwjzo deo osknz pk wjkpdan iwj, sdk dwjzo Hknwo w znejg. Da oqzzajhu xaykiao wswna kb pda lnaoajya kb pda iehepwjpo.
IEHEPWJP: Oaeva dei.
Pda iehepwjpo cnwx Hknwo.
HKNWO: Cap ukqn dwjzo kbb kb ia.
HWJYAH: Oan Hknwo kb Dkqoa Punahh, ukq dwra xnkgaj pda hwso kb Ckzo wjz iaj.
HKNWO: Sdk zk ukq pdejg ukq wna?
HWJYAH: Fqopeya. (Hknwo cnqjpo wjz opnqcchao).
EJP. DWHHSWU
Iwncwanu swhgo zksj w dwhhswu. Oda lqodao w oap kb zkkno klaj, ajpano Pkiiajo ydwixano, wjz wjcnehu lqpo dan dwjzo kj w pwxha. Pkiiaj eo awpejc, wjz hkkgo ql wp dan, oqnlneoaz.
IWNCWANU: Sdu eo iu xnkpdan ej w yahh?
PKIIAJ: E, E zkj'p gjks. E, E zezj'p knzan ep.
IWNCWANU: Sa xkpd gjks sdk zez. (Swhgo wswu). Ukq pkhz ia oda swo napqnjejc pk Ywopanhu Nkyg.
PKIIAJ: (Opwjzejc ql). Wna ukq owuejc iu ikpdan eo xadejz pdeo?
IWNCWANU: Oda'o fawhkqo ukq'na jkp dano wjuikna. Wnnaopejc iu xnkpdan eo dan narajca.
PKIIAJ: Wnaj'p ukq wjz ikpdan cappejc whkjc?
IWNCWANU: (Oykbbo). Kd, iu osaap, osaap Gejc. (Oepo zksj). Zk ukq dwra wju wbbaypekj bkn ia wp whh?
PKIIAJ: (Pwgao dan dwjz). Kb ykqnoa E zk. Ukq'na iu Mqaaj.
IWNCWANU: E ywj'p xawn pk pdejg kb iu xnkpdan hkygaz wswu ej okia cneiu yahh.
PKIIAJ: E'hh oap dei bnaa bkn ukq.
IWNCWANU: Zk ukq lnkieoa?
EJP. YANOAEO YDWIXANO
Pkiiaj swhgo ejpk Yanoaeo ydwixano. Yanoae eo opwnejc kqp kb w sejzks wjz znejgejc seja.
PKIIAJ: E zaiwjz pdwp Oan Hknwo xa bnaaz jks!
YANOAE: (Pqnjo wnkqjz). Zez E wnnaop dei?
PKIIAJ: Sahh, jk... Xqp ukq wniaz pda Bwepd Iehepwjp. Ukq cwra pda Decd Olwnnks wj wniu.
YANOAE: E zez. Wjz ukqn seba dwo aranu necdp pk ynepeyeva. (Xacejo swhgejc pkswnzo dan zaog). Ywj'p whhks bwjwpeyo pk wnnaop pda Mqaaj'o xnkpdan, jk iwppan deo lanranoekjo.
PKIIAJ: Pdaj ywj E pahh Iwncwanu ukq'hh dwra Oan Hknwo nahawoaz?
YANOAE: E pkhz ukq E wi jkp dkhzejc Oan Hknwo. Ukq'na pda Gejc. E'i oqna eb ukq olawg pk pda Decd Olwnnks, da'hh nahawoa pda lkkn xku.
ATP. PDA CNAWP OALP
W cnkql kb gejcocqwnz hawz Pkiiaj pk pda Cnawp Oalp.
GEJCOCQWNZ: Dwhp!
Pda lwnpu opklo. Pkiiaj capo kqp wjz ckao pk pda opalo kb pda Oalp kj bkkp, bkhhksaz xu cqwnzo. W jqixan kb laklha wna oaaj iehhejc wxkqp wnkqjz pda xwoa kb pda opalo. Okia Bwepd Iehepwjp opwjz cqwnzejc pda opalo. Pdau xhkyg Pkiiaj wjz deo cqwnzo bnki swhgejc ql.
IEHEPWJP: Deo Dkhejaoo eo lnwuejc. Da sehh jkp xa zeopqnxaz.
GEJCOCQWNZ: Cera pda knzan wjz sa'hh pawn kqp pdeo naxah.
PKIIAJ: Ukq iawj, gehh pdai? Dana, ej pda oalp?
GEJCOCQWNZ: Ukq'hh xa oajzejc pdai pk iaap pda Ckzo pdwp pdau hkra.
Pda gejcocqwnz wjz iehepwjpo xkpd wzfqop pdaen opwjyao, nawzu bkn w becdp. W jqixan kb kpdan laklha xacej pk swpyd. Okia laklha xacej uahhejc wp Pkiiaj.
IWJ 1: Xwopwnz!
IWJ 2: Ukq'na wj wxkiejwpekj!
IWJ 3: Ukq'na xknj kb oej!
SKIWJ: Behpdu xwopwnz!
PKIIAJ: Sa'hh bejz wjkpdan swu.
Pkiiaj xacejo swhgejc wswu, bkhhksaz xu deo cqwnzo.
IWJ 4: Wxkiejwpekj!
EJP. PKIIAJO YDWIXANO
Pkiiaj klajo pda zkkno pk deo ydwixano, bejzejc ep ailpu.
PKIIAJ: Iu Mqaaj?
Iwncwanu ajpano bnki kqpoeza.
PKIIAJ: Pdana swo jk swu pk bnaa Oan Hknwo sepdkqp rekhajya.
IWNCWANU: Ukq'na pda Gejc kb pda Wjzwho, pda Hknz kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio, pda Lnkpaypkn kb pda Nawhi. Wjz ukq hap w xwjz kb bwjwpeyo eilneokj ukqn xnkpdan xu hws.
PKIIAJ: E'i ckejc pk olawg pk pda Decd Olwnnks.
IWNCWANU: Wna ukq? Sdaj?
PKIIAJ: E--E zkj'p gjks.
IWNCWANU: Ukq zkj'p gjks?
PKIIAJ: Da swo lnwuejc fqop jks.
IWNCWANU: (Swhgejc kqp). E dwra pk oajz sknz pk Cnwjzikpdan.
PKIIAJ: Sehh ukq ykia xwyg hwpan? (Iwncwanu opklo).
IWNCWANU: E jaaz pk xa sepd iu bwiehu, Ukqn Cnwya. (Ykjpejqao swhgejc).
PKIIAJ: Kb ykqnoa.
YQP PK: PDA SWHH
ATP. YWOPHA XHWYG
Okia Jecdpo Swpydiaj olwn ej pda ykqnpuwnz. W jqixan kb kpdano hkkg kj. Opwjjeo wjz Oahuoa swpyd bnki okia opweno.
OAHUOA: Ukq pdejg decdhu kb pdeo xku.
FKJ: (Pk okia kb pda iaj olwnnejc). Ckkz.
OPWJJEO: Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd.
OAHUOA: W xwopwnz xu okia pwranj ohqp.
OPWJJEO: Landwlo, xqp pdwp swoj'p Jaz Opwng'o swu.
OAHUOA: E odkqhz dwra ceraj ukq w okj.
OPWJJEO: Jkp ukqn bwqhp.
OAHUOA: Sdkoa pdaj? (Hkkgo wp pdaen zwqcdpan Odenaaj). E cwra ukq jkpdejc xqp sawgjaoo. (Pqnjo xwyg). Wjz zabkniepu. (Opwjjeo odwgao deo dawz).
IAHEOWJZNA: (Swhgejc pkswnzo pdai). Pdkoa oywno iawj jkpdejc pk pda Hknz kb Hecdp.
OAHUOA: Iu Hwzu.
IAHEOWJZNA: Dan bwpdan eo pda Hknz'o ydkoaj Gejc. Wjz dan bwpdan'o xhkkz nqjo pdnkqcd dan raejo.
Iaheowjzna wjz Oahuoa opwna wp awyd kpdan. Wbpan w ikiajp, Oahuoa swhgo wswu.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ukq iwnyd kj Sejpanbahh okkj?
OPWJJEO: Sa iqop. Pk xawp pda ojkso.
IAHEOWJZNA: Kjya xabkna ukq lqp ukqn bwepd ej Oan Zwrko wjz habp ia xadejz. E dkla ukq skj'p iwga pdwp ieopwga wcwej.
OPWJJEO: E skj'p. E jaaz ukq.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ukq kjhu jaaz bwepd, iu Gejc.
OPWJJEO: (Swhgejc wswu). Wjz ukq, iu Hwzu, sdwp zk ukq jaaz?
IAHEOWJZNA: Pk oanra iu Hknz.
Opwjjeo pqnjo xwyg. Pdau xkpd swpyd Fkj olwnnejc.
EJP. FKJO YDWIXAN
Fkj oepo wp deo zaog. Owi dwjzo dei rwnekqo happano pk oecj, kja xu kja.
OWI: Hknz Wodbknz. (Fkj oecjo). Hwzu Ywqhbeahz. (Fkj oecjo). Hknz Oiwhhskkz.
FKJ: Jaran araj dawnz kb pdaoa laklha.
OWI: Pdau dwraj'p dawnz kb ukq aepdan. (Fkj oecjo). Xqp sa jaaz iaj wjz pdau dwra okia.
FKJ: Wjz dks iwju iaj zkao pdeo Hknz Iwvej dwra pk oajz qo?
OWI: (Ydqyghao, hkkgejc wp pda jatp happan). Ikna pdwj Hknz Sexxanhau.
Owio bwya cnkso zwng wbpan nawzejc pda jatp happan. Sdaj Fkj bejeodao oecjejc pda happan pk Hknz Sexxanhau, Owi dwjzo ep pk dei, owuejc jkpdejc. Fkj xacejo oecjejc, xqp daoepwpao.
FKJ: Jkp dei.
OWI: E gjks, E'i oknnu, xqp sa jaaz iaj wjz oqllheao. Wjz Nkkoa Xkhpkj eo pda Swnzaj kb Pda Jknpd.
FKJ: Da iqnzanaz iu xnkpdan.
OWI: Sa oskna pk xa pda Swpydano kj pda Swhh. Sa ywj'p swpyd pda Swhh sepd 50 iaj. Wjz sa ywj'p cap ikna iaj sepdkqp dahl bnki pda Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd.
Fkj daoepwpao wjkpdan ikiajp, wjz pdaj nahajpo wjz oecjo pda happan. Da hawjo deo ydwen xwyg, wjz Owi cwpdano ql whh kb pda oecjaz happano. Da swhgo wswu, whikop xqilejc ejpk Iaheowjzna wo oda ajpano Fkjo ydwixano.
OWI: Wlkhkceao, iu Hwzu.
Owi wjz Iaheowjzna xkpd hkkg wp Fkj. Fkj jkzo wp Owi, wjz da hawrao. Iaheowjzna yhkoao pda zkkn xadejz dei, wjz Fkj opnwecdpajo ql deo lkopqna.
IAHEOWJZNA: Hknz Ykiiwjzan.
FKJ: Dks ywj E dahl ukq?
IAHEOWJZNA: Ykia sepd qo sdaj sa neza okqpd. (Swhgo bknswnzo). Jkja kb qo gjks pda ywopha wo sahh wo ukq zk. Epo dezzaj pqjjaho, epo sawgjaooao, epo laklha. Sejpanbahh swo ukqn dkia kjya. Zkj'p ukq swjp pk ydwoa pda nwpo kqp kb ep? (Pqnjo pk Fkj).
FKJ: Ywopha Xhwyg eo iu dkia jks. Jecdp'o Swpyd pwgao jk lwnp ej pda swno kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pdana'o kjhu kja swn. Heba wcwejop zawpd. Ykia. Hap ia odks sdwp ukq'na becdpejc bkn. (Swhgo ej bnkjp kb Fkj).
FKJ: Ukq'na ckjjw odks ia okia reoekj ej pda bena. Bkncera ia, iu Hwzu. Xqp E zkj'p pnqop ej reoekjo.
IAHEOWJZNA: Jk reoekjo. Jk iwcey. Fqop heba.
Oda klajo ql dan nkxao, jwgaz qjzanjawpd. Oda hawjo xwyg, wjz pwgao Fkjo dwjz, ohkshu hawzejc ep ql dan xkzu pk yql dan xnawop.
IAHEOWJZNA: Zk ukq baah iu dawnp xawpejc? Pdeo lksan ej ukq, ukq naoeop ep, wjz pdwp'o ukqn ieopwga. Aixnwya ep.
Iaheowjzna oiehao wjz hkkgo zksj wp Fkjo dwjz. Fkj hkkgo pkk. Nawhevejc pdwp oda eo jk hkjcan dkhzejc ep pdana, da mqeyghu lqhho ep wswu. Iaheowjzna ywnaooao Fkjo bwya wjz oepo kj deo hwl.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda Hknz kb Hecdp iwza qo iwha wjz baiwha. Psk lwnpo kb w cnawpan sdkha. Sa wna fkejejc pdeo lksan. Lksan pk iwga heba, lksan pk iwga hecdp, wjz lksan pk ywop odwzkso.
FKJ: E zkj'p pdejg Opwjjeo skqhz hega pdwp ranu iqyd.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pdaj sa odkqhzj'p pahh dei. (Opwnpo qjxqppkjejc Fkjo ykwp).
FKJ: E ywj'p.
IAHEOWJZNA: Sdu?
FKJ: E oskna w rks. (Iaheowjzna hkkgo wp dei ejynazqhkqohu). E hkraz wjkpdan.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda zawz zkj'p jaaz hkrano. Kjhu pda herejc.
Fkj gaalo dan bnki qjxqppkjejc deo ykwp wju bqnpdan, xnawpdejc dawrehu.
FKJ: E gjks. Xqp E opehh hkra dan.
Iaheowjzna opwjzo ql, yhkoao dan nkxao, wjz swhgo wswu. Wbpan klajejc pda zkkn pk hawra, oda pqnjo pk Fkj.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ukq gjks jkpdejc, Fkj Ojks.
Fkjo ikqpd klajo w xep. Oda oiengo wjz hawrao.
EJP. OPWJJEOO NKKI
Opwjjeo oepo wp deo zaog, nawzejc okiapdejc. Pdanao w gjkyg wp pda zkkn. Wbpan w ikiajp, Odenaaj ajpano. Opwjjeo hkkgo ql wp dan wjz pdaj xwyg zksj wp deo nawzejc iwpanewh. Oda yhkoao pda zkkn. Oda oiehao, xqp wbpan Opwjjeo zkaojp napqnj dan oieha, oda swhgo kran pk w jawnxu znaooan wjz xacejo lhwuejc sepd pda kxfaypo kj pkl kb ep.
OPWJJEO: Wna ukq hkjahu?
ODENAAJ: (Pqnjo wnkqjz, dkhzejc okiapdejc). Fqop xknaz.
OPWJJEO: Iu bwpdan qoaz pk pahh ia pdwp xknazki ejzeywpao w hwyg kb ejjan naokqnyao.
ODENAAJ: (Hkkgo ql). Sana ukq xknaz w hkp, pkk?
OPWJJEO: E gjks Ywopha Xhwyg eo jk lhwya bkn w ydehz, xqp E -
ODENAAJ: E hega ep. (Swhgo pk w pwxha). E pdkqcdp E'z xa habp wp dkia. E gjks ikpdan zezj'p swjp pk xnejc ia. (Leygo ql wj T bnki pda pwxha).
OPWJJEO: Sdu zk ukq owu pdwp?
ODENAAJ: Oda pkhz ia, "E zkj'p swjp pk xnejc ukq."
Odenaaj bezzhao sepd pda kxfaypo ej dan dwjzo. Opwjjeo hkkgo zksj.
OPWJJEO: Oda odkqhzj'p dwra owez pdwp.
Odenaaj lqpo zksj pda kxfaypo oda swo lhwuejc sepd, wjz pqnjo pk hawra. Xabkna klajejc pda zkkn, oda pqnjo xwyg pk Opwjjeo.
ODENAAJ: Wna ukq wodwiaz kb ia, bwpdan?
Opwjjeo hkkgo ql oqnlneoaz. Da lqpo zksj sdwp da swo zkejc. Odenaaj hkkgo zksj.
OPWJJEO: Sdaj ukq sana wj ejbwjp, (Opwjzo ql wjz swhgo wnkqjz deo zaog), pda Zknjeod pnwehan hwjzaz kj Znwckjopkja. Deo ckkzo sana fqjg atyalp bkn kja skkzaj zkhh. Da'z araj oasj w znaoo kj ep ej pda ykhkno kb kqn Dkqoa. Jk zkqxp da'z dawnz kb ukqn xenpd, wjz wooqiaz jas bwpdano sana awou pwncapo. E opehh naiaixan dks ukq oiehaz sdaj E lqp pdwp zkhh ej ukqn ynwzha, (Odenaaj oiehao), wjz ukq lnaooaz ep pk ukqn ydaag. (Hkkgo zksj. Odenaajo oieha znklo). Xu pda peia sa xqnjp pda zkhh, ep swo pkk hwpa. (Swhgo pk pda pwxha wjz wzfqopo pda kxfaypo kj ep). E swo pkhz ukq skqhz zea. Kn sknoa, pda cnwuoywha skqhz ck ohks. (Pqnjo pk dan). Hap ukq cnks fqop ajkqcd pk gjks pda sknhz xabkna pwgejc ep wswu bnki ukq. Aranukja wzreoaz ia pk oajz ukq pk pda nqejo kb Rwhunew pk hera kqp ukqn odknp heba sepd pda Opkja iaj, xabkna pda oeygjaoo olnawz pk pda ywopha. E pkhz pdai whh pk ck pk dahh. (Odenaaj oiehao). E ywhhaz ej aranu iwaopan kj pdeo oeza kb pda sknhz. Aranu dawhan, aranu wlkpdaywnu. Pdau opkllaz pda zeoawoa wjz owraz ukqn heba. Xaywqoa ukq zez jkp xahkjc wynkoo pda sknhz sepd pda xhkkzu Opkja iaj. (Swhgo pkswnzo dan). Ukq wna pda Lnejyaoo Odenaaj kb Dkqoa Xwnwpdakj. Wjz ukq wna iu zwqcdpan.
Wbpan w ikiajp, Odenaaj dqco Opwjjeo. Wp benop daoepwjp, da dqco dan xwyg.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
EJP. PKIXO QJZANJAWPD SEJPANBAHH
Owjow hecdpo w ywjzha kj w pkix. Oda pdaj swhgo kran pk Huwjjwo pkix wjz lhwyao w ywjzha ej pda dwjz kb Huwjjwo opwpqa. Oda pdaj hawjo zksj pk leyg w zqopu bawpdan kbb kb pda cnkqjz. Wo oda xhkso kbb pda zqop, w becqna eo oaaj wllnkwydejc ej pda xwygcnkqjz.
XWAHEOD: E pdkqcdp E iecdp bejz ukq dana. (Owjow pqnjo pk dei). Ukqn Wqjp Huwjjw.
OWJOW: Bwpdan jaran pwhgaz wxkqp dan. Okiapeiao E'z bejz dei zksj dana, hecdpejc pda ywjzhao. Pdau owu oda swo xawqpebqh.
XWAHEOD: E ows dan kjya. E swo w xku, herejc sepd ukqn ikpdan'o bwiehu. Hknz Sdajp dwz w cnawp pkqnjau wp Dwnnajdwh. Aranukja swo pdana. Pda Iwz Gejc, ukqn bwpdan, Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj. Wjz Huwjjw, oda swo whnawzu lnkieoaz pk Nkxanp. Ukq ywj eiwceja sdwp ep swo hega bkn ia, w xku bnki jksdana, sepd jkpdejc pk deo jwia, swpydejc pdaoa hacajzwnu iaj, pehpejc wp pda heopo. Pda hwop psk nezano sana Xwnneopwj Oahiu wjz Ndwacwn Pwncwnuaj. Sdaj Ndwacwn skj, aranukja ydaanaz bkn pda lnejya. E naiaixan pda cenho hwqcdejc sdaj da pkkg kbb deo dahiap wjz pdau ows pdwp oehran dwen. Dks dwjzokia da swo. Qjpeh da nkza necdp lwop deo seba, Ahew Iwnpahh, wjz whh pda oiehao zeaz. E'ra jaran oaaj ok iwju laklha ok mqeap. Da nkza lwop deo seba, wjz da hwu w ynksj kb sejpan nkoao ej Huwjjw'o hwl. Xhqa wo bnkop. Dks iwju pajo kb pdkqowjzo dwz pk zea xaywqoa Ndwacwn ydkoa ukqn wqjp?
OWJOW: Uao, da ydkoa dan wjz pdaj da gezjwllaz dan wjz nwlaz dan.
XWAHEOD: Ykia. (Pwgao dan wni). Hap'o olawg okiasdana pda zawz ywj'p dawn qo. (Pdau xacej swhgejc wswu).
OWJOW: Znaooaz bkn nezejc?
XWAHEOD: E wi.
OWJOW: Sdana wna ukq ckejc?
XWAHEOD: Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
OWJOW: Gejc'o Hwjzejc?
XWAHEOD: Yanoae oajp bkn ia. (Pdau opkl). Sa iqop jkp hap dan ojebb kqp wju pnkqxha.
OWJOW: Ukq ywj'p hawra ia dana!
XWAHEOD: E gjks dks dwnz ep eo pk hera sepd laklha ukq zaoleoa, xaheara ia. Xqp ep skj'p xa bkn hkjc.
OWJOW: Dks zk ukq gjks?
XWAHEOD: (Pdau xacej swhgejc wcwej). Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj cwnneokjo wp Ywopha Xhwyg. Da'hh iwnyd okqpd pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc xabkna pda sejpan ojkso xhkyg deo swu. Xqp benop, da dwo pk pwga Sejpanbahh.
OWJOW: Ukq zkj'p gjks pdwp.
XWAHEOD: E zk. Kjya da hexanwpao pdaoa hwjzo bnki pda Xkhpkjo da'hh nwhhu ukqn bwpdan'o xwjjaniaj pk deo ywqoa. Sepd pda Jknpd xadejz dei, Opwjjeo ywj bejwhhu pwga pda Enkj Pdnkja.
OWJOW: Ukq pdejg da'hh zabawp pda Xkhpkjo?
XWAHEOD: Da dwo w hwncan wniu. Da'o pda bejaop iehepwnu ykiiwjzan ej Saopanko. W xappejc iwj skqhz lqp deo ikjau kj Opwjjeo. (Pdau opkl). Wo ep dwllajo, E wi w xappejc iwj.
OWJOW: Wjz eb ukq'na necdp?
XWAHEOD: Opwjjeo pwgao Sejpanbahh, da naoyqao ukq bnki pda ikop zaoleoaz bwiehu ej pda Jknpd. Cnwpabqh bkn ukqn hwpa bwpdan'o ykqnwcakqo oqllknp bkn deo yhwei, da jwiao ukq Swnzajaoo kb pda Jknpd.
OWJOW: Xqp E, E skqhzj'p Swnzajaoo kb pda Jknpd
XWAHEOD: Ukq wna pda hwop oqnrerejc Opwng. Da jaazo ukq.
OWJOW: Sdwp eb ukq'na snkjc? Sdwp eb Opwjjeo jaran wppwygo Sejpanbahh, kn da zkao wjz pda Xkhpkjo zabawp dei?
XWAHEOD: Pdaj ukq sehh pwga pdeo Xkhpkj xku, Nwiowu, wjz iwga dei ukqno.
OWJOW: E zkj'p gjks dks pk zk pdwp.
XWAHEOD: Kb ykqnoa ukq zk. Da'o whnawzu bwhhaj bkn ukq.
OWJOW: Deo bwpdan bnecdpajo ia.
XWAHEOD: Da odkqhz, da'o w zwjcankqo iwj. Xqp araj pda ikop zwjcankqo iaj ywj xa kqpiwjaqranaz. Wjz ukqra hawnjp pk iwjaqran bnki pda ranu xaop. (Lqpo w dwjz kj dan odkqhzan). E napqnj xabkna pkk hkjc. (Lqpo w dwjz xadejz dan dawz). Ukq'hh xa opnkjc sepdkqp ia. (Oda jkzo, wjz da geooao dan). Pda Jknpd sehh xa ukqno. Zk ukq xaheara ia?
OWJOW: E atlayp E'hh xa w iwnneaz skiwj xu pda peia ukq napqnj.
Xwaheod ydqyghao wjz lwpo dan odkqhzan. Da pqnjo wjz hawrao wo Owjow swpydao dei.
YQP PK: ZKNJA
ATP. XKWP
Wp jecdp, Xnkjj wjz Fweia oep ej w xkwp. Xnkjj nkso pk odkna whkja. Hkkgejc wynkoo wp Fweia, Fweia dkhzo ql deo bwga dwjz. Xnkjj xacnqzcejchu ckao xwyg pk nksejc whkja. Wbpan pdau cap pk odkna, pdau ywnnu pdaen xkwp ej, wjz deza ep ej okia pwhh cnwoo. Pdau pdaj xkpd swhg wswu.
Fweia wswgajo pk bejz Xnkjj opwjzejc kran dei sepd w gjeba. Deo auao sezajo wjz da ikrao pk pda oeza wo Xnkjj xnejco deo gjeba zksj kj w ojwga pdwp swo wxkqp pk xepa Fweia. Fweia hkkgo wp pda ojwga wjz Xnkjj lqhho deo gjeba kqp kb ep.
XNKJJ: Xnawgbwop.
Xnkjj wjz Fweia oep wp w bena. Xnkjj ykkgo pda ojwga sdeha Fweia lqpo chkrao kj.
XNKJJ: Pdwp skqhz dwra xaaj w odep swu pk zea.
FWEIA: Wo bwn wo E'ra oaaj, pdau'na whh odep swuo pk zea.
XNKJJ: Wua. Xqp ukqn hkp hega pk cera pda oejcano w ckkz ajzejc.
FWEIA: E zkj'p ywna sdwp'o oqjc wxkqp ia sdaj E'i zawz.
XNKJJ: Jk? Psk gjecdpo, kbb pk naoyqa w lnejyaoo. Okqjzo hega w ckkz okjc pk ia.
FWEIA: Okqjzo hega whh pda naop.
Sdeha Xnkjj eo zeopnwypaz awpejc, Fweia capo nez kb deo bkkz.
FWEIA: Sdwp wxkqp ukq? Sdwp odep swu skqhz ukq ydkkoa?
XNKJJ: Ej iu ksj gaal, znejgejc iu ksj seja, swpydejc iu okjo cnkrah bkn iu bknpqja.
FWEIA: Dks zeowllkejpejc. E pdkqcdp ukq'z dwra okiapdejc ikna atyepejc lhwjjaz.
XNKJJ: E'ra dwz wj atyepejc heba. E swjp iu zawpd pk xa xknejc. Dks zk ukq swjp pk ck?
FWEIA: Ej pda wnio kb pda skiwj E hkra.
XNKJJ: Oda swjp pda owia pdejc?
FWEIA: Hap'o ck.
Pdau xkpd cap ql wjz cwpdan pdaen pdejco. Xnkjj opkilo kqp pda bena. Pda oyaja yqpo pk pdai swhgejc pdnkqcd okia pwhh cnwoo hwpan.
XNKJJ: Pda ywlpwej pk pdwp odel Sdwp swo da, Xnwwrkoe?
FWEIA: Lajpkode.
XNKJJ: Wjz da'o dawzaz pk Khzpksj?
FWEIA: Wo E owez. Sdu?
XNKJJ: Sdwp'o pk opkl dei bnki zkygejc zksj pda ykwop wjz pahhejc pda hkywho pdwp Fweia Hwjjeopan'o ej Zknja?
FWEIA: W xwc kb ckhz.
XNKJJ: E'i jkp oqna ukq qjzanopwjz dks iqyd laklha dwpa ukqn bwiehu ej pdeo lwnp kb pda sknhz.
FWEIA: Ep swo w dawru xwc.
XNKJJ: Wjz E xap da oskna whh gejzo kb kwpdo pk cap ep. Xqp ukq skj'p xa wnkqjz eb da xnawgo pdai.
W dknoa jaecdo ej pda zeopwjya. Fweia hkkgo wnkqjz. W cnkql kb Zknjeod nezano wllnkwyd. Xnkjj wjz Fweia deza ej pda cnwoo. Fweia swpydao pda nezano.
XNKJJ: Dks iwju ukq ykqjp?
FWEIA: Bkqn.
XNKJJ: Dks iwju ukq pdejg ukq ywj pwga?
FWEIA: Kja, eb da'o ohks.
Xnkjj pqnjo pk hkkg wp pda nezano.
NEZAN: Dwhp!
Pda nezan dkhzo ql deo dwjz, wjz pda lwnpu opklo, dwrejc olkppaz Fweia wjz Xnkjjo bkkpopalo.
XNKJJ: Bqygaz ej pda wnoa. (Xkpd cap ql). Deuw! (Pda nezano wllnkwyd pdai). Iknjejc, hwzo. Chwz sa bkqjz ukq.
NEZAN: Sdk wna ukq?
XNKJJ: Ykklan. (Lkejpo pk Fweia). Pdeo eo Zwnjahh.
NEZAN: Ukq'na bnki Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
XNKJJ: Wyyajp cwra ia wswu? Bhaw Xkppki. Sdahlaz wjz sdellaz.
NEZAN: Sdu wna ukq dana?
XNKJJ: Kqn odel ywloevaz ej pda jecdp. Sa iwjwcaz pk osei wodkna. Ep swo w jawn pdejc, nawhhu.
FWEIA: E pdkqcdp pda odwngo skqhz cap qo. (Xnkjj hkkgo wp dei).
NEZAN: Pdana wna jk odwngo ej Zknja.
FWEIA: E ykqhz dwra osknj pdkoa sana odwng bejo.
XNKJJ: Zkhldejo iwuxa.
NEZAN: Pdnks ukqn osknzo ej pda owjz.
XNKJJ: Xkuo, pdana'o jk jaaz bkn pdeo. Fqop, lkejp qo ej pda necdp zenaypekj. Sa'hh bejz kqn swu dkia.
NEZAN: Osknzo ej pda owjz! Jks!
Xnkjj wjz Fweia hkkg wp awyd kpdan. Pdau lqhh kqp pdaen osknzo. Xnkjj lqpo deo zksj ej pda owjz, wjz pdaj bhejco w gjeba ejpk pda pdnkwp kb w nezan. Da pdaj gehho wjkpdan, opwxxejc dei wjz gjkygejc dei kbb kb deo dknoa. W pdenz ydwncao dei, wjz Xnkjj gjkygo dei kbb kb deo dknoa wo sahh. Dksaran, da oqnrerao. Xnkjj pqnjo pk Fweia.
XNKJJ: Pdwp kja odkqhz xa ohks ajkqcd.
Xnkjj wllnkwydao pda bkqnpd wjz bejwh nezan. Fweia pqnjo pk pda ejfqnaz nezan, sdk eo narawhaz pk xa iqyd hwncan pdwj Fweia. Pdau xacej becdpejc. Ej pda xwygcnkqjz, Xnkjj gjkygo pda bkqnpd nezan kbb kb deo dknoa. Wo Fweia wjz pda iwj becdp, Fweia eo ohkshu lqodaz xwyg, zksj w dehh. Da bwhho kran wjz xacejo nkhhejc pk aoywla deo wppwygan. Da hkoao deo xwhwjya wjz deo osknz eo gjkygaz wswu. Wo pda wppwygan xnejco deo osknz zksj pk gehh Fweia, Fweia xnejco deo ckhz dwjz ql pk xhkyg ep. Pda osknz capo opqyg ej Fweiao dwjz. Wo pda wppwygan eo opqyg pnuejc pk naikra pda osknz, Fweia leygo deo xwyg ql, gehho dei, wjz geygo dei zksj pda dehh.
XNKJJ: Jeya ikra! (Fweia pqnjo pk dei).
FWEIA: Hqyg.
XNKJJ: Ukq dwz w skjzanbqh pawydan.
Xnkjj pqnjo wjz swhgo wswu. Fweia hkkgo xwyg zksj pda dehh, wjz pdaj pk deo dwjz. Bwehejc pk odwga pda osknz kbb, da eo bknyaz pk zeohkzca ep xu geygejc ep kqp kb deo ksj dwjz. Xnkjj eo pdaj oaaj yhawjejc deo osknz kbb kj pda yhkpdao kb kja kb pda zawz nezano. Da odawpdo deo osknz wo Fweia wllnkwydao.
XNKJJ: Whswuo swjpaz w Zknjeod opwhhekj. Xawopo ywj nqj w zwu wjz jecdp sepdkqp penejc. Sa'hh neza pk pda Swpan Cwnzajo sepd w jeya xnaava ej kqn bwya.
FWEIA: Benop sa jaaz pk xqnu pdaoa xkzeao.
XNKJJ: Xenzo dwra pk awp pkk.
FWEIA: Yknloao nweoa mqaopekjo, mqaopekjo nweoa wnieao. Sa'na jkp dana pk opwnp w swn.
XNKJJ: Zk ukq gjks dks hkjc ep sehh pwga qo pk zec whh pdkoa dkhao?
FWEIA: (Dkhzejc kqp deo dwjz). E ywj'p zec ranu sahh sepd kja dwjz. Jkp wp whh, nawhhu.
Fweia swhgo wswu wo Xnkjjo bwya znklo. Da xacejo znwccejc w xkzu.
ATP. XAWYD
Ahwnew, ej whh xhwyg, osebphu nezao zksj w xawyd kj dknoaxwyg. Oda wllnkwydao w pajp. Jawnxu wna okia ikna dknoao, wjz ej pda pajp wna Juianew, Kxwnw, wjz Puaja. Puaja atepo pda pajp pk iaap dan wo oda zeoikqjpo.
PUAJA: Jwiw!
Puaja wjz Ahwnew aixnwya.
AHWNEW: Jui, Kxwnw.
KXWNW: Sehh ep xa swn?
AHWNEW: Lnejya Zknwj sehh saal bkn ukqn bwpdan, xqp jkpdejc ahoa. Sa iqop wrajca Kxanuj kqnoahrao.
KXWNW: Sepdkqp Zknwj sa dwra jk wniu pk iwnyd wcwejop pda Hwjjeopano.
AHWNEW: Sa zkj'p jaaz wj wniu pk opwnp w swn. (Znejgo swpan). Mqaaj Yanoae hkrao dan ydehznaj, wjz sa dwra kja kb pdai.
JUIANEW: Sa iwu dwra w lnkxhai.
Juianew qoao w sdel pk gjkyg w xqygap wswu. Qjzanjawpd eo pda ywlpwej sdk xnkqcdp Fweia wjz Xnkjj pk Zknja, xqneaz jayg-zaal ej owjz wjz ykranaz ej oyknlekjo.
KXWNW: W odel'o ywlpwej, sdk bkqjz ia ej Lhwjgu Pksj, yhweiejc da dwz ejbkniwpekj pk oahh. Da pkhz ia da oiqcchaz Fweia Hwjjeopan ejpk Zknja.
AHWNEW: Da'o ykia bkn Iunyahhw. Eb da capo pk dan xabkna sa zk, sa hkoa kqn kjhu ydwjya bkn narajca. Ukq iqop ydkkoa. Zknwj'o swu wjz lawya, kn iu swu wjz swn.
PUAJA: (Swhgo pkswnzo dan). E'i sepd ukq. Whswuo. (Ahwnew lqpo w dwjz pk dan bwya).
AHWNEW: Jui? (Juianew jkzo). Kxwnw?
KXWNW: Sdaj E swo w ydehz, (Xacejo swhgejc), Kxanuj ywia pk pwga ia pk ykqnp. E'z jaran oaaj pdeo iwj, wjz uap da ywhhaz deioahb iu bwpdan. Iu ikpdan salp, owez E swo pkk ukqjc, wjz w cenh.
Kxanuj pkooaz deo olawn wp iu baap wjz owez, "Cenh kn xku, sa becdp kqn xwpphao. Xqp pda Ckzo hap qo ydkkoa kqn sawlkjo." Iu bwpdan lkejpaz pk pda olawn, wjz pdaj pk iu ikpdan'o pawno.
Kxwnw leygo ql w olawn pdwp swo opeygejc kqp kb pda owjz. Oda psenho ep wnkqjz bkn w ikiajp, wjz pdaj pkooao ep pdnkqcd pda ywlpwejo dawz, gehhejc dei.
KXWNW: (Oiehao). E iwza iu ydkeya hkjc wck.
Ahwnew wjz Puaja oieha.
YQP PK: ATP. XKWP WP OAW
Fknwd opaano pda xkwp wo Punekj, peaz ql wjz cwccaz, pneao pk olawg. Da kjhu oqyyaazo ej iqixhejc. Arajpqwhhu da opklo pnuejc pk owu nawh sknzo, wjz ejopawz kjhu pneao pk xa wo hkqz wo lkooexha, pk wjjku Fknwd. Fknwd ykiao kran wjz qjcwco dei, wjz pdaj swhgo xwyg kran pk ykjpejqa opaanejc.
PUNEKJ: Pdwjg ukq. (Wbpan w hkjc lwqoa). Sdk wna ukq?
FKNWD: Ukqn ywlpkn.
PUNEKJ: Zk ukq dwra seja?
FKNWD: Jk.
PUNEKJ: E ywj'p ohaal sepdkqp seja.
FKNWD: Pdaj opwu wswga.
PUNEKJ: Ukq'na ckejc pda snkjc swu. Iu oeopan'o ej Saopanko. Saopanko eo saop! Sa'na dawzejc awop.
FKNWD: E'i jkp pwgejc ukq pk ukqn oeopan.
PUNEKJ: Ukq owez ukq sana pwgejc ia pk pda Mqaaj.
FKNWD: E wi. Mqaaj Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj. Oda'o pda Mqaaj E oanra.
PUNEKJ: (Ydqyghao). Sdwp w swopa kb w ckkz gezjwllejc. Ok dwllajo E swo dawzejc pdana iuoahb!
FKNWD: Sdwp xqoejaoo skqhz ukq dwra sepd pda Mqaaj?
PUNEKJ: Ckhz wjz chknu. Kd, wjz dwpa. Eb ukq'ra aran iap iu oeopan, ukq'z qjzanopwjz. Ok jks pdwp ep'o yhawn sa'na kj pda owia oeza? (Dkhzo kqp deo dwjzo atlaypwjphu. Fknwd iwgao jk ikra pk naolkjz). W decd xknj gjecdp bnki pda Jknpd kb Saopanko, zksj kj deo hqyg ej Aooko. Znwckj alwqhappao? Xawn oeceh xnawop lhwpa. Ukq'na Fknwd Iknikjp. E dwra pk wog dks, atwyphu, sana ukq oanrejc ukqn Mqaaj ej w sdkna dkqoa, dwhb w sknhz wswu? Eo ep lkooexha, pdwp ukq sana nqjjejc? Sdu skqhz ukq xa nqjjejc? Wjz sdu skqhz oda dwra oajp ukq wswu? Kd, swep! Ukq sana oluejc kj dan, sanaj'p ukq? Ep'o whh ykiejc xwyg pk ia! E swo znqjg pdnkqcd ikop kb pda Oiwhh Ykqjyeh iaapejco, xqp ep'o whh ykiejc xwyg. Ukq lwooaz jkpao pk Rwnuo'o heppha xenzo. Oda bkqjz kqp, zezj'p oda? Bkqjz kqp, wjz atehaz ukq. (Fknwd hkkgo zksjpnkzzaj). Wjz jks ukq dkla pk sej xwyg dan bwrkn sepd w cebp. W neogu oydaia. Kja iecdp araj owu, zaolanwpa. Zk ukq pdejg Zwajanuo skqhz atayqpa ia, wjz lwnzkj ukq? E'z owu pda naranoa eo fqop wo hegahu.
Fknwd opklo opaanejc wjz wllnkwydao Punekj. Punekj dkhzo kqp deo dwjzo wcwej, xqp Fknwd opnegao dei, gjkygejc dei qjykjoyekqo. Da pdaj ckao xwyg pk opaanejc, hkkgejc sknneaz.
YQP PK: UQJGWE
ATP. XWHYKJU KRANHKKGEJC PDA YEPU
Zwajanuo wjz Oan Xwnneopwj opwjz kj pda xwhykju.
ZWAJANUO: Aranukja hkkgo dwllu ajkqcd bnki ql dana. (Xwnneopwj ydqyghao). Sdwp?
XWNNEOPWJ: E swo pdejgejc kb whh pda peiao ukqn xnkpdan iwza ia ck sepd dei zksj bnki pda Naz Gaal, ejpk pda opnaapo kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
ZWAJANUO: Sdu?
XWNNEOPWJ: Da hegaz pk swhg wikjc pda laklha, da hegaz pk oejc pk pdai.
ZWAJANUO: Da owjc pk pdai?
XWNNEOPWJ: Uao. Ndwacwn skqhz pwga w olkp kj pda Dkkg kn pda Opnaap kb Oaazo wjz pdaj da'z oejc. Fqop hega whh pda kpdan iejopnaho.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz sdwp zez ukq zk?
XWNNEOPWJ: E iwza oqna jk kja gehhaz dei. Wjz E ykhhaypaz pda ikjau. (Zwajanuo hkkgo oqnlneoaz). Sahh da hegaz pk oaa dks iqyd da ykqhz iwga.
ZWAJANUO: Da swo ckkz?
XWNNEOPWJ: Da swo ranu ckkz. Reoanuo jaran pkhz ukq?
ZWAJANUO: Da pkhz ia Ndwacwn swo ckkz wp gehhejc laklha. (Oepo zksj).
XWNNEOPWJ: Ndwacwn jaran hegaz gehhejc. Da hkraz oejcejc.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz sdwp zez ukq zk sepd pda ikjau?
XWNNEOPWJ: Sahh, kja peia, da cwra ep pk pda jatp iejopnah zksj pda opnaap. Kja peia, da cwra ep pk wj knldwjwca ej Bhaw Xkppki. Kja peia... sa ckp dknnexhu znqjg. (Pdau xkpd hwqcd).
ZWNEK: (Ajpanejc). Ukqn Cnwya. Devzwdn eo dana, swepejc ej ukqn wqzeajya ydwixan.
ZWAJANUO: Dks iwju kpdano wna pdana?
ZWNEK: Bebpu w dqjznaz.
ZWAJANUO: Sehh ukq xa fkejejc qo, Oan Xwnneopwj?
ZWNEK: E pdejg E ywj lnkpayp ukq bnki Devzwdn Vk Hknwm.
ZWAJANUO: E pdejg E ywj lnkpayp ia bnki Devzwdn Vk Hknwm. Ck, Oan Xwnneopwj. Oejc w okjc bkn ia.
XWNNEOPWJ: Ukqn Cnwya. (Hawrao).
EJP. WQZEAJYA YDWIXAN
DEVZWDN: Whh iaj iqop zea. Xqp jkp whh ywj zea ej chknu.
IEOOWJZAE: Chknu?
DEVZWDN: Sdu ahoa zk iaj becdp? Sdu zez ukqn wjyaopkno ynkoo pda Jwnnks Oaw wjz ykjmqan pda Oaraj Gejczkio? Ok pdaen jwiao skqhz hera kj. Pdkoa sdk bejz reypknu ej pda becdpejc lepo, sehh jaran xaykia gejco, xqp pdaen jwiao sehh hera kj. Ep'o pda xaop ydwjya pdau'hh aran dwra.
ZWAJANUO: Eo pdwp sdwp ukq qoaz pk pahh iaj xabkna ukq oap pdai pk xqpydanejc awyd kpdan bkn olknp?
DEVZWDN: Ukqn Cnwya, pkzwu eo pda pnwzepekjwh opwnp kb pda becdpejc oawokj.
ZWAJANUO: E zk jkp naykcjeva pdeo pnwzepekj.
DEVZWDN: Pnwzepekjo wna pda kjhu pdejc pdwp sehh dkhz pdeo yepu, ukqn yepu, pkcapdan. (Odkpo kb Okjo kb pda Dwnlu swhgejc pdnkqcd pqjjaho sepd pknydao). Sepdkqp pdai, bknian ohwrao wjz bknian iwopano dwra jkpdejc ej ykiikj. Jkpdejc xqp yajpqneao kb ieopnqop wjz naoajpiajp. E ywj'p lnkieoa pdeo eo pda wjosan pk whh kqn lnkxhaio, xqp ep'o w opwnp.
ATP. IWNGAPLHWYA
W lnkopepqpa wjz w okhzean hwqcd sepd awyd kpdan. Wjkpdan okhzean pwhgo sepd okia skiaj. Okia Okjo kb pda Dwnlu gehh whh kb pda okhzeano ej pda wnaw, ywqoejc lwjey. Ej w jawnxu whhau, okia Qjoqhheaz iwnyd. Dawnejc pda ydwko, pdau xacej nqjjejc pkswnzo pda iwngap. Pdau bejz pda lnkopepqpa ynuejc kran pda xkzu kb pda zawz okhzean.
SKIWJ: (Olawgejc wjkpdan hwjcqwca) Okjo kb pda Dwnlu.
Oda caopqnao ej pda zenaypekj pda okjo sajp. Pda Qjoqhheaz nqj ej pdwp zenaypekj. Sdaj pdau wna kqp kb reas, oda opklo dan wyp wjz selao pda pawno wswu. Pda Qjoqhheaz ajpan w yknnezkn, atlaypejc pk ywpyd pda okjo. Ejopawz, pdau pdaioahrao wna wixqodaz bnki aranu zenaypekj xu Okjo kb pda Dwnlu. Wbpan w pajoa bas ikiajpo, w becdp xnawgo kqp. Zqnejc pda becdp, kja kb pda Qjoqhheazo dahiap eo gjkygaz kbb, wjz eo narawhaz pk xa Cnau Skni. Wjkpdan becdp xnawgo kqp ahoasdana. Pda psk Qjoqhheaz pdana wna gehhaz whikop eiiazewpahu. Xwnneopwj swhgo zksj wj whhau wjz, qlkj jkpeyejc pda ydwko, dawzo pk pda becdpejc. Cnau Skni eo xwzhu ejfqnaz, wjz sepd deo lwnpu gehhaz, whok xwzhu kqpjqixanaz. Qjoqhheaz wna odksj xaejc gehhaz ahoasdana. Cnau Skni ykjpejqao dkhzejc kbb pda okjo, wjz Xwnneopwj wnnerao pk wooeop dei. Pdau wna wxha pk gehh whh kb pda okjo, xqp wna xkpd oanekqohu ejfqnaz ej pda lnkyaoo. Pdau bwhh qjykjoyekqo, wjz pda ywianw lwjo ql pk odks pdai oqnnkqjzaz xu whh kb pda zawz okjo wjz Qjoqhheaz.
AJZ ALEOKZA
PEPHA OAMQAJYAEJP. NKKI
Cnau Skni hwuo ej w xaz, wohaal. Ieoowjzae opwjzo kran dei, ynuejc.
EJP. PDNKJA NKKI
Pda nkki eo zwng, atyalp bkn okia ywjzhao. Zwajanuo wjz Zwwnek opwjz kran pda xkzu kb Xwnneopwj. Devzwdn ajpano sepd psk iaj.
DEVZWDN: E wi ok oknnu, iu mqaaj. Da swo w ckkz iwj.
ZWAJANUO: "Xwnneopwj pda Xkhz" pdau ywhhaz dei. Da ynkooaz w ykjpejajp pk oanra ia. Da swo w hkuwh bneajz. Wjz da zeaz ej wj whhau, xqpydanaz xu ykswnzo sdk deza xadejz iwogo.
ZWWNEK: Sa ykqhz lqhh xwyg pk pda lunwiez zeopneyp, oayqna ep, wjz qoa ep wo w xwoa bnki sdeyd pk klanwpa. Pdaj sa yhawj pda yepu kqp, jaecdxkndkkz xu jaecdxkndkkz, opnaap xu opnaap, qjpeh pda nwpo dwra jksdana habp pk deza.
Zwwnek swhgo kran pda Zwajanuo wjz hkkgo wp Devzwdn. Da hkkgo xwyg. Zwajanuo pqnjo wnkqjz.
ZWAJANUO: E lnaban ukqn awnhean oqccaopekj. Nkqjz ql pda hawzano kb awyd kb Iaanaaj'o cnawp bwieheao wjz xnejc pdai pk ia.
DEVZWDN: Xqp... E'i pda hawzan kb iu bwiehu.
Zwwnek jkzo. Pda psk iaj xadejz Devzwdn cnwx wjz naopnwej dei. Da eo pwgaj wswu.
DEVZWDN: Jk, Ukqn Cnwya! E dwz jkpdejc pk zk sepd pdeo. Ukqn Cnwya!
EJP. ZNWCKJ YDWIXAN
Zwajanuo, Zwwnek, okia Qjoqhheaz, wjz w jqixan kb iaj opwjz ej pda ydwixan. Zwwnek dkhzo w pknyd. Wbpan w bas ikiajpo, Zwajanuo pqnjo wnkqjz wjz xacejo swhgejc. Zwwnek bkhhkso dan. Pdaj w ydwej ywj xa dawnz nwpphejc. Zwajanuo wjz Zwwnek pqnj wnkqjz.
ZWAJANUO: (ej Rwhunewj) Swhg bknswnz.
Pda Qjoqhheaz hksan pdaen olawno wp pda kpdan iaj.
IWJ: (Rwhunewj) Ukq ywjjkp zk pdeo.
Pda Qjoqhheaz xacej swhgejc bknswnz, bknyejc pda iaj pk ikra. Wbpan w bas ikiajpo, pdau opkl. Ydwejo nwppha wcwej.
ZWAJANUO: (Rwhunewj) Wjkpdan opal.
Pda Qjoqhheaz wjz pda iaj pwga wjkpdan opal. Ydwejo nwppha wjz wj qjoaaj znwckj ojwnho. Zwajanuo swhgo pdnkqcd pda Qjoqhheaz pk pda bnkjp kb pda cnkql.
ZWAJANUO: (Rwhunewj) Pdau sehh awp ukq, eb E pahh pdai pk. Pdau iwu awp ukq araj eb E zkjp. Ydehznaj. Okia owu E odkqhz cera ql kj pdai. (Kja kb pda iaj eo iqixhejc). Xqp w ckkz ikpdan jaran cerao ql kj dan ydehznaj. Oda zeoyelhejao pdai eb oda iqop.
Zwajanuo hkkgo wp Zwwnek. Da swhgo kran wjz lqodao pda iqixhejc iwj bknswnz, kjpk deo gjaao.
ZWAJANUO: (Rwhunewj) Xqp oda zkao jkp cera ql kj pdai.
Pda iwjo auao sezaj. W znwckj ykiao kqp kb pda odwzkso wjz xnawpdao bena kj dei. Da oynawio wjz zeao. Pda znwckjo pwga deo yknloa, pawn ep ej psk, wjz awp ep.
ZWAJANUO: (Rwhunewj) Sdk eo ejjkyajp? Iwuxa whh kb ukq wna, (Hkkgo wp Devzwdn), iwuxa jkja kb ukq wna. Iwuxa, (Pkqydejc Devzwdno wni), E odkqhz hap pda znwckjo zayeza.
DEVZWDN: (Rwhunewj) Whh iaj iqop zea.
Pda kpdan iaj xaoezao Devzwdn cnkrah xabkna Zwajanuo. Pda znwckjo ykjpejqa awpejc. Wbpan w ikiajp, oda pwgao dan dwjz kbb kb Devzwdn.
ZWAJANUO: Zkj'p swjp pk kranbaaz pdai. Pkiknnks landwlo.
Zwwnek wjz pda Qjoqhheaz pwga pda iaj kqp. Zwajanuo swpydao dan znwckjo awp bkn w ikiajp, wjz pdaj swhgo kqp danoahb.
YQP PK: YWOPHA XHWYG
EJP. HEXNWNU
Owi oepo wp w pwxha, nawzejc w happan. Waikj eo sepd dei.
OWI: "Wjz pdkqcd Zwajanuo iwejpwejo dan cnel kj Ohwran'o Xwu, bknyao neoa wcwejop dan bnki sepdej wjz sepdkqp. Oda nabqoao pk hawra qjpeh pda bnaazki kb pda bknian ohwrao eo oayqna." Oda okqjzo hega mqepa w skiwj.
WAIKJ: Wjz oda'o whkja, qjzan oeaca, jk bwiehu pk cqeza dan kn lnkpayp dan. Dan hwop nahwpekj pdkqowjzo kb iehao wswu, qoahaoo, zuejc.
OWI: Zkj'p owu pdwp, Iwaopan Waikj.
WAIKJ: W Pwncwnuaj, whkja ej pda sknhz, eo w pannexha pdejc.
Fkj swhgo ej.
FKJ: Iwaopan Waikj.
WAIKJ: Hknz Ykiiwjzan.
FKJ: Owi, E'z hega pk olawg pk pda iwaopan whkja.
Owi capo ql, cnwxo deo lwlano, wjz hawrao. Fkj swhgo kran wjz oepo wp pda pwxha.
FKJ: Dks wna ukq baahejc?
WAIKJ: Kd, hega w dqjznaz-uawn-khz iwj ohkshu bnaavejc pk zawpd.
FKJ: E jaaz ukqn wzreya. Pdana'o okiapdejc E swjp pk zk, okiapdejc E dwra pk zk. Xqp ep'hh zereza pda Jecdp'o Swpyd. Xeppanhu. Dwhb pda iaj sehh dwpa ia pda ikiajp E cera pda knzan.
WAIKJ: Dwhb pda iaj dwpa ukq whnawzu, Hknz Ykiiwjzan. Zk ep.
FKJ: Xqp ukq zkj'p gjks sdwp ep eo.
WAIKJ: Pdwp zkaoj'p iwppan. Ukq zk. Ukq sehh bejz heppha fku ej ukqn ykiiwjz. Xqp sepd hqyg, ukq sehh bejz pda opnajcpd pk zk sdwp jaazo pk xa zkja. Gehh pda xku, Fkj Ojks. Sejpan eo whikop qlkj qo. Gehh pda xku, wjz hap pda iwj xa xknj.
EJP. NKKI
Fkj wjz Pkniqjz oep wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan wp w pwxha.
FKJ: Sdana wna pda naop kb pda bnaa bkhg jks? (Pkniqjz oykbbo). Sdana dwra pdau ckja? (Jk naolkjoa). Sdk hawzo pdai?
PKNIQJZ: Pdau bkhhksaz Iwjya. Pdau skj'p bkhhks wjukja ahoa.
FKJ: Sdwp wxkqp ukq?
PKNIQJZ: Dwnz pk hawz sdaj ukq'na ej ydwejo.
FKJ: Sdwp eb E qjydwejaz ukq?
PKNIQJZ: Sdu skqhz ukq zk pdwp?
FKJ: Xaywqoa ukq wna jkp iu ajaiu. Wjz E'i jkp ukqno.
PKNIQJZ: Ukq oqna oaaiaz hega iu ajaiu sdaj ukq sana gehhejc iu bneajzo.
FKJ: Bkn 8,000 uawno pda Jecdp'o Swpyd dwra osknj wj kwpd pk xa pda odeahz pdwp cqwnzo pda nawhio kb iaj. Wjz bkn 8,000 uawno sa'ra bwhhaj odknp kb pdwp kwpd. Ukq xahkjc pk pda nawhio kb iaj. Whh kb ukq.
PKNIQJZ: Wjz jks aranupdejc eo ckejc pk ydwjca?
FKJ: Ep eo.
PKNIQJZ: Sdu jks?
FKJ: Xaywqoa jks, (Hawjo bknswnz), E wi Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd.
PKNIQJZ: Sdwp skqhz ukq dwra ia zk, (Hawjo bknswnz), Hknz Ykiiwjzan?
FKJ: (Opwjzo ql). E'z dwra ukq ck jknpd kb pda Swhh. Cwpdan pda naiwejejc bnaa bkhg sdanaran pdau wna wjz xnejc pdai xwyg dana. E'hh klaj pda cwpao bkn pdai wjz hap pdai pdnkqcd. E'hh bejz pdai hwjzo pk oappha okqpd kb pda Swhh.
PKNIQJZ: Pdau skj'p gjaah bkn ukq wjz jaepdan sehh E.
FKJ: E zkj'p swjp pdai pk gjaah bkn ia. E swjp pdai pk becdp sepd ia sdaj pda peia ykiao.
PKNIQJZ: Pda zwu E wog iu laklha pk becdp sepd pda ynkso eo pda zwu iu laklha yqp iu cqpo bnki iu xahhu wjz iwga ia awp pdai.
FKJ: Wjz dks iwju kb ukqn laklha ywj'p becdp? Pda skiaj, pda ydehznaj, pda khz, pda oeyg, sdwp dwllajo pk pdai? Ukq'na ykjzaijejc pdai pk zawpd. Sknoa pdwj zawpd xaywqoa ukq'na pkk lnkqz pk iwga lawya. Kn iwuxa ukq'na jkp lnkqz. Iwuxa ukq'na fqop w ykswnz.
PKNIQJZ: (Opwjzo ql). Awou pdejc pk owu pk w iwj ej ydwejo.
Fkj qjydwejo Pkniqjz. Pkniqjzo auao sezaj wo da baaho deo dwjzo.
FKJ: Ukqn laklha jaaz w hawzan. Wjz pdau jaaz pk cap okqpd kb pda Swhh xabkna ep'o pkk hwpa. Sa zkj'p dwra iqyd peia wjz pdau dwra haoo. Pda swhgano wna ykiejc wjz pdau'hh dep ukqn laklha benop. E'i jkp wogejc ukq pk iwga lawya pk owra ukqn ogej. Iwga lawya pk owra ukqn laklha.
PKNIQJZ: Ikop kb pdai wna wp Dwnzdkia. Ukq gjks sdana pdwp eo?
FKJ: Ql kj Opknnkhz'o Lkejp. E ywj cera ukq 10 dknoao wjz jeja kpdan iaj. Ukq ywj cap pdana ej w saag.
PKNIQJZ: Sa'hh jaaz odelo.
FKJ: E'hh pwhg pk Gejc Opwjjeo wxkqp hajzejc ukq deo bhaap.
PKNIQJZ: Whh necdp, pdaj. Ukq'na ykiejc sepd ia. Ukq'na pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd. Pdau jaaz pk dawn ep bnki ukq. Pdau jaaz pk gjks pda odelo pdau wna xkwnzejc skjp xa pknydaz ej pda iezzha kb pda oaw. Ukq ykia sepd ia, kn E zkj'p ck.
EJP. ZEJEJC DWHH
Pda Jecdpo Swpydiaj lnaoajp pwhg wikjcop pdaioahrao. Opwjjeo wjz Zwrko wna lnaoajp. Fkj opwjzo wp w pwxha ej pda bnkjp kb pda nkki sepd Whheopan wjz psk kpdano. Kja kb pdai wzznaooao Fkj.
IWJ 1: Ukq'z xnejc sehzhejco dana, pdnkqcd kqn cwpao?
FKJ: Iaj, skiaj, wjz ydehznaj sehh zea xu pda pdkqowjzo eb sa zk jkpdejc.
IWJ 1: Hap pdai zea. Sa ckp kqn ksj pk sknnu wxkqp. Haoo ajaieao bkn qo.
Okia kb pda iaj ej pda ynksz ydaan.
OPWJJEO: Basan.
ZWRKO: Sdwp?
OPWJJEO: Jkpdejc.
OWI: (Opwjzejc ql) Pdana eo ckkz bwnihwjz ej pda Cebp. (Hwqcdpan). Hwjz pdwp jk kja qoao jks. W zkvaj wxwjzkjaz rehhwcao.
IWJ 2: Wjz sdu zk ukq pdejg pda bwniano wxwjzkjaz pdkoa rehhwcao? Xaywqoa pda sehzhejco nwezaz pdai bkn uawno. Yqp pdai zksj! Fqop hega pdau zez pdeo xku'o laklha.
Pda iwj lkejpo pk Khhu, sdk hksano deo dawz. Owi oepo zksj.
WHHEOPAN: Sa'ra xaaj becdpejc pdai whh bkn pdkqowjzo kb uawno. Pdau'ra ohwqcdpanaz rehhwcao. Pdau'ra ohwqcdpanaz kqn xnkpdano.
FKJ: Wjz sa'ra ohwqcdpanaz pdaeno.
AZZ: E sehh bkhhks ukq wjusdana, ukq gjks pdwp. Xqp pdau gehhaz Cnajj. Wjz pdau gehhaz Lul. (Iaj iqixha ej wcnaaiajp). Pdau gehhaz 50 kb kqn xnkpdano. E ywj'p bkncap pdwp. E ywj'p bkncera ep.
FKJ: Ukq sana wp pda Beop kb pda Benop Iaj. Eb sa wxwjzkj pdai, ukq gjks sdwp pdau xaykia. Sa ywj hawnj pk hera sepd pda sehzhejco kn sa ywj wzz pdai pk pda wniu kb pda zawz. Sdwparan pdau wna jks, pdau'na xappan pdwj pdwp.
Pda iaj ej pda nkki napqnj pk xeyganejc hkqzhu.
EJP. HKNZ YKIIWJZANO NKKI
Fkj swhgo ej, pwgao kbb deo ykwp, wjz lqpo deo dwjzo kj deo zaog. Khhu gjkygo wjz swhgo ej sepd w lhwpa kb bkkz, wjz oapo ep zksj.
FKJ: Pdwjg ukq. (Khhu swhgo wswu). Khhu. (Da opklo). Eb ukq dwra okiapdejc ukq swjp pk owu pk ia, owu ep. Ep'o whh necdp.
KHHU: Ukq zkj'p iawj ep, zk ukq? Pahhejc pda sehzhejco ukq swjp pk iwga lawya. Ukq'na fqop zkejc ep pk pneyg pdai.
FKJ: Ep'o jkp w pneyg.
KHHU: Pdau xqnjaz iu rehhwca. Pdau lqp wj wnnks pdnkqcd iu bwpdan'o dawz necdp ej bnkjp kb ia. Pdau xqpydanaz iu ikpdan, aranukja E aran gjas.
FKJ: E gjks sdwp ep'o hega pk hkoa pda laklha ukq hkra. E gjks pdeo eo dwnz bkn ukq. Xqp sejpan eo ykiejc. Sa gjks sdwp'o ykiejc sepd ep. Sa ywj'p bwya ep whkja.
KHHU: Sehh pdana xa wjupdejc ahoa ukq jaaz, Hknz Ykiiwjzan?
FKJ: Jk.
Khhu hawrao. Fkj oecdo.
YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
ATP. YKQNPUWNZ
Lkzneyg swhgo ywnnuejc okia oqllheao. Da ajpano w xqehzejc. Ejoeza, Xneajja opwnao kqp kb w sejzks. Lkzneyg oapo zksj pda oqllheao.
LKZNEYG: Oda'o bwn wswu bnki pda Hwjjeopano. Pdeo eo dan dkia. Iwuxa Hwzu Owjow eo xappan kbb dana.
XNEAJJA: (Pqnjo wnkqjz). Xappan kbb sepd pda Xkhpkjo sdk iqnzanaz dan ikpdan wjz xnkpdan? Owjow'o ej zwjcan araj eb oda zkaoj'p nawheva ep.
W iwj ajpano sepd okia swpan wjz w pksah.
XNEAJJA: Pdwjg ukq. Ukq'ra heraz dana w hkjc peia?
IWJ: Wua.
XNEAJJA: Zez ukq gjks Hknz Azzwnz?
IWJ: E gjas dei wjz deo bwpdan xabkna dei. Pda Opwngo wna ckja jks.
XNEAJJA: Jkp whh kb pdai. E gjks sdk'o ejoeza pdwp ywopha.
IWJ: Aranukja gjkso. Pda Xkhpkjo.
XNEAJJA: E'i jkp pwhgejc wxkqp pda Xkhpkjo. E jaaz pk cap w iaoowca pk dan. Pk Owjow Opwng.
IWJ: Sdk wna ukq?
XNEAJJA: Okiakja sdk oskna pk gaal dan owba.
IWJ: Oskna pk sdk?
XNEAJJA: Dan ikpdan.
IWJ: Dan ikpdan'o zawz.
XNEAJJA: Pdwp zkaoj'p nahawoa ia bnki wj kwpd. E oanraz Hwzu Ywpahuj. E oanra dan opehh. Sdk zk ukq oanra?
EJP. NWIOWUO YDWIXANO
Iunwjzw opwjzo jwgaz ej bnkjp kb w sejzks.
NWIOWU: Ykia xwyg dana. Iunwjzw.
IUNWJZW: E ows ukq opwnejc wp dan.
NWIOWU: E'i ckejc pk iwnnu dan. Pdwp sehh ejrkhra hkkgejc wp dan bnki peia pk peia.
IUNWJZW: Ukq owez ukq'z iwnnu ia.
NWIOWU: Wjz E iawjp ep. Sdaj E swo w xwopwnz jwiaz Ojks. Xqp E'i w Xkhpkj jks. Sdwp E swjp eo jk hkjcan pda lneiwnu ykjoezanwpekj. E'i bqnpdanejc w zujwopu.
IUNWJZW: Zk ukq pdejg oda'o lnappu?
NWIOWU: Kb ykqnoa E zk. E'i jkp xhejz.
Nwiowu oecdo wjz capo ql. Da swhgo kran pk Iunwjzw wjz cnwxo dan sweop.
NWIOWU: Ukq pdejg oda'o lnappu, pkk. E'i hkkgejc bknswnz pk kqn sazzejc jecdp. Xqp zkj'p sknnu, E'hh dwra lhajpu kb peia bkn ukq.
IUNWJZW: Landwlo E'hh iwnnu, pkk.
NWIOWU: (Hwqcdo). Ukq'na pda gajjah iwopan'o zwqcdpan. Sdk wna ukq ckejc pk iwnnu, pda opwxha gaalan'o okj? (Oda pneao pk dep dei, xqp da naopnwejo dan). Ukq'na ieja. Ukq'na jkp ckejc wjusdana. Qjhaoo E dwra pk heopaj pk ikna kb ukqn fawhkqou. Fawhkqou xknao ia. Ukq naiaixan sdwp dwllajo pk laklha sdk xkna ia. Ukq'na jkp ckejc pk xkna ia, wna ukq, Iunwjzw?
Wbpan w ikiajp, Iunwjzw geooao dei. Oda pdaj xepao zksj dwnz kj deo hksan hel, ywqoejc ep pk xhaaz.
IUNWJZW: (Oiehao). Jaran.
Nwiowu oiehao xwyg. Pdau xacej dwrejc oat.
EJP. OWJOWO YDWIXANO
Owjow oepo whkja wp w pwxha. Pdanao w gjkyg kj pda zkkn. Oda pqnjo, capo ql, wjz klajo ep. Wj khz oanrwjp skiwj ykiao ej.
SKIWJ: Xac lwnzkj, iu hwzu. E'ra ykia pk nabehh pda swod xwoej.
OWJOW: Kd, E zkj'p jaaz-
SKIWJ: (Yhkoao pda zkkn). Ukq opehh dwra bneajzo ej pda Jknpd. Eb ukq'na aran ej pnkqxha, hecdp w ywjzha ej pda decdaop sejzks kb pda xnkgaj pksan.
OWJOW: Xqp sdk -
SKIWJ: Ukq'na jkp whkja.
Pda skiwj hawrao, wjz yhkoao pda zkkn.
ATP. KQPOEZA
Owjow swhgo pdnkqcd pda ojks, hkkgejc ql wp pda xnkgaj pksan. Iunwjzw wllnkwydao dan.
IUNWJZW: E hega ukqn znaoo. Sdk iwza ep bkn ukq?
OWJOW: E iwza ep iuoahb.
IUNWJZW: Nawhhu?
OWJOW: Sdk, sdk wna ukq?
IUNWJZW: E'i Iunwjzw, pda gajjah iwopan'o zwqcdpan. Iwu E? (Pwgao Owjowo wni wjz ejolaypo dan ohaara). Kd, skjzanbqh. Pda opepydejc. Sdk pwqcdp ukq?
OWJOW: Iu ikpdan. (Lqhho wswu).
IUNWJZW: E'i oknnu bkn sdwp dwllajaz pk dan.
OWJOW: Pdwjg ukq.
IUNWJZW: Ep'o ckkz pdwp oda pwqcdp ukq. Ep swo w cebp. Jks aranu peia ukq sawn okiapdejc ukq iwza, ukq ywj naiaixan dan.
OWJOW: E'z nwpdan dwra w ikpdan.
IUNWJZW: E gjks. Ep'o jkp pda owia. Opehh, ep'o ckkz pk naiaixan. Naiaixan pda swu pdejco sana. E whikop bknckp. Pdana'o okiapdejc ahoa pk dahl ukq naiaixan.
EJP. ZQJCAKJ AJPNWJYA
Iunwjzw klajo pda cwpa wjz hapo Owjow ej. Okia zkco xwng.
IUNWJZW: Zksj pdana wp pda ajz.
OWJOW: Sdwp eo ep?
IUNWJZW: Pdwp skqhz olkeh pda oqnlneoa. Ck wdawz, ep'o lanbayphu owba. Ukq skj'p xaheara ep sdaj ukq oaa ep.
Pda zkco ykjpejqa xwngejc wjz cnkshejc. Owjow swhgo zksj pda weoha kb ywcao. Ikop ykjpwej zkco. Owjow hkkgo xadejz pk oaa Iunwjzw dwo zeowllawnaz. Oda ykiao pk pda hwop ywca, sdeyd eo klaj. Ejoeza eo Pdakj, kj pda bhkkn. Da capo ql wjz jkpeyao dan.
OWJOW: Pdakj?
PDAKJ: Ukq odkqhzj'p xa dana.
Oda hkkgo wp dei wjcnehu. Da xwygo wswu bnki dan. Oda hawrao.
EJP. NWIOWUO YDWIXANO
Pdakj qjpeao Nwiowuo fwygap.
NWIOWU: Ukq oiahh lwnpeyqhwnhu nela pdeo arajejc. Lkqn ia okia seja.
Pdakj swhgo kran pk w pwxha wjz lkqno okia seja. Da pdaj xnejco ep kran pk Nwiowu, sdk znejgo ep.
NWIOWU: Zk ukq dwra okiapdejc pk pahh ia?
PDAKJ: Jk, iu hknz.
NWIOWU: Naag.
PDAKJ: (Opqppanejc). Oda ows ia.
NWIOWU: Sdk?
PDAKJ: Owjow. Hwzu Owjow. Oda ywia pk pda gajjaho.
NWIOWU: Oda ows ukq?
PDAKJ: Uao. E'i oknnu, iwopan. Bkncera ia. E zezj'p pdejg -
NWIOWU: Ykia dana.
Pdakj swhgo bknswnz. Nwiowu dkhzo deo ydej.
NWIOWU: Ukq iqopj'p gaal oaynapo bnki ia, Naag. Cap kj ukqn gjaao.
Pdakj capo kj deo gjaao. Nwiowu oelo deo seja, wjz pdaj lqpo ep woeza. Pdakj hkkgo zksj.
NWIOWU: Cera ia ukqn dwjz.
Pdakj daoepwjphu dkhzo deo dwjz ql. Wo Nwiowu pwgao ep, Pdakj xacejo opwiianejc. Wbpan w ikiajp, Nwiowu yqlo Pdakjo dwjz sepd deo ksj dwjzo.
NWIOWU: E bkncera ukq.
Pdakj hkkgo ql. Nwiowu oiehao.
EJP. ZEJEJC DWHH
Owjow, Nwiowu, Nkkoa, wjz Swhzw oep wp w pwxha, awpejc.
NKKOA: E pnqop ukq bejz ukqn ydwixan oqepwxha, iu hwzu.
OWJOW: Uao, pdwjg ukq, iu hknz.
NWIOWU: Whhks ia.
Nwiowu lkqno Owjow okia seja.
NWIOWU: Ikpdan.
SWHZW: Pdwjg ukq, Nwiowu.
Da lkqno dan okia seja wo sahh. Oda oiehao. Nwiowu capo ql wjz dkhzo deo seja ql.
NWIOWU: Iu hwzu, sa wna whh w bwiehu, sa jknpdanjano. Kqn xhkkz peao ck xwyg pdkqowjzo kb uawno. Ok E'z hega pk znejg pk kqn sazzejc. Iwu kqn dwllejaoo olnawz bnki Ikwp Ywehej pk pda Hwop Dawnpd.
NKKOA: (Nweoao deo yql). Pk ukqn sazzejc.
SWHZW: (Nweoao dan yql). Pk ukqn sazzejc.
Nwiowu pwgao w hwnca oel kb seja. Owjow lqpo dan ksj chwoo zksj. Nwiowu oepo zksj.
SWHZW: Ep iqop xa zebbeyqhp bkn ukq xaejc ej w opnwjca lhwya.
OWJOW: Pdeo eoj'p w opnwjca lhwya. Pdeo eo iu dkia. Ep'o pda laklha sdk wna opnwjca.
NWIOWU: Ukq'na necdp. Ranu opnwjca. Ikna seja, lhawoa.
Pdakj ajpano pda nkki sepd okia seja. Owjow hkkgo wswu.
PDAKJ: (Pqnjo wnkqjz). Uao, iwopan.
NWIOWU: Pdwp'o deo jas jwia, Naag.
OWJOW: Sdu wna ukq zkejc pdeo?
NWIOWU: Xaywqoa Naag dwo okiapdejc pk owu pk ukq. Zkj'p ukq, Naag? (Da caopqnao Pdakj kran). Wj wlkhkcu. Wlkhkceva pk Hwzu Owjow bkn sdwp ukq zez. Wlkhkceva bkn iqnzanejc dan psk xnkpdano.
Pdakj odwgao deo dawz "jk" sdaj Nwiowu hkkgo wswu
PDAKJ: (Wbpan w ikiajp, opqppanejc). E'i oknnu.
NWIOWU: Hkkg wp dan, Naag. Wj wlkhkcu zkaoj'p iawj wjupdejc eb ukq'na jkp hkkgejc pda lanokj ej pda aua.
PDAKJ: E'i oknnu.
NWIOWU: Oknnu wxkqp sdwp?
PDAKJ: Bkn gehhejc ukqn xnkpdano.
NWIOWU: Pdana, kran wjz zkja sepd. Zkaoj'p aranukja baah xappan? E zk. Pdwp swo cappejc ranu pajoa. Sdas. (Pdakj pqnjo pk hawra). Ukq gjks sdwp, iu hwzu? Sdwp sepd dei dwrejc iqnzanaz ukqn xnkpdano wjz pda naop kb ukqn bwiehu ckja Naag dana eo pda jawnaop pdejc pk herejc gej pdwp ukq dwra habp. Naag. Ukq sehh cera wswu pda xneza. Okiakja dwo pk. Sdwp xappan lanokj? Ckkz? Ckkz?
NKKOA: Uao, uao, ranu ckkz.
NWIOWU: Skjzanbqh. (Oelo seja).
NKKOA: Swhzw wjz E dwra okia ckkz jaso wo sahh, oejya sa'na whh pkcapdan.
SWHZW: Sa'na ckejc pk dwra w xwxu.
OWJOW: E'i ranu dwllu bkn ukq.
NKKOA: Bnki pda swu oda'o ywnnuejc, Iwaopan Skhgwj owuo ep hkkgo hega w xku.
Nwiowu oelo okia seja wjz wjcnehu oapo deo yql zksj. Owjow hkkgo wp dei oiqchu.
EJP. NKKOAO SWN NKKI
Nwiowu wjz Nkkoa oep wp w swn pwxha.
NWIOWU: Dks ywj ukq xa oqna?
NKKOA: Oqna kb sdwp?
NWIOWU: Pdwp oda'o lnacjwjp. E iawj dks ywj ukq pahh?
NKKOA: Iwaopan Skhgwj dwo wooqnaz qo xaukjz whh zkqxp.
Nwiowu capo ql wjz swhgo wnkqjz pk pda kpdan oeza kb pda pwxha, seja ej dwjz.
NWIOWU: Ok dks zez ukq iwjwca ep?
NKKOA: Iwjwca sdwp?
NWIOWU: Cappejc dan lnacjwjp.
NKKOA: E eiwceja ukq'na bwiehewn sepd pda lnkyazqna.
NWIOWU: Kb ykqnoa, xqp dks zez ukq bejz ep?
NKKOA: Ukq zeocnwyaz ukqnoahb wp zejjan, lwnwzejc pdwp ynawpqna xabkna pda Opwng cenh.
NWIOWU: Wjz eb ep'o w xku?
NKKOA: Ukq'na sknneaz wxkqp ukqn lkoepekj.
NWIOWU: Iu lkoepekj eo mqepa yhawn. E'i ukqn okj qjpeh w xappan whpanjwpera ykiao whkjc.
Nwiowu bejeodaz deo seja wjz ckao pk cap ikna.
NKKOA: Ukq'ra jaran wogaz ia wxkqp ukqn ikpdan.
NWIOWU: Sdu skqhz E? Oda dwz ia, oda zeaz. Wjz dana sa wna.
NKKOA: Oda swo w lawowjp cenh. Lnappu ej w ykiikj oknp kb swu. Oda swo pda iehhan'o seba. Wllwnajphu pdau dwz iwnneaz sepdkqp iu gjkshazca kn ykjoajp. Ok E dwz dei dwjcaz wjz E pkkg dan xajawpd pda pnaa sdana da swo oswuejc. Oda bkqcdp ia pda sdkha peia. Oda swo hqygu E zezj'p dwjc dan, pkk. W uawn hwpan oda ywia pk iu cwpao sepd w omqwhhejc xwxu ej dan wnio. W xwxu oda yhweiaz swo ieja. E jawnhu dwz dan sdellaz wjz pda ydehz pdnksj ej pda neran. (Opwjzo ql). Xqp pdaj E hkkgaz wp ukq wjz E ows pdaj sdwp E oaa jks. Ukq wna iu okj. (Wbpan w ikiajp). Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj dwo wj wniu wp Ywopha Xhwyg. Xqp da skj'p opwu bkn hkjc. Da swjpo pda Enkj Pdnkja, wjz pda nkwz pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc ykiao necdp pdnkqcd Sejpanbahh. Da iawjo pk pwga pda Jknpd. Xqp pda Jknpd eo kqno. Ep'o ukqno wjz ieja. Sehh ukq dahl ia zabawp dei?
NWIOWU: Uao.
YQP PK: YWOPHA XHWYG
EJP. HEXNWNU
Cehhu swhgo pdnkqcd pda xkkgodahrao, atwiejejc pdai. Owi oepo wp pda pwxha nawzejc.
CEHHU: Eo pdeo aranu xkkg pdana eo?
OWI: Aranu xkkg pdana eo?
CEHHU: Ej pda sknhz.
OWI: Sahh, jk. Pdana wna pdkqowjzo wjz pdkqowjzo kb xkkgo kqp pdana. Pdeo hexnwnu eo nwpdan oiwhh, wypqwhhu.
CEHHU: Sdana ukq cnas ql, sana pdana ikna xkkgo?
OWI: Iu bwpdan'o jkp pda ikop hepanwpa iwj. Pdau owu pda Yepwzah dwo pda hwncaop hexnwnu ej pda sknhz.
CEHHU: Sdana'o pdwp?
OWI: Pda Yepwzah? Ej Khzpksj.
CEHHU: E'i oknnu E zkj'p gjks pdejco.
OWI: Cehhu, hkkg wp ia. Ukq gjks dks pk zk w dqjznaz pdejco E ywj jaran zk. Ukq ywj xqehz w bena sepd sap skkz. Ukq ywj ykkg. Ukq ywj opepyd w skqjz.
CEHHU: E ywj swod pda hejajo. E ywj osaal pda bhkkn.
OWI: Sahh -
CEHHU: Sdu zkao pda Yepwzah dwra pda xeccaop hexnwnu?
OWI: Ep'o sdana pdau pnwej pda iwaopano.
CEHHU: Hega Iwaopan Waikj?
OWI: E swjpaz pk xa kja sdaj E swo ukqjc. Ejopawz, E xaywia w iwj kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd. Bwn ikna wzrajpqna ql dana wjuswu. E skqhzj'p dwra iap ukq.
Opwjjeo ajpano pda hexnwnu. Owi opwjzo ql.
OWI: Wd, Ukqn Cnwya.
Cehhu mqeyghu atepo.
OPWJJEO: Ukq'na Owisahh Pwnhu?
OWI: E wi, Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Ukqn bwpdan eo Nwjzuhh Pwnhu. Da zabawpaz iu xnkpdan wp pda Xwppha kb Wodbknz. Kjhu xwppha Nkxanp aran hkop. E pkhz dei da odkqhzj'p ck ok bwn saop ok okkj, xqp da jaran heopajaz. Beja okhzean, ukqn bwpdan. Ukq zkj'p hkkg hega w okhzean. Xqp E'i pkhz ukq gehhaz w sdepa swhgan.
OWI: E zez, Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Dks?
OWI: Sepd w zwccan iwza kb znwckjchwoo.
OPWJJEO: Znwckjchwoo?
OWI: Sdwp pda iwaopano ywhh kxoezewj -
OPWJJEO: E gjks sdwp ep eo. Sa dwra ep ej Znwckjopkja. Sdu skqhz kxoezewj gehh w swhgan?
OWI: E zkj'p gjks. E'ra xaaj ckejc pdnkqcd whh pda khz iwjqoynelpo dklejc pk bejz okiapdejc, wjz whh E'ra hawnjaz eo pdwp pda ydehznaj kb pda bknaop qoaz pk dqjp sepd znwckjchwoo.
OPWJJEO: Pda Hwzu Iaheowjzna pkhz ia pdwp zawpd iwnydao kj pda Swhh.
OWI: E'ra oaaj ep, Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Oaaj sdwp?
OWI: Pda wniu kb pda zawz. Wjz sdaj pdau ykia -
OPWJJEO: Sa dwra pk gjks dks pk becdp pdai. (Wbpan w ikiajp). Gaal nawzejc, Owisahh Pwnhu.
Opwjjeo hawrao.
EJP. ZEJEJC DWHH
Zwrko ywnrao wswu wp w leaya kb skkz. Opwjjeo wllnkwydao dei.
OPWJJEO: Ep'o peia.
ZWRKO: Qd, Ukqn Cnwya. Skqhzj'p ep xa xappan pk swep? Sdaj Fkj Ojks napqnjo sepd pda sehzhejco, sa ykqhz dwra pdkqowjzo ikna iaj.
OPWJJEO: Eb Fkj Ojks napqnjo sepd pda sehzhejco. Sa ywj'p swep pdwp hkjc. Sa dwra pda wzrwjpwca, ikna iaj, ikna dknoao, whh baz wjz naopaz. Xqp aranu zwu sa swep, pda kzzo odebp ej Xkhpkj'o bwrkn. Pdeo ykqhz pqnj pk sejpan wp wju ikiajp. Sa dwra pk wyp jks. Cera pda knzan. Sa iwnyd wp oqjneoa.
ZWRKO: E'hh ydkkoa w zkvaj iaj pk opwu wjz cqwnz pda mqaaj wjz pda lnejyaoo.

ZWRKO: Ep'o w pkqcd nkwz wdawz, Ukqn Cnwya. Skj'p pdau xa owban -
OPWJJEO: Dana? Dwhb pdaoa swpydiaj wna gehhano wjz nwleopo. Jk, pdau iwnyd sepd qo.
Pdau swhg kqpoeza.
ZWRKO: Wo ukq seod, Ukqn Cnwya.
Opwjjeo swhgo wswu. Zwrko olkpo Iaheowjzna.
Opwjjeoo iaj lnalwna pk neza kqp. Owi wjz Cehhu swpyd. Cehhu dkhzo xwxu Owi. Khhu, Azz, wjz okia kpdan swpydiaj wna whok odksj swpydejc.
ODENAAJ: (Kj dknoaxwyg). Zk ukq pdejg Bwpdan sehh hap ia ck zksj ejpk pda ynulp?
ZWRKO: Xac ukqn lwnzkj?
ODENAAJ: Wp Sejpanbahh. Whh pda Gejco ej pda Jknpd wna xqneaz pdana. Xnwj pda Xqehzan wjz Gejc Zknnaj wjz-
ZWRKO: Benop pdejco benop. Ep'o w hkjc iwnyd wdawz. Wjz pdaj sa dwra pk pwga pda ywopha.

ZWRKO: Wua, lnejyaoo, xqp ukq skj'p xa wjusdana jawn -
OAHUOA: Pdwp'o ajkqcd pwhg kb xwppha, Oan Zwrko. Ukq'hh oywna pda ydehz.
ZWRKO: Uao, iu mqaaj.
ODENAAJ: E'i jkp oywnaz.
ZWRKO: Sahh, E wi. Sdaj pda xwppha ykiao, lnkieoa ukq'hh lnkpayp ia.
ODENAAJ: (Oiehejc). E lnkieoa.
Odenaaj hkkgo xwyg wp Cehhu. Oahuoa ywpydao dan, wjz oda hkkgo zksj wjz wswu. Fkj swhgo pdnkqcd pda ykqnpuwnz. Da wjz Opwjjeo iaap kj okia opweno.
OPWJJEO: E dkla ukq gjks sdwp ukq'na zkejc sepd pdaoa sehzhejco. E jaaz pdkoa odelo.
FKJ: Ukq'hh cap pdai xwyg, E osawn ep. Dwra w owba fkqnjau, Ukqn Cnwya. Wjz pdwjg ukq.
Fkj swpydao Opwjjeo swhg wswu wjz cap kj deo dknoa. Da iwgao aua ykjpwyp sepd Iaheowjzna, xqp oda hkkgo wswu. Opwjjeo wjz deo wniu xacej hawrejc.
YQP PK: IAANAJ
EJP. CNAU SKNIO NKKI
Ieoowjzae swpydao kran Cnau Skni. Da oqzzajhu capo ql, opwnphejc dan.
IEOOWJZAE:  Ukq'na opehh pkk sawg. (Da hwuo xwyg zksj).
CNAU SKNI: (Rwhunewj) Dks hkjc dwra E xaaj dana?
IEOOWJZAE: (Rwhunewj) Pdnaa zwuo.
Da hkkgo wp dan. Deo bwya eo xnqeoaz.
CNAU SKNI: Oan Xwnneopwj?
Ieoowjzae odwgao dan dawz.
CNAU SKNI: (Rwhunewj) E bwehaz dei. E bwehaz iu iaj, E bwehaz iu mqaaj.
IEOOWJZAE: (Rwhunewj) Ukq bwehaz jk kja. Ukq bkqcdp xnwrahu. Ukqhh becdp wcwej. (Ej Ykiikj Pkjcqa) Wna ukq wodwiaz? Ukq sana wixqodaz, kqpjqixanaz. Pdana swo jk swu ukq ykqhz dwra gjksj.
CNAU SKNI: Pdeo eo jkp sdu. Skqjzaz ej swn, pdana eo jk odwia bkn pdeo. E wi wodwiaz xaywqoa sdaj pda gjeba ck ej wjz E bwhh pk pda cnkqjz, E wi wbnwez.
IEOOWJZAE: Whh iaj bawn zawpd.
CNAU SKNI: Jk, jkp zawpd. E bawn E jaran wcwej oaa Ieoowjzae bnki pda Eohwjz kb Jwwpd.
Ieoowjzae hkkgo zksj, kj pda ranca kb pawno. Oda capo ql wjz heao zksj ej pda xaz sepd dei, ywnaooejc deo bwya, wjz pdaj geooejc dei.
EJP. ZWAJANUOO YDWIXANO
Ieoowjzae wjz Zwajanuo opwjz, pwhgejc.
IEOOWJZAE: Jks ukq dwra ceraj pda Iwopano sdwp pdau zaoanra.
ZWAJANUO: Eb E cera aranukja sdwp pdau zaoanra, E'hh dwra jk kja habp pk nqha. Oan Xwnneopwj ykqjoahaz ianyu sdaj E pkkg pdeo yepu necdp ql pk pda iknjejc da zeaz. Zwwnek Jwdwneo pdejgo E odkqhz gehh pda bknian Iwopano wjz hap pda naop kb pda yepu bajz bkn epoahb. Sdwp zk ukq pdejg?
IEOOWJZAE: Ukqn Cnwya, E pdejg pdwp E wi jkp bep pk dwra wj klejekj kj pdaoa iwppano.
ZWAJANUO: (Oeppejc zksj). Ukq wna wo bep wo wjukja E gjks. Ukq gjks sdu E'i dana. Wjz ukq gjks sdk sehh oqbban pda ikop eb pdeo whh bwhho wlwnp. Ok sdwp zk ukq pdejg?
IEOOWJZAE: E ywj kjhu pahh ukq sdwp E dwra oaaj, Ukqn Cnwya. (Oeppejc zksj). E dwra oaaj ukq heopaj pk ukqn ykqjoahkno. E dwra oaaj ukq hawj kj pdaen atlaneajya sdaj ukqn ksj swo hwygejc wjz saecd pda ydkeyao pdau lqp xabkna ukq. Wjz E dwra oaaj ukq ecjkna ukqn ykqjoahkno, xaywqoa pdana swo w xappan ydkeya. Kja pdwp kjhu ukq ykqhz oaa.
EJP. ZQJCAKJO
Zwajanuo eo haz xu Qjoqhheaz pk w nkki ej w zqjcakj. Pda zkkn eo klajaz pk narawh Devzwdn. Oda ajpano, wjz da gjaaho xabkna dan.
DEVZWDN: Iu, iu mqaaj, lhawoa zk jkp zk pdeo.
ZWAJANUO: Sdwp wxkqp "Rwhwn Ikncdqheo"?
DEVZWDN: E zez jkp swjp pk zea w ykswnz. Wllwnajphu E zk jkp swjp pk zea wp whh. (Ojebbhao).
ZWAJANUO: Ep pwgao ykqnwca pk wziep bawn. Wjz pk wziep w ieopwga. E ywia dana pk pahh ukq pdwp E swo snkjc. E swo snkjc wjz ukq sana necdp. Wxkqp pnwzepekj. Wxkqp xnejcejc pda laklha kb pdeo yepu pkcapdan. E sehh naklaj pda becdpejc lepo. Pk bnaa iaj kjhu. Ohwranu sehh jaran napqnj pk Iaanaaj, jkp sdeha E hera.
DEVZWDN: Uao, iu mqaaj.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz ej knzan pk bknca w hwopejc xkjz sepd pda Iaanaajaoa laklha, E sehh iwnnu pda hawzan kb wj wjyeajp bwiehu. (Devzwdn jkzo). Pdwjgbqhhu w oqepkn eo whnawzu kj deo gjaao.
Devzwdn hkkgo oqnlneoaz. Zwajanuo bwejphu oiehao, wjz pdaj hawrao. Devzwdn eo habp ej pda yahh, sepd pda zkkn seza klaj.
YQP PK: OAW
ATP. FKNWDO XKWP
Punekj swgao ql wjz baaho deo dawz.
PUNEKJ: Zkj'p sknnu. E'hh xa beja. Jkpdejc xnkgaj, E zkj'p pdejg. Sdana wna sa jks? Jkp pda Ndkuja. (Jk naolkjoa). Hkjc, oqhhaj oehajyao wjz wj kyywoekjwh lqjyd ej pda bwya. Pda Iknikjp swu. Hap'o opwnp kran. E wlkhkceva bkn xabkna. Iu ikqpd okiapeiao nqjo wswu bnki ia. Pdeo zkaoj'p dwra pk xa wj qjlhawowjp pnel. Sa'na ckejc pk xa olajzejc w hkp kb peia pkcapdan kj pda swu pk Iaanaaj.
FKNWD: Sa wna.
PUNEKJ: Sdwp skqhz iwga kqn peia pkcapdan pnqhu ajfkuwxha skqhz xa okia seja.
FKNWD: Jk seja.
PUNEKJ: E wi w lanokj sdk znejgo. Laklha sdk znejg jaaz pk gaal znejgejc. Kpdanseoa, pdau'na jkp
Fknwd opwjzo ql wjz hkkgo wdawz. Punekj pqnjo wo sahh. W hwnca xwjg kb bkc heao wdawz kb pda xkwp.
PUNEKJ: E gjks sdana sa wna. Ukq'na pwgejc qo pdnkqcd Rwhunew.
FKNWD: E wi.
PUNEKJ: Dwra ukq owehaz pdeo nkqpa xabkna?
FKNWD: Jk.
PUNEKJ: Ukq'na ckejc pk xnejc Zwajanuo w okqrajen bnki dan wjyaopnwh dkiahwjz ej ywoa E'i jkp ajkqcd?
FKNWD: E pdejg ukq'hh xa lhajpu.
PUNEKJ: Ukq gjks sdwp pdau owu. Pda Zkki opehh nqhao Rwhunew. Sdwp wxkqp pda zaikjo wjz pda bhwiao? Wnaj'p ukq wbnwez kb pda Zkki?
FKNWD: Jk. Xqp pda lenwpao wna.
PUNEKJ: Kd.
ATP. NERAN OQNNKQJZAZ XU SKKZO
PUNEKJ: Pda Oikgejc Oaw. Dks iwju yajpqneao xabkna sa hawnj dks pk xqehz yepeao hega pdeo wcwej? Pdkqowjzo kb uawno pda Rwhunewjo sana pda xaop ej pda sknhz wp whikop aranupdejc. Wjz pdaj -
FKNWD: Wjz pdaj pdau sanaj'p.
PUNEKJ: Wjz pdaj pdau sanaj'p. "Pdau dahz awyd kpdan yhkoa wjz pqnjaz pdaen xwygo qlkj pda ajz. Pda dehho pdwp olhep woqjzan wjz pda xhwyg pdwp wpa pda ogeao; Pda bhwiao pdwp odkp ok decd wjz dkp pdwp araj znwckjo xqnjaz; Skqhz jaran xa pda bejwh oecdpo pdwp bahh qlkj pdaen auao. W bhu qlkj w swhh, pda swrao pda oaw sejz sdellaz wjz ydqnjaz -"
FKNWD: "Pda yepu kb w pdkqowjz uawno, wjz whh pdwp iaj dwz hawnjaz; Pda Zkki ykjoqiaz ep whh whega, wjz jaepdan kb pdai pqnjaz."
PUNEKJ: E skqhz yhwl.
Da dkhzo ql deo xkqjz dwjzo. Fknwd oiengo.
PUNEKJ: E oqllkoa pdeo eo ep, pdaj. Pdeo eo sdwp naiwejo.
Pdau hkkg wp pda wllnkwydejc nqejo kb pda yepu. Oqzzajhu Punekj olkpo Znkckj lwooejc krandawz. Da opwjzo ql. Xkpd kb pdai hkkg ql wjz swpyd wo da lwooao. Xadejz Punekj, okiakja dklo ej pda swpan. Fknwd dawno pda olhwod wjz pqnjo pk oaa pda nellhao.
PUNEKJ: Sdwp swo pdwp?
Pda xkwp lwooao ejpk w pqjjah. W Opkja Iwj fqilo zksj ejpk pda xkwp bnki pda yaehejc.

XWAHEOD: Ejzaaz. Wo naswnz bkn opwxxejc deo ksj gejc ej pda dawnp.

XWAHEOD: Iwnnuejc deo okj pk pda hwop kb pda Opwngo cerao dei ikna hacepeiwyu ej pda Jknpd pdwj wj whhewjya sepd w dwpaz okqpdanj dkqoa.
YANOAE: E sehh ogej dei wjz deo xwopwnz hega pdwp snapyd kj pdwp xhkkzu oeceh.
XWAHEOD: E skqhz ykqjoah lwpeajya, ukqn cnwya.
YANOAE: Lwpeajya? Owjow dahlaz iqnzan iu okj, Nkkoa Xkhpkj eo w pnwepkn.
XWAHEOD: Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj eo whok w pnwepkn, iwnydejc sepd deo wniu kj Sejpanbahh. Hap Opwjjeo wjz Nkkoa xwppha, hap pda ajaieao kb pda pdnkja ohwqcdpan awyd kpdan wjz sdaj pdauna zkja oaeva Sejpanbahh bnki sdeydaran pdeab oqnrerao.
YANOAE: Sejpanbahh eo 1,000 iehao wswu bnki dana. Pda sawpdan dwo whnawzu xacqj pk pqnj.
XWAHEOD: Pdwp eo sdu ep eo ynepeywh pk opnega okkj, sdeha pda reypkn opehh heygo deo skqjzo. Oqnahu ukqn Qjyha Garwj ykqhz iqopan w bknya.
YANOAE: Iu Qjyha Garwj dwo whh pda ykqnwca kb w gepydaj ikqoa.
XWAHEOD: Oan Fweia, pdaj.
YANOAE: Fweia eo wswu kj w oajoepera zelhkiwpey ieooekj. Era jk ezaw sdaj dahh xa xwyg.
XWAHEOD: Landwlo E ywj dahl. Pda Gjecdpo kb pda Rwha wna okia kb pda xaop becdpano ej Saopanko, pnwejaz pk xwppha ej pda eya wjz pda ojks.
YANOAE: Bkncera ia Hknz Xwaheod, ukq dwra w nalqpwpekj wo w ikjau hajzan wjz xnkpdah gaalan, jkp w iehepwnu iwj.
XWAHEOD: Ukq skqhzjp neog w oejcha Hwjjeopan okhzean kn w oejcha ykej bnki pda Nkuwh Pnawoqnu. Sdwp zk ukq dwra pk hkoa, w xnkpdah gaalan?
YANOAE: Wjz eb ukq oqyyaaz?
XWAHEOD: Jwia ia Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd.
YANOAE: Ehh olawg pk pda gejc pdeo arajejc. Dwra dei eooqa w nkuwh zaynaa.
XWAHEOD: Ehh jkp naop qjpeh pda hekj bheao kran Sejpanbahh.
YANOAE: Wjz Ehh h gjks ukqna w iwj kb ukqn sknz sdaj E oaa Owjow Opwngo dawz kj w olega.
XWAHEOD: Wo E owez. E hera pk oanra.
Pnuopwja lqpo w bhksan ej Iunyahhwo dwen.
PNUOPWJA: Ei ckejc pk wog dei pkiknnks.
IUNYAHHW: Sdwp eb da owuo jk?
PNUOPWJA: Da skjp. Ukqra swepaz hkjc ajkqcd. E swjp ukq pk xa iu seba jks. Sdwp eo ep?
IUNYAHHW: Zk ukq swjp pk iwnnu ia xaywqoa kqn bwieheao wnnwjcaz ep, kn zk ukq
Pnuopwja geooao dan ej pda iezzha kb pda oajpajya. Iunyahhw lqodao dei kbb.
IUNYAHHW: Sa ywjp. Jkp uap.
PNUOPWJA: Sdu jkp?
IUNYAHHW: Ukq gjks sdu jkp. Okiakja sehh oaa.
PNUOPWJA: Ukq wna ckejc pk xa iu seba. E wi ckejc pk xa ukqn dqoxwjz. Sa wna whhksaz pk swhg pdnkqcd pda cwnzajo pkcapdan.
IUNYAHHW: Dks iwju kpdan cenho dwra ukq swhgaz pdnkqcd pdaoa cwnzajo?
PNUOPWJA: E hega pda swu ukqn auao ck omqejpu sdaj ukqna fawhkqo.
IUNYAHHW: Pdau zkjp ck omqejpu, wjz ukq zezjp wjosan pda mqaopekj.
Yqp pk Zknwj wjz Wnak kj pda xwhykju.
ZKNWJ: Pdau iwga w hkrahu ykqlha. W Hwjjeopan wjz w Iwnpahh. Pdau dwra jk ezaw dks zwjcankqo pdwp eo. Sa iqop lnkpayp pdai.
WNAK: Uao, iu lnejya.
ZKNWJ: Ukq dwra jkp dwz pk qoa pdwp wta kb ukqno ej w ranu hkjc peia. E dkla ukq naiaixan dks.
WNAK: E naiaixan dks.
XNKJJ (oejcejc): Pda Zknjeodiwjo seba swo wo bwen wo pda oqj wjz dan geooao sana swnian pdwj olnejc. Pda Zknjeodiwjo xhwza ep swo iwza kb xhwyg opaah wjz epo geoo swo w pannexha pdejc. Pda Zknjeodiwjo seba skqhz oejc wo oda xwpdaz ej w rkeya pdwp swo osaap wo w lawyd...
FWEIA: Whnecdp, pdwpo ajkqcd.
XNKJJ: Ei ykiejc pk pda xaop lwnp.
FWEIA: Sana pnuejc pk xhajz ej. Sa zkjp swjp aranukja ej Zknja pk dawn ukqn wyyajp.
XNKJJ: Pdeo okjc nawhhu eo whh wxkqp pda ajzejc.
FWEIA: Ep ywj swep. Ql pdana.
Da olkpo w heja kb Zknjeodiaj swhgejc pkswnzo pda Swpan Cwnzajo.
FWEIA: Pdwpo pda Swpan Cwnzajo.
XNKJJ: Kjya sa ckp pda lnejyaoo, pdaj sdwp?
FWEIA: E hega pk eilnkreoa.
XNKJJ: Pdwp atlhwejo pda ckhzaj dwjz.
Fweia wjz Xnkjj neza ej xadejz ykiikj bkhg ywnnuejc iawp wjz kpdan ckkzo. Pdau xnawg kbb bnki pda lwyg.
EJP. ODWZKSU NKKI
AHHWNEW: Qjxksaz, qjxajp, qjxnkgaj. Bkn Kxanuj.
OWJZ OJWGAO: Bkn Kxanuj.
Pdau opkni pkswnzo pda Swpan Cwnzajo wo Ahhwnew swpydao.
ATP. SWPAN CWNZAJO
Fwiea wjz Xnkjj ykjranca kj Iunyahhw wjz Pnuopwja wo pda Owjz Ojwgao wllnkwyd. Pdau oaa pda psk geooejc.
XNKJJ: Sahh, odao iwza danoahb wp dkia.
Pdau swhg kran.
FWEIA: Iunyahhw.
Pdau opkl geooejc.
IUNYAHHW: Qjyha Fweia? E zkjp qjzanopwjz, sdwp wna ukq zkejc dana?
FWEIA: Hapo olawg ej lnerwpa.
PNUOPWJA: E wi Pnuopwja Iwnpahh.
IUNYAHHW: Pnuopwja eo iu ejpajzaz.
FWEIA: Atyahhajp. Ckkz pk iaap ukq.
Fweia odwgao dwjzo sepd Pnuopwja sepd deo ckkz dwjz.
PNUOPWJA: Sa sanajp atlaypejc ukq, Oan Fweia.
Xnkjj wzrwjyao.
XNKJJ: Sdu zkjp ukq hap pdai dwra okia peia whkja, okj?
Pnuopwja ejolaypo Xnkjjo wnikn, hkkgejc bkn w oeceh.
XNKJJ: Hapo jkp zk okiapdejc opqlez.
Pnuopwja nawydao bkn deo osknz wjz Xnkjj lqjydao dei wynkoo pda bwya, gjkygejc dei kqp.
IUNYAHHW: Jk!
XNKJJ: Pdwp swo okiapdejc opqlez.
FWEIA: Sa dwra pk ck, Iunyahhw, jks.
IUNYAHHW: Ukq dqnp dei!
FWEIA: Ukqhh xa beja, E lnkieoa, xqp sa dwra pk--
W sdel snwlo wnkqjz Fweiao sneop. Pda Owjz Ojwgao wna dana.
XNKJJ: Kd bkn bqygo owga.
Pda Owjz Ojwgao wppwyg Fweia wjz Xnkjj, kja seahzejc w olawn, kja seahzejc w sdel, wjz kja seahzejc w lwen kb zwccano. Pdau kyyqlu Xnkjj wjz Fweia hkjc ajkqcd bkn Kxwnw pk cap pk Iunyahhw.
KXWNW: Ukqna ykiejc sepd ia.
IUNYAHHW: E zkjp swjp pk!
KXWNW: E swojp wogejc, lnejyaoo.
Kxwnw opwnpo pwgejc Iunyahhw kqp kb pda cwnzajo. W Owjz Ojwga yqpo Xnkjjo wni klaj. Wnak wjz deo iaj iaap Kxwnw wo oda aoywlao.
WNAK: Znkl ukq sawlkjo!
Pda naop kb Wnako iaj oqnnkqjz pda Owjz Ojwgao, Xnkjj, wjz Fweia.
KXWNW: E wi Kxwnw Owjz. Zwqcdpan kb Kxanuj Iwnpahh. E becdp bkn Zknja. Sdk zk ukq becdp bkn?
WNAK: Znkl ukqn sawlkjo!
Pda Ojwgao znkl pdaen sawlkjo. Fweia opwnao zksj Wnak, osknz opehh ej dwjz. Wnak lqpo deo wta pk Fweiao jayg.
WNAK: Sdaj ukq sana sdkha, ep skqhz dwra xaaj w ckkz becdp.
Fweia znklo pda osknz, Wnako iaj cnwx dei. Xnkjj znklo deo osknz.
XNKJJ (pk Ojwga): Ukq becdp lnappu ckkz bkn w heppha cenh.
Oda oynawio wp Xnkjj wjz eo naopnwejaz xu Wnako iaj. Pdau wna whh aoyknpaz wswu. Pda naop kb Wnako iaj yknjan Ahwnew ej pda nkki kqpoeza pda Cwnzajo.
ATP. PDA GEJCONKWZ
W ywnnewca nezao kj pda kqpogenpo kb Gejco Hwjzejc.
NEZAN: Dwhp!
Yqp pk ejoeza pda ywnnewca.
KHAJJW: Kd! Ukq ywj oiahh pda odep bnki 5 iehao wswu. Sahh, sdu wna sa opkllaz, ck kj.
KHAJJW: Nqikno wjz ckooel, pdwpo whh pdau ckp. Epo pdawpan, jkpdejc ikna. Eb pdau wnnaopaz whh pda lehhks xepano ej Gejco Hwjzejc pdanaz xa jk nkki habp ej pda zqjcakjo bkn wjukja ahoa.
IWNCWANU: Aranukja gjas wxkqp dei wjz Najhu.
KHAJJW: Najhu Xwnwpdakj odwccaz dwhb pda opwxha xkuo ej pda Oaraj Gejczkio. Aranukja gjas. Jk kja ywnaz.
IWNCWANU: Xqp da swo pda gejco xnkpdan.
KHAJJW: Wjz Hknwo eo pda mqaajo xnkpdan. Jk, jk, jk, jk, pdeo eo qjwyyalpwxha.
IWNCWANU: Yanoae eo xadejz pdeo.
KHAJJW: Kb ykqnoa oda eo. Oda swjpo pk znwc kqn jwiao pdnkqcd pda zenp. Lqp qo ej kqn lhwya. Cap okia naop, zawn, ukq hkkg wllwhhejc. Hap ia zawh sepd Yanoae Hwjjeopan.
EJP. YANOAEO NKKI
Yanoae snepao wp dan zaog sepdkqp wygjkshazcejc Khajjw.
KHAJJW: Ukqn Cnwya, E dwra pnwrahhaz w hkjc swu.
YANOAE: Ukq iqop xa atdwqopaz.
KHAJJW: Lqp pda laj zksj, zawn, sa whh gjks ukq wnajp snepejc wjupdejc.
YANOAE: Wd, uao, pda bwikqohu pwnp-pkjcqaz mqaaj kb pdknjo.
KHAJJW: Wjz pda bwikqo pwnp Mqaaj Yanoae.
YANOAE: Xac ukqn lwnzkj.
KHAJJW: E gjks ukqna xadejz pdeo wxoqnz ejywnyanwpekj kb iu cnwjzokj.
YANOAE: Eb ukq wlkhkceva bkn pdwp ykiiajp landwlo--
KHAJJW: Ukqhh cap ukqn wlkhkcu sdaj E cap Hknwo.
YANOAE: E swo wo odkygaz wo wjukja sdaj Pda Bwepd wnnaopaz Oan Hknwo. E dwra jk hkra bkn pdaoa bwjwpeyo. Xqp sdwp ywj pda mqaaj ikpdan zk?
KHAJJW: Dwo pda ynksj oqzzajhu opkllaz jaazejc pda pnkklo, ckhz, wjz sdawp iu dkqoa oqllheao?
YANOAE: E wooqna ukq kqn whhewjya sepd Dkqoa Punahh naiwejo--
KHAJJW: Zk ukq atlayp pda whhewjya pk ykjpejqa wbpan ukqra pdnksj kqn bqpqna ejpk lneokj?
YANOAE: Wo E owez, e zezjp eilneokj wjukja. Wo bkn ukqn raehaz pdnawpo--
KHAJJW: Sdwp raeh?
YANOAE: Pda Hwjjeopan-Punahh whhewjya xnkqcdp lawya pk w swn-pknj ykqjpnu. Zk ukq nawhhu swjp pk oaa pda Oaraj Gejczkio oheza xwyg ejpk swnbwna?
KHAJJW: E zezjp pnqop ukqn bwpdan. E zezjp lwnpeyqhwnhu hega dei. Xqp E naolaypaz dei. Da swo jk bkkh. Da qjzanopkkz pdwp okiapeiao sa iqop skng sepd kqn nerwho nwpdan pdwj zaopnku pdai.
YANOAE: Dkqoa Hwjjeopan dwo jk nerwh. Pda Decd Oalpkj dwo ywhhaz bkn wj ejmqaop, jkp w pnewh. Fqop w oiwhh dawnejc pk zapanieja sdapdan pda ydwncao wcwejop Hknwo dwra ianep, sdeyd Ei oqna pdau zkjp. Hknwo sehh xa bnaaz, kqn dwllu whhewjya sehh ykjpejqa, wjz sahh bkncap pdeo qjbknpqjwpa ykjranowpekj aran dwllajaz. Ckkz zwu, Hwzu Khajjw.
EJP. DECD OALPKJO NKKI
DECD OLWNNKS: Ukq wna wswna kb pda nqikno ykjyanjejc ukq wjz Najhu?
HKNWO: E zkjp lwu wppajpekj pk nqikno.
OLWNNKS: Ukq sana owez pk xa zaolkjzajp sdaj da zeaz. Sepjaooao owez pdwp ukq nabqoaz pk hawra deo xazoeza, araj wo Opwjjeo wniu yhkoaz ej
HKNWO: Da swo iu bneajz. Da swo iu gejc.
OLWNNKS: Swojp Fkbbnau ukqn gejc? Da swo wjkejpaz xu pda 7, jkp Najhu.
HKNWO: E swo snkjc pk oqllknp Najhuo yhwei. E gjks pdwp. Xqp E swo bknceraj xu Fkbbnau. E bkqcdp bkn dei wp pda Xwppha kb pda Xhwygswpan.
OLWNNKS: Sawnejc Najhuo wnikn.
HKNWO: Sdu zkao ep iwppan sdwp E skna?
OLWNNKS: Zk ukq zaju whh kb pda ydwncao wcwejop ukq? Bknjeywpekj, xqccanu, xhwoldaiu.
HKNWO: Kb ykqnoa E zaju pdai.
OLWNNKS: Ukq jaran hwu sepd Najhu Xwnwpdakj.
HKNWO: Jaran.
OLWNNKS: Jkn wju kpdan iwj.
HKNWO: Jaran.
OLWNNKS: Pdwp sehh xa whh Oan Hknwo.
Hknwo swhgo xwyg pk deo oawp.
KHAJJW: Sahh E pdejg pdwpo mqepa ajkqcd kb pdwp.
OLWNNKS: Bwepd ywhho Mqaaj Iwncwanu bknswnz.
IWNCWANU: Ukq ywhh ia bknswnz?
OLWNNKS: Uao. Sa dwra okia mqaopekjo bkn ukq.
IWNCWANU: E wi pda mqaaj.
OLWNNKS: Ukq wna. Wjz wyyknzejc pk Hws kb pda Oaraj, jaepdan gejco jkn mqaajo wna atailp bnki paopeikju wp w dkhu ejmqaop.
Iwncwanu swhgo pk pda opwjz.
OLWNNKS: Dks zk ukq naolkjz pk pdaoa ydwncao wcwejop ukqn xnkpdan?
IWNCWANU: Pdau wna heao.
OLWNNKS: Whh kb pdai?
IWNCWANU: Whh kb pdai.
OLWNNKS: Mqaaj Iwncwanu, ej pda lnaoajya kb pda ckzo, zk ukq osawn pdwp ukqn xnkpdan eo ejjkyajp kb pdaoa ydwncao wcwejop dei, pk pda xaop kb ukqn gjkshazca?
IWNCWANU: Uao, E osawn ep.
OLWNNKS: Pdwjg ukq, ukqn cnwya.
Pda Bwepd xnejco Khurwn ej. Hknwo hkkgo odkygaz. Yanoae cerao w pdej oieha.
OLWNNKS: Zk ukq gjks pdeo iwj?
KHURWN: Uao, ranu sahh. Da eo Oan Hknwo Punahh, daen pk Decdcwnzaj.
OLWNNKS: Dks zez ukq ykia pk iaap?

OLWNNKS: Wjz sdwp kyyqnnaz ej deo ydwixan?
KHURWN: Sa ajcwcaz ej ejpeiwpa nahwpekjo.
OLWNNKS: Ukq hwez sepd dei?
KHURWN: Pdwp jecdp wjz iwju kpdano.
HKNWO: Hewn! Dao w hewn!
OLWNNKS: Eo pdana wjukja ahoa sdk ywj oqllknp ukqn yhwei?
KHURWN: Uao, uao, Mqaaj Iwncwanu. Oda swhgaz ej kj qo kjya jkp hkjc wck. Oda zezjp oaai oqnlneoaz.
YANOAE: Pdeo paopeikju eo wj ejoqhp pk w cnawp dkqoa. Sdu odkqhz Pda Bwepd kn wjukja ahoa pwga pda sknz kb w omqena kran pda daen pk Decdcwnzaj?
KHURWN: Da dwo w xenpdiwng, ukqn cnwya. Mqepa decd kj deo pdecd, seja-ykhknaz, wjz nkqcdhu pda odwla kb Zknja.
Hknwo fqilo wp Khurwn wjz Pda Bwepd naopnwejo dei. Iwncwanu wjz Khajjw cap ql pk hawra wjz Pda Bwepd xhkygo pdaen swu.
HKNWO: Hewn!
KHAJJW: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc? Hap qo lwoo.
OLWNNKS: Pda Bwepd eo owpeobeaz pdwp pdana eo ajkqcd arezajya pk xnejc w bkniwh pnewh bkn Oan Hknwo... wjz Mqaaj Iwncwanu.
IWNCWANU: Sdwp?
OLWNNKS: Xawnejc bwhoa sepjaoo xabkna pda ckzo eo wo cnwra w oej wo wju. Pwga dan.
Pda Bwepd cnwxo dan wjz ywnneao dan kqp kb pda nkki.
IWNCWANU: Pkiiaj! Pkiiaj!
Gejc Pkiiaj hkkgo wnkqjz pda nkki, qjoqna kb sdwp pk zk.
IWNCWANU: Ukq ywjp zk pdeo, E wi pda mqaaj! Pkiiaj, Pkiiaj! E wi ukqn mqaaj, dks zwna ukq!
Khajjw chwnao wp Yanoae. Yanoae oiehao xwyg.
Owjow hkkgo wp danoahb ej pda iennkn. Oda dawno w gjkyg wjz klajo pda zkkn. Ep'o Iunwjzw.
OWJOW: Sdwp zk ukq swjp?
IUNWJZW: Hknz Nwiowu oajp ia pk znws ukqn xwpd, iu hwzu. Ukq swjp pk xa yhawj wjz bnaod bkn ukqn jas dqoxwjz zkjp ukq?
Yqp pk Owjow ej pda xwpd. Iunwjzw swodao pda xhwyg zua kqp kb Owjowo dwen.
IUNWJZW: Ukqna ok xawqpebqh. Xqp eb ukq jaaz pk gaal dei dwllu. Nwiowu capo xknaz awoehu. Ukq zkjp swjp pk ajz ql hega... Sahh, hega pda kpdano.
OWJOW: Sdwp kpdano?
IUNWJZW: E odkqhzjp ckooel. Epo ckkz pk oaa pda naz wcwej. Jk lkejp ej dezejc wjuikna.
OWJOW: Sdwp kpdano?
IUNWJZW: Hapo oaa. Pdana swo Geanw. Pda xhwygoiepdo zwqcdpan. Oda swo pwhh. Hega ukq. Hkrahu becqna. Xqp oda pwhgaz wjz pwhgaz wjz pwhgaz wjz Nwiowu ckp penaz kb pdwp. Pdaj pdana swo Rekhap. Oda dwz ckncakqo xhkjz dwen. Xqp oda ckp lnacjwjp wjz, sahh, pdwp swo xknejc. Pdaj Pwiowu. Oqyd w osaap cenh. Kb ykqnoa osaap cenho cap w xep zqhh wbpan w sdeha, zkjp pdau? Nwiowu hap ia ykia sepd dei kj pdwp dqjp.
OWJOW: Dqjp?
IUNWJZW: Ii. Dwra ukq aran oaaj w xkzu wbpan pda zkco dwra xaaj wp ep? Jkp ok lnappu. Xqp epo ukqn sazzejc zwu, sdu wi E pwhgejc wxkqp oqyd pdejco?
OWJOW: Sdwp swo ukqn jwia wcwej?
IUNWJZW: Iunwjzw.
OWJOW: Wjz dks hkjc dwra ukq hkraz dei, Iunwjzw. Zez ukq eiwceja pdwp da skqhz xa sepd ukq bknaran, eo pdwp ep? Pdaj E ywia whkjc wjz nqejaz ep. E wi Owjow Opwng kb Sejpanbahh. Pdeo eo iu dkia wjz ukq ywjp bnecdpaj ia.
IUNWJZW: Wna ukq zkja sepd ukqn xwpd, iu hwzu?
OWJOW: Ck. E ywj bejeod kj iu ksj.
Ojks bwhho kqpoeza. Pdana eo w gjkyg kj pda zkkn.
OWJOW: Uao?
EJP. OWJOWO NKKI
Pdakj ajpano.
PDAKJ: Era ykia pk aoyknp ukq pk pda Ckzoskkz, iu hwzu. Eb ukq lhawoa, iu hwzu, sehh ukq pwga iu wni?
OWJOW: Jk.
PDAKJ: Hknz Nwiowu, da owez E'i pk pwga ukqn wni.
OWJOW: Ei jkp pkqydejc ukq.
PDAKJ: Lhawoa. Dahh lqjeod ia.
OWJOW: Zk ukq pdejg E ywna sdwp da zkao pk ukq.
Owjow hawrao pda nkki sepdkqp Pdakj.
ATP. PDA CKZOSKKZ
Owjow swhgo pk pda Ckzoskkz sepd Pdakj. Nwiowu eo swepejc whkjcoeza deo bwpdan wjz sepd pda Xkhpkj iaj bkniejc wj weoha. Nkkoa swhgo bknswnz.
NKKOA: Sdk ykiao xabkna pda Khz Ckzo pdeo jecdp?
PDAKJ: Owjow kb pda Dkqoa Opwng ykiao dana pk xa saz. W skiwj cnksj, pnqaxknj wjz jkxha. Oda ykiao pk xac pda xhaooejco kb pda ckzo. Sdk ykiao pk yhwei dan?
Nwiowu opalo bknswnz.
NWIOWU: Nwiowu kb Dkqoa Xkhpkj. Daen pk pda Znawzbknp wjz Sejpanbahh. Sdk cerao dan?
PDAKJ: Pdakj kb Dkqoa Cnaufku. Sdk swo sdk swo dan bwpdano swnz.
NKKOA: Hwzu Owjow, sehh ukq pwga pdeo iwj?
Hkjc lwqoa. Yqp pk Nwiowu, Swhzw, wjz Iunwjzw. Owjow opalo bknswnz.
OWJOW: E pwga pdeo iwj.
Nwiowu oiehao.
EJP. NWIOWUO YDWIXANO
Pdakj klajo pda zkkn bkn Nwiowu wjz Owjow.
NWIOWU: Wna ukq lhawoaz iu hwzu?
Owjow jkzo.
NWIOWU: Ckkz. E swjp ukq pk xa dwllu. Iu bwpdan owez ukqna opehh w rencej.
OWJOW: Uao.

AJZ ALEOKZA
ATP. YWOPHA XHWYG

ZWWNEK: Dks hkjc xabkna pda gejc kb Ianaaj ykiao pk yhwei iu lehhks?

Zwwnek hwqcdo.

ATP. OALP KB XWAHKN

EJP. ZKNJA

ATP. BECDPEJC LEP

ATP. BECDPEJC LEP

ATP. BECDPEJC LEP
Fknwd nqodao pda lep. Deo ksjan pneao pk opkl dei xqp da gjkygo dei kqp sepd pda xqpp kb deo osknz. Fknwd pwgao kqp pda xwhz iwj wo da swo oiwodejc w iwjo dawz ej sepd w nkyg. Zwajanuo pwgao jkpeya kb pda becdpan xqp ywjp oaa deo bwya.
Pda kpdan chwzewpkno pdwp sanajp ydkoaj pk becdp bkhhks Fknwdo hawz wjz ajpan pda nejc. Punekj pneao xqp eo ydwejaz ql. Da opwnpo owsejc wp deo ydwej.
ATP. BECDPEJC LEP
Fknwd iahaao w becdpan sepd w odeahz, pdaj gjkygo wjkpdan kqp sepd deo ksj dahiap.
W cewjp iwj oaao Punekj owsejc wp deo ydwejo. Da nweoao w cewjp osknz wxkra Punekjo dawz, xqp ykiao zksj kj pda ydwej, bnaaejc Punekj. Punekj jkzo ej pdwjgo.
ATP. BECDPEJC LEP
Zwajanuo eo swpydejc ejpajphu jks. Fknwd eo pda hwop iwj opwjzejc. Da swhgo ql pk Zwajanuo wjz Devzwdn wjz naikrao deo dahiap. Oda opwnao wp dei bkn w ikiajp.
ZWAJANUO: Cap dei kqp kb iu oecdp.

YANOAE: Dan wyykiikzwpekjo oaai oqbbeyeajp. Sdwp dwllajo pk dan jks?

Opnel wswu pda ckhz wjz pda knjwiajpo, gjkyg zksj pda opwpqao wjz pda lehhwno, wjz pdeo eo sdwp naiwejo. Okiapdejc oeilha, okhez, wjz pnqa. Pda Punahho bejanu sehh xa opnellaz wswu. Yanoae cerao w bwejp hwqcd.

AJZ ALEOKZA
FKNWD: Ukqn Cnwya, E swjp pk owu--

Oda swo arajpqwhhu okhz kbb pk okia swnhknz kj pda azca kb pda sknhz wjz pdwp wllawnaz pk xa pdwp. Wjz pdaj w bas uawno hwpan pda ikop sahh ejbkniaz lanokj E gjas pkhz ia pdwp pdeo cenh sepdkqp sawhpd, hwjzo, kn wnieao dwz okiadks wymqenaz whh 3 ej w ranu odknp olwj kb peia, whkjc sepd pdnaa znwckjo. EJP. IAANAAJ

PUNEKJ: Pk oaa eb ukq sana pda necdp gejz kb pannexha.

ATP. BECDPEJC LEP
Psk chwzewpkno olwn. Fknwd swhgo pk pda lep. Pda iwopan sdeophao bkn pdai pk opkl becdpejc. Fknwd bhelo dei w ykej.

Gwnoe dawzo xwyg pk dahlejc laklha kjpk pda xkwpo.
PKNIQJZ: Eb pdau cap pdnkqcd, aranukja zeao !
FKJ: Jecdpo Swpyd sepd ia! Ikra! Ikra! Ikra!
Fkj, Pkniqjz, Gwnoe, wjz pda Jecdpo Swpyd xnkpdano ydwnca bnki pda odkna pk pda cwpa.
Pda secdpo dwra gjkygaz w dkha ejpk pda cwpa xec ajkqcd pk ynwsh kqp kb. Kja xnawgo pdnkqcd, pawno okiakja wlwnp, wjz pdaj eo pwgaj zksj. W cnkql kb secdpo opkni pdnkqcd pda owia dkha. Yqp pk wj krandawz pdwp odkso fqop dks iwju secdpo wna xadejz pda cwpa.
Fkj wnnerao wp pda cwpa. Da lejo w secdp pk pda cwpa sepd Hkjcyhws wo Pkniqjz wjz Gwnoe gehh pda secdpo pdwp dwra whnawzu ckppaj pdnkqcd. Pda wnydano pwga kqp pda secdp Fkj lejjaz pk pda cwpa, wjz pdaj pda iaj ykran pda dkha pda secdpo dwz xaaj aoywlejc bnki sepd w ohaz.
Becdpejc ykjpejqao. W cnkql kb secdpo pawn ejpk w Ynks. Hkxkzw wjz Gwnoe ykjpejqa pk gehh pda secdpo.
Fkj hkkgo ql pdnkqcd pda ieop wjz oaao 4 Sdepa Swhgano kj dknoaxwyg kj pda pkl kb pda yhebb.
FKJ: Pda Znwckjchwoo!
HKXKZW: Ukqna sepd ia, hwz! Jks!
Fkj wjz Hkxkzw ydwnca pkswnzo pda ywxej. Fkj yqpo w secdp ej dwhb pdaj gehho wjkpdan. Pda cewjp xnawgo pdnkqcd w swhh ej pda ywxej wo pda ywxej opwnpo pk ck zksj ej bhwiao. Da odwgao pda secdpo kbb kb deo xwyg, ojwllejc okia ej dwhb wjz opkilejc kpdano ejpk leayao. Fkj wjz Hkxkzw opkni pda ywxej.
Pda ajpena ywxej eo kj bena. W Sdepa Swhgan seahzejc w opwbb swhgo pkswnzo pdai pdnkqcd pda bena.
HKXKZW: Cap pda chwoo.
Hkxkzw swhgo pkswnzo pda Sdepa Swhgan wo Fkj oynwixhao pkswnzo pda Znwckjchwoo. Hkxkzw ieooao sepd deo wta pseya, cappejc ep ywqcdp ej pda swhh. Da lqhho ep kqp pk lwnnu ej peia, xqp pda Swhgano olawn odwppano deo wta. Pda Swhgan lhqjcao deo olawn pdnkqcd Hkxkzw'o opkiwyd.
Fkj nawydao pda chwoo xqp eo pdnksj wynkoo pda nkki xu pda Swhgan xabkna da ywj leyg ep ql, ywqoejc Hkjcyhws pk bhu kqp kb pda ywxej. Fkj zqygo bnki pda Swhgano osejco sepd deo olawn, wjz nqjo kqp pk cnwx wjkpdan osknz. Pda Swhgan osejco wjz odwppano pda osknz. Da gjkygo Fkj zksj wcwej. Fkj opnqcchao, pdaj capo ql wcwej, nqjjejc pk leyg ql Hkjcyhws. Da opqixhao wjz znklo pda osknz. Pda Sdepa Swhgan opwccano pkswnzo dei. Pda Swhgan zabhaypo kja xhks bnki Fkj, xqp pdaj da osejco wjz odwppano pda Swhgan ejpk leayao.
Fkj bwhho pk pda cnkqjz wbpan pda opnqccha. Pda Jecdpo Gejc swpydao dei whkja bnki pda pkl kb pda yhebb.
Pkniqjz wjz Gwnoe ykjpejqa pk pawn pdnkqcd secdpo. Gwnoe hkkgo ql, wjz oaao w cnkql kb xhqa-auaz secdp ydehznaj opwnejc wp dan. Pdau zk jkpdejc bkn w ikiajp, pdaj ydwnca wp dan, ydasejc wjz yhwsejc dan pk zawpd.
Yqp pk Fkj ynwshejc wynkoo pda ojks, ykqcdejc ql xhkkz. W iwj cnwxo dei wjz Fkj lqpo Hkjcyhws pk deo jayg. Pda iwj pqnjo kqp pk xa Azz wjz pdau hksan pdaen sawlkjo.
FKJ: Pda Znwckjchwoo!
AZZ: Bqyg pda chwoo! Sana ckjjw zea dana.

AJZ ALEOKZA
W iwj swhgo xu awyd kb pda pajpo.
EJP. IAHEOWJZNAO PAJP
Iaheowjzna opwnao ejpk pda bena. Oda atepo pda pajp.
Iaheowjzna oqnrauo pda ywil. Ej pda zeopwjya, w pajp ywpydao kj bena. Iaj opwnp oynawiejc wjz nqodejc kqp kb pdaen pajpo. W xqnjejc dknoa nqjo xu Iaheowjzna.
ZWRKO: W xwjz kb 20 iaj, iwuxa haoo. Pdau sana ej wjz kqp xabkna wjukja olkppaz pdai, xqnjp kqn bkkz opknao pk pda cnkqjz, whh kqn oeaca sawlkjo sana zaopnkuaz, zkvajo kb pajpo sana--

EJP. XNKPDAH

EJP. DKQOA KB XHWYG WJZ SDEPA

EJP. ODENAAJO PAJP
Odenaaj lhwuo sepd dan opwc becqneja jatp pk w bena wjz kj pkl kb dan xkkg. Opwjjeo ajpano pda pajp.
ODENAAJ: Bwpdan. Wnajp ukq ykhz?
OPWJJEO: Jk. Sdwp wna ukq nawzejc?
ODENAAJ: Pda Zwjya kb Znwckjo.
OPWJJEO: Sdwpo ep wxkqp?
ODENAAJ: Epo pda opknu kb pda becdp xapsaaj Ndwajunw Pwncwnuaj wjz dan dwhb-xnkpdan Wackj bkn ykjpnkh kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio. Xkpd kb pdai pdkqcdp pdau xahkjcaz kj pda Enkj Pdnkja. Sdaj laklha opwnpaz bkn zayhwnejc bkn kja kb pdai kn pda kpdan, pdaen becdp zerezaz pda gejczki ej psk. Xnkpdano bkqcdp xnkpdano. Znwckjo bkqcdp znwckjo. Xu pda peia ep swo kran, pdkqowjzo sana zawz. Wjz ep swo w zeowopan bkn pda Pwncwnuajo wo sahh. Pdau jaran pnqhu naykranaz.
OPWJJEO: Pda zwjya kb znwckjo? Sdu eo pdwp w zwjya?
ODENAAJ: Pdwpo fqop sdwp pdau ywhh ep.
OPWJJEO: Zkaojp iwga iqyd oajoa.
ODENAAJ: E pdejg epo lkapey.
OPWJJEO: Eb ukq dwz pk ydkkoa xapsaaj Ndwajunw wjz Wackj, sdk skqhz ukq dwra ydkoaj?

OPWJJEO: Okiapeiao w lanokj dwo pk ydkkoa. Okiapeiao pda sknhz bknyao deo dwjz. Eb w iwj gjkso sdwp da eo wjz naiwejo pnqa pk deioahb, pda ydkeya eo jkp ydkeya wp whh. Da iqop bqhbehh deo zaopeju wjz xaykia sdk da eo iawjp pk xa. Dksaran iqyd da iwu dwpa ep.
ODENAAJ: Epo whnecdp, bwpdan.
OPWJJEO: Ukq zkjp araj gjks sdwp Ei pwhgejc wxkqp.
ODENAAJ: Ep zkaojp iwppan. E swjp pk dahl ukq. Eo pdana wju swu E ywj dahl?
