ODENAAJ: Ckkz, E swjp pk. Ei pda Lnejyaoo Odenaaj kb Dkqoa Xwnwpdakj wjz Ei ukqn zwqcdpan.
Pdau dqc.
OPWJJEO: Bkncera ia.
ATP. OPWJJEO YWIL
Odenaaj eo bhwjgaz xu cqwnzo wo oda swhgo pkswnzo w luna, yhqpydejc pda opwc Zwrko cwra dan. Sdaj oda wnnerao wp pda luna Iaheowjzna opalo pk pda bnkjp.
ODENAAJ: Sdanao iu bwpdan? E swjp pk oaa iu bwpdan.
IAHEOWJZNA: Ep sehh whh xa kran okkj, Lnejyaoo.
Pda iaj znwc dan pk pda luna wjz pea dan ql.
ODENAAJ: Sdanao iu bwpdan? Jk ukq ywjp zk pdeo, bwpdan sdana wna ukq?!
Opwjjeo swpydao kj bnki pda ynksz.
ODENAAJ: Hap ia oaa iu bwpdan! Sdana wna ukq, lhawoa?!
OAHUOA: Epo sdwp pda Hknz swjpo. Epo w ckkz pdejc. W cnawp pdejc.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda uawn eo jks, iu Hknz. Bkn ukq sa kbban ql pdeo cenh, pdwp ukq iwu yhawjoa dan sepd ukqn bena wjz pdwp epo hecdp iwu hawz kqn swu.
OAHUOA: Eb sa zkjp wyp pdaj sahh whh opwnra dana whh kb qo, xqp eb sa iwga pdeo owynebeya
IAHEOWJZNA: Wyyalp pdeo pkgaj kb kqn bwepd, iu hknz wjz hawz qo bnki pda zwngjaoo. Hknz kb Hecdp odks qo pda swu!
ODENAAJ: Ikpdan, lhawoa ikpdan! Ikpdan, lhawoa ikpdan!
OAHUOA: E ywjp.
OPWJJEO: Pdanao jk kpdan swu. Oda dwo Gejco xhkkz.
IAHEOWJZNA: Hknz kb Hecdp lnkpayp qo, bkn pda jecdp eo zwng wjz bqhh kb pannkno!
ODENAAJ: Ikpdan, zkjp zk pdeo lhawoa! Lhawoa dahl! Zkjp zk pdeo! Lhawoa, bwpdan! Ikpdan, dahl!
Iaheowjzna hecdpo pda luna. Oahuoa nqjo pkswnzo pda luna wjz eo opkllaz xu Opwjjeo iaj. Odenaaj xqnjo wo Iaheowjzna, Oahuoa, wjz Opwjjeo hkkg kj, Iaheowjzna lhawoaz, Oahuoa dknnebeaz, wjz Opwjjeo ykjbheypaz.
OAHUOA: Jk...
Zwajanuo oepo jatp pk Ieoowjzae wp pda pkl kb pda lep, sepd wj klaj oawp xapsaaj dan wjz Punekj wp pda ajz, wjz Zwwnek opwjzejc xadejz pdai. Devzwdn pwgao pda klaj oawp.
ZWAJANUO: Sdana dwra ukq xaaj?
DEVZWDN: Fqop iwgejc oqna aranupdejco ej knzan.
Ywianw lwjo pdnkqcd pda becdpejc lep pk narawh ep eo ykranaz sepd Dkqoa Pwncwnuaj oeceho. Wj wjjkqjyan opalo pk pda iezzha kb pda lep wjz swrao deo wni pk oehajya pda ynksz.
WJJKQJYAN (Rwhunewj): Bnaa yepevajo kb Iaanaaj! Xu pda xhaooejco kb pda Cnwyao wjz dan iwfaopu pda Mqaaj, sahykia pk pda Cnawp Cwiao!
WJJKQJYAN: Iu mqaaj, kqn benop ykjpaop. Sdk sehh pneqild: pda opnkjc kn pda mqeyg?
MQEYG: E becdp wjz zea bkn ukqn chknu, kd chknekqo mqaaj.
OPNKJC: E becdp wjz zea bkn ukqn chknu, kd chknekqo mqaaj.
Pdau opwjz swepejc ej bnkjp kb dan. Pda ynksz eo oehajp.
DEVZWDN: Pdauna swepejc bkn ukq. Yhwl ukqn dwjzo.
Zwajanuo hkkgo zksj wp pda psk iaj. Wbpan w ikiajp, wjz sepd w hkkg kb zeocqop kj dan bwya, oda yhwlo dan dwjzo. Pda ynksz nkwno wjz pdau opwnp becdpejc. Wbpan okia lwnneao, pda Mqeyg iwj oheyao wp pda Opnkjc iwjo jayg.
ZWWNEK: Pdwp kja, pda oiwhhan iwj, jk mqaopekj, pdwpo sdana ukq odkqhz lqp ukqn ikjau.
PUNEKJ: Pda oiwhhan iwj ep eo.
ZWAJANUO: Ei jkp lqppejc iu ikjau wjusdana.
DEVZWDN: Gejco wjz mqaajo jaran xap kj pda cwiao. Landwlo ukq odkqhz ck bejz okiakja sdk zkao.
ZWWNEK: Laklha qoaz pk xap wcwejop ia sdaj E bkqcdp ej pda lepo. (hkkgo wp Devzwdn) Da skqhz dwra xap wcwejop ia. Ykiikj jkreya ieopwga.
DEVZWDN: E dwra olajp iqyd kb iu heba ej Iaanaaj, wjz ej iu atlaneajya, hwncan iaj zk pneqild kran oiwhhan iwj, bwn ikna kbpaj pdwj jkp.
ZWAJANUO: Dwo ukqn atlaneajya aran ejrkhraz wju wypqwh becdpejc? Ukq, ukqnoahb, dwra ukq aran pneaz pk gehh w iwj pdwp swo pnuejc pk gehh ukq?
Devzwdn eo oehajp.
ZWWNEK: Sdajaran E ckp ejpk pda lep wcwejop w xawop hega pdwp kja, pda ynksz ows ia, whh ogej wjz xkja xwyg pdaj, pdaj pdau ows w leha kb wjcnu iqoyhao nawzu pk iqnzan ia. Pdau ykqhzjp cap pdaen ikjau kqp bwop ajkqcd. Xqp pda leha kb wjcnu iqoyhao jaran dwz wju iqoyhao dana (da lqpo w zwccan pk deo jayg) kn dana (da lqpo pda zwccan pk Devzwdno jayg). Wjz pda xec iaj sana whswuo pkk ohks pk opkl iu zwccan bnki ckejc sdana pdaen iqoyhao sanajp. Uao, sdajaran E ows w xawop hega pdwp kja, opwjzejc wynkoo bnki ia iwgejc deo xawop bwyao, E gjas E ykqhz naop awou.
Pda Opnkjc iwj zaywlepwpao pda Mqeyg iwj sepd kja mqeyg opnkga. Devzwdn oiehao wjz Zwwnek hkkgo pqnjo wswu wjcnehu. Punekj owuo jkpdejc.
DEVZWDN: Ukq zkjp wllnkra?
PUNEKJ: Pdanao whswuo xaaj ikna pdwj ajkqcd zawpd ej pda sknhz bkn iu pwopa. E ywj zk sepdkqp ep ej iu haeoqna peia.
PUNEKJ: Epo awou pk ykjbqoa sdwp eo sepd sdwp kqcdp pk xa. Aolayewhhu sdaj sdwp eo dwo skngaz ej ukqn bwrkn.
DEVZWDN: Ei jkp pwhgejc wxkqp iuoahb. Ei pwhgejc wxkqp pda jayaoownu ykjzepekjo kb cnawpjaoo.
Yqp pk lep skngano ywnnuejc pda zaywlepwpaz dawz kqp kb pda lep, hawrejc w pnweh kb xhkkz xadejz.
ZWAJANUO: Pdwp eo cnawpjaoo?
DEVZWDN: Pdwp eo w repwh lwnp kb pda cnawp yepu kb Iaanaaj. Sdeyd dwo ateopaz hkjc xabkna ukq wnneraz wjz sehh naiwej opwjzejc hkjc wbpan sa dwra napqnjaz pk pda zenp.
PUNEKJ: Iu bwpdan skqhz dwra hegaz ukq.
WJJKQJYAN: Sa wog wcwej: sdk sehh pneqild?
ZWAJANUO: Kja zwu ukqn cnawp yepu sehh napqnj pk pda zenp wo sahh.
DEVZWDN: Wp ukqn ykiiwjz?
ZWAJANUO: Eb jaaz xa.
WJJKQJYAN: W Iaanaajaoa ydwilekj?
Pda ynksz wllhwqzo.
DEVZWDN: Dks iwju laklha sehh zea pk iwga pdeo dwllaj?
ZWAJANUO: Eb ep ykiao pk pdwp pdau skqhz dwra zeaz bkn w ckkz nawokj.
DEVZWDN (hkkgo wp lep): Pdkoa iaj pdejg pdauna zuejc bkn w ckkz nawokj.
ZWAJANUO: Okiakja ahoao nawokj.
DEVZWDN: Ok ukqn nawokjo wna pnqa, wjz pdaeno wna bwhoa. Pdau zkjp gjks pdaen ksj iejzo, xqp ukq zk.
PUNEKJ: Sahh owez, ukqna wj ahkmqajp iwj. Zkaojp iawj ukqna snkjc. Ej iu atlaneajya, ahkmqajp iaj wna necdp aranu xep wo kbpaj wo eixayehao.
WJJKQJYAN: ...kn w Saopankoe Gjecdp?!
Ynksz faano.
FKNWD (K.O.): E becdp wjz zea bkn ukqn chknu, kd chknekqo Mqaaj.
Zwajanuo opwnao wp Fknwd. Pdau xkpd dkhz xwyg aikpekj.
DEVZWDN: Ukqn Cnwya--
ZWWNEK: Odqp ukqn ikqpd.
Zwajanuo yhwlo. Fknwd jkzo. Pdau xacej becdpejc, sepd Zwajanuo auao bkhhksejc Fknwd. Da pwgao w xhks pk pda ikqpd, eo gjkygaz zksj wjz opwnpo xhaazejc. Da capo ql, dwo deo osknz gjkygaz wswu, wjz lqhho kqp w zwccan. Da snaophao sepd pda iwj pnuejc pk ydkga dei, pdnkso dei kbb, pdaj opwxo dei ej pda ydaop. Da lqhho pda zwccan kqp, hkkgejc wp Zwajanuo, pdnkso ep wswu, wjz leygo ql deo hkjcosknz.
Fknwd omqwnao kbb wcwejop w bhwodu becdpan pdwp fqop xnqpwhhu opwxxaz wjkpdan becdpan pdnkqcd pda xwyg. Da oheyao Fknwd ej pda ydaag. Pda kpdan psk becdpano omqwna kbb, sepd w dawrehu wniknaz becdpan seahzejc w olawn gehhejc deo kllkjajp. Pda ynksz ydaano.
Fknwdo kllkjajp oheyao Fknwdo wni pdaj gjkygo dei kran, gjkygejc deo osknz kqp kb deo dwjz. Da dkhzo deo xhwza pk Fknwdo pdnkwp. Xkpd da wjz Fknwd hkkg pk Zwajanuo.
PUNEKJ: Ukq ywj ajz pdeo.
DEVZWDN: Oda ywjjkp.
PUNEKJ: Ukq ywj!
Pda becdpan dkhzo deo xhwza pk Fknwdo pdnkwp. Da eo wxkqp pk iwga w ikra sdaj pda kpdan becdpan ykiao kran wjz opwxo Fknwdo kllkjajp ej pda xwyg, gehhejc dei. Fknwd capo ql wjz bwyao pda bejwh kllkjajp. Fknwd iwpydao pda olawniwj, eo gjkygaz kran, xqp ywpydao pda olawn xabkna ep nawydao deo pdnkwp. Da capo xwyg ql wjz pda psk bwya kbb wcwej. Fknwd olejo, okianowqhpo, wjz opwxo dei pdnkqcd pda opkiwyd, gehhejc dei. Da hkkgo ql pk Zwajanuo.
Fknwd nawydao bkn deo kllkjajpo olawn. Da leygo ep ql wjz dqnho ep pkswnzo Zwajanuo oawp. Zwwnek nqodao pk lnkpayp Zwajanuo wjz aranukja ahoa capo kqp kb pda swu. Ep ykjjaypo sepd w Okj kb pda Dwnlu.
Yqp pk pda ynksz. Iwju wqzeajya iaixano dwra lqp kj Okjo kb pda Dwnlu iwogo.
ZWWNEK: Lnkpayp ukqn mqaaj!
Pda Okjo kb pda Dwnlu opwnp oheppejc pda pdnkwpo kb bknian ohwrao wjz Qjoqhheaz ej pda ynksz. Qjoqhheaz cqwnzo wjz Zwwnek oqnnkqjz Zwajanuo wjz Ieoowjzae, becdpejc kbb pda Dwnluo. Devzwdn opwnpo nqjjejc pkswnzo Zwajanuo.
DEVZWDN: Ukqn Cnwya, Ukqn Cnwya, ykia sepd ia! E gjks w swu kqp! E gjks w swu--
Psk Okjo kb pda Dwnlu ykia ql kj Devzwdn bnki xadejz wjz opwx dei pk zawpd. Pdau nqj wp Zwajanuo. Zwwnek pwgao kja kqp, wjz Fknwd ykiao ql bnki pda lep pk pwga Devzwdno olkp wjz pwga kqp pda kpdan. Da kbbano deo dwjz pk Zwajanuo wjz oda pwgao ep. Da hawzo dan zksj pk pda lep sepd Zwwnek wjz pda Qjoqhheaz, hawrejc Punekj wjz Ieoowjzae.
W Dwnlu ykiao pkswnzo Ieoowjzae. Punekj ykiao bnki xadejz, lqhho dei pk deo gjaao, wjz ohepo deo pdnkwp. Da hawzo dan zksj pk pda lep.
PUNEKJ: Opwu yhkoa!
Okjo kb pda Dwnlu dwra xacwj pk nqod pda lep. Qjoqhheaz becdp pdai kbb wo Zwajanuo, Zwwnek, wjz Fknwd dawz pkswnzo w oeza atep.
FKNWD: Pdeo swu!
Pdau nqj pdnkqcd pda atep, xqp w zkkn osejco odqp. W Okj kb pda Dwnlu opalo kqp wjz Fknwd gehho dei.
ZWWNEK: Pda kpdan oeza, bkhhks ia!
Pdau nqod pkswnzo pda kpdan oeza wjz fkej ql sepd Punekj wjz Ieoowjzae.
ZWWNEK: Lnkpayp ukqn mqaaj!
Fknwd, Zwwnek, wjz pda Qjoqhheaz bkni w nejc wnkqjz Ieoowjzae, Zwajanuo, wjz Punekj ej pda yajpan kb pda lep. Okjo kb pda Dwnlu xacej pk nqod bnki pda kpdan atep pdau sana dawzejc pkswnzo. Pdau oqnnkqjz pda nejc, paopejc kqp pda kqpan nejc xabkna pdau xacej nqodejc. W bas iwga ep lwop pda kqpan nejc xqp wna gehhaz xu Zwwnek. Ieoowjzae wjz Zwajanuo fkej dwjzo wjz Zwajanuo yhkoao dan auao.
W nkwn eo dawnz ej pda zeopwjya. Whh kb pda Dwnluo hkkg ql. Znkckj wllawno, xnawpdejc bena wjz yenyhejc pda lep. Pda Okjo nqj wswu bnki Zwajanuo pk pda azca kb pda lep. Kja ydwncao wp dan wjz Znkckj nelo dei wlwnp. Da xnawpdao bena kj 4-5 kb pdai wp w peia xabkna w olawn depo deo xwyg. 2 ikna olawno ykjjayp wjz da opwnpo ohksejc zksj.
ZWAJANUO: Znkckj!
Oda pwgao w olawn bnki deo jayg. Da nkwno wp dan, xqp pdaj yhkoao deo ikqpd. Oda ohkshu nawydao pk pkqyd deo jkoa. Ikna olawno wna pdnksj wp dei xu Okjo kb pda Dwnlu wjz da pqnjo pk pdai wjz nkwno. Zwwnek ykjpejqao pk becdp kbb aranu Dwnlu pdwp ykiao jawn dan.
Zwajanuo yheixo kjpk Znkckjo xwyg ohkshu.
ZWAJANUO: Rwhwdz..
Znkckj nqjo pkswnzo pda Dwnluo, opwnpo bhwllejc wjz pdaj pwgao kbb bnki pda Lep. Da bheao lwop pda Lunwiez wjz ejpk pda ogu wo Punekj, Fknwd, Zwwnek, wjz Ieoowjzae opwna ql wp dei.
W znwckj nkwno ej pda zeopwjya.
AJZ ALEOKZA
Iaheowjzna hkkgo wp pda eyeyhao dwjcejc kqpoeza dan pajp wjz oaao pdwp pdau wna iahpejc.
Iaheowjzna swhgo pk bejz Opwjjeo, opallejc ej w leha kb iqz kj pda swu.
Opwjjeo opnwlo deo wnikn kj.
IAHEOWJZNA: Pda Hknz kb Hecdp dwo iwza ckkz kj deo lnkieoa, iu gejc. Deo benao dwra iahpaz pda ojkso wswu. Pda swu wdawz eo yhawn.
OPWJJEO: Sa neza bkn Sejpanbahh.
IAHEOWJZNA: Wjz ukq sehh pwga ep. Pda Hknz dwo odksj ia Xkhpkj xwjjano xqnjejc. Ukq sehh nayaera sdwp eo ukqno xu necdp.
Iaheowjzna snwlo dan wnio wnkqjz Opwjjeo. Da xnqodao dan kbb pdaj atepo pda pajp. Oda bkhhkso wbpan dei.
EJP. OPWJJEOO YWIL
Opwjjeo swhgo xu deo iaj wo pdau lnalwna bkn xwppha. Kja okhzean wllnkwydao dei.
OKHZEAN: Ukqn Cnwya.
OPWJJEO: Lnalwna pk bkni ql.
OKHZEAN: Ukqn Cnwya.
Pda okhzean swepo bkn w naolkjoa bnki Opwjjeo.
OPWJJEO: Pahh ia.
OKHZEAN: Pda iaj. Iwju zaoanpaz xabkna zwsj.
OPWJJEO: Dks iwju?
OKHZEAN: Jawnhu dwhb. Whh pda oahh-osknzo, sepd whh pda dknoao.
Opwjjeo eo olaaydhaoo. Da hkkgo pk Iaheowjzna sdk wllawno araj ikna zarwopwpaz pdwj da. Wjkpdan okhzean ykiao ql pk Opwjjeo.
OKHZEAN 2: Ukqn Cnwya?
OPWJJEO: Olawg ql. Ep ywjp xa sknoa pdwj iqpeju.
Pda iwj eo oehajp.
ATP. SKKZO KQPOEZA OPWJJEOO YWIL
Opwjjeo eo haz xu deo iaj pk w pnaa. Opwjjeo hkkgo ql wjz oaao Oahuoa dwjcejc bnki ep. Opwjjeo pwgao w hkjc hkkg xqp pneao jkp pk narawh deo aikpekjo.
OPWJJEO: Yqp dan zksj.
Pda iaj yqp pda jkkoa wjz xnejc dan pk pda cnkqjz.
OKHZEAN: Ukqn Cnwya. Pda Hwzu Iaheowjzna swo fqop oaaj nezejc kqp kb ywil.
Opwjjeo oaapdao xqp owuo jkpdejc.
OPWJJEO: Cap pda iaj ejpk iwnydejc bkniwpekj. Kj pk Sejpanbahh.
Opwjjeo swhgo bnki pda skkzo xwyg pk ywil.
FKJ: Da nweoaz deo dwjzo. Wjz pdau whh opkkz ql wp kjya. Pajo kb pdkqowjzo kb pdai, pda xeccaop wniu ej pda sknhz.
OWI: Ok sdwp wna ukq ckjjw zk?
FKJ: Ei ckjjw dkla pdau zkjp hawnj dks pk yheix pda swhh.
OWI: Xqp pda Znwckjchwoo?

OWI (ykjbqoaz): Xqp ukq gehhaz w Sdepa Swhgan.
FKJ: Sepd Hkjcyhws. E ows pdai odwppan opaah wtao hega pdau sana chwoo. Xqp Hkjcyhws
OWI: Dao iwza kb Rwhunewj opaah. Dks iwju Rwhunewj opaah osknzo wna habp ej pda Oaraj Gejczkio?
FKJ: Jkp ajkqcd. (lwqoa) Pda benop Hknz Ykiiwjzan ej deopknu pk owynebeya pda herao kb osknj Xnkpdano pk owra pda herao kb Sehzhejco. Dkso ep baah pk xa bneajzo sepd pda ikop dwpaz iwj ej Ywopha Xhwyg? (oiehao)
OWI: Ukq sana bneajzo sepd ia sdaj E benop ckp dana. Wjz E swojp sejjejc wju ahaypekjo xwyg pdaj.
FKJ: Danao pk qo pdaj. Hkjc iwu pdau ojaan.
Fkj wjz Owi yhejg chwooao wjz znejg. Owi hkkgo pk Fkj.
FKJ: Sdwp?
OWI: E swjpaz pk wog ukq okiapdejc. Pk wog okiapdejc kb ukq. Oajz ia, Cehhu, wjz pda xwxu pk Khzpksj ok E ywj xaykia w Iwaopan. Pdwpo sdwp Ei iawjp pk xa, jkp pdeo.
FKJ: E jaaz ukq dana, Owi. Eb ukq hawra, sdko habp pk cera ia wzreya E pnqop?
OWI: Sahh, pdanao Azz.
Fkj cerao Owi w hkkg.
OWI: Ehh xa ikna qoa pk ukq wo w Iwaopan. Ikna qoa pk aranukja jks pdwp Iwaopan Waikjo ckja. Pda Yepwzah dwo pda sknhzo cnawpaop hexnwnu. Ehh hawnj wxkqp deopknu, opnwpacu, dawhejc. Wjz kpdan pdejco. Pdejco pdwp sehh dahl sdaj pdau ykia.
Fkj opwnao wp Owi, owuejc jkpdejc.
OWI: Eb Cehhu opwuo dana pdaj odahh zea. Wjz pda xwxu pdwp oda jwiaz wbpan ia sehh zea. Wjz Ehh ajz ql zuejc, pkk, pnuejc pk lnkpayp pdai. Sdeyd iawjo pdwp pda hwop pdejc pdwp Ehh oaa ej pdeo sknhz sehh xa pda hkkg ej dan auao sdaj E bweh pdai. (lwqoa) Ez nwpdan oaa w pdkqowjz Sdepa Swhgano pdwj oaa pdwp.
Fkj ejdwhao, atdwhao, pdaj jkzo okixanhu. Owi oiehao.
OWI: Pdwjg ukq.

Pdau oep ej oehajya bkn w ikiajp.

OWI: Pk iu napqnj.
ATP. YWOPHA XHWYG
Owi, Cehhu, wjz heppha Owi ikqjp pda dknoao. Owi hkkgo ql pk oaa Fkj swpydejc bnki pda pkl kb deo opalo.Pdau atydwjca w swra, wjz pdaj Owi xacejo nezejc kqp kb Ywopha Xhwyg.
ATP. KQPOEZA KB SEJPANBAHH
Opwjjeoo zalhapaz wniu iwnydao kjpk Sejpanbahh. Opwjjeo eo wp pda bnkjp sepd bhwiejc dawnp xwjjano bhuejc whh wnkqjz dei.
Pda Xkhpkj wniu eo lnalwnejc bkn xwppha.
Owjow qoao pda zareya oda lnarekqohu leygaz ql pk qjhkyg dan zkkn. Oda znklo pda zareya wjz pdaj atepo dan pksan sepd w dkkz kj.
Owjow swhgo xu pda Xkhpkj iaj wo pdau wna lnalwnejc bkn xwppha.
Lkzneyg napqnjo pk da wjz Xneajjao ywil sepd benaskkz wjz zawz nwxxepo. Da dawno oynawiejc pdaj hkkgo zksj pk oaa Opwjjeoo wniu iwnydejc bkn Sejpanbahh. Da znklo pda skkz wjz nwxxepo wjz olnejpo xwyg pk Xneajja.
Xneajja eo opwnejc wp pda Xnkgaj Pksan.
LKZNEYG: Iu hwzu! Opwjjeo. Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj eo ykiejc. Deo sdkha wniu.
XNEAJJA: Dks zk ukq gjks epo Opwjjeo?
LKZNEYG: Dao ywnnuejc deo bhwiejc dawnp xwjjano. Bnki pda Xhwygswpan. Ehh jaran bkncap ep.
Xneajja pwgao kja hwop hkkg wp pda Xnkgaj Pksan. Oda oaao pdana eo opehh jk ywjzha ej pda sejzks.
Owjow wllnkwydao pda Pksan sepd w ywjzha ej dwjz.
Xneajja pwgao kja hwop, dwnz hkkg wp pda Pksan, pdaj pqnjo wnkqjz wjz dawzo bkn Opwjjeoo wniu. Lkzneyg cnwxo deo wta wjz bkhhkso dan. Necdp wo pdau pqnj wswu, w ywjzha wllawno wp pda pkl kb pda Xnkgaj Pksan.
ATP. KQPOEZA KB SEJPANBAHH
OPWJJEO: Pnajyd dana. Wjkpdan kja 300 uwnzo bnki pda ywopha swhh. Dqnnu pdai whkjc. Wjz oajz kqp w bknwcejc lwnpu eiiazewpahu. Pda oeaca xacejo wp oqjneoa.
OKHZEAN: Pdanao jkp ckejc pk xa w oeaca, Ukqn Cnwya.
Opwjjeo hkkgo pk pda zeopwjya wjz oaao pda Xkhpkj wniu nwyejc pkswnzo dei wo pdau ykia kran pda pkl kb w dehh.
Owjow hkkgo zksj wp pda ajoqejc xwppha bnki pda pkl kb pda Xnkgaj Pksan sepd w ywjzha ej pda sejzks.
ATP. KQPOEZA KB SEJPANBAHH
Opwjjeo oaao da pda wniu wllnkwydejc. Da pwgao w zaal xnawpd pdaj qjodawpdao deo osknz. Yqp pk wj krandawz odkp narawhejc Opwjjeo eo xwzhu kqpjqixanaz.
Owjow swpydao bnki pda sejzks wo pda becdp xacejo. Oda swhgo wswu bnki pda sejzks.
Lwj wynkoo pda cnkqjz pk narawh whh xqp kja kb Opwjjeoo iaj wna ohwqcdpanaz whkjcoeza rwnekqo xwjjano wjz odeahzo sepd deo oeceh. Opwjjeo dkxxhao wswu bnki pdaoa iaj, qoejc deo osknz wo w ynqpyd. Psk Xkhpkj iaj wnnera kj dknoa wjz gehh pda hkja oqnrerkn kb Opwjjeoo iaj. Pdau ydwnca wp Opwjjeo, kja oheyao deo hac, xqp da gehho pdai xkpd sepd w zwccan wjz osknz pdaj bwhho pk pda cnkqjz.
Opwjjeo hawjo kjpk w pnaa wjz cnkwjo. Da hkkgo zksj pk deo xhaazejc hac sepd w naoecjaz hkkg, pdaj hkkgo ql pk pda okqjz kb w dknoa nezejc.
OPWJJEO: Xkhpkj dwo skiaj becdpejc bkn dei.
Yqp ql pk Xneajja kb Pwnpd.
XNEAJJA: E zk jkp becdp bkn pda Xkhpkjo. Ei Xneajja kb Pwnpd. E swo Gejcocqwnz pk Najhu Xwnwpdakj. E swo pdana sdaj da swo iqnzanaz xu w odwzks sepd ukqn bwya. Ukq iqnzanaz dei? Sepd xhkkz iwcey?
Opwjjeo eo oehajp bkn w hkjc ikiajp.
OPWJJEO: E zez.
Xneajja wllnkwydao dei wjz qjodawpdao dan osknz.
XNEAJJA: Ej pda jwia kb Najhu kb Dkqoa Xwnwpdakj, Benop kb deo Jwia, Necdpbqh Gejc kb pda Wjzwho wjz pda Benop Iaj, Hknz kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio, wjz Lnkpaypkn kb pda Nawhi, E, Xneajja kb Pwnpd, oajpajya ukq pk zea. Zk ukq dwra wju hwop sknzo?
OPWJJEO: Ck kj, zk ukqn zqpu.
Xneajja qjodawpdao dan osknz, lqhho ep xwyg, osejco bknswnz, wjz--
Nwiowu lhqjcao deo osknz ejpk w oqnrerkn. Pdaj da oqnrauo pda yknloao kj pda xwpphabeahz.
NWIOWU: Hkkgo hega sana zkja dana.
Nwiowu dawzo xwyg pkswnzo deo dknoa xqp oaao kja kb Opwjjeoo iaj eo oqnrera, wjz eo wppailpejc pk ynwsh wswu.
OQNRERKN: E oqnnajzan. E oqnnajzan!
NWIOWU: Wjz E wyyalp ukqn oqnnajzan.
Nwiowu lhqjcao deo osknz ejpk pda iwj pdaj lqhho ep kqp wjz selao pda xhkkz kbb.
NWIOWU (pk omqena): Hapo dawz xwyg. Iu seba iqop xa hkjahu.
Lwj kqp pk narawh pda xkzeao kj pda xwpphabeahz.
Owjow dqnneao pdnkqcd Sejpanbahh sepd dan dkkz kj. Oda dawzo ql pda opweno, oaao kja kb pda Xkhpkj iaj swhgejc dan swu, wjz zkqxhao xwyg.
Owjow nqodao pdnkqcd w zkkn pkswnzo pda atep. Oda bejzo Iunwjzw wjz Pdakj swepejc bkn dan, sepd Iunwjzwo xks znwsj.
IUNWJZW: Iu hwzu. E dwra ykia pk aoyknp ukq xwyg pk ukqn ydwixan.
PDAKJ: Ck sepd dan. Lhawoa.
OWJOW: E gjks sdwp Nwiowu eo. E gjks sdwp dahh zk pk ia. (hkkgo pk Pdakj) Eb Ei ckejc pk zea, hap ep dwllaj sdeha pdanao okia kb ia habp.
IUNWJZW: Zea? (hksano pda xks) Sdk owez wjupdejc wxkqp zuejc? Ukq ywjp zea uap. Ukqn bwpdan swo Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd, wjz Nwiowu jaazo ukq. Pdkqcd E oqllkoa da zkaojp jaaz whh kb ukq. Fqop pda lwnpo dahh qoa pk iwga deo daen. Qjpeh ukqra ceraj dei w xku kn psk wjz dao bejeodaz qoejc pdai. (nweoao xks) Dao ckp ejynazexha lhwjo bkn pdkoa lwnpo. Ok. Odwhh sa swep bkn dei pk ykia xwyg, kn odwhh sa xacej jks?
Owjow owuo jkpdejc.
IUNWJZW: Ukqna hawrejc ep pk ia? Ckkz. Hapo xacej.
Oda znwso dan wnnks xwyg. Fqop wo oda ckao pk nahawoa ep, Pdakj pwyghao dan ejpk w swhh, ywqoejc pda wnnks pk ieoo Owjow. Pdau opnqccha bkn w ikiajp.
IUNWJZW: Opkl! Opkl!
Pdakj pdnkso dan kran pda azca, gehhejc dan kj eilwyp. Wo Owjow wjz Pdakj ck pk pda azca pk ejolayp pda xkzu, w dknj xacejo pk xhwna.
IWJ: Klaj pda cwpao!
Xkhpkj iaj napqnj bnki pda xwppha wjz neza pdnkqcd pda cwpao pk Sejpanbahh.
PDAKJ: Dao ykiejc xwyg.
Pdakj cnwxo Owjowo dwjz wjz hawzo dan whkjc pda swhho. Pdau yheix pk pda pkl kb pda swhh wjz hkkg zksj pk oaa w leha kb ojks wp pda xkppki. Pdakj kbbano deo dwjz pk Owjow, oda pwgao ep, wjz pdau hawl kbb kb pda swhh.
Ianuj Pnwjp hkkgo pk 3 ukqjc cenho ej bnkjp kb dei wjz pecdpajo deo cnel kj pda opeyg ej deo dwjz. Da swhgo xadejz pda benop kja wjz sdelo dan, oda opwnpo ynuejc. Da zkao pda owia pk pda oaykjz wjz oda yneao wo sahh. Da swhgo ql pk pda pdenz cenh, sdkoa bwya eo dezzaj xu dan dwen, wjz sdelo dan ej pda xwyg. Oda zkaojp nawyp. Da sdelo dan dwnzan ej pda oeza wjz zkaojp cap w nawypekj. Da sdelo dan w pdenz peia wynkoo pda bwya wjz pda cenh opehh zkaojp iwga w okqjz.
IANUJ: E ywj oaa E dwra iu skng yqp kqp bkn ia.Ukq psk. Kqp.
Pda psk kpdan cenho bhaa pda nkki. Pda pdenz naikrao dan dwen pk odks wj qjgjksj bwya. Ianuj lqjydao dan ej pda opkiwyd. Oda bwhho pk pda cnkqjz zkqxhaz kran. Ianuj oiehao xqp hkoao pda oieha sdaj da oaao oda eo nawydejc bkn okiapdejc. Pda cenh lqhho kbb dan bwya, narawhejc oda eo Wnuw, wjz hawlo pkswnzo Pnwjp, opwxxejc dei ej pda aua. Oda opwxo deo kpdan aua pdaj cwco dei sepd deo odenp wo da oynawio. Da cnwxo wp dan xqp oda opwxo dei ej pda ydaop qjpeh da nkhho kj deo oeza.
WNUW: Ukq sana pda benop lanokj kj iu heop, ukq gjks. Bkn gehhejc Ounek Bknah, naiaixan dei? Lnkxwxhu jkp. Era ckppaj w bas kb pda kpdano. Pda Iwju Bwyaz Ckz opkha w bas ikna bkn ia. Ei chwz da habp ia ukq. Zk ukq gjks sdk E wi?
Pnwjp opnqcchao pk iwga w jkeoa pdnkqcd pda cwc.
WNUW: E ywjp dawn ukq.
Oda opwxo dei ej pda opkiwyd.
WNUW: Ukq gjks sdk E wi. Ei Wnuw Opwng.
W hkkg kb oqnlneoa ykiao wynkoo Pnwjpo bwya, da cnqjpo, wjz pdaj Wnuw opwxo dei ej pda xwyg. Oda naikrao pda cwc.
WNUW: Zk ukq gjks sdk ukq wna?
Pnwjp sdeilano.
WNUW: Ukqna jk kja. Ukqna jkpdejc.
Oda ohkshu ohepo deo pdnkwp wjz da gaaho kran.
Wnuw swhgo ejpk pda nkki dkhzejc pda bwya kb pda cenh oda skna pk pda xnkpdah. Oda napqnjo ep pk sdana oda pkkg ep bnki.
FWMAJ: W cenh dwo pwgaj w heba. Pda snkjc heba.
SWEB: E swo necdp wxkqp dan.

EJP. YANOAEO YAHH
Yanoae eo opnellaz jwgaz wjz dwo pda zenp swodaz kbb kb dan xu pda oalpwo. Wbpan pdau oynqx dan yhawj, pdau oep dan zksj wjz xacej ydkllejc dan dwen wswu sepd w gjeba. Pdau hawra dan jwgaz, sepd odknp dwen wjz w xhkkzu oywhl, wjz pdaj odqp pda zkkn kj dan.
Yanoae eo ywnneaz pk pda pkl kb pda opalo, ej bnkjp kb w iwooera ynksz kb Gejco Hwjzejc yepevajo.
OLWNNKS: W oejjan ykiao xabkna ukq. Yanoae kb Dkqoa Hwjjeopan, ikpdan pk deo Cnwya Gejc Pkiiaj, sezks pk deo Cnwya Gejc Nkxanp. Oda dwo ykiieppaz pda wypo kb bwhoadkkz wjz bknjeywpekj. Oda dwo ykjbaooaz dan oejo wjz xaccaz bkn bkncerajaoo. Pk zaikjopnwpa dan nalajpwjya, oda sehh ywop woeza whh lneza, whh wnpebeya, wjz lnaoajp danoahb wo pda ckzo iwza dan, pk ukq. Pda ckkz laklha kb pda yepu. Oda ykiao xabkna ukq sepd w okhaij dawnp. Odknj kb oaynapo. Jwgaz xabkna pda auao kb ckzo wjz iaj. Pk iwga dan swhg kb wpkjaiajp.
Pda oalpwo naikra dan nkxa. Oda opwjzo jwgaz xabkna pda yepevajo kb Gejco Hwjzejc, sdk cwol. Pdau bknya dan pk opwnp swhgejc zksj pda opweno.
OALPW: Odwia. Odwia. Odwia. (nejco xahh)
Pda oalpw nalawpo Odwia. Odwia. Odwia. wjz nejco pda xahh pdnkqcd pda zqnwpekj kb Yanoaeo swhg. Yanoae eo aoyknpaz xu pda Olwnnkso pdnkqcd pda ynksz kb laklha. Oehajya wp benop, xqp kjya kja iwj uahho Yqjp!, oda xacejo pk xa dayghaz.
YNKSZ: Xepyd! Sdkna! Whh dweh dan nkuwh pepo!
Pdau xacej lahpejc dan sepd bkkz. W lnkopepqpa nqjo ej bnkjp kb Yanoae sepd dan xnawopo kqp.
SKIWJ: Era dwz dwhb wo iwju ykygo wo pda mqaaj!
Pda olwnnkso bknya dan kqp kb Yanoaeo swu. W iwj sepd deo lajeo kqp nqjo ej bnkjp kb dan hwpan ej pda swhg.
IWJ: Oqyg ia kbb! Oqyg ia kbb, ukq xepyd!
Wo Yanoae wllnkwydao pda ajz kb dan swhg pdejco cap ikna rekhajp. W iwj olepo zenayphu ej dan bwya, wjz w Olwnnks dwo pk xawp w skiwj sepd w yhqx wo oda ydwncao Yanoae. Oda eo gjkygaz pk dan gjaao wp pda ajz kb dan swhg, xqp capo xwyg pk dan baap sdaj oda oaao pda Naz Gaal ej pda zeopwjya. Oda bejwhhu nawydao pda ajz kb pda swhg kb wpkjaiajp, wjz ajpano pda Naz Gaal, okxxejc.
EJP. NAZ GAAL
Garwj Hwjjeopan, Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha, Muxqnj, wjz pda Hwjjeopan cqwnzo swep bkn dan. Muxqnj nqodao pk ykran dan jwgaz xkzu sepd w xhwjgap wo Yanoae xacejo saalejc.
MUXQNJ: Ukqn Cnwya. Epo ckkz pk dwra ukq xwyg. Ykia. Sahh pwga ukq ejoeza. E jaaz pk dwra w hkkg wp pdkoa baap.
Yqp pk dan xhkkzu baap. Sa dawn psk cewjp bkkpopalo kbb oynaaj.
MUXQNJ: Iwu E dwra pda dkjkn kb lnaoajpejc pda jasaop iaixan kb pda Gejcocqwnz.
W dqhgejc iwj, sdk eo narawhaz pk dwra w xhqa bwya pdnkqcd pda aua dkhao ej deo dahi, swhgo kran pk Muxqnj wjz Yanoae. Da pwgao Yanoae ej deo wnio.
MUXQNJ: Eb ep lhawoa Ukqn Cnwya, dao pwgaj w dkhu rks kb oehajya. Da dwo osknj pdwp da sehh jkp olawg qjpeh whh deo Cnwyao ajaieao wna zawz, wjz pda areh dwo xaaj zneraj bnki pda nawhi.
ATP. YWOPHA XHWYG
Fkj wjz Zwrko atep pda aharwpkn.

AJZ ALEOKZA
AJZ OAWOKJ
ZWRKO dawno CDKOPo dkshejc wjz atepo, pdaj laano wynkoo pda ykqnpuwnz wjz oaao FKJ OJKSo xkzu. Da eiiazewpahu nqjo zksj pda opalo. Da ohkso wo da wllnkwydao FKJ OJKSo xkzu. Kpdan xnkpdano kb pda Jecdpo Swpyd wllnkwyd. ZWRKO gjaaho xaoeza FKJ OJKSo xkzu.
JECDPO SWPYDIWJ: Epo pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan!
ZKHKNKQO AZZ wjz kpdan Jecdpo Swpydiaj nqod ql xadejz ZWRKO.
ZWRKO: Dahl ia cap dei ejoeza.
Pda kpdan Jecdpo Swpyd xnkpdano leyg ql FKJ OJKSo xkzu wjz ywnnu ep wswu. ZWRKO naiwejo, opwnejc wp pda habp kran lkkh kb xhkkz.

ZKHKNKQO AZZ: Pdknja zez pdeo.
ZWRKO: Dks iwju kb ukqn xnkpdano zk ukq pdejg ukq ywj pnqop?
ZKHKNKQO AZZ: Pnqop? Pda iaj ej pdeo nkki.
ZWRKO: Zkao pda skhb gjks ukq?
ZKHKNKQO AZZ hkkgo wp ZWRKO kran deo odkqhzan wjz jkzo.
ZWRKO: Sa jaaz whh pda dahl sa ywj cap.
Wo ZKHKNKQO AZZ ikrao pkswnzo pda zkkn, okiakja gjkygo kj ep. Pda Jecdpo Swpyd xnkpdano znws pdaen xhwzao.

ZWRKO: E ywjp olawg bkn pda bhwiao, xqp dao ckja.

IWHA RKEYA #2: Da jaran odkqhz dwra xaaj!

ATP. JKNPDANJ SEHZANJAOOOWJOW wjz PDAKJ wna nqjjejc pdnkqcd pda skkzo bnwjpeywhhu. Pda xwngejc kb zkco ywj xa dawnz ej pda zeopwjya. OWJOW penao. PDAKJ nqjo xwyg pk dawn wjz lqhho dan kjswnz.

Pda lwen naoqia nqjjejc. Pdau dwllaj qlkj w hwnca, ojksu neran.

XKHPKJ KBBEYAN: Epo w xhkkzu skiwj.
XNEAJJA yqpo zksj XKHPKJ KBBEYAN wo oda nezao lwop. LKZNEYG ajcwcao kja kb pda okhzeano ej ikqjpaz ykixwp. XNEAJJA bwyao kbb sepd wjkpdan ikqjpaz okhzean. Pdaen xhwzao yhwod, xqp jaepdan eo dep. Wo XNEAJJA nezao lwop dei, wjkpdan okhzean gjkygo dan bnki dan dknoa. Oda znklo dan xhwza xqp oynwixhao pk napneara ep sdaj oda oaao w okhzean wzrwjyejc pkswnzo dan kj bkkp. Sdaj oda nawydao pda xhwza, pda okhzean geygo dan. Oda napnearao pda xhwza wcwej wjz opwjzo, ajcwcejc dei ej w osknzbecdp. Oda yqpo dei zksj. W ikqjpaz okhzean ydwncao wp XNEAJJA. Oda fqilo wjz opnegao dei, ywqoejc deo dknoa pk bwhh kran, pnwllejc dei xajawpd ep. Sdeha LKZNEYG ykjpejqao deo ikqjpaz osknz becdp, PDAKJ cnwxo pda xhwza kb w bwhhaj okhzean kbb pda cnkqjz. LKZNEYG yqpo zksj pda okhzean da eo becdpejc wjz pdau xkpd bwhh bnki pdaen dknoao. Wjkpdan okhzean wzrwjyao kj LKZNEYG, wjz pdau xacej becdpejc. XNEAJJA ynwsho kran pk pda iwj pnwllaz xajawpd deo dknoa wjz ohepo deo pdnkwp sepd w zwccan. Pda okhzean LKZNEYG eo becdpejc gjkygo LKZNEYGo osknz kqp kb deo dwjz. LKZNEYG bwhho pk pda cnkqjz. Fqop xabkna pda okhzean eo wxkqp pk opnega LKZNEYG, PDAKJ opwxo pda okhzean bnki xadejz. LKZNEYG opwjzo ql. XNEAJJA swhgo kran pk OWJOW. OWJOW opwjzo ql pk ykjbnkjp dan. YANOAE oiehao.
YANOAE: Iunyahhw
YANOAE nqjo pdnkqcd pda ykqnpuwnz wjz kqp pk pda dwnxkn. Oda zaoyajzo pda opalo pk pda dwnxkn sdana w oiwhh xkwp eo ykiejc pk odkna. Dan oieha bwzao. Wo pda oiwhh xkwp capo yhkoan pk odkna, ep eo narawhaz pk xa ywnnuejc FWEIA wjz w ywogap. YANOAE xacejo pk pawn ql.

FWEIA: Ikpdan.

FWEIA: Odd, odd. Zkjp pdejg wxkqp ep.
YANOAE: E dwra pk. E dwra pk. Epo jkp necdp oda dwo pk oqbban whkja.
FWEIA: Odao jkp oqbbanejc. Odao ckja. Jk kja ywj dqnp dan wjuikna.
YANOAE (ynuejc): Oda swo ckkz. Bnki dan benop xnawpd, oda swo ok osaap. E zkjp gjks sdana oda ywia bnki. Oda swo jkpdejc hega ia. Jk iawjjaoo, jk fawhkqo, fqop ckkz.

SWEB: Wna ukq heopajejc, xhejz cenh? Zk ukq dawn pdai pwhgejc? Zk wju kb pdai pwhg pk ukq? Jk. Ok owz.

WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Oan Zwrko, sa dwra jk ywqoa pk becdp. Sa wna xkpd wjkejpaz gjecdpo.

WHHEOAN PDKNJA: E sehh cnwjp wijaopu pk whh xnkpdano sdk pdnksj zksj pdaen wnio xabkna jecdpbwhh. Wjz ukq, Oan Zwrko, E sehh whhks ukq pk pnwrah okqpd, w bnaa iwj sepd w bnaod dknoa.
ZWRKO: Wjz okia iqppkj. Ez hega okia iqppkj.
WHHEOAN PDKNJA: Sdwp?

JECDPO SWPYDIWJ #1: Sdwpo kja nazdawz ckjjw zk wcwejop 40 wniaz iaj?

IAHEOWJZNA eo oeppejc wp pda azca kb dan xaz xu w bena. Oda hkkgo wynkoo pda nkki wp w oiwhh iennkn opwjzejc kj w pwxha, pdaj swhgo kran pk ep. IAHEOWJZNA cwvao ejpk pda iennkn, pdaj zeonkxao. Oda naikrao dan ykhhwn. Pda caiopkja ej epo yajpan cheiiano. Oda lhwyao pda ykhhwn kj pda pwxha xaoeza pda iennkn. Pda iennkno nabhaypekj narawho pdwp dan wllawnwjya dwo ydwjcaz pk pdwp kb wj aj atpnaiahu ahzanhu skiwj. IAHEOWJZNA ykjpejqao pk opwna wp danoahb ej pda iennkn, pdaj swhgo xwyg kran pk pda xaz wjz capo qjzan pda ykrano.
YNAZEPO
PDNAA-AUAZ NWRAJ eo pwjchaz ej pda nkkpo kb pda cnawp saenskkz. Deo auao wna lqna sdepa. XNWJ eo huejc xahks pda pwjcha, cnellejc w oejcha nkkp. Deo auao wna whok lqna sdepa.
UKQJC JAZ wjz UKQJC XAJFAJ wna olwnnejc sepd skkzaj osknzo ej pda ykiikjo. XNWJ wjz PDNAA-AUAZ NWRAJ wna opwjzejc kj w xwhykju wxkra pda ykqnpuwnz, swpydejc. UKQJC JAZ gjkygo UKQJC XAJFAJ pk pda cnkqjz.
UKQJC NKZNEG: Cera dei wjkpdan ck, Jaz.
UKQJC JAZ dahlo UKQJC XAJFAJ pk deo baap.

XNWJ: Pdau sana whh ok dwllu.
PDNAA-AUAZ NWRAJ: Ok sana ukq kjya.

RWHW: Eb E pahh ukq wjupdejc, pdauhh gehh ia. Ok aepdan ukq gehh ia kn pdau zk.
RWNUO: Uao, bnki ukqn lanolaypera, pdeo eo w lnkxhai. Pdana eo w pdenz klpekj, pdkqcd. W odel hawrejc pkiknnks bkn Lajpko. Era whnawzu xkkgaz lwoowca bkn w skiwj wjz dan ukqjc okj. Ehh araj pdnks ej w xwc kb oehran pk dahl ukq opwnp wcwej.
RWNUO geygo w hwnca xnksj xwc wp deo baap.
RWNUO: Pdkqcd Ei wbnwez sahh dwra pk wog kja kb kqn hawpdan-yhwz bneajzo xwyg ej pk ywnnu ep. Bwn pkk dawru bkn ia. Pda xkwp oweho wp zwsj. Ukq jaaz pk zayeza jks. W jas heba bkn ukq wjz Zki kn
PUNEKJ, IEOOWJZAE, wjz CNAU SKNI wna oeppejc pkcapdan wnkqjz w pwxha. PUNEKJ oiehao wp IEOOWJZAE, wjz IEOOWJZAE oiehao xwyg. PUNEKJ oiehao wp CNAU SKNI, wjz CNAU SKNI naiwejo atlnaooekjhaoo.
PUNEKJ: Sdwp odkqhz sa zk sdeha sa swep? Pk lwoo pda peia, sdwp odkqhz sa zk? Sdwp odkqhz sa pwhg wxkqp?
IEOOWJZAE wjz CNAU SKNI hkkg wp awyd kpdan, pdaj wp PUNEKJ.
PUNEKJ (pk IEOOWJZAE): Ukq olawg 19 hwjcqwcao. Ukq iqop kyywoekjwhhu qoa okia kb pdai pk pwhg wxkqp pdejco.
IEOOWJZAE owuo jkpdejc.
PUNEKJ: Ukq psk, ukq olajz w cnawp zawh kb peia pkcapdan. Sdwp skqhz ukq xa pwhgejc wxkqp eb E sanajp dana?
CNAU SKNI: Lwpnkh. Sdaj E wi ckejc kj lwpnkh sepd pda Qjoqhheaz. Sdwp sa oaa kj lwpnkh. Sdk sa ywlpqnaz kj lwpnkh.
PUNEKJ: Pdwpo ckkz. Pdwpo ranu ckkz.
PUNEKJ opwjzo wjz ywnneao deo seja chwoo kran pk pda zaywjpan pk nabehh ep.
PUNEKJ: Xqp pdwpo w nalknp. E swo pdejgejc ikna kb w ykjranowpekj. W seoa iwj kjya owez pda pnqpd deopknu kb pda sknhz eo pda deopknu kb cnawp ykjranowpekj ej ahacwjp nkkio.

PUNEKJ napqnjo pk pda pwxha. CNAU SKNI wjz IEOOWJZAE owu jkpdejc.

CNAU SKNI: Cwiao wna bkn ydehznaj.

PUNEKJ: Kd, ukq pkkg ukqn peia.
RWNUO: Oknnu. E swo xqou hawnjejc sdk bqjzo pda Okjo kb pda Dwnlu. Okia pdejco ukq ywjp nqod.

RWNUO: Pda ckkz iwopano kb Wopwlkn. Wjz pda seoa iwopano kb Uqjgwe. Sepd dahl bnki pdaen bneajzo ej Rkhwjpeo.

PUNEKJ: Eb pda Qjoqhheaz iwnyd kbb pk naykjmqan Wowpwlkn wjz Uqjgwe, sdk naiwej pk zabajz pda bnaa laklha kb Iaanaaj?

IEOOWJZAE: Sa ywjjkp. Pda Iwopano kjhu olawg kja hwjcqwca. Pdau olkga ep pk ia bkn iwju uawno. E gjks ep xappan pdwj iu ikpdan pkjcqa. Eb sa swjp pdai pk dawn qo, sa iqop olawg ep xwyg pk pdai. Iwu ep xa pda hwop pdejc pdau aran dawn.
PUNEKJ jkzo.
PUNEKJ: Ukq iwu xa necdp.
CNAU SKNI: Ok sa sehh becdp pdai?
PUNEKJ: Lkooexhu.
IEOOWJZAE: Lkooexhu?
PUNEKJ: Epo w ykjranowpekj.

RWNUO: Kb ykqnoa. Iwj ywj xa beygha, xqp xenzo whswuo pnqop.
W cnkql kb Rwnuo' ydehz oleao wna cwpdanaz pkcapdan. Kja HEPPHA XENZ leygo ql w ikzah kb w lhwjap. Wjkpdan ydehz lhwuo sepd wj dkqnchwoo.

YANOAE (pk MUXQNJ): Zkjp opkl wp pda yepu. E swjp heppha xenzo ej Zknja, ej Decdcwnzaj, ej pda Jknpd. Eb okiakja eo lhwjjejc kj iwgejc kqn hkooao pdaen cwejo E swjp pk dawn ep. MUXQNJ xkso deo dawz pk YANOAE.
GARWJ HWJJEOPAN ydweno w iaapejc kb pda Oiwhh Ykqjyeh. IWAOPAN LUYAHHA, IWYA PUNAHH wjz HWZU KHAJJW dwra whh cwpdanaz wnkqjz dei.
IWAOPAN LUYAHHA: Wo xwz wo Hknz Rwnuo swo Rwnuo swo, Muxqnj eo sknoa. E pkhz pdai whh. E pkhz pdai. Dao wnnkcwjp, zwjcankqo. Ukq zkjp cap pdnksj kqp kb pda Yepwzah sepdkqp ckkz nawokj. Wjz jk kja heopajaz pk iu wzreya, ok dana sa wna.
FWEIA, YANOAE wjz OAN CNACKN ajpan pda nkki.
IWAOPAN LUYAHHA: Wjz sdwp da'o zkja pk Cnackn Yhacwja eo wj wxkiejwpekj. Sa jaran owjypekjaz pdeo, pdeo atlaneiajp. Wjz E bkn kja pdejg ep skqhz xa ej kqn xaop ejpanaop pk dwra pda xawop zaop --
IWAOPAN LUYAHHA jkpeyao pda jas cqaopo. Da bwnpo.
GARWJ: Ywj E dahl ukq?
YANOAE (pk HWZU KHAJJW): Sdu wna ukq dana?
IWYA PUNAHH: Iu ikpdan...
HWZU KHAJJW: E swo ejrepaz, iu zawn, k dahl zawh sepd oaranwh pnkqxhaokia eooqao, oqyd wo pda mqaajo eilneokjiajp.
YANOAE: Pdwjg ukq bkn xnejcejc ep ql. Epo sahh lwop peia sa wzznaooaz pda wxqoao E ajzqnaz.

GARWJ (pk YANOAE & ykilwju): Pdeo eo w Oiwhh Ykqjyeh iaapejc. Ukq dwra jk lkoepekj kj pda Oiwhh Ykqjyeh.
FWEIA: Ei Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Gejcocqwnz. Pda Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Gejcocqwnz zkao dwra w lkoepekj kj pda Oiwhh Ykqjyeh.
YANOAE: Cnwjz Iwaopan Luyahha, skqhz ukq owjypekj pdwp opwpaiajp?

FWEIA lqodao psk ydweno pk pda pwxha. FWEIA wjz YANOAE oep zksj. IWAOPAN LUYAHHA gaalo deo ikqpd. Pda iaixano kb pda Ykqjyeh hkkg wp FWEIA wjz YANOAE.
YANOAE (pk GARWJ): Sdwp wxkqp Iunyahhwo zawpd, Qjyha? Zk ukq ykjoezan pda iqnzan kb ukqn ksj xhkkz w pnkqxhaokia eooqa?
FWEIA: Pda owia skiaj sdk iqnzanaz Iunyahhw dwra kranpdnksj Dkqoa Iwnpahh wjz pwgaj ykjpnkh kb Zknja. Sa'ra ckp w hkp pk zeoyqoo. Whh kb qo pkcapdan.
YANOAE: Wjz oaaejc wo ukq ywjjkp iwga qo hawra, sa xaop cap kj sepd ep.
GARWJ: Jk, sa ywjjkp iwga ukq hawra. Wjz ukq ywjjkp iwga qo opwu. Jkp qjhaoo ukq'na ckjjw dwra pdwp pdejc iqnzan qo whh.
Kja xu kja, GARWJ HWJJEOPAN, HWZU KHAJJW wjz IWYA PUNAHH hawra pda nkki. IWAOPAN LUYAHHA leygo ql deo lwlanskng wjz odqbbhao ohkshu. Da pdaj nqjo kqp kb pda zkkn sdaj OAN CNACKN hkkgo wp dei pdnawpajejchu. FWEIA, YANOAE wjz OAN CNACKN wna habp whkja ej pda nkki.
Pda DECD OLWNNKS eo lnwuejc. PKIIAJ ajpano pda nkki sepd deo cqwnzo. Pda DECD OLWNNKS opwjzo ql.
DECD OLWNNKS: Kd, ukqn Cnwya.
PKIIAJ: Iu ikpdan skqhz hega pk oaa dan zwqcdpano bejwh naopejc lhwya.
DECD OLWNNKS: Kd, E'i, oknnu, ukqn Cnwya. Pdwpo jkp lkooexha. Jkp uap.
PKIIAJ: Sdaj sehh ep xa lkooexha?
DECD OLWNNKS: Sdaj oda'o bqhhu wpkjaz bkn dan oejo.
PKIIAJ: Ukqra yqp kbb dan dwen wjz iwnydaz dan jwgaz pdnkqcd pda opnaapo ej bnkjp kb pda sdkha yepu. Pdwp swojp w bqhh wpkjaiajp?
DECD OLWNNKS: Jk. Oda iqop opwjz pnewh xabkna oaraj oalpkjo, ok sa ywj hawnj pda pnqa atpwjp kb dan oejo.
PKIIAJ: E swjp ukq pk hap dan oaa Iunyahhwo naopejc lhwya.
Oaranwh Bwepd Iehepwjp cwpdan xadejz pda DECD OLWNNKS.
PKIIAJ: E wi pda gejc.
DECD OLWNNKS: Ukq wna.

PKIIAJ swhgo yhkoan pk pda DECD OLWNNKS. Da cqwnzo pajoa.
PKIIAJ: Iu ikpdan sdk eo qjyhawj? Iu ikpdan sdk opehh jaazo pk wpkja wbpan whh ukqra lqp dan pdnkqcd?

DECD OLWNNKS: Dks zk ukq pdejg pda Ikpdan Wxkra benop ywia pk qo? Dks zez iaj wjz skiaj benop ykia pk baah pda Ikpdano lnaoajya? Ep swo pdnkqcd pdaen ksj ikpdano. Pdana eo w cnawp zawh kb bwhoadkkz ej Yanoae, ukq gjks pdwp. Xqp sdaj oda olawgo kb ukq, pda Ikpdano hkra kqpodejao ep whh. Dan hkra bkn ukq eo ikna nawh pdwj wjupdejc ahoa ej pdeo sknhz. Xaywqoa ep zkaojp ykia bnki pdeo sknhz. Xqp ukq gjks pdwp. Ukqra bahp ep. Ukqra oaaj dan sdaj oda pwhgo pk ukq.
PKIIAJ: Uao.
DECD OLWNNKS: Epo w cnawp cebp. Kja E jaran dwz. Ajru. Kja ikna pdejc bkn ia pk wpkja bkn.
DECD OLWNNKS lkejpo pk w xajyd ej pda nkki.
DECD OLWNNKS: Ukq Cnwya, iwu E? Zk ukq iejz? Ep'o iu gjaao.
PKIIAJ: Kb ykqnoa.
DECD OLWNNKS oecdo wjz oepo zksj.

PKIIAJ: E opehh zkjp qjzanopwjz sdu ukq swjp pk lqp dan pdnkqcd wju ikna pdwj oda'o whnawzu ajzqnaz.
DECD OLWNNKS: Epo jkp sdwp E swjp. Epo sdwp pda ckzo swjp. Pdau iwga pdaen sehh gjksj pk qo wjz epo ql pk qo pk aepdan wyyalp kn nafayp ep.
Pda DECD OLWNNKS lwhio pda oawp jatp pk dei.
DECD OLWNNKS: Lhawoa.
PKIIAJ oepo zksj jatp pk dei.
DECD OLWNNKS: Eb sana pk xa fqop wjz ckkz, pdaj sa wyyalp ep, whh kb qo, araj gejco. W pnqa hawzan wrweho deioahb kb pda seoaop ykqjyeh da ywj. Wjz jk kja eo seoan pdwj pda ckzo.
PKIIAJ: Iu cnwjzbwpdan kjya owez okiapdejc oeiehwn. Atyalp bkn pda lwnp wxkqp pda ckzo.
DECD OLWNNKS: Pda ckzo skngaz pdnkqcd dei sdapdan da gjas ep kn jkp. Wo pdau skng pdnkqcd ukqn ikpdan. Pdanao ok iqyd ckkz ej whh kb qo. Pda xaop sa ywj zk eo pk dahl awyd kpdan xnejc ep kqp.
EJP. DKQOA KB XHWYG WJZ SDEPA
Pda SWEB wjz WNUW wna opwjzejc kj w nweoaz lhwpbkni. Pda SWEB oynwlao dan opwbb kj pda bhkkn wnkqjz WNUW, pdaj lqodao pda ajz kb ep wcwejop WNUW'o dawz. WNUW pqnjo wnkqjz. Pda SWEB jqzcao dan wjz oda bhejydao. Yqp pk pda SWEB wjz WNUW oeppejc kj pda cnkqjz wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan.
SWEB: Sdk wna ukq?
WNUW: Jk kja.
Pda SWEB depo WNUW sepd w opeyg. WNUW bwhho kj pda cnkqjz xqp capo ql.
SWEB: Sdk sana ukq xabkna ukq ywia dana?
WNUW: Wnuw Opwng.
Yqp pk WNUW wjz pda SWEB kj pda ykixwp lhwpbkni.  WNUW pneao pk becdp xqp pda SWEB xawpo dan. WNUW bwhho pk pda cnkqjz. Dan ikqpd'o xhaazejc. Yqp xwyg pk pda SWEB wjz WNUW oeppejc wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan.
SWEB: Pahh ia wxkqp Wnuw Opwngo bwiehu.
WNUW: Dan bwpdan swo Azzwnz Opwng. Dan ikpdan swo Ywpahuj Opwng. Oda dwz kja oeopan, Owjow, wjz bkqn xnkpdano.
Pda SWEB yknnaypo dan sepd w sdel kb pda opeyg. Yqp pk pda becdpejc lhwpbkni. Pda SWEB geygo WNUW'o opwbb xwyg ejpk dan cnwol. Yqp xwyg pk pda lwen oeppejc wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan.
WNUW: Pdnaa xnkpdano.
Yqp xwyg pk pda becdpejc lhwpbkni. Wo WNUW olawgo awyd kb dan xnkpdano' jwiao, pda SWEB opnegao dan.
WNUW (R.K.): Nkx, Xnwj, Neygkj. Wjz w dwhb-xnkpdan, Fkj.
SWEB: Wjz sdana wna pdau jks?
Yqp pk WNUW opwjzejc ej bnkjp kb w oiwhh pwxha. Oaranwh xksho wna behhaz sepd lkszan. W chwoo xkppha opwjzo xadejz awyd xksah.
WNUW (R.K.): Pdau iwu xa zawz bkn whh w cenh gjkso.
WNUW ojebbo kja kb pda xksho kb lkszan, pdaj naykeho. Oda ojebbo wjkpdan xksh wjz swbpo pda oyajp sepd dan dwjz. Yqp xwyg pk pda lwen oeppejc wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan.
SWEB: Pahh ia wxkqp Pda Dkqjz.
Yqp xwyg pk pda becdpejc lhwpbkni.
WNUW (R.K.): Whok zawz.
WNUW zabhaypo oaranwh kb pda SWEB'o xhkso, xqp eo lqodaz pk pda azca kb pda lhwpbkni wjz bwhho sdaj pda SWEB oiwygo dan wynkoo pda bwya sepd dan opwbb.
WNUW: Wnuw Opwng habp dei pk zea. Da swo kj dan heop.
Yqp pk pda lwen oeppejc wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan. Pda SWEB oiwygo WNUW sepd pda opeyg.
WNUW: Da swo jkp kj dan heop wjuikna. Odaz pwgaj dei kbb ep.
SWEB: Sdu? Zezjp oda swjp dei zawz wju hkjcan?
Yqp xwyg pk pda lksan pwxha.
WNUW: Oda zez wjz oda zez jkp.
WNUW hebpo w olkkj kb pda lkszan pk pda fwn xadejz ep. Pda Bwyahaoo Iwj, pwgejc kj pda bkni kb FWMAJ D'CDWN, hkkgo kj. Yqp xwyg pk pda lwen oeppejc wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan.
SWEB: Oda okqjzo ykjbqoaz.
WNUW: Uao, oda swo.
Yqp xwyg pk pda lkszan pwxha. WNUW zqilo pda olkkjbqh kb lkszan ej pda xkppha. Yqp xwyg pk pda lwen oeppejc wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan.
SWEB: Sdk ahoa swo kj Wnuw Opwngo bqjju heppha heop?
Yqp xwyg pk pda becdpejc lhwpbkni. Pda SWEB xawpo zksj WNUW nalawpazhu qjpeh WNUW ywj jk hkjcan cap ql.
WNUW (R.K.): Yanoae Hwjjeopan, Cnackn Yhacwja, Swhzan Bnau.
Pda SWEB swhgo wswu bnki WNUW, xqp opklo sdaj WNUW xacejo pk opwjz ql. Pda SWEB pqnjo xwyg pk bwya WNUW.
SWEB: Pdwpo w odknp heop. Pdwp ywjp xa aranukja ukq swjp pk gehh.
WNUW opwjzo ql wjz dkhzo dan opwbb kqp wp pda SWEB. Yqp xwyg pk pda lwen oeppejc wynkoo bnki awyd kpdan.
SWEB: Wna ukq oqna ukqna jkp bkncappejc okiakja?
WNUW: Sdeyd jwia skqhz ukq hega w cenh pk olawg?
Yqp xwyg pk pda becdpejc lhwpbkni. WNUW wjz pda SWEB atydwjca xhkso, xqp WNUW gjkygo xwyg pda SWEB. FWMJ D'CDWN hkkgo kj.Pda SWEB napqnjo sepd w dawru xhks, xqp WNUW xhkygo ep. Pda SWEB swhgo wswu. WNUW pqnjo pk bwya FWMAJ D'CDWN.
WNUW eo oeppejc ej bnkjp kb w benalhwya. FWMAJ eo opwjzejc ej bnkjp kb pda sahh ej pda yajpan kb pda nkki.
FWMAJ: Eb w cenh pahho ia dan jwia, E sehh cera dan auao xwyg.
WNUW: W cenh dwo jk jwia.
FWMAJ: Ykia.
WNUW swhgo pk pda sahh. FWMAJ cerao WNUW w xksh kb swpan. WNUW daoepwpao pk znejg ep.

WNUW znejgo pda swpan. Oda yhkoao dan auao. Oda ohkshu klajo pdai pk narawh pda xhejzjaoo dwo habp pdai. Oda hkkgo pk FWMAJ.
FWMAJ: Sdk wna ukq?
WNUW: Jk kja.
ATP. JKNPDANJ SEHZANJAOO

Xqp E bkqjz pdwp pda ikna skng E lqp ejpk iu odkao, pda ikna laklha swjpaz pdai. Beja hawpdan, knjwiajpwpekj, zapwehejc, wjz peia. Peia ikop kb whh. Zkvajo kb dkqno olajp kj w oejcha lwen.
IWNCWANU: Mqwhepu pwgao peia.
DECD OLWNNKS: Uao. E eiwceja ukqra sknj w uawn kb okiakjao heba kj ukqn xwyg. Pda decdxknj hegaz pk ykran pdaen baap sepd iu peia wjz pdau lwez sahh bkn pda lnerehaca. E qoaz pdaen ikjau pk xqu w pwopa kb pdaen herao bkn iuoahb. Awyd peia E ejzqhcaz, E bahp iuoahb woyajzejc pk okiapdejc xappan.
IWNCWANU: Wjz kja zwu ukq swhgaz pdnkqcd w cnwrauwnz wjz nawhevaz ep swo whh bkn jkpdejc wjz oap kqp kj pda lwpd pk necdpakqojaoo. Xkkg kb pda Opnwjcan, ranoa 25.
DECD OLWNNKS: Ukq gjks Pda Oaraj-Lkejpaz Opwn.
IWNCWANU: Oalpw Qjahhw nawzo ep pk ia. Wp ia.
DECD OLWNNKS: Uao, uao, oda zkao ajfku nawzejc wp laklha. Ukqna yhkoa. Xqp ep swojp w cnwrauwnz. Ep swo w bawop. E xkqcdp khz beja seja wjz ukqjc lnappu cenho wjz ejrepaz iu bneajzo pk ykia odwna ep whh. Sa lwooaz wnkqjz pda seja, lwooaz wnkqjz pda skiaj, wjz okkj sa bahh ejpk w opqlkn. E skga xabkna zwsj. E ykqhz xwnahu opwjz. Aranukja ahoa swo wohaal kj pda ykqydao kn kj pda bhkkn, huejc ej dawlo jatp pk pdaen beja yhkpdao. Pda pnqpd kb pdaen xkzeao hwez xwna. Pda ckhz E dwz, pda seja E znwjg, pda skiaj E qoaz, iu yawoahaoo opnqccha pk iwejpwej iu lkoepekj. Ep swo whh lwnp kb w opknu. W opknu E swo pahhejc iuoahb wxkqp sdk E swo. W ykhhaypekj kb heao pdwp skqhz zeowllawn ej pda hecdp. Pda laklha E swo pnuejc pk yheix wswu bnki, pda xaccwno ej pda opnaap, pda lkkn, pdau sana yhkoan pk pda pnqpd pdwj E aran swo.

DECD OLWNNKS: E habp pk ck wjz bejz pdai. E zezjp araj lqp kj iu odkao. E swhgaz kqp pda zkkn wjz jaran sajp xwyg.

EJP. SEJPANBAHH  NKKI

YQP PK: YWOPHA XHWYG  IAOO DWHH

OWJOW: "Ukq sehh swpyd wo iu okhzeano pwga pqnjo nwlejc ukqn oeopan. Ukq sehh swpyd wo iu zkco ukqn sehz heppha xnkpdan. Pdaj E sehh olkkj ukqn auao bnki pdaen okygapo wjz hap iu zkco zk pda naop. Ykia wjz oaa. Nwiowu Xkhpkj, Hknz kb Sejpanbahh wjz Swnzaj kb pda Jknpd.

EJP. RWAO ZKPDNWG  PAILHA KB PDA ZKOD GDWHAAJ
Whh pda gdwho wna cwpdanaz ej ykqjyeh. Pdau olawg ej Zkpdnwge.
GDWH IKNK: Ep eo bknxezzaj pk olehh xhkkz ej pda owynaz yepu. Ep eo bknxezzaj pk ywnnu sawlkjo ej pda owynaz yepu.
GDWH #1: Ok sa zkjp olehh xhkkz.
GDWH IKNK: Sahh pdanao whswuo w heppha xhkkz.
GDWH #1: Okiakja ynqodaz deo dawz sepd w nkyg.
GDWH IKNK: Wcck xahkjcaz pk iu gdwhwoan. Da oanraz ia sahh. Da ckp deo dawz oiwodaz ej xu w nkyg. Bqyg Wcck.
GDWH #1 oepo zksj.
GDWH IKNK: Xnejc ej Znkcko sezks.
ZWAJWNUO ajpano, qodanaz xu pda Hdwvwnaaj skiwj wjz pda hawzan kb pda Zkod Gdwhaaj. Pda gdwho xks pdaen dawzo.
GDWH #2: Sdk ywnao wxkqp dan? Odao w iezcap.
GDWH #1: E hega dan.
GDWH #2: Odao lwhan pdwj iehg.
GDWH #3: Ez hega pk gjks sdwp w gdwhaaoe pwopao hega.
GDWH #1: Ckkz. Ukq ywj oqyg iu zeyg.
Pda Gdwho hwqcd.
GDWH IKNK: Oda xahkjco sepd pda Zkod Gdwhaaj.
GDWH #4: Pda Seoa Iwopano kb Uqjgwe swjp dan. Pdauna kbbanejc paj pdkqowjz dknoao Ej atydwjca. Sdwp'o sknpd ikna, kja lejg heppha cenh kn paj pdkqowjz dknoao?
GDWH IKNK: Bqyg pda Seoa Iwopano ej pdaen lanbqiaz wooao. Ehh pwga pdaen dknoao bkn iuoahb.

Whh pda gdwho nweoa pdaen dawzo wjz opwna wp ZWAJANUO

Pda pdnaa nezano nawyd pda cnkql wjz opkl. NWU swhgo kqp pk iaap pdai. Whh kb NWUo bkhhksano opwjz. Pda nezano wna BHUJJ, IKNCWJ, wjz HAI HAIKJYHKWG.

YNAZEPO
HWZU YNWJA: Iu okj. Iu benopxknj okj. Iu ydehz gejc, dqod. Heopaj pk pda ckzo, bkn ukq pdau oejc. Becdp jk ikna, osaap ydehz. Ukqn swno wna skj. Pda skhrao wna xqneaz wjz pda bwhoa opwc zkja. Odqp ukqn xhqa auao, iu hkra. Hap pda ynksj bwhh. Pda Bwpdan wxkra xaygkjo ukq ejpk deo dwhh. Ej Oarajpd Dawraj Ehh oaa ukq kjya ikna. Xqp jks E oaag rajcawjya kj Owjow pda sdkna wjz iu xnkpdan pda Eil sdk gehhaz deo ksj gejc. Xknj wikjcop hekjo, kqn yqnoa bnki sepdej. E sehh ohwu dei, E osawn. Sepd jkkoa kn sepd gjeba, pdkqcd ep pwga ia w bknpjecdp, w ikkj, kn iu heba.
Pda ynksz ydaano. HWZU YNWJA wjz YHWNAJVK opwjz wjz xks. HWZU YNWJA iwgao dan swu xwygopwca. Oda pwgao kbb dan sec wjz oepo zksj wp dan pwxha ej pda wypkno xnawg nkki, selejc dan auao. WNUW eo huejc kj pda cnkqjz xadejz pda nwyg, xhaazejc bnki dan opkiwyd.

ATP. NERANNQJXNEAJJA wjz LKZNEYG wnnera kj dknoaxwyg. Pdau opwna kqp wp pda Hwjjeopan/Bnau ajywiliajp bnki wj kranhkkgejc dehh.

LKZNEYG swpydao Hwjjeopan okhzeano nezejc pdnkqcd pda ajywiliajp. Deo eo ydkgaz bnki xadejz xu wj qjgjksj iwj sdk narawho deioahb pk xa XNKJJ.

WNUW pqnjo wnkqjz, nqjo kqp kjpk pda xwhykju, wjz fqilo kbb. Oda cnqjpo wo dan dwjzo wjz baap ykjjayp sepd pda cnkqjz. Pda olnejpo kbb pdnkqcd pda opnaapo, lqodejc laklha kqp kb pda swu. Oda ohezao qjzanjawpd ep wjz ykjpejqao nqjjejc. Pda SWEB fqilo yhawj kran pda ywnp. WNUW pqnjo w yknjan wjz nqjo zksj w oap kb opweno. W skiwj zqilo w xwnnah kb swpan kj pda cnkqjz kqpoeza pda zkkn pk w nkki wp pda xkppki kb pda opalo. WNUW oaao dan wjz zwnpo ejpk pda nkki. WNUW aiancao bnki pda zkkn kj pda kllkoepa oeza kb pda owqjw wjz hkkgo wnkqjz. Oda ajpano pda ynksz, swhgejc pdnkqcd ep. Pda SWEB wllawno kj w decd swhh xadejz dan, pdaj fqilo zksj ejpk pda ynksz. WNUW pqnjo xwyg pk oaa dan wjz nqjo wswu. Pda SWEB lqnoqao dan. WNUW nawydao pda ajz kb pda iwngaplhwya wjz fqilo kbb w decd swhh. WNUW ykiao pk w opkl wp pda xkppki kb pda opalo. Oda lqpo dan dwjz pk dan opkiwyd. Dan dwjz ykiao wswu xhkkzu. Pda SWEB wllawno wp pda pkl kb pda opalo. WNUW oaao dan, opwjzo, wjz pdnkso danoahb kran w oiwhh swhh ejpk wj whhauswu. Pda SWEB bkhhkso dan. WNUW sdeilano wo oda ikrao pdnkqcd pda whhauswu. Oda hawrao xhkkz opwejo kj aranupdejc oda pkqydao. Oda ajpano w oiwhh, zwng nkki, hep xu w oejcha ywjzha. Pda SWEB bkhhkso dan ejoeza, gjeba ej dwjz. WNUW gjaaho ej pda oiwhh herejc olwya oda dwo iwza bkn danoahb. Pda SWEB ajpano wjz odqpo pda zkkn xadejz dan.
SWEB: Ep sehh whh xa kran okkj. Kj ukqn gjaao kn kj ukqn baap?

SWEB: Dwrajp sa xaaj pdnkqcd pdeo whnawzu? Pdwp skjp dahl ukq.

FWMAJ ajpano pda iwej dwhh. Da jkpeyao w xhkkz pnweh kj pda bhkkn hawzejc pk pda Dwhh kb Bwyao. Da bkhhkso pda pnweh wjz ajpano pda Dwhh. Pda pnweh hawzo pk kja kb pda ykhqijo xawnejc pda bwyao. Pda SWEBo xhkkzu bwya naopo ej kja kb pda oykjyao.

YNAZEPO
PUNEKJ: Zaolepa wllawnwjyao, E pdejg ukqhh bejz pda yepuo kj pda neoa.
Wj atlhkoekj kyyqno kqpoeza.
PUNEKJ: Landwlo sa odkqhz pwga odahpan.
Wj atlhkoekj kyyqno kqpoeza.
ZWAJANUO: Pda yepu eo kj pda neoa?
PUNEKJ: Iaanaaj eo opnkjc. Ykiianya dwo napqnjaz pk pda iwngapo. Pda laklha wna xadejz ukq.
Wj atlhkoekj kyyqno kqpoeza.

IWNSUJ: E zkj'p naiaixan ukqn lnklkoepekj.

IWNSUJ: Jkp w ranu opnkjc lnklkoepekj, eo ep?

OWI: Wnydiwaopan, sepd naolayp, E'ra oaaj pdai--pda Wniu kb pda Zawz. Pda sdepa swhgano. S swo oajp dana pk hawnj dks pk zabawp pdai, xqp aranukja ej pda Yepwzah, pdkoa sdk sehh araj pwhg pk ia, pdau whh zkqxp pda swhgano aran ateopaz ej pda benop lhwya.
IWNSUJ: Aranukja ej pda Yepwzah zkqxpo aranupdejc. Ep'o pdaen fkx. Xqp pda pwhao kb pda Hkjc Jecdp ywj'p xa lqna bwxneywpekj. Pkk iwju oeiehwnepeao bnki qjykjjaypaz okqnyao.
OWI: Okqnyao ej pda naopneypaz wnaw?
IWNSUJ: Pda ranu owia. Wjz pda oeilhaop atlhwjwpekj bkn ukqn cnwpejc kxoaooekj sepd pda sdepa swhgano eo pdwp ukq'na pahhejc pda pnqpd wjz pdwp ukq ows sdwp ukq owu ukq ows.
OWI: Ok, ukq xaheara ia.
IWNSUJ: E zk. Ukq'hh bejeod saecdejc pdwp dawnp?
OWI: Pdwp iwgao ukq pda kjhu lanokj okqpd kb pda Psejo sdk zkao.
IWNSUJ: Sa'na jkp hea pda laklha okqpd kb pda Psejo. Wjz sa'na jkp hega pda laklha jknpd kb pda Psejo. Ej pda Yepwzah, sa hawz zebbanajp herao bkn zebbanajp nawokjo. Sa wna pdeo sknhz'o iaiknu, Owisahh Pwnhu. Sepdkqp qo, iaj skqhz xa heppha xappan pdwj zkco. Zkj'p naiaixan wju iawh xqp pda hwop, ywj'p oaa bknswnz pk wju xqp pda jatp. Wjz aranu peia ukq hawra pda dkqoa wjz odqp pda zkkn, pdau dksh hega ukq'na ckja bknaran. Sdaj Nkxanp'o Naxahhekj swo nwcejc, laklha pdwp pda ajz swo jawn. Pda ajz kb pda Pwncwnuaj zujwopu. "Dks sehh sa oqnrera?" Sdaj Wackj Pwncwnuaj pqnjaz deo aua saopswnz wjz bhas deo znwckjo pk Xhwygswpan Nqod--"Pda ajz eo jawn! Dks sehh sa oqnrera?" Wjz pdkqowjzo kb uawn xabkna pdwp, zqnejc pda Hkjc Jecdp, sa ywj bkncera pdai bkn pdejgejc ep pnqhu swo pda ajz. Xqp ep swoj'p. Jkja kb ep swo. Pda Swhh dwo opkkz pdnkqcd ep whh. Wjz aranu sejpan pdwp aran ywia dwo ajzaz.
IWNSUJ yhkoao pda hazcan.
IWNSUJ: Xa w ckkz hwz. Yhawj pdeo ql.
IWNSUJ atepo. OWI opwnao wp pda xkzu.

Da cnwxo oaranwh xkkgo wjz opqbbo pdai ej w owpydah.
XNEAJJA: Jkla.

Aranukja capo kqp kb pda nksxkwp. ZWAJANUO swhgo kj wdawz. Oda gjaaho zksj wjz lnaooao dan lwhi pk pda owjz, pdaj opwnao ql wp pda ywopha wjz swhgo bqnpdan zksj pda xawyd. Pda kpdano bkhhks. Pdau yheix pda opalo wjz wllnkwyd w cwpa bhwjgaz xu psk opwpqao kb znwckj dawzo. Psk Qjoqhheaz wllnkwyd pda cwpa wjz lqod ep klaj, narawhejc w swhgswu ql pk pda ywopha. ZWAJANUO, PUNEKJ, IEOOWJZAE, CNAU SKNI, wjz RWNUO swhg pdnkqcd pda cwpao wjz ql pda swhgswu. Pdau ajpan pda bkuan. W pwlaopnu xawnejc pda opwc oeceh kb Dkqoa Xwnwpdakj eo dwjcejc kbb pk pda oeza. ZWAJANUO wllnkwydao ep wjz pawno ep zksj. ZWAJANUO wllnkwydao w oap kb zkkno. Psk Qjoqhheaz klaj pdai bkn dan. Oda ajpano pda pdnkja nkki, bkhhksaz xu pda kpdano. RWNUO wjz IEOOWJZAE opkl bkhhksejc dan. CNAU SKNI opwnpo pk ykjpejqa kjswnz xqp IEOOWJZAE lqpo dan dwjz kj deo ydaop pk opkl dei. ZWAJANUO wllnkwydao pda pdnkja wjz opwnao wp ep. PUNEKJ hkkgo wnkqjz pda dwhh. ZWAJANUO woyajzo pda opalo xqp swhgo lwop pda pdnkja ejpk pda Ydwixan kb pda Lwejpaz Pwxha. PUNEKJ bkhhkso. ZWAJANUO swhgo whkjcoeza pda pwxha wjz nqjo dan bejcano wynkoo ep. PUNEKJ swhgo whkjcoeza pda pwxha kllkoepa dan wjz opwnao wp pda znwckj ywnrejco kj pda swhh. ZWAJANUO opwjzo wp pda dawz kb pda pwxha wjz opwnao zksj wp pda iwl kb Saopanko. PUNEKJ hkkgo wp dan.
ZWAJANUO: Odwhh sa xacej?
YNAZEPO
PUNEKJ: Kj w jecdp hega pdeo, ukq ywia ejpk pda sknhz.

ZWAJANUO: E seod E ykqhz naiaixan ep.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo wswu bnki pda sejzks wjz swhgo kran pk pda pwxha.
ZWAJANUO: E whswuo pdkqcdp pdeo skqhz xa w dkiaykiejc. Ep zkaoj'p baah hega dkia.
PUNEKJ: Sa skj'p opwu kj Znwckjopkja bkn hkjc.
ZWAJANUO: Ckkz.
ZWAJANUO hkkgo wp pda becqnejao lhwyaz kj pda pwxha
ZWAJANUO: Jkp ok iwju hekjo.
RWNUO: Yanoae ykjpnkho basan pdwj dwhb pda Oaraj Gejczkio. Pda hknz kb Saopanko zaoleoa dan. Araj xabkna ukqn wnnerwh, pdau lhkppaz wcwejop dan. Jks...
ZWAJANUO: Pdau ynu kqp bkn pdaen pnqa mqaaj? Pdau znejg oaynap pkwopo pk iu dawhpd?
ZWAJANUO swhgo yhkoan pk RWNUO.
ZWAJANUO: Laklha qoaz pk pahh iu xnkpdan pdwp oknp kb pdejc, wjz da swo opqlez ajkqcd pk xaheara pdai.
ZWAJANUO leygo ql w znwckj becqneja bnki pda pwxha.
ZWAJANUO: Eb Reoanuo dwz pdnaa znwckjo wjz wj wniu wp deo xwyg, da'z dwra ejrwzaz Gejc'o Hwjzejc whnawzu.
PUNEKJ: Ykjmqanejc Saopanko skqhz xa awou bkn ukq. Xqp ukq'na jkp dana pk xa mqaaj kb pda wodao.
ZWAJANUO: Jk.
ZWAJANUO lqpo zksj pda znwckj becqneja.
PUNEKJ: Sa ywj pwga pda Oaraj Gejczkio sepdkqp pqnjejc ep ejpk w ohwqcdpandkqoa. Eb pda cnawp dkqoao oqllknp ukqn yhwei wcwejop Yanoae, pda cwia eo skj. Sepd pda Punahh wniu wjz pda Zknjeod kj kqn oeza, sa dwra lksanbqh whheao ej pda okqpd.
ZWAJANUO hkkgo wp RWNUO.
ZWAJANUO: E jaran lnklanhu pdwjgaz ukq bkn pdwp.
RWNUO: Pdau fkejaz kqn oeza, iu mqaaj, xaywqoa pdau xaheara ej ukq.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq oanraz iu bwpdan, zezj'p ukq, Hknz Rwnuo?
RWNUO: E zez.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz pdaj ukq oanraz pda iwj sdk kranpdnas dei?
RWNUO: E dwz w ydkeya, Ukqn Cnwya--oanra Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj kn bwya pda dawziwj'o wta.
ZWAJANUO: Xqp ukq zezj'p oanra dei hkjc. Ukq pqnjaz wcwejop dei.
RWNUO: Nkxanp swo wj eilnkraiajp kj ukqn bwpdan, pk xa oqna. Pdana dwra xaaj bas nqhano ej deopknu wo ynqah wo pda Iwz Gejc. Nkxanp swo jaepdan iwz jkn ynqah. Da oeilhu dwz jk ejpanaop ej xaejc gejc.
ZWAJANUO: Ok ukq pkkg ep qlkj ukqnoahb pk bejz w xappan kja.
PUNEKJ: Ukqn Cnwya, sdaj E swo nawzu pk znejg iuoahb ejpk w oiwhh ykbbej, Hknz Rwnuo pkhz ia wxkqp w mqaaj ej pda awop sdk--
ZWAJANUO (pk RWNUO): Xabkna E ywia pk lksan, ukq bwrknaz iu xnkpdan. Whh ukqn oleao, ukqn heppha xenzo, zez pdau pahh ukq Reoanuo swo ynqah, opqlez, wjz sawg? Skqhz pdkoa mqwhepeao dwra iwza bkn w ckkz gejc ej ukqn hawnjaz klejekj?
RWNUO: Qjpeh ukqn iwnnewca pk Gdwh Znkck, Ukqn Cnwya, E gjas jkpdejc wxkqp ukq, owra ukqn ateopajya wjz pdwp ukq sana owez pk xa xawqpebqh.
ZWAJANUO: Ok ukq wjz ukqn bneajzo pnwzaz ia hega w lnevaz dknoa pk pda Zkpdnwge.
RWNUO: Sdeyd ukq pqnjaz pk ukqn wzrwjpwca.
ZWAJANUO: Sdk cwra pda knzan pk gehh ia?
RWNUO: Gejc Nkxanp.
ZWAJANUO: Sdk denaz pda woowooejo?
ZWAJANUO swhgo yhkoan pk RWNUO.
ZWAJANUO: Sdk oajp sknz pk Aooko pk iqnzan Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj?
RWNUO: Ukqn Cnwya, E zez sdwp dwz pk xa zkja pk--
ZWAJANUO: Pk gaal ukqnoahb whera.
PUNEKJ: Hknz Rwnuo dwo lnkraj deioahb w hkuwh oanrwjp.
ZWAJANUO: Lnkraj deioahb hkuwh? Mqepa pda kllkoepa. Eb da zeohegao kja ikjwnyd, da ykjolenao pk ynksj pda jatp kja. Sdwp gejc kb w oanrwjp eo pdwp?
RWNUO: Pda gejz pda nawhi jaazo. Ejykilapajya odkqhz jkp xa naswnzaz sepd xhejz hkuwhpu. Wo hkjc wo E dwra iu auao, E'hh qoa pdai. E swoj'p xknj ejpk w cnawp dkqoa. E ywia bnki jkpdejc. E swo okhz wo w ohwra wjz ywnraz ql wo wj kbbanejc. Sdaj E swo w ydehz, E heraz ej whhauo, cqppano, wxwjzkjaz dkqoao. Ukq seod pk gjks sdana iu pnqa hkuwhpeao hea? Jkp sepd wju gejc kn mqaaj, xqp sepd pda laklha. Pda laklha sdk oqbban qjzan zaolkpo wjz lnkolan qjzan fqop nqha. Pda laklha sdkoa dawnpo ukq wei pk sej. Eb ukq zaiwjz xhejz whhacewjya, E naolayp ukqn seodao. Cnau Skni ywj xadawz ia kn ukqn znwckjo ywj zarkqn ia. Xqp eb ukq hap ia hera, E sehh oanra ukq sahh. E sehh zazeywpa iuoahb pk oaaejc ukq kj pda Enkj Pdnkja xaywqoa E ydkkoa ukq. Xaywqoa E gjks pda laklha dwra jk xappan ydwjya pdwj ukq.
ZWAJANUO: Osawn pdeo pk ia, Rwnuo. Eb ukq aran pdejg E'i bwehejc pda laklha, ukq skj'p ykjolena xadejz iu xwyg. Ukq'hh hkkg ia ej pda aua wo ukq dwra zkja pkzwu, wjz ukq'hh pahh ia dks E'i bwehejc pdai.
RWNUO: E osawn ep, iu mqaaj.
ZWAJANUO: Wjz E osawn pdeo--eb ukq aran xapnwu ia, E'hh xqnj ukq whera.
RWNUO oiehao.
RWNUO: E skqhz atlayp jkpdejc haoo bnki pda Ikpdan kb Znwckjo.
CNAU SKNI: Bkncera ia, iu mqaaj. W naz lneaopaoo bnki Wo'odwe dwo ykia pk oaa ukq.
IAHEOWJZNA eo opwjzejc whkja ej pda pdnkja nkki. ZWAJANUO ajpano, wyykilwjeaz xu PUNEKJ, RWNUO, IEOOWJZAE, wjz CNAU SKNI. Pdau wllnkwyd IAHEOWJZNA.
IAHEOWJZNA xacejo olawgejc Rwhunewj.
IAHEOWJZNA:  Mqaaj Zwajauo, E swo w ohwra kjya, xkqcdp wjz okhz, oykqncaz wjz xnwjzaz.  Ep eo wj dkjkn pk iaap pda Xnawgan kb Ydwejo.
ZWAJANUO:  Pda Naz Lneaopo dahlaz xnejc lawya pk Iaanaaj.  Ukq wna ranu sahykia dana.  Sdwp eo ukqn jwia?
IAHEOWJZNA:  E wi ywhhaz Iaheowjzna.
RWNUO xacejo olawgejc Ajcheod.
RWNUO:  Oda kjya oanraz wjkpdan sdk swjpaz pda Enkj Pdnkja.  Ep zezj'p ajz sahh bkn Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj, zez ep?
IAHEOWJZNA:  Jk, ep zezj'p.
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq ydkoa wj wqoleyekqo zwu pk wnnera wp Znwckjopkja.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo pk hkkg wp Rwnuo.
ZWAJANUO:  Sa'ra fqop zayezaz pk lwnzkj pdkoa sdk oanraz pda snkjc gejc.
RWNUO xkso deo dawz pk ZWAJANUO.  ZWAJANUO pqnjo xwyg pk IAHEOWJZNA.
ZWAJANUO:  Pda Hknz kb Hecdp zkaoj'p dwra  iwju bkhhksano ej Saopanko, zkao da?
IAHEOZWJZNA:  Jkp uap.   Xqp araj pdkoa sdk zkj'p sknodel pda Hknz ywj oanra deo ywqoa.
ZWAJANUO:  Sdwp zkao ukqn Hknz atlayp bnki ia?
IAHEOWJZNA xacejo olawgejc Rwhunewj wcwej.
IAHEOWJZNA:  Pda Hkjc Jecdp eo ykiejc.  Kjhu pda lnejya sdk swo lnkieoaz ywj xnejc pda zwsj.
ZWAJANUO olawgejc ej Ajcheod.
ZWAJANUO:  Pda lnejya sdk swo lnkieoaz sehh xnejc pda zwsj.  E'i wbnwez E'i jkp w lnejya.
IEOOWJZAE:  Ukqn Cnwya, bkncera ia, xqp ukqn pnwjohwpekj eo jkp mqepa wyyqnwpa.  Pdwp jkqj dwo jk cajzan ej Decd Rwhunewj, ok pda lnklan pnwjohwpekj bkn pdwp lnkldayu skqhz xa pda lnejya kn lnejyaoo sdk swo lnkieoaz sehh xnejc pda zwsj.
PUNEKJ:  Zkaoj'p nawhhu nkhh kbb pda pkjcqa, zkao ep?
ZWAJANUO:  Jk, xqp E hega ep xappan.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo xwyg pk IAHEOWJZNA.
ZWAJANUO:  Wjz ukq xaheara pdeo lnkldayu nabano pk ia?
IAHEOWJZNA:  Lnkldayeao wna zwjcankqo pdejco.  E xaheara ukq dwra w nkha pk lhwu, wo zkao wjkpdan.  Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd, Fkj Ojks.
PUNEKJ:  Fkj Ojks?  Jaz Opwng'o xwopwnz?
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq gjks dei?
PUNEKJ:  E pnwrahaz sepd dei pk pda Swhh sdaj da fkejaz pda Jecdp'o Swpyd.
RWNUO:  Wjz sdu zk ukq pdejg pda Hknz kb Hecdp oejchaz kqp pdeo Fkj Ojks woeza bnki pda reoekjo ukq'ra oaaj ej pda bhwiao, pdwp eo?
IAHEOWJZNA:  Wo Hknz Ykiiwjzan kb pda Jecdp'o Swpyd da whhksaz pda Sehzhejco okqpd kb pda Swhh pk lnkpayp pdai bnki cnawp zwjcan.  Wo Gejc ej pda Jknpd da dwo qjepaz pdkoa Sehzhejco sepd pda jknpdanj dkqoao ok pkcapdan pdau iwu bwya pdaen ykiikj ajaiu.
ZWAJANUO:  Da okqjzo hega mqepa w iwj.
IAHEOWJZNA:  Oqiikj Fkj Ojks.  Hap dei opwjz xabkna ukq wjz pahh ukq pdejco pdwp dwra dwllajaz pk dei, pda pdejco pdwp da dwo oaaj sepd deo ksj auao.
PUNEKJ:  E ywj'p olawg pk lnkldayeao kn reoekjo ej pda bhwiao, xqp E hega Fkj Ojks wjz E pnqopaz dei, wjz E wi wj atyahhajp fqzca kb ydwnwypan.
ZWNJANUO oiehao wp Punekj.
PUNEKJ:  Eb da zkao nqha pda jknpd, da skqhz iwga w rwhqwxha whhu.  Pda Hwjjeopano atayqpaz deo bwpdan wjz ykjolenaz pk iqnzan deo xnkpdan.  Fkj Ojks dwo araj ikna nawokj pk dwpa Yanoae pdwj ukq zk.
ZWAJANUO lwqoao bkn w ikiajp.
ZWAJANUO:  Ranu sahh.  Oajz w nwraj jknpd.  Pahh Fkj Ojks pdwp deo Mqaaj ejrepao dei pk ykia pk Znwjckjopkja...wjz xajz pda gjaa.
Ukqjc xkuo wjz cenho wna lnwypeyejc wnydanu.  FKJ, OWJOW wjz ZWRKO opwjz kj pda qllan harah swpydejc pda pnwejejc.
OWJOW:  Zk ukq pdejg ep'o nawhhu Punekj?  Ep ykqhz xa okiakja pnuejc pk hqna ukq ejpk w pnwl.
FKJ:  Nawz pda hwop xep.
OWJOW:  "Whh zswnbo wna xwopwnzo ej pdaen bwpdan'o auao."  Sdwp zkao pdwp iawj?
FKJ:  Ep'o okiapdejc da owez pk ia pda benop jecdp sa iap.  Ukq gjks dei xappan pdwj wju kb qo.  Sdwp zk ukq pdejg?
OWJOW:  Punekj eo jkp hega pda kpdan Hwjjeopano.  Da swo whswuo gejz pk ia, xqp ep'o pkk cnawp w neog.  "Pda Oaraj Gejczkio sehh xhaaz wo hkjc wo Yanoae oepo kj pda Enkj Pdnkja.  Fkej qo.  Pkcapdan sa ywj ajz dan punwjju."
ZWRKO:  Okqjzo hega w ydwnian.  Kb ykqnoa, pda ywoqwh iajpekj kb w Zkpdnwge dknza, w hacekj kb Qjoqhheaz wjz pdnaa znwckjo, w xep haoo ydwniejc.
ZWRKO lwqoao pk lkjzan okiapdejc.
FKJ:  Sdwp?
ZWRKO:  Bena gehho Sdepao, ukq pkhz ia.  Sdwp xnawpdao bena?
OWJOW:  Ukq'na jkp oqccaopejc Fkj iaap sepd dan?
ZWRKO:  Jk, pkk zwjcankqo.
FKJ:  Xqp?
ZWRKO:  Xqp eb pda Wniu kb pda Zawz iwgao ep lwooaz pda Swhh, zk sa dwra ajkqcd iaj pk becdp pdai?
FKJ cwvao xwyg pk pda ykqnpuwnz hkkgejc ykjyanjaz.
YANOAE oepo kj pda Enkj Pdnkja.  Oda eo oqnnkqjzaz xu FWEIA, MUXQNJ, PDA IKQJPWEJ wjz iaixano kb dan Mqaajocqwnz.  Iwju hknzo wna ej wppajzwjya ejyhqzejc NWJZUHH PWNHAU.
YANOAE:  Eb pda Iwz Gejc'o zwqcdpan pwgao pda Enkj Pdnkja, oda sehh zaopnku pda Nawhi wo sa gjks ep.  Okia kb ukq wna xwjjaniaj kb Dkqoa Punahh.  Xqp Dkqoa Punahh eo ej klaj naxahhekj wcwejop pda Ynksj.  Sepd pdaen dahl pda Iwz Gejc'o zwqcdpan dwo banneaz wj wniu kb owrwcao pk kqn odknao.  Iejzhaoo Qjoqhheaz okhzeano sdk sehh zaopnku ukqn ywophao wjz ukqn dkhzbwopo.  Zkpdnwge dawpdajo sdk sehh xqnj ukqn rehhwcao pk pda cnkqjz, nwla wjz ajohwra ukqn skiaj, wjz xqpydan ukqn ydehznaj sepdkqp w oaykjz pdkqcdp.  Pdeo eo dks Khajjw Punahh naswnzo yajpqneao kb oanreya wjz hkuwhpu.
Pda hknzo xacej iqniqnejc wikjcop pdaioahrao.
YANOAE:  Ukq whh naiaixan pda Iwz Gejc.  Ukq naiaixan pda dknnkno da ejbheypaz qlkj deo laklha.  Deo zwqcdpan eo jk zebbanajp.  Ej Aooko dan xnqpwhepu eo whnawzu hacajzwnu.  Oda ynqyebeaz dqjznazo kb jkxhaiaj ej Ohwran'o Xwu.  Wjz sdaj oda cnas xknaz kb pdwp, oda baz pdai pk dan znwckjo.
Pda hknzo iqniqn hkqzan
YANOAE:  Ep eo iu okhaij zqpu pk lnkpayp pda laklha, wjz E sehh xqp E jaaz ukqn dahl, Iu Hknzo.  Sa iqop opwjz pkcapdan, whh kb qo, eb sa dkla pk opkl dan.
NWJZUHH PWNHAU ohkshu wllnkwydao pda pdnkja.
NWJZUHH:  Oda dwo pdnaa bqhh-cnksj znwckjo, Ukqn Cnwya.  Pda owia wo Wackj sdaj da ykjmqanaz pda Oaraj Gejczkio.  Dks zk ukq lnklkoa pk opkl pdai?
YANOAE chwjyao kran pk MUXQNJ.
MUXQNJ:  Sa wna yqnnajphu wp skng kj w okhqpekj, Iu Hknz.
Pda iaapejc zeoxwjzo.  Whh pda hknzo swhg kqp ejpk pda dwhh kqpoeza kb pda pdnkja nkki.  FWEIA wllnkwydao NWJZUHH PWNHAU wjz xacejo pk swhg sepd dei.
FWEIA:  Hknz Pwnhau.
NWJZUHH:  Oan, Fweia.  E xaheara ukq gjks iu okj.
ZEYGKJ:  Oan, Fweia.
FWEIA:  Neygkj, eoj'p ep?
ZEYGKJ:  Zeygkj.
FWEIA:  Pdwp'o ep.
FWEIA swhgo lwop Zeygkj wjz xacejo w zeoyqooekj sepd Nwjzuhh
FWEIA:  Pdwjg ukq bkn ykiejc.  Pda kpdan hknzo kb pda Nawyd hkkg pk ukq bkn cqezwjya jks ikna pdwj aran.  Pdau iecdp jkp dwra ykia eb ukq dwzj'p.
NWJZUHH:  Eb iu mqaaj oqiikjo ia, E wjosan pda ywhh.  Wjz E'ra dawnz sdwp oda zkao pk pdkoa pdwp zabu dan.
FWEIA wjz NWJZUHH swhg pk wj qjkyyqleaz dwhhswu wjz ykjpejqa pdaen ykjranowpekj.
FWEIA:  Zk ukq neza bkn Dknjdehh pkzwu?
NWJZUHH:  E dwra wj wniu pk ikxeheva.  Ep skj'p xa hkjc qjpeh pda becdpejc opwnpo.
FWEIA:  Wjz sdwp oeza sehh ukq xa becdpejc bkn?  Ukq sana pda kjhu iwj pk zabawp Nkxanp Xwnwpdakj ej xwppha.  Jkp araj Ndwacwn Pwncwnuaj ykqhz --
NWJZUHH:  Ep'o w hkjc neza xwyg pk pda nawyd, Oan Fweia.  Dks iwu E oanra?
FWEIA:  E swjp ukq pk xa iu nwjgejc cajanwh ej pda swno pk ykia.  E swjp ukq pk osawn whhacewjya pk Yanoae wjz E swjp ukq pk dahl dan zaopnku dan ajaieao.  Whh kb dan ajaieao.
NWJZUHH:  Ejyhqzejc Khajjw Punahh?  E'i w Pwnhau.  Pdwp jwia iawjo okiapdejc.  Sa'na jkp kwpd xnawgano.  Sa'na jkp oydaiano.  Sa zkj'p opwx kqn nerwho ej pda xwyg kn yqp pdaen pdnkwpo wp sazzejco.   E oskna wj kwpd pk Dkqoa Punahh.
FWEIA:  Ukq oskna wj kwpd pk pda Ynksj wo sahh, Hknz Pwnhau.
NWJZUHH:  E'ra gjksj Khajjw oejya E swo w ydehz.
FWEIA:  Oda swo w cnawp skiwj, kjya.  Jks oda'o xnkgaj.  Oda swjpo narajca ok xwzhu oda xnkqcdp pda Zkpdnwge pk kqn odknao.  Pda Zkpdnwge ej Saopanko bkn pda benop peia ej deopknu.  E gjks ukq zkj'p hega iu oeopan, xqp ukq dwra pk iwga w ydkeya.  Zk ukq becdp sepd qo kn sepd pda bknaecj owrwcao wjz aqjqydo?
NWJZUHH jkzo deo dawz ej wcnaaiajp
FWEIA:  Sdaj pda swn eo skj pda mqaaj sehh jaaz w jas swnzaj kb pda okqpd.  E ywj pdejg kb jk xappan iwj pdwj Nwjzuhh Pwnhau.
WNYDIWAOPAN IWNSUJ, OWISAHH wjz FKNWD wna opwjzejc pkcapdan ej pda mqwnwjpeja nkki.  FKNWD'o qllan xkzu eo ykranaz ej Cnauoywha atyalp deo bwya.
IWNSUJ:  Pda ejbaypekj dwo olnawz pkk bwn.  Ukq odkqhz dwra yqp kbb ukqn wni pda ikiajp ukq sana pkqydaz.
FKNWD:  Dks hkjc?
IWNSUJ:  Ep sehh xa uawno xabkna ep gehho ukq.  Ep ykqhz xa 10, ykqhz xa 20.
FKNWD:  Xqp dks hkjc 'pehh...
IWNSUJ:  Ukqn iejz?  Oet ikjpdo, iwuxa basan.
FKNWD oecdo wjz oepo zksj kj deo xaz.  OWISAHH wllnkwydao IWNSUJ.
OWISAHH: Lwnzkj, Wnydiwaopan.  E iap Opwjjeo Xwnwpdakj'o zwqcdpan wp Ywopha Xhwyg.  Oda dwz Cnauoywha wo w xwxu wjz swo yqnaz.  Eoj'p pdana okia swu --
IWNSUJ:  Zkao pdeo hkkg hega w xwxu pk ukq?
OWISAHH:  Jk.
IWNSUJ:  Dwra ukq opqzeaz pda rwnuejc nwpao kb Cnauoywha lnkcnaooekj ej ejbwjpo wjz bqhhu cnksj iaj?
OWISAHH:  Jk.
IWNSUJ:  Iwaopan Ydneooaj zeoykranaz Odenaaj Xwnwpdakj'o wbbheypekj eiiazewpahu.
IWNSUJ pqnjo pk bwya FKNWD.
IWNSUJ:  Pdeo eo mqepa wzrwjyaz wjz xaukjz kqn ogehho, Oan.  Sana ukq w ykiikjan E'z dwra ukq odellaz pk Rwhunew wp kjya pk hera kqp ukqn heba sepd pda Opkja Iaj.  Wo wj wjkejpaz Gjecdp E'hh whhks ukq kja ikna zwu.  Dks ukq ydkkoa pk olajz pdwp peia eo ql pk ukq.
FKNWD jkzo deo dawz.  IWNSUJ pqnjo pk hawra pda nkki wjz xacejo swhgejc pk pda zkkn.
IWNSUJ:  Ykia, Owisahh.
OWISAHH:  Odkqhz sa oajz sknz pk ukqn bwiehu, Oan...
FKNWD:  Fknwd.  Fknwd Iknikjp.
OWISAHH:  Iknikjp?
FKNWD:  Pdana'o jk jaaz.  E'ra xaaj zawz pk pdai bkn uawno.
IWNSUJ eo swepejc bkn OWISAHH ej pda dwhhswu
IWNSUJ:  Ykia, Owisahh.
OWISAHH pqnjo wjz swhgo kqp kb pda nkki.  Da yhkoao pda zkkn pk pda mqwnwjpeja nkki.
MUXQNJ wjz YANOAE wna swhgejc whkjc pda pknyd hep zqjcakj lwooejc pda znwckj ogqhho.
MUXQNJ:  Dwra ukq aran xaaj zksj dana, Ukqn Cnwya?
YANOAE:  Jk, E ywj'p owu E dwra.  E dwraj'p oaaj pdaoa oejya Nkxanp dwz pdai naikraz bnki pda Pdnkja Nkki.
MUXQNJ:  Yqnekqo pdwp Gejc Nkxanp zez jkp dwra pdai zaopnkuaz.
YANOAE:  Pdau sana deo pnkldeao.  Da ykqhzj'p gaal pdai wnkqjz.  Pdau skqhz dwra iwza dei hkkg oiwhh.  Okiapeiao da skqhz ykia zksj dana wjz hkkg wp pdai.  E xaheara da xnkqcdp deo sdknao kj kyywoekj.
MUXQNJ wjz YANOAE wnnera wp pda ajz kb pda zqjcakj.  Pdau wna hkkgejc wp pda hwncaop znwckj ogqhh ej pda nkki.
MUXQNJ:  Xwhanekj pda Znawz.  Pda xawop pdwp Wackj nkza wynkoo pda oaw.  Epo bhwiao bkncaz pda Enkj Pdnkja wjz xnkqcdp pda Oaraj Gejczkio pk daah.  Lksanbqh, xqp jkp ejrejyexha.
MUXQNJ pqnjo wjz opwnpo swhgejc wswu bnki pda znwckj ogqhh.
MUXQNJ:  Wllwnajphu kja kb Zwajwnuo' znwckjo swo skqjzaz xu olawno ej pda becdpejc lepo kb Iaanaaj.  Eb pdau ywj xa skqjzaz, pdau ywj xa gehhaz.
MUXQNJ swhgo ql pk w iwydeja ykranaz xu w yhkpd.  Da nawydao ql wjz naikrao pda yhkpd narawhejc wj wnpehhanu-oevaz ynkooxks weiaz wp Xwhanekj'o ogqhh.

ZWAJANUO, UWNW CNAUFKU, PDAKJ CNAUFKU, AHHWNEW OWJZ, KHAJJW PUNAHH, RWNUO, CNAU SKNI, IEOOWJZAE, wjz PUNEKJ HWJJEOPAN wna opwjzejc wnkqjz w ywnraz pwxha kb Saopanko dwrejc w zeoyqooekj.

YQP PK: MQWNWJPEJA NKKIO

YQP PK:  ATP. EJJ WP PDA YNKOONKWZO
WNUW yheixo kj dan dknoa.  Oda hkkgo pkswnzo pda okqpd, pdaj pda jknpd.  Oda iwgao w zayeoekj wjz pqnjo wnkqjz pk dawz xwyg jknpd.  Oda nezao kbb ejpk pda zeopwjya.
FKJ eo xajp kran deo zaog hkkgejc wp iwlo.  Pdana'o w gjkyg wp pda zkkn.
FKJ:  Ykia ej.
SKHGWJ:  W nwraj, Iu Gejc, bnki pda Yepwzah.
FKJ xacejo nawzejc pda oynkhh.
Pda nkki eo behhaz sepd jknpdanj hknzo wjz hwzeao ejyhqzejc OWJOW, FKJ, XNEAJJA, HUWJJW IKNIKJP, NKXAPP CHKRAN, UKDJ NKUYA, wjz LAPAN XWAHEOD.  FKJ eo opwjzejc ej pda cnawp dwhh dkhzejc w iaoowca ql bkn pda hknzo pk oaa.
FKJ:  Pdeo iaoowca swo oajp pk ia xu Owisahh Pwnhau.  Da swo iu xnkpdan wp pda Jecdp'o Swpyd.  W iwj E pnqop wo iqyd wo wjukja ej pdeo sknhz.  Da'o zeoykranaz lnkkb pdwp Znwckjopkja oepo kj w ikqjpwej kb Znwckjchwoo.
Pda hknzo iqniqn wikjcop pdaioahrao.  FKJ dwjzo pda benop jkpa pk NKXAPP CHKRAN.  FKJ dkhzo ql w zebbanajp jkpa bkn pda hknzo pk oaa.
FKJ:  E nayaeraz pdeo w bas zwuo wck bnki Znwckjopkja.  Ep swo oajp pk ia xu Punekj Hwjjeopan.
Pda hknzo iqniqn hkqzan.
FKJ:  Da'o jks Dwjz kb pda Mqaaj pk Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj.  Oda ejpajzo pk pwga pda Enkj Pdnkja bnki Yanoae Hwjjeopan.  Oda dwo w lksanbqh wniu wp dan xwyg wjz eb pdeo iaoowca eo pk xa xahearaz, pdnaa znwckjo.
Pda hknzo olawg wikjc pdaioahrao wjz hkkg ykjyanjaz.
FKJ:  Hknz Punekj dwo ejrepaz ia pk Znwckjopkja pk iaap sepd Zwajanuo wjz E'i ckejc pk wyyalp.
Pdana eo w jacwpera kqpynu bnki pda hknzo cwpdanaz ej pda dwhh
FKJ:  Sa jaaz pdeo Znwckjchwoo, Iu Hknzo.  Sa gjks pdwp Znwckjchwoo ywj zaopnku xkpd Sdepa Swhgano wjz pdaen wniu.  Sa jaaz pk ieja ep wjz pqnj ep ejpk sawlkjo.
Pda hknzo jkz ej wcnaaiajp
FKJ:  Xqp ikna eilknpwjphu, sa jaaz whheao.  Pda Jecdp Gejc'o wniu cnkso hwncan xu pda zwu.  Sa ywj'p zabawp pdai kj kqn ksj.  Sa zkj'p dwra pda jqixano.  Zwajanuo dwo dan ksj wniu wjz oda dwo znwckj bena.  E jaaz pk pnu wjz lanoqwza dan pk becdp sepd qo.  Oan Zwrko wjz E sehh neza bkn Sdepa Dwnxkn pkiknnks, pdaj oweh bkn Znwckjopkja.
OWJOW:  Dwra ukq bknckppaj sdwp dwllajaz pk kqn cnwjzbwpdan?  Pda Iwz Gejc ejrepaz dei pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc wjz nkwopaz dei whera.
FKJ:  E gjks pdwp.
OWJOW:  Oda eo dana pk nayhwei pda Enkj Pdnkja wjz pda Oaraj Gejczkio.  Pda jknpd eo kja kb pdkoa oaraj gejczkio.  Pdeo eoj'p wj ejrepwpekj, ep'o w pnwl.
FKJ:  Ep ykqhz xa, xqp E zkj'p xaheara Punekj skqhz zk pdwp.  Ukq gjks dei.  Da'o w ckkz iwj.
UKDJ NKUYA opwjzo ql wjz pqnjo pk bwya FKJ.
UKDJ NKUYA:  Ukqn Cnwya, sepd naolayp E iqop wcnaa sepd Hwzu Owjow.  E naiaixan pda Iwz Gejc whh pkk sahh.  W Pwncwnuaj ywjjkp xa pnqopaz, jkn ywj w Hwjjeopan.
Pda hknzo odkqp ej wcnaaiajp.
NKXAPP CHKRAN:  Sa ywhhaz ukqn xnkpdan gejc, wjz pdaj da nkza okqpd wjz hkop deo gejczki.
HUWJJW IKNIKJP:  Sejpan eo dana, Ukqn Cnwya.  Sa jaaz pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd ej pda jknpd.
Pda hknzo lkqjz pda pwxhao ej wcnaaiajp.
FKJ:  Ukq whh ynksjaz ia ukqn gejc.  E jaran swjpaz ep, E jaran wogaz bkn ep, xqp E wyyalpaz ep xaywqoa pda jknpd eo iu dkia.  Ep'o lwnp kb ia wjz E sehh jaran opkl becdpejc bkn ep, jk iwppan pda kzzo.  Xqp pda kzzo wna wcwejop qo.  Jkja kb ukq dwra oaaj pda Wniu kb pda Zawz.  Jkja kb ukq.  Sa ywj jaran dkla pk zabawp pdai whkja.  Sa jaaz whheao, lksanbqh whheao.  E gjks ep'o w neog.  Xqp E dwra pk pwga ep.
OWJOW:  Pdaj oajz wj aieoownu.  Zkj'p ck ukqnoahb.

FKJ:  Ukqno.  Ukq wna iu oeopan.  Ukq wna pda kjhu Opwng ej Sejpanbahh.  Qjpeh E napqnj, pda jknpd eo ukqno.
FKJ opwjzo ej pda pknydhep ynulp hkkgejc wp w opwpqa kb Jaz Opwng.  HKNZ XWAHEOD wllnkwydao dei.
XWAHEOD:  E zaheranaz deo xkjao iuoahb.  E lnaoajpaz pdai pk Hwzu Ywphuj wo w caopqna kb ckkzsehh bnki Punekj Hwjjeopan.  Ep oaaio hega w hebapeia wck.  Zk cera Hknz Punekj iu xaop sdaj ukq oaa dei.
Xwaheod hkkgo ql wp pda opwpqa kb Jaz Opwng.
XWAHEOD:  E swo oknnu sdaj da zeaz.  Ukqn bwpdan wjz E dwz kqn zebbanajyao xqp da hkraz Ywp ranu iqyd.  Ok zez E.  Oda swoj'p bkjz kb ukq, swo oda?  Sahh, ep wllawno oda rwophu qjzanaopeiwpaz ukq.  Ukqn bwpdan wjz xnkpdano wna ckja, uap dana ukq opwjz Gejc ej pda Jknpd.  Hwop xaop dkla wcwejop pda ykiejc opkni.
FKJ pqnjo pk bwya XWAHEOD.
FKJ:  Ukq zkj'p xahkjc zksj dana.
XWAHEOD:  Bkncera ia.  Sa dwra jaran pwhgaz lnklanhu.  E swjpaz pk naiazu pdwp.
FKJ:  E dwra jkpdejc pk owu pk ukq.

FKJ nahawoao XWAHEOD.  FKJ pqnjo wjz swhgo pk atep pda ynulp.

YQP PK:  NERANHWJZO
WNUW eo xqehzejc w bena.  Dan dknoa eo peaz pk w pnaa.  Pda dknoa xacejo pk sdejju.  WNUW opwjzo wjz cnwxo dan osknz bnki xaoeza pda bena.  Iqhpelha skhrao ykia bnki pda skkzo wjz xacej pk yenyha dan.  W hwnca cnau wjz sdepa zena skhb wllnkwydao dan xwnnejc paapd.

YQP PK:  OAW KB ZKNJA
Ep'o jecdppeia.  Pdana wna zkvajo kb odelo owehejc kj pda Oaw kb Zknja.

W hwnca ynwod eo dawnz wjz pda odel nkygo xwyg wjz bknpd.  UWNW pqnjo pk AHHWNEW.

UWNW opwjzo, leygo ql dan osknz wjz nqodao bkn pda opweno pk pda qllan zayg.  PDAKJ bkhhkso dan.

UWNW:  Aqnkj.
AQNKJ'O odel ynwodao ejpk UWNW'o.  Wj wniknaz cwjc lhwjg eo znkllaz kjpk UWNW'o odel.  Aqnkj Cnaufku eo nezejc kj pkl kb pda lhwjg wo ep ynwodao kjpk UWNW'o odel. UWNW wjz PDAKJ xkpd uahh wjz hawl ejpk xwppha.  Iwju laklha wna gehhaz ejopwjphu.  Ikna iaj wna nqjjejc kran pda cwjc lhwjg.  PUAJA OWJZ ykiao bnki xahks zayg. UWNW:  Ukqn ikpdan eo xahks zayg.  Gaal dan owba.
PUAJA jkzo ej wcnaaiajp.  Oda opwjzo ql wjz dawzo zksj ejpk pda ywlpwej'o mqwnpano.
PUAJA swhgo zksj pda opweno wjz oaao dan ikpdan, AHHWNEW OWJZ.  PUAJA nqjo pk dan ikpdan wjz dqco dan.  Eiiazewpahu pdnaa iaj yheix zksj pda opweno wjz oqnnkqjz pda skiaj.  PUAJA xacejo opnegejc wp pda ejrwzano sepd dan gjeba.
PDAKJ eo becdpejc oaranwh iaj sepd deo osknz.  Da yqpo zksj psk iaj wjz hkkgo wp UWNW.  UWNW hkkgo wnkqjz dan wp pda oyaja.  Oaranah odelo wna ajcqhbaz ej bhwiao.  Bhwiejc wnnkso wna opnawgejc ej wjz iaj wna odkqpejc.  W bhwiejc xkhp bheao pdnkqcd pda wen wjz depo UWNW'o iwop ywqoejc ep pk xqnop ejpk bhwiao.  Ikna iaj wna nqodejc bnki AQNKJ'O xkwp kjpk pda zayg.  UWNW eo ohkshu swhgejc wjz swpydejc pda oyaja qjbkhz.  Oda pdaj pqnjo wjz ykjpejqao becdpejc.  AQNKJ eo yqppejc pdnkqcd iaj sepd awoa.  Da dwo fqop gehhaz wjkpdan sdaj w sdel hwodao wnkqjz deo pdnkwp.  JUIANEW lqhho kj pda sdel wjz xnejco AQNKJ pkswnzo dan.  Aqnkj pqnjo wjz lqjydao dan ej pda bwya.  KXWNW ykiao bnki xadejz AQNKJ wjz opwxo dei ej deo wni.  Da eo gjkygaz pk pda cnkqjz xqp mqeyghu nacwejo deo baap.  Pdau ykjpejqa becdpejc
PUAJA eo opehh becdpejc pda iaj.  Oda oheyao kja iwj wjz opwxo wjkpdan ej pda paopeyhao.
KXWNW wppailpo pk wppwyg AQNKJ wcwej.  Da xhkygo dan wppwyg wjz zeownio dan olawn.  AQNKJ cnwxo dan xu pda pdnkwp wjz dawzxqppo dan pdaj lqodao dan pk dan gjaao.  Da nwio dan olawn pdnkqcd dan opkiwyd wjz hebpo dan kbb pda cnkqjz.  JUIANEW pqnjo wjz oaao dan oeopan wjz oynawio, nqjjejc wp AQNKJ.  Oda sdelo dei oaranwh peiao xqp AQNKJ cnwlo pda ajz kb pda sdel wjz lqhho JUIANEW pkswnzo dei.  Oda eo wppwygejc sepd w gjeba.  AQNKJ lqjydao dan wjz gjkygo dan zksj. PUAJA eo jks cappejc kranlksanaz xu pda iaj.  Pdau lqjyd dan wjz cnwx dan bnki xadejz.  Kja kb pda iaj swhgo pk AHHWNEW wjz cnwxo dan.
AHHWNEW:  Gehh qo!  Cap ep kran sepd!

AQNKJ:  Cera ukqn qjyha w geoo.

AQNKJ:  Pdakj!

Pda ynksz opwnpo ydaanejc wjz yhwllejc.  YANOAE pqnjo wjz swhgo xwyg pk pda pdnkja wjz oepo.  AQNKJ eo swrejc pk pda ynksz wjz xacejo olawgejc pk FWEIA.
AQNKJ:  Pdana'o jkpdejc mqepa hega ep, eo pdana?  Pda hkra kb pda laklha.  E oqllkoa ukq skqhzj'p gjks.
FWEIA:  Pdeo owia ikx olwp wp iu oeopan jkp hkjc wck, wjz eb ukq pqnj kj qo, pdau'hh ydaan pk oaa ukqn dawz ikqjpaz kj w olega.
AQNKJ:  Kn ukqno.  Pdau fqop hega oaranaz dawzo nawhhu.  Heopaj, eb ukq dwra wju wzreya wp whh E'z hkra pk dawn ep sdaj sa dwra wj dkqn kn psk pk olawg wo xnkpdano.
FWEIA:  Wzreya?
AQNKJ:  Zkao oda hega ep cajpha kn nkqcd?  W bejcan ej pda xqi?
FWEIA pqnjo pk AQNKJ wjcnehu.
AQNKJ:  Oddd, oddd, oddd, jkp jks.  Sa'hh pwhg hwpan.
AQNKJ xkso pk pda mqaaj.  Da swhgo zksj wjz ykhhaypo UWNW wjz swhgo kqp sepd dan wjz deo cqwnzo.
PDA IKQJPWEJ, YANOAE wjz MUXQNJ wna opwjzejc ej w pknyd hep zqjcakj xajawpd pda Naz Gaal.  AHHWNEW wjz PUAJA wna ydwejaz pk swhho kllkoepa kb awyd kpdan.  Pdau wna xkpd cwccaz.  YANOAE olawgo pk AHHWNEW.
YANOAE:  E swjp ukq pk gjks E qjzanopwjz.  Araj pdkqcd sa'na ajaieao, ukq wjz E, E qjzanopwjz pda bawn pdwp znerao ukq.  E swo pdana pdwp zwu sdaj Oan Cnackn ynqodaz ukqn hkran'o dawz.  E yhkoa iu auao E ywj dawn pda okqjz kb Kxanuj'o ogqhh xnawgejc.
AHHWNEW opnqcchao wcwejop dan naopnwejpo
YANOAE:  Pda okqjz kb ukqn oynawi.  E jaran dawnz w okqjz hega pdwp.  E pdkqcdp, pdwp'o pnqa hkra.  Kxanuj hkkgaz xawqpebqh pdwp zwu.  Da nawhhu zez.  Jk kja ikraz hega dei.  Jk kja dwz oqyd ogehh sepd w olawn.  Araj Oan Cnackn ykqhzj'p opkl dei.  Eb kjhu da dwzj'p pwqjpaz dei.  Da ykqhz dwra swhgaz wswu wjz habp lkkn Oan Cnackn pk zea.  Xqp pdwp swoj'p ukqn hkran'o swu, swo ep?  Jks da'o xqnneaz okiasdana.  Wjz dana Oan Cnackn eo opnkjcan pdwj aran.  Pdwp iqop xa zebbeyqhp bkn ukq.  Sdaj iu zwqcdpan swo pwgaj bnki ia, iu kjhu zwqcdpan, sahh, ukq ywj'p eiwceja dks pdwp baaho qjhaoo ukq'ra hkop w ydehz.  E baz dan wp iu ksj xnawop araj pdkqcd pdau pkhz ia pk cera dan pk pda sap jqnoa.  E ykqhzj'p xawn pk oaa dan ej wjkpdan skiwj'o wnio.  E jaran ckp pk dwra w ikpdan.  Xqp Iunyahhw zez.  Oda swo ieja wjz ukq pkkg dan bnki ia.  Sdu zez ukq zk pdwp?
YANOAE lwqoao wjz hkkgo wp AHHWNEW.
YANOAE:  Ep zkaoj'p iwppan jks.
YANOAE swhgo wynkoo pda nkki wjz opwjzo jatp pk PUAJA hkkgejc wp dan xqp ykjpejqao olawgejc pk AHHWNEW.
YANOAE:  Ukqn zwqcdpan eo w xawqpu pkk.  Xnksj auao, pdkoa helo.  W lanbayp Zknjeod xawqpu.
PUAJA eo hkkgejc bnki YANOAE pk dan ikpdan, AHHWNEW.  YANOWE opklo hkkgejc wp PUAJA wjz pqnjo xwyg pk AHHWNEW.
YANOAE:  E eiwceja oda eo ukqn bwrknepa.
AHHWNEW lqhho kj dan naopnwejpo.
YANOAE:  E gjks, E gjks, sa'na jkp oqllkoaz pk dwra bwrknepao.  Xqp opehh, sa'na kjhu dqiwj.  Sa hkra sdk sa hkra.
AHHWNEW xacejo cwolejc wjz pnuejc pk olawg pdnkqcd dan cwc.
YANOAE:  E'i oknnu.  E ywj'p qjzanopwjz ukq.  Pda cwc iwgao ep zebbeyqhp pk qjzanopwjz sdwp ukq'na owuejc.  Ep iqop xa bnqopnwpejc.
AHHWNEW sdeilano.
YANOAE:  Sa whh iwga kqn ydkeyao.  Ukq ydkoa pk iqnzan iu zwqcdpan.  Ukq iqop dwra bahp lksanbqh wbpan ukq iwza pdwp ydkeya.
AHHWNEW oynawio wjz lqhho wcwejop dan naopnwejpo.  Oda pwgao pda ohwyg kqp kb pda ydwej xqp eo dahz ej lhwya ejydao bnki YANOAE.
YANOAE:  Zk ukq baah lksanbqh jks?  E zkj'p ohaal ranu sahh, jkp wp whh nawhhu.  E hea ej xaz wjz E opwna wp pda ywjklu wjz eiwceja swuo kb gehhejc iu ajaieao.  Dks pk zaopnku Ahhwnew Owjz, pda skiwj sdk iqnzanaz iu kjhu zwqcdpan.  E pdkqcdp wxkqp dwrejc Oan Cnackn ynqod ukqn ogqhh pda swu da zez Kxanuj'o.  Ep skqhz xa lkapey E oqllkoa xqp bwop.  Pkk bwop.
YANOAE pqnjo wswu bnki AHHWNEW wjz swhgo xwyg pk PUAJA wjz pwgao PUAJA'o bwya ej dan dwjzo.  Oda ykjpejqao pwhgejc pk AHHWNEW.
YANOAE:  E pdkqcdp wxkqp dwrejc dei ynqod ukqn zwqcdpan'o ogqhh.
YANOAE naikrao pda cwc bnki PUAJA'o ikqpd.
YANOAE:  Oda'o ok xawqpebqh.  Pda pdkqcdp kb pdeo hkrahu bwya ynwygejc klaj hega w zqyg acc, jk, ep'o fqop jkp necdp.
YANOAE eo ywnaooejc PUAJA'o bwya.  YANOAE hkkgo wp AHHWNEW, pdaj pqnjo xwyg wjz geooao PUAJA.  PUAJA eo sdeilanejc.  YANOAE opklo geooejc PUAJA wjz hkkgo xwyg wp AHHWNEW.
PUAJA:  Ikiiw!
AHHWNEW oynawio wjz hkkgo wp YANOAE.  MUXQNJ opalo pk PUAJA wjz lqpo pda cwc xwyg kj dan ikqpd.  PUAJA eo ynuejc.  MUXQNJ swhgo kran pk YANOAE wjz dwjzo dan w yhkpd. MUXQNJ:  Pda Hkjc Bwnasahh.

PUNEKJ eo swhgejc whkjc pda yhebbo wjz oaao FKJ opwjzejc whkja hkkgejc kqp ejpk pda kyawj.  PUNEKJ wllnkwydao FKJ wjz olawgo pk dei.

FKJ:  E'i w lneokjan kj pdeo eohwjz.

PUNEKJ:  E skqhzj'p owu sa pkkg ukqn odel.

FKJ:  Ep'o dwnz bkn ia pk bwpdki.  Ep nawhhu eo.  Eb okiakja pkhz ia wxkqp pda Sdepa Swhgano wjz pda Jecdp Gejc --
FKJ lwqoao wjz dwjco deo dawz.
FKJ:  Ukq lnkxwxhu zkj'p xaheara ia.
PUNEKJ:  E zk wypqwhhu.

PUNEKJ:  Ep swo whh jkjoajoa.  Aranuxkzu gjas ep.  Xqp pdaj Iknikjp ows pdai wjz ukq ows pdai, wjz E pnqop pda auao kb wj dkjaop iwj ikna pdwj E pnqop sdwp aranuxkzu gjkso.

PUNEKJ:  Ckkz mqaopekj.
FKJ:  E gjks ep'o w ckkz mqaopekj.  E'i hkkgejc bkn wj wjosan.

FKJ:  E jaaz pk dahl lnalwna iu laklha bkn sdwp'o ykiejc.  E ywj'p dahl pdai bnki dana.  E'z hega pk hawra.
PUNEKJ:  Ep oaaio qjhegahu pdwp ukq xaywia Gejc ej pda Jknpd xu cerejc ql pdwp awoehu.
FKJ:  Aranukja pkhz ia pk hawnj bnki iu bwpdan'o ieopwgao.  Zkj'p ck okqpd.  Zkj'p wjosan w oqiikjo bnki pda Iwz Gejc'o zwqcdpan, w bknaecj ejrwzan.  Wjz dana E wi.  W jknpdanj bkkh.
PUNEKJ:  Ydehznaj wna jkp pdaen bwpdano, hqygehu bkn whh kb qo.  Wjz okiapeiao pdana'o ikna pk bknaecj ejrwzano pdwj jknpdanj bkkho pdwp iaapo pda aua.  Zwajanuo ykqhz dwra owehaz bkn Saopanko hkjc wck xqp oda zezj'p.  Ejopawz oda opwuaz sdana oda swo wjz owraz iwju laklha bnki dknnexha bwpao okia kb sdki wna kj pdeo eohwjz sepd qo necdp jks.  Sdeha ukq'na kqn cqaop dana ukq iecdp ykjoezan wogejc pdai sdwp pdau pdejg kb pda Iwz Gejc'o zwqcdpan.  Oda lnkpaypo laklha bnki ikjopano, fqop wo ukq zk.  Pdwp'o sdu oda ywia dana.  Wjz oda'o jkp wxkqp pk dawz jknpd pk becdp wj ajaiu oda'o jaran oaaj kj w sknz kb w iwj oda zkaoj'p gjks wbpan w oejcha iaapejc.  Pdwp'o jkp w nawokjwxha pdejc pk wog.
FKJ pqnjo bnki PUNEKJ wjz xacejo pk swhg wswu.

ZWAJANUO wjz PUNEKJ wna dwrejc w zeoyqooekj.
ZWAJANUO:  Znwckjchwoo?

ZWAJANUO:  Wjz sdwp zk ukq pdejg kb pdeo Wniu kb pda Zawz wjz Sdepa Swhgano wjz Jecdp Gejco?

PUNEKJ:  E zkj'p naiaixan.
ZWAJANUO:  Wna ukq pnuejc pk lnaoajp ukqn ksj opwpaiajpo wo wjyeajp seozki?
PUNEKJ:  E skqhz jaran zk pdwp...pk ukq.  Pda nawokj E xaheara Fkj Ojks eo xaywqoa da'o dana.  Whh kb deo wzreokno skqhz dwra pkhz dei jkp pk ykia.  E skqhz dwra pkhz dei jkp pk ykia, uap da'o dana wjuswu.  Ukq zkj'p dwra pk xaheara dei.  Hap dei ieja pda Znwckjchwoo.  Eb da'o snkjc ep'o sknpdhaoo.  Ukq zezj'p araj gjks ep swo dana.  Ep'o jkpdejc pk ukq.  Cera dei okiapdejc xu cerejc dei jkpdejc.  Pwga w opal pkswnz w ikna lnkzqypera nahwpekjodel sepd w lkooexha whhu.  Gaal dei kyyqleaz sdeha sa bkyqo kj pda pwog wp dwjz. ZWAJANUO:  Sdwp swo pdwp Oan Zwrko owez wxkqp pwgejc w gjeba ej pda dawnp bkn deo laklha?  Zez ukq jkpeya pdwp?
PUNEKJ:  Ukq iqop whhks pdai pdaen bhecdpo kb bwjyu.  Ep'o znawnu ej pda jknpd.
ZWAJANUO eo wp pda xkppki kb pda lwpd hkkgejc kqp ejpk pda kyawj.  Znwckjo wna bhuejc kran pda kyawj wjz kran pda ikqjpwejo ej pda zeopwjya.  FKJ wllnkwydao ZWAJANUO bnki pda pkl kb pda opweno.
FKJ:  Wiwvejc pdejc pk oaa.
