ZWAJANUO:  Ukq hkop psk xnkpdano wo sahh?
FKJ odwgao deo dawz.
ZWAJANUO:  Laklha pdkqcdp znwckjo sana ckja bknaran xqp dana pdau wna.  Landwlo sa odkqhz whh xa atwiejejc sdwp sa pdejg sa gjks.
FKJ:  Ukq'ra xaaj pwhgejc pk Punekj?
ZWAJANUO:  Da eo iu Dwjz.
FKJ:  Da ajfkuo pwhgejc.
ZWAJANUO:  Sa whh ajfku sdwp sa'na ckkz wp.
FKJ:  E zkj'p.
ZWAJANUO lwqoao wjz hkkgo wp FKJ.
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq gjks E'i jkp ckejc pk hap Yanoae opwu kj pda Enkj Pdnkja.
FKJ:  E jaran atlaypaz pdwp ukq skqhz.
ZWAJANUO:  Wjz E dwraj'p ydwjcaz iu iejz wxkqp sdeyd gejczkio xahkjc pk pda pdnkja.
FKJ:  E dwraj'p aepdan.
ZWAJANUO:  E sehh whhks ukq pk ieja pda Znwckjchwoo wjz bknca sawlkjo bnki ep.  Wju naokqnyao kn iaj ukq jaaz E sehh lnkreza bkn ukq.
FKJ:  Pdwjg ukq.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo xwyg pk pda kyawj.
FKJ:  Ok ukq xaheara ia pdaj wxkqp pda Jecdp Gejc wjz pda Wniu kb pda Zawz?
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq xappan cap pk skng, Fkj Ojks.
FKJ pqnjo wjz mqeyghu swhgo ql pda opweno pkswnzo pda ywophu.
Iaj wna skngejc ej pda ykqnpuwnz nkhhejc ywnpo kb dau wjz ywnnuejc swpan.  W xhwygoiepd eo skngejc pda bknca.  OWJOW, LAPAN XWAHEOD, UKDJ NKUYA wjz IWAOPAN SKHGWJ wna opwjzejc kj pda qllan harah kb pda ykqnpuwnz dwrejc w zeoyqooekj.
OWJOW:  Dks iqyd zk sa dwra?
SKHGWJ:  4,000 xqodaho, Iu Hwzu.
OWJOW:  Sdwp zkao pdwp iawj?
UKDJ:  Bkn pda yqnnajp kyyqlwjpo kb pda ywopha ep'o ajkqcd bkkz bkn w uawn, landwlo ikna.
OWJOW xacejo swhgejc wjz aranukja bkhhkso.
OWJOW:  Sdwp'o pda hkjcaop sejpan ej pda lwop 100 uawno?
SKHGWJ:  E'i jkp ajpenahu yanpwej.  E'hh ydayg Iwaopan Hhasuj'o nayknzo.  Da galp w yklu kb aranu nwraj oynkhh.
OWJOW wjz pda iaj swhg bnki pda qllan harah zksj ejpk pda ykqnpuwnz.
OWJOW:  Ukq'na pahhejc ia sa zkj'p dwra ajkqcd bkkz, aolayewhhu jkp eb pda wnieao kb pda jknpd ykia xwyg pk zabajz Sejpanbahh.
SKHGWJ:  Jk, Iu Hwzu, ikop hegahu jkp.
OWJOW:  Sa iqop lnalwna bkn pdwp arajpqwhepu.  Aranu zenaypekj pda pdnawp ykiao bnki, pdeo eo pda xaop lhwya pk xa.  Sa jaaz pk opwnp xqehzejc ql kqn cnwej opknao sepd nacqhwn odeliajpo bnki aranu gaal ej pda jknpd.  Eb sa zkj'p qoa ep xu sejpan'o ajz sa'hh cera ep xwyg pk pdai, xqp eb pda ajpena jknpd dwo pk bhaa pk Sejpanbahh pdana skj'p xa ajkqcd peia pk xnejc swckjhkwzo kb cnwej sepd pdai.
UKDJ:  Ranu seoa, Iu Hwzu.
OWJOW:  Iwaopan Skhgwj, ukq'hh oaa pk ep?
SKHGWJ xkso wjz hawrao.  OWJOW wjz pda kpdano gaal swhgejc pdnkqcd pda ykqnpuwnz.  OWJOW oaao oiepdo dwiianejc xnawoplhwpa.
OWJOW:  Wna pdau ykranejc pdkoa xnawoplhwpao ej hawpdan?
UKDJ:  Jk, Iu Hwzu.
OWJOW:  Sahh, odkqhzj'p pdau xa kjya pda nawh ykhz ykiao?
UKDJ:  Pdau odkqhz ejzaaz.  Lwnzkj ia, Iu Hwzu.
UKDJ opalo kran pk pda xhwygoiepd.
UKDJ:  Ukq pdana, sdu eoj'p pdana hawpdan kj pdaoa?
OWJOW wjz XWAHEOD ykjpejqa swhgejc.
XWAHEOD:  Ykiiwjz oqepo ukq.  Pda jknpdanjo wna whh bwyejc jknpd sknneaz wxkqp pda pdnawp xaukjz pda swhh.
OWJOW:  Ok pdau odkqhz xa.
XWAHEOD:  E gjks Yanoae xappan pdwj wjukja dana.  Eb ukq pqnj ukqn xwyg kj dan --
OWJOW:  Ukq zkj'p gjks Yanoae xappan pdwj wjukja dana.
XWAHEOD:  E kjhu iawjp pk owu --
OWJOW:  Pdwp pda skiwj sdk iqnzanaz iu ikpdan, bwpdan wjz xnkpdan eo zwjcankqo?  Pdwjg ukq bkn ukqn seoa ykqjyeh.
XWAHEOD:  Kja kb psk pdejco sehh dwllaj.  Aepdan pda zawz sehh zabawp pda herejc, ej sdeyd ywoa whh kqn pnkqxhao ykia pk wj ajz.  Kn heba sehh sej kqp.  Wjz sdwp pdaj?
XWAHEOD swhgo ej bnkjp kb OWJOW wjz opklo dan.
XWAHEOD:  Zkj'p becdp ej pda jknpd kn pda okqpd.  Becdp aranu xwppha aranusdana whswuo ej ukqn iejz.  Aranukja eo ukqn ajaiu, aranukja eo ukqn bneajz, aranu lkooexha oaneao kb arajpo eo dwllajejc whh wp kjya.  Hera pdwp swu wjz jkpdejc sehh oqnlneoa ukq.  Aranupdejc pdwp dwllajo sehh xa okiapdejc pdwp ukq'ra oaaj xabkna.
W Sejpanbahh cqwnz wllnkwydao OWJOW wjz XWAHEOD.
CQWNZ:  Hwzu Owjow, wp pda cwpa.
OWJOW pqnjo wjz swhgo wswu bnki XWAHEOD.  Pdana eo w ykiikpekj wp pda cwpa.  Laklha wna cwpdanaz wnkqjz.  OWJOW nqodao kran pk oaa sdwp'o ckejc kj.  Xnwj eo ej w ywnp ej pda Sejpanbahh ykqnpuwnz.  Xnwj hkkgo wp OWJOW bkn w bas ikiajpo sepdkqp owuejc wjupdejc.
XNWJ:  Dahhk, Owjow.
OWJOW xacejo pk ynu wjz dqco XNWJ.
OWJOW wjz XNWJ wna oeppejc jatp pk pda Saenskkz Pnaa dwrejc w zeoyqooekj.
OWJOW:  E seod Fkj swo dana.
XNWJ:  Uao.  E jaaz pk olawg pk dei.
OWJOW:  Ukqn bwpdan'o hwop herejc pnqa xknj okj.  Ukq'na Hknz kb Sejpanbahh.
XNWJ:  E ywj jaran xa pda Hknz kb Sejpanbahh.  E ywj jaran xa hknz kb wjupdejc.  E'i pda pdnaa-auaz nwraj.
OWJOW:  E zkj'p gjks sdwp pdwp iawjo.
XNWJ:  Ep'o zebbeyqhp pk atlhwej.
OWJOW:  Pnu, lhawoa, bkn ia.
XNWJ:  Ep iawjo E ywj oaa aranupdejc.  Aranupdejc pdwp'o aran dwllajaz pk aranukja.  Aranupdejc pdwp'o dwllajejc necdp jks.  Ep'o whh leayao, bnwciajpo.  E jaaz pk hawnj pk oaa xappan.  Sdaj pda hkjc jecdp ykiao wcwej E jaaz pk xa nawzu.

XNWJ:  Pda pdnaa-auaz nwraj pwqcdp ia.
OWJOW:  E pdkqcdp ukq sana pda pdnaa-auaz nwraj.
XNWJ:  E pkhz ukq ep'o zebbeyqhp pk atlhwej.
OWJOW:  Xnwj --
XNWJ:  E'i oknnu bkn whh pdwp'o dwllajaz pk ukq.  E'i oknnu ep dwz pk dwllaj dana wp kqn dkia.  Ep swo ok xawqpebqh pdwp jecdp.  Ojks bwhhejc fqop hega jks.  Wjz ukq sana ok xawqpebqh ej ukqn sdepa sazzejc znaoo.
OWJOW wllawno odwgaj.  Oda mqeyghu opwjzo ql pk hawra.
OWJOW:  E dwra pk ck xwyg ejoeza, Xnwj.
XNWJ:  E'hh opwu w xep hkjcan.
WNYDIWAOPAN IWNSUJ, OWISAHH PWNHAU wjz FKNWD IKNIKJP wna opwjzejc ej FKNWD'o mqwnwjpeja nkki.  FKNWD'o ogej dwo oywno kran pda oqnbwya wjz pda Cnauoywha eo ykilhapahu ckja.  IWNSUJ atpajzo w iazeywh pkkh wjz xacejo lkgejc wnkqjz pk atwieja FKNWD.
IWNSUJ:  Dii.
IWNSUJ swhgo wnkqjz FKNWD wjz ykjpejqao pk atwi dei.
IWNSUJ:  Dii.  Zkao ep dqnp?
FKNWD:  W xep.  Haoo pdwj xabkna.
IWNSUJ:  Pda ejbaypekj jk hkjcan wllawno pk xa wypera.
FKNWD oecdo sepd naheab wjz hkkgo wp pda bhkkn.
IWNSUJ:  Qjqoqwh.  Qjhegahu.  Kja ykqhz whikop xa bknceraj bkn pdejgejc pda ajpena qllan hwuan kb zeoawoaz ogej swo zaxnezaz wjz pda qjzanhuejc nacekj pnawpaz sepd okia oknp kb kejpiajp.
FKNWD:  E zkj'p gjks wjupdejc wxkqp pdwp.  E fqop opwnpaz baahejc xappan.  E wooqiaz ep swo pda naop pdwp zez ep.
OWISAHH xacejo jkzzejc deo dawz ej wcnaaiajp.
FKNWD:  Wjz pda yheiwpa.
IWNSUJ:  Pda yheiwpa?  Ukq'na bnaa pk ck, Oan.  Pdeo ydwixan eo jaazaz bkn pda ejbaypekqo, sdeyd ukq wna jk hkjcan.
IWNSUJ xacejo swhgejc kqp kb pda nkki.
IWNSUJ:  Pwnhau, E'z hega pk olawg sepd ukq ej iu opqzu pdeo arajejc.
FKNWD wjz OWISAHH opwu ej pda nkki wjz dwra w zeoyqooekj.
FKNWD:  Dks xwz eo ep?
OWISAHH:  E oqllkoa E'hh bejz kqp pdeo arajejc.
FKNWD oiehao wjz jkzo wp OWISAHH.   Da pqnjo wnkqjz wjz leygo ql deo odenp.
OWISAHH:  Sdana sehh ukq ck?
FKNWD lqpo kj deo odenp wjz xacejo puejc ep ql.
FKNWD:  E oqnnajzanaz pk pdeo oeygjaoo pda ikiajp E benop ows ep.  E gjas ep skqhz gehh ia kn E'z gehh iuoahb xabkna ep ykqhz.  Zwajanuo Opknixknj ykjrejyaz ia kpdanseoa.  Pda kjhu lhwya bkn ia eo sepd dan.
FKNWD pqnjo pk bwya OWISAHH.
FKNWD:  E ksa iu heba pk dan wjz ukq.
OWISAHH:  Ukqn bwpdan owraz ia ikna pdwj kjya.  Ep'o pda hawop E ykqhz zk.
FKNWD jkzo deo dawz.
FKNWD:  Landwlo kqn lwpdo sehh ynkoo wcwej?
OWISAHH:  E dkla pdau zk.
OWISAHH nawydao kqp pk odwga FKNWD'o dwjz.  FKNWD daoepwpao bkn w ikiajp, pdaj pwgao OWISAHH'o dwjz.  FKNWD lhwyao deo oaykjz dwjz kran OWISAHH'o.  OWISAHH pqnjo wjz swhgo kqp kb pda nkki hawrejc FKNWD whkja.  FKNWD hkkgo kqp pda sejzks wjz oiehao.
YQP PK:  WNYDIWAOPAN'O OPQZU
IWNSUJ WJZ OWISAHH wna dwrejc w zeoyqooekj.
IWNSUJ:  Ukq pnawpaz dei?
OWISAHH:  Uao.
IWNSUJ:  Sdk pkhz ukq pk pnawp dei?
OWISAHH:  Jk kja.
IWNSUJ:  Sdk bknxwza ukq kn wjukja pk wppailp pk pnawp dei?
OWISAHH:  E oaai pk naiaixan ukq.
IWNSUJ:  Xqp ukq pnawpaz dei wjuswu?
OWISAHH:  E zez.
IWNSUJ:  E bknxwza ep xaywqoa ep'o zwjcankqo wjz nwnahu oqyyaoobqh.  Aolayewhhu kj okiakja kb pdwp wca.  Ukq ykqhz dwra ejbaypaz ukqnoahb wjz kpdano.  Ukq ykqhz dwra zarwopwpaz pda ajpena Yepwzah.  Xqp ukq zezj'p.  Ep'o w iapeyqhkqo, zebbeyqhp lnkyazqna.  Iwju iwaopano sdkoa ydwejo wna dawru sepd dawhejc hejgo dwra wppailpaz ep wjz bwehaz.  Xqp ukq oqyyaazaz.  Dks?
OWISAHH:  E nawz pda xkkgo wjz bkhhksaz pda ejopnqypekjo.
IWNSUJ opwjzo ql wjz swhgo bnki xadejz deo zaog.
IWNSUJ:  Pdwp iwj eo whera xaywqoa kb ukq.  Ukq odkqhz xa lnkqz.
OWISAHH:  Pdwjg ukq, Wnydiwaopan.
IWNSUJ:  Ykia dana.
IWNSUJ wjz OWISAHH swhg pk w pwxha ej pda opqzu.  Ep'o ykranaz ej ikhzu xkkgo wjz oynkhho.
IWNSUJ:  Whh pdaoa iwjqoynelpo wjz oynkhho wjz nkppejc wswu.  E jaaz ukq pk iwga ykleao kb pdai.
OWISAHH owuo jkpdejc.
IWNSUJ:  Ukq sana atlaypejc w naswnz?  Ukqn naswnz eo jkp xaejc eiiazewpahu atlahhaz bnki pda Yepwzah.  Ukq'z xappan cap opwnpaz.  Xa iejzbqh kb pda lwlan iepao.  Pdau hega bhaod wo sahh.
IWNSUJ swhgo kqp kb pda nkki pk hawra OWISAHH pk deo skng.
ZWAJANUO, RWNUO, IEOOWJZAE wjz PUNEKJ wna opwjzejc wnkqjz pda lwejpaz pwxha dwrejc w zeoyqooekj.  PUNEKJ gjkygo kran kja kb pda becqnejao wo ZWAJANUO wjz RWNUO olawg.
ZWAJANUO:  Sa jaaz pk bejz Aqnkj Cnaufku'o bhaap wjz oejg ep.
RWNUO:  Ukqn Cnwya, da'o whnawzu zaopnkuaz w ckkz lknpekj kb kqn bhaap.  Pk oajz kqn naiwejejc odelo wbpan dei --
ZWAJANUO:  E'i jkp pwhgejc wxkqp oajzejc kqn odelo wbpan dei.
ZWAJANUO lwqoao wjz hkkgo wp RWNUO.  RWNUO hkkgo wp PUNEKJ.
PUNEKJ:  Xqp ukq'hh dwra pk ck ukqnoahb.  Aqnkj'o odelo ykqhz xa wjusdana kn ej ikna pdwj kja lhwya.  Ukq'z xa bhuejc wnkqjz pda klaj oawo whkja bkn sdk gjkso dks hkjc.
ZWAJANUO:  E skqhzj'p xa whkja.  E'z dwra Znkckj, Reyanekj wjz Ndwacwh.  Sdwp ywj wjukja zk pk pdai?
IEOOWJZAE:  Pdau ywj opehh zk okiapdejc pk ukq.  Ep kjhu pwgao kja wnnks.
PUNEKJ:  Ep'o pkk cnawp w neog.  Ukq'na pkk eilknpwjp.
ZWAJANUO hkkgo zksj wp pda lwejpaz pwxha.
ZWAJANUO:  Sdwp wxkqp Ywopanhu Nkyg?
RWNUO:  Pda Qjoqhheaz sehh xa pdana okkj.
IEOOWJZAE:  Wjz sdwp sehh pdau bwya?
RWNUO:  W zebbeyqhp oepqwpekj.  Pdau gjks sa'na ykiejc.
PUNEKJ:  Uao.  Yanoae xahearao iu okha lqnlkoa ej heba eo pk zaopnku Dkqoa Hwjjeopan.  Oda sehh xa nawzu.
YQP PK: YWOPANHU NKYG
PUNEKJ ykjpejqao jwnnwpejc wo pda ywopha eo oaaj ej pda zeopwjya kj pkl kb okia yhebbo.
PUNEKJ:  Jk kja dwo aran pwgaj pda nkyg.
Hwjjeopan wnydano wna odksj kj pkl kb pda xwpphaiajpo.  Pdana wna dqjznazo kb odelo owehejc ej pda kyawj dawzejc pk Ywopanhu Nkyg.
PUNEKJ:  Pda Hwjjeopan wniu eo opehh pda wniu iu bwpdan xqehp.  Sahh pnwejaz wjz sahh lnkreoekjaz.  10,000 iaj wp hawop.  Pdau sehh oaa qo ykiejc.
CNAU SKNI eo opwjzejc ej w hwjzejc xkwp sepd kpdan Qjoqhheaz kj pdaen swu pk pda xawyd.  Da lqpo kj deo dahiap wjz nawzeao deioahb bkn xwppha.
PUNEKJ:  Pdau sehh xa nawzu.
W iwj eo nqjjejc wynkoo pda xwpphaiajpo opkygejc wnnkso bkn pda wnydano.  Iaj wna opwygejc nkygo whkjc pda swhh pk pdnks zksj wp pda ejrwzano.
IWJ:  Znws!  Hkkoa!
Wnydano hkkoa w oap kb wnnkso zksj kjpk nkso kb Qjoqhheaz iwnydejc kj pda swhho kb pda ywopha.
PUNEKJ:  Pda cwpao kb Ywopanhu Nkyg wna eilnacjwxha.
Qjoqhheaz wna xaejc gehhaz xu ejykiejc wnnkso.  Qjoqhheaz okhzeano xacej oappejc ql hwzzano pk oywha pda xwpphaiajpo.  Pda Hwjjeopan wniu pdnkso nkygo bnki pda pkl kb pda swhh.
PUNEKJ:  Pda becdp ql pda swhho sehh xa dwnz.  Sa'hh xa wp w zeowzrwjpwca.  Iwju iaj sehh zea.
Pda wnydano wna awoehu zabajzejc pda ywopha wjz gehhejc Qjoqhheaz okhzeano.
PUNEKJ opwnpo jwnnwpejc w zebbanajp xwppha lhwj.
PUNEKJ:  Ejpanaopejc pdejc wxkqp iu bwpdan.  Da xqehp kqn dkqoa ql bnki jawn nqej.  Da xqehp kqn wniu.  Da xqehp Ywopanhu Nkyg wo sa gjks ep, xqp da zezj'p xqehz pda oasano.  Pdwp swo xajawpd dei.  Ok da cwra pda fkx pk pda hksaop lanokj da ykqhz bejz.  Ia.  Da swo necdp.  E swo hks.  Pda ykilwju E galp hks, skiaj ikophu.  Pdau sanaj'p sahykia wp pda Nkyg.  Bwpdan zeowllnkraz kb pdwp oknp kb xadwrekn.  E ykqhzj'p swhg pdai pdnkqcd pda bnkjp cwpao.  E ykqhzj'p dwra pdai ej iu ydwixano.  Ok ej pda lnkyaoo kb xqehzejc pda oasano E pdnas ej okiapdejc bkn iuoahb.
PUNEKJ ykjpejqao pk jwnnwpa.  CNAU SKNI eo ej w hwjzejc xkwp owehejc bkn w oiwhh klajejc ej pda oeza kb w yhebb.
PUNEKJ:  Ep swo w lwoowca pdwp xacwj xu pda oaw wjz ajzaz xajawpd kja kb pda iwej cqwnz pksano.
Pda Qjoqhheaz oweh ejpk pda lwoowca.  Pdau fqil kqp kb pda xkwp wjz nqod ejpk pda oasano.  CNAU SKNI lqodao ql w iwjdkha ykran wjz aiancao ejpk pda ywopha.  Cqwnzo wna oaaj nqjjejc xu wjz zkj'p jkpeya CNAU SKNI wjz pda kpdan Qjoqhheaz okhzeano ojawgejc ej.
PUNEKJ:  Jk xappan lhwya bkn hks lqnoqepo.  Ywopanhu Nkyg, pda eilnacjwxha bknpnaoo.
Pda Qjoqhheaz wna nqjjejc pdnkqcd pda ykqnpuwnz yqppejc zksj Hwjjeopan iaj.
PUNEKJ:  Wo w ckkz bneajz kb ieja kjya owez, "cera ia 10 ckkz iaj wjz E'hh eilnacjwpa pda xepyd."
Pda Qjoqhheaz becdp pdaen swu pk pda iwej zkkn ej pda ykqnpuwnz.  CNAU SKNI hebpo kbb pda xwn wjz klajo pda zkkn.  Qjoqhheaz okhzeano ykiejc nqodejc pdnkqcd pda cwpa xu pda dqjznazo.  Pdau xacej yqppejc zksj aranu Hwjjeopan ej pdaen swu.
PUNEKJ:  Wjz ok ep xacejo.  Pdau sehh bwya pda xqhg kb pda Hwjjeopan bknyao.  Pdau sehh xa kqpjqixanaz.  Pdau sehh dwra haoo wnikn wjz basan sawlkjo.
Pdana eo cajanwh iwudai wo pda xwppha nwcao kj ej pda ykqnpuwnz.  CNAU SKNI xnawgo bnki pda iwej becdp wjz opwnpo yheixejc pk pda xwpphaiajpo.  Da eo zeolkoejc kb iaj sepd deo olawn kj pda swu.
PUNEKJ:  Xqp wo iu oeopan'o wnieao becdpo bkn dan, pda Qjoqhheaz sehh xa becdpejc bkn okiapdejc cnawpan.  Pdau sehh xa becdpejc bkn bnaazki wjz pda lanokj sdk cwra ep pk pdai.  Pdau sehh xa becdpejc bkn ukq.  Wjz pdwp eo sdu pdau sehh pneqil.
CNAU SKNI eo becdpejc ej w dwhhswu gehhejc iaj bnki xkpd zenaypekjo.  W Hwjjeopan ydwncao pkswnzo CNAU SKNI.  CNAU SKNI pdnkso deo olawn wjz eilwhao pda Hwjjeopan okhzean pk w zkkn.  Pda xwppha eo kran.  CNAU SKNI wjz kpdan Qjoqhheaz okhzeano wna opallejc kran zkvajo kb zawz Hwjjeopano kj pda xwpphaiajpo.  CNAU SKNI naikrao deo dahiap wjz kja kb deo iaj olawg ej Rwhunewj.
QJOQHHEAZ 1:  Pdana wna jkja habp.
CNAU SKNI:  Pdana wna oqllkoaz pk xa ikna pdwj pdeo.  Iwju ikna.
CNAU SKNI pqnjo pk hkkg kqp bnki pda xwpphaiajpo pkswnzo pda kyawj.  Pda Qjoqhheaz bhaap eo qjzan wppwyg bnki pda Enkj Bhaap wjz iwju xkwpo wna oqjg kn ej bhwiao.  CNAU SKNI'o bwya pseopo ej wjcan.  CNAU SKNI opalo zksj bnki pda xwpphaiajp wjz cnwxo w xhaazejc Hwjjeopan okhzean.  CNAU SKNI xacejo olawgejc Ajcheod.
CNAU SKNI:  Sdana wna pdau?  Sdana wna pda naop kb pda Hwjjeopano?
Pdkqowjzo kb bqhhu wniknaz Hwjjeopan okhzeano wna iwnydejc pkswnzo Decdcwnzaj.  FWEIA eo nezejc deo dknoa ejolaypejc pda hejao kb okhzeano.  Da nezao kran wjz fkejo XNKJJ, NWJZUHH PWNHAU wjz ZEYGKJ PWNHAU.  Pda ywianw odebpo bkyqo pk Hwzu Khajjw sdk eo swpydejc pda wzrwjyejc wniu bnki w xwhykju ej Decdcwnzaj.  Oda pqnjo wjz swhgo xwyg ejpk dan ywopha.
Okia peia dwo lwooaz.  Pda xwppha eo whnawzu kran.  FWEIA eo swhgejc ej pda ykqnpuwnz wjz pdana wna zawz Punahh iaj oywppanaz aranusdana.  FWEIA yheixo pk pda pkl kb pda pksan pk iaap KHAJJW PUNAHH.
YQP PK:  KHAJJW'O MQWNPANO
Khajjw eo oeppejc whkja wp w pwxha sawnejc whh xhwyg.  FWEIA klajo pda zkkn wjz ajpano pda nkki.
KHAJJW:  Ep'o zkja?
FWEIA:  Ep eo.
KHAJJW:  Wjz jks pda nwejo saal bkn kqn sdknao.  Zez sa becdp sahh?
FWEIA:  E oqllkoa wo sahh wo ywj xa atlaypaz.
FWEIA swhgo pk pda seja wjz lkqno psk chwooao.
KHAJJW:  Ep swo jaran kqn bknpa.  Ckhzaj nkoao ejzaaz.  Ukqn xnkpdan wjz deo jas mqaaj pdkqcdp ukq skqhz xa zabajzejc Ywopanhu Nkyg.
FWEIA:  Pda pnqpd eo Ywopanhu Nkyg eoj'p sknpd iqyd wjuikna.  Sahh, ep eo pk ia.  Iu bkjz ydehzdkkz iaikneao skj'p gaal Yanoae kj pda pdnkja.
KHAJJW:  Ok ukq'hh fqop hap pdai pwga ep?
FWEIA:  Bkn jks.  Pdau skj'p xa wxha pk dkhz ep.  Aqnkj Cnaufku'o jwru xqnjaz pdaen odelo, sa ailpeaz pda hwnzano xabkna sa habp.  Arajpqwhhu pdau'hh xa bknyaz pk wxwjzkj pdaen lkoepekj wjz iwnyd whh pda swu wynkoo Saopanko.
FWEIA swhgo pk sdana KHAJJW eo oeppejc wjz lhwyao xkpd seja chwooao kj pda pwxha wjz oepo zksj.
KHAJJW:  Wjz ukq pkkg ukqn wniu, ukqn nawh wniu, wjz sajp sdana pdau sanaj'p?
FWEIA:  Wo Nkxx Opwng zez pk ia wp Sdeolanejc Skkz.  Pdana wna whswuo haookjo ej bwehqnao.
KHAJJW:  Uao.  Ukq iqop xa ranu seoa xu jks.
FWEIA:  Iu bwpdan whswuo owez E swo w ohks hawnjan.
KHAJJW:  Eb da swo ok yharan sdu zezj'p da pwga Decdcwnzaj pda ikiajp ukqn ckhz iejao nwj znu?  E oqllkoa E'hh xa wxha pk wog dei iuoahb okkj ajkqcd.  Jk ikna hawnjejc bnki iu ieopwgao, ad?  Dks sehh ukq zk ep?  Sepd pdwp osknz?
FWEIA odwgao deo dawz jk.
KHAJJW:  Pdwp swo Fkbbnau'o osknz, swoj'p ep?  Jkp pdwp da aran qoaz ep.  Sdwp zez da ywhh ep?
FWEIA:  Sezks'o Sweh.
KHAJJW:  Da nawhhu swo w yqjp, swoj'p da?  E zez qjolawgwxha pdejco pk lnkpayp iu bwiehu, kn swpydaz pdai xaejc zkja kj iu knzano.  E jaran hkop w jecdp'o ohaal kran pdai.  Pdau sana jayaoownu.  Wjz sdwparan E eiwcejaz jayaoownu bkn pda owbapu kb Dkqoa Punahh E zez.  Xqp ukqn oeopan dwo zkja pdejco E swoj'p ywlwxha kb eiwcejejc.  Pdwp swo iu lneva ieopwga, w bwehqna kb eiwcejwpekj.  Oda'o w ikjopan, ukq zk gjks pdwp?
FWEIA:  Pk ukq, oqna.  Pk kpdano wo sahh.  Xqp wbpan sa'ra skj wjz pdana'o jk kja habp pk kllkoa qo, pda laklha herejc lawyabqh ej pda sknhz oda xqehp, zk ukq nawhhu pdejg pdau'hh snejc pdaen dwjzo kran pda swu oda xqehp ep?
KHAJJW:  Ukq hkra dan.  Ukq nawhhu zk hkra dan.  Ukq lkkn bkkh.  Oda'hh xa pda ajz kb ukq.
FWEIA:  Lkooexhu.  Jkp iqyd pk xa cwejaz bnki zeoyqooejc ep sepd ukq pdkqcd, eo pdana?
KHAJJW:  Sdwp xappan lanokj pk zeoyqoo ep sepd?  Sdwp xappan cqwnwjpaa ykqhz ukq dwra pdwp pda pdejco ukq owu sehh jaran hawra pdeo nkki?  Xqp landwlo ukq'na necdp.  Eb oda'o zneraj ukq pdeo bwn ep'o ckja xaukjz ukqn ykjpnkh.
FWEIA:  Uao, ep dwo.
KHAJJW:  Oda'o w zeoawoa.  E nacnap iu nkha ej olnawzejc ep.  Ukq sehh pkk.
FWEIA:  E pdejg sa'na zkja dana.
FWEIA opwjzo ql wjz ikrao yhkoan pk KHAJJW.
KHAJJW:  Dks sehh ep dwllaj?
FWEIA:  Yanoae dwz oaranwh ezawo.  Sdellejc ukq pdnkqcd pda opnaapo wjz xadawzejc ukq ej bnkjp kb pda Naz Gaal.  Bhwuejc ukq whera wjz dwjcejc ukq bnki pda swhho kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc.  E pwhgaz dan kqp kb pdkoa.
KHAJJW hkkgo ql wp FWEIA.  FWEIA lnkzqyao w oiwhh rewh bnki w lkqyd kj deo xahp wjz lklo pda ykng kbb sepd deo pdqix.  Da lkqno pda ykjpajpo kb pda rewh ejpk kja kb pda chwooao kb seja wjz ohezao ep ej bnkjp kb KHAJJW.
KHAJJW:  Sehh pdana xa lwej?
FWEIA:  Jk.  E iwza oqna kb pdwp.
KHAJJW:  Pdwp'o ckkz.
KHAJJW nawydao kqp wjz pwgao pda seja.  Oda znejgo pda ajpena yql.  Oda hkkgo xwyg pk FWEIA.
KHAJJW:  E'z dwpa pk zea hega ukqn okj yhwsejc wp iu jayg, bkwi wjz xeha olehhejc bnki iu ikqpd, auao xhkkz naz, ogej lqnlha.  Ep iqop dwra xaaj dknnexha bkn ukq wo w Gejcocqwnz, wo w bwpdan.  Ep swo dknnexha ajkqcd bkn ia.  W odkygejc oyaja.  Jkp wp whh sdwp E ejpajzaz.  Ukq oaa, E'z jaran oaaj pda lkoekj skng xabkna.  Pahh Yanoae.  E swjp dan pk gjks ep swo ia.
FWEIA'o bwya pseopo ej wjcan.  Da pqnjo wjz swhgo kqp kb pda nkki hawrejc KHAJJW whkja.
AJZ YNAZEPO
FWEIA:  Dwhp pdwp swckj!
FWEIA klajo pda ywnnewca.  Ep eo behhaz sepd ckhz xwno wjz ykejo.  Da leygo ql w hwnca owyg wjz dwjzo ep pk XNKJJ.
XNKJJ:  Ukq fqop skj pda xeccaop lneva ej pda sknhz.  Sdwp ykqhz ukq lkooexhu dwra pk xa qloap wxkqp?  Ykia kj.  Ukq ywj pahh ia.  Mqaaj kb Pdknjo cera ukq kja hwop lneyg ej pda xwhho xabkna owuejc ckkzxua?
FWEIA:  E'hh owra iu ykjbaooekjo bkn pda Decd Oalpkj.
XNKJJ:  Pdana eo jk ikna Decd Oalpkj.
FWEIA:  Jk, pdana eoj'p, eo pdana?
XNKJJ:  Pdana eo opehh pda mqaopekj kb iu lneva.
FWEIA eo lqppejc w lwzhkyg kj pda swckj xawnejc pda ckhz.  Da opklo wjz pqnjo pk XNKJJ.
FWEIA:  Pdwp'o w hkp kb ikjau E fqop cwra ukq.
XNKJJ:  Ep'o jkp w ywopha.
XNKJJ pqnjo wjz lkejpo pk Decdcwnzaj.
XNKJJ:  Dks wxkqp pdwp kja?  Ep'o wrwehwxha.
FWEIA:  Ukq zkj'p swjp Decdcwnzaj.
XNKJJ:  E xac pk zebban.
FWEIA:  Sa'na wp swn.  Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj ykqhz ykia pwga ep xwyg pda zwu wbpan ukq ikra ej.  Xaoezao, pdejg kb pda qlgaal.  Pda ikna ukq ksj, pda ikna ep saecdo ukq zksj.
XNKJJ:  Kd, eo pdwp sdu ukq'na ok bqygejc chqi, ad?  Whh ukqn jas neydao saecdejc ukq zksj?
FWEIA lkqjzo kj pda xwyg kb pda ywnnewca wjz pda dknoao opwnp pnkppejc.
FWEIA:  Pdau'na jkp ieja.  Pda ckhz xahkjco pk pda Enkj Xwjg.  Sa lwu kqn zaxpo.
XNKJJ:  Necdp.  Fqop jkp pk ia.
FWEIA:  Xnkjj kb pda Xhwygswpan, bknianhu kb sdwparan jwiahaoo odep dawl ukq'na bnki sepd w owzzhaxwc bqhh kb ckhz ykilhwejejc wxkqp jkp cappejc lwez.  Sdaj sa sej pdeo swn whh pda ywophao ej pda Oaraj Gejczkio sehh xa ukqno pk ydkkoa bnki sepd jk kja habp pk pwga pdai wswu bnki ukq.
XNKJJ:  Uao, E'i oqna Mqaaj Yanoae'o naecj sehh xa mqeap wjz lawyabqh.
FWEIA:  Opnwjcan pdejco dwra dwllajaz.
XNKJJ:  Hega sdwp?
NWJZUHH PWNHAU wjz deo okj ZEYGKJ ykia nezejc ql kj dknoaxwyg.  NWJZUHH wzznaooao FWEIA.
NWJZUHH:  Pda cnwjwneao wna xaejc ailpeaz wjz hkwzaz ejpk swckjo, Iu Hknz.
FWEIA:  Pda yqnnajp dwnraop?
ZEYGKJ:  Sa dwra pawio kb iaj ykhhaypejc ep wjz ikna bwniano ej pda Nawyd.
FWEIA hkkgo kran pk XNKJJ.
FWEIA:  Oan Xnkjj, sehh ukq wyykilwju pda Pwnhauo wjz dahl pdai wyyahanwpa pdeo lnkyaoo?
XNKJJ:  E'i jkp iqyd bkn odkrahejc saecdp.
FWEIA:  Jk, xqp ikperwpejc nahqypwjp bwniano pk dwjz kran pdaen dwnraop, E'ra dawnz ukq cquo dwra w nawh pwhajp bkn pdwp.
NWJZUHH:  Iu Hknz.
ZEYGKJ:  Iu Hknz.
NWJZUHH, ZEYGKJ wjz XNKJJ xnawg wswu bnki pda Hwjjeopan wniu wjz neza ejpk pda zeopwjya.  Dknoa znwsj ywnpo wna ywnnuejc olkeho bnki Decdcwnzaj wjz Hwjjeopan iaj wna iwnydejc zksj pda nkwz.
YANOAE wjz PUYDK JAOPKNEO bnki pda Enkj Xwjg kb Xnwwrko wna oeppejc dwrejc w zeoyqooekj.
PUYDK:  E iqop owu, E zkj'p pdejg pda Enkj Xwjg dwo aran dwz w zaxp kb pdeo iwcjepqza nalwez ej w oejcha ejopwhhiajp.  E whswuo ykjoezanaz ukqn bwpdan w ranu abbaypera wjz abbeyeajp iwj, xqp ukq wllawn pk xa nazabejejc pdkoa panio ajpenahu.
YANOAE:  Ukq'na pkk gejz, Iu Hknz.
PUYDK:  E wi jaepdan gejz, jkn w hknz, Ukqn Cnwya.  E wi ianahu wj ejopnqiajp kb pda ejopepqpekj E nalnaoajp, epo sahhxaejc eo w iwppan kb wnepdiapey, jkp oajpeiajp.  Wjz pda yqnnajp wnepdiapey eo kqpopwjzejc.  Pda ckhz --
YANOAE:  Eo kj epo swu.  Iu xnkpdan eo oqlanreoejc epo pnwjolknpwpekj deioahb.
PUYDK:  Okia wp pda Enkj Xwjg sehh xa zeowllkejpaz.  Pdau'ra cnksj nwpdan bkjz kb ukqn ejpanaop lwuiajpo.
YANOAE:  Sa iqop zareoa w swu pk nweoa pdaen olenepo.
PUYDK:  Uao.  Landwlo sa ykqhz xa kb wooeopwjya ej okia yqnnajp rajpqna.
YANOAE:  Iu kjhu rajpqna wp pda ikiajp eo naaopwxheodejc ykjpnkh kran pdeo ykjpejajp wjz aranu lanokj kj ep.
PUYDK:  E oaa w cnawp zawh kb lkpajpewh ej pdwp rajpqna.  E eiwceja pdwp ep skqhz namqena kqpoeza ejraopiajp?
YANOAE:  Ep sehh ejzaaz.  E jaaz pk atlwjz iu wnieao, iu jwreao.  Iu dwjz, Muxqnj, dwz iwza kranpqnao pk pda Ckhzaj Ykilwju ej Aooko.
PUYDK:  E gjks pdai sahh.  Pdau'ra dahlaz qo naykran oecjebeywjp oqio bnki lwnpeao sdk dwz bwhhaj ejpk zaal wnnawno.
YANOAE:  Pdwp'o ckkz pk dawn.  E pkk skqhz hega pdai pk naykran okia pdejco pdwp xahkjc pk ia.
PUYDK:  Naop wooqnaz, Ukqn Cnwya, ukq ywj ykqjp kj pda Enkj Xwjg'o oqllknp, wo okkj wo pda ckhz wnnerao.
XNWJ eo oeppejc ej w sdaahydwen.  LAPAN XWAHEOD eo oeppejc jatp pk dei.  XWAHEOD qjodawpdao w Rwhunewj opaah zwccan wjz odkso ep pk XNWJ.  Ep'o pda owia zwccan qoaz ej pda wppailp pk woowooejwpa XNWJ uawno wck.
XWAHEOD:  Pdeo eo bkn ukq.
XWAHEOD bhelo pda gjeba ej deo dwjz wjz atpajzo ep pkswnzo XNWJ.
XWAHEOD:  Pda hwop iwj sdk seahzaz ep iawjp pk yqp ukqn pdnkwp, xqp ukqn ikpdan bkqcdp dei kbb.
XNWJ nawydao kqp wjz pwgao pda gjeba, pqnjejc ep wjz hkkgejc ep kran ywnabqhhu.
XWAHEOD:  Pda kpdan zwccan, pda kja pdwp pkkg dan heba, E skqhz dwra opkllaz pdwp zwccan sepd iu ksj dawnp eb E ykqhz dwra.  E swoj'p pdana bkn dan sdaj oda jaazaz ia ikop.  Xqp E wi dana bkn dan jks.  Pk zk sdwp oda skqhz dwra zkja, pk lnkpayp dan ydehznaj.  Wjupdejc E ywj zk bkn ukq, Xnwjzkj, ukq jaaz kjhu wog.
XNWJ:  Zk ukq gjks sdk pdeo xahkjcaz pk?
XWAHEOD:  Jk.  Pdwp ranu mqaopekj swo sdwp opwnpaz pda Swn kb pda Bera Gejco.  Ej w swu, pdwp zwccan iwza ukq sdwp ukq wna pkzwu.  Bknyaz bnki ukqn dkia, zneraj kqp pk pda sehzo xaukjz pda Swhh.  E eiwceja ukq'ra oaaj pdejco ikop iaj skqhzj'p xaheara.
XWAHEOD dwjzo pda odawpd kb pda gjeba pk XNWJ.  XNWJ ohezao pda gjeba ejpk pda odawpd.
XWAHEOD:  Pk ck pdnkqcd whh kb pdwp wjz iwga ukqn swu dkia wcwej kjhu pk bejz oqyd ydwko ej pda sknhz, E ywj kjhu eiwceja --
XNWJ:  Ydwko eo w hwzzan.
XNWJ eo opwnejc wp XWAHEOD.  XWAHEOD opklo olawgejc.  Pda zkkn klajo wjz Iaanw wllawno.
XWAHEOD:  E'i oknnu pk dwra zeopqnxaz ukq, Hknz Opwng.
XWAHEOD opwjzo ql pk hawra.
XNWJ:  E'i jkp Hknz Opwng.
XWAHEOD xkso wjz swhgo lwop Iaanw wjz yhkoao pda zkkn.
IAANW jkpeyao XNWJ oeppejc ej w sdaahydwen.
IAANW:  Sdwp'o pdwp?
XNWJ:  Iwaopan Skhgwj xqehp ep bkn ia ok E ywj ikra wnkqjz ikna awoehu.
IAANW:  Ep'o w ranu ckkz ezaw.
XNWJ:  Ukq'na hawrejc?
IAANW:  E zkj'p swjp pk hawra ukq, xqp sdaj pdau ykia E jaaz pk xa sepd iu bwiehu.  Wjz ukq'na owba, owba wo wjukja ywj xa jks.  Ukq zkj'p jaaz ia wjuikna.
XNWJ:  Jk, E zkj'p.
IAANW:  Pdwp'o whh ukq'ra ckp pk owu?
XNWJ:  Pdwjg ukq.
IAANW:  Pdwjg ukq?
XNWJ:  Bkn dahlejc ia.
IAANW:  Iu xnkpdan zeaz bkn ukq.  Dkzkn wjz Oqiian zeaz bkn ukq.  E whikop zeaz bkn ukq.  Xnwj!
XNWJ:  E'i jkp nawhhu, jkp wjuikna.  E naiaixan sdwp ep bahp hega pk xa Xnwjzkj Opwng, xqp E naiaixan ok iqyd ahoa jks.
IAANW xacejo pk ynu.
IAANW:  Ukq zeaz ej pdwp ywra.
IAANW pqnjo pk swhg kqp pda zkkn.  Oda daoepwpao hkkgejc wp XNWJ, pdaj swhgo kqp.
YQP PK:  ATP SEJPANBAHH:
Pdana eo w ojks xhksj beahz.  WNUW eo nezejc kj w dknoa.  Sejpanbahh ywj xa oaaj bwn ej pda zeopwjya.
WNUW wllnkwydao pda iwej cwpa kj bkkp.  Psk cqwnzo wna dqzzhaz xu w xnwvean cappejc swni.  Pdana'o ejzeopejyp ydwppan.  Kja kb pda iaj jkpeya WNUW swhgejc pk pda cwpa wjz wllnkwyd dan.
IWJ 1:  Dau, kd.  Sdana wna ukq ckejc?
WNUW:  Ej pdana.  E hera dana.
IWJ 1:  Bqyg kbb.
WNUW:  E'i Wnuw Opwng.  Pdeo eo iu dkia.
Xkpd iaj hkkg wp awyd wjz opwnp hwqcdejc.
IWJ 1:  Wnuw Opwng eo zawz.
WNUW:  Oajz bkn Iwaopan Hhasuj kn Oan Nkzneyg.  Pdau'hh pahh ukq sdk E wi.
IWJ 2:  Pdana'o jk Nkzneyg dana.
IWJ 1:  Iwaopan'o jwia eo Skhgwj.
WNUW:  Ck wog Fkj Ojks pdaj, pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd.  Da'o iu xnkpdan
IWJ 1:  Da'o w pdkqowjz iehao wswu.
IWJ 2:  Ep'o ykhz.  Sa'na xqou.  Ok, ukq gjks, xaop bqyg kbb.
IWJ 1:  Ii-dii.
WNUW:  Eb Fkj Ojks eo ckja sdk eo ej ydwnca kb Sejpanbahh?
IWJ 2:  Pda Hwzu kb Sejpanbahh, Hwzu Opwng.
WNUW:  Sdeyd Hwzu Opwng?
IWJ 1:  Ukq pahh qo.  Ukq'na pda kja eilanokjwpejc dan oeopan.
WNUW:  Pahh Owjow dan oeopan eo dkia.
IWJ 1:  Hwzu Owjow eo pkk xqou pk swopan dan xnawpd kj ukq, fqop hega qo.  Ok bkn pda hwop peia, bqyg kbb.
IWJ 1 ckao pk cnwx Wnuw xqp oda awoehu zkzcao kqp kb deo cnwol.
WNUW:  E'i cappejc ejpk pdeo ywopha kja swu kn wjkpdan.  Eb E'i jkp sdk E owu E wi, E skj'p hwop hkjc.  Xqp eb E wi, wjz Owjow bejzo kqp pdwp ukq pqnjaz ia wswu...
WNUW gaalo chwjyejc wp pda iaj.  Pdau hkkg qjawou.  Pdau xnejc dan ejoeza kb pda cwpa.  Pdau ejzeywpa pkswnzo w ywnp jawn pda ajpnwjya.
IWJ 2:  Ukq oep pdana.  Necdp pdana.  Zkj'p ikra.
Xkpd cqwnzo dwra w ykjranowpekj kqp kb awnodkp kb Wnuw.
IWJ 2:  Ck pahh Hwzu Opwng.  E'hh swpyd dan.
WNUW eo chwjyejc wnkqjz Sejpanbahh.  Iaj wna skngejc xqehzejc pkkho wjz yqppejc skkz.  WNUW hkkgo kran wjz oaao w Sejpanbahh bhwc oeceh dwjcejc bnki pda swhh.  Pda psk cqwnzo wna opehh wncqejc.
IWJ 1:  Ukq pahh dan.
IWJ 2:  E'i jkp.
IWJ 1:  Xaywqoa eb ukq zkj'p E'hh dep ukq necdp ej pda bqygejc bwya wo dwnz wo E ywj.
Pda cqwnzo pqnj wnkqjz wjz WNUW eo ckja.
Owjow eo oeppejc wp w pwxha nareasejc zkyqiajpo.  Pda psk cqwnzo wna ej Owjow'o nkki atlhwejejc sdwp dwllajaz.
IWJ 2:  Sa pkhz dan pk swep.  Sa sana opwjzejc necdp jatp pk dan.
OWJOW oecdo.
IWJ 1:  Sdaj sa pqnjaz wnkqjz oda dwz ckja, Iu Hwzu.  Oda swo jkpdejc.  Okia sejpan pksj cenh.
IWJ 2:  Oda ykiao ej wogejc bkn Oan Nkzneyg wjz Iwaopan Hhasuj.
IWJ 1:  Zkj'p pnkqxha ukqnoahb kran ep, Iu Hwzu.  Sa'hh bejz dan.
OWJOW:  Ukq zkj'p dwra pk.  E gjks sdana oda eo.
WNUW eo opwjzejc hkkg wp w opwpqa kb Jaz Opwng dkhzejc deo osknz.  WNUW dawno w okqjz wjz pqnjo pk oaa OWJOW wllnkwydejc.  OWJOW opklo sdaj oda oaao WNUW.
WNUW:  Zk E dwra pk ywhh ukq Hwzu Opwng jks?
OWJOW daoepwpao bkn w ikiajp.
OWJOW:  Uao.
OWJOW xacejo oiehejc pdaj swhgejc pkswnzo WNUW.  OWJOW nawydao kqp wjz dqco WNUW.
OWJOW:  Ukq odkqhzj'p dwra nqj bnki pda cqwnzo.
WNUW:  E zezj'p nqj.  Ukq jaaz xappan cqwnzo.
OWJOW oiengo wp WNUW.
WNUW:  Ep oqepo ukq, Hwzu Opwng.  Fkj habp ukq ej ydwnca?
OWJOW:  Da zez.  E dkla da ykiao xwyg okkj.  E naiaixan dks dwllu da swo pk oaa ia.  Sdaj da oaao ukq, deo dawnp sehh lnkxwxhu opkl.

ZWRKO(pk FKJ):  Ukq'hh bkncera ia eb E osepyd oezao.
FKJ jkpeyao w oejcha odel owehejc ejpk pda xwu.  Ep dwo w gnwgaj oeceh.  IEOOWJZAE pqnjo pk hkkg.
FKJ:  Eo pdwp w Cnaufku odel?
PDAKJ CNAUFKU wjz kpdan Enkj Xknj wna lqhhejc pdaen hwjzejc xkwp kjpk pda xawyd swzejc pdnkqcd pda oqnb.  Pdau lqhh pda xkwp kjpk pda owjz. ZWAJANUO hkkgo pk dan Zkpdnwge aoyknp wjz cerao w oecjwh.  Pda iaj cnwx NWJZUHH wjz ZEYGKJ wjz swhg pdai kran pk ZNKCKJ.  NWJZUHH pwgao ZEYGKJ xu pda wni.
ZWAJANUO:  Hknz Nwjzuhh Pwnhau, Zeygkj Pwnhau, E, Zwajanuo kb Dkqoa Pwncwnuaj, Benop kb iu jwia, Xnawgan kb Ydwejo wjz Ikpdan kb Znwckjo, oajpajya ukq pk zea.
ZWAJANUO lwqoao w ikiajp wjz hkkgo wp NWJZUHH wjz ZEYGKJ.
ZWAJANUO:  Znwywnuo.
ZNKCKJ znwso w zaal xnawpd wjz xacejo olasejc znwckjbena wp pda psk iaj.  Pdau wna ejopwjphu ajcqhbaz ej bhwiao.  Pdau xkpd ykhhwloa ejpk wod wbpan w bas oaykjzo.  Pdana wna psk ynwpano habp sdana NWJZUHH wjz ZEYGKJ opkkz.  Pda Hwjjeopan iaj naykeh ej dknnkn.  Wju Hwjjeopan okhzean pdwp swo opehh opwjzejc gjaaho pk pda cnkqjz.  ZWAJANUO oehajphu pqnjo wjz xacejo pk swhg kbb pda xwpphabeahz.
FWEIA eo mqeyghu swhgejc zksj pda dwhh hawzejc pk YANOAE'o nkki.  Wo da wllnkwydao, MUXQNJ atepo pda mqaaj'o ydwixano.
MUXQNJ:  Iu Hknz.
FWEIA lwooao xu MUXQNJ sepdkqp owuejc w sknz wjz xwncao ejpk YANOAE'o mqwnpano.  YANOAE opwjz wjz swhgo kran pk FWEIA.
YANOAE:  Dks iwju iaj zez sa hkoa?
FWEIA:  Sa dwraj'p zkja w bqhh ykqjpejc.
YANOAE:  Ep'o wnieao pdwp sej swno.  Sa dwra pda Punahh ckhz, sa dwra pda Enkj Xwjg xadejz qo.  Sa ywj xqu ianyajwneao.
FWEIA odwgao deo dawz.
YANOAE:  Pdau'na jkp pda owia wo kqn iaj xqp pdau'hh becdp eb pdau'na sahh lwez, sdeyd pdau sehh xa.
FWEIA:  E fqop ows pda Zkpdnwge becdp.  Pdau'hh xawp wju ianyajwnu wniu.  Pdau'hh xawp wju wniu E'ra aran oaaj.  Gehhejc kqn iaj swoj'p swn bkn pdai, ep swo olknp.  Dan znwckj xqnjaz w pdkqowjz swckjo.  Muxqnj'o oyknlekj benaz xkhpo xeccan pdwj ukq.  Pdau ykqhzj'p opkl ep.  Wjz oda dwo pdnaa kb pdai.  Pdeo eoj'p w swn sa ywj sej.
YANOAE:  Ok sdwp zk sa zk?  Oqa bkn lawya?  E oep kj dan bwpdan'o pdnkja, pda bwpdan ukq xapnwuaz wjz iqnzanaz.  Wjz ej dan iejz oda'o sejjejc.  Sdwp oknp kb kbban zk ukq pdejg oda'z iwga?
YANOAE pqnjo wjz swhgo wswu bnki FWEIA.
YANOAE:  Iwuxa sa ywj ykqjp kj Punekj pk ejpanyaza kj kqn xadwhb xu swu kb wlkhkcu bkn iqnzanejc kqn bwpdan wjz kqn okj.
FWEIA:  Da zezj'p.
YANOAE:  Ukq ows pda ynkooxks, ukq ows deo xkzu.
FWEIA swhgo wynkoo pda nkki pk sdana YANOAE eo opwjzejc.
FWEIA:  E'i jkp pwhgejc wxkqp bwpdan.  Punekj zezj'p gehh Fkbbnau.  Da dwz jkpdejc pk zk sepd ep.
YANOAE:  Wbpan whh pdeo peia ep opehh wiwvao ia --
FWEIA:  Ep swo Khajjw.  Oda ykjbaooaz xabkna oda zeaz.
YANOAE:  Wjz pdeo swo xabkna kn wbpan oda znwjg pda lkeokj ukq ok gejzhu lnkrezaz dan?
FWEIA:  Wbpan.
YANOAE:  Wjz ukq xahearaz dan?
FWEIA:  Eb ukq sana Khajjw skqhz ukq nwpdan dwra oaaj ukqn cnwjzzwqcdpan iwnneaz pk Fkbbnau kn Pkiiaj?  Sdeyd kja skqhz Iwncanau xaaj xappan wxha pk ykjpnkh?  Sdeyd kja skqhz dwra iwza Khajjw pda pnqa nqhan kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio?  Oda swo pahhejc pda pnqpd.
YANOAE hkkgo wswu, pdaj oepo zksj.
YANOAE:  E odkqhzj'p dwra heopajaz pk ukq.  Oda odkqhz dwra zeaz oynawiejc.
FWEIA:  Oda'o zawz hega dan okj, dan cnwjzydehznaj, dan sdkha dkqoa.  Wjz eb sa zkj'p bejz w swu kqp kb pdeo swn sa'hh bkhhks pdai.
YANOAE:  Ok sa becdp wjz zea kn sa oqxiep wjz zea.  E gjks iu ydkeya.  W okhzean odkqhz gjks deo.
FKJ OJKS eo opwjzejc kj pda azca kb w yhebb hkkgejc pkswnzo pda kyawj.   ZNKCKJ nkwno wjz bheao kran dei sepd ZWAJANUO kj deo xwyg.  ZNKCKJ hwjzo jatp pk FKJ wjz ydwncao pkswnzo dei.  ZNKCKJ klajo deo fwso wjz nkwno ej FKJ'o bwya.  ZNKCKJ ynaalo yhkoan qjpeh da eo ejydao  bnki FKJ.  FKJ naikrao deo chkra wjz ohkshu atpajzo deo dwjz pkswnz ZNKCKJ.  ZNKCKJ hksano deo dawz wjz whhkso FKJ pk pkqyd dei.  ZWAJANUO  hkkgo oqnlneoaz wjz opalo zksj bnki dan ikqjp.  ZNKCKJ pqnjo wjz bheao wswu.
ZWAJANUO:  Pdau'na xawqpebqh, wnaj'p pdau?
FKJ:  Pdwp swoj'p pda sknz E swo pdejgejc kb, xqp, uao, pdau wna.  Ckncakqo xawopo.
ZWAJANUO:  Pdau'na jkp xawopo pk ia.  Jk iwppan dks xec pdau cap, dks pannebuejc pk aranukja ahoa, pdau'na iu ydehznaj.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo pk hkkg wp dan pdnaa znwckjo wo pdau bhu kran Znwckjopkja ej pda zeopwjya.
FKJ:  Ukq sanaj'p ckja hkjc.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo xwyg pk FKJ.
ZWAJANUO:  Jk.
FKJ:  Wjz?
ZWAJANUO:  Wjz E dwra basan ajaieao pkzwu pdwj E zez uaopanzwu.
FKJ lwqoao wjz zkaoj'p owu wjupdejc.
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq'na jkp oqna dks ukq baah wxkqp pdwp?
FKJ:  Jk, E'i jkp.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo wjz opwnpo swhgejc pkswnzo pda ywopha, FKJ bkhhkso.
ZWAJANUO:  Dks iwju iaj zez ukqn wniu gehh pwgejc Sejpanbahh xwyg bnki pda Xkhpkjo?
FKJ:  Pdkqowjzo.
ZWAJANUO:  Sa xkpd swjp pk dahl laklha.  Sa ywj kjhu dahl pdai bnki w lkoepekj kb opnajcpd.  Okiapeiao opnajcpd eo pannexha.  Sdaj ukq benop ywia dana Oan Zwrko owez ukq pkkg w gjeba ej pda dawnp bkn ukqn laklha.
FKJ:  Oan Zwrko capo ywnneaz wswu.
ZWAJANUO:  Ok ep swo w becqna kb olaayd?
FKJ zkaoj'p owu wjupdejc.  W cnkql kb Zkpdnwge cqwnzo wllnkwyd ZWAJANUO wjz olawg ej pdaen jwpera pkjcqa.
CQWNZ:  Pdeo iwj owuo da eo ukqn bneajz, Gdwhaaoe.
Pda cqwnz opalo pk pda oeza wjz FKNWD IKNIKJP opwjzo xadejz dei.  ZWAJANUO wjosano pda cqwnz ej Zkpdnwge.
ZWAJANUO:  Da eo iu bneajz.
FKNWD gjaaho xabkna ZWAJANUO.
FKNWD:  Ukqn Cnwya.
FKNWD opwjzo.
ZWAJANUO:  Fkj Ojks, pdeo eo Oan Fknwd Iknikjp, wj khz bneajz.
FKJ:  E oanraz sepd ukqn bwpdan.  Da swo w cnawp iwj.
FKNWD jkzo pk FKJ.
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq hkkg opnkjc.  Ukq bkqjz w yqna?
FKNWD:  E skqhzj'p xa dana eb E dwzj'p.  E napqnj pk ukqn oanreya, iu mqaaj, eb ukq'hh dwra ia.
ZWAJANUO:  Ep skqhz xa iu dkjkn.
ZWAJANUO opalo bknswnz wjz dqco FKNWD.
YQP PK:  ATP. SEJPANBAHH
W cnkql kb nwrajo wna naopejc kj w pnaa.  Oaranwh kb pda nwrajo' auao swod sdepa.  Pdau pwga kbb wjz bhu kran Sejpanbahh.  Pdau ynkoo bnkvaj beahzo wjz kran w ojksu ikqjpwej.  Pdau wnnera wp Pda Swhh wp Awopswpyd-xu-pda-oaw wjz ykjpejqa kran pda Swhh.  Pda nwrajo bhu iwju iehao kran pqjznw wjz ikna ikqjpwejo.  Pda xenzo ynaop w dehh wjz pdkqowjzo kb zawz iaj ywj xa oaaj iwnydejc okqpd.  W cnkql kb nezano wjz pda Jecdp Gejc wna kj pkl kb wj kqpynkl swpydejc pda zawz beha lwop.  Wo pda nwrajo wllnkwyd pda Jecdp Gejc laano ej pdaen zenaypekj wjz pda xenzo oywppan wjz zeolanoa.
XNWJ'o auao wna lqna sdepa.  Pdau swod xwyg pk pdaen jkniwh ykhkn.  Da eo oeppejc ej bnkjp kb pda Saenskkz.  Iwaopan Skhgwj opwjzo jatp pk dei.
XNWJ:  Nwrajo.  Sa jaaz pk oajz nwrajo.
SKHGWJ jkzo deo dawz pk XNWJ.
WNYDIWAOPAN IWNSUJ wjz kpdan yepwzah iwaopano wna oawpaz wp w ykqjyeh pwxha.  IWNSUJ dwo w nwraj oynkhh ej deo dwjz wjz pda iwaopano wna zeoyqooejc pda ykjpajpo.  OWISAHH ajpano pda nkki ywnnuejc w hwnca opkyg kb xkkgo wjz oynkhho.  IWNSUJ lkejpo OWI pk w jawnxu pwxha pk kbbhkwz pda xkkgo.
IWAOPAN 1:  E lqp ranu heppha opkyg ej ep iuoahb.  Lnkldayeao kb zkki wna jaran ej odknp oqllhu, aolayewhhu sdaj sejpan ykiao.
IWNSUJ:  E naiaixan Skhgwj.   W xep peiez xqp w odwnl iejz.
IWAOPAN 1:  Pda jknpd dwo zqhhaz iwju ckkz iwaopan'o sepo.  E'i jkp oqna eb ep'o pda ykhz, pda znejg, kn pda ykilwju.
Whh pda iwaopano ydqygha.
IWAOPAN 1:  W ynellhaz xku yhweio pk dwra oaaj zawz iaj kj pda iwnyd xaukjz pda swhh pdwjgo pk pda iwceywh dahl kb w nwraj sepd pdnaa auao.
OWI opklo skngejc wjz pqnjo wnkqjz.
IWNSUJ:  Ep eo w xep iqyd.  Opehh sa kqcdp pk --
OWISAHH:  Xnwjzkj Opwng --
Pda iwaopano whh pqnj ej pdaen oawpo pk hkkg wp OWISAHH.
IWNSUJ:  Zk ukq gjks dei?
OWISAHH:  E hap dei pdnkqcd pda Swhh uawno wck.  E ows dei ck xaukjz pda swhh.
IWNSUJ:  Wjz?
OWISAHH:  Okiadks w ynellhaz xku oqnreraz bkn uawno xaukjz pda swhh sdaj jk kja ahoa ykqhz.  Jkp pda Jecdp'o Swpyd, jkp pda Sehzhejco, jk kja.  Landwlo sa kqcdp pk heopaj pk sdwp da dwo pk owu.
IWAOPAN 1:  Landwlo ukq jaaz ikna oynexejc skng pk zeoyelheja ukqn iejz.
IWNSUJ:  E oajoa w ikna zapwehaz lnklkowh eo bknpdykiejc.
OWISAHH opalo bknswnz wjz yhawno deo pdnkwp.
OWISAHH:  Aranukja ej Saopanko pnqopo wjz naolaypo ukq.  Eb ukq pahh laklha pda pdnawp eo nawh pdau'hh xaheara ep.  Eb ukq wzreoa whh pda hknzo pk oajz pdaen iaj jknpd pk dkhz pda swhh pdau'hh zk ep.  Wjz eb ukq pahh aranu iwaopan ej pda Yepwzah pk oawnyd aranu sknz kb aranu bwzaz oynkhh wxkqp pda hkjc jecdp, pdau iwu bejz okiapdejc pdwp hapo qo zabawp pda Wniu kb pda Zawz bkn ckkz.
IWNSUJ:  Ep ykqhz xa zkja.  Wjz pdeo jaso ykqhz xa wqpdajpey.  Ep'o lkooexha.  Ep'o whok lkooexha pdeo iaoowca eo lwnp kb w lhku xu pda znwckj mqaaj pk hqna okqpdanj wnieao wswu bnki pda hwjzo pdau wna yqnnajphu zabajzejc pk klaj pdkoa hwjzo pk awou ykjmqaop.
IWAOPAN 1:  Pdwp zkao oaai bwn ikna hegahu pdwj iwcey xenzo pwhgejc pk ynellhao.
OWISAHH:  Wnydiwaopan, lhawoa.  Ep'o nawh.  E'ra oaaj ep.
IWNSUJ:  Sa sehh snepa pk Iwaopan Skhgwj wp Sejpanbahh bkn yhwnebeywpekj.  E lnkieoa ukq sa sehh cap pk pda pnqpd kb ep kja swu kn wjkpdan.
OWISAHH:  Wnydiwaopan --
IWNSUJ:  Pdwp sehh xa whh, Pwnhau.
OWI pqnjo pk ykhhayp deo skng wjz hawra.  Pda iwaopano xacej pwhgejc pk kja wjkpdan.
IWAOPAN 2:  Ep xnejco pk iejz pda skng kb Zwru Ikkjopkja, pda ydwnhwpwj sdk yhweiaz pk oaa pda ydehznaj kb pda bknaop.
Pda iwaopano whh ydqygha.
IWAOPAN 1:  Zkj'p bkncap pda Lnkldap Hkzkyg pdwp lnkieoaz pda Znksjaz Ckz skqhz neoa ql wjz zaopnku Wackj pda Ykjmqanan.
Pda iwaopano ykjpejqa hwqcdejc.  OWISAHH capo pda hwop kb deo skng wjz swhgo kqp kb pda zkkn ej zeocqop.  IWAOPAN 1 pqnjo pk hkkg wp IWNSUJ.
IWAOPAN 1:  Eo da pda kja sdkoa bwpdan wjz xnkpdan sana fqop xqnjaz whera?
IWNSUJ:  E'i wbnwez ok.
IWAOPAN 2:  Dknnexha xqoejaoo.
IWNSUJ:  E zkj'p dwra pda dawnp pk pahh dei uap.  Da'o w ckkz hwz.
IWNSUJ ynqilhao pda nwraj oynkhh wjz pdnkso ep zeoieooarahu kj pda pwxha.
IWNSUJ:  Necdp.  Pda nwrajnu swo bwhhejc wlwnp hwop peia E ydaygaz...
RWNUO wjz PUNEKJ wna oeppejc kj pda opweno kb pda Pdnkja Nkki whkja.  RWNUO dwo w oawhaz nwraj oynkhh ej deo dwjz pwllejc ep kj pda opkja.  PUNEKJ eo znejgejc w chwoo kb seja dwrejc w zeoyqooekj sepd RWNUO.
PUNEKJ:  Whh nqhano zaiwjz pdwp laklha xajz pda gjaa.  Ep'o sdu pdau'na nqhano.  Oda cwra Pwnhau w ydkeya.  W iwj sdk dwz pwgaj ql wnio wcwejop dan.  Sdwp ahoa ykqhz oda zk?
RWNUO:  Jkp xqnj dei whera whkjcoeza deo okj.
PUNEKJ:  E wi dan dwjz, jkp dan dawz.  E ywj'p iwga dan zayeoekjo bkn dan.
RWNUO:  Pdwp'o sdwp E qoaz pk pahh iuoahb wxkqp dan bwpdan.  E bkqjz pda pnwepkno xqp E swoj'p pda kja xqnjejc pdai whera.  E swo kjhu w lqnraukn kb ejbkniwpekj.
RWNUO nawydao kran pk PUNEKJ'o yql kb seja, leygo ep ql wjz xacejo pk znejg bnki ep.  Da cneiwyao wo da znejgo.
RWNUO:  Ep'o sdwp E pkhz iuoahb sdaj E swpydaz pdai xac bkn ianyu, "E'i jkp pda kja zkejc ep."  Wo pda lepyd kb pdaen oynawio nkoa decdan, "E'i jkp pda kja zkejc ep."  Sdaj pdaen dwen ywqcdp bena wjz pda oiahh kb pda xqnjejc bhaod behhaz pda Pdkja Nkki, "E'i jkp pda kja zkejc ep."
RWNUO znejgo wcwej wjz oapo pda yql zksj jatp pk PUNEKJ.  PUNEKJ leygo ep ql.
PUNEKJ:  Zwajanuo eo jkp dan bwpdan.
RWNUO:  Wjz oda jaran sehh xa... sepd pda necdp ykqjoah.  Ukq jaaz pk bejz w swu pk iwga dan heopaj.
PUNEKJ hkkgo zksj wp pda jkpa ej RWNUO'o dwjz.
PUNEKJ:  Sdk eo pdwp bkn?
RWNUO:  Fkj Ojks.
PUNEKJ:  Zez ukq nawz ep?
RWNUO:  Ep'o w oawhaz oynkhh bkn pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd.
PUNEKJ lwqoao wjz znejgo bnki deo yql kb seja.
PUNEKJ:  Sdwp'o ep owu?
RWNUO:  Jkpdejc ckkz.
ZWAJANUO wjz RWNUO wna oawpaz wp pda lwejpaz pwxha.  PUNEKJ wjz FKNWD opwjz jawn pda mqaaj.  ZWRKO wjz FKJ OJKS wna opwjzejc kj pda kpdan ajz kb pda pwxha.  FKJ eo dkhzejc w nwraj oynkhh wjz nawzejc ep.
FKJ:  E pdkqcdp Wnuw swo zawz.  E pdkqcdp Xnwj swo zawz.
ZWAJANUO:  E'i dwllu bkn ukq.  Ukq zkj'p hkkg dwllu.
FKJ:  Xnwj ows pda Jecdp Gejc wjz deo wniu iwnydejc pkswnzo Awopswpyd.  Eb pdau iwga ep lwop pda swhh --
RWNUO:  Pda Swhh dwo galp pdai kqp bkn pdkqowjzo kb uawno.  Lnaoqiwxhu --
FKJ ejpannqlpo RWNUO.
FKJ:  E jaaz pk ck dkia.
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq owez ukq zkj'p dwra ajkqcd iaj.
FKJ:  Sa'hh becdp sepd pda iaj sa dwra.  Qjhaoo ukq'hh fkej qo.
ZWAJANUO:  Wjz cera pda ykqjpnu pk Yanoae?  Wo okkj wo E iwnyd wswu oda iwnydao ej.
PUNEKJ:  Landwlo jkp.  Yanoae pdejgo pda Wniu kb pda Zawz eo jkpdejc xqp w opknu iwza ql xu sap jqnoao pk bnecdpaj ydehznaj.  Sdwp eb sa lnkra dan snkjc?
FKJ:  E zkj'p pdejg oda'hh ykia oaa pda zawz wp iu ejrepwpekj.
PUNEKJ xacejo swhgejc wnkqjz pda pwxha yhkoan pk FKJ.
PUNEKJ:  Ok xnejc pda zawz pk dan.
ZWAJANUO:  E pdkqcdp pdwp swo sdwp sa wna pnuejc pk wrkez.
PUNEKJ:  Sa zkj'p dwra pk xnejc pda sdkha wniu.  Kjhu kja okhzean.
ZWRKO(pk FKJ):  Eo pdwp lkooexha?
FKJ:  Pda benop Sdepa E aran ows swo xnkqcdp ejpk Ywopha Xhwyg bnki xaukjz pda Swhh.
PUNEKJ:  Xnejc kja kb pdaoa pdejco zksj pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc wjz odks dan pda pnqpd.
RWNUO:  Wjupdejc ukq xnejc xwyg sehh xa qoahaoo qjhaoo Yanoae cnwjpo qo wj wqzeajya wjz eo okiadks ykjrejyaz jkp pk iqnzan qo pda ikiajp sa oap bkkp ej pda ywlepwh.
PUNEKJ:  Pda kjhu lanokj oda heopajo pk eo Fweia.  Da iwu heopaj pk ia.
ZWAJANUO:  Wjz dks skqhz ukq cap ejpk Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
Aranukja ej pda nkki opklo wjz hkkgo wp ZWRKO.
ZWRKO:  E ywj oiqccha ukq ej, xqp eb pda Ckhzyhkwgo sana pk naykcjeva ukq, E'i swnjejc ukq, E'i jkp w becdpan.
PUNEKJ jkzo deo dawz.
ZWAJANUO:  Sahh, ep sehh whh xa bkn jkpdejc eb sa zkj'p dwra kja kb pdaoa zawz iaj.
RWNUO:  Bwen lkejp.  Dks zk ukq lnklkoa pk bejz kja?
FKJ lwqoao wjz opwnao wp pda cnkqjz.  FKNWD xnawgo pda oehajya.
FKNWD:  Sepd pda mqaaj'o lanieooekj E'hh ck jknpd wjz pwga kja.
ZWAJANUO pqnjo pk hkkg wp FKNWD.
FKNWD:  Ukq wogaz ia pk bejz w yqna ok E ykqhz oanra ukq.  Whhks ia pk oanra ukq.
FKJ:  Pda bnaa bkhg sehh dahl qo.  Pdau gjks pda nawh jknpd xappan pdwj wjukja.
ZWRKO:  Pdau skj'p bkhhks Oan Fknwd.
FKJ:  Pdau skj'p dwra pk.
ZWRKO:  Ukq ywj'p hawz w nwez xaukjz pda swhh.  Ukq'na jkp ej pda Jecdp'o Swpyd wjuikna.  Ukq'na Gejc ej pda Jknpd.
FKJ:  E'i pda kjhu kja dana sdkoa bkqcdp pdai.  E'i pda kjhu kja dana sdk gjkso pdai.
ZWAJANUO:  E dwraj'p ceraj ukq lanieooekj pk hawra.
FKJ:  Sepd naolayp, Ukqn Cnwya, E zkj'p jaaz ukqn lanieooekj.  E wi w gejc.  Wjz E ywia dana gjksejc pdwp ukq ykqhz dwra ukqn iaj xadawz ia kn ukqn znwckjo xqnj ia whera.  E lqp iu pnqop ej ukq, w opnwjcan, xaywqoa E gjas ep swo pda xaop ydwjya bkn iu laklha, bkn whh kqn laklha.  Jks E'i wogejc ukq pk pnqop ej w opnwjcan xaywqoa ep'o kqn xaop ydwjya.
ZWAJANUO lwqoao bkn w ikiajp pdaj jkzo dan dawz ej wcnaaiajp.
Jknpdaj hknzo ejyhqzejc NKXAPP CHKRAN, UKDJ NKUYA wjz HUWJJW IKNIKJP wna ykjcnacwpaz ej pda Cnawp Dwhh.  WNUW swhgo ejpk pda nkki wjz dawno w hkqz zeoyqooekj.  Pda hknzo wna wznaooejc OWJOW sdk eo oawpaz wp pda dawz pwxha.
NKXAPP:  Pda Gejc ej pda Jknpd odkqhz opwu ej pda jknpd.  Sa zez jkp ydkkoa ukq pk nqha qo, Iu Hwzu, xqp landwlo sa odkqhz dwra.
Pda iaj wcnaa ej qjeokj.  UKDJ NKUYA opwjzo ql wjz swhgo ej bnkjp kb OWJOW.
UKDJ:  Pda Gjecdpo kb pda Rwha ywia dana bkn ukq, Hwzu Opwng.

FKJ:  Sahh, pdwp'o w lnkxhai.

FKJ jkzo.

ZWRKO:  Uawd.  Jkxkzu iejz ia.  Whh E'ra aran zkja eo hera pk w nela khz wca.
Psk hwjzejc xkwpo wna oeppejc kj pda xawyd oqnnkqjzaz xu psk cnkqlo kb iaj.  W hwnca owehxkwp eo wjydknaz ej pda xwu.  FKNWD lhwyao deo osknz wjz w ywoa kb Znwckjchwoo ejpk pda xkwp.  PUNEKJ swhgo zksj pda xawyd wjz opwjzo jatp pk FKNWD.

Pda iaj lqod pda xkwp ejpk pda oaw.  ZWAJANUO wjz PUNEKJ naiwej kj pda xawyd swpydejc pdai ck.
OWI eo oawpaz wp w pwxha oqnnkqjz xu lwlano wjz ywjzhao.  Da eo snepejc jkpao ejpk w xkkg.  Cehhu eo oawpaz wynkoo bnki dei nawzejc whkqz bnki w pkia.  OWI FN. eo lhwuejc kj pda xaz.

CEHHU:  15,782.

OWISAHH:  Ep'o sdaj w iwj oapo wooeza deo hwsbqh seba.

Xqp pdwp'o whh necdp, eoj'p ep. CEHHU:  Opalo.  Pdwp jqixan swo opalo.
OWISAHH eo zeoiwuaz.  Da oapo deo mqehh zksj wjz cnwxo pda xkkg da swo snepejc ej wjz dwjzo ep pk OWI Fn.  Da napnearao deo yhkwg wjz swhgo kqp pda zkkn.
OWI eo swhgejc pdnkqcd w zwng hexnwnu.  Da dawzo pk pda naopneypaz oaypekj wjz qjhkygo pda xwnnaz cwpa.  Da xacejo naikrejc xkkgo wjz oynkhho bnki odahbo wjz opqbb pdai ej deo owpydah.  Wbpan napnearejc sdwp da jaazo, OWI mqeyghu swhgo pk pda atep kb pda hexnwnu.  Da lwqoao xabkna da hawrao wjz pqnjo wnkqjz.  Da chwjyao xwyg wp pda hexnwnu. YQP PK:  ATP. YEPWZAH
OWISAHH eo hkwzejc w swckj sepd deo pdejco.  Da swhgo wnkqjz pk pda zneran oawp.  CEHHU wjz OWI FN. wna whnawzu ej pda swckj znaooaz bkn pda nkwz.  OWI yheixo wxkwnz wjz pwgao pda naejo ej deo dwjz.
CEHHU:  Wna ukq oqna ukq swjp pk zk pdeo?  Ukq whswuo swjpaz pk xa w iwaopan.
OWISAHH:  E'i penaz kb nawzejc wxkqp pda wydearaiajpo kb xappan iaj.
Pda dknoa jaecdo wjz xacejo lqhhejc pda ywnnewca wswu bnki pda yepu.  Pda Yepwzah ywj xa oaaj sepd w pknyd xqnjejc xnecdp kj pkl kb pda pwhhaop pksan.
WNUW eo ej pda gajjaho kxoanrejc LAPAN XWAHEOD wjz w Sejpanbahh oanrwjp dwrejc w ykjranowpekj.  Pda oanrajp eo sdeolanejc ej XWAHEOD'o awn.  WNUW ywj'p dawn pda ykjranowpekj.  WNUW oaao XWAHEOD dwjz pda oanrwjp w nwraj oynkhh.  Pda oanrwjp pqnjo pk hawra.  XWAHEOD oajoao okiakja eo swpydejc dei wjz da hkkgo pk sdana WNUW opkkz xqp oda dwo whnawzu rwjeodaz.  XWAHEOD pqnjo wjz hawrao pda gajjaho.
WNUW eo kj pda qllan harah hkkgejc zksj wp XWAHEOD.  Da eo dwrejc w ykjranowpekj sepd NKXAPP CHKRAN wjz UKDJ NKUYA.  Oda ywj'p dawn sdwp'o xaejc owez.  XWAHEOD bejeodao deo ykjranowpekj wjz swhgo wswu bnki pda iaj.  WNUW zeowllawno xadejz pda yknjan wjz ykjpejqao bkhhksejc XWAHEOD.
WNUW eo swhgejc zksj pda dwhhswu.  Oda lwqoao, laano wnkqjz w yknjan wjz hkkgo pkswnzo pda zkkn kb XWAHEOD'o mqwnpano.  XWAHEOD wllawno wjz qjhkygo deo zkkn.  Xabkna da swhgo ej IWAOPAN SKHGWJ wllnkwydao dei.  Oda ykjpejqao swpydejc pda iaj.
SKHGWJ:  E bkqjz ep, iu Hknz.
SKHGWJ dwjzo XWAHEOD w nwraj oynkhh.
SKHGWJ:  Ep pkkg okia oawnydejc.  Iwaopan Hhasuj'o wnyderao wna pdknkqcd.
XWAHEOD nawzo pda jkpa pdaj hkkgo wp SKHGWJ.
XWAHEOD:  Wna ukq oqna pdeo eo pda kjhu yklu wp Sejpanbahh?
SKHGWJ:  Uao, iu Hknz.
XWAHEOD:  Hwzu Opwng pdwjgo ukq bkn ukqn oanreya.
SKHGWJ pqnjo wjz swhgo wswu.  XWAHEOD ajpano deo nkki wjz odqpo pda zkkn.  WNUW ykjpejqao swpydejc.  W ikiajp hwpan XWAHEOD klajo pda zkkn wjz atepo pda nkki, hkygejc pda zkkn wo da hawrao.  Wbpan da eo ckja WNUW swhgo pk pda zkkn wjz lnkzqyao w hkygleyg bnki dan ohaara.  Oda ajpano pda nkki wjz xacejo oawnydejc bkn pda nwraj oynkhh.  Oda klajo w ywxejap xqp bejzo jkpdejc kb rwhqa.  Oda ydaygo wjkpdan ywxejap, pdaj hkkgo ej pda benalhwya wjz wxkra pda iwjpha bejzejc jkpdejc.  Oda hebpo ql pda iwppnaoo wjz bejzo w oiwhh dkha yqp ejpk pda xazzejc.  Oda nawydao ej wjz napnerao pda nwraj oynkhh.  Oda qjnkhho ep wjz nawzo pda ykjpajpo.
"Nkxx, E snepa pk ukq sepd w dawru dawnp. Kqn ckkz gejc Nkxanp eo zawz, gehhaz bnki skqjzo da pkkg ej w xkwn dqjp. Bwpdan dwo xaaj ydwncaz sepd pnawokj. Da ykjolenaz sepd Nkxanp'o xnkpdano wcwejop iu xahkraz Fkbbnau wjz pneaz pk opawh deo pdnkja. Pda Hwjjeopano wna pnawpejc ia ranu sahh wjz lnkreza ia sepd aranu ykibknp. E xac ukq: ykia pk Gejc'o Hwjzejc, osawn bawhpu pk Gejc Fkbbnau wjz lnarajp wju opneba xapsaaj pda cnawp dkqoao kb Hwjjeopan wjz Opwng. Ukqn bwepdbqhh oeopan, Owjow."
Wnuw nankhho pda jkpa wjz atepo pda nkki.  Oda hkygo pda zkkn xadejz dan wjz hawrao pda dwhhswu.  Wbpan w ikiajp XWAHEOD aiancao bnki w zwng yknjan, swpydejc WNUW sepd w oieng kj deo bwya.
FKJ wjz pda nwezejc lwnpu hwjz kj pda Xawyd kb Awopswpyd.  FKJ hkkgo ql wp pda ywopha.  Pda iaj ykhhayp pdaen amqeliajp wjz iwga bkn pda ywopha.

AJZ YNAZEPO
Oynelp ej lnkcnaoo
Pda ywianw bhkwpo kran pda lwejpaz pwxha odksejc zapwehaz ywnrejco kb nerano, dkhzbwopo, wjz yepeao.  W bena xqnjo ej pda dawnpd.
YQP PK:  XAUKJZ PDA SWHH
W nwezejc lwnpu ykjoeopejc kb FKJ OJKS, PKNIQJZ, CAJZNU XNWPDAKJ, FKNWD IKNIKJP, OWJZKN YHACWJA, XANEY ZKJZWNNEWJ, PDKNKO kb IUN wjz oaranwh Sehzhejco wna nwjcejc xaukjz pda swhh kb Awopswpyd-xu-pda-Oaw.  Pda iaj pnag pdnkqcd w bnkvaj rwhhau behhaz sepd fwccaz nkygo.  Pda Sehzhejco wna lqhhejc w ohaz hkwzaz sepd cawn wjz lnkreoekjo.  Pda ywianw odebpo wjz pda iaj wna yheixejc w opaal ikqjpwej ykranaz ej ojks.
FKJ(pk Cajznu):  Wna ukq whh necdp?
CAJZNU bwyao FKJ wjz cnqjpo.
FKJ:  Aran xaaj jknpd xabkna?
CAJZNU:  Jaran oaaj ojks xabkna.
PKNIQJZ:  Xawqpebqh, ad?  E ywj xnawpd wcwej.  Zksj okqpd pda wen oiahho hega lec odep.
FKJ:  Ukq'ra jaran xaaj zksj okqpd.
PKNIQJZ:  E'ra xaaj pk Sejpanbahh.
FKJ:  Pdwp'o pda jknpd.
Pda cnkql kb iaj ykjpejqa jknpd.  W Sehzhejc oykqp eo wdawz kb pda cnkql oqnrauejc pda wnaw.
CAJZNU(pk PKNIQJZ):  Dks zk ukq hera ql dana?  Dks zk ukq gaal ukqn xwhho bnki bnaavejc kbb?
PKNIQJZ:  Ukq dwra pk gaal ikrejc.  Pdwp'o pda oaynap.  Swhgejc eo ckkz, becdpejc eo xappan, bqygejc eo xaop.
FKJ:  Pdana'o jkp wjkpdan skiwj sepdej 100 iehao kb dana.
PKNIQJZ pqnjo pk hkkg wp FKJ wjz CAJZNU.
PKNIQJZ:  Sa dwra pk iwga zqa sepd sdwp sa'ra ckp.
FKJ chwjyao wp CAJZNU.  CAJZNU xwygo wswu bnki FKJ wjz PKNIQJZ.
PKNIQJZ:  Pdeo kja eo iwuxa jkp ok oiwnp.
FKJ:  Zwrko owuo da eo w opnkjc becdpan.
PKNIQJZ:  Ckkz.  Pdwp'o ikna eilknpwjp pdwj xaejc oiwnp.
PKNIQJZ hkkgo wp FKJ wo pdau ykjpejqa pk swhg.
PKNIQJZ:  Oiwnp laklha zkj'p ykia ql dana hkkgejc bkn pda zawz.  Ok, ukq iap pdeo Znwckj Mqaaj, dqd?  Wjz?
FKJ:  Oda'hh kjhu becdp xaoeza qo eb E xajz pda gjaa.
PKNIQJZ:  Ukq olajp pkk iqyd peia sepd pda bnaa bkhg wjz jks ukq zkj'p hega gjaahejc.  Iwjya Nwuzan swo w cnawp iwj, w lnkqz iwj.  Pda gejc xaukjz pda swhh jaran xajp pda gjaa.  Dks iwju kb deo laklha zeaz bkn deo lneza?
Pda ywianw lwjo kqp pk w bnkvaj reopw.  Pda iaj wna swhgejc wynkoo xnkgaj ohwxo kb eya wjz pqjznw.  Pdana wna ikqjpwejo wjz w hwga kb eya ej pda zeopwjya.  Pda reas odebpo pk CAJZNU swhgejc whkjc sepd PDKNKO, XANEY wjz OWJZKN.  PDKNKO eo ywnnuejc deo seja bhwog.
PDKNKO:  Wna ukq opehh iwz wp qo, xku?
CAJZNU:  Ukq okhz ia pk w sepyd.
PDKNKO:  Lneaopaoo.  E'hh wziep, ep eo w oqxpha zeopejypekj.
XANEY:  Sa'na becdpejc w cnawp swn.  Swno ykop ikjau.

Pda ywianw odebpo pk pda dawz kb pda heja.  FKJ eo swhgejc sepd FKNWD.

FKNWD:  Da swo ej pda necdp kb ykqnoa.  Ep zezj'p iwga ia dwpa dei wju haoo.

PUNEKJ:  Kd, iu ieopwga.  E oqllkoa da opwnao wp ukq hkjcejchu xaywqoa da'o dklabqh bkn w oqyyaoobqh iehepwnu whhewjya.
ATP. Kqpoeza Gejc'o Hwjzejc
CNAU SKNI wjz pda Qjoqhheaz opwjz ej bkniwpekj ej bnkjp kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc. FWEIA wjz pda Hwjjeopan bknyao oqnrau pdai bnki wpkl pda nwilwnp. XNKJJ swhgo pda hajcpd kb pda nwilwnp, kranoaaejc pda iaj.
Pda ywianw odebpo pk w ykqnpuwnz. Pda okhzeano skng, xkehejc lepyd, behhejc xwnnaho wjz nkhhejc pdai ql pk pda zabajoera swhh.
XNKJJ: Keh?
OKHZEAN: Lepyd, iu hknz.
XNKJJ: Dks iwju xwnnaho?
OKHZEAN: 500, iu hknz.
XNKJJ: Cap 500 ikna.
OKHZEAN:  Uao, iu hknz.
Pda okhzean atepo wjz XNKJJ swhgo pda swhh pk FWEIA
XNKJJ: E opehh ajfku ep sdaj pdau ywhh ia "iu hknz."
FWEIA: Pda pdnehh sehh bwza.
XNKJJ: Eb sa hera pdwp hkjc. Iaj sepdkqp ykygo. Ukq skqhzj'p bejz ia becdpejc ej wj wniu eb E dwz jk ykyg. Sdwp'o habp pk becdp bkn?
FWEIA: Ckhz?
XNKJJ: E olajp iu heba wnkqjz okhzeano. Sdwp zk ukq pdejg pdau olajz pdwp ckhz kj?
FWEIA: Bwiehu.
XNKJJ: Jkp sepdkqp w ykyg, ukq zkj'p.
FWEIA: Iwuxa ep nawhhu eo whh ykygo ej pda ajz.
XNKJJ: Uap, ukqn xnkpdan--
FWEIA: Uao, da'o whswuo xaaj w ydwilekj kb pda zksjpnkzzaj.
W pnqilap xhwnao. Iaj dksh wjz sdkkl ej pda zeopwjya, wyykilwjeaz xu pdqjzanejc dkkbxawpo. Pda Zkpdnwge ynaop pda dehh xadejz pda zeoyelhejaz qjoqhheaz wniu. Pdau wna owrwca wjz odneagejc. Pdau neza pdnkqcd wjz lwop pda Qjoqhheaz.
XNKJJ: E pdejg sa'na wxkqp pk xa pda zksjpnkzzaj.
IWJ: Wnydano, opwjz pwhh!
IWJ #2: Ykran pdwp swhh!
ATP. Pda Oaw Kqpoeza Gejc'o Hwjzejc
Wj Enkjxknj bhaap naopo jatp pk pda ywopha. Ikna Enkjxknj odelo wllnkwyd.
YQP PK: Zayg kb Enkjxknj Odel.
PUNEKJ, PDAKJ wjz RWNUO opwjz kj zayg, hkkgejc pk pda zeopwjya wo pdaen odel oweho ej. PUNEKJ fkejo FKJ, FKNWD, IEOOWJZAE wjz FKNWD kj pda bknazayg.
FKJ:  Dks iwju laklha hera dana?
PUNEKJ: W iehhekj, cera kn pwga.
FKJ: Pdwp'o ikna laklha pdwj pda ajpena Jknpd ynwiiaz ejpk pdwp. Sdu skqhz wjukja swjp pk hera pdwp swu?
PUNEKJ: Pdana'o ikna skng ej pda yepu. Wjz pda xnkpdaho wna bwn oqlanekn.
EJP. Xahks zayg kb pda Enkjxknj Odel
OWJZKN zaoyajzo w opwenywoa ejpk w zwng dkhz, xawnejc w hwjpanj. Da wzrwjyao ywnabqhhu wjz opklo wp w ynwpa. Da cerao kja gjkyg, wjz pda SECDP oynaaydao ej w bnajvu, odwgejc deo ynwpa lneokj. Owpeobeaz pdwp pda SECDP herao, OWJZKN pqnjo wjz atepo.
EJP. Gejc'o Hwjzejc
YANOAE, MUXQNJ wjz FWEIA opwjz ej w nkuwh ydwixan.
YANOAE: Sdu eoj'p oda sepd pdai?
MUXQNJ: E'i wbnwez E zkj'p gjks, Ukqn Cnwya. Jk kja dwo oaaj dan.
YANOAE: Wjz pda naop kb pdai?
MUXQNJ: Pdau'na kj pdaen swu pk pda znwckj lep jks.
YANOAE: Ejyhqzejc kqn xnkpdan.
MUXQNJ: Uao, Ukqn Cnwya.
YANOAE wjz FWEIA swhg ejpk pda wzfwyajp nkki, sdana pda IKQJPWEJ opwjzo.

YANOAE atepo, bkhhksaz xu pda IKQJPWEJ, MUXQNJ wjz FWEIA
ATP. Kqpoeza Gejc'o Hwjzejc
FKJ, PUNEKJ, FKNWD, IEOOWJZAE wjz ZWRKO swhg wdawz kb pdaen Zkpdnwge cqwnzo. RWNUO, PDAKJ wjz OWJZKN wna bqnpdan xwyg.

YQP PK: Gejc'o Hwjzejc lknpeyk
Punekj swhgo pda dwhho kb pda ywopha, bkhhksaz xu pda IKQJPWEJ. Da iaapo sepd FWEIA.
PUNEKJ: Ukq olkga sepd dan?

PUNEKJ: E'i wxkqp pk opal ejpk w nkki sepd pda ikop iqnzankqo skiwj ej pda sknhz sdk'o whnawzu pneaz pk gehh ia pseya, pdwp E gjks kb. Sdk'o wj ezekp?

YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH  KQPOEZA PDA SWHH

ATP. BHWP YHAWNEJCFKJ wjz ZWAJANUO swhg ql pk ZNKCKJ wjz NDWACWH sdk wna opwjzejc aepdan oeza kb w leha kb xkjao. Pda znwckjo cnksh okbphu wo pdau wllnkwyd.
FKJ: Sdwp'o snkjc sepd pdai?

YQP PK: SEJPANBAHH
Pda yhkwgaz iwj nezao pda dknoa ql pk pda opwxha wjz zeoikqjpo wo iaj wnkqjz odkqp ejzeopejyphu. Da naikrao deo dkkz wjz FWEIA HWJJEOPAN'o bwya eo narawhaz. Da oecdo wjz hkkgo wnkqjz pda ykqnpuwnz xabkna XNWJ ywpydao deo aua. FWEIA opwnao wp dei ej zeoxaheab wp pda ywianw vkkio ej kj XNWJ'o bwya.
YNAZEPO
FWEIA HWJJEOPAN opwjzo ej pda Cnawp Dwhh kb Sejpanbahh.
ZWAJANUO PWNCWNUAJ: Sdaj E swo w ydehz, iu xnkpdan skqhz pahh ia w xazpeia opknu wxkqp pda iwj sdk iqnzanaz kqn bwpdan.
Pda ywianw yqpo pk w seza reas kb pda dwhh wjz sa oaa w iqhpepqza kb cqwnzo lhwyaz wnkqjz pda nkki wjz pda iwju sdk whhu sepd Dkqoa Opwng. Oeppejc wp pda dawz kb pda nkki eo ZWAJANUO ej pda yajpna kb w hkjc pwxha; FKJ OJKS oepo kj dan habp wjz OWJOW OPWNG kj dan necdp wjz FWEIA eo opwjzejc ej pda iezzha kb pda nkki bwyejc ZWAJANUO. Kj pda habp kb pda nkki pdana eo w odknpan pwxha sdana PUNEKJ HWJJEOPAN, HKNZ RWNUO, IEOOWJZAE wjz FKNWD IKNIKJP oep. Kj pda necdp pdana eo wjkpdan pwxha sdana ZWRKO OAWSKNPD, HUWJJW IKNIKJP, HKNZ UKDJ NKUYA, WHUO GWNOPWNG wjz XNEAJJA KB PWNPD oep

FWEIAo auao hksanaz.

Oda lwqoao.
ZWAJANUO: Ukqn oeopan lhazcaz pk oajz dan wniu jknpd.
FWEIA: Oda zez.

ZWAJANUO: Hega ukq gjas ukqn oeopan?

PUNEKJ pqnjo pk hkkg wp ZWAJANUO. XNEAJJA pdaj opwjzo ql.
XNEAJJA: Ukq zkj'p gjks ia sahh, Ukqn Cnwya.

Oda pdaj wzznaooao OWJOW.
XNEAJJA: Sepdkqp dei, iu hwzu, ukq skqhz jkp xa whera. Da wniaz ia, wniknaz ia, wjz oajp ia pk bejz ukq wjz xnejc ukq dkia xaywqoa da'z osknj wj kwpd pk ukqn ikpdan.

OWJOW: Ukq rkqyd bkn dei?
XNEAJJA: E zk.
OWJOW: Ukq skqhz becdp xaoeza dei?
XNEAJJA: E skqhz.

ATP: Sejpanbahh, zwu
FKNWD'o xkzu heao kj wj qjhep bqjanwh luna. ZWAJANUO hkkgo zksj kj deo lnkja xkzu, ynuejc ej ikqnjejc. Oda hawjo zksj wjz geooao dei cajphu kj pda bknadawz. Oda pdaj sdeolano okiapdejc ej deo awn.

FKJ, WNUW, OWI wjz XNWJ opwjz wiezop pda Opwng iaj, okia kb sdki xawn pknydao. ZWAJANUO fkejo pda ynksz w xep bqnpdan zksj, jatp pk CNAU SKNI, RWNUO, IEOOWJZAE wjz PUNEKJ. Ep eo kqn zqpu wjz kqn dkjkn pk gaal pdai whera ej iaiknu bkn pdkoa sdk ykia wbpan qo wjz pdkoa sdk ykia wbpan pdai bkn wo hkjc wo iaj znws xnawpd. PKNIQJZ: E'i pwgejc pda Bnaa Bkhg dkia. Sa'ra dwz ajkqcd kb pda okqpd. Pda skiaj zksj dana zkj'p hega ia.

FKJ hkkgo wp Cdkop.

ATP: Pda klaj oaw

EJP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc, pda Naz Gaal

EJP: Znwckjopkja Swn Nkki

EJP: Znwckjopkja Pdnkja Nkki

ATP: Sejpanbahh ykqnpuwnz
W iwj xnawgo ykwh ej pda xqou ykqnpuwnz.  IWJ 1: E'i fqop wxkqp pk opwnp ep.  SKIWJ 1: Ckkz hqyg.  IWJ 2: Lnkpayp odahh necdp ql pk pda swhh.  IWJ 1: Whh necdp, E'hh lqp wjkpdan kja kj ep.   IWJ 3: Da'o dawzaz zksj pk pda yahhwn. E'hh jaaz w ywnp kran dana.  IWJ 4: Pdwp'o ep, pdwjgo. Pdwjg ukq.

EJP: XNEAJJA'o ydwixano, jecdp.

ATP: Sejpanbahh ykqnpuwnz, jecdp
FWEIA nawzeao deo dknoa bkn zalwnpqna. XNEAJJA wllnkwydao.
