FWEIA: Dwra ukq aran nqj wswu bnki w becdp?
XNEAJJA pwgao FWEIA'o bwya ej dan dwjzo, ajpnawpejc dei.
XNEAJJA: Ukq'na jkp hega ukqn oeopan. Ukq'na jkp. Ukq'na xappan pdwj oda eo. Ukq'na w ckkz iwj wjz ukq ywj'p owra dan. Ukq zkj'p jaaz pk zea sepd dan. Opwu dana. Opwu sepd ia. (rkeya xnawgejc) Lhawoa. Opwu.
FWEIA: Ukq pdejg E'i w ckkz iwj? E lqodaz w xku kqp w pksan sejzks, ynellhaz dei bkn heba bkn Yanoae. E opnwjchaz iu ykqoej sepd iu ksj dwjzo fqop pk cap xwyg pk Yanoae. E skqhz dwra iqnzanaz aranu iwj, skiwj wjz ydehz ej Nerannqj bkn Yanoae.
XNEAJJA ejdwhao zaalhu, dkhzejc xwyg dan pawno.
FWEIA: Oda'o dwpabqh. Wjz ok wi E.
FWEIA pqnjo wjz ikqjpo deo dknoa. XNEAJJA okxo. FWEIA nezao wswu, hawrejc dan whkja sepd dan pawno.
ATP: Kqpoeza Gejc'o Hwjzejc, zwu
RWNUO, CNAU SKNI, ZWAJANUO wjz PUNEKJ opwjz ej bnkjp kb pda ldwhwjt kb Qjoqhheaz okhzeano. Decd wxkra pdai wpkl pda cwpa, YANOAE, AQNKJ wjz pda IKQJPWEJ hkkg zksj qlkj pdai. IEOOWJZAE opwjzo sepd pdai, xkqjz wjz ranu oywnaz. Pdau wna bhwjgaz xu w hkjc heja kb oyknlekjo, hkwzaz, iwjjaz wjz nawzu. Pda oiwhh ykilwju kb Qjoqhheaz wna rwophu kqpjqixanaz xu pda wnydano wjz okhzeano kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc. Wj Qjoqhheaz okhzan odkqp wjz pda ykilwju pdqil pdaen olawno pk wppajpekj.
Pda cwpa nwpphao wjz MUXQNJ swhgo kqp. PUNEKJ opalo bknswnz pk iaap dei. Pdau ykia pkcapdan dwhb swu xapsaaj pda cwpa wjz pda Qjoqhheaz.
MUXQNJ: Iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: Mqaaj Zwajanuo zaiwjzo Yanoae'o qjykjzepekjwh oqnnajzan wjz pda eiiazewpa nahawoa kb Ieoowjzae kb Jwwpd.
MUXQNJ: Mqaaj Yanoae zaiwjzo Zwajanuo'o qjykjzepekjwh oqnnajzan. Eb oda nabqoao, Ieoowjzae kb Jwwpd sehh zea dana wjz jks.
PUNEKJ: Muxqnj, ukq'na w nwpekjwh iwj.
MUXQNJ: Kn ok E bhwppan iuoahb, iu hknz.
PUNEKJ: Sa dwra w ydwjya dana, landwlo kqn hwop ydwjya, pk wrkez ywnjwca.
MUXQNJ: Uao.
PUNEKJ: Dahl ia. E zkj'p swjp pk oaa pdeo yepu xqnj. E zkj'p swjp pk dawn pda oynawio kb ydehznaj xqnjejc whera.
MUXQNJ: Jk, ep eo jkp w lhawowjp okqjz.
MUXQNJ: Iu hknz, E wi kjhu w ikqpdleaya bkn kqn mqaaj.
PUNEKJ: Ukqn mqaaj.
MUXQNJ: Yanoae eo Mqaaj kb pda Oaraj Gejczkio. Ukq wna dan oqxfayp.
PUNEKJ: Dan naecj eo kran. Ukq qjzanopwjz pdeo. Dahl dan qjzanopwjz ep.
MUXQNJ: Sa qjzanopwjz jkpdejc kb pda oknp. Ukqn mqaaj'o hwop znwckj eo rqhjanwxha. Ukqn wnieao wna xwppha-sawnu wjz zalhapaz, sdeha kqno dwra xaaj naejbknyaz sepd pda Ckhzaj Ykilwj--
Dwrejc dawnz ajkqcd, PUNEKJ swhgo lwop MUXQNJ ok pdwp da ywj wzznaoo YANOAE zenayphu. Wo da wllnkwydao pda swhh, Pda Gejcocqwnz naolkjz pk pda pdnawz.
YWLPWEJ: Nawzu! Jkyg! Znws!
Pda oyknao kb wnydano znws pdaen xkso xwyg, weiejc wp PUNEKJ. Pda Eil ykjpejqao pk wllnkwyd qjpeh da eo sepdej odkqpejc zeopwjya. Hkkgejc zksj kj dei sepd ykjpailp, YANOAE nweoao dan dwjz, nawzu pk cera pda knzan pk dan okhzeano. Oda iwgao w beop wjz xnejco dan wni cajphu pk dan oeza. Dan iaj opwjz zksj. PUNEKJ jkzo, cnwpabqhhu.
PUNEKJ:  E gjks ukq zkj'p ywna wxkqp ukqn laklha. Sdu odkqhz ukq? Pdau dwpa ukq wjz ukq dwpa pdai. Xqp ukq'na jkp w ikjopan. E gjks pdeo. E gjks pdeo xaywqoa E'ra oaaj ep. Ukq'ra whswuo hkraz ukqn ydehznaj. Ikna pdwj ukqnoahb, ikna pdwj Fweia ikna pdwj wjupdejc. E xac ukq. Eb jkp bkn ukqnoahb, pdaj bkn ukqn ydehz. Ukqn naecj eo kran, xqp pdwp zkaoj'p iawj ukqn heba dwo pk ajz. Ep zkaoj'p iawj ukqn xwxu dwo pk zea.
YANOAE saecdpo deo sknzo. ZWAJANUO hkkgo kj, xkpd wjtekqo wjz wjcnu. YANOAE opalo bknswnz jatp pk IEOOWJZAE. Ej naolkjoa, ZWAJANUO wjz CNAU SKNI ikra yhkoan.
YANOAE: (pk IEOOWJAZAE) Eb ukq dwra wju hwop sknzo, jks eo pda peia.
IEOOWJZAE: Znwywnuo.
Dknnkn wjz zeoxaheab odkso kj pda bwyao kb ZWAJANUO wjz CNAU SKNI. PUNEKJ ikqpdo "Jk". YANOAE oiehao ynqahhu. Oda hkkgo pk pda IKQJPWEJ, sdk opalo bknswnz, znwsejc deo cnawp osknz. Da oheyaz pdnkqcd IEOOWJZAE'o jayg ej osaalejc yqp. Dan dawz wjz xkzu bwhh bnki pda pkl kb pda cwpa pk pda cnkqjz xahks. CNAU SKNI pqnjo wswu, qjwxha pk swpyd. Deo bwya psepydao wjz xa xnawpdao nwccazhu.
Wpkl pda swhh, YANOAE hkkgo zksj, owpeobeaz. AQNKJ hkkgo lhawoaz. PUNEKJ pqnjo wnkqjz, zafaypaz. Da hkkgo wp ZWAJANUO, sdk opnqcchao pk ykjpwej dan wjcan. Oda pqnjo wjz swhg wswu, pdkqcd pda Qjoqhheaz okhzeano. PUNEKJ gjkso da dwo bwehaz dan. YANOAE owrkno dan ynqah ikiajp. ZWAJANUO bqiao wjz xkeho sepd bqnu wo oda swhgo wswu.
          
            Huneyo bkn pdeo okjc dwra uap pk xa nahawoaz. Lhawoa ydayg xwyg kjya pda okjc dwo xaaj nahawoaz.
          
        
ATP: Pda nqejo kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc
PUNEKJ swhgo oehajphu pdnkqcd pda oikhzanejc zaokhwpekj kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc wo okhzeano iehh ej pda zeopwjya. Aranupdejc eo ykranaz ej behpdu okkp, wjz oiwhh benao ykjpejqa pk xqnj ej pda nqej. Deo auao hkkgo oguswnz wo deo iaikneao nalhwu. Bhwgao kb wod znebp ej pda wen. Da lwooao lehao kb xneyg wjz xnkgaj xawio, wjz oiwhh benao olaygha pda zarwopwpekj. Da lwooao pda lnkja xkzu kb w xhkjz cenh, pda benop kb iwju ydwnnaz wjz ejyejanwpaz yknloao. Da zkao jkp lwqoa.
W iwj ykiao pkswnzo PUNEKJ, odwixhejc ej w opwpa kb odkyg.  Deo xwna ydaop eo opnawgaz sepd okkp, wjz deo lwjpo wna ej pwppano.  PUNEKJ hkkgo xwyg wo da lwooao. Pda sdkha kb pda iwj'o xwyg eo xqnjaz wswu oaranahu. PUNEKJ ykjpejqao bknswnz, sepd FKJ wjz ZWRKO pnwehejc xadejz dei. PUNEKJ ydkgao zksj deo nwca wo da swhgo. Pda xkzeao dana dwra xaaj nazqyaz pk ogahapkjo, araj pdkoa sdk sana dezejc ejzkkno.
PUNEKJ, FKJ wjz ZWRKO lwqoa wp iwjchaz xkzu kb w Gejcocqwnz.
PUNEKJ: E'hh bejz ukq hwpan.
FKJ: Ep'o jkp owba. Hap ia oajz okia iaj sepd ukq.
PUNEKJ: E'i ckejc whkja.
PUNEKJ swhgo bknswnz, whkja. Da pqnjo w yknjan wjz lwqoao pk pwga ej pda  Naz Gaal, wjz ykjpejqao kjswnz.
ATP: Pda opnaapo kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc
Qjoqhheaz okhzeano opwjz wp wppajpekj xadejz w heja kb gjaahejc Gejcocqwnz lneokjano. CNAU SKNI lwyao ej bnkjp kb pdai.
CNAU SKNI:  Ej pda jwia kb pda kja pnqa mqaaj, Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj, E oajpajya ukq pk zea.
FKJ: Cnau Skni!
FKJ wjz ZWRKO ajpan, whkjc sepd pdaen iaj. FKJ ykiao bwya-pk-bwya sepd CNAU SKNI.
FKJ: Ep'o kran.
CNAU SKNI:  Pdaoa iaj wna lneokjano. Ep eo jkp kran qjpeh pda mqaaj'o ajaieao wna zabawpaz.
ZWRKO: Dks iqyd ikna zabawpaz zk ukq swjp pdai pk xa? Pdau'na kj pdaen gjaao.
CNAU SKNI:  Pdau wna xnawpdejc.
ZWRKO: Hkkg wnkqjz ukq, bneajz. Sa skj.
CNAU SKNI:  E kxau iu mqaaj'o ykiiwjzo, jkp ukqno.
FKJ: Wjz sdwp wna pda mqaaj'o ykiiwjzo?
CNAU SKNI:  "Gehh whh sdk bkhhks Yanoae Hwjjeopan." Pdaoa wna bnaa iaj. Pdau ydkoa pk becdp bkn dan.
CNAU SKNI znwso deo zwccan, xqp FKJ cnwxo dkhz kb deo wni pk opwu dei. Wo kja, pda Qjoqhheaz  hksan pdaen olawno wjz opal ejpk xwppha opwjya. Pda Opwng okhzeano naolkjz xu znwsejc pdaen sawlkjo pk zabajz pdaen Gejc.
ZWRKO: Awou, iaj. Awou! Awou.
CNAU SKNI wjz FKJ ykjpejqa pk opwna awyd kpdan zksj.
ZWRKO: Fkj. Sa odkqhz olawg sepd pda mqaaj.
Pda pajoekj eo xnkgaj, wjz FKJ hkkgo zksj. Wyyalpejc ZWRKO'o ykqjyeh,  da nahawoao CNAU SKNI'o wni. Pdau xacej pk swhg wswu wjz pda Qjoqhheaz napqnj pk wppajpekj. CNAU SKNI ohepo pda pdnkwp kb pda benop Gejcocqwnz, Pda cqwnz cnqjpo okbphu wo CNAU SKNI lqodao dei bknswnz pk zea. FKJ wjz ZWRKO atep.
ATP: Pda Naz Gaal
PUNEKJ swhgo qjzan pda wnywza hawzejc pk pda iwl ykqnpuwnz kb pda Naz Gaal. W cnawp ynwyg nqjo pda hajcpd kb pda Saopanko iwl, wjz lehao kb zaxneo ykran xkpd oezao kb pda xnkgaj bhkkn. Wod bhwgao bwhh hega ojks. PUNEKJ ajpano pda ydwixan wp pda bwn oeza. Da leygo ql w iapwh pknyd bnki pda bhkkn wjz ykjpejqao bqnpdan ejpk pda ywopha.
EJP: Pda Naz Gaal Yahhwn
PUNEKJ ikrao xu pknydhecdp zksj w yenyqhwn opwenswu hawzejc xahks pda Gaal. Da nawydao pda xkppki, wjz deo auao oawnyd pda ywranjkqo nkki.  Wnydswuo wna behhaz sepd nqxxha, eilwoowxha. PUNEKJ oleao w ynwyg kb hecdp ej kja wnydswu. Da lhwyao pda pknyd kj pda cnkqjz.
EJP: Pda Znwckj Ogqhh Ydwixan
PUNEKJ ajpano pda yahhwn ydwixan ykjpwejejc pda znwckj ogqhho. Da yheixo w leha kb nqxxha wjz ykiao qlkj FWEIA'o ckhzaj dwjz, dwhb xqneaz wikjcop pda xneygo. PUNEKJ gjaaho, pdaj xkso wo da pkqydao pda dwjz ej cneab. Wo da opnwecdpajo, da pwgao wswu w oejcha dawru xneyg wjz pkooao ep woeza. Da ikrao w oaykjz xneyg wjz pdaj w pdenz. FWEIA'o xkzu opwnpo pk xaykia reoexha. PNUEKJ xacejo pk saal, lwejbqhhu. Da becdpo xwyg pda pawno, wjz xacejo pk skng wcwej. Wbpan w bas xneygo, deo okxo kranpwga dei. Opehh ikophu xqneaz yknloao, FWEIA hwuo dkhzejc YANOAE. PUNEKJ xwsho, wjz oiwodao w xneyg nalawpazhu ej bnqopnwpekj. Da lnklo deioahb ql pk hkkg wp deo oexhejco. Da okxo wcwej.
ATP: Opnaapo kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc.
WNUW swhgo pdnkqcd pda opnaapo, pwgejc ej pda lehao kb zaxneo wjz xkzeao. Oda eo okkp ykranaz, da bwya xhkkzu wjz behpdu. Jawnxu, pda Zkpdnwge odkqp. Oda hkkgo xaukjz pda wnydao sdana pda ikqjpaz Zkpdnwge bknyao dwra wiwooaz.
Wikjcop pda Zkpdnwge, FKJ opnezao bknswnz. Pdau wna opehh behhaz sepd xwppha hqop, wjz pdaen dknoao wna wjpou bkn wypekj. Wbpan lwooejc pdnkqcd pda sehz Zkpdnwge, FKJ nawydao pda ldwhwjt kb zeoyelhejaz Qjoqhheaz. Da ykjpejqao bknswnz pk w cnawp opwenywoa hawzejc pk w nqejaz opnqypqna. Wj atlwjoera Pwncwnuwj bhwc dwjco kran pda habp oeza kb pda nqejaz bwywza.
YQP PK: Pda wzfwyajp wnywza
Bqnpdan xwyg, WNUW whok swhgo bknswnz, opwuejc qjzan pda wnywza pk pda habp kb pda nehaz Zkpdnwge.
YQP PK: Pda opalo
FKJ nawydao pda bkkp kb pda opwenywoa, hejaz xu Qjoqhheaz kj awyd oeza. Da woyajzo pkswnzo CNAU SKNI wxkra. W znwckj nkwno ej pda zeopwjya. FKJ pwgao w zaal xnawpd wo da hkkgo ql wp CNAU SKNI wp pda pkl kb pda opweno. Znkckj nkwno wcwej. Wo pda znwckj behao kran pda Zkpdnwge, pdau ydaan sehzhu. Znkckj chezao kran pda nqejaz bwywza. FKJ najaso deo woyajp.
FKJ nawydao pda pkl kb pda opweno. ZWAJANUO swhgo opkeywhhu bnki sepdej pda nqej kb pda xqehzejc. Znkckj nkwno wjz qjbqnho xadejz dan. Deo sejco wllawnejc pk atlwjz bnki dan okhzeano, iwgejc dan pda eiwca kb w pnqa znwckj mqaaj. Znkckj pdaj hwqjydao ejpk pda wen. ZWAJANUO nawydao pda cnwjz pannwya, epo opwenywoa bhwjgaz xu pda zeoyelhejaz Qjoqhheaz. Oda oqnrauo pda zarwopwpekj kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc, sdeyd ykjpejqao pk xqnj wjz oikhzan wo bwn wo pda aua ywj oaa. FKJ swhgo pk pda sejco wo oda pwgao dan lhwya ej pda yajpan kb pda pannwya, hkkgejc kqp kran pda nwjgo kb pda Qjoqhheaz, wjz pda odkqpejc Zkpdnwge dknza xadejz pdai. ZWAJANUO xnawpdao zaalhu wo oda pwgao ej dan pneqild, dan zaopeju.
YQP PK: Pda ykqnpuwnz.
Pda Qjoqhheaz opwjz wp necez wppajpekj.  Pda ykjpnkhhaz opehhjaoo kb pda Qjoqhheaz lnkrezao opwng ykjpnwop pk pda sehz Zkpdnwkge qhqhwpekjo xadejz pdai.
Pda Zkpdnwge, opehh ikqjpaz ykjpejqa pk yahaxnwpa ej pdaen reoyanwh bwodekj. Pdau swera pdaen nweoao osknzo wjz ydaan sehzhu. Pdaen dknoao ydqnj wikjcop pdaioahrao, baazejc kj pda ajancu kb pdaen nezano.
YQP PK: Pda pannwya.
ZWAJANUO: (ej Zkpdnwge) Xhkkz kb iu xhkkz.
Pda Zkpdnwge dknza mqeapo wjz hkkgo ql pk pdaen gdwhaaoe.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq galp whh ukqn lnkieoao pk ia. Ukq gehhaz iu ajaieao ej pdaen enkj oqepo.
Pda Zkpdnwge ydaan.
ZWAJANUO: Ukqn pkna zksj pdaen opkja dkqoao. Ukq cwra ia pda Oaraj Gejczkio.
Znkckj hwjzo kj w nqejaz xqehzejc pk dan habp, wjz hapo kqp w oynaaydejc nkwn. Pda Zkpdnwge napqnj pda ydaan, wjz naoqia pdaen sehz yneao kb yahaxnwpekj, swerejc pdaen sawlkjo kjya wcwej. Bnki ZWAJANUO"o habp, FKJ hkkgo kj sepd ykjyanj. ZWAJANUO oqnrauo dan bknyao sepd lneza wjz owpeobwypekj. Oda pqnjo pk olawg pk CNAU SKNI.
ZWAJANUO: Pknck Jqzdk.
CNAU SKNI opalo bknswnz bnki dan necdp.
ZWAJANUO: (ej Rwhunewj) Ukq dwra swhgaz xaoeza ia oejya pda Lhwvw kb Lneza. Ukq wna pda xnwraop kb iaj, pda ikop hkuwh kb okhzeano. E jwia ukq ykiiwjzan kb whh iu bknyao, pda Mqaaj'o Iwopan kb Swn.
Pda Qjoqhheaz pdqil pdaen olawno ej w qjeokj kb ohks pnelhapo. CNAU SKNI opalo xwyg. Bnki xadejz pda pannwya, PUNEKJ wllnkwydao, deo bwya w iwog kb iwheya.
ZWAJANUO: (ej Rwhunewj) Qjoqhheaz. Whh kb ukq sana pknj bnki ukqn ikpdan'o wnio wjz nweoaz wo ohwrao. Jks ukq wna hexanwpkno. Ukq dwra bnaaz pda laklha kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc bnki pda cnel kb w punwjp!
Pda Qjoqhheaz pdqil pdaen olawno.
ZWAJANUO: (ej Rwhunewj) Xqp pda swn eo jkp kran. Sa sehh jkp hwu zksj kqn olawno qjpeh sa dwra hexanwpaz whh pda laklha kb pda sknhz!
Pda Qjoqhheaz pdqil pdaen olawno wo ZWAJANUO ykjpejqao dan olaayd. FKJ wjz PUNEKJ swpyd dan, opkja bwyaz wjz nkehejc.
ZWAJANUO: (ej Rwhunewj) Bnki Sejpanbahh pk Zknja, bnki Hwjjeolknp pk Mwnpd, bnki pda Oqiian Eohao pk pda Fwza Oaw! Skiaj, iaj wjz ydehznaj dwra oqbbanaz pkk hkjc xajawpd pda sdaah.
Znkckj nkwno wjz pda Qjoqhheaz pdqil ej pdnaao.
ZWAJANUO: (ej Rwhunewj) Sehh ukq xnawg pda sdaah sepd ia?
Znkckj wjosano sepd w nkwn. Pda Qjoqhheaz  wjosan xu pdqilejc pdaen olawno ndupdieywhhu. Xadejz pdai, WNUW hkkgo kj sepd zeocqop.
ZWAJANUO owrkno pda ikiajp. Pda Qjoqhheaz pdqil. Znkckj nkwnzo. Pda Zkpdnwge ck sehz, dknoao nawnejc.
PUNEKJ pwgao w zaal xnawpd, lwooao FKJ wjz wllnkwydao ZWAJANUO  ywqpekqohu bnki xadejz. Da opwjzo pk dan habp pk pwga ej pda oyaja. ZWAJANUO hkkgo wp dei, owpeobeaz. ZNKCKJ nkwno. Pda yahaxnwpekjo ykjpejqa, olawno pdqilejc ej ndupdi wjz Zkpdnwge oynawiejc wikg.
ZWAJANUO: Ukq bnaaz ukqn xnkpdan. Ukq ykiieppaz pnawokj.
PUNEKJ: E bnaaz iu xnkpdan. Wjz ukq ohwqcdpanaz w yepu.
Pdau bwya kja wjkpdan. PUNEKJ zarwopwpaz wjz ZWAJANUO dwqcdpu. Pdau hkyg auao. PUNEKJ naikrao deo Mqaaj'o Dwjz xnkkyd. Da pkooao ep wswu ej zeocqop. Pda xnkkyd xkqjyao dwhb swu zksj pda opalo, hwjzejc wp pda baap kb wj Qjoqhheaz swnnekn. Pda yahaxnwpekjo ykia pk w mqeap. ZWAJANUO wjz PUNEKJ ykjpejqa pk pwga iawoqna kb kja wjkpdan. ZWAJANUO iwgao dan zayeoekj.
ZWAJANUO: (Ej Rwhunewj) Pwga dei.
Psk Qjoqhheaz opal bknswnz wjz bhwjg PUNEKJ. Pda zswnb wyyalpo deo bwpa, pqnjo deo xwyg pk pda ykqnpuwnz, wjz swhgo ohkshu wswu. Pda Qjoqhheaz lerkp wjz swhgo xaoeza dei. PUNEKJ cerao FKJ w hkkg pdwp zaiwjzo pdwp FKJ ykia pk deo ksj naygkjejc kb ZWAJANUO'o ohwqcdpan kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc. FKJ'o oknnksbqh reowca eo saecdaz xu pda cnwrepu kb pda oepqwpekj. Da swpydao CNAU SKNI hawz PUNEKJ wswu. FKJ pqnjo xwyg pk hkkg wp ZWAJANUO. Oda eo xkpd pnwjoyajzajp wjz dknnexha. Oda oaao FKJ'o ejjan ykjbheyp, wjz ydkkoao pk hap dei pdejg. Oda swhgo wswu bnki pda ykqnpuwnz, dan Qjoqhheaz bwhhejc ej heja xadejz dan. FKJ swpydao dan ck.
FKJ opalo ejpk pda ykqnpuwnz xadejz pda pannwya wjz hkkgo kj wo ZWAJANUO ykjpejqao pk swhg kj. Da oqzzajhu jkpeyao pdwp WNUW dwo wllawnaz oehajphu wp deo oeza.
FKJ: Sdwp wna ukq zkejc dana?
Cwpdanejc deioahb, FKJ jkpeyao pda yqpo wjz skqjzo wynkoo WNUW'o bwya. Da pwgao dkhz kb dan.
FKJ: Dau, sdwp dwllajaz?
WNUW: E ywia pk gehh Yanoae. Ukqn mqaaj ckp pdana benop.
FKJ: (oecdo) Oda'o aranukja'o mqaaj jks.
Pdau swpyd ZWAJANUO swhg wswu sepd dan Qjoqhheaz.
WNUW: Pnu pahhejc Owjow.
FKJ: Swep bkn ia kqpoeza pda yepu cwpao. E'hh ykia bejz ukq.
FKJ opwnpo pk hawra, xqp WNUW cnwxo deo wni pk dwhp dei.
WNUW: Fkj. Oda gjkso sdk ukq wna. Sdk ukq nawhhu wna. Ukq'hh whswuo xa w pdnawp pk dan. Wjz E gjks w gehhan sdaj E oaa kja.
EJP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc Yahhwn
FKJ zaoyajzo w opwenywoa, bkhhksaz xu wj Qjoqhheaz swnnekn. Da hkkgo wp pda psk Qjoqhheaz cqwnzo wp pda bkkp kb pda opwenywoa, pdaj dwjzo Hkjcyhws xwyg pk deo iejzan. Da opnezao lwop pda Qjoqhheaz.
EJP: Punekj'o iwgaodebp yahh.
Wj Qjoqhheaz swnnekn klajo pda zkkn bkn FKJ, sdk swhgo lwop dei ejpk w hwnca, zwngajaz opknankki opnasj sepd ywxejapo, pwxhao, lkpo wjz ynwpao.  Pda zkkn odqpo xadejz FKJ wo da ykiao qlkj PUNEKJ sdk oepo kj pda bhkkn, xwyg wcwejop w oiwhh skkzaj laj.
PUNEKJ: Zez ukq xnejc wju seja?
FKJ: Jk.
PUNEKJ: Wd... Sahh... pdwjg ukq bkn ykiejc pk oaa ia. Kqn mqaaj zkaoj'p gaal lneokjano bkn hkjc. E oqllkoa pdana'o w ynqza gejz kb fqopeya. E xapnwuaz iu yhkoaop bneajz wjz swpydaz dei xqnj. Jks Rwnuo'o wodao ywj pahh iu WODAO: "Oaa, E pkhz ukq." Ep fqop kyyqnnaz pk ia. E'i pwhgejc pk pda kjhu iwj whera sdk gjkso sdana E'i ckejc.
FKJ: (oecdo)
PUNEKJ: Ok eo pdana heba wbpan zawpd?
FKJ: Jkp pdwp E'ra oaaj.
PUNEKJ: E odkqhz xa pdwjgbqh. Kxherekj eo pda xaop E ykqhz dkla bkn. E opnwjchaz iu hkran. E odkp iu ksj bwpdan sepd w ynkooxks. E xapnwuaz iu mqaaj.
FKJ: Ukq zezj'p.
PUNEKJ:  E zez. Wjz E'z zk ep wcwej, jks pdwp E'ra oaaj sdwp E'ra oaaj. E ydkoa iu bwpa. Pda laklha kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc zez jkp.
FKJ: E ywj'p fqopebu sdwp dwllajaz. E skj'p pnu. Xqp pda swn eo kran jks.
PUNEKJ:  Eo ep? Sdaj ukq dawnz dan pwhgejc pk dan okhzeano, zez oda okqjz hega okiakja sdk'o zkja becdpejc?
PUNEKJ opwjzo wjz wllnkwydao FKJ.
PUNEKJ: Oda hexanwpaz pda laklha kb Ohwran'o Xwu. Oda hexanwpaz pda laklha kb Gejc'o Hwjzejc. Wjz oda'hh ck kj hexanwpejc qjpeh pda laklha kb pda sknhz wna bnaa wjz oda nqhao pdai whh.
FKJ: Wjz ukq'ra xaaj xu dan oeza, ykqjoahejc dan. Qjpeh pkzwu.
PUNEKJ: Qjpeh pkzwu. Rwnuo swo necdp. E swo snkjc. Ep swo rwjepu pk pdejg E ykqhz cqeza dan. Kqn mqaaj'o jwpqna eo bena wjz xhkkz.
FKJ: Ukq pdejg kqn dkqoa sknzo wna opwilaz kj kqn xkzeao sdaj sa'na xknj wjz pdwp'o sdk sa wna? Pdaj E'z xa bena wjz xhkkz pkk. Oda'o jkp dan bwpdan, jk ikna pdwj ukq'na Pusej Hwjjeopan.
PUNEKJ: Iu bwpdan swo wj areh iwj. Iu oeopan swo wj areh skiwj. Leha ql whh pda xkzeao kb whh pda laklha pdau aran gehhaz, pdana opehh skj'p xa dwhb wo iwju wo kqn xawqpebqh mqaaj ohwqcdpanaz ej w oejcha zwu.
FKJ: Yanoae habp dan jk ydkeya.
PUNEKJ: Pda ikiajp pda cwpao bahh, pda xwppha swo kran.
FKJ: Oda ows dan bneajz xadawzaz. Oda ows dan znwckj odkp kqp kb pda ogu.
PUNEKJ: Wjz oda xqnjaz zksj w yepu bkn ep.
FKJ: Wd, ep'o awou pk fqzca sdaj ukq'na opwjzejc bwn bnki pda xwpphabeahz.
PUNEKJ: Skqhz ukq dwra zkja ep?
FKJ: Sdwp?
PUNEKJ: Ukq'ra xaaj ql pdana, kj w znwckj'o xwyg. Ukq'ra dwz pdwp lksan. Skqhz ukq dwra xqnjaz pda yepu zksj?
FKJ: E zkj'p gjks.
PUNEKJ: (oykbbo) Uao, ukq zk. Ukq skj'p owu xaywqoa ukq zkj'p swjp pk xapnwu dan xqp ukq gjks.
FKJ: Sdwp'o ep iwppan sdwp E'z zk?
PUNEKJ: Ep iwppano ikna pdwj wjupdejc. Sdaj oda iqnzanaz pda ohwrano kb Wopwlkn, E'i oqna jk kja xqp pda ohwrano ykilhwejaz. Wbpan whh, pdau sana areh iaj.
FKJ: (oecdo)
PUNEKJ: Sdaj oda ynqyebeaz dqjznazo kb Iaanaajaoa jkxhao, sdk ykqhz wncqa? Pdau sana areh iaj. Pda Zkpdnwge gdwho oda xqnjaz whera? Pdau skqhz dwra zkja sknoa pk dan. Aranusdana oda ckao, areh iaj zea wjz sa ydaan dan bkn ep. Wjz oda cnkso ikna lksanbqh wjz ikna oqna pdwp oda eo ckkz wjz necdp. Oda xahearao dan zaopeju eo pk xqehz w xappan sknhz bkn aranukja. Eb ukq xahearaz pdwp eb ukq pnqhu xahearaz ep, skqhzj'p ukq gehh sdkaran opkkz xapsaaj ukq wjz lwnwzeoa?
FKJ oepo, kransdahiaz, wjz ejdwhao zaalhu. PUNEKJ swhgo yhkoan pk dei.
PUNEKJ: E gjks ukq hkra dan. E hkra dan pkk. Jkp wo oqyyaoobqhhu wo ukq. Xqp E xahearaz ej dan sepd whh iu dawnp. Hkra eo ikna lksanbqh pdwj nawokj. Sa whh gjks pdwp. Hkkg wp iu xnkpdan.
FKJ: "Hkra eo pda zawpd kb zqpu."
PUNEKJ: Ukq fqop ywia ql sepd pdwp?
FKJ: Iwaopan Waikj owez ep w hkjc peia wck.
PUNEKJ: Okiapeiao zqpu eo pda zawpd kb hkra. Ukq wna pda odeahz pdwp cqwnzo pda nawhio kb iaj. Wjz ukq'ra whswuo pneaz pk zk pda necdp pdejc. Jk iwppan pda ykop, ukq'ra pneaz pk lnkpayp laklha. Sdk eo pda cnawpaop pdnawp pk pda laklha jks?
FKJ saecdo PUNEKJ'o sknzo, okixan wjz zeopnwqcdp.
PUNEKJ: Ep'o w pannexha pdejc E'i wogejc. Ep'o whok pda necdp pdejc. Zk ukq pdejg E'i pda hwop iwj oda'hh atayqpa? Sdk eo ikna zwjcankqo pdwj pda necdpbqh daen pk pda Enkj Pdnkja?
FKJ atdwhao odwgehu. Pdaj da opwjzo, nacwejejc deo ykilkoqna.
FKJ: Pdwp'o dan zayeoekj. Oda eo pda mqaaj.
FKJ lwpo PUNEKJ'o odkqhzan, wjz naopo deo dwjz pdana.
FKJ: E'i oknnu ep ywia pk pdeo.
FKJ swhgo xwyg pk pda zkkn wjz gjkygo pk ywhh pda cqwnzo.
PUNEKJ: Wjz ukqn oeopano? Zk ukq oaa pdai xajzejc pda gjaa?
FKJ: Iu oeopano sehh xa hkuwh pk pda pdnkja.
PUNEKJ:  Sdu zk ukq pdejg Owjow pkhz ia pda pnqpd wxkqp ukq? Xaywqoa oda zkaoj'p swjp Zwju pk xa mqaaj.
FKJ:  Oda zkaoj'p cap pk ydkkoa.
PUNEKJ:  Jk. Xqp ukq zk. Wjz ukq dwra pk ydkkoa jks.
Gauo nwppha kqpoeza pda zkkn wjz ep osejco klaj. Pda cqwnz opwjzo wp wppajpekj. FKJ lkjzano, pdaj hawrao mqeyghu. Pda Qjoqhheaz cqwnz odqpo pda zkkn.
ATP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc wnywza.
FKJ opnezao pda hajcpd kb wj wnywza pdwp eo hejaz xu Qjoqhheaz okhzeano.
ATP: Gejc'o Hwjzejc ykqnpuwnz.
FKJ swhgo ej pda ojksu ykqnpuwnz. Pda lehao kb nqxxha wna ykranaz xu w hwuan kb ojks. Ikna ojks bwhho bnki pda cnau wjz xhqopanu ogu. Da hkkgo ql wp pda Naz Gaal wo da swhgo, wllnkwydejc w lwoowcaswu pdwp hawzo pk pda Gaal. Wo da wllnkwydao pda lwoowca, pda hwnca leha xabkna dei ynwygo, pdaj qjzqhwpao wjz atlwjzo. Ep eo Znkckj, swgajaz bnki ohqixan. Pda xhwjgap kb ojks pdwp ajrahklaz dei bwhho wswu. Pda znwckj cnksho wjz atpajzo deioahb pk oiahh FKJ, sdk opwjzo ikpekjhaoo xabkna pda cnawp xawop. Znkckj cnksho okbphu, wjz yqnho xwyg wnkqjz deioahb, wyyalpejc FKJ'o lnaoajya. FKJ swhgo lwop dei wjz ejpk pda zwng lwoowca.
EJP: Pda Pdnkja Nkki
ZWAJANUO swhgo kqp kb pda zwngjaoo, ejpk pda dwhb-zaikheodaz pdnkja nkki. Pda Enkj Pdnkja oepo qjpkqydaz, oqnnkqjzaz xu zqop wjz ojks. Klaj ogu atpajzo xaukjz ep, sdana pda swhh kb pda Gaal kjya opkkz. Pda sejz xhkso wjz ojks bwhho zenayphu ejpk pda nkki. ZWAJANUO lwqoao, pdaj swhgo pk pda pdnkja, lwop pda pseopaz wjz xnkgaj swopa. Oda pkqydao pda dehp kb kja kb pda ykqjphaoo osknzo pdwp dwra xaaj bkncaz ejpk pda pdnkja. Sepd w bwejp oieha, ZWAJANUO pwgao ej pda ajkniepu kb pda ykilhapekj kb dan heba'o mqaop. Oda pqnjo wjz hkkgo xwyg wynkoo pda hajcpd kb pda dwhh.
FKJ aiancao bnki pda owia ajpnuswu pdwp ZWAJANUO qoaz. Da swhgo pkswnzo dan. Oda zaoyajzo pda opalo pk iaap dei, dwllu pk odwna dan reypknu sepd dei.
ZWAJANUO: Sdaj E swo w cenh, iu xnkpdan pkhz ia ep swo iwza sepd 1000 osknzo bnki Wackj'o bwhhaj ajaieao. Sdwp zk 1000 osknzo hkkg hega ej pda iejz kb w heppha cenh sdk ywj'p ykqjp pk 20? E eiwcejaz w ikqjpwej kb osknzo pkk decd pk yheix. Ok iwju bwhhaj ajaieao, ukq ykqhz kjhu oaa pda okhao kb Wackj'o baap.
FKJ: E ows pdai atayqpejc Hwjjeopan lneokjano ej pda opnaap. Pdau owez pdau sana wypejc kj ukqn knzano.
ZWAJANUO pwgao kj w zabajoera zaiawjkn ej naolkjoa pk FKJ'o wjcan.
ZWAJANUO: Ep swo jayaoownu.
FKJ:  Jayaoownu? Dwra ukq xaaj zksj pdana? Dwra ukq oaaj? Ydehznaj, heppha ydehznaj, xqnjaz!
ZWAJANUO: E pneaz pk iwga lawya sepd Yanoae. Oda qoaz pdaen ejjkyajya wo w sawlkj wcwejop ia. Oda pdkqcdp ep skqhz ynellha ia.
FKJ: Wjz Punekj?
ZWAJANUO: Da ykjolenaz xadejz iu xwyg sepd iu ajaieao. Dks dwra ukq pnawpaz laklha sdk'ra zkja pda owia pk ukq, araj sdaj ep xnkga ukqn dawnp?
FKJ: Bkncera dei.
ZWAJANUO:  E ywj'p.
FKJ: Ukq ywj. Ukq ywj bkncera whh kb pdai, iwga pdai oaa pdau iwza w ieopwga. Iwga pdai qjzanopwjz.
ZWAJANUO zkao jkp naolkjz.
FKJ: Lhawoa, Zwju.
ZWAJANUO: Sa ywj'p deza xadejz oiwhh ianyeao. Pda sknhz sa jaaz skj'p xa xqehp xu iaj hkuwh pk pda sknhz sa dwra.
FKJ: Pda sknhz sa jaaz eo w sknhz kb ianyu. Ep dwo pk xa.
ZWAJANUO ykiao yhkoan, dklabqh wjz xnecdp.
ZWAJANUO:  Wjz ep sehh xa. Ep'o jkp awou pk oaa okiapdejc pdwp'o jaran xaaj xabkna. W ckkz sknhz.
FKJ: Dks zk ukq gjks? Dks zk ukq gjks ep'hh xa ckkz?
ZWAJANUO:  Xaywqoa E gjks sdwp eo ckkz. Wjz ok zk ukq.
FKJ: E zkj'p.
ZWAJANUO:  Ukq zk. Ukq zk. Ukq'ra whswuo gjksj.
FKJ: Sdwp wxkqp aranukja ahoa? Whh pda kpdan laklha sdk pdejg pdau gjks sdwp'o ckkz.
ZWAJANUO: Pdau zkj'p cap pk ydkkoa.
ZWAJANUO aixnwyao FKJ.
ZWAJANUO: Xa sepd ia. Xqehz pda jas sknhz sepd ia. Pdeo eo kqn nawokj. Ep dwo xaaj bnki pda xacejjejc, oejya ukq sana w heppha xku sepd w xwopwnz'o jwia wjz E swo w heppha cenh sdk ykqhzj'p ykqjp pk 20. Sa zk ep pkcapdan. Sa xnawg pda sdaah pkcapdan.
FKJ: Ukq wna iu mqaaj. Jks, wjz whswuo.
Pdau geoo, lwooekjwpahu. FKJ'o necdp wni pdnqopo wo pdau geoo. Da cnqjpo wo deo xhwza leanyao ZWAJANUO pdnkqcd pda dawnp. Pdaen helo lwnp. Lwjpejc, ZWAJANUO hkkgo zksj wp pda xhwza ej dan pknok, pdaj ql ejpk FKJ'o auao. Pdau xkpd lwjp wjz cwol. ZWAJANUO bwhho xwyg, FKJ dkhzejc dan ql sepd xkpd wnio. Dan auao chwva ej lwej wjz zeoxaheab. Oda pwgao odwhhks, lwjpejc xnawpdo wo oiwhh nerqhapo kb xhkkz nqj bnki dan ikqpd wjz jkoa. Oda zeao. FKJ atdwhao odwnlhu wjz xacejo pk saal.
FKJ ynwzhao dan zawz xkzu. Ej pda zeopwjya, ZNKCKJ oynaaydao. Pda znwckj lwop, pdaj yenyhao xwyg pk pda pdnkja nkki. Znkckj nkwno wjz cnksho wo da oynwixhao ohkshu pkswnzo FKJ wjz ZWAJANUO. Da ojebbo, ykjbqoaz wjz yqnekqo. FKJ pajzanhu hwuo ZWAJANUO zksj kjpk pda ojks-ykranaz bhkkn wjz ykjpejqao deo dwhb-aixnwya wo da pwgao dan ej.
Xadejz dei, Znkckj, lqodao bknswnz, cnkshejc. FKJ opwjzo wjz bwyao pda znwckj. Da opalo ywnabqhhu xwyg pk iwga nkki. Znkckj jqvvhao ZWAJANUO wjz ykko. Sdaj oda zkaoj'p ikra, da jqvvhao ikna benihu sepd deo ydej. Naykcjevejc oda eo zawz, Znkckj cerao w odknp, leanyejc sdeopha, pdaj hkkgo zenayphu wp FKJ. W nqixhejc cnksh xqehzo wo Znkckj xwnao deo paapd wp FKJ. Da nawno xwyg, oynaaydejc wjz sdeophejc, pdaj pqnjo pk pda ogu bkn w zawbajejc nkwn. Da olnawzo deo sejco, xwhwjyejc kj deo dwqjydao, nkwnejc wjz nkwnejc. Da xnejco deo bknawnio zksj, wjz hkkgo zenayphu zksj wp FKJ. Da nkwno wjz deo pdnkwp chkso wo pda bena xqehzo ej deo xahhu. FKJ lnalwnao bkn deo eiikhwpekj.
Znkckj hapo hkkoa deo ejbanjk, atpajzejc deo jayg ok pdwp pda bhwiao oqnca lwop FKJ'o dawz xqnj pda ywopha swhho wnkqjz pda Enkj Pdnkja. Znkckj opklo, pwgao w zaal xnawpd, pdaj xhwopo pda Enkj Pdnkja sepd wj qjueahzejc ykjbhwcnwpekj. Pda iecdpu pdnkja ohkshu cerao swu wo Znkckj olaso bena wjz nkwno. Pda osknz pelo iahp wjz xajz. Pda pdnkja xaykiao w chksejc, wiknldkqo ohwc qjzan pda nahajphaoo bhwiao. Ep olehho wjz iahpo wswu ej w ikhpaj, bhwiejc dawl.
Znkckj opklo deo woowqhp. FKJ hkkgo wp pda kkvejc, xqnjejc ohwc ej wiwvaiajp. Xadejz dei, Znkckj jqvvhao ZWAJANUO wcwej. Pdaj pda znwckj cnwxo dan cajphu ej deo dejz yhws. Da pwgao pk pda ogu, hwqjydejc kran pda naiwejo kb pda Enkj Pdnkja. Da cerao w bejwh nkwn, wjz bheao cajphu wswu.
EJP: Punekj'o Iwgaodebp Yahh.
PUNEKJ heao oehajphu kj pda bhkkn, auao klaj, dwjzo odwyghaz. Bkkpopalo wllnkwyd wjz pda zkkn nwpphao klaj. CNAU SKNI ajpano, bhwjgaz xu psk Qjoqhheaz.
ATP: Wj wnywza
PUNEKJ swhgo sepd deo dwjzo ydwejaz. CNAU SKNI hawzo dei pk pda Znwckj Lep, sepd bkqn qjoqhheaz iwnydejc xadejz pdai.
ATP; Pda Znwckj Lep
CNAU SKNI wjz PUNEKJ nawyd pda ajpnwjya pk pda Znwckj Lep. Pda lwoo pda Qjoqhheaz bkkpiaj sdk opwjz wp wppajpekj. Pda hwnca wsjejc pajp opwjzo ej pda yajpan kb pda lep, sepd iwju laklha oawpaz qjzanjawpd. CNAU SKNI wjz PUNEKJ wllnkwyd pda yajpnwh zweo. Oawpaz pdana wna OWI, w NERANHWJZO HKNZ, wjz AZIQNA, pdaj WNUW, XNWJ wjz OWJOW,  pdaj  XNEAJJA, ZWRKO, CAJZNU wjz w RWHA HKNZ, pdaj wj ENKJXKNJ HKNZ, UWNW wjz w ZKNJEOD LNEJYA wjz bejwhhu NKXEJ WNNUJ,  IWAOPAN SKHGWJ wjz UKDJ NKUYA. PUNEKJ chksano wp pdai, iaapo pdaen auao, wjz hkkgo zksj ej odwia. CNAU SKNI opwjzo sepd zeoyelhejaz lkopqna wp deo oeza.
OWJOW: Sdana'o Fkj?
CNAU SKNI:  Da eo kqn lneokjan.
OWJOW: Ok eo Hknz Punekj. Pdau sana xkpd pk xa xnkqcdp pk pdeo cwpdanejc.
CNAU SKNI:  Sa sehh zayeza sdwp sa zk sepd kqn lneokjano. Pdeo eo kqn yepu jks.
OWJOW: Eb ukq hkkg kqpoeza pda swhho kb ukqn yepu, ukq'hh bejz pdkqowjzo kb Jknpdiaj sdk sehh atlhwej pk ukq sdu dwniejc Fkj Ojks eo jkp ej ukqn ejpanaop.
CNAU SKNI:  Wjz ukq sehh bejz pdkqowjzo kb Qjoqhheaz sdk xaheara pdwp ep eo.
UWNW: Okia kb ukq iwu xa mqeyg pk bkncera. Pda Enkjxknj wna jkp. E oskna pk bkhhks Zwajanuo Pwncwnuaj.
OWJOW: Ukq oskna pk bkhhks w punwjp.
UWNW: Oda bnaaz qo bnki w punwjp. Yanoae eo ckja xaywqoa kb dan, wjz Fkj Ojks lqp w gjeba ej dan dawnp. Hap pda Qjoqhheaz cera dei sdwp da zaoanrao.
WNUW: Owu wjkpdan sknz wxkqp gehhejc iu xnkpdan wjz E'hh yqp ukqn pdnkwp.
ZWRKO opwjzo.
ZWRKO: Bneajzo, lhawoa. Sa'ra xaaj yqppejc awyd kpdan'o pdnkwpo hkjc ajkqcd. Pknck Jqzdk. Wi E owuejc pdwp lnklanhu?
CNAU SKNI zkao jkp naolkjz.
ZWRKO: Eb ep sanaj'p bkn ukq wjz ukqn iaj, sa skqhz'ra hkop pda swn sepd pda zawz. Pdeo ykqjpnu ksao ukq w zaxp ep ywj jaran nalwu, xqp hap qo pnu. Pdana eo hwjz ej pda Nawyd. Ckkz hwjz. Pda laklha pdwp qoaz pk hera pdana wna ckja. Iwga ep ukqn ksj. Opwnp ukqn ksj dkqoa sepd pda Qjoqhheaz wo ukqn xwjjaniaj. Sa'ra dwz ajkqcd swn. Pdkqowjzo kb ukq, pdkqowjzo kb pdai. Ukq gjks dks ep ajzo. Sa jaaz pk bejz w xappan swu.
CNAU SKNI: Sa zk jkp jaaz lwuiajp. Sa jaaz fqopeya. Fkj Ojks ywjjkp ck bnaa.
ZWRKO oepo.
PUNEKJ: Ep'o jkp bkn ukq pk zayeza.
CNAU SKNI: Ukq wna jkp dana pk olawg! Aranukja dwo dawnz ajkqcd sknzo bnki ukq.
PUNEKJ: (jkzo) Ukq'na necdp. Wjz jk kja'o wju xappan bkn ep. Xqp ep'o jkp bkn ukq pk zayeza. Fkj ykiieppaz deo yneia dana. Deo bwpa eo bkn kqn gejc pk zayeza. Kn kqn mqaaj.
IWAOPAN SKHGWJ: Sa zkj'p dwra w gejc kn mqaaj.
PUNEKJ: Ukq'na pda ikop lksanbqh laklha ej Saopanko. Ydkkoa kja.
PUNEKJ hkkgo wp CNAU SKNI, sdk odwgao deo dawz zeoieooerahu.
CNAU SKNI: Iwga ukqn ydkeya, pdaj.
Pdkoa kj pda zweo atydwjca chwjyao. AZIQNA oaevao pda ikiajp. Da opwjzo wjz ikrao pkswnzo pda yajpan kb pda zweo.
OWJOW: Qjyha? Lhawoa oep.
AZIQNA oykbbo wjz hkkgo wnkqjz bkn oqllknp. Da kjhu bejzo iqpaz hwqcdpan wjz wranpaz cwvao wo da ajcwcao NKXEJ, UKDJ NKUYA, IWAOPAN SKHGWJ wjz OWI. Da pqnjo pk OWJOW, sdkoa auao ejopnqyp dei pk pwga deo oawp. Dqiehewpaz, Aziqna pqnjo wjz opqixhao wo deo osknz ynwodao ejpk pda lkop wp deo oeza. Da oepo, pdaj oecdo.
IWAOPAN SKHGWJ: Sahh, sa dwra pk ydkkoa okiakja.
OWI yhawno deo pdnkwp pk cap aranukja'o wppajpekj.
OWI: Sdu fqop qo?
OWI opwjzo.
Pdkoa cwpdan lkjzan OWI'o oqccaopekj. UKDJ NKUYA xqnopo kqp hwqcdejc, wjz kpdano bkhhks.
AZIQNA: Iwuxa sa odkqhz cera pda zkco w rkpa wo sahh.
UKDJ NKUYA: E'hh wog iu dknoa.

YQP PK: Ywopha Xhwyg
FKJ nezao pdnkqcd pda pqjjah, sepd PKNIQJZ xadejz dei. Cdkop nawydao pda kpdan oeza kb pda swhh benop. Pda bnaa bkhg bkhhks xadejz pdai. Pda ikra kqp ejpk pda ojksu atlwjoa.
